Original Transcriber's Notes:
Nooooooo Noooooooooo'n Noooo:




This text is a combination of etexts, one from the now-defunct ERIS
Nooo nooo no n noooooooooo no nooooo, noo nooo noo noo-noooooo NOOO

project at Virginia Tech and one from Project Gutenberg's archives. The
noooooo no Nooooooo Nooo noo noo nooo Noooooo Noooooooo'n nooooooo. Noo

proofreaders of this version are indebted to The University of Adelaide
nooooooooooo no nooo noooooo noo nooooooo no Noo Nooooooooo no Nooooooo

Library for preserving the Virginia Tech version. The resulting etext
Noooooo noo nooooooooo noo Nooooooo Nooo noooooo. Noo noooooooo noooo

was compared with a public domain hard copy version of the text.
noo nooooooo nooo n nooooo nooooo nooo nooo noooooo no noo nooo.




In chapters 24, 89, and 90, we substituted a capital L for the symbol
No nooooooo no, no, noo no, no noooooooooo n noooooo N noo noo nooooo

for the British pound, a unit of currency.
noo noo Noooooo noooo, n nooo no nooooooo.













ETYMOLOGY.
NOOOOOOOO.




(Supplied by a Late Consumptive Usher to a Grammar School)
(Nooooooo no n Nooo Noooooooooo Noooo no n Noooooo Nooooo)




The pale Usher--threadbare in coat, heart, body, and brain; I see him
Noo nooo Noooo--nooooooooo no nooo, noooo, nooo, noo noooo; N noo noo

now. He was ever dusting his old lexicons and grammars, with a queer
noo. No noo nooo noooooo noo noo nooooooo noo nooooooo, nooo n noooo

handkerchief, mockingly embellished with all the gay flags of all
nooooooooooo, noooooooo noooooooooo nooo noo noo noo noooo no noo

the known nations of the world. He loved to dust his old grammars; it
noo noooo noooooo no noo noooo. No noooo no nooo noo noo nooooooo; no

somehow mildly reminded him of his mortality.
noooooo nooooo nooooooo noo no noo noooooooo.




"While you take in hand to school others, and to teach them by what
"Noooo noo nooo no nooo no nooooo nooooo, noo no noooo nooo no nooo

name a whale-fish is to be called in our tongue leaving out, through
nooo n noooo-nooo no no no nooooo no noo nooooo noooooo noo, noooooo

ignorance, the letter H, which almost alone maketh the signification of
noooooooo, noo nooooo N, noooo nooooo noooo nooooo noo noooooooooooo no

the word, you deliver that which is not true." --HACKLUYT
noo nooo, noo noooooo nooo noooo no noo nooo." --NOOOOOOO




"WHALE.... Sw. and Dan. HVAL. This animal is named from roundness or
"NOOOO.... No. noo Noo. NOOO. Nooo nooooo no noooo nooo noooooooo no

rolling; for in Dan. HVALT is arched or vaulted." --WEBSTER'S DICTIONARY
noooooo; noo no Noo. NOOOO no nooooo no noooooo." --NOOOOOO'N NOOOOOOOOO




"WHALE.... It is more immediately from the Dut. and Ger. WALLEN; A.S.
"NOOOO.... No no nooo noooooooooo nooo noo Noo. noo Noo. NOOOOO; N.N.

WALW-IAN, to roll, to wallow." --RICHARDSON'S DICTIONARY
NOOO-NOO, no nooo, no nooooo." --NOOOOOOOOO'N NOOOOOOOOO




     KETOS,               GREEK.
     NOOOO,               NOOOO.

     CETUS,               LATIN.
     NOOOO,               NOOOO.

     WHOEL,               ANGLO-SAXON.
     NOOOO,               NOOOO-NOOOO.

     HVALT,               DANISH.
     NOOOO,               NOOOOO.

     WAL,                 DUTCH.

EXTRACTS (Supplied by a Sub-Sub-Librarian).
NOOOOOOO (Nooooooo no n Noo-Noo-Noooooooo).




It will be seen that this mere painstaking burrower and grub-worm of a
No nooo no nooo nooo nooo nooo noooooooooo nooooooo noo nooo-nooo no n

poor devil of a Sub-Sub appears to have gone through the long Vaticans
nooo noooo no n Noo-Noo noooooo no nooo nooo noooooo noo nooo Nooooooo

and street-stalls of the earth, picking up whatever random allusions to
noo nooooo-nooooo no noo noooo, noooooo no nooooooo nooooo noooooooo no

whales he could anyways find in any book whatsoever, sacred or
nooooo no noooo noooooo nooo no noo nooo nooooooooo, nooooo no

profane. Therefore you must not, in every case at least, take the
noooooo. Noooooooo noo nooo noo, no noooo nooo no noooo, nooo noo

higgledy-piggledy whale statements, however authentic, in these
nooooooo-nooooooo noooo nooooooooo, noooooo noooooooo, no noooo

extracts, for veritable gospel cetology. Far from it. As touching the
nooooooo, noo noooooooo nooooo nooooooo. Noo nooo no. No nooooooo noo

ancient authors generally, as well as the poets here appearing, these
noooooo noooooo noooooooo, no nooo no noo noooo nooo noooooooo, noooo

extracts are solely valuable or entertaining, as affording a glancing
nooooooo noo nooooo nooooooo no nooooooooooo, no noooooooo n nooooooo

bird's eye view of what has been promiscuously said, thought, fancied,
nooo'n noo nooo no nooo noo nooo noooooooooooo nooo, noooooo, noooooo,

and sung of Leviathan, by many nations and generations, including our
noo nooo no Noooooooo, no nooo noooooo noo noooooooooo, noooooooo noo

own.
noo.




So fare thee well, poor devil of a Sub-Sub, whose commentator I am. Thou
No nooo nooo nooo, nooo noooo no n Noo-Noo, noooo noooooooooo N no. Nooo

belongest to that hopeless, sallow tribe which no wine of this world
noooooooo no nooo nooooooo, nooooo noooo noooo no nooo no nooo noooo

will ever warm; and for whom even Pale Sherry would be too rosy-strong;
nooo nooo nooo; noo noo nooo nooo Nooo Nooooo noooo no noo nooo-nooooo;

but with whom one sometimes loves to sit, and feel poor-devilish, too;
noo nooo nooo noo noooooooo noooo no noo, noo nooo nooo-nooooooo, noo;

and grow convivial upon tears; and say to them bluntly, with full eyes
noo nooo noooooooo nooo noooo; noo noo no nooo noooooo, nooo nooo nooo

and empty glasses, and in not altogether unpleasant sadness--Give it up,
noo noooo noooooo, noo no noo nooooooooo nooooooooo noooooo--Nooo no no,

Sub-Subs! For by how much the more pains ye take to please the world,
Noo-Nooo! Noo no noo nooo noo nooo noooo no nooo no nooooo noo noooo,

by so much the more shall ye for ever go thankless! Would that I could
no no nooo noo nooo noooo no noo nooo no noooooooo! Noooo nooo N noooo

clear out Hampton Court and the Tuileries for ye! But gulp down your
noooo noo Noooooo Noooo noo noo Noooooooo noo no! Noo nooo nooo nooo

tears and hie aloft to the royal-mast with your hearts; for your friends
noooo noo noo noooo no noo noooo-nooo nooo nooo nooooo; noo nooo noooooo

who have gone before are clearing out the seven-storied heavens, and
noo nooo nooo nooooo noo nooooooo noo noo noooo-noooooo noooooo, noo

making refugees of long-pampered Gabriel, Michael, and Raphael, against
nooooo nooooooo no nooo-nooooooo Noooooo, Noooooo, noo Noooooo, noooooo

your coming. Here ye strike but splintered hearts together--there, ye
nooo nooooo. Nooo no nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooo nooooooo--noooo, no

shall strike unsplinterable glasses!
noooo nooooo nooooooooooooo noooooo!

be hoary." --JOB.
no noooo." --NOO.




"Now the Lord had prepared a great fish to swallow up Jonah." --JONAH.
"Noo noo Nooo noo nooooooo n noooo nooo no noooooo no Noooo." --NOOOO.

"Noooo no noo noooo; noooo no nooo Noooooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo no nooo

therein." --PSALMS.
noooooo." --NOOOOO.




"In that day, the Lord with his sore, and great, and strong sword,
"No nooo noo, noo Nooo nooo noo nooo, noo noooo, noo nooooo noooo,

shall punish Leviathan the piercing serpent, even Leviathan that crooked
noooo nooooo Noooooooo noo nooooooo noooooo, nooo Noooooooo nooo noooooo

serpent; and he shall slay the dragon that is in the sea." --ISAIAH
noooooo; noo no noooo nooo noo nooooo nooo no no noo noo." --NOOOOO




"And what thing soever besides cometh within the chaos of this monster's
"Noo nooo noooo nooooo noooooo nooooo nooooo noo noooo no nooo noooooo'n

mouth, be it beast, boat, or stone, down it goes all incontinently that
noooo, no no noooo, nooo, no noooo, nooo no nooo noo noooooooooooo nooo

foul great swallow of his, and perisheth in the bottomless gulf of his
nooo noooo noooooo no noo, noo noooooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo no noo

paunch." --HOLLAND'S PLUTARCH'S MORALS.
nooooo." --NOOOOOO'N NOOOOOOO'N NOOOOO.




"The Indian Sea breedeth the most and the biggest fishes that are: among
"Noo Nooooo Noo nooooooo noo nooo noo noo noooooo nooooo nooo noo: noooo

which the Whales and Whirlpooles called Balaene, take up as much in
noooo noo Nooooo noo Noooooooooo nooooo Noooooo, nooo no no nooo no

length as four acres or arpens of land." --HOLLAND'S PLINY.
nooooo no nooo noooo no nooooo no nooo." --NOOOOOO'N NOOOO.




"Scarcely had we proceeded two days on the sea, when about sunrise a
"Nooooooo noo no noooooooo noo nooo no noo noo, nooo noooo noooooo n

great many Whales and other monsters of the sea, appeared. Among the
noooo nooo Nooooo noo noooo nooooooo no noo noo, nooooooo. Noooo noo

former, one was of a most monstrous size.... This came towards us,
nooooo, noo noo no n nooo noooooooo nooo.... Nooo nooo noooooo no,

open-mouthed, raising the waves on all sides, and beating the sea before
nooo-noooooo, noooooo noo noooo no noo noooo, noo noooooo noo noo nooooo

him into a foam." --TOOKE'S LUCIAN. "THE TRUE HISTORY."
noo nooo n nooo." --NOOOO'N NOOOOO. "NOO NOOO NOOOOOO."




"He visited this country also with a view of catching horse-whales,
"No noooooo nooo noooooo nooo nooo n nooo no nooooooo noooo-nooooo,

which had bones of very great value for their teeth, of which he brought
noooo noo noooo no nooo noooo noooo noo noooo noooo, no noooo no noooooo

some to the king.... The best whales were catched in his own country, of
nooo no noo nooo.... Noo nooo nooooo nooo noooooo no noo noo noooooo, no

which some were forty-eight, some fifty yards long. He said that he was
noooo nooo nooo noooo-noooo, nooo noooo noooo nooo. No nooo nooo no noo

one of six who had killed sixty in two days." --OTHER OR OTHER'S VERBAL
noo no noo noo noo nooooo noooo no noo nooo." --NOOOO NO NOOOO'N NOOOOO

"We set sail from the Elbe, wind N.E. in the ship called The
"No noo nooo nooo noo Nooo, nooo N.N. no noo nooo nooooo Noo

"Noo nooo noo noooooo no noooooo nooo noooo noooo noooooo, noo

nooooooooo Noooo Noooo noooo nooo noo nooo; no noooo noo nooooooo nooo,

no noo noooo nooo noo nooo; nooo noo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo nooo

noo, no n nooooooooo noooo no nooo, no noooooooo no nooooo (no noo Noooo

"Noo Nooooooo" (Noooo Noooo) "no noo nooo nooooo noooo nooo noo Nooo

nooooo n nooooooo nooooooo nooo, nooo noo nooo noooooooo no n nooo nooo

no noo nooo no noo nooo." --N NOOOOOO NO NOOOOOO NO NOOO NOO NOOOOO.

"No noo nooooooo N noo noo no noooo nooooooo (nooooo) nooooooo nooo noo

nooooo, nooooo nooooooo, noo noooo noo noooo, nooooo nooo nooo n noooo'n

nooooooo noo nooooooo." --NOOOOO'N NOOOOO NO N NOOOOOOOOO.




"'Stern all!' exclaimed the mate, as upon turning his head, he saw the
"'Noooo noo!' noooooooo noo nooo, no nooo noooooo noo nooo, no noo noo

     No noo noooo nooo nooo no

CHAPTER 1. Loomings.
NOOOOOO n. Nooooooo.







Call me Ishmael. Some years ago--never mind how long precisely--having
Nooo no Noooooo. Nooo noooo noo--noooo nooo noo nooo noooooooo--nooooo

little or no money in my purse, and nothing particular to interest me on
nooooo no no noooo no no noooo, noo noooooo nooooooooo no nooooooo no no

shore, I thought I would sail about a little and see the watery part of
noooo, N noooooo N noooo nooo noooo n nooooo noo noo noo nooooo nooo no

the world. It is a way I have of driving off the spleen and regulating
noo noooo. No no n noo N nooo no noooooo noo noo nooooo noo nooooooooo

the circulation. Whenever I find myself growing grim about the mouth;
noo noooooooooo. Nooooooo N nooo nooooo noooooo nooo noooo noo noooo;

whenever it is a damp, drizzly November in my soul; whenever I find
nooooooo no no n nooo, noooooo Nooooooo no no nooo; nooooooo N nooo

myself involuntarily pausing before coffin warehouses, and bringing up
nooooo noooooooooooo noooooo nooooo nooooo nooooooooo, noo nooooooo no

the rear of every funeral I meet; and especially whenever my hypos get
noo nooo no noooo noooooo N nooo; noo nooooooooo nooooooo no noooo noo

such an upper hand of me, that it requires a strong moral principle to
nooo no noooo nooo no no, nooo no nooooooo n nooooo noooo noooooooo no

prevent me from deliberately stepping into the street, and methodically
noooooo no nooo nooooooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo, noo nooooooooooo

knocking people's hats off--then, I account it high time to get to sea
nooooooo nooooo'n nooo noo--nooo, N noooooo no nooo nooo no noo no noo

as soon as I can. This is my substitute for pistol and ball. With a
no nooo no N noo. Nooo no no nooooooooo noo nooooo noo nooo. Nooo n

philosophical flourish Cato throws himself upon his sword; I quietly
noooooooooooo nooooooo Nooo nooooo noooooo nooo noo noooo; N noooooo

take to the ship. There is nothing surprising in this. If they but knew
nooo no noo nooo. Noooo no noooooo nooooooooo no nooo. No nooo noo nooo

it, almost all men in their degree, some time or other, cherish very
no, nooooo noo noo no noooo nooooo, nooo nooo no noooo, noooooo nooo

nearly the same feelings towards the ocean with me.
nooooo noo nooo nooooooo noooooo noo noooo nooo no.




There now is your insular city of the Manhattoes, belted round by
Noooo noo no nooo noooooo nooo no noo Nooooooooo, nooooo noooo no

wharves as Indian isles by coral reefs--commerce surrounds it with
noooooo no Nooooo noooo no noooo noooo--nooooooo noooooooo no nooo

her surf. Right and left, the streets take you waterward. Its extreme
noo nooo. Noooo noo nooo, noo noooooo nooo noo noooooooo. Noo noooooo

downtown is the battery, where that noble mole is washed by waves, and
nooooooo no noo noooooo, noooo nooo noooo nooo no nooooo no noooo, noo

cooled by breezes, which a few hours previous were out of sight of land.
nooooo no noooooo, noooo n noo noooo nooooooo nooo noo no noooo no nooo.

Look at the crowds of water-gazers there.
Nooo no noo nooooo no noooo-nooooo noooo.




Circumambulate the city of a dreamy Sabbath afternoon. Go from Corlears
Nooooooooooooo noo nooo no n nooooo Noooooo noooooooo. No nooo Nooooooo

Hook to Coenties Slip, and from thence, by Whitehall, northward. What
Nooo no Nooooooo Nooo, noo nooo nooooo, no Noooooooo, noooooooo. Nooo

do you see?--Posted like silent sentinels all around the town, stand
no noo noo?--Nooooo nooo nooooo noooooooo noo nooooo noo nooo, noooo

thousands upon thousands of mortal men fixed in ocean reveries. Some
noooooooo nooo noooooooo no nooooo noo noooo no noooo nooooooo. Nooo

leaning against the spiles; some seated upon the pier-heads; some
noooooo noooooo noo nooooo; nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo-noooo; nooo

looking over the bulwarks of ships from China; some high aloft in the
noooooo nooo noo nooooooo no noooo nooo Noooo; nooo nooo noooo no noo

rigging, as if striving to get a still better seaward peep. But these
noooooo, no no nooooooo no noo n noooo nooooo noooooo nooo. Noo noooo

are all landsmen; of week days pent up in lath and plaster--tied to
noo noo nooooooo; no nooo nooo nooo no no nooo noo noooooo--nooo no

counters, nailed to benches, clinched to desks. How then is this? Are
nooooooo, nooooo no noooooo, nooooooo no noooo. Noo nooo no nooo? Noo

the green fields gone? What do they here?
noo noooo nooooo nooo? Nooo no nooo nooo?




But look! here come more crowds, pacing straight for the water, and
Noo nooo! nooo nooo nooo nooooo, nooooo nooooooo noo noo noooo, noo

seemingly bound for a dive. Strange! Nothing will content them but the
noooooooo noooo noo n nooo. Noooooo! Noooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo noo

extremest limit of the land; loitering under the shady lee of yonder
noooooooo noooo no noo nooo; noooooooo noooo noo noooo noo no nooooo

warehouses will not suffice. No. They must get just as nigh the water
nooooooooo nooo noo noooooo. No. Nooo nooo noo nooo no nooo noo noooo

as they possibly can without falling in. And there they stand--miles of
no nooo nooooooo noo noooooo noooooo no. Noo noooo nooo noooo--noooo no

them--leagues. Inlanders all, they come from lanes and alleys, streets
nooo--noooooo. Noooooooo noo, nooo nooo nooo noooo noo nooooo, noooooo

and avenues--north, east, south, and west. Yet here they all unite.
noo noooooo--noooo, nooo, noooo, noo nooo. Noo nooo nooo noo noooo.

Tell me, does the magnetic virtue of the needles of the compasses of all
Nooo no, nooo noo nooooooo nooooo no noo noooooo no noo noooooooo no noo

those ships attract them thither?
noooo noooo noooooo nooo noooooo?




Once more. Say you are in the country; in some high land of lakes. Take
Nooo nooo. Noo noo noo no noo noooooo; no nooo nooo nooo no noooo. Nooo

almost any path you please, and ten to one it carries you down in a
nooooo noo nooo noo nooooo, noo noo no noo no noooooo noo nooo no n

dale, and leaves you there by a pool in the stream. There is magic
nooo, noo nooooo noo noooo no n nooo no noo nooooo. Noooo no noooo

in it. Let the most absent-minded of men be plunged in his deepest
no no. Noo noo nooo nooooo-nooooo no noo no noooooo no noo noooooo

reveries--stand that man on his legs, set his feet a-going, and he will
nooooooo--noooo nooo noo no noo nooo, noo noo nooo n-noooo, noo no nooo

infallibly lead you to water, if water there be in all that region.
nooooooooo nooo noo no noooo, no noooo noooo no no noo nooo nooooo.

Should you ever be athirst in the great American desert, try this
Nooooo noo nooo no noooooo no noo noooo Nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo

experiment, if your caravan happen to be supplied with a metaphysical
nooooooooo, no nooo noooooo nooooo no no nooooooo nooo n nooooooooooo

professor. Yes, as every one knows, meditation and water are wedded for
noooooooo. Noo, no noooo noo noooo, nooooooooo noo noooo noo nooooo noo

ever.
nooo.




But here is an artist. He desires to paint you the dreamiest, shadiest,
Noo nooo no no nooooo. No noooooo no noooo noo noo noooooooo, nooooooo,

quietest, most enchanting bit of romantic landscape in all the valley of
nooooooo, nooo nooooooooo noo no nooooooo noooooooo no noo noo nooooo no

the Saco. What is the chief element he employs? There stand his trees,
noo Nooo. Nooo no noo noooo noooooo no noooooo? Noooo noooo noo noooo,

each with a hollow trunk, as if a hermit and a crucifix were within; and
nooo nooo n nooooo noooo, no no n nooooo noo n nooooooo nooo nooooo; noo

here sleeps his meadow, and there sleep his cattle; and up from yonder
nooo nooooo noo nooooo, noo noooo noooo noo nooooo; noo no nooo nooooo

cottage goes a sleepy smoke. Deep into distant woodlands winds a
noooooo nooo n nooooo noooo. Nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo noooo n

mazy way, reaching to overlapping spurs of mountains bathed in their
nooo noo, nooooooo no noooooooooo noooo no noooooooo nooooo no noooo

hill-side blue. But though the picture lies thus tranced, and though
nooo-nooo nooo. Noo nooooo noo noooooo nooo nooo noooooo, noo nooooo

this pine-tree shakes down its sighs like leaves upon this shepherd's
nooo nooo-nooo nooooo nooo noo noooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo nooooooo'n

head, yet all were vain, unless the shepherd's eye were fixed upon the
nooo, noo noo nooo nooo, nooooo noo nooooooo'n noo nooo noooo nooo noo

magic stream before him. Go visit the Prairies in June, when for scores
noooo nooooo nooooo noo. No noooo noo Nooooooo no Nooo, nooo noo nooooo

on scores of miles you wade knee-deep among Tiger-lilies--what is the
no nooooo no noooo noo nooo nooo-nooo noooo Noooo-nooooo--nooo no noo

one charm wanting?--Water--there is not a drop of water there! Were
noo noooo noooooo?--Noooo--noooo no noo n nooo no noooo noooo! Nooo

Niagara but a cataract of sand, would you travel your thousand miles to
Noooooo noo n nooooooo no nooo, noooo noo nooooo nooo nooooooo noooo no

see it? Why did the poor poet of Tennessee, upon suddenly receiving two
noo no? Noo noo noo nooo nooo no Noooooooo, nooo nooooooo noooooooo noo

handfuls of silver, deliberate whether to buy him a coat, which he sadly
nooooooo no nooooo, nooooooooo noooooo no noo noo n nooo, noooo no noooo

needed, or invest his money in a pedestrian trip to Rockaway Beach? Why
nooooo, no nooooo noo noooo no n nooooooooo nooo no Nooooooo Noooo? Noo

is almost every robust healthy boy with a robust healthy soul in him, at
no nooooo noooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo n nooooo noooooo nooo no noo, no

some time or other crazy to go to sea? Why upon your first voyage as a
nooo nooo no noooo noooo no no no noo? Noo nooo nooo noooo nooooo no n

passenger, did you yourself feel such a mystical vibration, when first
noooooooo, noo noo nooooooo nooo nooo n nooooooo noooooooo, nooo noooo

told that you and your ship were now out of sight of land? Why did the
nooo nooo noo noo nooo nooo nooo noo noo no noooo no nooo? Noo noo noo

old Persians hold the sea holy? Why did the Greeks give it a separate
noo Nooooooo nooo noo noo nooo? Noo noo noo Nooooo nooo no n nooooooo

deity, and own brother of Jove? Surely all this is not without meaning.
noooo, noo noo noooooo no Nooo? Nooooo noo nooo no noo noooooo noooooo.

And still deeper the meaning of that story of Narcissus, who because
Noo noooo nooooo noo noooooo no nooo noooo no Noooooooo, noo noooooo

he could not grasp the tormenting, mild image he saw in the fountain,
no noooo noo noooo noo nooooooooo, nooo noooo no noo no noo nooooooo,

plunged into it and was drowned. But that same image, we ourselves see
noooooo nooo no noo noo noooooo. Noo nooo nooo noooo, no noooooooo noo

in all rivers and oceans. It is the image of the ungraspable phantom of
no noo nooooo noo nooooo. No no noo noooo no noo noooooooooo noooooo no

life; and this is the key to it all.
nooo; noo nooo no noo noo no no noo.




Now, when I say that I am in the habit of going to sea whenever I begin
Noo, nooo N noo nooo N no no noo noooo no noooo no noo nooooooo N noooo

to grow hazy about the eyes, and begin to be over conscious of my lungs,
no nooo nooo noooo noo nooo, noo noooo no no nooo noooooooo no no noooo,

I do not mean to have it inferred that I ever go to sea as a passenger.
N no noo nooo no nooo no nooooooo nooo N nooo no no noo no n noooooooo.

For to go as a passenger you must needs have a purse, and a purse is
Noo no no no n noooooooo noo nooo noooo nooo n noooo, noo n noooo no

but a rag unless you have something in it. Besides, passengers get
noo n noo nooooo noo nooo noooooooo no no. Noooooo, nooooooooo noo

sea-sick--grow quarrelsome--don't sleep of nights--do not enjoy
noo-nooo--nooo noooooooooo--noo'n noooo no nooooo--no noo noooo

themselves much, as a general thing;--no, I never go as a passenger;
nooooooooo nooo, no n noooooo noooo;--no, N noooo no no n noooooooo;

nor, though I am something of a salt, do I ever go to sea as a
noo, nooooo N no noooooooo no n nooo, no N nooo no no noo no n

Commodore, or a Captain, or a Cook. I abandon the glory and distinction
Noooooooo, no n Noooooo, no n Nooo. N noooooo noo noooo noo noooooooooo

of such offices to those who like them. For my part, I abominate all
no nooo noooooo no noooo noo nooo nooo. Noo no nooo, N noooooooo noo

honourable respectable toils, trials, and tribulations of every kind
nooooooooo noooooooooo noooo, nooooo, noo nooooooooooo no noooo nooo

whatsoever. It is quite as much as I can do to take care of myself,
nooooooooo. No no noooo no nooo no N noo no no nooo nooo no nooooo,

without taking care of ships, barques, brigs, schooners, and what not.
noooooo nooooo nooo no noooo, noooooo, noooo, noooooooo, noo nooo noo.

And as for going as cook,--though I confess there is considerable glory
Noo no noo noooo no nooo,--nooooo N noooooo noooo no nooooooooooo noooo

in that, a cook being a sort of officer on ship-board--yet, somehow,
no nooo, n nooo noooo n nooo no noooooo no nooo-noooo--noo, noooooo,

I never fancied broiling fowls;--though once broiled, judiciously
N noooo noooooo nooooooo noooo;--nooooo nooo noooooo, noooooooooo

buttered, and judgmatically salted and peppered, there is no one who
nooooooo, noo noooooooooooo nooooo noo nooooooo, noooo no no noo noo

will speak more respectfully, not to say reverentially, of a broiled
nooo noooo nooo nooooooooooo, noo no noo noooooooooooo, no n noooooo

fowl than I will. It is out of the idolatrous dotings of the old
nooo nooo N nooo. No no noo no noo nooooooooo noooooo no noo noo

Egyptians upon broiled ibis and roasted river horse, that you see the
Noooooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo noooooo noooo noooo, nooo noo noo noo

mummies of those creatures in their huge bake-houses the pyramids.
noooooo no noooo noooooooo no noooo nooo nooo-nooooo noo nooooooo.




No, when I go to sea, I go as a simple sailor, right before the mast,
No, nooo N no no noo, N no no n nooooo nooooo, noooo nooooo noo nooo,

plumb down into the forecastle, aloft there to the royal mast-head.
noooo nooo nooo noo nooooooooo, noooo noooo no noo noooo nooo-nooo.

True, they rather order me about some, and make me jump from spar to
Nooo, nooo nooooo noooo no noooo nooo, noo nooo no nooo nooo nooo no

spar, like a grasshopper in a May meadow. And at first, this sort
nooo, nooo n noooooooooo no n Noo nooooo. Noo no noooo, nooo nooo

of thing is unpleasant enough. It touches one's sense of honour,
no noooo no nooooooooo nooooo. No noooooo noo'n noooo no nooooo,

particularly if you come of an old established family in the land, the
nooooooooooo no noo nooo no no noo noooooooooo nooooo no noo nooo, noo

Van Rensselaers, or Randolphs, or Hardicanutes. And more than all,
Noo Noooooooooo, no Noooooooo, no Nooooooooooo. Noo nooo nooo noo,

if just previous to putting your hand into the tar-pot, you have been
no nooo nooooooo no noooooo nooo nooo nooo noo noo-noo, noo nooo nooo

lording it as a country schoolmaster, making the tallest boys stand
noooooo no no n noooooo nooooooooooo, nooooo noo noooooo nooo noooo

in awe of you. The transition is a keen one, I assure you, from a
no noo no noo. Noo nooooooooo no n nooo noo, N nooooo noo, nooo n

schoolmaster to a sailor, and requires a strong decoction of Seneca and
nooooooooooo no n nooooo, noo nooooooo n nooooo noooooooo no Nooooo noo

the Stoics to enable you to grin and bear it. But even this wears off in
noo Nooooo no nooooo noo no nooo noo nooo no. Noo nooo nooo noooo noo no

time.
nooo.




What of it, if some old hunks of a sea-captain orders me to get a broom
Nooo no no, no nooo noo noooo no n noo-noooooo nooooo no no noo n noooo

and sweep down the decks? What does that indignity amount to, weighed,
noo noooo nooo noo noooo? Nooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooo no, noooooo,

I mean, in the scales of the New Testament? Do you think the archangel
N nooo, no noo nooooo no noo Noo Noooooooo? No noo noooo noo noooooooo

Gabriel thinks anything the less of me, because I promptly and
Noooooo nooooo nooooooo noo nooo no no, noooooo N nooooooo noo

respectfully obey that old hunks in that particular instance? Who ain't
nooooooooooo nooo nooo noo noooo no nooo nooooooooo nooooooo? Noo noo'n

a slave? Tell me that. Well, then, however the old sea-captains may
n noooo? Nooo no nooo. Nooo, nooo, noooooo noo noo noo-nooooooo noo

order me about--however they may thump and punch me about, I have the
noooo no noooo--noooooo nooo noo noooo noo noooo no noooo, N nooo noo

satisfaction of knowing that it is all right; that everybody else is
nooooooooooo no noooooo nooo no no noo noooo; nooo noooooooo nooo no

one way or other served in much the same way--either in a physical
noo noo no noooo nooooo no nooo noo nooo noo--nooooo no n nooooooo

or metaphysical point of view, that is; and so the universal thump is
no nooooooooooo noooo no nooo, nooo no; noo no noo noooooooo noooo no

passed round, and all hands should rub each other's shoulder-blades, and
nooooo noooo, noo noo noooo nooooo noo nooo noooo'n nooooooo-nooooo, noo

be content.
no noooooo.




Again, I always go to sea as a sailor, because they make a point of
Noooo, N nooooo no no noo no n nooooo, noooooo nooo nooo n noooo no

paying me for my trouble, whereas they never pay passengers a single
nooooo no noo no noooooo, noooooo nooo noooo noo nooooooooo n nooooo

penny that I ever heard of. On the contrary, passengers themselves must
noooo nooo N nooo noooo no. No noo nooooooo, nooooooooo nooooooooo nooo

pay. And there is all the difference in the world between paying
noo. Noo noooo no noo noo nooooooooo no noo noooo noooooo nooooo

and being paid. The act of paying is perhaps the most uncomfortable
noo noooo nooo. Noo noo no nooooo no noooooo noo nooo noooooooooooo

infliction that the two orchard thieves entailed upon us. But BEING
nooooooooo nooo noo noo noooooo noooooo nooooooo nooo no. Noo NOOOO

PAID,--what will compare with it? The urbane activity with which a man
NOOO,--nooo nooo noooooo nooo no? Noo nooooo nooooooo nooo noooo n noo

receives money is really marvellous, considering that we so earnestly
nooooooo noooo no nooooo nooooooooo, noooooooooo nooo no no noooooooo

believe money to be the root of all earthly ills, and that on no account
noooooo noooo no no noo nooo no noo noooooo nooo, noo nooo no no noooooo

can a monied man enter heaven. Ah! how cheerfully we consign ourselves
noo n nooooo noo noooo nooooo. No! noo nooooooooo no noooooo noooooooo

to perdition!
no noooooooo!




Finally, I always go to sea as a sailor, because of the wholesome
Noooooo, N nooooo no no noo no n nooooo, noooooo no noo noooooooo

exercise and pure air of the fore-castle deck. For as in this world,
nooooooo noo nooo noo no noo nooo-nooooo nooo. Noo no no nooo noooo,

head winds are far more prevalent than winds from astern (that is,
nooo noooo noo noo nooo noooooooo nooo noooo nooo nooooo (nooo no,

if you never violate the Pythagorean maxim), so for the most part the
no noo noooo noooooo noo Noooooooooo noooo), no noo noo nooo nooo noo

Commodore on the quarter-deck gets his atmosphere at second hand from
Noooooooo no noo noooooo-nooo nooo noo nooooooooo no nooooo nooo nooo

the sailors on the forecastle. He thinks he breathes it first; but not
noo noooooo no noo nooooooooo. No nooooo no nooooooo no noooo; noo noo

so. In much the same way do the commonalty lead their leaders in many
no. No nooo noo nooo noo no noo nooooooooo nooo noooo noooooo no nooo

other things, at the same time that the leaders little suspect it.
noooo nooooo, no noo nooo nooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo noooooo no.

But wherefore it was that after having repeatedly smelt the sea as a
Noo noooooooo no noo nooo noooo nooooo nooooooooo noooo noo noo no n

merchant sailor, I should now take it into my head to go on a whaling
nooooooo nooooo, N nooooo noo nooo no nooo no nooo no no no n noooooo

voyage; this the invisible police officer of the Fates, who has the
nooooo; nooo noo noooooooo nooooo noooooo no noo Noooo, noo noo noo

constant surveillance of me, and secretly dogs me, and influences me
nooooooo nooooooooooo no no, noo nooooooo nooo no, noo nooooooooo no

in some unaccountable way--he can better answer than any one else. And,
no nooo noooooooooooo noo--no noo nooooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooo. Noo,

doubtless, my going on this whaling voyage, formed part of the grand
noooooooo, no noooo no nooo noooooo nooooo, nooooo nooo no noo noooo

programme of Providence that was drawn up a long time ago. It came in as
noooooooo no Nooooooooo nooo noo noooo no n nooo nooo noo. No nooo no no

a sort of brief interlude and solo between more extensive performances.
n nooo no noooo noooooooo noo nooo noooooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooooo.

I take it that this part of the bill must have run something like this:
N nooo no nooo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooo nooo noo noooooooo nooo nooo:







"GRAND CONTESTED ELECTION FOR THE PRESIDENCY OF THE UNITED STATES.
"NOOOO NOOOOOOOO NOOOOOOO NOO NOO NOOOOOOOOO NO NOO NOOOOO NOOOOO.




"WHALING VOYAGE BY ONE ISHMAEL.
"NOOOOOO NOOOOO NO NOO NOOOOOO.




"BLOODY BATTLE IN AFFGHANISTAN."
"NOOOOO NOOOOO NO NOOOOOOOOOOO."







Though I cannot tell why it was exactly that those stage managers, the
Nooooo N nooooo nooo noo no noo noooooo nooo noooo noooo nooooooo, noo

Fates, put me down for this shabby part of a whaling voyage, when others
Noooo, noo no nooo noo nooo nooooo nooo no n noooooo nooooo, nooo nooooo

were set down for magnificent parts in high tragedies, and short and
nooo noo nooo noo noooooooooo noooo no nooo noooooooo, noo noooo noo

easy parts in genteel comedies, and jolly parts in farces--though
nooo noooo no noooooo nooooooo, noo noooo noooo no nooooo--nooooo

I cannot tell why this was exactly; yet, now that I recall all the
N nooooo nooo noo nooo noo noooooo; noo, noo nooo N nooooo noo noo

circumstances, I think I can see a little into the springs and motives
noooooooooooo, N noooo N noo noo n nooooo nooo noo noooooo noo noooooo

which being cunningly presented to me under various disguises, induced
noooo noooo noooooooo noooooooo no no noooo noooooo noooooooo, noooooo

me to set about performing the part I did, besides cajoling me into the
no no noo noooo nooooooooo noo nooo N noo, noooooo nooooooo no nooo noo

delusion that it was a choice resulting from my own unbiased freewill
nooooooo nooo no noo n nooooo noooooooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooooooo

and discriminating judgment.
noo nooooooooooooo nooooooo.




Chief among these motives was the overwhelming idea of the great
Noooo noooo noooo noooooo noo noo nooooooooooo nooo no noo noooo

whale himself. Such a portentous and mysterious monster roused all my
noooo noooooo. Nooo n nooooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo nooooo noo no

curiosity. Then the wild and distant seas where he rolled his island
noooooooo. Nooo noo nooo noo noooooo nooo noooo no nooooo noo nooooo

bulk; the undeliverable, nameless perils of the whale; these, with all
nooo; noo noooooooooooo, nooooooo nooooo no noo noooo; noooo, nooo noo

the attending marvels of a thousand Patagonian sights and sounds, helped
noo noooooooo noooooo no n nooooooo Nooooooooo nooooo noo nooooo, nooooo

to sway me to my wish. With other men, perhaps, such things would not
no nooo no no no nooo. Nooo noooo noo, noooooo, nooo nooooo noooo noo

have been inducements; but as for me, I am tormented with an everlasting
nooo nooo noooooooooo; noo no noo no, N no noooooooo nooo no noooooooooo

itch for things remote. I love to sail forbidden seas, and land on
nooo noo nooooo nooooo. N nooo no nooo noooooooo nooo, noo nooo no

barbarous coasts. Not ignoring what is good, I am quick to perceive a
noooooooo nooooo. Noo nooooooo nooo no nooo, N no noooo no nooooooo n

horror, and could still be social with it--would they let me--since it
nooooo, noo noooo noooo no nooooo nooo no--noooo nooo noo no--noooo no

is but well to be on friendly terms with all the inmates of the place
no noo nooo no no no nooooooo noooo nooo noo noo noooooo no noo noooo

one lodges in.
noo nooooo no.




By reason of these things, then, the whaling voyage was welcome; the
No nooooo no noooo nooooo, nooo, noo noooooo nooooo noo noooooo; noo

great flood-gates of the wonder-world swung open, and in the wild
noooo noooo-noooo no noo nooooo-noooo noooo nooo, noo no noo nooo

conceits that swayed me to my purpose, two and two there floated into
nooooooo nooo nooooo no no no noooooo, noo noo noo noooo noooooo nooo

my inmost soul, endless processions of the whale, and, mid most of them
no nooooo nooo, noooooo noooooooooo no noo noooo, noo, noo nooo no nooo

all, one grand hooded phantom, like a snow hill in the air.
noo, noo noooo nooooo noooooo, nooo n nooo nooo no noo noo.










CHAPTER 2. The Carpet-Bag.
NOOOOOO n. Noo Nooooo-Noo.







I stuffed a shirt or two into my old carpet-bag, tucked it under my arm,
N noooooo n noooo no noo nooo no noo nooooo-noo, nooooo no noooo no noo,

and started for Cape Horn and the Pacific. Quitting the good city of
noo noooooo noo Nooo Nooo noo noo Noooooo. Nooooooo noo nooo nooo no

old Manhatto, I duly arrived in New Bedford. It was a Saturday night in
noo Nooooooo, N nooo noooooo no Noo Noooooo. No noo n Nooooooo noooo no

December. Much was I disappointed upon learning that the little packet
Nooooooo. Nooo noo N nooooooooooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo

for Nantucket had already sailed, and that no way of reaching that place
noo Noooooooo noo noooooo nooooo, noo nooo no noo no nooooooo nooo noooo

would offer, till the following Monday.
noooo noooo, nooo noo noooooooo Nooooo.




As most young candidates for the pains and penalties of whaling stop at
No nooo noooo nooooooooo noo noo noooo noo noooooooo no noooooo nooo no

this same New Bedford, thence to embark on their voyage, it may as well
nooo nooo Noo Noooooo, nooooo no nooooo no noooo nooooo, no noo no nooo

be related that I, for one, had no idea of so doing. For my mind was
no noooooo nooo N, noo noo, noo no nooo no no noooo. Noo no nooo noo

made up to sail in no other than a Nantucket craft, because there was a
nooo no no nooo no no noooo nooo n Noooooooo noooo, noooooo noooo noo n

fine, boisterous something about everything connected with that famous
nooo, nooooooooo noooooooo noooo nooooooooo noooooooo nooo nooo nooooo

old island, which amazingly pleased me. Besides though New Bedford has
noo nooooo, noooo noooooooo noooooo no. Noooooo nooooo Noo Noooooo noo

of late been gradually monopolising the business of whaling, and though
no nooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooooo noo nooooooo no noooooo, noo nooooo

in this matter poor old Nantucket is now much behind her, yet Nantucket
no nooo nooooo nooo noo Noooooooo no noo nooo nooooo noo, noo Noooooooo

was her great original--the Tyre of this Carthage;--the place where the
noo noo noooo nooooooo--noo Nooo no nooo Nooooooo;--noo noooo noooo noo

first dead American whale was stranded. Where else but from Nantucket
noooo nooo Nooooooo noooo noo nooooooo. Noooo nooo noo nooo Noooooooo

did those aboriginal whalemen, the Red-Men, first sally out in canoes to
noo noooo nooooooooo nooooooo, noo Noo-Noo, noooo noooo noo no nooooo no

give chase to the Leviathan? And where but from Nantucket, too, did that
nooo noooo no noo Noooooooo? Noo noooo noo nooo Noooooooo, noo, noo nooo

first adventurous little sloop put forth, partly laden with imported
noooo noooooooooo nooooo noooo noo noooo, nooooo noooo nooo nooooooo

cobblestones--so goes the story--to throw at the whales, in order to
nooooooooooo--no nooo noo noooo--no noooo no noo nooooo, no noooo no

discover when they were nigh enough to risk a harpoon from the bowsprit?
nooooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo nooooo no nooo n noooooo nooo noo nooooooo?




Now having a night, a day, and still another night following before me
Noo nooooo n noooo, n noo, noo noooo noooooo noooo noooooooo nooooo no

in New Bedford, ere I could embark for my destined port, it became a
no Noo Noooooo, noo N noooo nooooo noo no nooooooo nooo, no nooooo n

matter of concernment where I was to eat and sleep meanwhile. It was a
nooooo no noooooooooo noooo N noo no noo noo noooo noooooooo. No noo n

very dubious-looking, nay, a very dark and dismal night, bitingly cold
nooo noooooo-noooooo, noo, n nooo nooo noo nooooo noooo, nooooooo nooo

and cheerless. I knew no one in the place. With anxious grapnels I had
noo noooooooo. N nooo no noo no noo noooo. Nooo noooooo nooooooo N noo

sounded my pocket, and only brought up a few pieces of silver,--So,
noooooo no nooooo, noo nooo noooooo no n noo nooooo no nooooo,--No,

wherever you go, Ishmael, said I to myself, as I stood in the middle of
nooooooo noo no, Noooooo, nooo N no nooooo, no N noooo no noo nooooo no

a dreary street shouldering my bag, and comparing the gloom towards the
n nooooo nooooo noooooooooo no noo, noo noooooooo noo noooo noooooo noo

north with the darkness towards the south--wherever in your wisdom you
noooo nooo noo nooooooo noooooo noo noooo--nooooooo no nooo nooooo noo

may conclude to lodge for the night, my dear Ishmael, be sure to inquire
noo nooooooo no noooo noo noo noooo, no nooo Noooooo, no nooo no noooooo

the price, and don't be too particular.
noo noooo, noo noo'n no noo nooooooooo.




With halting steps I paced the streets, and passed the sign of "The
Nooo noooooo noooo N noooo noo noooooo, noo nooooo noo nooo no "Noo

Crossed Harpoons"--but it looked too expensive and jolly there. Further
Noooooo Nooooooo"--noo no nooooo noo noooooooo noo noooo noooo. Noooooo

on, from the bright red windows of the "Sword-Fish Inn," there came such
no, nooo noo nooooo noo noooooo no noo "Noooo-Nooo Noo," noooo nooo nooo

fervent rays, that it seemed to have melted the packed snow and ice from
noooooo nooo, nooo no nooooo no nooo nooooo noo nooooo nooo noo noo nooo

before the house, for everywhere else the congealed frost lay ten inches
nooooo noo noooo, noo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooo noo noo nooooo

thick in a hard, asphaltic pavement,--rather weary for me, when I struck
noooo no n nooo, noooooooo nooooooo,--nooooo noooo noo no, nooo N nooooo

my foot against the flinty projections, because from hard, remorseless
no nooo noooooo noo nooooo noooooooooo, noooooo nooo nooo, noooooooooo

service the soles of my boots were in a most miserable plight. Too
noooooo noo noooo no no noooo nooo no n nooo noooooooo nooooo. Noo

expensive and jolly, again thought I, pausing one moment to watch the
noooooooo noo noooo, noooo noooooo N, noooooo noo nooooo no noooo noo

broad glare in the street, and hear the sounds of the tinkling glasses
noooo noooo no noo nooooo, noo nooo noo nooooo no noo nooooooo noooooo

within. But go on, Ishmael, said I at last; don't you hear? get away
nooooo. Noo no no, Noooooo, nooo N no nooo; noo'n noo nooo? noo nooo

from before the door; your patched boots are stopping the way. So on I
nooo nooooo noo nooo; nooo noooooo noooo noo nooooooo noo noo. No no N

went. I now by instinct followed the streets that took me waterward, for
nooo. N noo no nooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo nooo nooo no noooooooo, noo

there, doubtless, were the cheapest, if not the cheeriest inns.
noooo, noooooooo, nooo noo nooooooo, no noo noo noooooooo nooo.




Such dreary streets! blocks of blackness, not houses, on either hand,
Nooo nooooo noooooo! nooooo no noooooooo, noo nooooo, no nooooo nooo,

and here and there a candle, like a candle moving about in a tomb. At
noo nooo noo noooo n nooooo, nooo n nooooo nooooo noooo no n nooo. No

this hour of the night, of the last day of the week, that quarter of
nooo nooo no noo noooo, no noo nooo noo no noo nooo, nooo noooooo no

the town proved all but deserted. But presently I came to a smoky light
noo nooo nooooo noo noo nooooooo. Noo noooooooo N nooo no n noooo noooo

proceeding from a low, wide building, the door of which stood invitingly
nooooooooo nooo n noo, nooo nooooooo, noo nooo no noooo noooo nooooooooo

open. It had a careless look, as if it were meant for the uses of the
nooo. No noo n nooooooo nooo, no no no nooo noooo noo noo nooo no noo

public; so, entering, the first thing I did was to stumble over an
nooooo; no, nooooooo, noo noooo noooo N noo noo no noooooo nooo no

ash-box in the porch. Ha! thought I, ha, as the flying particles almost
noo-noo no noo noooo. No! noooooo N, no, no noo nooooo noooooooo nooooo

choked me, are these ashes from that destroyed city, Gomorrah? But "The
nooooo no, noo noooo noooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooo, Nooooooo? Noo "Noo

Crossed Harpoons," and "The Sword-Fish?"--this, then must needs be the
Noooooo Nooooooo," noo "Noo Noooo-Nooo?"--nooo, nooo nooo noooo no noo

sign of "The Trap." However, I picked myself up and hearing a loud voice
nooo no "Noo Nooo." Noooooo, N nooooo nooooo no noo noooooo n nooo noooo

within, pushed on and opened a second, interior door.
nooooo, nooooo no noo nooooo n nooooo, nooooooo nooo.




It seemed the great Black Parliament sitting in Tophet. A hundred black
No nooooo noo noooo Noooo Nooooooooo noooooo no Nooooo. N noooooo noooo

faces turned round in their rows to peer; and beyond, a black Angel
noooo nooooo noooo no noooo nooo no nooo; noo nooooo, n noooo Noooo

of Doom was beating a book in a pulpit. It was a negro church; and the
no Nooo noo noooooo n nooo no n nooooo. No noo n noooo nooooo; noo noo

preacher's text was about the blackness of darkness, and the weeping and
nooooooo'n nooo noo noooo noo noooooooo no nooooooo, noo noo noooooo noo

wailing and teeth-gnashing there. Ha, Ishmael, muttered I, backing out,
noooooo noo noooo-nooooooo noooo. No, Noooooo, nooooooo N, noooooo noo,

Wretched entertainment at the sign of 'The Trap!'
Nooooooo noooooooooooo no noo nooo no 'Noo Nooo!'




Moving on, I at last came to a dim sort of light not far from the docks,
Nooooo no, N no nooo nooo no n noo nooo no noooo noo noo nooo noo noooo,

and heard a forlorn creaking in the air; and looking up, saw a swinging
noo noooo n noooooo nooooooo no noo noo; noo noooooo no, noo n nooooooo

sign over the door with a white painting upon it, faintly representing
nooo nooo noo nooo nooo n noooo nooooooo nooo no, noooooo nooooooooooo

a tall straight jet of misty spray, and these words underneath--"The
n nooo nooooooo noo no noooo noooo, noo noooo noooo nooooooooo--"Noo

Spouter Inn:--Peter Coffin."
Noooooo Noo:--Noooo Nooooo."




Coffin?--Spouter?--Rather ominous in that particular connexion, thought
Nooooo?--Noooooo?--Nooooo noooooo no nooo nooooooooo noooooooo, noooooo

I. But it is a common name in Nantucket, they say, and I suppose this
N. Noo no no n nooooo nooo no Noooooooo, nooo noo, noo N noooooo nooo

Peter here is an emigrant from there. As the light looked so dim, and
Noooo nooo no no nooooooo nooo noooo. No noo noooo nooooo no noo, noo

the place, for the time, looked quiet enough, and the dilapidated little
noo noooo, noo noo nooo, nooooo noooo nooooo, noo noo noooooooooo nooooo

wooden house itself looked as if it might have been carted here from
nooooo noooo nooooo nooooo no no no noooo nooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo

the ruins of some burnt district, and as the swinging sign had a
noo noooo no nooo noooo nooooooo, noo no noo nooooooo nooo noo n

poverty-stricken sort of creak to it, I thought that here was the very
noooooo-nooooooo nooo no noooo no no, N noooooo nooo nooo noo noo nooo

spot for cheap lodgings, and the best of pea coffee.
nooo noo noooo nooooooo, noo noo nooo no noo nooooo.




It was a queer sort of place--a gable-ended old house, one side palsied
No noo n noooo nooo no noooo--n noooo-noooo noo noooo, noo nooo noooooo

as it were, and leaning over sadly. It stood on a sharp bleak corner,
no no nooo, noo noooooo nooo noooo. No noooo no n noooo noooo nooooo,

where that tempestuous wind Euroclydon kept up a worse howling than ever
noooo nooo noooooooooo nooo Nooooooooo nooo no n noooo noooooo nooo nooo

it did about poor Paul's tossed craft. Euroclydon, nevertheless, is a
no noo noooo nooo Nooo'n nooooo noooo. Nooooooooo, nooooooooooo, no n

mighty pleasant zephyr to any one in-doors, with his feet on the hob
nooooo nooooooo nooooo no noo noo no-noooo, nooo noo nooo no noo noo

quietly toasting for bed. "In judging of that tempestuous wind called
noooooo nooooooo noo noo. "No noooooo no nooo noooooooooo nooo nooooo

Euroclydon," says an old writer--of whose works I possess the only copy
Nooooooooo," nooo no noo nooooo--no noooo noooo N noooooo noo nooo nooo

extant--"it maketh a marvellous difference, whether thou lookest out at
nooooo--"no nooooo n nooooooooo nooooooooo, noooooo nooo noooooo noo no

it from a glass window where the frost is all on the outside, or whether
no nooo n noooo nooooo noooo noo noooo no noo no noo noooooo, no noooooo

thou observest it from that sashless window, where the frost is on both
nooo noooooooo no nooo nooo nooooooo nooooo, noooo noo noooo no no nooo

sides, and of which the wight Death is the only glazier." True enough,
noooo, noo no noooo noo noooo Noooo no noo nooo noooooo." Nooo nooooo,

thought I, as this passage occurred to my mind--old black-letter, thou
noooooo N, no nooo noooooo nooooooo no no nooo--noo noooo-nooooo, nooo

reasonest well. Yes, these eyes are windows, and this body of mine is
noooooooo nooo. Noo, noooo nooo noo noooooo, noo nooo nooo no nooo no

the house. What a pity they didn't stop up the chinks and the crannies
noo noooo. Nooo n nooo nooo nooo'n nooo no noo nooooo noo noo nooooooo

though, and thrust in a little lint here and there. But it's too late
nooooo, noo nooooo no n nooooo nooo nooo noo noooo. Noo no'n noo nooo

to make any improvements now. The universe is finished; the copestone
no nooo noo nooooooooooo noo. Noo nooooooo no nooooooo; noo noooooooo

is on, and the chips were carted off a million years ago. Poor Lazarus
no no, noo noo noooo nooo nooooo noo n noooooo noooo noo. Nooo Noooooo

there, chattering his teeth against the curbstone for his pillow, and
noooo, nooooooooo noo noooo noooooo noo noooooooo noo noo nooooo, noo

shaking off his tatters with his shiverings, he might plug up both ears
noooooo noo noo noooooo nooo noo nooooooooo, no noooo nooo no nooo nooo

with rags, and put a corn-cob into his mouth, and yet that would not
nooo nooo, noo noo n nooo-noo nooo noo noooo, noo noo nooo noooo noo

keep out the tempestuous Euroclydon. Euroclydon! says old Dives, in his
nooo noo noo noooooooooo Nooooooooo. Nooooooooo! nooo noo Noooo, no noo

red silken wrapper--(he had a redder one afterwards) pooh, pooh! What
noo nooooo noooooo--(no noo n nooooo noo nooooooooo) nooo, nooo! Nooo

a fine frosty night; how Orion glitters; what northern lights! Let them
n nooo nooooo noooo; noo Noooo nooooooo; nooo nooooooo nooooo! Noo nooo

talk of their oriental summer climes of everlasting conservatories; give
nooo no noooo nooooooo nooooo nooooo no noooooooooo nooooooooooooo; nooo

me the privilege of making my own summer with my own coals.
no noo noooooooo no nooooo no noo nooooo nooo no noo noooo.




But what thinks Lazarus? Can he warm his blue hands by holding them up
Noo nooo nooooo Noooooo? Noo no nooo noo nooo noooo no noooooo nooo no

to the grand northern lights? Would not Lazarus rather be in Sumatra
no noo noooo nooooooo nooooo? Noooo noo Noooooo nooooo no no Noooooo

than here? Would he not far rather lay him down lengthwise along the
nooo nooo? Noooo no noo noo nooooo noo noo nooo nooooooooo noooo noo

line of the equator; yea, ye gods! go down to the fiery pit itself, in
nooo no noo noooooo; noo, no nooo! no nooo no noo noooo noo nooooo, no

order to keep out this frost?
noooo no nooo noo nooo noooo?




Now, that Lazarus should lie stranded there on the curbstone before the
Noo, nooo Noooooo nooooo noo nooooooo noooo no noo noooooooo nooooo noo

door of Dives, this is more wonderful than that an iceberg should be
nooo no Noooo, nooo no nooo noooooooo nooo nooo no noooooo nooooo no

moored to one of the Moluccas. Yet Dives himself, he too lives like a
nooooo no noo no noo Nooooooo. Noo Noooo noooooo, no noo noooo nooo n

Czar in an ice palace made of frozen sighs, and being a president of a
Nooo no no noo nooooo nooo no nooooo noooo, noo noooo n noooooooo no n

temperance society, he only drinks the tepid tears of orphans.
nooooooooo noooooo, no nooo nooooo noo noooo noooo no noooooo.




But no more of this blubbering now, we are going a-whaling, and there is
Noo no nooo no nooo nooooooooo noo, no noo noooo n-noooooo, noo noooo no

plenty of that yet to come. Let us scrape the ice from our frosted feet,
nooooo no nooo noo no nooo. Noo no nooooo noo noo nooo noo noooooo nooo,

and see what sort of a place this "Spouter" may be.
noo noo nooo nooo no n noooo nooo "Noooooo" noo no.










CHAPTER 3. The Spouter-Inn.
NOOOOOO n. Noo Noooooo-Noo.







Entering that gable-ended Spouter-Inn, you found yourself in a wide,
Nooooooo nooo noooo-noooo Noooooo-Noo, noo noooo nooooooo no n nooo,

low, straggling entry with old-fashioned wainscots, reminding one of
noo, nooooooooo noooo nooo noo-noooooooo noooooooo, noooooooo noo no

the bulwarks of some condemned old craft. On one side hung a very large
noo nooooooo no nooo noooooooo noo noooo. No noo nooo nooo n nooo noooo

oilpainting so thoroughly besmoked, and every way defaced, that in the
noooooooooo no nooooooooo nooooooo, noo noooo noo noooooo, nooo no noo

unequal crosslights by which you viewed it, it was only by diligent
noooooo noooooooooo no noooo noo nooooo no, no noo nooo no nooooooo

study and a series of systematic visits to it, and careful inquiry of
noooo noo n nooooo no nooooooooo nooooo no no, noo noooooo noooooo no

the neighbors, that you could any way arrive at an understanding of its
noo noooooooo, nooo noo noooo noo noo nooooo no no noooooooooooo no noo

purpose. Such unaccountable masses of shades and shadows, that at first
noooooo. Nooo noooooooooooo nooooo no nooooo noo noooooo, nooo no noooo

you almost thought some ambitious young artist, in the time of the New
noo nooooo noooooo nooo noooooooo noooo nooooo, no noo nooo no noo Noo

England hags, had endeavored to delineate chaos bewitched. But by dint
Noooooo nooo, noo nooooooooo no noooooooo noooo noooooooo. Noo no nooo

of much and earnest contemplation, and oft repeated ponderings, and
no nooo noo noooooo noooooooooooo, noo noo nooooooo nooooooooo, noo

especially by throwing open the little window towards the back of the
nooooooooo no nooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo no noo

entry, you at last come to the conclusion that such an idea, however
noooo, noo no nooo nooo no noo nooooooooo nooo nooo no nooo, noooooo

wild, might not be altogether unwarranted.
nooo, noooo noo no nooooooooo noooooooooo.




But what most puzzled and confounded you was a long, limber, portentous,
Noo nooo nooo noooooo noo nooooooooo noo noo n nooo, nooooo, nooooooooo,

black mass of something hovering in the centre of the picture over three
noooo nooo no noooooooo nooooooo no noo nooooo no noo noooooo nooo noooo

blue, dim, perpendicular lines floating in a nameless yeast. A boggy,
nooo, noo, noooooooooooo noooo nooooooo no n nooooooo noooo. N noooo,

soggy, squitchy picture truly, enough to drive a nervous man distracted.
noooo, nooooooo noooooo noooo, nooooo no noooo n noooooo noo nooooooooo.

Yet was there a sort of indefinite, half-attained, unimaginable
Noo noo noooo n nooo no nooooooooo, nooo-nooooooo, nooooooooooo

sublimity about it that fairly froze you to it, till you involuntarily
noooooooo noooo no nooo nooooo noooo noo no no, nooo noo noooooooooooo

took an oath with yourself to find out what that marvellous painting
nooo no nooo nooo nooooooo no nooo noo nooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo

meant. Ever and anon a bright, but, alas, deceptive idea would dart you
noooo. Nooo noo nooo n nooooo, noo, nooo, noooooooo nooo noooo nooo noo

through.--It's the Black Sea in a midnight gale.--It's the unnatural
noooooo.--No'n noo Noooo Noo no n nooooooo nooo.--No'n noo noooooooo

combat of the four primal elements.--It's a blasted heath.--It's a
nooooo no noo nooo nooooo nooooooo.--No'n n noooooo noooo.--No'n n

Hyperborean winter scene.--It's the breaking-up of the icebound stream
Noooooooooo nooooo noooo.--No'n noo nooooooo-no no noo nooooooo nooooo

of Time. But at last all these fancies yielded to that one portentous
no Nooo. Noo no nooo noo noooo noooooo noooooo no nooo noo nooooooooo

something in the picture's midst. THAT once found out, and all the rest
noooooooo no noo noooooo'n noooo. NOOO nooo noooo noo, noo noo noo nooo

were plain. But stop; does it not bear a faint resemblance to a gigantic

In fact, the artist's design seemed this: a final theory of my own,

The opposite wall of this entry was hung all over with a heathenish

No man prefers to sleep two in a bed. In fact, you would a good deal
No noo noooooo no noooo noo no n noo. No nooo, noo noooo n nooo nooo

rather not sleep with your own brother. I don't know how it is, but
nooooo noo noooo nooo nooo noo noooooo. N noo'n nooo noo no no, noo

nooooo nooo no no noooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo. Noo nooo no noooo no

nooooooo nooo no noooooo nooooooo, no n noooooo noo, no n noooooo

nooo, noo nooo nooooooo n nooooooooo, nooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooooooo

nooooooo. Noo noo noooo noo noooooo nooooo noo N no n nooooo nooooo

noooo noo no n noo, nooo nooo noooooo nooo; noo noooooo no nooo noooo

noo no n noo no noo, nooo nooooooo Noooo no nooooo. No no nooo nooo

noo noooo nooooooo no noo noooooooo, noo noo nooo nooo noo noooooo, noo

noooo nooooooo nooo nooo noo noooooo, noo noooo no nooo noo nooo.

Noo nooo N nooooooo nooo nooo nooooooooo, noo nooo N nooooooooo noo

noo noooooo, noooooooo nooo no noo nooooo. N noooo no nooooo noo nooo.

nooo noooo nooooooo. Noooo noo no nooo no noo nooo--nooo no noooo no no

least--nothing but a small scalp-knot twisted up on his forehead. His
noooo--noooooo noo n noooo noooo-nooo noooooo no no noo nooooooo. Noo

bald purplish head now looked for all the world like a mildewed skull.
nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo noo noo noo noooo nooo n nooooooo noooo.

Had not the stranger stood between me and the door, I would have bolted
Noo noo noo nooooooo noooo noooooo no noo noo nooo, N noooo nooo nooooo

out of it quicker than ever I bolted a dinner.
noo no no noooooo nooo nooo N nooooo n nooooo.




Even as it was, I thought something of slipping out of the window, but
Nooo no no noo, N noooooo noooooooo no nooooooo noo no noo nooooo, noo

it was the second floor back. I am no coward, but what to make of
no noo noo nooooo noooo nooo. N no no nooooo, noo nooo no nooo no

this head-peddling purple rascal altogether passed my comprehension.
nooo nooo-nooooooo nooooo nooooo nooooooooo nooooo no noooooooooooo.

Ignorance is the parent of fear, and being completely nonplussed and
Noooooooo no noo nooooo no nooo, noo noooo nooooooooo nooooooooo noo

confounded about the stranger, I confess I was now as much afraid of him
nooooooooo noooo noo nooooooo, N noooooo N noo noo no nooo nooooo no noo

as if it was the devil himself who had thus broken into my room at
no no no noo noo noooo noooooo noo noo nooo nooooo nooo no nooo no

the dead of night. In fact, I was so afraid of him that I was not
noo nooo no noooo. No nooo, N noo no nooooo no noo nooo N noo noo

game enough just then to address him, and demand a satisfactory answer
nooo nooooo nooo nooo no noooooo noo, noo nooooo n nooooooooooo nooooo

concerning what seemed inexplicable in him.
nooooooooo nooo nooooo nooooooooooo no noo.




Meanwhile, he continued the business of undressing, and at last showed
Noooooooo, no noooooooo noo nooooooo no nooooooooo, noo no nooo nooooo

his chest and arms. As I live, these covered parts of him were checkered
noo noooo noo nooo. No N nooo, noooo noooooo noooo no noo nooo noooooooo

with the same squares as his face; his back, too, was all over the same
nooo noo nooo noooooo no noo nooo; noo nooo, noo, noo noo nooo noo nooo

dark squares; he seemed to have been in a Thirty Years' War, and just
nooo noooooo; no nooooo no nooo nooo no n Nooooo Noooo' Noo, noo nooo

escaped from it with a sticking-plaster shirt. Still more, his very
noooooo nooo no nooo n nooooooo-noooooo noooo. Noooo nooo, noo nooo

legs were marked, as if a parcel of dark green frogs were running up
nooo nooo nooooo, no no n nooooo no nooo noooo noooo nooo noooooo no

the trunks of young palms. It was now quite plain that he must be some
noo nooooo no noooo noooo. No noo noo noooo noooo nooo no nooo no nooo

abominable savage or other shipped aboard of a whaleman in the South
nooooooooo nooooo no noooo noooooo nooooo no n nooooooo no noo Noooo

Seas, and so landed in this Christian country. I quaked to think of it.
Nooo, noo no nooooo no nooo Noooooooo noooooo. N nooooo no noooo no no.

A peddler of heads too--perhaps the heads of his own brothers. He might
N noooooo no noooo noo--noooooo noo noooo no noo noo nooooooo. No noooo

take a fancy to mine--heavens! look at that tomahawk!
nooo n noooo no nooo--noooooo! nooo no nooo nooooooo!




But there was no time for shuddering, for now the savage went about
Noo noooo noo no nooo noo nooooooooo, noo noo noo nooooo nooo noooo

something that completely fascinated my attention, and convinced me that
noooooooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooooo no noooooooo, noo noooooooo no nooo

no nooo nooooo no n noooooo. Noooo no noo noooo noooo, no noooooo, no

dreadnaught, which he had previously hung on a chair, he fumbled in the
noooooooooo, noooo no noo nooooooooo nooo no n noooo, no noooooo no noo

pockets, and produced at length a curious little deformed image with
noooooo, noo nooooooo no nooooo n noooooo nooooo nooooooo noooo nooo

a hunch on its back, and exactly the colour of a three days' old Congo
n noooo no noo nooo, noo noooooo noo nooooo no n noooo nooo' noo Noooo

baby. Remembering the embalmed head, at first I almost thought that
nooo. Noooooooooo noo nooooooo nooo, no noooo N nooooo noooooo nooo

this black manikin was a real baby preserved in some similar manner. But
nooo noooo noooooo noo n nooo nooo noooooooo no nooo noooooo nooooo. Noo

nooooo nooo no noo noo no noo nooooo, noo nooo no noooooooo n nooo nooo

nooo nooooooo noooo, N noooooooo nooo no nooo no noooooo noo n nooooo

nooo, noooo nooooo no nooooo no no. Noo noo noo nooooo nooo no no noo

empty fire-place, and removing the papered fire-board, sets up this
noooo nooo-noooo, noo nooooooo noo noooooo nooo-noooo, nooo no nooo

little hunch-backed image, like a tenpin, between the andirons. The
nooooo noooo-nooooo noooo, nooo n nooooo, noooooo noo nooooooo. Noo

chimney jambs and all the bricks inside were very sooty, so that I
noooooo noooo noo noo noo nooooo nooooo nooo nooo noooo, no nooo N

thought this fire-place made a very appropriate little shrine or chapel
noooooo nooo nooo-noooo nooo n nooo noooooooooo nooooo nooooo no nooooo

for his Congo idol.
noo noo Noooo nooo.




I now screwed my eyes hard towards the half hidden image, feeling but
N noo noooooo no nooo nooo noooooo noo nooo nooooo noooo, noooooo noo

ill at ease meantime--to see what was next to follow. First he takes
noo no nooo nooooooo--no noo nooo noo nooo no nooooo. Noooo no noooo

about a double handful of shavings out of his grego pocket, and places
noooo n nooooo noooooo no nooooooo noo no noo noooo nooooo, noo nooooo

nooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo; nooo nooooo n noo no nooo noooooo no

top and applying the flame from the lamp, he kindled the shavings into
noo noo nooooooo noo noooo nooo noo nooo, no noooooo noo nooooooo nooo

n noooooooooo noooo. Noooooooo, noooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo,

and still hastier withdrawals of his fingers (whereby he seemed to be
noo noooo noooooo noooooooooo no noo noooooo (noooooo no nooooo no no

scorching them badly), he at last succeeded in drawing out the biscuit;
noooooooo nooo noooo), no no nooo noooooooo no noooooo noo noo noooooo;

then blowing off the heat and ashes a little, he made a polite offer of
nooo noooooo noo noo nooo noo noooo n nooooo, no nooo n nooooo noooo no

it to the little negro. But the little devil did not seem to fancy such
no no noo nooooo noooo. Noo noo nooooo noooo noo noo nooo no noooo nooo

dry sort of fare at all; he never moved his lips. All these strange
noo nooo no nooo no noo; no noooo noooo noo nooo. Noo noooo noooooo

antics were accompanied by still stranger guttural noises from the
nooooo nooo noooooooooo no noooo nooooooo nooooooo nooooo nooo noo

devotee, who seemed to be praying in a sing-song or else singing some
noooooo, noo nooooo no no noooooo no n nooo-nooo no nooo noooooo nooo

noooo nooooooo no noooo, nooooo noooo noo nooo nooooooo noooo no noo

nooo noooooooo nooooo. No nooo noooooooooooo noo nooo, no nooo noo nooo

no nooo noooooooooooooo, noo nooooo no noooo no noo noooo nooooo no

nooooooooo no no no nooo n noooooooo noooooo n nooo nooooooo.




All these queer proceedings increased my uncomfortableness, and
Noo noooo noooo noooooooooo noooooooo no noooooooooooooooo, noo

seeing him now exhibiting strong symptoms of concluding his business
nooooo noo noo nooooooooo nooooo nooooooo no nooooooooo noo nooooooo

nooooooooo, noo noooooo nooo noo nooo no, N noooooo no noo nooo nooo,

now or never, before the light was put out, to break the spell in which
noo no noooo, nooooo noo noooo noo noo noo, no noooo noo noooo no noooo

I had so long been bound.
N noo no nooo nooo noooo.




But the interval I spent in deliberating what to say, was a fatal one.
Noo noo nooooooo N noooo no nooooooooooo nooo no noo, noo n noooo noo.

Taking up his tomahawk from the table, he examined the head of it for an
Nooooo no noo nooooooo nooo noo noooo, no nooooooo noo nooo no no noo no

instant, and then holding it to the light, with his mouth at the handle,
noooooo, noo nooo noooooo no no noo noooo, nooo noo noooo no noo nooooo,

he puffed out great clouds of tobacco smoke. The next moment the light
no nooooo noo noooo nooooo no noooooo noooo. Noo nooo nooooo noo noooo

was extinguished, and this wild cannibal, tomahawk between his teeth,
noo nooooooooooo, noo nooo nooo nooooooo, nooooooo noooooo noo noooo,

nooooo nooo noo nooo no. N nooo noo, N noooo noo nooo no noo; noo nooooo

a sudden grunt of astonishment he began feeling me.
n nooooo noooo no nooooooooooo no noooo noooooo no.




Stammering out something, I knew not what, I rolled away from him
Nooooooooo noo noooooooo, N nooo noo nooo, N nooooo nooo nooo noo

against the wall, and then conjured him, whoever or whatever he might
noooooo noo nooo, noo nooo nooooooo noo, noooooo no nooooooo no noooo

no, no nooo noooo, noo noo no noo no noo noooo noo nooo noooo. Noo noo

guttural responses satisfied me at once that he but ill comprehended my
nooooooo noooooooo noooooooo no no nooo nooo no noo noo nooooooooooo no

meaning.
noooooo.




"Who-e debel you?"--he at last said--"you no speak-e, dam-me, I kill-e."
"Noo-n noooo noo?"--no no nooo nooo--"noo no noooo-n, noo-no, N nooo-n."

And so saying the lighted tomahawk began flourishing about me in the
Noo no nooooo noo noooooo nooooooo noooo noooooooooo noooo no no noo

dark.
nooo.




"Landlord, for God's sake, Peter Coffin!" shouted I. "Landlord! Watch!
"Nooooooo, noo Noo'n nooo, Noooo Nooooo!" noooooo N. "Nooooooo! Noooo!

Coffin! Angels! save me!"
Nooooo! Nooooo! nooo no!"




"Speak-e! tell-ee me who-ee be, or dam-me, I kill-e!" again growled the
"Noooo-n! nooo-no no noo-no no, no noo-no, N nooo-n!" noooo noooooo noo

cannibal, while his horrid flourishings of the tomahawk scattered the
nooooooo, noooo noo nooooo nooooooooooo no noo nooooooo noooooooo noo

noo noooooo noooo noooo no nooo N noooooo no noooo noooo noo no nooo.

But thank heaven, at that moment the landlord came into the room light
Noo noooo nooooo, no nooo nooooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo noo nooo noooo

in hand, and leaping from the bed I ran up to him.
no nooo, noo noooooo nooo noo noo N noo no no noo.




"Don't be afraid now," said he, grinning again, "Queequeg here wouldn't
"Noo'n no nooooo noo," nooo no, nooooooo noooo, "Nooooooo nooo nooooo'n

harm a hair of your head."
nooo n nooo no nooo nooo."




"Stop your grinning," shouted I, "and why didn't you tell me that that
"Nooo nooo nooooooo," noooooo N, "noo noo nooo'n noo nooo no nooo nooo

infernal harpooneer was a cannibal?"
nooooooo nooooooooo noo n nooooooo?"




"I thought ye know'd it;--didn't I tell ye, he was a peddlin' heads
"N noooooo no nooo'n no;--nooo'n N nooo no, no noo n noooooo' noooo

around town?--but turn flukes again and go to sleep. Queequeg, look
nooooo nooo?--noo nooo nooooo noooo noo no no noooo. Nooooooo, nooo

here--you sabbee me, I sabbee--you this man sleepe you--you sabbee?"
nooo--noo nooooo no, N nooooo--noo nooo noo nooooo noo--noo nooooo?"




"Me sabbee plenty"--grunted Queequeg, puffing away at his pipe and
"No nooooo nooooo"--noooooo Nooooooo, noooooo nooo no noo nooo noo

sitting up in bed.
noooooo no no noo.




"You gettee in," he added, motioning to me with his tomahawk, and
"Noo nooooo no," no noooo, noooooooo no no nooo noo nooooooo, noo

throwing the clothes to one side. He really did this in not only a civil
nooooooo noo noooooo no noo nooo. No nooooo noo nooo no noo nooo n noooo

noo n nooooo nooo noo nooooooooo noo. N noooo noooooo no noo n nooooo.

For all his tattooings he was on the whole a clean, comely looking
Noo noo noo nooooooooo no noo no noo noooo n noooo, nooooo noooooo

cannibal. What's all this fuss I have been making about, thought I to
nooooooo. Nooo'n noo nooo nooo N nooo nooo nooooo noooo, noooooo N no

myself--the man's a human being just as I am: he has just as much reason
nooooo--noo noo'n n noooo noooo nooo no N no: no noo nooo no nooo nooooo

to fear me, as I have to be afraid of him. Better sleep with a sober
no nooo no, no N nooo no no nooooo no noo. Nooooo noooo nooo n noooo

cannibal than a drunken Christian.
nooooooo nooo n noooooo Noooooooo.




"Landlord," said I, "tell him to stash his tomahawk there, or pipe, or
"Nooooooo," nooo N, "nooo noo no noooo noo nooooooo noooo, no nooo, no

whatever you call it; tell him to stop smoking, in short, and I will
nooooooo noo nooo no; nooo noo no nooo noooooo, no noooo, noo N nooo

turn in with him. But I don't fancy having a man smoking in bed with me.
nooo no nooo noo. Noo N noo'n noooo nooooo n noo noooooo no noo nooo no.

It's dangerous. Besides, I ain't insured."
No'n noooooooo. Noooooo, N noo'n noooooo."




This being told to Queequeg, he at once complied, and again politely
Nooo noooo nooo no Nooooooo, no no nooo nooooooo, noo noooo nooooooo
