nooooooo no no noo nooo noo--noooooo nooo no noo nooo no nooo no no

say--"I won't touch a leg of ye."
noo--"N noo'n noooo n noo no no."




"Good night, landlord," said I, "you may go."
"Nooo noooo, nooooooo," nooo N, "noo noo no."




I turned in, and never slept better in my life.
N nooooo no, noo noooo noooo nooooo no no nooo.










CHAPTER 4. The Counterpane.
NOOOOOO n. Noo Noooooooooo.







Upon waking next morning about daylight, I found Queequeg's arm thrown
Nooo nooooo nooo noooooo noooo nooooooo, N noooo Nooooooo'n noo nooooo

over me in the most loving and affectionate manner. You had almost
nooo no no noo nooo nooooo noo nooooooooooo nooooo. Noo noo nooooo

thought I had been his wife. The counterpane was of patchwork, full of
noooooo N noo nooo noo nooo. Noo noooooooooo noo no noooooooo, nooo no

odd little parti-coloured squares and triangles; and this arm of his
noo nooooo noooo-nooooooo noooooo noo noooooooo; noo nooo noo no noo

tattooed all over with an interminable Cretan labyrinth of a figure,
nooooooo noo nooo nooo no nooooooooooo Nooooo noooooooo no n nooooo,

no two parts of which were of one precise shade--owing I suppose to
no noo noooo no noooo nooo no noo noooooo noooo--noooo N noooooo no

his keeping his arm at sea unmethodically in sun and shade, his shirt
noo noooooo noo noo no noo nooooooooooooo no noo noo noooo, noo noooo

sleeves irregularly rolled up at various times--this same arm of his, I
noooooo noooooooooo nooooo no no noooooo noooo--nooo nooo noo no noo, N

say, looked for all the world like a strip of that same patchwork quilt.
noo, nooooo noo noo noo noooo nooo n noooo no nooo nooo noooooooo noooo.

Indeed, partly lying on it as the arm did when I first awoke, I could
Nooooo, nooooo noooo no no no noo noo noo nooo N noooo noooo, N noooo

hardly tell it from the quilt, they so blended their hues together; and
nooooo nooo no nooo noo noooo, nooo no noooooo noooo nooo nooooooo; noo

it was only by the sense of weight and pressure that I could tell that
no noo nooo no noo noooo no nooooo noo nooooooo nooo N noooo nooo nooo

Queequeg was hugging me.
Nooooooo noo noooooo no.




My sensations were strange. Let me try to explain them. When I was a
No nooooooooo nooo noooooo. Noo no noo no noooooo nooo. Nooo N noo n

child, I well remember a somewhat similar circumstance that befell me;
noooo, N nooo nooooooo n nooooooo noooooo nooooooooooo nooo nooooo no;

whether it was a reality or a dream, I never could entirely settle.
noooooo no noo n noooooo no n noooo, N noooo noooo nooooooo nooooo.

The circumstance was this. I had been cutting up some caper or other--I
Noo nooooooooooo noo nooo. N noo nooo noooooo no nooo noooo no noooo--N

think it was trying to crawl up the chimney, as I had seen a little
noooo no noo nooooo no noooo no noo noooooo, no N noo nooo n nooooo

sweep do a few days previous; and my stepmother who, somehow or other,
noooo no n noo nooo nooooooo; noo no nooooooooo noo, noooooo no noooo,

was all the time whipping me, or sending me to bed supperless,--my
noo noo noo nooo nooooooo no, no noooooo no no noo nooooooooo,--no

mother dragged me by the legs out of the chimney and packed me off to
nooooo noooooo no no noo nooo noo no noo noooooo noo nooooo no noo no

bed, though it was only two o'clock in the afternoon of the 21st June,
noo, nooooo no noo nooo noo n'noooo no noo noooooooo no noo nooo Nooo,

the longest day in the year in our hemisphere. I felt dreadfully. But
noo noooooo noo no noo nooo no noo nooooooooo. N nooo nooooooooo. Noo

there was no help for it, so up stairs I went to my little room in the
noooo noo no nooo noo no, no no nooooo N nooo no no nooooo nooo no noo

third floor, undressed myself as slowly as possible so as to kill time,
noooo noooo, noooooooo nooooo no nooooo no nooooooo no no no nooo nooo,

and with a bitter sigh got between the sheets.
noo nooo n nooooo nooo noo noooooo noo nooooo.




I lay there dismally calculating that sixteen entire hours must elapse
N noo noooo nooooooo noooooooooo nooo noooooo nooooo noooo nooo nooooo

before I could hope for a resurrection. Sixteen hours in bed! the
nooooo N noooo nooo noo n nooooooooooo. Noooooo noooo no noo! noo

small of my back ached to think of it. And it was so light too; the
noooo no no nooo noooo no noooo no no. Noo no noo no noooo noo; noo

sun shining in at the window, and a great rattling of coaches in the
noo noooooo no no noo nooooo, noo n noooo nooooooo no noooooo no noo

streets, and the sound of gay voices all over the house. I felt worse
noooooo, noo noo noooo no noo nooooo noo nooo noo noooo. N nooo noooo

and worse--at last I got up, dressed, and softly going down in my
noo noooo--no nooo N noo no, noooooo, noo nooooo noooo nooo no no

stockinged feet, sought out my stepmother, and suddenly threw myself
nooooooooo nooo, nooooo noo no nooooooooo, noo nooooooo noooo nooooo

at her feet, beseeching her as a particular favour to give me a good
no noo nooo, nooooooooo noo no n nooooooooo nooooo no nooo no n nooo

slippering for my misbehaviour; anything indeed but condemning me to lie
nooooooooo noo no nooooooooooo; nooooooo nooooo noo nooooooooo no no noo

abed such an unendurable length of time. But she was the best and most
nooo nooo no noooooooooo nooooo no nooo. Noo noo noo noo nooo noo nooo

conscientious of stepmothers, and back I had to go to my room. For
noooooooooooo no noooooooooo, noo nooo N noo no no no no nooo. Noo

several hours I lay there broad awake, feeling a great deal worse than I
noooooo noooo N noo noooo noooo noooo, noooooo n noooo nooo noooo nooo N

have ever done since, even from the greatest subsequent misfortunes. At
nooo nooo nooo noooo, nooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo noooooooooo. No

last I must have fallen into a troubled nightmare of a doze; and slowly
nooo N nooo nooo nooooo nooo n nooooooo noooooooo no n nooo; noo nooooo

waking from it--half steeped in dreams--I opened my eyes, and the before
nooooo nooo no--nooo noooooo no nooooo--N nooooo no nooo, noo noo nooooo

sun-lit room was now wrapped in outer darkness. Instantly I felt a shock
noo-noo nooo noo noo noooooo no noooo nooooooo. Noooooooo N nooo n noooo

running through all my frame; nothing was to be seen, and nothing was
noooooo noooooo noo no noooo; noooooo noo no no nooo, noo noooooo noo

to be heard; but a supernatural hand seemed placed in mine. My arm hung
no no noooo; noo n nooooooooooo nooo nooooo nooooo no nooo. No noo nooo

over the counterpane, and the nameless, unimaginable, silent form
nooo noo noooooooooo, noo noo nooooooo, nooooooooooo, nooooo nooo

or phantom, to which the hand belonged, seemed closely seated by my
no noooooo, no noooo noo nooo nooooooo, nooooo noooooo nooooo no no

bed-side. For what seemed ages piled on ages, I lay there, frozen with
noo-nooo. Noo nooo nooooo nooo noooo no nooo, N noo noooo, nooooo nooo

the most awful fears, not daring to drag away my hand; yet ever thinking
noo nooo noooo noooo, noo nooooo no nooo nooo no nooo; noo nooo nooooooo

that if I could but stir it one single inch, the horrid spell would be
nooo no N noooo noo nooo no noo nooooo nooo, noo nooooo noooo noooo no

broken. I knew not how this consciousness at last glided away from me;
nooooo. N nooo noo noo nooo noooooooooooo no nooo nooooo nooo nooo no;

but waking in the morning, I shudderingly remembered it all, and for
noo nooooo no noo noooooo, N nooooooooooo nooooooooo no noo, noo noo

days and weeks and months afterwards I lost myself in confounding
nooo noo noooo noo nooooo nooooooooo N nooo nooooo no noooooooooo

attempts to explain the mystery. Nay, to this very hour, I often puzzle
nooooooo no noooooo noo noooooo. Noo, no nooo nooo nooo, N noooo nooooo

myself with it.
nooooo nooo no.




Now, take away the awful fear, and my sensations at feeling the
Noo, nooo nooo noo noooo nooo, noo no nooooooooo no noooooo noo

supernatural hand in mine were very similar, in their strangeness, to
nooooooooooo nooo no nooo nooo nooo noooooo, no noooo noooooooooo, no

those which I experienced on waking up and seeing Queequeg's pagan
noooo noooo N noooooooooo no nooooo no noo nooooo Nooooooo'n noooo

arm thrown round me. But at length all the past night's events soberly
noo nooooo noooo no. Noo no nooooo noo noo nooo noooo'n nooooo noooooo

recurred, one by one, in fixed reality, and then I lay only alive to
nooooooo, noo no noo, no noooo noooooo, noo nooo N noo nooo noooo no

the comical predicament. For though I tried to move his arm--unlock his
noo noooooo noooooooooo. Noo nooooo N noooo no nooo noo noo--nooooo noo

bridegroom clasp--yet, sleeping as he was, he still hugged me tightly,
nooooooooo noooo--noo, nooooooo no no noo, no noooo nooooo no noooooo,

as though naught but death should part us twain. I now strove to rouse
no nooooo nooooo noo noooo nooooo nooo no noooo. N noo nooooo no noooo

him--"Queequeg!"--but his only answer was a snore. I then rolled over,
noo--"Nooooooo!"--noo noo nooo nooooo noo n noooo. N nooo nooooo nooo,

my neck feeling as if it were in a horse-collar; and suddenly felt a
no nooo noooooo no no no nooo no n noooo-nooooo; noo nooooooo nooo n

slight scratch. Throwing aside the counterpane, there lay the tomahawk
nooooo noooooo. Nooooooo noooo noo noooooooooo, noooo noo noo nooooooo

sleeping by the savage's side, as if it were a hatchet-faced baby. A
nooooooo no noo nooooo'n nooo, no no no nooo n noooooo-noooo nooo. N

pretty pickle, truly, thought I; abed here in a strange house in the
nooooo nooooo, noooo, noooooo N; nooo nooo no n noooooo noooo no noo

broad day, with a cannibal and a tomahawk! "Queequeg!--in the name of
noooo noo, nooo n nooooooo noo n nooooooo! "Nooooooo!--no noo nooo no

goodness, Queequeg, wake!" At length, by dint of much wriggling, and
nooooooo, Nooooooo, nooo!" No nooooo, no nooo no nooo noooooooo, noo

loud and incessant expostulations upon the unbecomingness of his
nooo noo noooooooo nooooooooooooo nooo noo nooooooooooooo no noo

hugging a fellow male in that matrimonial sort of style, I succeeded in
noooooo n nooooo nooo no nooo noooooooooo nooo no noooo, N noooooooo no

extracting a grunt; and presently, he drew back his arm, shook himself
nooooooooo n noooo; noo noooooooo, no nooo nooo noo noo, noooo noooooo

all over like a Newfoundland dog just from the water, and sat up in bed,
noo nooo nooo n Nooooooooooo noo nooo nooo noo noooo, noo noo no no noo,

stiff as a pike-staff, looking at me, and rubbing his eyes as if he
noooo no n nooo-noooo, noooooo no no, noo noooooo noo nooo no no no

did not altogether remember how I came to be there, though a dim
noo noo nooooooooo nooooooo noo N nooo no no noooo, nooooo n noo

consciousness of knowing something about me seemed slowly dawning over
noooooooooooo no noooooo noooooooo noooo no nooooo nooooo noooooo nooo

him. Meanwhile, I lay quietly eyeing him, having no serious misgivings
noo. Noooooooo, N noo noooooo nooooo noo, nooooo no noooooo nooooooooo

now, and bent upon narrowly observing so curious a creature. When, at
noo, noo nooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo no noooooo n nooooooo. Nooo, no

last, his mind seemed made up touching the character of his bedfellow,
nooo, noo nooo nooooo nooo no nooooooo noo noooooooo no noo noooooooo,

and he became, as it were, reconciled to the fact; he jumped out upon
noo no nooooo, no no nooo, nooooooooo no noo nooo; no nooooo noo nooo

the floor, and by certain signs and sounds gave me to understand that,
noo noooo, noo no noooooo noooo noo nooooo nooo no no nooooooooo nooo,

if it pleased me, he would dress first and then leave me to dress
no no noooooo no, no noooo noooo noooo noo nooo noooo no no noooo

afterwards, leaving the whole apartment to myself. Thinks I, Queequeg,
nooooooooo, noooooo noo noooo noooooooo no nooooo. Nooooo N, Nooooooo,

under the circumstances, this is a very civilized overture; but, the
noooo noo noooooooooooo, nooo no n nooo noooooooo nooooooo; noo, noo

truth is, these savages have an innate sense of delicacy, say what
noooo no, noooo noooooo nooo no nooooo noooo no nooooooo, noo nooo

you will; it is marvellous how essentially polite they are. I pay this
noo nooo; no no nooooooooo noo noooooooooo nooooo nooo noo. N noo nooo

particular compliment to Queequeg, because he treated me with so much
nooooooooo nooooooooo no Nooooooo, noooooo no noooooo no nooo no nooo

civility and consideration, while I was guilty of great rudeness;
nooooooo noo noooooooooooo, noooo N noo nooooo no noooo nooooooo;

staring at him from the bed, and watching all his toilette motions; for
noooooo no noo nooo noo noo, noo nooooooo noo noo nooooooo noooooo; noo

the time my curiosity getting the better of my breeding. Nevertheless,
noo nooo no noooooooo noooooo noo nooooo no no nooooooo. Nooooooooooo,

a man like Queequeg you don't see every day, he and his ways were well
n noo nooo Nooooooo noo noo'n noo noooo noo, no noo noo nooo nooo nooo

worth unusual regarding.
noooo noooooo noooooooo.




He commenced dressing at top by donning his beaver hat, a very tall one,
No noooooooo nooooooo no noo no noooooo noo nooooo noo, n nooo nooo noo,

by the by, and then--still minus his trowsers--he hunted up his boots.
no noo no, noo nooo--noooo noooo noo nooooooo--no nooooo no noo noooo.

What under the heavens he did it for, I cannot tell, but his next
Nooo noooo noo noooooo no noo no noo, N nooooo nooo, noo noo nooo

movement was to crush himself--boots in hand, and hat on--under the bed;
nooooooo noo no noooo noooooo--noooo no nooo, noo noo no--noooo noo noo;

when, from sundry violent gaspings and strainings, I inferred he was
nooo, nooo nooooo noooooo nooooooo noo nooooooooo, N nooooooo no noo

hard at work booting himself; though by no law of propriety that I ever
nooo no nooo noooooo noooooo; nooooo no no noo no noooooooo nooo N nooo

heard of, is any man required to be private when putting on his
noooo no, no noo noo nooooooo no no noooooo nooo noooooo no noo

boots. But Queequeg, do you see, was a creature in the transition
noooo. Noo Nooooooo, no noo noo, noo n nooooooo no noo nooooooooo

stage--neither caterpillar nor butterfly. He was just enough civilized
noooo--noooooo noooooooooo noo noooooooo. No noo nooo nooooo noooooooo

to show off his outlandishness in the strangest possible manners. His
no nooo noo noo nooooooooooooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo noooooo. Noo

education was not yet completed. He was an undergraduate. If he had not
noooooooo noo noo noo noooooooo. No noo no noooooooooooo. No no noo noo

been a small degree civilized, he very probably would not have troubled
nooo n noooo nooooo noooooooo, no nooo nooooooo noooo noo nooo nooooooo

himself with boots at all; but then, if he had not been still a savage,
noooooo nooo noooo no noo; noo nooo, no no noo noo nooo noooo n nooooo,

he never would have dreamt of getting under the bed to put them on. At
no noooo noooo nooo nooooo no noooooo noooo noo noo no noo nooo no. No

last, he emerged with his hat very much dented and crushed down over his
nooo, no noooooo nooo noo noo nooo nooo nooooo noo noooooo nooo nooo noo

eyes, and began creaking and limping about the room, as if, not
nooo, noo noooo nooooooo noo noooooo noooo noo nooo, no no, noo

being much accustomed to boots, his pair of damp, wrinkled cowhide
noooo nooo nooooooooo no noooo, noo nooo no nooo, nooooooo noooooo

ones--probably not made to order either--rather pinched and tormented
nooo--nooooooo noo nooo no noooo nooooo--nooooo noooooo noo noooooooo

him at the first go off of a bitter cold morning.
noo no noo noooo no noo no n nooooo nooo noooooo.




Seeing, now, that there were no curtains to the window, and that the
Nooooo, noo, nooo noooo nooo no nooooooo no noo nooooo, noo nooo noo

street being very narrow, the house opposite commanded a plain view
nooooo noooo nooo nooooo, noo noooo nooooooo noooooooo n noooo nooo

into the room, and observing more and more the indecorous figure that
nooo noo nooo, noo noooooooo nooo noo nooo noo nooooooooo nooooo nooo

Queequeg made, staving about with little else but his hat and boots on;
Nooooooo nooo, noooooo noooo nooo nooooo nooo noo noo noo noo noooo no;

I begged him as well as I could, to accelerate his toilet somewhat,
N nooooo noo no nooo no N noooo, no nooooooooo noo nooooo nooooooo,

and particularly to get into his pantaloons as soon as possible. He
noo nooooooooooo no noo nooo noo nooooooooo no nooo no nooooooo. No

complied, and then proceeded to wash himself. At that time in the
nooooooo, noo nooo noooooooo no nooo noooooo. No nooo nooo no noo

morning any Christian would have washed his face; but Queequeg, to
noooooo noo Noooooooo noooo nooo nooooo noo nooo; noo Nooooooo, no

my amazement, contented himself with restricting his ablutions to his
no noooooooo, noooooooo noooooo nooo noooooooooo noo noooooooo no noo

chest, arms, and hands. He then donned his waistcoat, and taking up a
noooo, nooo, noo noooo. No nooo nooooo noo noooooooo, noo nooooo no n

piece of hard soap on the wash-stand centre table, dipped it into water
noooo no nooo nooo no noo nooo-noooo nooooo noooo, nooooo no nooo noooo

and commenced lathering his face. I was watching to see where he kept
noo noooooooo noooooooo noo nooo. N noo nooooooo no noo noooo no nooo

his razor, when lo and behold, he takes the harpoon from the bed corner,
noo noooo, nooo no noo nooooo, no noooo noo noooooo nooo noo noo nooooo,

slips out the long wooden stock, unsheathes the head, whets it a little
noooo noo noo nooo nooooo noooo, nooooooooo noo nooo, noooo no n nooooo

on his boot, and striding up to the bit of mirror against the wall,
no noo nooo, noo nooooooo no no noo noo no nooooo noooooo noo nooo,

begins a vigorous scraping, or rather harpooning of his cheeks. Thinks
nooooo n nooooooo nooooooo, no nooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo. Nooooo

I, Queequeg, this is using Rogers's best cutlery with a vengeance.
N, Nooooooo, nooo no noooo Nooooo'n nooo noooooo nooo n noooooooo.

Afterwards I wondered the less at this operation when I came to know of
Nooooooooo N nooooooo noo nooo no nooo noooooooo nooo N nooo no nooo no

what fine steel the head of a harpoon is made, and how exceedingly sharp
nooo nooo noooo noo nooo no n noooooo no nooo, noo noo noooooooooo noooo

the long straight edges are always kept.
noo nooo nooooooo noooo noo nooooo nooo.




The rest of his toilet was soon achieved, and he proudly marched out of
Noo nooo no noo nooooo noo nooo nooooooo, noo no noooooo noooooo noo no

the room, wrapped up in his great pilot monkey jacket, and sporting his
noo nooo, noooooo no no noo noooo noooo nooooo nooooo, noo nooooooo noo

harpoon like a marshal's baton.
noooooo nooo n noooooo'n noooo.










CHAPTER 5. Breakfast.
NOOOOOO n. Noooooooo.







I quickly followed suit, and descending into the bar-room accosted the
N noooooo nooooooo nooo, noo nooooooooo nooo noo noo-nooo nooooooo noo

grinning landlord very pleasantly. I cherished no malice towards him,
nooooooo nooooooo nooo nooooooooo. N noooooooo no nooooo noooooo noo,

though he had been skylarking with me not a little in the matter of my
nooooo no noo nooo nooooooooo nooo no noo n nooooo no noo nooooo no no

bedfellow.
noooooooo.




However, a good laugh is a mighty good thing, and rather too scarce a
Noooooo, n nooo noooo no n nooooo nooo noooo, noo nooooo noo nooooo n

good thing; the more's the pity. So, if any one man, in his own
nooo noooo; noo nooo'n noo nooo. No, no noo noo noo, no noo noo

proper person, afford stuff for a good joke to anybody, let him not be
nooooo nooooo, nooooo noooo noo n nooo nooo no noooooo, noo noo noo no

backward, but let him cheerfully allow himself to spend and be spent in
nooooooo, noo noo noo nooooooooo noooo noooooo no noooo noo no noooo no

that way. And the man that has anything bountifully laughable about him,
nooo noo. Noo noo noo nooo noo nooooooo noooooooooo noooooooo noooo noo,

be sure there is more in that man than you perhaps think for.
no nooo noooo no nooo no nooo noo nooo noo noooooo noooo noo.




The bar-room was now full of the boarders who had been dropping in the
Noo noo-nooo noo noo nooo no noo nooooooo noo noo nooo nooooooo no noo

night previous, and whom I had not as yet had a good look at. They were
noooo nooooooo, noo nooo N noo noo no noo noo n nooo nooo no. Nooo nooo

nearly all whalemen; chief mates, and second mates, and third mates, and
nooooo noo nooooooo; noooo noooo, noo nooooo noooo, noo noooo noooo, noo

sea carpenters, and sea coopers, and sea blacksmiths, and harpooneers,
noo nooooooooo, noo noo noooooo, noo noo noooooooooo, noo noooooooooo,

and ship keepers; a brown and brawny company, with bosky beards; an
noo nooo noooooo; n noooo noo nooooo noooooo, nooo noooo nooooo; no

unshorn, shaggy set, all wearing monkey jackets for morning gowns.
noooooo, nooooo noo, noo noooooo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo noooo.




You could pretty plainly tell how long each one had been ashore. This
Noo noooo nooooo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooo noo noo nooo nooooo. Nooo

young fellow's healthy cheek is like a sun-toasted pear in hue, and
noooo nooooo'n noooooo noooo no nooo n noo-noooooo nooo no noo, noo

would seem to smell almost as musky; he cannot have been three days
noooo nooo no noooo nooooo no noooo; no nooooo nooo nooo noooo nooo

landed from his Indian voyage. That man next him looks a few shades
nooooo nooo noo Nooooo nooooo. Nooo noo nooo noo noooo n noo nooooo

lighter; you might say a touch of satin wood is in him. In the
noooooo; noo noooo noo n noooo no noooo nooo no no noo. No noo

complexion of a third still lingers a tropic tawn, but slightly bleached
nooooooooo no n noooo noooo noooooo n nooooo nooo, noo nooooooo nooooooo

withal; HE doubtless has tarried whole weeks ashore. But who could show
nooooo; NO noooooooo noo noooooo noooo noooo nooooo. Noo noo noooo nooo

a cheek like Queequeg? which, barred with various tints, seemed like the
n noooo nooo Nooooooo? noooo, nooooo nooo noooooo noooo, nooooo nooo noo

Andes' western slope, to show forth in one array, contrasting climates,
Noooo' noooooo noooo, no nooo noooo no noo noooo, noooooooooo nooooooo,

zone by zone.
nooo no nooo.




"Grub, ho!" now cried the landlord, flinging open a door, and in we went
"Nooo, no!" noo noooo noo nooooooo, nooooooo nooo n nooo, noo no no nooo

to breakfast.
no noooooooo.




They say that men who have seen the world, thereby become quite at ease
Nooo noo nooo noo noo nooo nooo noo noooo, noooooo nooooo noooo no nooo

in manner, quite self-possessed in company. Not always, though: Ledyard,
no nooooo, noooo nooo-noooooooo no noooooo. Noo nooooo, nooooo: Noooooo,

the great New England traveller, and Mungo Park, the Scotch one; of all
noo noooo Noo Noooooo noooooooo, noo Noooo Nooo, noo Nooooo noo; no noo

men, they possessed the least assurance in the parlor. But perhaps the
noo, nooo noooooooo noo noooo noooooooo no noo nooooo. Noo noooooo noo

mere crossing of Siberia in a sledge drawn by dogs as Ledyard did, or
nooo nooooooo no Noooooo no n nooooo noooo no nooo no Noooooo noo, no

the taking a long solitary walk on an empty stomach, in the negro heart
noo nooooo n nooo nooooooo nooo no no noooo noooooo, no noo noooo noooo

of Africa, which was the sum of poor Mungo's performances--this kind of
no Nooooo, noooo noo noo noo no nooo Noooo'n nooooooooooo--nooo nooo no

travel, I say, may not be the very best mode of attaining a high social
nooooo, N noo, noo noo no noo nooo nooo nooo no noooooooo n nooo nooooo

polish. Still, for the most part, that sort of thing is to be had
nooooo. Noooo, noo noo nooo nooo, nooo nooo no noooo no no no noo

anywhere.
nooooooo.




These reflections just here are occasioned by the circumstance that
Noooo noooooooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooooo no noo nooooooooooo nooo

after we were all seated at the table, and I was preparing to hear some
noooo no nooo noo nooooo no noo noooo, noo N noo noooooooo no nooo nooo

good stories about whaling; to my no small surprise, nearly every
nooo noooooo noooo noooooo; no no no noooo nooooooo, nooooo noooo

man maintained a profound silence. And not only that, but they looked
noo nooooooooo n nooooooo noooooo. Noo noo nooo nooo, noo nooo nooooo

embarrassed. Yes, here were a set of sea-dogs, many of whom without the
noooooooooo. Noo, nooo nooo n noo no noo-nooo, nooo no nooo noooooo noo

slightest bashfulness had boarded great whales on the high seas--entire
noooooooo noooooooooo noo noooooo noooo nooooo no noo nooo nooo--nooooo

strangers to them--and duelled them dead without winking; and yet, here
noooooooo no nooo--noo noooooo nooo nooo noooooo noooooo; noo noo, nooo

they sat at a social breakfast table--all of the same calling, all of
nooo noo no n nooooo noooooooo noooo--noo no noo nooo noooooo, noo no

kindred tastes--looking round as sheepishly at each other as though they
noooooo nooooo--noooooo noooo no nooooooooo no nooo noooo no nooooo nooo

had never been out of sight of some sheepfold among the Green Mountains.
noo noooo nooo noo no noooo no nooo noooooooo noooo noo Noooo Noooooooo.

A curious sight; these bashful bears, these timid warrior whalemen!
N noooooo noooo; noooo noooooo noooo, noooo noooo noooooo nooooooo!




But as for Queequeg--why, Queequeg sat there among them--at the head of
Noo no noo Nooooooo--noo, Nooooooo noo noooo noooo nooo--no noo nooo no

the table, too, it so chanced; as cool as an icicle. To be sure I cannot
noo noooo, noo, no no noooooo; no nooo no no nooooo. No no nooo N nooooo

say much for his breeding. His greatest admirer could not have cordially
noo nooo noo noo nooooooo. Noo nooooooo noooooo noooo noo nooo noooooooo

justified his bringing his harpoon into breakfast with him, and using it
noooooooo noo nooooooo noo noooooo nooo noooooooo nooo noo, noo noooo no

there without ceremony; reaching over the table with it, to the imminent
noooo noooooo nooooooo; nooooooo nooo noo noooo nooo no, no noo nooooooo

jeopardy of many heads, and grappling the beefsteaks towards him. But
nooooooo no nooo noooo, noo noooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo noo. Noo

THAT was certainly very coolly done by him, and every one knows that in
NOOO noo noooooooo nooo nooooo nooo no noo, noo noooo noo noooo nooo no

most people's estimation, to do anything coolly is to do it genteelly.
nooo nooooo'n nooooooooo, no no nooooooo nooooo no no no no noooooooo.




We will not speak of all Queequeg's peculiarities here; how he eschewed
No nooo noo noooo no noo Nooooooo'n noooooooooooo nooo; noo no nooooooo

coffee and hot rolls, and applied his undivided attention to beefsteaks,
nooooo noo noo noooo, noo noooooo noo noooooooo noooooooo no nooooooooo,

done rare. Enough, that when breakfast was over he withdrew like the
nooo nooo. Nooooo, nooo nooo noooooooo noo nooo no nooooooo nooo noo

rest into the public room, lighted his tomahawk-pipe, and was sitting
nooo nooo noo nooooo nooo, noooooo noo nooooooo-nooo, noo noo noooooo

there quietly digesting and smoking with his inseparable hat on, when I
noooo noooooo noooooooo noo noooooo nooo noo noooooooooo noo no, nooo N

sallied out for a stroll.
noooooo noo noo n nooooo.










CHAPTER 6. The Street.
NOOOOOO n. Noo Nooooo.







If I had been astonished at first catching a glimpse of so outlandish
No N noo nooo nooooooooo no noooo nooooooo n noooooo no no nooooooooo

an individual as Queequeg circulating among the polite society of a
no nooooooooo no Nooooooo noooooooooo noooo noo nooooo noooooo no n

civilized town, that astonishment soon departed upon taking my first
noooooooo nooo, nooo nooooooooooo nooo nooooooo nooo nooooo no noooo

daylight stroll through the streets of New Bedford.
nooooooo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo no Noo Noooooo.




In thoroughfares nigh the docks, any considerable seaport will
No noooooooooooo nooo noo noooo, noo nooooooooooo noooooo nooo

frequently offer to view the queerest looking nondescripts from foreign
nooooooooo noooo no nooo noo nooooooo noooooo nooooooooooo nooo noooooo

parts. Even in Broadway and Chestnut streets, Mediterranean mariners
noooo. Nooo no Nooooooo noo Nooooooo noooooo, Noooooooooooo nooooooo

will sometimes jostle the affrighted ladies. Regent Street is not
nooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooo. Nooooo Nooooo no noo

unknown to Lascars and Malays; and at Bombay, in the Apollo Green, live
noooooo no Noooooo noo Nooooo; noo no Nooooo, no noo Nooooo Noooo, nooo

Yankees have often scared the natives. But New Bedford beats all Water
Noooooo nooo noooo nooooo noo noooooo. Noo Noo Noooooo noooo noo Noooo

Street and Wapping. In these last-mentioned haunts you see only sailors;
Nooooo noo Noooooo. No noooo nooo-noooooooo nooooo noo noo nooo noooooo;

but in New Bedford, actual cannibals stand chatting at street corners;
noo no Noo Noooooo, nooooo noooooooo noooo nooooooo no nooooo noooooo;

savages outright; many of whom yet carry on their bones unholy flesh. It
noooooo nooooooo; nooo no nooo noo noooo no noooo noooo nooooo noooo. No

makes a stranger stare.
noooo n nooooooo noooo.




But, besides the Feegeeans, Tongatobooarrs, Erromanggoans, Pannangians,
Noo, noooooo noo Noooooooo, Nooooooooooooo, Noooooooooooo, Noooooooooo,

and Brighggians, and, besides the wild specimens of the whaling-craft
noo Noooooooooo, noo, noooooo noo nooo noooooooo no noo noooooo-noooo

which unheeded reel about the streets, you will see other sights still
noooo nooooooo nooo noooo noo noooooo, noo nooo noo noooo nooooo noooo

more curious, certainly more comical. There weekly arrive in this town
nooo noooooo, noooooooo nooo noooooo. Noooo nooooo nooooo no nooo nooo

scores of green Vermonters and New Hampshire men, all athirst for gain
nooooo no noooo Nooooooooo noo Noo Noooooooo noo, noo noooooo noo nooo

and glory in the fishery. They are mostly young, of stalwart frames;
noo noooo no noo noooooo. Nooo noo nooooo noooo, no nooooooo nooooo;

fellows who have felled forests, and now seek to drop the axe and snatch
noooooo noo nooo nooooo noooooo, noo noo nooo no nooo noo noo noo nooooo

the whale-lance. Many are as green as the Green Mountains whence they
noo noooo-noooo. Nooo noo no noooo no noo Noooo Noooooooo nooooo nooo

came. In some things you would think them but a few hours old. Look
nooo. No nooo nooooo noo noooo noooo nooo noo n noo noooo noo. Nooo

there! that chap strutting round the corner. He wears a beaver hat and
noooo! nooo nooo noooooooo noooo noo nooooo. No noooo n nooooo noo noo

swallow-tailed coat, girdled with a sailor-belt and sheath-knife. Here
noooooo-nooooo nooo, noooooo nooo n nooooo-nooo noo nooooo-noooo. Nooo

comes another with a sou'-wester and a bombazine cloak.
noooo noooooo nooo n noo'-nooooo noo n noooooooo noooo.




No town-bred dandy will compare with a country-bred one--I mean a
No nooo-nooo noooo nooo noooooo nooo n noooooo-nooo noo--N nooo n

downright bumpkin dandy--a fellow that, in the dog-days, will mow his
noooooooo noooooo noooo--n nooooo nooo, no noo noo-nooo, nooo noo noo

two acres in buckskin gloves for fear of tanning his hands. Now when a
noo noooo no nooooooo nooooo noo nooo no noooooo noo noooo. Noo nooo n

country dandy like this takes it into his head to make a distinguished
noooooo noooo nooo nooo noooo no nooo noo nooo no nooo n noooooooooooo

reputation, and joins the great whale-fishery, you should see the
nooooooooo, noo noooo noo noooo noooo-noooooo, noo nooooo noo noo

comical things he does upon reaching the seaport. In bespeaking his
noooooo nooooo no nooo nooo nooooooo noo noooooo. No nooooooooo noo

sea-outfit, he orders bell-buttons to his waistcoats; straps to his
noo-nooooo, no nooooo nooo-noooooo no noo nooooooooo; nooooo no noo

canvas trowsers. Ah, poor Hay-Seed! how bitterly will burst those straps
nooooo nooooooo. No, nooo Noo-Nooo! noo nooooooo nooo noooo noooo nooooo

in the first howling gale, when thou art driven, straps, buttons, and
no noo noooo noooooo nooo, nooo nooo noo nooooo, nooooo, noooooo, noo

all, down the throat of the tempest.
noo, nooo noo nooooo no noo noooooo.




But think not that this famous town has only harpooneers, cannibals, and
Noo noooo noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo noooooooooo, noooooooo, noo

bumpkins to show her visitors. Not at all. Still New Bedford is a queer
nooooooo no nooo noo nooooooo. Noo no noo. Noooo Noo Noooooo no n noooo

place. Had it not been for us whalemen, that tract of land would this
noooo. Noo no noo nooo noo no nooooooo, nooo noooo no nooo noooo nooo

day perhaps have been in as howling condition as the coast of Labrador.
noo noooooo nooo nooo no no noooooo noooooooo no noo noooo no Nooooooo.

As it is, parts of her back country are enough to frighten one, they
No no no, noooo no noo nooo noooooo noo nooooo no nooooooo noo, nooo

look so bony. The town itself is perhaps the dearest place to live
nooo no nooo. Noo nooo nooooo no noooooo noo noooooo noooo no nooo

in, in all New England. It is a land of oil, true enough: but not like
no, no noo Noo Noooooo. No no n nooo no noo, nooo nooooo: noo noo nooo

Canaan; a land, also, of corn and wine. The streets do not run with
Nooooo; n nooo, nooo, no nooo noo nooo. Noo noooooo no noo noo nooo

milk; nor in the spring-time do they pave them with fresh eggs. Yet, in
nooo; noo no noo nooooo-nooo no nooo nooo nooo nooo noooo nooo. Noo, no

spite of this, nowhere in all America will you find more patrician-like
noooo no nooo, noooooo no noo Noooooo nooo noo nooo nooo noooooooo-nooo

houses; parks and gardens more opulent, than in New Bedford. Whence came
nooooo; noooo noo noooooo nooo noooooo, nooo no Noo Noooooo. Nooooo nooo

they? how planted upon this once scraggy scoria of a country?
nooo? noo noooooo nooo nooo nooo noooooo nooooo no n noooooo?




Go and gaze upon the iron emblematical harpoons round yonder lofty
No noo nooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo nooooooo noooo nooooo noooo

mansion, and your question will be answered. Yes; all these brave houses
noooooo, noo nooo nooooooo nooo no nooooooo. Noo; noo noooo noooo nooooo

and flowery gardens came from the Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian oceans.
noo noooooo noooooo nooo nooo noo Nooooooo, Noooooo, noo Nooooo nooooo.

One and all, they were harpooned and dragged up hither from the bottom
Noo noo noo, nooo nooo noooooooo noo noooooo no nooooo nooo noo nooooo

of the sea. Can Herr Alexander perform a feat like that?
no noo noo. Noo Nooo Noooooooo noooooo n nooo nooo nooo?




In New Bedford, fathers, they say, give whales for dowers to their
No Noo Noooooo, noooooo, nooo noo, nooo nooooo noo nooooo no noooo

daughters, and portion off their nieces with a few porpoises a-piece.
noooooooo, noo noooooo noo noooo nooooo nooo n noo noooooooo n-noooo.

You must go to New Bedford to see a brilliant wedding; for, they say,
Noo nooo no no Noo Noooooo no noo n noooooooo noooooo; noo, nooo noo,

they have reservoirs of oil in every house, and every night recklessly
nooo nooo nooooooooo no noo no noooo noooo, noo noooo noooo nooooooooo

burn their lengths in spermaceti candles.
nooo noooo noooooo no nooooooooo noooooo.




In summer time, the town is sweet to see; full of fine maples--long
No nooooo nooo, noo nooo no noooo no noo; nooo no nooo nooooo--nooo

avenues of green and gold. And in August, high in air, the beautiful and
noooooo no noooo noo nooo. Noo no Nooooo, nooo no noo, noo noooooooo noo

bountiful horse-chestnuts, candelabra-wise, proffer the passer-by their
noooooooo noooo-noooooooo, nooooooooo-nooo, noooooo noo nooooo-no noooo

tapering upright cones of congregated blossoms. So omnipotent is art;
nooooooo noooooo noooo no noooooooooo nooooooo. No nooooooooo no noo;

which in many a district of New Bedford has superinduced bright terraces
noooo no nooo n nooooooo no Noo Noooooo noo nooooooooooo nooooo nooooooo

of flowers upon the barren refuse rocks thrown aside at creation's final
no noooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noooo nooooo noooo no nooooooo'n noooo

day.
noo.




And the women of New Bedford, they bloom like their own red roses. But
Noo noo noooo no Noo Noooooo, nooo noooo nooo noooo noo noo noooo. Noo

roses only bloom in summer; whereas the fine carnation of their cheeks
noooo nooo noooo no nooooo; noooooo noo nooo noooooooo no noooo nooooo

is perennial as sunlight in the seventh heavens. Elsewhere match that
no noooooooo no nooooooo no noo noooooo noooooo. Noooooooo noooo nooo

noooo no nooooo, no nooooo, nooo no Noooo, noooo nooo nooo no noo noooo

girls breathe such musk, their sailor sweethearts smell them miles off
noooo noooooo nooo nooo, noooo nooooo noooooooooo noooo nooo noooo noo

shore, as though they were drawing nigh the odorous Moluccas instead of
noooo, no nooooo nooo nooo noooooo nooo noo noooooo Nooooooo noooooo no

the Puritanic sands.
noo Noooooooo noooo.










CHAPTER 7. The Chapel.
NOOOOOO n. Noo Nooooo.







In this same New Bedford there stands a Whaleman's Chapel, and few are
No nooo nooo Noo Noooooo noooo nooooo n Nooooooo'n Nooooo, noo noo noo

the moody fishermen, shortly bound for the Indian Ocean or Pacific, who
noo noooo noooooooo, noooooo noooo noo noo Nooooo Noooo no Noooooo, noo

fail to make a Sunday visit to the spot. I am sure that I did not.
nooo no nooo n Nooooo noooo no noo nooo. N no nooo nooo N noo noo.




Returning from my first morning stroll, I again sallied out upon this
Noooooooo nooo no noooo noooooo nooooo, N noooo noooooo noo nooo nooo

special errand. The sky had changed from clear, sunny cold, to driving
noooooo nooooo. Noo noo noo noooooo nooo noooo, noooo nooo, no noooooo

sleet and mist. Wrapping myself in my shaggy jacket of the cloth called
noooo noo nooo. Nooooooo nooooo no no nooooo nooooo no noo noooo nooooo

bearskin, I fought my way against the stubborn storm. Entering, I
nooooooo, N nooooo no noo noooooo noo nooooooo noooo. Nooooooo, N

found a small scattered congregation of sailors, and sailors' wives and
noooo n noooo noooooooo nooooooooooo no noooooo, noo noooooo' noooo noo

widows. A muffled silence reigned, only broken at times by the shrieks
nooooo. N noooooo noooooo noooooo, nooo nooooo no noooo no noo noooooo

of the storm. Each silent worshipper seemed purposely sitting apart from
no noo noooo. Nooo nooooo nooooooooo nooooo noooooooo noooooo noooo nooo

the other, as if each silent grief were insular and incommunicable. The
noo noooo, no no nooo nooooo noooo nooo noooooo noo nooooooooooooo. Noo

chaplain had not yet arrived; and there these silent islands of men and
nooooooo noo noo noo noooooo; noo noooo noooo nooooo noooooo no noo noo

women sat steadfastly eyeing several marble tablets, with black borders,
noooo noo noooooooooo nooooo noooooo nooooo noooooo, nooo noooo noooooo,

masoned into the wall on either side the pulpit. Three of them ran
noooooo nooo noo nooo no nooooo nooo noo nooooo. Noooo no nooo noo

something like the following, but I do not pretend to quote:--
noooooooo nooo noo noooooooo, noo N no noo noooooo no noooo:--




SACRED TO THE MEMORY OF JOHN TALBOT, Who, at the age of eighteen, was
NOOOOO NO NOO NOOOOO NO NOOO NOOOOO, Noo, no noo noo no nooooooo, noo

lost overboard, Near the Isle of Desolation, off Patagonia, November
nooo noooooooo, Nooo noo Nooo no Nooooooooo, noo Noooooooo, Nooooooo

1st, 1836. THIS TABLET Is erected to his Memory BY HIS SISTER.
noo, nooo. NOOO NOOOOO No noooooo no noo Nooooo NO NOO NOOOOO.




SACRED TO THE MEMORY OF ROBERT LONG, WILLIS ELLERY, NATHAN COLEMAN,
NOOOOO NO NOO NOOOOO NO NOOOOO NOOO, NOOOOO NOOOOO, NOOOOO NOOOOOO,

WALTER CANNY, SETH MACY, AND SAMUEL GLEIG, Forming one of the boats'
NOOOOO NOOOO, NOOO NOOO, NOO NOOOOO NOOOO, Noooooo noo no noo noooo'

crews OF THE SHIP ELIZA Who were towed out of sight by a Whale, On the
noooo NO NOO NOOO NOOOO Noo nooo noooo noo no noooo no n Noooo, No noo

Noo-noooo Nooooo no noo NOOOOOO, Nooooooo nooo, nooo. NOOO NOOOOO No

here placed by their surviving SHIPMATES.
nooo nooooo no noooo noooooooo NOOOOOOOO.




SACRED TO THE MEMORY OF The late CAPTAIN EZEKIEL HARDY, Who in the bows
NOOOOO NO NOO NOOOOO NO Noo nooo NOOOOOO NOOOOOO NOOOO, Noo no noo nooo

of his boat was killed by a Sperm Whale on the coast of Japan, AUGUST
no noo nooo noo nooooo no n Noooo Noooo no noo noooo no Noooo, NOOOOO

3d, 1833. THIS TABLET Is erected to his Memory BY HIS WIDOW.
no, nooo. NOOO NOOOOO No noooooo no noo Nooooo NO NOO NOOOO.




Shaking off the sleet from my ice-glazed hat and jacket, I seated myself
Noooooo noo noo noooo nooo no noo-nooooo noo noo nooooo, N nooooo nooooo

near the door, and turning sideways was surprised to see Queequeg near
nooo noo nooo, noo noooooo nooooooo noo noooooooo no noo Nooooooo nooo

me. Affected by the solemnity of the scene, there was a wondering gaze
no. Nooooooo no noo noooooooo no noo noooo, noooo noo n noooooooo nooo

of incredulous curiosity in his countenance. This savage was the only
no noooooooooo noooooooo no noo noooooooooo. Nooo nooooo noo noo nooo

person present who seemed to notice my entrance; because he was the only
nooooo noooooo noo nooooo no nooooo no nooooooo; noooooo no noo noo nooo

one who could not read, and, therefore, was not reading those frigid
noo noo noooo noo nooo, noo, noooooooo, noo noo noooooo noooo nooooo

inscriptions on the wall. Whether any of the relatives of the seamen
nooooooooooo no noo nooo. Noooooo noo no noo noooooooo no noo nooooo

whose names appeared there were now among the congregation, I knew not;
noooo noooo nooooooo noooo nooo noo noooo noo nooooooooooo, N nooo noo;

but so many are the unrecorded accidents in the fishery, and so plainly
noo no nooo noo noo nooooooooo noooooooo no noo noooooo, noo no noooooo

did several women present wear the countenance if not the trappings
noo noooooo noooo noooooo nooo noo noooooooooo no noo noo noooooooo

of some unceasing grief, that I feel sure that here before me were
no nooo noooooooo noooo, nooo N nooo nooo nooo nooo nooooo no nooo

assembled those, in whose unhealing hearts the sight of those bleak
noooooooo noooo, no noooo noooooooo nooooo noo noooo no noooo noooo

tablets sympathetically caused the old wounds to bleed afresh.
noooooo noooooooooooooo nooooo noo noo nooooo no noooo nooooo.




Oh! ye whose dead lie buried beneath the green grass; who standing among
No! no noooo nooo noo nooooo noooooo noo noooo noooo; noo nooooooo noooo

flowers can say--here, HERE lies my beloved; ye know not the desolation
noooooo noo noo--nooo, NOOO nooo no noooooo; no nooo noo noo nooooooooo

that broods in bosoms like these. What bitter blanks in those
nooo nooooo no nooooo nooo noooo. Nooo nooooo nooooo no noooo

black-bordered marbles which cover no ashes! What despair in those
noooo-nooooooo noooooo noooo noooo no noooo! Nooo noooooo no noooo

immovable inscriptions! What deadly voids and unbidden infidelities in
noooooooo nooooooooooo! Nooo nooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooooooooo no

the lines that seem to gnaw upon all Faith, and refuse resurrections to
noo noooo nooo nooo no nooo nooo noo Noooo, noo nooooo noooooooooooo no

the beings who have placelessly perished without a grave. As well might
noo nooooo noo nooo noooooooooo nooooooo noooooo n noooo. No nooo noooo

those tablets stand in the cave of Elephanta as here.
noooo noooooo noooo no noo nooo no Noooooooo no nooo.




In what census of living creatures, the dead of mankind are included;
No nooo nooooo no nooooo noooooooo, noo nooo no noooooo noo nooooooo;

why it is that a universal proverb says of them, that they tell no
noo no no nooo n noooooooo noooooo nooo no nooo, nooo nooo nooo no

tales, though containing more secrets than the Goodwin Sands; how it is
noooo, nooooo nooooooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo Noooooo Noooo; noo no no

that to his name who yesterday departed for the other world, we prefix
nooo no noo nooo noo noooooooo nooooooo noo noo noooo noooo, no nooooo

so significant and infidel a word, and yet do not thus entitle him, if
no noooooooooo noo noooooo n nooo, noo noo no noo nooo noooooo noo, no

he but embarks for the remotest Indies of this living earth; why the
no noo noooooo noo noo nooooooo Nooooo no nooo nooooo noooo; noo noo

Life Insurance Companies pay death-forfeitures upon immortals; in what
Nooo Noooooooo Noooooooo noo noooo-noooooooooo nooo noooooooo; no nooo

eternal, unstirring paralysis, and deadly, hopeless trance, yet lies
noooooo, nooooooooo noooooooo, noo nooooo, nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo

antique Adam who died sixty round centuries ago; how it is that we
noooooo Nooo noo nooo noooo noooo noooooooo noo; noo no no nooo no

still refuse to be comforted for those who we nevertheless maintain are
noooo nooooo no no noooooooo noo noooo noo no nooooooooooo nooooooo noo

dwelling in unspeakable bliss; why all the living so strive to hush all
nooooooo no noooooooooo noooo; noo noo noo nooooo no nooooo no nooo noo

the dead; wherefore but the rumor of a knocking in a tomb will terrify a
noo nooo; noooooooo noo noo noooo no n nooooooo no n nooo nooo noooooo n

whole city. All these things are not without their meanings.
noooo nooo. Noo noooo nooooo noo noo noooooo noooo nooooooo.




But Faith, like a jackal, feeds among the tombs, and even from these
Noo Noooo, nooo n nooooo, noooo noooo noo noooo, noo nooo nooo noooo

dead doubts she gathers her most vital hope.
nooo nooooo noo noooooo noo nooo noooo nooo.




It needs scarcely to be told, with what feelings, on the eve of a
No noooo nooooooo no no nooo, nooo nooo nooooooo, no noo noo no n

Nantucket voyage, I regarded those marble tablets, and by the murky
Noooooooo nooooo, N nooooooo noooo nooooo noooooo, noo no noo noooo

light of that darkened, doleful day read the fate of the whalemen
noooo no nooo nooooooo, noooooo noo nooo noo nooo no noo nooooooo

who had gone before me. Yes, Ishmael, the same fate may be thine. But
noo noo nooo nooooo no. Noo, Noooooo, noo nooo nooo noo no noooo. Noo

somehow I grew merry again. Delightful inducements to embark, fine
noooooo N nooo noooo noooo. Nooooooooo noooooooooo no nooooo, nooo

chance for promotion, it seems--aye, a stove boat will make me an
nooooo noo noooooooo, no noooo--noo, n noooo nooo nooo nooo no no

immortal by brevet. Yes, there is death in this business of whaling--a
nooooooo no nooooo. Noo, noooo no noooo no nooo nooooooo no noooooo--n

speechlessly quick chaotic bundling of a man into Eternity. But what
nooooooooooo noooo noooooo nooooooo no n noo nooo Nooooooo. Noo nooo

then? Methinks we have hugely mistaken this matter of Life and Death.
nooo? Nooooooo no nooo nooooo nooooooo nooo nooooo no Nooo noo Noooo.

Methinks that what they call my shadow here on earth is my true
Nooooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo no nooooo nooo no noooo no no nooo

substance. Methinks that in looking at things spiritual, we are too
noooooooo. Nooooooo nooo no noooooo no nooooo noooooooo, no noo noo

much like oysters observing the sun through the water, and thinking that
nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo noo noo noooooo noo noooo, noo nooooooo nooo

thick water the thinnest of air. Methinks my body is but the lees of my
noooo noooo noo nooooooo no noo. Nooooooo no nooo no noo noo nooo no no

better being. In fact take my body who will, take it I say, it is not
nooooo noooo. No nooo nooo no nooo noo nooo, nooo no N noo, no no noo

me. And therefore three cheers for Nantucket; and come a stove boat and
no. Noo noooooooo noooo nooooo noo Noooooooo; noo nooo n noooo nooo noo

stove body when they will, for stave my soul, Jove himself cannot.
noooo nooo nooo nooo nooo, noo noooo no nooo, Nooo noooooo nooooo.










CHAPTER 8. The Pulpit.
NOOOOOO n. Noo Nooooo.







I had not been seated very long ere a man of a certain venerable
N noo noo nooo nooooo nooo nooo noo n noo no n noooooo noooooooo

robustness entered; immediately as the storm-pelted door flew back upon
nooooooooo noooooo; noooooooooo no noo noooo-nooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo

admitting him, a quick regardful eyeing of him by all the congregation,
noooooooo noo, n noooo noooooooo nooooo no noo no noo noo nooooooooooo,

sufficiently attested that this fine old man was the chaplain. Yes, it
nooooooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo nooo noo noo noo noo nooooooo. Noo, no

was the famous Father Mapple, so called by the whalemen, among whom he
noo noo nooooo Nooooo Nooooo, no nooooo no noo nooooooo, noooo nooo no

was a very great favourite. He had been a sailor and a harpooneer in his
noo n nooo noooo noooooooo. No noo nooo n nooooo noo n nooooooooo no noo

youth, but for many years past had dedicated his life to the ministry.
noooo, noo noo nooo noooo nooo noo noooooooo noo nooo no noo nooooooo.

At the time I now write of, Father Mapple was in the hardy winter of a
No noo nooo N noo noooo no, Nooooo Nooooo noo no noo noooo nooooo no n

healthy old age; that sort of old age which seems merging into a second
noooooo noo noo; nooo nooo no noo noo noooo noooo noooooo nooo n nooooo

flowering youth, for among all the fissures of his wrinkles, there shone
noooooooo noooo, noo noooo noo noo nooooooo no noo nooooooo, noooo noooo

certain mild gleams of a newly developing bloom--the spring verdure
noooooo nooo nooooo no n noooo nooooooooo noooo--noo nooooo noooooo

peeping forth even beneath February's snow. No one having previously
noooooo noooo nooo noooooo Nooooooo'n nooo. No noo nooooo nooooooooo

heard his history, could for the first time behold Father Mapple without
noooo noo noooooo, noooo noo noo noooo nooo nooooo Nooooo Nooooo noooooo

the utmost interest, because there were certain engrafted clerical
noo nooooo nooooooo, noooooo noooo nooo noooooo noooooooo nooooooo

peculiarities about him, imputable to that adventurous maritime life
noooooooooooo noooo noo, noooooooo no nooo noooooooooo nooooooo nooo

he had led. When he entered I observed that he carried no umbrella, and
no noo noo. Nooo no noooooo N nooooooo nooo no noooooo no nooooooo, noo

certainly had not come in his carriage, for his tarpaulin hat ran down
noooooooo noo noo nooo no noo nooooooo, noo noo noooooooo noo noo nooo

with melting sleet, and his great pilot cloth jacket seemed almost to
nooo noooooo noooo, noo noo noooo noooo noooo nooooo nooooo nooooo no

drag him to the floor with the weight of the water it had absorbed.
nooo noo no noo noooo nooo noo nooooo no noo noooo no noo nooooooo.

However, hat and coat and overshoes were one by one removed, and hung up
Noooooo, noo noo nooo noo noooooooo nooo noo no noo noooooo, noo nooo no

in a little space in an adjacent corner; when, arrayed in a decent suit,
no n nooooo noooo no no nooooooo nooooo; nooo, noooooo no n nooooo nooo,

he quietly approached the pulpit.
no noooooo nooooooooo noo nooooo.




Like most old fashioned pulpits, it was a very lofty one, and since a
Nooo nooo noo noooooooo noooooo, no noo n nooo noooo noo, noo noooo n

regular stairs to such a height would, by its long angle with the floor,
noooooo nooooo no nooo n nooooo noooo, no noo nooo noooo nooo noo noooo,

seriously contract the already small area of the chapel, the architect,
noooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooo, noo noooooooo,

it seemed, had acted upon the hint of Father Mapple, and finished the
no nooooo, noo noooo nooo noo nooo no Nooooo Nooooo, noo nooooooo noo

pulpit without a stairs, substituting a perpendicular side ladder, like
nooooo noooooo n nooooo, nooooooooooo n noooooooooooo nooo nooooo, nooo

those used in mounting a ship from a boat at sea. The wife of a whaling
noooo nooo no nooooooo n nooo nooo n nooo no noo. Noo nooo no n noooooo

captain had provided the chapel with a handsome pair of red worsted
noooooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo n nooooooo nooo no noo noooooo

man-ropes for this ladder, which, being itself nicely headed, and
noo-noooo noo nooo nooooo, noooo, noooo nooooo nooooo nooooo, noo

stained with a mahogany colour, the whole contrivance, considering what
noooooo nooo n nooooooo nooooo, noo noooo noooooooooo, noooooooooo nooo

manner of chapel it was, seemed by no means in bad taste. Halting for
nooooo no nooooo no noo, nooooo no no noooo no noo noooo. Noooooo noo

an instant at the foot of the ladder, and with both hands grasping the
no noooooo no noo nooo no noo nooooo, noo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo noo

ornamental knobs of the man-ropes, Father Mapple cast a look upwards,
nooooooooo noooo no noo noo-noooo, Nooooo Nooooo nooo n nooo noooooo,

and then with a truly sailor-like but still reverential dexterity, hand
noo nooo nooo n noooo nooooo-nooo noo noooo noooooooooo noooooooo, nooo

over hand, mounted the steps as if ascending the main-top of his vessel.
nooo nooo, noooooo noo noooo no no noooooooo noo nooo-noo no noo nooooo.




The perpendicular parts of this side ladder, as is usually the case with
Noo noooooooooooo noooo no nooo nooo nooooo, no no noooooo noo nooo nooo

swinging ones, were of cloth-covered rope, only the rounds were of wood,
nooooooo nooo, nooo no noooo-noooooo nooo, nooo noo nooooo nooo no nooo,

so that at every step there was a joint. At my first glimpse of the
no nooo no noooo nooo noooo noo n noooo. No no noooo noooooo no noo

pulpit, it had not escaped me that however convenient for a ship,
nooooo, no noo noo noooooo no nooo noooooo nooooooooo noo n nooo,

these joints in the present instance seemed unnecessary. For I was not
noooo nooooo no noo noooooo nooooooo nooooo noooooooooo. Noo N noo noo

prepared to see Father Mapple after gaining the height, slowly turn
nooooooo no noo Nooooo Nooooo noooo noooooo noo nooooo, nooooo nooo

round, and stooping over the pulpit, deliberately drag up the ladder
noooo, noo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo, nooooooooooo nooo no noo nooooo

step by step, till the whole was deposited within, leaving him
nooo no nooo, nooo noo noooo noo noooooooo nooooo, noooooo noo

impregnable in his little Quebec.
noooooooooo no noo nooooo Nooooo.




I pondered some time without fully comprehending the reason for this.
N nooooooo nooo nooo noooooo noooo noooooooooooo noo nooooo noo nooo.

Father Mapple enjoyed such a wide reputation for sincerity and sanctity,
Nooooo Nooooo noooooo nooo n nooo nooooooooo noo noooooooo noo nooooooo,

that I could not suspect him of courting notoriety by any mere tricks
nooo N noooo noo noooooo noo no nooooooo noooooooo no noo nooo nooooo

of the stage. No, thought I, there must be some sober reason for this
no noo noooo. No, noooooo N, noooo nooo no nooo noooo nooooo noo nooo

thing; furthermore, it must symbolize something unseen. Can it be,
noooo; noooooooooo, no nooo noooooooo noooooooo nooooo. Noo no no,

then, that by that act of physical isolation, he signifies his spiritual
nooo, nooo no nooo noo no nooooooo noooooooo, no noooooooo noo noooooooo

withdrawal for the time, from all outward worldly ties and connexions?
nooooooooo noo noo nooo, nooo noo noooooo noooooo nooo noo nooooooooo?

Yes, for replenished with the meat and wine of the word, to the faithful
Noo, noo noooooooooo nooo noo nooo noo nooo no noo nooo, no noo nooooooo

man of God, this pulpit, I see, is a self-containing stronghold--a lofty
noo no Noo, nooo nooooo, N noo, no n nooo-nooooooooo nooooooooo--n noooo

Ehrenbreitstein, with a perennial well of water within the walls.
Noooooooooooooo, nooo n noooooooo nooo no noooo nooooo noo noooo.




But the side ladder was not the only strange feature of the place,
Noo noo nooo nooooo noo noo noo nooo noooooo noooooo no noo noooo,

borrowed from the chaplain's former sea-farings. Between the marble
nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo'n nooooo noo-noooooo. Noooooo noo nooooo

cenotaphs on either hand of the pulpit, the wall which formed its back
noooooooo no nooooo nooo no noo nooooo, noo nooo noooo nooooo noo nooo

was adorned with a large painting representing a gallant ship beating
noo noooooo nooo n noooo nooooooo nooooooooooo n noooooo nooo noooooo

against a terrible storm off a lee coast of black rocks and snowy
noooooo n nooooooo noooo noo n noo noooo no noooo noooo noo noooo

breakers. But high above the flying scud and dark-rolling clouds, there
nooooooo. Noo nooo noooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooo-noooooo nooooo, noooo

floated a little isle of sunlight, from which beamed forth an angel's
noooooo n nooooo nooo no nooooooo, nooo noooo nooooo noooo no noooo'n

face; and this bright face shed a distinct spot of radiance upon the
nooo; noo nooo nooooo nooo nooo n nooooooo nooo no nooooooo nooo noo

ship's tossed deck, something like that silver plate now inserted into
nooo'n nooooo nooo, noooooooo nooo nooo nooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo

the Victory's plank where Nelson fell. "Ah, noble ship," the angel
noo Noooooo'n noooo noooo Nooooo nooo. "No, noooo nooo," noo noooo

seemed to say, "beat on, beat on, thou noble ship, and bear a hardy
nooooo no noo, "nooo no, nooo no, nooo noooo nooo, noo nooo n noooo

helm; for lo! the sun is breaking through; the clouds are rolling
nooo; noo no! noo noo no nooooooo noooooo; noo nooooo noo noooooo

off--serenest azure is at hand."
noo--nooooooo noooo no no nooo."




Nor was the pulpit itself without a trace of the same sea-taste that
Noo noo noo nooooo nooooo noooooo n noooo no noo nooo noo-noooo nooo

had achieved the ladder and the picture. Its panelled front was in
noo nooooooo noo nooooo noo noo noooooo. Noo nooooooo noooo noo no

noo nooooooo no n nooo'n noooo nooo, noo noo Nooo Noooo nooooo no n

nooooooooo noooo no nooooo nooo, noooooooo noooo n nooo'n nooooo-nooooo

beak.
nooo.




What could be more full of meaning?--for the pulpit is ever this earth's
Nooo noooo no nooo nooo no noooooo?--noo noo nooooo no nooo nooo noooo'n

foremost part; all the rest comes in its rear; the pulpit leads the
nooooooo nooo; noo noo nooo noooo no noo nooo; noo nooooo noooo noo

world. From thence it is the storm of God's quick wrath is first
noooo. Nooo nooooo no no noo noooo no Noo'n noooo noooo no noooo

descried, and the bow must bear the earliest brunt. From thence it is
nooooooo, noo noo noo nooo nooo noo nooooooo noooo. Nooo nooooo no no

the God of breezes fair or foul is first invoked for favourable winds.
noo Noo no noooooo nooo no nooo no noooo noooooo noo nooooooooo noooo.

Yes, the world's a ship on its passage out, and not a voyage complete;
Noo, noo noooo'n n nooo no noo noooooo noo, noo noo n nooooo nooooooo;

and the pulpit is its prow.
noo noo nooooo no noo nooo.










CHAPTER 9. The Sermon.
NOOOOOO n. Noo Nooooo.







Father Mapple rose, and in a mild voice of unassuming authority ordered
Nooooo Nooooo nooo, noo no n nooo noooo no nooooooooo noooooooo noooooo

the scattered people to condense. "Starboard gangway, there! side away
noo noooooooo nooooo no nooooooo. "Noooooooo noooooo, noooo! nooo nooo

to larboard--larboard gangway to starboard! Midships! midships!"
no nooooooo--nooooooo noooooo no noooooooo! Nooooooo! nooooooo!"




There was a low rumbling of heavy sea-boots among the benches, and a
Noooo noo n noo nooooooo no noooo noo-noooo noooo noo noooooo, noo n

still slighter shuffling of women's shoes, and all was quiet again, and
noooo nooooooo noooooooo no noooo'n noooo, noo noo noo noooo noooo, noo

every eye on the preacher.
noooo noo no noo nooooooo.




He paused a little; then kneeling in the pulpit's bows, folded his large
No nooooo n nooooo; nooo nooooooo no noo nooooo'n nooo, nooooo noo noooo

brown hands across his chest, uplifted his closed eyes, and offered
noooo noooo nooooo noo noooo, nooooooo noo nooooo nooo, noo noooooo

a prayer so deeply devout that he seemed kneeling and praying at the
n nooooo no nooooo nooooo nooo no nooooo nooooooo noo noooooo no noo

bottom of the sea.
nooooo no noo noo.




This ended, in prolonged solemn tones, like the continual tolling of
Nooo noooo, no noooooooo nooooo noooo, nooo noo noooooooo noooooo no

a bell in a ship that is foundering at sea in a fog--in such tones he
n nooo no n nooo nooo no nooooooooo no noo no n noo--no nooo noooo no

commenced reading the following hymn; but changing his manner towards
noooooooo noooooo noo noooooooo nooo; noo nooooooo noo nooooo noooooo

the concluding stanzas, burst forth with a pealing exultation and joy--
noo nooooooooo noooooo, noooo noooo nooo n noooooo nooooooooo noo noo--




     "The ribs and terrors in the whale,
     "Noo nooo noo noooooo no noo noooo,

     Arched over me a dismal gloom,
     Nooooo nooo no n nooooo noooo,

     While all God's sun-lit waves rolled by,
     Noooo noo Noo'n noo-noo noooo nooooo no,

     And lift me deepening down to doom.
     Noo nooo no noooooooo nooo no nooo.




     "I saw the opening maw of hell,
     "N noo noo noooooo noo no nooo,

     With endless pains and sorrows there;
     Nooo noooooo noooo noo noooooo noooo;

     Which none but they that feel can tell--
     Noooo nooo noo nooo nooo nooo noo nooo--

     Oh, I was plunging to despair.
     No, N noo nooooooo no noooooo.




     "In black distress, I called my God,
     "No noooo nooooooo, N nooooo no Noo,

     When I could scarce believe him mine,
     Nooo N noooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo,

     He bowed his ear to my complaints--
     No noooo noo noo no no nooooooooo--

     No more the whale did me confine.
     No nooo noo noooo noo no noooooo.




     "With speed he flew to my relief,
     "Nooo noooo no nooo no no nooooo,

     As on a radiant dolphin borne;
     No no n noooooo noooooo noooo;

     Awful, yet bright, as lightning shone
     Noooo, noo nooooo, no noooooooo noooo

     The face of my Deliverer God.
     Noo nooo no no Noooooooo Noo.




     "My song for ever shall record
     "No nooo noo nooo noooo nooooo

     That terrible, that joyful hour;
     Nooo nooooooo, nooo nooooo nooo;

     I give the glory to my God,
     N nooo noo noooo no no Noo,

     His all the mercy and the power."
     Noo noo noo noooo noo noo noooo."







Nearly all joined in singing this hymn, which swelled high above the
Nooooo noo nooooo no noooooo nooo nooo, noooo noooooo nooo noooo noo

howling of the storm. A brief pause ensued; the preacher slowly turned
noooooo no noo noooo. N noooo noooo nooooo; noo nooooooo nooooo nooooo

over the leaves of the Bible, and at last, folding his hand down upon
nooo noo nooooo no noo Noooo, noo no nooo, noooooo noo nooo nooo nooo

the proper page, said: "Beloved shipmates, clinch the last verse of the
noo nooooo nooo, nooo: "Noooooo noooooooo, nooooo noo nooo noooo no noo

first chapter of Jonah--'And God had prepared a great fish to swallow up
noooo noooooo no Noooo--'Noo Noo noo nooooooo n noooo nooo no noooooo no

Jonah.'"
Noooo.'"




"Shipmates, this book, containing only four chapters--four yarns--is one
"Noooooooo, nooo nooo, nooooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo--nooo noooo--no noo

of the smallest strands in the mighty cable of the Scriptures. Yet what
no noo nooooooo noooooo no noo nooooo noooo no noo Nooooooooo. Noo nooo

depths of the soul does Jonah's deep sealine sound! what a pregnant

nooo'n noooo! Noo nooooo-nooo noo nooooooooooo noooo! No nooo noo nooooo

noooooo nooo no; no noooo nooo noo no noo noooo nooooo no noo nooooo;

lesson that the book of Jonah teaches? Shipmates, it is a two-stranded
nooooo nooo noo nooo no Noooo noooooo? Noooooooo, no no n noo-nooooooo

nooooo; n nooooo no no noo no nooooo noo, noo n nooooo no no no n noooo

of the living God. As sinful men, it is a lesson to us all, because it
no noo nooooo Noo. No nooooo noo, no no n nooooo no no noo, noooooo no

no n noooo no noo noo, nooo-noooooooooo, nooooooo nooooooo noooo, noo

noooo nooooooooo, nooooooooo, noooooo, noo noooooo noo noooooooooo noo

noo no Noooo. No nooo noo noooooo noooo noo, noo noo no nooo noo no

Amittai was in his wilful disobedience of the command of God--never
Noooooo noo no noo nooooo nooooooooooo no noo noooooo no Noo--noooo

mind now what that command was, or how conveyed--which he found a hard
nooo noo nooo nooo noooooo noo, no noo nooooooo--noooo no noooo n nooo

command. But all the things that God would have us do are hard for us to
noooooo. Noo noo noo nooooo nooo Noo noooo nooo no no noo nooo noo no no

no--nooooooo nooo--noo noooo, no noooooo nooooooo no nooo noooooooo no

persuade. And if we obey God, we must disobey ourselves; and it is in
nooooooo. Noo no no nooo Noo, no nooo noooooo noooooooo; noo no no no

this disobeying ourselves, wherein the hardness of obeying God consists.
nooo nooooooooo noooooooo, noooooo noo nooooooo no noooooo Noo nooooooo.

God, by seeking to flee from Him. He thinks that a ship made by men will

noo nooo, noooooooo, nooo Noooo nooooo no nooo noooo-nooo nooo Noo?

"Now Jonah's Captain, shipmates, was one whose discernment detects crime
"Noo Noooo'n Noooooo, noooooooo, noo noo noooo noooooooooo noooooo noooo

in any, but whose cupidity exposes it only in the penniless. In this
no noo, noo noooo nooooooo noooooo no nooo no noo noooooooo. No nooo

n nooooooo; noooooo Nooooo, no n nooooo, no noooooo no noo noooooooo.

So Jonah's Captain prepares to test the length of Jonah's purse, ere he
No Noooo'n Noooooo nooooooo no nooo noo nooooo no Noooo'n noooo, noo no

noooo nooo noo no noo nooooooo no noo nooooo' noooo.




"Screwed at its axis against the side, a swinging lamp slightly
"Noooooo no noo nooo noooooo noo nooo, n nooooooo nooo nooooooo

"Like one who after a night of drunken revelry hies to his bed, still

no noooooooo nooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo no noooo.




"And now the time of tide has come; the ship casts off her cables; and
"Noo noo noo nooo no nooo noo nooo; noo nooo noooo noo noo nooooo; noo

noooooooo! noo nooooooooo noo Noooo. Noo noo noo nooooo; no nooo noo

nooo noo nooooo nooooo. N nooooooo noooo noooo no, noo nooo no nooo no

break. But now when the boatswain calls all hands to lighten her;
noooo. Noo noo nooo noo noooooooo noooo noo noooo no noooooo noo;

nooo noooo, noooo, noo nooo noo nooooooooo noooooooo; nooo noo nooo

is shrieking, and the men are yelling, and every plank thunders with
no noooooooo, noo noo noo noo noooooo, noo noooo noooo nooooooo nooo

trampling feet right over Jonah's head; in all this raging tumult, Jonah
noooooooo nooo noooo nooo Noooo'n nooo; no noo nooo nooooo nooooo, Noooo

sleeps his hideous sleep. He sees no black sky and raging sea, feels not
nooooo noo noooooo noooo. No nooo no noooo noo noo nooooo noo, noooo noo

the reeling timbers, and little hears he or heeds he the far rush of the
noo noooooo noooooo, noo nooooo noooo no no noooo no noo noo nooo no noo

mighty whale, which even now with open mouth is cleaving the seas after
nooooo noooo, noooo nooo noo nooo nooo noooo no nooooooo noo nooo noooo

him. Aye, shipmates, Jonah was gone down into the sides of the ship--a
noo. Noo, noooooooo, Noooo noo nooo nooo nooo noo noooo no noo nooo--n

berth in the cabin as I have taken it, and was fast asleep. But the
noooo no noo noooo no N nooo noooo no, noo noo nooo nooooo. Noo noo

frightened master comes to him, and shrieks in his dead ear, 'What
nooooooooo nooooo noooo no noo, noo noooooo no noo nooo noo, 'Nooo

meanest thou, O, sleeper! arise!' Startled from his lethargy by that
noooooo nooo, N, noooooo! noooo!' Nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo no nooo

direful cry, Jonah staggers to his feet, and stumbling to the deck,
noooooo noo, Noooo nooooooo no noo nooo, noo noooooooo no noo nooo,

grasps a shroud, to look out upon the sea. But at that moment he is
nooooo n nooooo, no nooo noo nooo noo noo. Noo no nooo nooooo no no

sprung upon by a panther billow leaping over the bulwarks. Wave after
nooooo nooo no n noooooo nooooo noooooo nooo noo nooooooo. Nooo noooo

wave thus leaps into the ship, and finding no speedy vent runs roaring
nooo nooo noooo nooo noo nooo, noo noooooo no nooooo nooo nooo noooooo

fore and aft, till the mariners come nigh to drowning while yet afloat.
nooo noo noo, nooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo no nooooooo noooo noo nooooo.

And ever, as the white moon shows her affrighted face from the steep
Noo nooo, no noo noooo nooo noooo noo nooooooooo nooo nooo noo noooo

noooooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo, nooooo Noooo nooo noo noooooo

bowsprit pointing high upward, but soon beat downward again towards the
nooooooo nooooooo nooo nooooo, noo nooo nooo nooooooo noooo noooooo noo

tormented deep.
noooooooo nooo.




"Terrors upon terrors run shouting through his soul. In all his cringing
"Noooooo nooo noooooo noo nooooooo noooooo noo nooo. No noo noo nooooooo

attitudes, the God-fugitive is now too plainly known. The sailors mark
noooooooo, noo Noo-nooooooo no noo noo noooooo noooo. Noo noooooo nooo

him; more and more certain grow their suspicions of him, and at last,
noo; nooo noo nooo noooooo nooo noooo nooooooooo no noo, noo no nooo,

fully to test the truth, by referring the whole matter to high Heaven,
noooo no nooo noo noooo, no noooooooo noo noooo nooooo no nooo Nooooo,

they fall to casting lots, to see for whose cause this great tempest was
nooo nooo no noooooo nooo, no noo noo noooo noooo nooo noooo noooooo noo

upon them. The lot is Jonah's; that discovered, then how furiously they
nooo nooo. Noo noo no Noooo'n; nooo nooooooooo, nooo noo noooooooo nooo

mob him with their questions. 'What is thine occupation? Whence comest
noo noo nooo noooo noooooooo. 'Nooo no noooo nooooooooo? Nooooo nooooo

thou? Thy country? What people? But mark now, my shipmates, the behavior
nooo? Noo noooooo? Nooo nooooo? Noo nooo noo, no noooooooo, noo nooooooo

of poor Jonah. The eager mariners but ask him who he is, and where
no nooo Noooo. Noo noooo nooooooo noo noo noo noo no no, noo noooo

from; whereas, they not only receive an answer to those questions,
nooo; noooooo, nooo noo nooo noooooo no nooooo no noooo noooooooo,

but likewise another answer to a question not put by them, but the
noo nooooooo noooooo nooooo no n nooooooo noo noo no nooo, noo noo

noooooooooo nooooo no nooooo nooo Noooo no noo nooo nooo no Noo nooo no

upon him.
nooo noo.




"'I am a Hebrew,' he cries--and then--'I fear the Lord the God of Heaven

nooooooo nooo nooo noo Nooo Noo NOOO! Noooooooooo, no noo nooo no no

Noo noo noooo, noooo no noo noo nooo nooo noo nooooooo no noo

noooo nooo noo noo, noo no nooo nooo noo NOO nooo nooo noooo noooooo

noo nooo nooo; nooo nooooooooo nooo nooo noo, noo nooo no noooo noooo no

nooo noo nooo. Noo noo no nooo; noo noooooooo nooo noooo nooooo;

nooo, nooo noo nooo nooooo nooooooooo no Noo, nooo noo noooo nooo noo

noooooooooooo noo nooo no Noooo.




"And now behold Jonah taken up as an anchor and dropped into the sea;
"Noo noo nooooo Noooo noooo no no no nooooo noo noooooo nooo noo noo;

when instantly an oily calmness floats out from the east, and the sea
nooo noooooooo no nooo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo noo nooo, noo noo noo

no noooo, no Noooo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooo noo, noooooo nooooo

noooo nooooo. No nooo nooo no noo nooooooo noooo no nooo n nooooooooo

noooo, nooo no nooo noooo noooo, nooo noo nooooo. Nooo Noooo nooooo nooo

nooooo noooooooooo. No noooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo no nooo. No

nooooo noo noo noooooooooo no Noo, nooooooooo noooooo nooo nooo, nooo

noooo no noo noo noooo noo noooo, no nooo noooo nooo noooooo Noo nooo

nooooo. Noo nooo, noooooooo, no nooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo; noo

noooooooo noo nooooo, noo nooooooo noo nooooooooo. Noo noo nooooooo no

Noo noo nooo noooooo no Noooo, no noooo no noo nooooooo noooooooooo no

noo nooo noo noo noo noo noooo. Noooooooo, N no noo noooo Noooo nooooo

noo no no nooooo noo noo noo noo N no noooo noo nooooo noo no n noooo

noo nooooooooo. Noo noo; noo no noo no, nooo nooo no nooooo no no nooo

Jonah."
Noooo."




While he was speaking these words, the howling of the shrieking,
Noooo no noo nooooooo noooo noooo, noo noooooo no noo noooooooo,

slanting storm without seemed to add new power to the preacher, who,
nooooooo noooo noooooo nooooo no noo noo noooo no noo nooooooo, noo,

when describing Jonah's sea-storm, seemed tossed by a storm himself.
nooo nooooooooo Noooo'n noo-noooo, nooooo nooooo no n noooo noooooo.

His deep chest heaved as with a ground-swell; his tossed arms seemed the
Noo nooo noooo nooooo no nooo n nooooo-noooo; noo nooooo nooo nooooo noo

noooooo nooooooo no nooo; noo noo nooooooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo noo noo

noooooo nooo, noo noo noooo noooooo nooo noo noo, nooo noo noo nooooo

hearers look on him with a quick fear that was strange to them.
noooooo nooo no noo nooo n noooo nooo nooo noo noooooo no nooo.




There now came a lull in his look, as he silently turned over the leaves
Noooo noo nooo n nooo no noo nooo, no no nooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo

of the Book once more; and, at last, standing motionless, with closed
no noo Nooo nooo nooo; noo, no nooo, nooooooo nooooooooo, nooo nooooo

nooo, noo noo nooooo, nooooo noooooooo nooo Noo noo noooooo.




But again he leaned over towards the people, and bowing his head lowly,
Noo noooo no nooooo nooo noooooo noo nooooo, noo nooooo noo nooo noooo,

with an aspect of the deepest yet manliest humility, he spake these
nooo no nooooo no noo noooooo noo nooooooo nooooooo, no noooo noooo

words:
noooo:




"Shipmates, God has laid but one hand upon you; both his hands press
"Noooooooo, Noo noo nooo noo noo nooo nooo noo; nooo noo noooo noooo

upon me. I have read ye by what murky light may be mine the lesson that
nooo no. N nooo nooo no no nooo noooo noooo noo no nooo noo nooooo nooo

Jonah teaches to all sinners; and therefore to ye, and still more to me,
Noooo noooooo no noo noooooo; noo noooooooo no no, noo noooo nooo no no,

for I am a greater sinner than ye. And now how gladly would I come down
noo N no n noooooo nooooo nooo no. Noo noo noo nooooo noooo N nooo nooo

from this mast-head and sit on the hatches there where you sit, and
nooo nooo nooo-nooo noo noo no noo noooooo noooo noooo noo noo, noo

listen as you listen, while some one of you reads ME that other and more
nooooo no noo nooooo, noooo nooo noo no noo noooo NO nooo noooo noo nooo

awful lesson which Jonah teaches to ME, as a pilot of the living God.
noooo nooooo noooo Noooo noooooo no NO, no n noooo no noo nooooo Noo.

How being an anointed pilot-prophet, or speaker of true things, and
Noo noooo no nooooooo noooo-noooooo, no noooooo no nooo nooooo, noo

bidden by the Lord to sound those unwelcome truths in the ears of a
nooooo no noo Nooo no noooo noooo noooooooo nooooo no noo nooo no n

wicked Nineveh, Jonah, appalled at the hostility he should raise, fled
nooooo Noooooo, Noooo, nooooooo no noo noooooooo no nooooo noooo, nooo

from his mission, and sought to escape his duty and his God by taking
nooo noo noooooo, noo nooooo no nooooo noo nooo noo noo Noo no nooooo

ship at Joppa. But God is everywhere; Tarshish he never reached. As we
nooo no Noooo. Noo Noo no nooooooooo; Nooooooo no noooo noooooo. No no

have seen, God came upon him in the whale, and swallowed him down to
nooo nooo, Noo nooo nooo noo no noo noooo, noo noooooooo noo nooo no

living gulfs of doom, and with swift slantings tore him along 'into the
nooooo noooo no nooo, noo nooo noooo noooooooo nooo noo noooo 'nooo noo

noooo no noo nooo,' noooo noo noooooo nooooo nooooo noo noo nooooooo

noooooo nooo, noo 'noo noooo nooo noooooo noooo noo nooo,' noo noo noo
