nooooo noooo no noo nooooo nooo noo. Noo nooo nooo nooooo noo noooo no

any plummet--'out of the belly of hell'--when the whale grounded upon
noo noooooo--'noo no noo noooo no nooo'--nooo noo noooo nooooooo nooo

the ocean's utmost bones, even then, God heard the engulphed, repenting
noo noooo'n nooooo noooo, nooo nooo, Noo noooo noo noooooooo, noooooooo

prophet when he cried. Then God spake unto the fish; and from the
noooooo nooo no noooo. Nooo Noo noooo nooo noo nooo; noo nooo noo

shuddering cold and blackness of the sea, the whale came breeching
nooooooooo nooo noo noooooooo no noo noo, noo noooo nooo noooooooo

up towards the warm and pleasant sun, and all the delights of air and
no noooooo noo nooo noo nooooooo noo, noo noo noo nooooooo no noo noo

earth; and 'vomited out Jonah upon the dry land;' when the word of the
noooo; noo 'noooooo noo Noooo nooo noo noo nooo;' nooo noo nooo no noo

Lord came a second time; and Jonah, bruised and beaten--his ears, like
Nooo nooo n nooooo nooo; noo Noooo, noooooo noo nooooo--noo nooo, nooo

two sea-shells, still multitudinously murmuring of the ocean--Jonah
noo noo-nooooo, noooo noooooooooooooo noooooooo no noo noooo--Noooo

did the Almighty's bidding. And what was that, shipmates? To preach the
noo noo Nooooooo'n noooooo. Noo nooo noo nooo, noooooooo? No nooooo noo

Truth to the face of Falsehood! That was it!
Noooo no noo nooo no Noooooooo! Nooo noo no!




"This, shipmates, this is that other lesson; and woe to that pilot of
"Nooo, noooooooo, nooo no nooo noooo nooooo; noo noo no nooo noooo no

the living God who slights it. Woe to him whom this world charms from
noo nooooo Noo noo noooooo no. Noo no noo nooo nooo noooo nooooo nooo

Gospel duty! Woe to him who seeks to pour oil upon the waters when God
Nooooo nooo! Noo no noo noo noooo no nooo noo nooo noo nooooo nooo Noo

has brewed them into a gale! Woe to him who seeks to please rather than
noo nooooo nooo nooo n nooo! Noo no noo noo noooo no nooooo nooooo nooo

to appal! Woe to him whose good name is more to him than goodness! Woe
no noooo! Noo no noo noooo nooo nooo no nooo no noo nooo nooooooo! Noo

to him who, in this world, courts not dishonour! Woe to him who would
no noo noo, no nooo noooo, nooooo noo noooooooo! Noo no noo noo noooo

not be true, even though to be false were salvation! Yea, woe to him
noo no nooo, nooo nooooo no no noooo nooo noooooooo! Noo, noo no noo

who, as the great Pilot Paul has it, while preaching to others is
noo, no noo noooo Noooo Nooo noo no, noooo noooooooo no nooooo no

himself a castaway!"
noooooo n nooooooo!"




He dropped and fell away from himself for a moment; then lifting his
No noooooo noo nooo nooo nooo noooooo noo n nooooo; nooo noooooo noo

face to them again, showed a deep joy in his eyes, as he cried out with
nooo no nooo noooo, nooooo n nooo noo no noo nooo, no no noooo noo nooo

a heavenly enthusiasm,--"But oh! shipmates! on the starboard hand of
n nooooooo nooooooooo,--"Noo no! noooooooo! no noo noooooooo nooo no

every woe, there is a sure delight; and higher the top of that delight,
noooo noo, noooo no n nooo noooooo; noo nooooo noo noo no nooo noooooo,

than the bottom of the woe is deep. Is not the main-truck higher than
nooo noo nooooo no noo noo no nooo. No noo noo nooo-noooo nooooo nooo

the kelson is low? Delight is to him--a far, far upward, and inward
noo nooooo no noo? Noooooo no no noo--n noo, noo nooooo, noo nooooo

delight--who against the proud gods and commodores of this earth, ever
noooooo--noo noooooo noo noooo nooo noo nooooooooo no nooo noooo, nooo

stands forth his own inexorable self. Delight is to him whose strong
nooooo noooo noo noo nooooooooo nooo. Noooooo no no noo noooo nooooo

arms yet support him, when the ship of this base treacherous world has
nooo noo noooooo noo, nooo noo nooo no nooo nooo noooooooooo noooo noo

gone down beneath him. Delight is to him, who gives no quarter in the
nooo nooo noooooo noo. Noooooo no no noo, noo noooo no noooooo no noo

truth, and kills, burns, and destroys all sin though he pluck it out
noooo, noo noooo, noooo, noo nooooooo noo noo nooooo no noooo no noo

from under the robes of Senators and Judges. Delight,--top-gallant
nooo noooo noo noooo no Nooooooo noo Nooooo. Noooooo,--noo-noooooo

delight is to him, who acknowledges no law or lord, but the Lord his
noooooo no no noo, noo nooooooooooo no noo no nooo, noo noo Nooo noo

God, and is only a patriot to heaven. Delight is to him, whom all the
Noo, noo no nooo n noooooo no nooooo. Noooooo no no noo, nooo noo noo

waves of the billows of the seas of the boisterous mob can never shake
noooo no noo noooooo no noo nooo no noo nooooooooo noo noo noooo noooo

from this sure Keel of the Ages. And eternal delight and deliciousness
nooo nooo nooo Nooo no noo Nooo. Noo noooooo noooooo noo noooooooooooo

will be his, who coming to lay him down, can say with his final
nooo no noo, noo nooooo no noo noo nooo, noo noo nooo noo noooo

breath--O Father!--chiefly known to me by Thy rod--mortal or immortal,
nooooo--N Nooooo!--noooooo noooo no no no Noo noo--nooooo no nooooooo,

here I die. I have striven to be Thine, more than to be this world's, or
nooo N noo. N nooo noooooo no no Noooo, nooo nooo no no nooo noooo'n, no

mine own. Yet this is nothing: I leave eternity to Thee; for what is man
nooo noo. Noo nooo no noooooo: N noooo nooooooo no Nooo; noo nooo no noo

that he should live out the lifetime of his God?"
nooo no nooooo nooo noo noo nooooooo no noo Noo?"




He said no more, but slowly waving a benediction, covered his face with
No nooo no nooo, noo nooooo nooooo n noooooooooo, noooooo noo nooo nooo

his hands, and so remained kneeling, till all the people had departed,
noo noooo, noo no nooooooo nooooooo, nooo noo noo nooooo noo nooooooo,

and he was left alone in the place.
noo no noo nooo noooo no noo noooo.










CHAPTER 10. A Bosom Friend.
NOOOOOO no. N Noooo Nooooo.







Returning to the Spouter-Inn from the Chapel, I found Queequeg there
Noooooooo no noo Noooooo-Noo nooo noo Nooooo, N noooo Nooooooo noooo

quite alone; he having left the Chapel before the benediction some time.
noooo noooo; no nooooo nooo noo Nooooo nooooo noo noooooooooo nooo nooo.

He was sitting on a bench before the fire, with his feet on the stove
No noo noooooo no n noooo nooooo noo nooo, nooo noo nooo no noo noooo

hearth, and in one hand was holding close up to his face that little
nooooo, noo no noo nooo noo noooooo noooo no no noo nooo nooo nooooo

negro idol of his; peering hard into its face, and with a jack-knife
noooo nooo no noo; noooooo nooo nooo noo nooo, noo nooo n nooo-noooo

gently whittling away at its nose, meanwhile humming to himself in his
nooooo noooooooo nooo no noo nooo, noooooooo noooooo no noooooo no noo

heathenish way.
nooooooooo noo.




But being now interrupted, he put up the image; and pretty soon, going
Noo noooo noo noooooooooo, no noo no noo noooo; noo nooooo nooo, noooo

to the table, took up a large book there, and placing it on his lap
no noo noooo, nooo no n noooo nooo noooo, noo noooooo no no noo noo

began counting the pages with deliberate regularity; at every fiftieth
noooo nooooooo noo noooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooooo; no noooo nooooooo

page--as I fancied--stopping a moment, looking vacantly around him, and
nooo--no N noooooo--nooooooo n nooooo, noooooo nooooooo nooooo noo, noo

giving utterance to a long-drawn gurgling whistle of astonishment. He
nooooo noooooooo no n nooo-noooo nooooooo noooooo no nooooooooooo. No

would then begin again at the next fifty; seeming to commence at number
noooo nooo noooo noooo no noo nooo noooo; noooooo no nooooooo no nooooo

one each time, as though he could not count more than fifty, and it was
noo nooo nooo, no nooooo no noooo noo noooo nooo nooo noooo, noo no noo

only by such a large number of fifties being found together, that his
nooo no nooo n noooo nooooo no noooooo noooo noooo nooooooo, nooo noo

astonishment at the multitude of pages was excited.
nooooooooooo no noo noooooooo no noooo noo noooooo.




With much interest I sat watching him. Savage though he was, and
Nooo nooo nooooooo N noo nooooooo noo. Nooooo nooooo no noo, noo

hideously marred about the face--at least to my taste--his countenance
noooooooo nooooo noooo noo nooo--no noooo no no noooo--noo noooooooooo

yet had a something in it which was by no means disagreeable. You cannot
noo noo n noooooooo no no noooo noo no no noooo nooooooooooo. Noo nooooo

hide the soul. Through all his unearthly tattooings, I thought I saw
nooo noo nooo. Noooooo noo noo noooooooo nooooooooo, N noooooo N noo

the traces of a simple honest heart; and in his large, deep eyes,
noo nooooo no n nooooo nooooo noooo; noo no noo noooo, nooo nooo,

fiery black and bold, there seemed tokens of a spirit that would dare a
noooo noooo noo nooo, noooo nooooo nooooo no n nooooo nooo noooo nooo n

thousand devils. And besides all this, there was a certain lofty bearing
nooooooo nooooo. Noo noooooo noo nooo, noooo noo n noooooo noooo noooooo

about the Pagan, which even his uncouthness could not altogether maim.
noooo noo Noooo, noooo nooo noo noooooooooo noooo noo nooooooooo nooo.

He looked like a man who had never cringed and never had had a creditor.
No nooooo nooo n noo noo noo noooo noooooo noo noooo noo noo n nooooooo.

Whether it was, too, that his head being shaved, his forehead was drawn
Noooooo no noo, noo, nooo noo nooo noooo nooooo, noo nooooooo noo noooo

out in freer and brighter relief, and looked more expansive than it
noo no noooo noo nooooooo nooooo, noo nooooo nooo noooooooo nooo no

otherwise would, this I will not venture to decide; but certain it was
noooooooo noooo, nooo N nooo noo noooooo no nooooo; noo noooooo no noo

his head was phrenologically an excellent one. It may seem ridiculous,
noo nooo noo noooooooooooooo no noooooooo noo. No noo nooo nooooooooo,

but it reminded me of General Washington's head, as seen in the popular
noo no nooooooo no no Noooooo Nooooooooo'n nooo, no nooo no noo noooooo

busts of him. It had the same long regularly graded retreating slope
noooo no noo. No noo noo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooo nooooooooo noooo

from above the brows, which were likewise very projecting, like two
nooo noooo noo noooo, noooo nooo nooooooo nooo nooooooooo, nooo noo

long promontories thickly wooded on top. Queequeg was George Washington
nooo nooooooooooo noooooo nooooo no noo. Nooooooo noo Nooooo Nooooooooo

cannibalistically developed.
noooooooooooooooo noooooooo.




Whilst I was thus closely scanning him, half-pretending meanwhile to be
Nooooo N noo nooo noooooo nooooooo noo, nooo-nooooooooo noooooooo no no

looking out at the storm from the casement, he never heeded my presence,
noooooo noo no noo noooo nooo noo nooooooo, no noooo nooooo no nooooooo,

never troubled himself with so much as a single glance; but appeared
noooo nooooooo noooooo nooo no nooo no n nooooo nooooo; noo nooooooo

wholly occupied with counting the pages of the marvellous book.
nooooo nooooooo nooo nooooooo noo noooo no noo nooooooooo nooo.

Considering how sociably we had been sleeping together the night
Noooooooooo noo nooooooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooooooo noo noooo

previous, and especially considering the affectionate arm I had found
nooooooo, noo nooooooooo noooooooooo noo nooooooooooo noo N noo noooo

thrown over me upon waking in the morning, I thought this indifference
nooooo nooo no nooo nooooo no noo noooooo, N noooooo nooo nooooooooooo

of his very strange. But savages are strange beings; at times you do not
no noo nooo noooooo. Noo noooooo noo noooooo nooooo; no noooo noo no noo

know exactly how to take them. At first they are overawing; their calm
nooo noooooo noo no nooo nooo. No noooo nooo noo noooooooo; noooo nooo

self-collectedness of simplicity seems a Socratic wisdom. I had noticed
nooo-noooooooooooo no nooooooooo noooo n Nooooooo nooooo. N noo noooooo

also that Queequeg never consorted at all, or but very little, with the
nooo nooo Nooooooo noooo noooooooo no noo, no noo nooo nooooo, nooo noo

other seamen in the inn. He made no advances whatever; appeared to have
noooo nooooo no noo noo. No nooo no nooooooo nooooooo; nooooooo no nooo

no desire to enlarge the circle of his acquaintances. All this struck
no nooooo no noooooo noo nooooo no noo noooooooooooo. Noo nooo nooooo

me as mighty singular; yet, upon second thoughts, there was something
no no nooooo nooooooo; noo, nooo nooooo nooooooo, noooo noo noooooooo

almost sublime in it. Here was a man some twenty thousand miles from
nooooo noooooo no no. Nooo noo n noo nooo nooooo nooooooo noooo nooo

home, by the way of Cape Horn, that is--which was the only way he could
nooo, no noo noo no Nooo Nooo, nooo no--noooo noo noo nooo noo no noooo

get there--thrown among people as strange to him as though he were in
noo noooo--nooooo noooo nooooo no noooooo no noo no nooooo no nooo no

the planet Jupiter; and yet he seemed entirely at his ease; preserving
noo nooooo Noooooo; noo noo no nooooo nooooooo no noo nooo; nooooooooo

the utmost serenity; content with his own companionship; always equal to
noo nooooo nooooooo; noooooo nooo noo noo noooooooooooo; nooooo noooo no

himself. Surely this was a touch of fine philosophy; though no doubt he
noooooo. Nooooo nooo noo n noooo no nooo nooooooooo; nooooo no noooo no

had never heard there was such a thing as that. But, perhaps, to be
noo noooo noooo noooo noo nooo n noooo no nooo. Noo, noooooo, no no

true philosophers, we mortals should not be conscious of so living or
nooo nooooooooooo, no noooooo nooooo noo no noooooooo no no nooooo no

so striving. So soon as I hear that such or such a man gives himself
no nooooooo. No nooo no N nooo nooo nooo no nooo n noo noooo noooooo

out for a philosopher, I conclude that, like the dyspeptic old woman, he
noo noo n noooooooooo, N nooooooo nooo, nooo noo noooooooo noo noooo, no

must have "broken his digester."
nooo nooo "nooooo noo nooooooo."




As I sat there in that now lonely room; the fire burning low, in that
No N noo noooo no nooo noo nooooo nooo; noo nooo noooooo noo, no nooo

mild stage when, after its first intensity has warmed the air, it then
nooo noooo nooo, noooo noo noooo noooooooo noo nooooo noo noo, no nooo

only glows to be looked at; the evening shades and phantoms gathering
nooo noooo no no nooooo no; noo noooooo nooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo

round the casements, and peering in upon us silent, solitary twain;
noooo noo noooooooo, noo noooooo no nooo no nooooo, nooooooo noooo;

the storm booming without in solemn swells; I began to be sensible of
noo noooo noooooo noooooo no nooooo nooooo; N noooo no no nooooooo no

strange feelings. I felt a melting in me. No more my splintered heart
noooooo nooooooo. N nooo n noooooo no no. No nooo no nooooooooo noooo

and maddened hand were turned against the wolfish world. This soothing
noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo noooo. Nooo nooooooo

savage had redeemed it. There he sat, his very indifference speaking a
nooooo noo nooooooo no. Noooo no noo, noo nooo nooooooooooo nooooooo n

nature in which there lurked no civilized hypocrisies and bland deceits.
nooooo no noooo noooo nooooo no noooooooo noooooooooo noo noooo noooooo.

Wild he was; a very sight of sights to see; yet I began to feel myself
Nooo no noo; n nooo noooo no nooooo no noo; noo N noooo no nooo nooooo

nooooooooooo noooo noooooo noo. Noo noooo nooo nooooo nooo noooo nooo

repelled most others, they were the very magnets that thus drew me. I'll
nooooooo nooo nooooo, nooo nooo noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo nooo no. N'no

try a pagan friend, thought I, since Christian kindness has proved but
noo n noooo nooooo, noooooo N, noooo Noooooooo nooooooo noo nooooo noo

hollow courtesy. I drew my bench near him, and made some friendly signs
nooooo nooooooo. N nooo no noooo nooo noo, noo nooo nooo nooooooo noooo

and hints, doing my best to talk with him meanwhile. At first he little
noo noooo, noooo no nooo no nooo nooo noo noooooooo. No noooo no nooooo

noticed these advances; but presently, upon my referring to his last
noooooo noooo nooooooo; noo noooooooo, nooo no noooooooo no noo nooo

night's hospitalities, he made out to ask me whether we were again to be
noooo'n noooooooooooo, no nooo noo no noo no noooooo no nooo noooo no no

bedfellows. I told him yes; whereat I thought he looked pleased, perhaps
nooooooooo. N nooo noo noo; noooooo N noooooo no nooooo noooooo, noooooo

a little complimented.
n nooooo nooooooooooo.




We then turned over the book together, and I endeavored to explain to
No nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo, noo N nooooooooo no noooooo no

him the purpose of the printing, and the meaning of the few pictures
noo noo noooooo no noo nooooooo, noo noo noooooo no noo noo nooooooo

that were in it. Thus I soon engaged his interest; and from that we went
nooo nooo no no. Nooo N nooo noooooo noo nooooooo; noo nooo nooo no nooo

to jabbering the best we could about the various outer sights to be seen
no noooooooo noo nooo no noooo noooo noo noooooo noooo nooooo no no nooo

in this famous town. Soon I proposed a social smoke; and, producing
no nooo nooooo nooo. Nooo N nooooooo n nooooo noooo; noo, noooooooo

his pouch and tomahawk, he quietly offered me a puff. And then we sat
noo noooo noo nooooooo, no noooooo noooooo no n nooo. Noo nooo no noo

exchanging puffs from that wild pipe of his, and keeping it regularly
nooooooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo nooo no noo, noo noooooo no noooooooo

passing between us.
noooooo noooooo no.




If there yet lurked any ice of indifference towards me in the Pagan's
No noooo noo nooooo noo noo no nooooooooooo noooooo no no noo Noooo'n

breast, this pleasant, genial smoke we had, soon thawed it out, and left
nooooo, nooo nooooooo, nooooo noooo no noo, nooo nooooo no noo, noo nooo

us cronies. He seemed to take to me quite as naturally and unbiddenly as
no noooooo. No nooooo no nooo no no noooo no noooooooo noo nooooooooo no

I to him; and when our smoke was over, he pressed his forehead against
N no noo; noo nooo noo noooo noo nooo, no noooooo noo nooooooo noooooo

mine, clasped me round the waist, and said that henceforth we were
nooo, noooooo no noooo noo noooo, noo nooo nooo nooooooooo no nooo

noooooo; noooooo, no noo noooooo'n nooooo, nooo no nooo noooo noooooo;

he would gladly die for me, if need should be. In a countryman, this
no noooo nooooo noo noo no, no nooo nooooo no. No n nooooooooo, nooo

nooooo noooo no nooooooooo noooo nooo nooooo noo noo noooooooo, n noooo

to be much distrusted; but in this simple savage those old rules would
no no nooo nooooooooo; noo no nooo nooooo nooooo noooo noo noooo noooo

not apply.
noo noooo.




After supper, and another social chat and smoke, we went to our room
Noooo nooooo, noo noooooo nooooo nooo noo noooo, no nooo no noo nooo

together. He made me a present of his embalmed head; took out his
nooooooo. No nooo no n noooooo no noo nooooooo nooo; nooo noo noo

enormous tobacco wallet, and groping under the tobacco, drew out
nooooooo noooooo nooooo, noo noooooo noooo noo noooooo, nooo noo

nooo nooooo noooooo no nooooo; nooo noooooooo nooo no noo noooo, noo

nooooooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo noo noooo nooooooo, nooooo noo no nooo

towards me, and said it was mine. I was going to remonstrate; but he
noooooo no, noo nooo no noo nooo. N noo noooo no noooooooooo; noo no

nooooooo no no noooooo nooo nooo no nooooooo' noooooo. N noo nooo nooo.

He then went about his evening prayers, took out his idol, and removed
No nooo nooo noooo noo noooooo noooooo, nooo noo noo nooo, noo noooooo

the paper fireboard. By certain signs and symptoms, I thought he seemed
noo noooo noooooooo. No noooooo noooo noo nooooooo, N noooooo no nooooo

anxious for me to join him; but well knowing what was to follow, I
noooooo noo no no nooo noo; noo nooo noooooo nooo noo no nooooo, N

noooooooooo n nooooo noooooo, no nooo no noooooo no, N noooo nooooo no

otherwise.
noooooooo.




I was a good Christian; born and bred in the bosom of the infallible
N noo n nooo Noooooooo; nooo noo nooo no noo noooo no noo nooooooooo

Presbyterian Church. How then could I unite with this wild idolator in
Nooooooooooo Nooooo. Noo nooo noooo N noooo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo no

worshipping his piece of wood? But what is worship? thought I. Do
noooooooooo noo noooo no nooo? Noo nooo no noooooo? noooooo N. No

you suppose now, Ishmael, that the magnanimous God of heaven and
noo noooooo noo, Noooooo, nooo noo noooooooooo Noo no nooooo noo

earth--pagans and all included--can possibly be jealous of an
noooo--nooooo noo noo nooooooo--noo nooooooo no noooooo no no

insignificant bit of black wood? Impossible! But what is worship?--to do
noooooooooooo noo no noooo nooo? Nooooooooo! Noo nooo no noooooo?--no no

the will of God--THAT is worship. And what is the will of God?--to do to
noo nooo no Noo--NOOO no noooooo. Noo nooo no noo nooo no Noo?--no no no

my fellow man what I would have my fellow man to do to me--THAT is the
no nooooo noo nooo N noooo nooo no nooooo noo no no no no--NOOO no noo

will of God. Now, Queequeg is my fellow man. And what do I wish that
nooo no Noo. Noo, Nooooooo no no nooooo noo. Noo nooo no N nooo nooo

this Queequeg would do to me? Why, unite with me in my particular
nooo Nooooooo noooo no no no? Noo, noooo nooo no no no nooooooooo

Presbyterian form of worship. Consequently, I must then unite with him
Nooooooooooo nooo no noooooo. Nooooooooooo, N nooo nooo noooo nooo noo

in his; ergo, I must turn idolator. So I kindled the shavings; helped
no noo; nooo, N nooo nooo nooooooo. No N noooooo noo nooooooo; nooooo

prop up the innocent little idol; offered him burnt biscuit with
nooo no noo nooooooo nooooo nooo; noooooo noo noooo noooooo nooo

Queequeg; salamed before him twice or thrice; kissed his nose; and that
Nooooooo; noooooo nooooo noo noooo no nooooo; nooooo noo nooo; noo nooo

done, we undressed and went to bed, at peace with our own consciences
nooo, no noooooooo noo nooo no noo, no noooo nooo noo noo noooooooooo

and all the world. But we did not go to sleep without some little chat.
noo noo noo noooo. Noo no noo noo no no noooo noooooo nooo nooooo nooo.




How it is I know not; but there is no place like a bed for confidential
Noo no no N nooo noo; noo noooo no no noooo nooo n noo noo nooooooooooo

disclosures between friends. Man and wife, they say, there open the very
noooooooooo noooooo noooooo. Noo noo nooo, nooo noo, noooo nooo noo nooo

bottom of their souls to each other; and some old couples often lie
nooooo no noooo noooo no nooo noooo; noo nooo noo noooooo noooo noo

and chat over old times till nearly morning. Thus, then, in our hearts'
noo nooo nooo noo noooo nooo nooooo noooooo. Nooo, nooo, no noo nooooo'

honeymoon, lay I and Queequeg--a cosy, loving pair.
noooooooo, noo N noo Nooooooo--n nooo, nooooo nooo.










CHAPTER 11. Nightgown.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooooo.







We had lain thus in bed, chatting and napping at short intervals, and
No noo nooo nooo no noo, nooooooo noo noooooo no noooo noooooooo, noo

Queequeg now and then affectionately throwing his brown tattooed legs
Nooooooo noo noo nooo nooooooooooooo nooooooo noo noooo nooooooo nooo

over mine, and then drawing them back; so entirely sociable and free
nooo nooo, noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo; no nooooooo nooooooo noo nooo

and easy were we; when, at last, by reason of our confabulations, what
noo nooo nooo no; nooo, no nooo, no nooooo no noo nooooooooooooo, nooo

little nappishness remained in us altogether departed, and we felt like
nooooo noooooooooo nooooooo no no nooooooooo nooooooo, noo no nooo nooo

getting up again, though day-break was yet some way down the future.
noooooo no noooo, nooooo noo-noooo noo noo nooo noo nooo noo nooooo.




Yes, we became very wakeful; so much so that our recumbent position
Noo, no nooooo nooo noooooo; no nooo no nooo noo noooooooo nooooooo

began to grow wearisome, and by little and little we found ourselves
noooo no nooo noooooooo, noo no nooooo noo nooooo no noooo noooooooo

sitting up; the clothes well tucked around us, leaning against the
noooooo no; noo noooooo nooo nooooo nooooo no, noooooo noooooo noo

head-board with our four knees drawn up close together, and our two
nooo-noooo nooo noo nooo noooo noooo no noooo nooooooo, noo noo noo

noses bending over them, as if our kneepans were warming-pans. We felt
noooo noooooo nooo nooo, no no noo nooooooo nooo noooooo-nooo. No nooo

very nice and snug, the more so since it was so chilly out of doors;
nooo nooo noo nooo, noo nooo no noooo no noo no nooooo noo no noooo;

indeed out of bed-clothes too, seeing that there was no fire in the
nooooo noo no noo-noooooo noo, nooooo nooo noooo noo no nooo no noo

room. The more so, I say, because truly to enjoy bodily warmth, some
nooo. Noo nooo no, N noo, noooooo noooo no noooo nooooo nooooo, nooo

small part of you must be cold, for there is no quality in this world
noooo nooo no noo nooo no nooo, noo noooo no no noooooo no nooo noooo

that is not what it is merely by contrast. Nothing exists in itself. If
nooo no noo nooo no no nooooo no nooooooo. Noooooo nooooo no nooooo. No

you flatter yourself that you are all over comfortable, and have been so
noo noooooo nooooooo nooo noo noo noo nooo noooooooooo, noo nooo nooo no

a long time, then you cannot be said to be comfortable any more. But if,
n nooo nooo, nooo noo nooooo no nooo no no noooooooooo noo nooo. Noo no,

like Queequeg and me in the bed, the tip of your nose or the crown
nooo Nooooooo noo no no noo noo, noo noo no nooo nooo no noo noooo

of your head be slightly chilled, why then, indeed, in the general
no nooo nooo no nooooooo noooooo, noo nooo, nooooo, no noo noooooo

consciousness you feel most delightfully and unmistakably warm. For this
noooooooooooo noo nooo nooo nooooooooooo noo nooooooooooo nooo. Noo nooo

reason a sleeping apartment should never be furnished with a fire, which
nooooo n nooooooo noooooooo nooooo noooo no noooooooo nooo n nooo, noooo

is one of the luxurious discomforts of the rich. For the height of this
no noo no noo noooooooo noooooooooo no noo nooo. Noo noo nooooo no nooo

sort of deliciousness is to have nothing but the blanket between you and
nooo no noooooooooooo no no nooo noooooo noo noo noooooo noooooo noo noo

your snugness and the cold of the outer air. Then there you lie like the
nooo nooooooo noo noo nooo no noo noooo noo. Nooo noooo noo noo nooo noo

one warm spark in the heart of an arctic crystal.
noo nooo noooo no noo noooo no no nooooo noooooo.




We had been sitting in this crouching manner for some time, when all at
No noo nooo noooooo no nooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo nooo, nooo noo no

once I thought I would open my eyes; for when between sheets, whether
nooo N noooooo N noooo nooo no nooo; noo nooo noooooo nooooo, noooooo

by day or by night, and whether asleep or awake, I have a way of always
no noo no no noooo, noo noooooo nooooo no noooo, N nooo n noo no nooooo

keeping my eyes shut, in order the more to concentrate the snugness
noooooo no nooo nooo, no noooo noo nooo no noooooooooo noo nooooooo

of being in bed. Because no man can ever feel his own identity aright
no noooo no noo. Noooooo no noo noo nooo nooo noo noo nooooooo nooooo

except his eyes be closed; as if darkness were indeed the proper element
nooooo noo nooo no nooooo; no no nooooooo nooo nooooo noo nooooo noooooo

of our essences, though light be more congenial to our clayey part. Upon
no noo nooooooo, nooooo noooo no nooo noooooooo no noo nooooo nooo. Nooo

opening my eyes then, and coming out of my own pleasant and self-created
noooooo no nooo nooo, noo nooooo noo no no noo nooooooo noo nooo-noooooo

darkness into the imposed and coarse outer gloom of the unilluminated
nooooooo nooo noo noooooo noo nooooo noooo noooo no noo noooooooooooo

twelve-o'clock-at-night, I experienced a disagreeable revulsion. Nor did
nooooo-n'noooo-no-noooo, N noooooooooo n nooooooooooo noooooooo. Noo noo

I at all object to the hint from Queequeg that perhaps it were best to
N no noo nooooo no noo nooo nooo Nooooooo nooo noooooo no nooo nooo no

strike a light, seeing that we were so wide awake; and besides he felt
nooooo n noooo, nooooo nooo no nooo no nooo noooo; noo noooooo no nooo

a strong desire to have a few quiet puffs from his Tomahawk. Be it said,
n nooooo nooooo no nooo n noo noooo noooo nooo noo Nooooooo. No no nooo,

that though I had felt such a strong repugnance to his smoking in the
nooo nooooo N noo nooo nooo n nooooo nooooooooo no noo noooooo no noo

bed the night before, yet see how elastic our stiff prejudices grow when
noo noo noooo nooooo, noo noo noo noooooo noo noooo nooooooooo nooo nooo

love once comes to bend them. For now I liked nothing better than to
nooo nooo noooo no nooo nooo. Noo noo N noooo noooooo nooooo nooo no

have Queequeg smoking by me, even in bed, because he seemed to be full
nooo Nooooooo noooooo no no, nooo no noo, noooooo no nooooo no no nooo

of such serene household joy then. I no more felt unduly concerned for
no nooo nooooo noooooooo noo nooo. N no nooo nooo nooooo noooooooo noo

the landlord's policy of insurance. I was only alive to the condensed
noo nooooooo'n nooooo no noooooooo. N noo nooo noooo no noo noooooooo

confidential comfortableness of sharing a pipe and a blanket with a real
nooooooooooo noooooooooooooo no noooooo n nooo noo n noooooo nooo n nooo

friend. With our shaggy jackets drawn about our shoulders, we now passed
nooooo. Nooo noo nooooo noooooo noooo noooo noo noooooooo, no noo nooooo

the Tomahawk from one to the other, till slowly there grew over us a
noo Nooooooo nooo noo no noo noooo, nooo nooooo noooo nooo nooo no n

blue hanging tester of smoke, illuminated by the flame of the new-lit
nooo noooooo nooooo no noooo, noooooooooo no noo noooo no noo noo-noo

lamp.
nooo.




Whether it was that this undulating tester rolled the savage away to far
Noooooo no noo nooo nooo nooooooooo nooooo nooooo noo nooooo nooo no noo

distant scenes, I know not, but he now spoke of his native island; and,
noooooo nooooo, N nooo noo, noo no noo noooo no noo nooooo nooooo; noo,

eager to hear his history, I begged him to go on and tell it. He gladly
noooo no nooo noo noooooo, N nooooo noo no no no noo nooo no. No nooooo

complied. Though at the time I but ill comprehended not a few of his
nooooooo. Nooooo no noo nooo N noo noo nooooooooooo noo n noo no noo

words, yet subsequent disclosures, when I had become more familiar with
noooo, noo nooooooooo noooooooooo, nooo N noo nooooo nooo nooooooo nooo

his broken phraseology, now enable me to present the whole story such as
noo nooooo noooooooooo, noo nooooo no no noooooo noo noooo noooo nooo no

it may prove in the mere skeleton I give.
no noo noooo no noo nooo nooooooo N nooo.










CHAPTER 12. Biographical.
NOOOOOO no. Nooooooooooo.







Queequeg was a native of Rokovoko, an island far away to the West and
Nooooooo noo n nooooo no Nooooooo, no nooooo noo nooo no noo Nooo noo

South. It is not down in any map; true places never are.
Noooo. No no noo nooo no noo noo; nooo nooooo noooo noo.




When a new-hatched savage running wild about his native woodlands in
Nooo n noo-noooooo nooooo noooooo nooo noooo noo nooooo noooooooo no

a grass clout, followed by the nibbling goats, as if he were a green
n noooo noooo, nooooooo no noo nooooooo noooo, no no no nooo n noooo

sapling; even then, in Queequeg's ambitious soul, lurked a strong desire
noooooo; nooo nooo, no Nooooooo'n noooooooo nooo, nooooo n nooooo nooooo

to see something more of Christendom than a specimen whaler or two. His
no noo noooooooo nooo no Noooooooooo nooo n nooooooo nooooo no noo. Noo

father was a High Chief, a King; his uncle a High Priest; and on the
nooooo noo n Nooo Noooo, n Nooo; noo noooo n Nooo Nooooo; noo no noo

maternal side he boasted aunts who were the wives of unconquerable
nooooooo nooo no noooooo noooo noo nooo noo noooo no noooooooooooo

warriors. There was excellent blood in his veins--royal stuff; though
nooooooo. Noooo noo noooooooo noooo no noo noooo--noooo noooo; nooooo

sadly vitiated, I fear, by the cannibal propensity he nourished in his
noooo nooooooo, N nooo, no noo nooooooo nooooooooo no noooooooo no noo

untutored youth.
noooooooo noooo.




A Sag Harbor ship visited his father's bay, and Queequeg sought a
N Noo Nooooo nooo noooooo noo nooooo'n noo, noo Nooooooo nooooo n

passage to Christian lands. But the ship, having her full complement of
noooooo no Noooooooo noooo. Noo noo nooo, nooooo noo nooo nooooooooo no

seamen, spurned his suit; and not all the King his father's influence
nooooo, noooooo noo nooo; noo noo noo noo Nooo noo nooooo'n noooooooo

could prevail. But Queequeg vowed a vow. Alone in his canoe, he paddled
noooo noooooo. Noo Nooooooo noooo n noo. Noooo no noo noooo, no noooooo

off to a distant strait, which he knew the ship must pass through when
noo no n noooooo nooooo, noooo no nooo noo nooo nooo nooo noooooo nooo

she quitted the island. On one side was a coral reef; on the other a low
noo noooooo noo nooooo. No noo nooo noo n noooo nooo; no noo noooo n noo

tongue of land, covered with mangrove thickets that grew out into the
nooooo no nooo, noooooo nooo nooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo noo nooo noo

water. Hiding his canoe, still afloat, among these thickets, with its
noooo. Nooooo noo noooo, noooo nooooo, noooo noooo nooooooo, nooo noo

prow seaward, he sat down in the stern, paddle low in hand; and when the
nooo noooooo, no noo nooo no noo noooo, nooooo noo no nooo; noo nooo noo

ship was gliding by, like a flash he darted out; gained her side; with
nooo noo noooooo no, nooo n noooo no nooooo noo; nooooo noo nooo; nooo

one backward dash of his foot capsized and sank his canoe; climbed up
noo nooooooo nooo no noo nooo nooooooo noo nooo noo noooo; noooooo no

the chains; and throwing himself at full length upon the deck, grappled
noo nooooo; noo nooooooo noooooo no nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo, nooooooo

a ring-bolt there, and swore not to let it go, though hacked in pieces.
n nooo-nooo noooo, noo noooo noo no noo no no, nooooo nooooo no nooooo.




In vain the captain threatened to throw him overboard; suspended a
No nooo noo noooooo nooooooooo no noooo noo noooooooo; noooooooo n

cutlass over his naked wrists; Queequeg was the son of a King, and
noooooo nooo noo noooo nooooo; Nooooooo noo noo noo no n Nooo, noo

Queequeg budged not. Struck by his desperate dauntlessness, and his wild
Nooooooo nooooo noo. Nooooo no noo noooooooo noooooooooooo, noo noo nooo

desire to visit Christendom, the captain at last relented, and told
nooooo no noooo Noooooooooo, noo noooooo no nooo nooooooo, noo nooo

him he might make himself at home. But this fine young savage--this sea
noo no noooo nooo noooooo no nooo. Noo nooo nooo noooo nooooo--nooo noo

Prince of Wales, never saw the Captain's cabin. They put him down among
Nooooo no Noooo, noooo noo noo Noooooo'n noooo. Nooo noo noo nooo noooo

the sailors, and made a whaleman of him. But like Czar Peter content to
noo noooooo, noo nooo n nooooooo no noo. Noo nooo Nooo Noooo noooooo no

toil in the shipyards of foreign cities, Queequeg disdained no seeming
nooo no noo noooooooo no noooooo nooooo, Nooooooo noooooooo no noooooo

ignominy, if thereby he might happily gain the power of enlightening his
nooooooo, no noooooo no noooo noooooo nooo noo noooo no nooooooooooo noo

untutored countrymen. For at bottom--so he told me--he was actuated by a
noooooooo nooooooooo. Noo no nooooo--no no nooo no--no noo nooooooo no n

profound desire to learn among the Christians, the arts whereby to
nooooooo nooooo no noooo noooo noo Nooooooooo, noo nooo noooooo no

make his people still happier than they were; and more than that,
nooo noo nooooo noooo noooooo nooo nooo nooo; noo nooo nooo nooo,

still better than they were. But, alas! the practices of whalemen soon
noooo nooooo nooo nooo nooo. Noo, nooo! noo noooooooo no nooooooo nooo

convinced him that even Christians could be both miserable and wicked;
noooooooo noo nooo nooo Nooooooooo noooo no nooo noooooooo noo nooooo;

infinitely more so, than all his father's heathens. Arrived at last in
nooooooooo nooo no, nooo noo noo nooooo'n nooooooo. Noooooo no nooo no

old Sag Harbor; and seeing what the sailors did there; and then going on
noo Noo Nooooo; noo nooooo nooo noo noooooo noo noooo; noo nooo noooo no

to Nantucket, and seeing how they spent their wages in that place also,
no Noooooooo, noo nooooo noo nooo noooo noooo noooo no nooo noooo nooo,

poor Queequeg gave it up for lost. Thought he, it's a wicked world in
nooo Nooooooo nooo no no noo nooo. Noooooo no, no'n n nooooo noooo no

all meridians; I'll die a pagan.
noo noooooooo; N'no noo n noooo.




And thus an old idolator at heart, he yet lived among these Christians,
Noo nooo no noo nooooooo no noooo, no noo noooo noooo noooo Nooooooooo,

wore their clothes, and tried to talk their gibberish. Hence the queer
nooo noooo noooooo, noo noooo no nooo noooo noooooooo. Noooo noo noooo

ways about him, though now some time from home.
nooo noooo noo, nooooo noo nooo nooo nooo nooo.




By hints, I asked him whether he did not propose going back, and having
No noooo, N noooo noo noooooo no noo noo noooooo noooo nooo, noo nooooo

a coronation; since he might now consider his father dead and gone, he
n nooooooooo; noooo no noooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooo, no

being very old and feeble at the last accounts. He answered no, not yet;
noooo nooo noo noo nooooo no noo nooo nooooooo. No nooooooo no, noo noo;

and added that he was fearful Christianity, or rather Christians, had
noo noooo nooo no noo noooooo Nooooooooooo, no nooooo Nooooooooo, noo

unfitted him for ascending the pure and undefiled throne of thirty pagan
nooooooo noo noo noooooooo noo nooo noo noooooooo nooooo no nooooo noooo

Kings before him. But by and by, he said, he would return,--as soon as
Noooo nooooo noo. Noo no noo no, no nooo, no noooo nooooo,--no nooo no

he felt himself baptized again. For the nonce, however, he proposed to
no nooo noooooo nooooooo noooo. Noo noo noooo, noooooo, no nooooooo no

sail about, and sow his wild oats in all four oceans. They had made a
nooo noooo, noo noo noo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooooo. Nooo noo nooo n

harpooneer of him, and that barbed iron was in lieu of a sceptre now.
nooooooooo no noo, noo nooo nooooo nooo noo no nooo no n noooooo noo.




I asked him what might be his immediate purpose, touching his future
N noooo noo nooo noooo no noo noooooooo noooooo, nooooooo noo nooooo

movements. He answered, to go to sea again, in his old vocation. Upon
noooooooo. No nooooooo, no no no noo noooo, no noo noo nooooooo. Nooo

this, I told him that whaling was my own design, and informed him of my
nooo, N nooo noo nooo noooooo noo no noo nooooo, noo nooooooo noo no no

intention to sail out of Nantucket, as being the most promising port for
noooooooo no nooo noo no Noooooooo, no noooo noo nooo noooooooo nooo noo

an adventurous whaleman to embark from. He at once resolved to accompany
no noooooooooo nooooooo no nooooo nooo. No no nooo nooooooo no noooooooo

me to that island, ship aboard the same vessel, get into the same watch,
no no nooo nooooo, nooo nooooo noo nooo nooooo, noo nooo noo nooo noooo,

the same boat, the same mess with me, in short to share my every hap;
noo nooo nooo, noo nooo nooo nooo no, no noooo no noooo no noooo noo;

with both my hands in his, boldly dip into the Potluck of both worlds.
nooo nooo no noooo no noo, nooooo noo nooo noo Noooooo no nooo nooooo.

To all this I joyously assented; for besides the affection I now felt
No noo nooo N nooooooo nooooooo; noo noooooo noo noooooooo N noo nooo

for Queequeg, he was an experienced harpooneer, and as such, could not
noo Nooooooo, no noo no noooooooooo nooooooooo, noo no nooo, noooo noo

fail to be of great usefulness to one, who, like me, was wholly ignorant
nooo no no no noooo nooooooooo no noo, noo, nooo no, noo nooooo nooooooo

of the mysteries of whaling, though well acquainted with the sea, as
no noo noooooooo no noooooo, nooooo nooo nooooooooo nooo noo noo, no

known to merchant seamen.
noooo no nooooooo nooooo.




His story being ended with his pipe's last dying puff, Queequeg embraced
Noo noooo noooo noooo nooo noo nooo'n nooo noooo nooo, Nooooooo nooooooo

me, pressed his forehead against mine, and blowing out the light, we
no, noooooo noo nooooooo noooooo nooo, noo noooooo noo noo noooo, no

rolled over from each other, this way and that, and very soon were
nooooo nooo nooo nooo noooo, nooo noo noo nooo, noo nooo nooo nooo

sleeping.
nooooooo.







CHAPTER 13. Wheelbarrow.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooooooo.







Next morning, Monday, after disposing of the embalmed head to a barber,
Nooo noooooo, Nooooo, noooo noooooooo no noo nooooooo nooo no n nooooo,

for a block, I settled my own and comrade's bill; using, however, my
noo n noooo, N noooooo no noo noo noooooo'n nooo; noooo, noooooo, no

comrade's money. The grinning landlord, as well as the boarders, seemed
noooooo'n noooo. Noo nooooooo nooooooo, no nooo no noo nooooooo, nooooo

amazingly tickled at the sudden friendship which had sprung up between
noooooooo noooooo no noo nooooo nooooooooo noooo noo nooooo no noooooo

me and Queequeg--especially as Peter Coffin's cock and bull stories
no noo Nooooooo--nooooooooo no Noooo Nooooo'n nooo noo nooo noooooo

about him had previously so much alarmed me concerning the very person
noooo noo noo nooooooooo no nooo noooooo no nooooooooo noo nooo nooooo

whom I now companied with.
nooo N noo noooooooo nooo.




We borrowed a wheelbarrow, and embarking our things, including my own
No nooooooo n noooooooooo, noo noooooooo noo nooooo, noooooooo no noo

poor carpet-bag, and Queequeg's canvas sack and hammock, away we went
nooo nooooo-noo, noo Nooooooo'n nooooo nooo noo noooooo, nooo no nooo

down to "the Moss," the little Nantucket packet schooner moored at the
nooo no "noo Nooo," noo nooooo Noooooooo nooooo nooooooo nooooo no noo

wharf. As we were going along the people stared; not at Queequeg
noooo. No no nooo noooo noooo noo nooooo nooooo; noo no Nooooooo

so much--for they were used to seeing cannibals like him in their
no nooo--noo nooo nooo nooo no nooooo noooooooo nooo noo no noooo

streets,--but at seeing him and me upon such confidential terms. But we
noooooo,--noo no nooooo noo noo no nooo nooo nooooooooooo noooo. Noo no

heeded them not, going along wheeling the barrow by turns, and Queequeg
nooooo nooo noo, noooo noooo nooooooo noo nooooo no noooo, noo Nooooooo

now and then stopping to adjust the sheath on his harpoon barbs. I asked
noo noo nooo nooooooo no nooooo noo nooooo no noo noooooo noooo. N noooo

him why he carried such a troublesome thing with him ashore, and
noo noo no noooooo nooo n noooooooooo noooo nooo noo nooooo, noo

whether all whaling ships did not find their own harpoons. To this, in
noooooo noo noooooo noooo noo noo nooo noooo noo nooooooo. No nooo, no

substance, he replied, that though what I hinted was true enough, yet
noooooooo, no noooooo, nooo nooooo nooo N nooooo noo nooo nooooo, noo

he had a particular affection for his own harpoon, because it was of
no noo n nooooooooo noooooooo noo noo noo noooooo, noooooo no noo no

assured stuff, well tried in many a mortal combat, and deeply intimate
noooooo noooo, nooo noooo no nooo n nooooo nooooo, noo nooooo nooooooo

with the hearts of whales. In short, like many inland reapers
nooo noo nooooo no nooooo. No noooo, nooo nooo nooooo noooooo

and mowers, who go into the farmers' meadows armed with their own
noo nooooo, noo no nooo noo noooooo' noooooo noooo nooo noooo noo

scythes--though in no wise obliged to furnish them--even so, Queequeg,
noooooo--nooooo no no nooo noooooo no noooooo nooo--nooo no, Nooooooo,

for his own private reasons, preferred his own harpoon.
noo noo noo noooooo noooooo, noooooooo noo noo noooooo.




Shifting the barrow from my hand to his, he told me a funny story about
Nooooooo noo nooooo nooo no nooo no noo, no nooo no n noooo noooo noooo

the first wheelbarrow he had ever seen. It was in Sag Harbor. The owners
noo noooo noooooooooo no noo nooo nooo. No noo no Noo Nooooo. Noo nooooo

of his ship, it seems, had lent him one, in which to carry his
no noo nooo, no noooo, noo nooo noo noo, no noooo no noooo noo

heavy chest to his boarding house. Not to seem ignorant about the
noooo noooo no noo nooooooo noooo. Noo no nooo nooooooo noooo noo

thing--though in truth he was entirely so, concerning the precise way in
noooo--nooooo no noooo no noo nooooooo no, nooooooooo noo noooooo noo no

which to manage the barrow--Queequeg puts his chest upon it; lashes it
noooo no nooooo noo nooooo--Nooooooo nooo noo noooo nooo no; nooooo no

fast; and then shoulders the barrow and marches up the wharf. "Why,"
nooo; noo nooo noooooooo noo nooooo noo noooooo no noo noooo. "Noo,"

said I, "Queequeg, you might have known better than that, one would
nooo N, "Nooooooo, noo noooo nooo noooo nooooo nooo nooo, noo noooo

think. Didn't the people laugh?"
noooo. Nooo'n noo nooooo noooo?"




Upon this, he told me another story. The people of his island of
Nooo nooo, no nooo no noooooo noooo. Noo nooooo no noo nooooo no

Rokovoko, it seems, at their wedding feasts express the fragrant water
Nooooooo, no noooo, no noooo noooooo nooooo noooooo noo nooooooo noooo

of young cocoanuts into a large stained calabash like a punchbowl; and
no noooo noooooooo nooo n noooo noooooo nooooooo nooo n noooooooo; noo

this punchbowl always forms the great central ornament on the braided
nooo noooooooo nooooo noooo noo noooo noooooo nooooooo no noo noooooo

mat where the feast is held. Now a certain grand merchant ship once
noo noooo noo noooo no nooo. Noo n noooooo noooo nooooooo nooo nooo

touched at Rokovoko, and its commander--from all accounts, a very
noooooo no Nooooooo, noo noo noooooooo--nooo noo nooooooo, n nooo

stately punctilious gentleman, at least for a sea captain--this
noooooo noooooooooo noooooooo, no noooo noo n noo noooooo--nooo

commander was invited to the wedding feast of Queequeg's sister, a
noooooooo noo noooooo no noo noooooo noooo no Nooooooo'n nooooo, n

pretty young princess just turned of ten. Well; when all the wedding
nooooo noooo nooooooo nooo nooooo no noo. Nooo; nooo noo noo noooooo

guests were assembled at the bride's bamboo cottage, this Captain
nooooo nooo noooooooo no noo noooo'n nooooo noooooo, nooo Noooooo

marches in, and being assigned the post of honour, placed himself over
noooooo no, noo noooo nooooooo noo nooo no nooooo, nooooo noooooo nooo

against the punchbowl, and between the High Priest and his majesty the
noooooo noo noooooooo, noo noooooo noo Nooo Nooooo noo noo noooooo noo

King, Queequeg's father. Grace being said,--for those people have their
Nooo, Nooooooo'n nooooo. Noooo noooo nooo,--noo noooo nooooo nooo noooo

grace as well as we--though Queequeg told me that unlike us, who at such
noooo no nooo no no--nooooo Nooooooo nooo no nooo nooooo no, noo no nooo

times look downwards to our platters, they, on the contrary, copying the
noooo nooo noooooooo no noo nooooooo, nooo, no noo nooooooo, noooooo noo

ducks, glance upwards to the great Giver of all feasts--Grace, I say,
noooo, nooooo noooooo no noo noooo Noooo no noo nooooo--Noooo, N noo,

being said, the High Priest opens the banquet by the immemorial ceremony
noooo nooo, noo Nooo Nooooo noooo noo noooooo no noo nooooooooo nooooooo

of the island; that is, dipping his consecrated and consecrating fingers
no noo nooooo; nooo no, noooooo noo noooooooooo noo nooooooooooo noooooo

into the bowl before the blessed beverage circulates. Seeing himself
nooo noo nooo nooooo noo noooooo nooooooo nooooooooo. Nooooo noooooo

placed next the Priest, and noting the ceremony, and thinking
nooooo nooo noo Nooooo, noo nooooo noo nooooooo, noo nooooooo

himself--being Captain of a ship--as having plain precedence over a
noooooo--noooo Noooooo no n nooo--no nooooo noooo nooooooooo nooo n

mere island King, especially in the King's own house--the Captain coolly
nooo nooooo Nooo, nooooooooo no noo Nooo'n noo noooo--noo Noooooo nooooo

proceeds to wash his hands in the punchbowl;--taking it I suppose for a
nooooooo no nooo noo noooo no noo noooooooo;--nooooo no N noooooo noo n

huge finger-glass. "Now," said Queequeg, "what you tink now?--Didn't our
nooo nooooo-noooo. "Noo," nooo Nooooooo, "nooo noo nooo noo?--Nooo'n noo

people laugh?"
nooooo noooo?"




At last, passage paid, and luggage safe, we stood on board the schooner.
No nooo, noooooo nooo, noo noooooo nooo, no noooo no noooo noo nooooooo.

Hoisting sail, it glided down the Acushnet river. On one side, New
Nooooooo nooo, no nooooo nooo noo Nooooooo noooo. No noo nooo, Noo

Bedford rose in terraces of streets, their ice-covered trees all
Noooooo nooo no nooooooo no noooooo, noooo noo-noooooo noooo noo

glittering in the clear, cold air. Huge hills and mountains of casks on
nooooooooo no noo noooo, nooo noo. Nooo noooo noo noooooooo no noooo no

casks were piled upon her wharves, and side by side the world-wandering
noooo nooo noooo nooo noo noooooo, noo nooo no nooo noo noooo-noooooooo

whale ships lay silent and safely moored at last; while from others
noooo noooo noo nooooo noo nooooo nooooo no nooo; noooo nooo nooooo

came a sound of carpenters and coopers, with blended noises of fires and
nooo n noooo no nooooooooo noo noooooo, nooo noooooo nooooo no noooo noo

forges to melt the pitch, all betokening that new cruises were on the
nooooo no nooo noo noooo, noo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooo nooo no noo

start; that one most perilous and long voyage ended, only begins a
noooo; nooo noo nooo nooooooo noo nooo nooooo noooo, nooo nooooo n

second; and a second ended, only begins a third, and so on, for ever
nooooo; noo n nooooo noooo, nooo nooooo n noooo, noo no no, noo nooo

and for aye. Such is the endlessness, yea, the intolerableness of all
noo noo noo. Nooo no noo noooooooooo, noo, noo noooooooooooooo no noo

earthly effort.
noooooo nooooo.




Gaining the more open water, the bracing breeze waxed fresh; the little
Noooooo noo nooo nooo noooo, noo noooooo nooooo noooo noooo; noo nooooo

Moss tossed the quick foam from her bows, as a young colt his snortings.
Nooo nooooo noo noooo nooo nooo noo nooo, no n noooo nooo noo noooooooo.

How I snuffed that Tartar air!--how I spurned that turnpike earth!--that
Noo N noooooo nooo Nooooo noo!--noo N noooooo nooo nooooooo noooo!--nooo

common highway all over dented with the marks of slavish heels and
nooooo noooooo noo nooo nooooo nooo noo noooo no noooooo noooo noo

hoofs; and turned me to admire the magnanimity of the sea which will
noooo; noo nooooo no no nooooo noo noooooooooo no noo noo noooo nooo

permit no records.
nooooo no noooooo.




At the same foam-fountain, Queequeg seemed to drink and reel with me.
No noo nooo nooo-nooooooo, Nooooooo nooooo no noooo noo nooo nooo no.

His dusky nostrils swelled apart; he showed his filed and pointed teeth.
Noo noooo nooooooo noooooo noooo; no nooooo noo noooo noo noooooo noooo.

On, on we flew; and our offing gained, the Moss did homage to the
No, no no nooo; noo noo nooooo nooooo, noo Nooo noo nooooo no noo

blast; ducked and dived her bows as a slave before the Sultan. Sideways
noooo; nooooo noo noooo noo nooo no n noooo nooooo noo Nooooo. Nooooooo

leaning, we sideways darted; every ropeyarn tingling like a wire; the
noooooo, no nooooooo nooooo; noooo nooooooo nooooooo nooo n nooo; noo

two tall masts buckling like Indian canes in land tornadoes. So full of
noo nooo noooo nooooooo nooo Nooooo noooo no nooo noooooooo. No nooo no

this reeling scene were we, as we stood by the plunging bowsprit, that
nooo noooooo noooo nooo no, no no noooo no noo nooooooo nooooooo, nooo

for some time we did not notice the jeering glances of the passengers, a
noo nooo nooo no noo noo nooooo noo noooooo noooooo no noo nooooooooo, n

lubber-like assembly, who marvelled that two fellow beings should be so
nooooo-nooo nooooooo, noo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo nooooo no no

companionable; as though a white man were anything more dignified than a
noooooooooooo; no nooooo n noooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo noooooooo nooo n

whitewashed negro. But there were some boobies and bumpkins there, who,
noooooooooo noooo. Noo noooo nooo nooo noooooo noo nooooooo noooo, noo,

by their intense greenness, must have come from the heart and centre of
no noooo noooooo noooooooo, nooo nooo nooo nooo noo noooo noo nooooo no

all verdure. Queequeg caught one of these young saplings mimicking him
noo noooooo. Nooooooo nooooo noo no noooo noooo nooooooo noooooooo noo

behind his back. I thought the bumpkin's hour of doom was come. Dropping
nooooo noo nooo. N noooooo noo noooooo'n nooo no nooo noo nooo. Nooooooo

his harpoon, the brawny savage caught him in his arms, and by an almost
noo noooooo, noo nooooo nooooo nooooo noo no noo nooo, noo no no nooooo

miraculous dexterity and strength, sent him high up bodily into the air;
nooooooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo, nooo noo nooo no nooooo nooo noo noo;

then slightly tapping his stern in mid-somerset, the fellow landed with
nooo nooooooo noooooo noo noooo no noo-nooooooo, noo nooooo nooooo nooo

bursting lungs upon his feet, while Queequeg, turning his back upon him,
nooooooo noooo nooo noo nooo, noooo Nooooooo, noooooo noo nooo nooo noo,

lighted his tomahawk pipe and passed it to me for a puff.
noooooo noo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo no no no noo n nooo.




"Capting! Capting!" yelled the bumpkin, running towards that officer;
"Noooooo! Noooooo!" nooooo noo noooooo, noooooo noooooo nooo noooooo;

"Capting, Capting, here's the devil."
"Noooooo, Noooooo, nooo'n noo noooo."




"Hallo, _you_ sir," cried the Captain, a gaunt rib of the sea, stalking
"Noooo, noooo noo," noooo noo Noooooo, n noooo noo no noo noo, nooooooo

up to Queequeg, "what in thunder do you mean by that? Don't you know you
no no Nooooooo, "nooo no noooooo no noo nooo no nooo? Noo'n noo nooo noo

might have killed that chap?"
noooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo?"




"What him say?" said Queequeg, as he mildly turned to me.
"Nooo noo noo?" nooo Nooooooo, no no nooooo nooooo no no.




"He say," said I, "that you came near kill-e that man there," pointing
"No noo," nooo N, "nooo noo nooo nooo nooo-n nooo noo noooo," nooooooo

to the still shivering greenhorn.
no noo noooo noooooooo noooooooo.




"Kill-e," cried Queequeg, twisting his tattooed face into an unearthly
"Nooo-n," noooo Nooooooo, nooooooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo no noooooooo

expression of disdain, "ah! him bevy small-e fish-e; Queequeg no kill-e
nooooooooo no noooooo, "no! noo nooo noooo-n nooo-n; Nooooooo no nooo-n

so small-e fish-e; Queequeg kill-e big whale!"
no noooo-n nooo-n; Nooooooo nooo-n noo noooo!"




"Look you," roared the Captain, "I'll kill-e YOU, you cannibal, if you
"Nooo noo," nooooo noo Noooooo, "N'no nooo-n NOO, noo nooooooo, no noo

try any more of your tricks aboard here; so mind your eye."
noo noo nooo no nooo nooooo nooooo nooo; no nooo nooo noo."




But it so happened just then, that it was high time for the Captain to
Noo no no nooooooo nooo nooo, nooo no noo nooo nooo noo noo Noooooo no

mind his own eye. The prodigious strain upon the main-sail had parted
nooo noo noo noo. Noo nooooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooo-nooo noo nooooo

the weather-sheet, and the tremendous boom was now flying from side to
noo noooooo-noooo, noo noo nooooooooo nooo noo noo nooooo nooo nooo no

side, completely sweeping the entire after part of the deck. The poor
nooo, nooooooooo nooooooo noo nooooo noooo nooo no noo nooo. Noo nooo

fellow whom Queequeg had handled so roughly, was swept overboard; all
nooooo nooo Nooooooo noo noooooo no noooooo, noo noooo noooooooo; noo

hands were in a panic; and to attempt snatching at the boom to stay it,
noooo nooo no n noooo; noo no noooooo noooooooo no noo nooo no nooo no,

seemed madness. It flew from right to left, and back again, almost
nooooo noooooo. No nooo nooo noooo no nooo, noo nooo noooo, nooooo

in one ticking of a watch, and every instant seemed on the point of
no noo noooooo no n noooo, noo noooo noooooo nooooo no noo noooo no

snapping into splinters. Nothing was done, and nothing seemed capable of
nooooooo nooo noooooooo. Noooooo noo nooo, noo noooooo nooooo noooooo no

being done; those on deck rushed towards the bows, and stood eyeing the
noooo nooo; noooo no nooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo, noo noooo nooooo noo

boom as if it were the lower jaw of an exasperated whale. In the
nooo no no no nooo noo noooo noo no no noooooooooo noooo. No noo

midst of this consternation, Queequeg dropped deftly to his knees, and
noooo no nooo noooooooooooo, Nooooooo noooooo nooooo no noo noooo, noo

crawling under the path of the boom, whipped hold of a rope, secured one
nooooooo noooo noo nooo no noo nooo, noooooo nooo no n nooo, noooooo noo

end to the bulwarks, and then flinging the other like a lasso, caught it
noo no noo nooooooo, noo nooo nooooooo noo noooo nooo n noooo, nooooo no

round the boom as it swept over his head, and at the next jerk, the spar
noooo noo nooo no no noooo nooo noo nooo, noo no noo nooo nooo, noo nooo

was that way trapped, and all was safe. The schooner was run into the
noo nooo noo noooooo, noo noo noo nooo. Noo nooooooo noo noo nooo noo

wind, and while the hands were clearing away the stern boat, Queequeg,
nooo, noo noooo noo noooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo nooo, Nooooooo,

stripped to the waist, darted from the side with a long living arc of
nooooooo no noo noooo, nooooo nooo noo nooo nooo n nooo nooooo noo no

a leap. For three minutes or more he was seen swimming like a dog,
n nooo. Noo noooo noooooo no nooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooo n noo,

throwing his long arms straight out before him, and by turns revealing
nooooooo noo nooo nooo nooooooo noo nooooo noo, noo no noooo noooooooo

his brawny shoulders through the freezing foam. I looked at the grand
noo nooooo noooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo nooo. N nooooo no noo noooo

and glorious fellow, but saw no one to be saved. The greenhorn had gone
noo nooooooo nooooo, noo noo no noo no no noooo. Noo noooooooo noo nooo

down. Shooting himself perpendicularly from the water, Queequeg, now
nooo. Nooooooo noooooo noooooooooooooo nooo noo noooo, Nooooooo, noo

took an instant's glance around him, and seeming to see just how matters
nooo no noooooo'n nooooo nooooo noo, noo noooooo no noo nooo noo noooooo

were, dived down and disappeared. A few minutes more, and he rose again,
nooo, noooo nooo noo noooooooooo. N noo noooooo nooo, noo no nooo noooo,

one arm still striking out, and with the other dragging a lifeless form.
noo noo noooo nooooooo noo, noo nooo noo noooo nooooooo n nooooooo nooo.

The boat soon picked them up. The poor bumpkin was restored. All hands
Noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo no. Noo nooo noooooo noo nooooooo. Noo noooo

voted Queequeg a noble trump; the captain begged his pardon. From that
noooo Nooooooo n noooo noooo; noo noooooo nooooo noo nooooo. Nooo nooo

hour I clove to Queequeg like a barnacle; yea, till poor Queequeg took
nooo N noooo no Nooooooo nooo n nooooooo; noo, nooo nooo Nooooooo nooo

his last long dive.
noo nooo nooo nooo.




Was there ever such unconsciousness? He did not seem to think that he at
Noo noooo nooo nooo noooooooooooooo? No noo noo nooo no noooo nooo no no

all deserved a medal from the Humane and Magnanimous Societies. He only
noo nooooooo n noooo nooo noo Nooooo noo Noooooooooo Noooooooo. No nooo

asked for water--fresh water--something to wipe the brine off; that
noooo noo noooo--noooo noooo--noooooooo no nooo noo noooo noo; nooo

done, he put on dry clothes, lighted his pipe, and leaning against the
nooo, no noo no noo noooooo, noooooo noo nooo, noo noooooo noooooo noo

bulwarks, and mildly eyeing those around him, seemed to be saying
nooooooo, noo nooooo nooooo noooo nooooo noo, nooooo no no nooooo

to himself--"It's a mutual, joint-stock world, in all meridians. We
no noooooo--"No'n n nooooo, noooo-noooo noooo, no noo noooooooo. No

cannibals must help these Christians."
noooooooo nooo nooo noooo Nooooooooo."










CHAPTER 14. Nantucket.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooooo.







Nothing more happened on the passage worthy the mentioning; so, after a
Noooooo nooo nooooooo no noo noooooo nooooo noo nooooooooo; no, noooo n

fine run, we safely arrived in Nantucket.
nooo noo, no nooooo noooooo no Noooooooo.




Nantucket! Take out your map and look at it. See what a real corner of
Noooooooo! Nooo noo nooo noo noo nooo no no. Noo nooo n nooo nooooo no

the world it occupies; how it stands there, away off shore, more lonely
noo noooo no nooooooo; noo no nooooo noooo, nooo noo noooo, nooo nooooo

than the Eddystone lighthouse. Look at it--a mere hillock, and elbow of
nooo noo Noooooooo nooooooooo. Nooo no no--n nooo noooooo, noo noooo no

sand; all beach, without a background. There is more sand there than
nooo; noo noooo, noooooo n nooooooooo. Noooo no nooo nooo noooo nooo

you would use in twenty years as a substitute for blotting paper. Some
noo noooo noo no nooooo noooo no n nooooooooo noo nooooooo noooo. Nooo

gamesome wights will tell you that they have to plant weeds there, they
nooooooo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo nooo nooo no noooo noooo noooo, nooo

don't grow naturally; that they import Canada thistles; that they have
noo'n nooo noooooooo; nooo nooo nooooo Nooooo nooooooo; nooo nooo nooo

to send beyond seas for a spile to stop a leak in an oil cask; that
no nooo nooooo nooo noo n noooo no nooo n nooo no no noo nooo; nooo

pieces of wood in Nantucket are carried about like bits of the true
nooooo no nooo no Noooooooo noo noooooo noooo nooo nooo no noo nooo

cross in Rome; that people there plant toadstools before their houses,
noooo no Nooo; nooo nooooo noooo noooo nooooooooo nooooo noooo nooooo,

to get under the shade in summer time; that one blade of grass makes an
no noo noooo noo noooo no nooooo nooo; nooo noo noooo no noooo noooo no

oasis, three blades in a day's walk a prairie; that they wear quicksand
noooo, noooo nooooo no n noo'n nooo n noooooo; nooo nooo nooo noooooooo

shoes, something like Laplander snow-shoes; that they are so shut up,
noooo, noooooooo nooo Noooooooo nooo-noooo; nooo nooo noo no nooo no,

belted about, every way inclosed, surrounded, and made an utter island
nooooo noooo, noooo noo nooooooo, nooooooooo, noo nooo no noooo nooooo

of by the ocean, that to their very chairs and tables small clams will
no no noo noooo, nooo no noooo nooo nooooo noo nooooo noooo noooo nooo

sometimes be found adhering, as to the backs of sea turtles. But these
noooooooo no noooo nooooooo, no no noo noooo no noo noooooo. Noo noooo

extravaganzas only show that Nantucket is no Illinois.
noooooooooooo nooo nooo nooo Noooooooo no no Nooooooo.




Look now at the wondrous traditional story of how this island was
Nooo noo no noo nooooooo noooooooooo noooo no noo nooo nooooo noo

settled by the red-men. Thus goes the legend. In olden times an eagle
noooooo no noo noo-noo. Nooo nooo noo nooooo. No noooo noooo no noooo

swooped down upon the New England coast, and carried off an infant
noooooo nooo nooo noo Noo Noooooo noooo, noo noooooo noo no nooooo

Indian in his talons. With loud lament the parents saw their child borne
Nooooo no noo nooooo. Nooo nooo nooooo noo noooooo noo noooo noooo noooo

out of sight over the wide waters. They resolved to follow in the same
noo no noooo nooo noo nooo nooooo. Nooo nooooooo no nooooo no noo nooo

direction. Setting out in their canoes, after a perilous passage they
noooooooo. Noooooo noo no noooo nooooo, noooo n nooooooo noooooo nooo

discovered the island, and there they found an empty ivory casket,--the
nooooooooo noo nooooo, noo noooo nooo noooo no noooo noooo nooooo,--noo

poor little Indian's skeleton.
nooo nooooo Nooooo'n nooooooo.




What wonder, then, that these Nantucketers, born on a beach, should take
Nooo nooooo, nooo, nooo noooo Nooooooooooo, nooo no n noooo, nooooo nooo

to the sea for a livelihood! They first caught crabs and quohogs in
no noo noo noo n nooooooooo! Nooo noooo nooooo noooo noo noooooo no

the sand; grown bolder, they waded out with nets for mackerel; more
noo nooo; noooo nooooo, nooo noooo noo nooo nooo noo nooooooo; nooo

experienced, they pushed off in boats and captured cod; and at last,
noooooooooo, nooo nooooo noo no noooo noo nooooooo noo; noo no nooo,

launching a navy of great ships on the sea, explored this watery world;
noooooooo n nooo no noooo noooo no noo noo, nooooooo nooo nooooo noooo;

put an incessant belt of circumnavigations round it; peeped in
noo no noooooooo nooo no noooooooooooooooo noooo no; nooooo no

at Behring's Straits; and in all seasons and all oceans declared
no Noooooo'n Noooooo; noo no noo noooooo noo noo nooooo nooooooo

everlasting war with the mightiest animated mass that has survived the
noooooooooo noo nooo noo noooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo noo

flood; most monstrous and most mountainous! That Himmalehan, salt-sea
noooo; nooo noooooooo noo nooo noooooooooo! Nooo Nooooooooo, nooo-noo

Mastodon, clothed with such portentousness of unconscious power, that
Nooooooo, noooooo nooo nooo nooooooooooooo no noooooooooo noooo, nooo

his very panics are more to be dreaded than his most fearless and
noo nooo nooooo noo nooo no no noooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo noo

malicious assaults!
noooooooo nooooooo!




And thus have these naked Nantucketers, these sea hermits, issuing from
Noo nooo nooo noooo noooo Nooooooooooo, noooo noo noooooo, noooooo nooo

their ant-hill in the sea, overrun and conquered the watery world like
noooo noo-nooo no noo noo, noooooo noo noooooooo noo nooooo noooo nooo

so many Alexanders; parcelling out among them the Atlantic, Pacific, and
no nooo Nooooooooo; nooooooooo noo noooo nooo noo Nooooooo, Noooooo, noo

Indian oceans, as the three pirate powers did Poland. Let America add
Nooooo nooooo, no noo noooo nooooo nooooo noo Nooooo. Noo Noooooo noo

Mexico to Texas, and pile Cuba upon Canada; let the English overswarm
Nooooo no Noooo, noo nooo Nooo nooo Nooooo; noo noo Noooooo noooooooo

all India, and hang out their blazing banner from the sun; two thirds
noo Noooo, noo nooo noo noooo noooooo nooooo nooo noo noo; noo nooooo

of this terraqueous globe are the Nantucketer's. For the sea is his; he
no nooo noooooooooo noooo noo noo Noooooooooo'n. Noo noo noo no noo; no

owns it, as Emperors own empires; other seamen having but a right of
nooo no, no Nooooooo noo noooooo; noooo nooooo nooooo noo n noooo no

way through it. Merchant ships are but extension bridges; armed ones but
noo noooooo no. Nooooooo noooo noo noo noooooooo noooooo; noooo nooo noo

floating forts; even pirates and privateers, though following the sea
nooooooo noooo; nooo noooooo noo nooooooooo, nooooo noooooooo noo noo

as highwaymen the road, they but plunder other ships, other fragments of
no nooooooooo noo nooo, nooo noo noooooo noooo noooo, noooo noooooooo no

the land like themselves, without seeking to draw their living from the
noo nooo nooo nooooooooo, noooooo noooooo no nooo noooo nooooo nooo noo

bottomless deep itself. The Nantucketer, he alone resides and riots on
nooooooooo nooo nooooo. Noo Noooooooooo, no noooo noooooo noo noooo no

the sea; he alone, in Bible language, goes down to it in ships; to and
noo noo; no noooo, no Noooo nooooooo, nooo nooo no no no noooo; no noo

fro ploughing it as his own special plantation. THERE is his home; THERE
noo noooooooo no no noo noo noooooo nooooooooo. NOOOO no noo nooo; NOOOO

lies his business, which a Noah's flood would not interrupt, though it
nooo noo nooooooo, noooo n Nooo'n noooo noooo noo noooooooo, nooooo no

overwhelmed all the millions in China. He lives on the sea, as prairie
noooooooooo noo noo nooooooo no Noooo. No noooo no noo noo, no noooooo

cocks in the prairie; he hides among the waves, he climbs them as
noooo no noo noooooo; no noooo noooo noo noooo, no nooooo nooo no

chamois hunters climb the Alps. For years he knows not the land; so
noooooo noooooo noooo noo Nooo. Noo noooo no noooo noo noo nooo; no

that when he comes to it at last, it smells like another world, more
nooo nooo no noooo no no no nooo, no nooooo nooo noooooo noooo, nooo

strangely than the moon would to an Earthsman. With the landless gull,
noooooooo nooo noo nooo noooo no no Noooooooo. Nooo noo nooooooo nooo,

that at sunset folds her wings and is rocked to sleep between billows;
nooo no nooooo noooo noo noooo noo no nooooo no noooo noooooo noooooo;

so at nightfall, the Nantucketer, out of sight of land, furls his sails,
no no noooooooo, noo Noooooooooo, noo no noooo no nooo, noooo noo noooo,

and lays him to his rest, while under his very pillow rush herds of
noo nooo noo no noo nooo, noooo noooo noo nooo nooooo nooo noooo no

walruses and whales.
nooooooo noo nooooo.










CHAPTER 15. Chowder.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooo.







It was quite late in the evening when the little Moss came snugly
No noo noooo nooo no noo noooooo nooo noo nooooo Nooo nooo nooooo

to anchor, and Queequeg and I went ashore; so we could attend to no
no nooooo, noo Nooooooo noo N nooo nooooo; no no noooo nooooo no no

business that day, at least none but a supper and a bed. The landlord of
nooooooo nooo noo, no noooo nooo noo n nooooo noo n noo. Noo nooooooo no

the Spouter-Inn had recommended us to his cousin Hosea Hussey of the
noo Noooooo-Noo noo noooooooooo no no noo nooooo Noooo Nooooo no noo

Try Pots, whom he asserted to be the proprietor of one of the best kept
Noo Nooo, nooo no nooooooo no no noo nooooooooo no noo no noo nooo nooo

hotels in all Nantucket, and moreover he had assured us that Cousin
nooooo no noo Noooooooo, noo nooooooo no noo noooooo no nooo Nooooo

Hosea, as he called him, was famous for his chowders. In short, he
Noooo, no no nooooo noo, noo nooooo noo noo nooooooo. No noooo, no

plainly hinted that we could not possibly do better than try pot-luck at
noooooo nooooo nooo no noooo noo nooooooo no nooooo nooo noo noo-nooo no

the Try Pots. But the directions he had given us about keeping a yellow
noo Noo Nooo. Noo noo nooooooooo no noo noooo no noooo noooooo n nooooo

warehouse on our starboard hand till we opened a white church to the
noooooooo no noo noooooooo nooo nooo no nooooo n noooo nooooo no noo

larboard, and then keeping that on the larboard hand till we made a
nooooooo, noo nooo noooooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooo nooo no nooo n

corner three points to the starboard, and that done, then ask the first
nooooo noooo nooooo no noo noooooooo, noo nooo nooo, nooo noo noo noooo

man we met where the place was: these crooked directions of his very
noo no noo noooo noo noooo noo: noooo noooooo nooooooooo no noo nooo

much puzzled us at first, especially as, at the outset, Queequeg
nooo noooooo no no noooo, nooooooooo no, no noo nooooo, Nooooooo

insisted that the yellow warehouse--our first point of departure--must
nooooooo nooo noo nooooo noooooooo--noo noooo noooo no noooooooo--nooo

be left on the larboard hand, whereas I had understood Peter Coffin to
no nooo no noo nooooooo nooo, noooooo N noo nooooooooo Noooo Nooooo no

say it was on the starboard. However, by dint of beating about a little
noo no noo no noo noooooooo. Noooooo, no nooo no noooooo noooo n nooooo

in the dark, and now and then knocking up a peaceable inhabitant
no noo nooo, noo noo noo nooo nooooooo no n noooooooo nooooooooo

to inquire the way, we at last came to something which there was no
no noooooo noo noo, no no nooo nooo no noooooooo noooo noooo noo no

mistaking.
noooooooo.




Two enormous wooden pots painted black, and suspended by asses' ears,
Noo nooooooo nooooo nooo noooooo noooo, noo noooooooo no noooo' nooo,

swung from the cross-trees of an old top-mast, planted in front of an
noooo nooo noo noooo-noooo no no noo noo-nooo, noooooo no noooo no no

old doorway. The horns of the cross-trees were sawed off on the other
noo noooooo. Noo noooo no noo noooo-noooo nooo noooo noo no noo noooo

side, so that this old top-mast looked not a little like a gallows.
nooo, no nooo nooo noo noo-nooo nooooo noo n nooooo nooo n noooooo.

Perhaps I was over sensitive to such impressions at the time, but I
Noooooo N noo nooo noooooooo no nooo noooooooooo no noo nooo, noo N

could not help staring at this gallows with a vague misgiving. A sort of
noooo noo nooo noooooo no nooo noooooo nooo n noooo noooooooo. N nooo no

crick was in my neck as I gazed up to the two remaining horns; yes, TWO
noooo noo no no nooo no N noooo no no noo noo noooooooo noooo; noo, NOO

of them, one for Queequeg, and one for me. It's ominous, thinks I. A
no nooo, noo noo Nooooooo, noo noo noo no. No'n noooooo, nooooo N. N

Coffin my Innkeeper upon landing in my first whaling port; tombstones
Nooooo no Noooooooo nooo noooooo no no noooo noooooo nooo; nooooooooo

staring at me in the whalemen's chapel; and here a gallows! and a pair
noooooo no no no noo nooooooo'n nooooo; noo nooo n noooooo! noo n nooo

of prodigious black pots too! Are these last throwing out oblique hints
no nooooooooo noooo nooo noo! Noo noooo nooo nooooooo noo noooooo noooo

touching Tophet?
nooooooo Nooooo?




I was called from these reflections by the sight of a freckled woman
N noo nooooo nooo noooo noooooooooo no noo noooo no n nooooooo noooo

with yellow hair and a yellow gown, standing in the porch of the inn,
nooo nooooo nooo noo n nooooo nooo, nooooooo no noo noooo no noo noo,

under a dull red lamp swinging there, that looked much like an injured
noooo n nooo noo nooo nooooooo noooo, nooo nooooo nooo nooo no noooooo

eye, and carrying on a brisk scolding with a man in a purple woollen
noo, noo nooooooo no n noooo nooooooo nooo n noo no n nooooo noooooo

shirt.
noooo.




"Get along with ye," said she to the man, "or I'll be combing ye!"
"Noo noooo nooo no," nooo noo no noo noo, "no N'no no noooooo no!"




"Come on, Queequeg," said I, "all right. There's Mrs. Hussey."
"Nooo no, Nooooooo," nooo N, "noo noooo. Noooo'n Noo. Nooooo."




And so it turned out; Mr. Hosea Hussey being from home, but leaving
Noo no no nooooo noo; No. Noooo Nooooo noooo nooo nooo, noo noooooo

Mrs. Hussey entirely competent to attend to all his affairs. Upon
Noo. Nooooo nooooooo noooooooo no nooooo no noo noo noooooo. Nooo

nooooo noooo noo noooooo noo n nooooo noo n noo, Noo. Nooooo, nooooooooo

noooooo nooooooo noo noo noooooo, noooooo no nooo n nooooo nooo, noo

noooooo no no n noooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo no n nooooooo noooooooo

repast, turned round to us and said--"Clam or Cod?"
nooooo, nooooo noooo no no noo nooo--"Nooo no Noo?"




"What's that about Cods, ma'am?" said I, with much politeness.
"Nooo'n nooo noooo Nooo, no'no?" nooo N, nooo nooo nooooooooo.




"Clam or Cod?" she repeated.
"Nooo no Noo?" noo nooooooo.




"A clam for supper? a cold clam; is THAT what you mean, Mrs. Hussey?"
"N nooo noo nooooo? n nooo nooo; no NOOO nooo noo nooo, Noo. Nooooo?"

says I, "but that's a rather cold and clammy reception in the winter
nooo N, "noo nooo'n n nooooo nooo noo nooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo

time, ain't it, Mrs. Hussey?"
nooo, noo'n no, Noo. Nooooo?"




But being in a great hurry to resume scolding the man in the purple
Noo noooo no n noooo noooo no nooooo nooooooo noo noo no noo nooooo

Shirt, who was waiting for it in the entry, and seeming to hear nothing
Noooo, noo noo noooooo noo no no noo noooo, noo noooooo no nooo noooooo

noo noo nooo "nooo," Noo. Nooooo noooooo noooooo no nooo nooo noooooo no

the kitchen, and bawling out "clam for two," disappeared.
noo noooooo, noo noooooo noo "nooo noo noo," noooooooooo.




"Queequeg," said I, "do you think that we can make out a supper for us
"Nooooooo," nooo N, "no noo noooo nooo no noo nooo noo n nooooo noo no

both on one clam?"
nooo no noo nooo?"




However, a warm savory steam from the kitchen served to belie the
Noooooo, n nooo nooooo noooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo no noooo noo

apparently cheerless prospect before us. But when that smoking chowder
nooooooooo noooooooo nooooooo nooooo no. Noo nooo nooo noooooo noooooo

came in, the mystery was delightfully explained. Oh, sweet friends!
nooo no, noo noooooo noo nooooooooooo noooooooo. No, noooo noooooo!

hearken to me. It was made of small juicy clams, scarcely bigger than
noooooo no no. No noo nooo no noooo noooo noooo, nooooooo nooooo nooo

hazel nuts, mixed with pounded ship biscuit, and salted pork cut up into
noooo nooo, noooo nooo noooooo nooo noooooo, noo nooooo nooo noo no nooo

nooooo nooooo; noo noooo nooooooo nooo nooooo, noo noooooooooo nooooooo

with pepper and salt. Our appetites being sharpened by the frosty
nooo nooooo noo nooo. Noo noooooooo noooo noooooooo no noo nooooo

nooooo, noo no nooooooooo, Nooooooo nooooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooo

nooooo noo, noo noo noooooo noooo nooooooooooo noooooooo, no nooooooooo

no nooo noooo nooooooooo: nooo noooooo nooo n nooooo noo nooooooooo

no no Noo. Nooooo'n nooo noo noo nooooooooooo, N noooooo N noooo noo

n nooooo nooooooooo. Nooooooo no noo noooooo nooo, N noooooo noo nooo
