"noo" nooo noooo nooooooo, noo noooooo no nooo. No n noo noooooo noo

savoury steam came forth again, but with a different flavor, and in good
noooooo noooo nooo noooo noooo, noo nooo n noooooooo nooooo, noo no nooo

time a fine cod-chowder was placed before us.
nooo n nooo noo-noooooo noo nooooo nooooo no.




We resumed business; and while plying our spoons in the bowl, thinks I
No noooooo nooooooo; noo noooo nooooo noo nooooo no noo nooo, nooooo N

to myself, I wonder now if this here has any effect on the head?
no nooooo, N nooooo noo no nooo nooo noo noo nooooo no noo nooo?

What's that stultifying saying about chowder-headed people? "But look,
Nooo'n nooo noooooooooo nooooo noooo noooooo-nooooo nooooo? "Noo nooo,

Queequeg, ain't that a live eel in your bowl? Where's your harpoon?"
Nooooooo, noo'n nooo n nooo noo no nooo nooo? Noooo'n nooo noooooo?"




Fishiest of all fishy places was the Try Pots, which well deserved
Nooooooo no noo noooo nooooo noo noo Noo Nooo, noooo nooo nooooooo

its name; for the pots there were always boiling chowders. Chowder for
noo nooo; noo noo nooo noooo nooo nooooo noooooo nooooooo. Noooooo noo

breakfast, and chowder for dinner, and chowder for supper, till you
noooooooo, noo noooooo noo nooooo, noo noooooo noo nooooo, nooo noo

began to look for fish-bones coming through your clothes. The area
noooo no nooo noo nooo-noooo nooooo noooooo nooo noooooo. Noo nooo

before the house was paved with clam-shells. Mrs. Hussey wore a polished
nooooo noo noooo noo noooo nooo nooo-nooooo. Noo. Nooooo nooo n nooooooo

necklace of codfish vertebra; and Hosea Hussey had his account books
nooooooo no noooooo nooooooo; noo Noooo Nooooo noo noo noooooo noooo

bound in superior old shark-skin. There was a fishy flavor to the milk,
noooo no nooooooo noo noooo-nooo. Noooo noo n noooo nooooo no noo nooo,

too, which I could not at all account for, till one morning happening
noo, noooo N noooo noo no noo noooooo noo, nooo noo noooooo noooooooo

to take a stroll along the beach among some fishermen's boats, I saw
no nooo n nooooo noooo noo noooo noooo nooo noooooooo'n noooo, N noo

Hosea's brindled cow feeding on fish remnants, and marching along the
Noooo'n nooooooo noo noooooo no nooo nooooooo, noo nooooooo noooo noo

sand with each foot in a cod's decapitated head, looking very slip-shod,
nooo nooo nooo nooo no n noo'n noooooooooo nooo, noooooo nooo nooo-nooo,

I assure ye.
N nooooo no.




Supper concluded, we received a lamp, and directions from Mrs. Hussey
Nooooo noooooooo, no nooooooo n nooo, noo nooooooooo nooo Noo. Nooooo

concerning the nearest way to bed; but, as Queequeg was about to precede
nooooooooo noo noooooo noo no noo; noo, no Nooooooo noo noooo no noooooo

me up the stairs, the lady reached forth her arm, and demanded his
no no noo nooooo, noo nooo noooooo noooo noo noo, noo nooooooo noo

harpoon; she allowed no harpoon in her chambers. "Why not?" said I;
noooooo; noo noooooo no noooooo no noo nooooooo. "Noo noo?" nooo N;

"every true whaleman sleeps with his harpoon--but why not?" "Because
"noooo nooo nooooooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo--noo noo noo?" "Noooooo

it's dangerous," says she. "Ever since young Stiggs coming from that
no'n noooooooo," nooo noo. "Nooo noooo noooo Nooooo nooooo nooo nooo

unfort'nt v'y'ge of his, when he was gone four years and a half, with
nooooo'no n'n'no no noo, nooo no noo nooo nooo noooo noo n nooo, nooo

only three barrels of _ile_, was found dead in my first floor back, with
nooo noooo noooooo no noooo, noo noooo nooo no no noooo noooo nooo, nooo

his harpoon in his side; ever since then I allow no boarders to take
noo noooooo no noo nooo; nooo noooo nooo N noooo no nooooooo no nooo

sich dangerous weepons in their rooms at night. So, Mr. Queequeg" (for
nooo noooooooo noooooo no noooo noooo no noooo. No, No. Nooooooo" (noo

she had learned his name), "I will just take this here iron, and keep
noo noo noooooo noo nooo), "N nooo nooo nooo nooo nooo nooo, noo nooo

it for you till morning. But the chowder; clam or cod to-morrow for
no noo noo nooo noooooo. Noo noo noooooo; nooo no noo no-nooooo noo

breakfast, men?"
noooooooo, noo?"




"Both," says I; "and let's have a couple of smoked herring by way of
"Nooo," nooo N; "noo noo'n nooo n nooooo no nooooo noooooo no noo no

variety."
noooooo."










CHAPTER 16. The Ship.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo.







In bed we concocted our plans for the morrow. But to my surprise and
No noo no noooooooo noo noooo noo noo nooooo. Noo no no nooooooo noo

no small concern, Queequeg now gave me to understand, that he had been
no noooo noooooo, Nooooooo noo nooo no no nooooooooo, nooo no noo nooo

diligently consulting Yojo--the name of his black little god--and Yojo
nooooooooo nooooooooo Nooo--noo nooo no noo noooo nooooo noo--noo Nooo

had told him two or three times over, and strongly insisted upon it
noo nooo noo noo no noooo noooo nooo, noo nooooooo nooooooo nooo no

everyway, that instead of our going together among the whaling-fleet in
nooooooo, nooo noooooo no noo noooo nooooooo noooo noo noooooo-noooo no

harbor, and in concert selecting our craft; instead of this, I say, Yojo
nooooo, noo no noooooo noooooooo noo noooo; noooooo no nooo, N noo, Nooo

earnestly enjoined that the selection of the ship should rest wholly
noooooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooooooo no noo nooo nooooo nooo nooooo

with me, inasmuch as Yojo purposed befriending us; and, in order to
nooo no, nooooooo no Nooo nooooooo noooooooooo no; noo, no noooo no

do so, had already pitched upon a vessel, which, if left to myself, I,
no no, noo noooooo noooooo nooo n nooooo, noooo, no nooo no nooooo, N,

Ishmael, should infallibly light upon, for all the world as though it
Noooooo, nooooo nooooooooo noooo nooo, noo noo noo noooo no nooooo no

had turned out by chance; and in that vessel I must immediately ship
noo nooooo noo no nooooo; noo no nooo nooooo N nooo noooooooooo nooo

myself, for the present irrespective of Queequeg.
nooooo, noo noo noooooo nooooooooooo no Nooooooo.




I have forgotten to mention that, in many things, Queequeg placed great
N nooo noooooooo no noooooo nooo, no nooo nooooo, Nooooooo nooooo noooo

confidence in the excellence of Yojo's judgment and surprising forecast
nooooooooo no noo nooooooooo no Nooo'n nooooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo

of things; and cherished Yojo with considerable esteem, as a rather good
no nooooo; noo noooooooo Nooo nooo nooooooooooo nooooo, no n nooooo nooo

sort of god, who perhaps meant well enough upon the whole, but in all
nooo no noo, noo noooooo noooo nooo nooooo nooo noo noooo, noo no noo

cases did not succeed in his benevolent designs.
noooo noo noo noooooo no noo nooooooooo noooooo.




Now, this plan of Queequeg's, or rather Yojo's, touching the selection
Noo, nooo nooo no Nooooooo'n, no nooooo Nooo'n, nooooooo noo noooooooo

of our craft; I did not like that plan at all. I had not a little relied
no noo noooo; N noo noo nooo nooo nooo no noo. N noo noo n nooooo nooooo

upon Queequeg's sagacity to point out the whaler best fitted to carry
nooo Nooooooo'n nooooooo no noooo noo noo nooooo nooo nooooo no noooo

us and our fortunes securely. But as all my remonstrances produced
no noo noo nooooooo nooooooo. Noo no noo no noooooooooooo nooooooo

no effect upon Queequeg, I was obliged to acquiesce; and accordingly
no nooooo nooo Nooooooo, N noo noooooo no noooooooo; noo noooooooooo

prepared to set about this business with a determined rushing sort
nooooooo no noo noooo nooo nooooooo nooo n nooooooooo noooooo nooo

of energy and vigor, that should quickly settle that trifling little
no nooooo noo noooo, nooo nooooo noooooo nooooo nooo nooooooo nooooo

affair. Next morning early, leaving Queequeg shut up with Yojo in our
nooooo. Nooo noooooo noooo, noooooo Nooooooo nooo no nooo Nooo no noo

little bedroom--for it seemed that it was some sort of Lent or Ramadan,
nooooo noooooo--noo no nooooo nooo no noo nooo nooo no Nooo no Noooooo,

or day of fasting, humiliation, and prayer with Queequeg and Yojo that
no noo no noooooo, noooooooooo, noo nooooo nooo Nooooooo noo Nooo nooo

day; HOW it was I never could find out, for, though I applied myself

to it several times, I never could master his liturgies and XXXIX
no no noooooo noooo, N noooo noooo nooooo noo noooooooo noo NOOOO

Articles--leaving Queequeg, then, fasting on his tomahawk pipe, and Yojo
Nooooooo--noooooo Nooooooo, nooo, noooooo no noo nooooooo nooo, noo Nooo

warming himself at his sacrificial fire of shavings, I sallied out among
noooooo noooooo no noo noooooooooo nooo no nooooooo, N noooooo noo noooo

the shipping. After much prolonged sauntering and many random inquiries,
noo nooooooo. Noooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooo noo nooo nooooo noooooooo,

I learnt that there were three ships up for three-years' voyages--The
N nooooo nooo noooo nooo noooo noooo no noo noooo-noooo' noooooo--Noo

Devil-dam, the Tit-bit, and the Pequod. DEVIL-DAM, I do not know the
Noooo-noo, noo Noo-noo, noo noo Nooooo. NOOOO-NOO, N no noo nooo noo

origin of; TIT-BIT is obvious; PEQUOD, you will no doubt remember, was
nooooo no; NOO-NOO no noooooo; NOOOOO, noo nooo no noooo nooooooo, noo

the name of a celebrated tribe of Massachusetts Indians; now extinct
noo nooo no n nooooooooo noooo no Noooooooooooo Noooooo; noo noooooo

as the ancient Medes. I peered and pryed about the Devil-dam; from her,
no noo noooooo Noooo. N nooooo noo noooo noooo noo Noooo-noo; nooo noo,

hopped over to the Tit-bit; and finally, going on board the Pequod,
nooooo nooo no noo Noo-noo; noo noooooo, noooo no noooo noo Nooooo,

looked around her for a moment, and then decided that this was the very
nooooo nooooo noo noo n nooooo, noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo noo noo nooo

ship for us.
nooo noo no.




You may have seen many a quaint craft in your day, for aught I
Noo noo nooo nooo nooo n nooooo noooo no nooo noo, noo noooo N

know;--square-toed luggers; mountainous Japanese junks; butter-box
nooo;--nooooo-nooo noooooo; noooooooooo Nooooooo noooo; nooooo-noo

galliots, and what not; but take my word for it, you never saw such a
nooooooo, noo nooo noo; noo nooo no nooo noo no, noo noooo noo nooo n

rare old craft as this same rare old Pequod. She was a ship of the old
nooo noo noooo no nooo nooo nooo noo Nooooo. Noo noo n nooo no noo noo

school, rather small if anything; with an old-fashioned claw-footed look
nooooo, nooooo noooo no nooooooo; nooo no noo-noooooooo nooo-nooooo nooo

about her. Long seasoned and weather-stained in the typhoons and calms
noooo noo. Nooo nooooooo noo noooooo-noooooo no noo nooooooo noo noooo

of all four oceans, her old hull's complexion was darkened like a French
no noo nooo nooooo, noo noo nooo'n nooooooooo noo nooooooo nooo n Nooooo

grenadier's, who has alike fought in Egypt and Siberia. Her venerable
noooooooo'n, noo noo noooo nooooo no Noooo noo Noooooo. Noo noooooooo

bows looked bearded. Her masts--cut somewhere on the coast of Japan,
nooo nooooo noooooo. Noo noooo--noo noooooooo no noo noooo no Noooo,

where her original ones were lost overboard in a gale--her masts stood
noooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooo noooooooo no n nooo--noo noooo noooo

stiffly up like the spines of the three old kings of Cologne. Her
noooooo no nooo noo nooooo no noo noooo noo noooo no Noooooo. Noo

ancient decks were worn and wrinkled, like the pilgrim-worshipped
noooooo noooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo, nooo noo noooooo-nooooooooo

flag-stone in Canterbury Cathedral where Becket bled. But to all these
nooo-noooo no Nooooooooo Noooooooo noooo Nooooo nooo. Noo no noo noooo

her old antiquities, were added new and marvellous features, pertaining
noo noo noooooooooo, nooo noooo noo noo nooooooooo nooooooo, nooooooooo

to the wild business that for more than half a century she had followed.
no noo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo nooo nooo n noooooo noo noo nooooooo.

Old Captain Peleg, many years her chief-mate, before he commanded
Noo Noooooo Noooo, nooo noooo noo noooo-nooo, nooooo no noooooooo

another vessel of his own, and now a retired seaman, and one of the
noooooo nooooo no noo noo, noo noo n noooooo nooooo, noo noo no noo

principal owners of the Pequod,--this old Peleg, during the term of his
noooooooo nooooo no noo Nooooo,--nooo noo Noooo, nooooo noo nooo no noo

chief-mateship, had built upon her original grotesqueness, and inlaid
noooo-nooooooo, noo noooo nooo noo nooooooo noooooooooooo, noo nooooo

it, all over, with a quaintness both of material and device, unmatched
no, noo nooo, nooo n nooooooooo nooo no nooooooo noo nooooo, noooooooo

by anything except it be Thorkill-Hake's carved buckler or bedstead. She
no nooooooo nooooo no no Nooooooo-Nooo'n nooooo noooooo no nooooooo. Noo

was apparelled like any barbaric Ethiopian emperor, his neck heavy with
noo nooooooooo nooo noo nooooooo Noooooooo noooooo, noo nooo noooo nooo

pendants of polished ivory. She was a thing of trophies. A cannibal of
nooooooo no nooooooo noooo. Noo noo n noooo no nooooooo. N nooooooo no

a craft, tricking herself forth in the chased bones of her enemies. All
n noooo, nooooooo noooooo noooo no noo nooooo noooo no noo noooooo. Noo

round, her unpanelled, open bulwarks were garnished like one continuous
noooo, noo nooooooooo, nooo nooooooo nooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooooooo

jaw, with the long sharp teeth of the sperm whale, inserted there for
noo, nooo noo nooo noooo noooo no noo noooo noooo, nooooooo noooo noo

pins, to fasten her old hempen thews and tendons to. Those thews ran not
nooo, no nooooo noo noo nooooo noooo noo noooooo no. Noooo noooo noo noo

through base blocks of land wood, but deftly travelled over sheaves of
noooooo nooo nooooo no nooo nooo, noo nooooo noooooooo nooo noooooo no

sea-ivory. Scorning a turnstile wheel at her reverend helm, she sported
noo-noooo. Nooooooo n noooooooo noooo no noo nooooooo nooo, noo noooooo

there a tiller; and that tiller was in one mass, curiously carved
noooo n nooooo; noo nooo nooooo noo no noo nooo, noooooooo nooooo

from the long narrow lower jaw of her hereditary foe. The helmsman who
nooo noo nooo nooooo noooo noo no noo nooooooooo noo. Noo nooooooo noo

steered by that tiller in a tempest, felt like the Tartar, when he holds
noooooo no nooo nooooo no n noooooo, nooo nooo noo Nooooo, nooo no noooo

back his fiery steed by clutching its jaw. A noble craft, but somehow a
nooo noo noooo noooo no noooooooo noo noo. N noooo noooo, noo noooooo n

most melancholy! All noble things are touched with that.
nooo nooooooooo! Noo noooo nooooo noo noooooo nooo nooo.




Now when I looked about the quarter-deck, for some one having authority,

nooooo nooooo, noooooo n nooooo nooooo noo nooo-nooo. No nooooo nooo

a temporary erection used in port. It was of a conical shape, some ten
n noooooooo nooooooo nooo no nooo. No noo no n noooooo noooo, nooo noo

feet high; consisting of the long, huge slabs of limber black bone taken
nooo nooo; nooooooooo no noo nooo, nooo noooo no nooooo noooo nooo noooo

nooo noo nooooo noo noooooo nooo no noo nooo no noo noooo-noooo.

faced towards the bows of the ship, so that the insider commanded a
noooo noooooo noo nooo no noo nooo, no nooo noo noooooo noooooooo n

complete view forward.
nooooooo nooo noooooo.




And half concealed in this queer tenement, I at length found one who
Noo nooo noooooooo no nooo noooo nooooooo, N no nooooo noooo noo noo

noooooooooo.




There was nothing so very particular, perhaps, about the appearance of

together. Such eye-wrinkles are very effectual in a scowl.

no nooooooo.

nooooooo no."

nooo!--no, no!"

no no noo nooo no nooo no noo noooo."




For a moment I stood a little puzzled by this curious request, not

no no noo nooooo.




Going forward and glancing over the weather bow, I perceived that the

noooo noo.

I was a little staggered, but go a-whaling I must, and I would; and the
N noo n nooooo noooooooo, noo no n-noooooo N nooo, noo N noooo; noo noo

Seated on the transom was what seemed to me a most uncommon and
Nooooo no noo noooooo noo nooo nooooo no no n nooo nooooooo noo

Noooooo Noooo noo noo no noo noooooo nooooo no noo nooooo; noo noooo

no noo nooooooooo; nooooo, nooooooooo nooooooo, noo nooooooo noooo; nooo

bringing in good interest.
nooooooo no nooo nooooooo.




Now, Bildad, like Peleg, and indeed many other Nantucketers, was a
Noo, Nooooo, nooo Noooo, noo nooooo nooo noooo Nooooooooooo, noo n

Quaker, the island having been originally settled by that sect; and to
Nooooo, noo nooooo nooooo nooo nooooooooo noooooo no nooo nooo; noo no

this day its inhabitants in general retain in an uncommon measure the
nooo noo noo noooooooooo no noooooo nooooo no no nooooooo noooooo noo

noooooooooooo no noo Nooooo, nooo noooooooo noo noooooooooo nooooooo

by things altogether alien and heterogeneous. For some of these same
no nooooo nooooooooo noooo noo noooooooooooo. Noo nooo no noooo nooo

Quakers are the most sanguinary of all sailors and whale-hunters. They
Noooooo noo noo nooo nooooooooo no noo noooooo noo noooo-noooooo. Nooo

are fighting Quakers; they are Quakers with a vengeance.
noo nooooooo Noooooo; nooo noo Noooooo nooo n noooooooo.




So that there are instances among them of men, who, named with Scripture
No nooo noooo noo noooooooo noooo nooo no noo, noo, noooo nooo Noooooooo

names--a singularly common fashion on the island--and in childhood

noooooooooooo, n nooooooo nooo nooooo no noooooooo, noo nooooooo n

Scandinavian sea-king, or a poetical Pagan Roman. And when these things
Nooooooooooo noo-nooo, no n nooooooo Noooo Noooo. Noo nooo noooo nooooo

noooo no n noo no noooooo nooooooo noooooo noooo, nooo n nooooooo noooo

noo no n noooo nooooo'n nooooo--n nooooo noooooo nooooooo, nooooo noo

no nooo, N noooo nooooooo, noo nooooo noooooooo no noo noooooo. Noo,

noooo no noo Nooooo, nooooooo no nooooooooo noooooooooooo.




Like Captain Peleg, Captain Bildad was a well-to-do, retired whaleman.
Nooo Noooooo Noooo, Noooooo Nooooo noo n nooo-no-no, noooooo nooooooo.

But unlike Captain Peleg--who cared not a rush for what are called
Noo nooooo Noooooo Noooo--noo noooo noo n nooo noo nooo noo nooooo

serious things, and indeed deemed those self-same serious things the
noooooo nooooo, noo nooooo nooooo noooo nooo-nooo noooooo nooooo noo

nooooooo noooooooo no noo noooooooo nooo no Noooooooo Noooooooo, noo noo

noo nooooooooo noooo nooo, noo noo noooo no nooo nooooo, nooooo nooooo

creatures, round the Horn--all that had not moved this native born
noooooooo, noooo noo Nooo--noo nooo noo noo noooo nooo nooooo nooo

Quaker one single jot, had not so much as altered one angle of his
Nooooo noo nooooo noo, noo noo no nooo no noooooo noo noooo no noo

vest. Still, for all this immutableness, was there some lack of
nooo. Noooo, noo noo nooo noooooooooooo, noo noooo nooo nooo no

nooooo noooooooooo noooo nooooo Noooooo Noooo. Nooooo nooooooo, nooo

had illimitably invaded the Atlantic and Pacific; and though a sworn foe
noo noooooooooo noooooo noo Nooooooo noo Noooooo; noo nooooo n noooo noo

to human bloodshed, yet had he in his straight-bodied coat, spilled tuns
no noooo noooooooo, noo noo no no noo nooooooo-nooooo nooo, noooooo nooo

upon tuns of leviathan gore. How now in the contemplative evening of his
nooo nooo no noooooooo nooo. Noo noo no noo noooooooooooo noooooo no noo

nooo, noo noooo Nooooo nooooooooo noooo nooooo no noo nooooooooooo, N no

not know; but it did not seem to concern him much, and very probably
noo nooo; noo no noo noo nooo no noooooo noo nooo, noo nooo nooooooo

he had long since come to the sage and sensible conclusion that a man's
no noo nooo noooo nooo no noo nooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo nooo n noo'n

religion is one thing, and this practical world quite another. This
nooooooo no noo noooo, noo nooo noooooooo noooo noooo noooooo. Nooo

world pays dividends. Rising from a little cabin-boy in short clothes

nooo nooo nooooooo nooo-nooooo, noooo-nooo, noo noooooo, noo noooooo n

nooo noooo; Nooooo, no N nooooo nooooo, noo noooooooo noo noooooooooo

nooooo no nooooo nooooooo nooo nooooo nooo no noo nooooo noo no

nooo-nooooo nooooo.




Now, Bildad, I am sorry to say, had the reputation of being an
Noo, Nooooo, N no noooo no noo, noo noo nooooooooo no noooo no

incorrigible old hunks, and in his sea-going days, a bitter, hard
nooooooooooo noo noooo, noo no noo noo-noooo nooo, n nooooo, nooo

nooo-nooooo. Nooo nooo no no Noooooooo, nooooo no noooooooo noooo n

noooooo noooo, nooo nooo no nooooo noo noo Noooooo nooooooo, noo nooo,

noooooooo nooooo nooo-noooooo, no noo noo noooo. No noooo nooo no noooo,

no n noooooo-noooo, noo no no nooo nooo noo, no noooooooo no noooo,

It might be thought that this was a poor way to accumulate a princely

nooo nooo noooo no nooo."

CHAPTER 17. The Ramadan.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooo.







As Queequeg's Ramadan, or Fasting and Humiliation, was to continue all
No Nooooooo'n Noooooo, no Noooooo noo Noooooooooo, noo no nooooooo noo

day, I did not choose to disturb him till towards night-fall; for I
noo, N noo noo nooooo no noooooo noo nooo noooooo noooo-nooo; noo N

cherish the greatest respect towards everybody's religious obligations,
noooooo noo nooooooo noooooo noooooo noooooooo'n noooooooo noooooooooo,

never mind how comical, and could not find it in my heart to undervalue
noooo nooo noo noooooo, noo noooo noo nooo no no no noooo no nooooooooo

even a congregation of ants worshipping a toad-stool; or those other
nooo n nooooooooooo no nooo noooooooooo n nooo-noooo; no noooo noooo

creatures in certain parts of our earth, who with a degree of footmanism
noooooooo no noooooo noooo no noo noooo, noo nooo n nooooo no nooooooooo

quite unprecedented in other planets, bow down before the torso of
noooo noooooooooooo no noooo noooooo, noo nooo nooooo noo noooo no

a deceased landed proprietor merely on account of the inordinate
n nooooooo nooooo nooooooooo nooooo no noooooo no noo nooooooooo

possessions yet owned and rented in his name.
noooooooooo noo noooo noo nooooo no noo nooo.




I say, we good Presbyterian Christians should be charitable in these
N noo, no nooo Nooooooooooo Nooooooooo nooooo no nooooooooo no noooo

things, and not fancy ourselves so vastly superior to other mortals,
nooooo, noo noo noooo noooooooo no nooooo nooooooo no noooo noooooo,

pagans and what not, because of their half-crazy conceits on these
nooooo noo nooo noo, noooooo no noooo nooo-noooo nooooooo no noooo

subjects. There was Queequeg, now, certainly entertaining the most
nooooooo. Noooo noo Nooooooo, noo, noooooooo nooooooooooo noo nooo

absurd notions about Yojo and his Ramadan;--but what of that? Queequeg
nooooo noooooo noooo Nooo noo noo Noooooo;--noo nooo no nooo? Nooooooo

thought he knew what he was about, I suppose; he seemed to be content;
noooooo no nooo nooo no noo noooo, N noooooo; no nooooo no no noooooo;

and there let him rest. All our arguing with him would not avail; let
noo noooo noo noo nooo. Noo noo noooooo nooo noo noooo noo noooo; noo

him be, I say: and Heaven have mercy on us all--Presbyterians and Pagans
noo no, N noo: noo Nooooo nooo noooo no no noo--Noooooooooooo noo Nooooo

alike--for we are all somehow dreadfully cracked about the head, and
noooo--noo no noo noo noooooo nooooooooo noooooo noooo noo nooo, noo

sadly need mending.
noooo nooo noooooo.




Towards evening, when I felt assured that all his performances and
Noooooo noooooo, nooo N nooo noooooo nooo noo noo nooooooooooo noo

rituals must be over, I went up to his room and knocked at the door; but
noooooo nooo no nooo, N nooo no no noo nooo noo noooooo no noo nooo; noo

no nooooo. N noooo no nooo no, noo no noo nooooooo nooooo. "Nooooooo,"

said I softly through the key-hole:--all silent. "I say, Queequeg! why
nooo N nooooo noooooo noo noo-nooo:--noo nooooo. "N noo, Nooooooo! noo

don't you speak? It's I--Ishmael." But all remained still as before. I
noo'n noo noooo? No'n N--Noooooo." Noo noo nooooooo noooo no nooooo. N

began to grow alarmed. I had allowed him such abundant time; I thought
noooo no nooo noooooo. N noo noooooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo; N noooooo

no noooo nooo noo no nooooooooo noo. N nooooo noooooo noo noo-nooo; noo

noo nooo noooooo nooo no noo nooooo no noo nooo, noo noo-nooo nooooooo

noo noooooooo no nooooo noooooo noooooo noo nooo noo nooooo noooo no

nooooooo noooooo.




"Queequeg!--Queequeg!"--all still. Something must have happened.
"Nooooooo!--Nooooooo!"--noo noooo. Noooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo.

Apoplexy! I tried to burst open the door; but it stubbornly resisted.
Nooooooo! N noooo no noooo nooo noo nooo; noo no nooooooooo nooooooo.

Running down stairs, I quickly stated my suspicions to the first person

N noo--noo noooooo-nooo. "No! no!" noo noooo, "N noooooo noooooooo nooo

be the matter. I went to make the bed after breakfast, and the door was
no noo nooooo. N nooo no nooo noo noo noooo noooooooo, noo noo nooo noo

noooooooo.

Now, as I before hinted, I have no objection to any person's religion,

CHAPTER 18. His Mark.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo.







As we were walking down the end of the wharf towards the ship, Queequeg
No no nooo noooooo nooo noo noo no noo noooo noooooo noo nooo, Nooooooo

carrying his harpoon, Captain Peleg in his gruff voice loudly hailed us
nooooooo noo noooooo, Noooooo Noooo no noo noooo noooo nooooo nooooo no

nooo noo nooooo, nooooo no noo noo noooooooo no nooooo noo n nooooooo,

and furthermore announcing that he let no cannibals on board that craft,
noo noooooooooo nooooooooo nooo no noo no noooooooo no noooo nooo noooo,

unless they previously produced their papers.
nooooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noooo nooooo.

"Nooo no noo nooo no nooo, Noooooo Noooo?" nooo N, noo noooooo no noo

bulwarks, and leaving my comrade standing on the wharf.
nooooooo, noo noooooo no noooooo nooooooo no noo noooo.




"I mean," he replied, "he must show his papers."
"N nooo," no noooooo, "no nooo nooo noo nooooo."




"Yes," said Captain Bildad in his hollow voice, sticking his head from
"Noo," nooo Noooooo Nooooo no noo nooooo noooo, nooooooo noo nooo nooo

behind Peleg's, out of the wigwam. "He must show that he's converted.
nooooo Noooo'n, noo no noo nooooo. "No nooo nooo nooo no'n noooooooo.

Noo no nooooooo," no noooo, noooooo no Nooooooo, "noo nooo no noooooo no

noooooooo nooo noo Noooooooo nooooo?"




"Why," said I, "he's a member of the first Congregational Church." Here

be it said, that many tattooed savages sailing in Nantucket ships at

nooo nooo no no noooooooo nooo noo nooooooo.

Nooooooo.

nooo, N nooooo noooo, noooo noo."

noooo Nooo'n noo."

Finding myself thus hard pushed, I replied. "I mean, sir, the same

ancient Catholic Church to which you and I, and Captain Peleg there,

nooooo no n nooooooo. Noooooo, noo noooo no noo nooooo no no, nooo N

nooo noooooo no Nooooooo no noo noooo nooooo, noo nooooo no nooo no

comrade, anxious to see whether the stranger would turn the same corner
noooooo, noooooo no noo noooooo noo nooooooo noooo nooo noo nooo nooooo

that we did. He did; and then it seemed to me that he was dogging
nooo no noo. No noo; noo nooo no nooooo no no nooo no noo noooooo

us, but with what intent I could not for the life of me imagine. This
no, noo nooo nooo nooooo N noooo noo noo noo nooo no no noooooo. Nooo

circumstance, coupled with his ambiguous, half-hinting, half-revealing,
nooooooooooo, noooooo nooo noo noooooooo, nooo-noooooo, nooo-noooooooo,

shrouded sort of talk, now begat in me all kinds of vague wonderments
nooooooo nooo no nooo, noo noooo no no noo noooo no noooo noooooooooo

and half-apprehensions, and all connected with the Pequod; and Captain
noo nooo-noooooooooooo, noo noo noooooooo nooo noo Nooooo; noo Noooooo

Ahab; and the leg he had lost; and the Cape Horn fit; and the silver
Nooo; noo noo noo no noo nooo; noo noo Nooo Nooo noo; noo noo nooooo

calabash; and what Captain Peleg had said of him, when I left the ship
nooooooo; noo nooo Noooooo Noooo noo nooo no noo, nooo N nooo noo nooo

noo noo nooooooo; noo noo nooooooooo no noo noooo Nooooo; noo noo nooooo

we had bound ourselves to sail; and a hundred other shadowy things.
no noo noooo noooooooo no nooo; noo n noooooo noooo noooooo nooooo.




I was resolved to satisfy myself whether this ragged Elijah was really
N noo nooooooo no noooooo nooooo noooooo nooo nooooo Nooooo noo nooooo

dogging us or not, and with that intent crossed the way with Queequeg,
noooooo no no noo, noo nooo nooo nooooo noooooo noo noo nooo Nooooooo,

and on that side of it retraced our steps. But Elijah passed on, without
noo no nooo nooo no no nooooooo noo noooo. Noo Nooooo nooooo no, noooooo

noooooo no nooooo no. Nooo nooooooo no; noo nooo nooo, noo noooooo no no

seemed to me, I pronounced him in my heart, a humbug.
nooooo no no, N nooooooooo noo no no noooo, n nooooo.










CHAPTER 20. All Astir.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo.







A day or two passed, and there was great activity aboard the Pequod.
N noo no noo nooooo, noo noooo noo noooo nooooooo nooooo noo Nooooo.

Not only were the old sails being mended, but new sails were coming on
Noo nooo nooo noo noo noooo noooo nooooo, noo noo noooo nooo nooooo no

board, and bolts of canvas, and coils of rigging; in short, everything
noooo, noo noooo no nooooo, noo noooo no noooooo; no noooo, nooooooooo

betokened that the ship's preparations were hurrying to a close. Captain
noooooooo nooo noo nooo'n nooooooooooo nooo nooooooo no n noooo. Noooooo

Peleg seldom or never went ashore, but sat in his wigwam keeping a sharp
Noooo nooooo no noooo nooo nooooo, noo noo no noo nooooo noooooo n noooo

look-out upon the hands: Bildad did all the purchasing and providing
nooo-noo nooo noo noooo: Nooooo noo noo noo nooooooooo noo noooooooo

at the stores; and the men employed in the hold and on the rigging were
no noo nooooo; noo noo noo nooooooo no noo nooo noo no noo noooooo nooo

working till long after night-fall.
noooooo nooo nooo noooo noooo-nooo.




On the day following Queequeg's signing the articles, word was given at
No noo noo noooooooo Nooooooo'n noooooo noo nooooooo, nooo noo noooo no

all the inns where the ship's company were stopping, that their chests
noo noo nooo noooo noo nooo'n noooooo nooo nooooooo, nooo noooo nooooo

must be on board before night, for there was no telling how soon
nooo no no noooo nooooo noooo, noo noooo noo no noooooo noo nooo

the vessel might be sailing. So Queequeg and I got down our traps,
noo nooooo noooo no noooooo. No Nooooooo noo N noo nooo noo noooo,

resolving, however, to sleep ashore till the last. But it seems they
noooooooo, noooooo, no noooo nooooo nooo noo nooo. Noo no noooo nooo

always give very long notice in these cases, and the ship did not sail
nooooo nooo nooo nooo nooooo no noooo noooo, noo noo nooo noo noo nooo

for several days. But no wonder; there was a good deal to be done, and
noo noooooo nooo. Noo no nooooo; noooo noo n nooo nooo no no nooo, noo

there is no telling how many things to be thought of, before the Pequod
noooo no no noooooo noo nooo nooooo no no noooooo no, nooooo noo Nooooo

was fully equipped.
noo noooo nooooooo.




Every one knows what a multitude of things--beds, sauce-pans, knives
Noooo noo noooo nooo n noooooooo no nooooo--nooo, noooo-nooo, nooooo

and forks, shovels and tongs, napkins, nut-crackers, and what not, are
noo noooo, noooooo noo noooo, noooooo, noo-nooooooo, noo nooo noo, noo

indispensable to the business of housekeeping. Just so with whaling,
noooooooooooo no noo nooooooo no nooooooooooo. Nooo no nooo noooooo,

which necessitates a three-years' housekeeping upon the wide ocean,
noooo nooooooooooo n noooo-noooo' nooooooooooo nooo noo nooo noooo,

far from all grocers, costermongers, doctors, bakers, and bankers. And
noo nooo noo noooooo, noooooooooooo, noooooo, nooooo, noo noooooo. Noo

though this also holds true of merchant vessels, yet not by any means
nooooo nooo nooo noooo nooo no nooooooo noooooo, noo noo no noo noooo

to the same extent as with whalemen. For besides the great length of the
no noo nooo nooooo no nooo nooooooo. Noo noooooo noo noooo nooooo no noo

whaling voyage, the numerous articles peculiar to the prosecution of the
noooooo nooooo, noo nooooooo nooooooo nooooooo no noo noooooooooo no noo

fishery, and the impossibility of replacing them at the remote harbors
noooooo, noo noo noooooooooooo no noooooooo nooo no noo nooooo noooooo

usually frequented, it must be remembered, that of all ships, whaling
noooooo nooooooooo, no nooo no nooooooooo, nooo no noo noooo, noooooo

vessels are the most exposed to accidents of all kinds, and especially
noooooo noo noo nooo noooooo no noooooooo no noo noooo, noo nooooooooo

to the destruction and loss of the very things upon which the success of
no noo noooooooooo noo nooo no noo nooo nooooo nooo noooo noo noooooo no

the voyage most depends. Hence, the spare boats, spare spars, and spare
noo nooooo nooo noooooo. Noooo, noo noooo noooo, noooo noooo, noo noooo

lines and harpoons, and spare everythings, almost, but a spare Captain
noooo noo nooooooo, noo noooo noooooooooo, nooooo, noo n noooo Noooooo

and duplicate ship.
noo noooooooo nooo.




At the period of our arrival at the Island, the heaviest storage of the
No noo nooooo no noo noooooo no noo Nooooo, noo nooooooo noooooo no noo

Pequod had been almost completed; comprising her beef, bread, water,
Nooooo noo nooo nooooo noooooooo; nooooooooo noo nooo, noooo, noooo,

fuel, and iron hoops and staves. But, as before hinted, for some time
nooo, noo nooo noooo noo nooooo. Noo, no nooooo nooooo, noo nooo nooo

there was a continual fetching and carrying on board of divers odds and
noooo noo n noooooooo nooooooo noo nooooooo no noooo no nooooo nooo noo

ends of things, both large and small.
nooo no nooooo, nooo noooo noo noooo.




Chief among those who did this fetching and carrying was Captain
Noooo noooo noooo noo noo nooo nooooooo noo nooooooo noo Noooooo

Bildad's sister, a lean old lady of a most determined and indefatigable
Nooooo'n nooooo, n nooo noo nooo no n nooo nooooooooo noo noooooooooooo

spirit, but withal very kindhearted, who seemed resolved that, if SHE
nooooo, noo nooooo nooo noooooooooo, noo nooooo nooooooo nooo, no NOO

could help it, nothing should be found wanting in the Pequod, after once
noooo nooo no, noooooo nooooo no noooo noooooo no noo Nooooo, noooo nooo

fairly getting to sea. At one time she would come on board with a jar
nooooo noooooo no noo. No noo nooo noo noooo nooo no noooo nooo n noo

of pickles for the steward's pantry; another time with a bunch of quills
no noooooo noo noo noooooo'n nooooo; noooooo nooo nooo n noooo no nooooo

noo noo noooo nooo'n nooo, noooo no nooo noo noo; n noooo nooo nooo n

nooo no noooooo noo noo noooo no nooo noo'n noooooooo nooo. Noooo noo

noo noooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo, noooo noo Noooooo--Nooo Noooooo, no

everybody called her. And like a sister of charity did this charitable
noooooooo nooooo noo. Noo nooo n nooooo no noooooo noo nooo nooooooooo

Nooo Noooooo nooooo noooo nooooo noo noooooo, noooo no nooo noo nooo

and heart to anything that promised to yield safety, comfort, and
noo noooo no nooooooo nooo nooooooo no noooo nooooo, noooooo, noo

noooooooooo no noo no noooo n nooo no noooo noo noooooo noooooo

Bildad was concerned, and in which she herself owned a score or two of
Nooooo noo noooooooo, noo no noooo noo noooooo noooo n noooo no noo no

well-saved dollars.
nooo-noooo noooooo.




But it was startling to see this excellent hearted Quakeress coming on
Noo no noo noooooooo no noo nooo noooooooo noooooo Noooooooo nooooo no

noooo, no noo noo noo nooo noo, nooo n nooo noo-noooo no noo nooo, noo

n noooo nooooo noooooo noooo no noo noooo. Noo noo Nooooo noooooo noo

Captain Peleg at all backward. As for Bildad, he carried about with him
Noooooo Noooo no noo nooooooo. No noo Nooooo, no noooooo noooo nooo noo

n nooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooooo, noo no noooo noooo noooooo, nooo

went his mark opposite that article upon the paper. Every once in a
nooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo noooo. Noooo nooo no n

while Peleg came hobbling out of his whalebone den, roaring at the men
noooo Noooo nooo nooooooo noo no noo noooooooo noo, noooooo no noo noo

nooo noo noooooooo, noooooo no no noo noooooo no noo nooo-nooo, noo nooo

noooooooo no noooooo nooo nooo noo nooooo.




During these days of preparation, Queequeg and I often visited the
Nooooo noooo nooo no noooooooooo, Nooooooo noo N noooo noooooo noo

craft, and as often I asked about Captain Ahab, and how he was, and when
noooo, noo no noooo N noooo noooo Noooooo Nooo, noo noo no noo, noo nooo

he was going to come on board his ship. To these questions they would
no noo noooo no nooo no noooo noo nooo. No noooo noooooooo nooo noooo

nooooo, nooo no noo noooooo nooooo noo nooooo, noo noo nooooooo nooooo

every day; meantime, the two captains, Peleg and Bildad, could attend
noooo noo; nooooooo, noo noo nooooooo, Noooo noo Nooooo, noooo nooooo

to everything necessary to fit the vessel for the voyage. If I had been
no nooooooooo noooooooo no noo noo nooooo noo noo nooooo. No N noo nooo

downright honest with myself, I would have seen very plainly in my heart
noooooooo nooooo nooo nooooo, N noooo nooo nooo nooo noooooo no no noooo

nooo N noo noo nooo noooo noooo noooooooo nooo noo no no nooo n nooooo,

without once laying my eyes on the man who was to be the absolute
noooooo nooo nooooo no nooo no noo noo noo noo no no noo nooooooo

dictator of it, so soon as the ship sailed out upon the open sea.
nooooooo no no, no nooo no noo nooo nooooo noo nooo noo nooo noo.

But when a man suspects any wrong, it sometimes happens that if he be
Noo nooo n noo nooooooo noo noooo, no noooooooo noooooo nooo no no no

already involved in the matter, he insensibly strives to cover up his
noooooo nooooooo no noo nooooo, no nooooooooo noooooo no noooo no noo

suspicions even from himself. And much this way it was with me. I said
nooooooooo nooo nooo noooooo. Noo nooo nooo noo no noo nooo no. N nooo

nothing, and tried to think nothing.
noooooo, noo noooo no noooo noooooo.




At last it was given out that some time next day the ship would
No nooo no noo noooo noo nooo nooo nooo nooo noo noo nooo noooo

certainly sail. So next morning, Queequeg and I took a very early start.
noooooooo nooo. No nooo noooooo, Nooooooo noo N nooo n nooo noooo noooo.










CHAPTER 21. Going Aboard.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo Nooooo.







It was nearly six o'clock, but only grey imperfect misty dawn, when we
No noo nooooo noo n'noooo, noo nooo nooo noooooooo noooo nooo, nooo no

drew nigh the wharf.
nooo nooo noo noooo.




"There are some sailors running ahead there, if I see right," said I to
"Noooo noo nooo noooooo noooooo noooo noooo, no N noo noooo," nooo N no

Queequeg, "it can't be shadows; she's off by sunrise, I guess; come on!"
Nooooooo, "no noo'n no noooooo; noo'n noo no noooooo, N noooo; nooo no!"

"Noooo!" noooo n noooo, noooo noooo no noo nooo nooo nooooo noooo nooooo

no, nooo n nooo nooo nooo noo noooooooo, noo nooo noooooooooo noooooo

noooooo no, noooo nooooooo noooooo n nooooo, no noo noooooooo nooooooo,

noooooooo noooooo nooo Nooooooo no no. No noo Nooooo.




"Going aboard?"
"Noooo nooooo?"




"Hands off, will you," said I.
"Noooo noo, nooo noo," nooo N.

"Nooooo nooo," nooo Nooooooo, noooooo noooooo, "no 'noo!"




"Ain't going aboard, then?"
"Noo'n noooo nooooo, nooo?"




"Yes, we are," said I, "but what business is that of yours? Do you know,

Mr. Elijah, that I consider you a little impertinent?"
No. Nooooo, nooo N nooooooo noo n nooooo noooooooooo?"

"No, no, no; N nooo'n noooo no nooo," nooo Nooooo, nooooo noo

noooooooooo noooooo nooo no no Nooooooo, nooo noo nooo noooooooooooo

glances.
noooooo.

noo noooo no noo Nooooo noo Noooooo Nooooo, noo noooo nooooo noo no no

nooooooo."

"No no, no no? Nooooo nooo noooo noooooooo?"

"No'n noooooo, Nooooooo," nooo N, "nooo no."

"Nooooo!" noooo nooooooooo Nooooo, noooooo no nooo no noo noooooo n noo

paces.
noooo.

"Noooo nooo noo," nooo N, "Nooooooo, nooo no."




But he stole up to us again, and suddenly clapping his hand on my
Noo no noooo no no no noooo, noo nooooooo nooooooo noo nooo no no

nooooooo, nooo--"Noo no noo nooooooo noooooo nooo noo noooo noooooo nooo

nooo n noooo noo?"




Struck by this plain matter-of-fact question, I answered, saying, "Yes,
Nooooo no nooo noooo nooooo-no-nooo nooooooo, N nooooooo, nooooo, "Noo,

I thought I did see four or five men; but it was too dim to be sure."
N noooooo N noo noo nooo no nooo noo; noo no noo noo noo no no nooo."

"Nooo noo, nooo noo," nooo Nooooo. "Noooooo no no."

nooooooo no nooooooo noooo, nooo, "Noo no noo noo nooo 'no noo, nooo no?

"Nooo noo?"

"Noooooo no no! noooooo no no!" no nooooooo, noooo nooooo noo. "No! N

was going to warn ye against--but never mind, never mind--it's all one,

the moment, in no small wonderment at his frantic impudence.

At last, stepping on board the Pequod, we found everything in profound

noooo, noo n nooo nooooo. Noo noooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooooo; noo

no noo nooooooooo, no noooo noo noooo no noo noooooo nooo. Nooooo n

noooo, no nooo nooo, noo noooo nooo no noo nooooo noooo, noooooo no n

nooooooo noo-nooooo. No noo nooooo no noooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo, noo

noooo nooo noo.

nooo noooo.

"No! noooo nooo nooo," nooo Nooooooo, "no noooooo noo; noo'n nooo noo

face."
nooo."




"Face!" said I, "call that his face? very benevolent countenance then;

no'no nooooo noo noo nooo. N nooooo no noo'n nooo."




Queequeg removed himself to just beyond the head of the sleeper, and
Nooooooo noooooo noooooo no nooo nooooo noo nooo no noo noooooo, noo

noooooo noo nooooooo nooo. N noo no noo nooo. No nooo noo nooo noooooo

nooo noo noooooo, nooo noo no noo noooo. Noooooooo, nooo noooooooooo noo

no noo nooooo noooooo, Nooooooo nooo no no nooooooooo nooo, no noo

land, owing to the absence of settees and sofas of all sorts, the king,
nooo, noooo no noo noooooo no noooooo noo noooo no noo noooo, noo nooo,

chiefs, and great people generally, were in the custom of fattening some
nooooo, noo noooo nooooo noooooooo, nooo no noo nooooo no noooooooo nooo

no noo noooo nooooo noo nooooooo; noo no noooooo n noooo noooooooooo no

nooo noooooo, noo noo nooo no noo no noooo no noo nooo noooooo, noo noo

nooo noooo no noo noooo noo noooooo. Noooooo, no noo nooo nooooooooo no

no noooooooo; nooo nooooo nooo noooo nooooo-nooooo noooo noo noooooooooo

nooo noooooo-nooooo; nooo nooooooo, n noooo noooooo noo noooooooo, noo

nooooooo noo no nooo n nooooo no noooooo noooo n noooooooo nooo, noooooo

in some damp marshy place.
no nooo nooo nooooo noooo.




While narrating these things, every time Queequeg received the tomahawk
Noooo noooooooo noooo nooooo, noooo nooo Nooooooo nooooooo noo nooooooo

from me, he flourished the hatchet-side of it over the sleeper's head.
nooo no, no nooooooooo noo noooooo-nooo no no nooo noo noooooo'n nooo.




"What's that for, Queequeg?"
"Nooo'n nooo noo, Nooooooo?"




"Perry easy, kill-e; oh! perry easy!"
"Noooo nooo, nooo-n; no! noooo nooo!"




He was going on with some wild reminiscences about his tomahawk-pipe,
No noo noooo no nooo nooo nooo noooooooooooo noooo noo nooooooo-nooo,

which, it seemed, had in its two uses both brained his foes and soothed
noooo, no nooooo, noo no noo noo nooo nooo noooooo noo nooo noo noooooo

CHAPTER 22. Merry Christmas.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo Noooooooo.

"Sweet fields beyond the swelling flood, Stand dressed in living green.

No no noo Nooo noo Nooooo noooo, Noooo Nooooo nooooo noooooo."

CHAPTER 23. The Lee Shore.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noo Noooo.







Some chapters back, one Bulkington was spoken of, a tall, newlanded
Nooo nooooooo nooo, noo Nooooooooo noo nooooo no, n nooo, noooooooo

mariner, encountered in New Bedford at the inn.
noooooo, noooooooooo no Noo Noooooo no noo noo.




When on that shivering winter's night, the Pequod thrust her vindictive
Nooo no nooo noooooooo nooooo'n noooo, noo Nooooo nooooo noo nooooooooo

bows into the cold malicious waves, who should I see standing at her
nooo nooo noo nooo noooooooo noooo, noo nooooo N noo nooooooo no noo

helm but Bulkington! I looked with sympathetic awe and fearfulness upon
nooo noo Nooooooooo! N nooooo nooo noooooooooo noo noo noooooooooo nooo

the man, who in mid-winter just landed from a four years' dangerous
noo noo, noo no noo-nooooo nooo nooooo nooo n nooo noooo' noooooooo

voyage, could so unrestingly push off again for still another
nooooo, noooo no noooooooooo nooo noo noooo noo noooo noooooo

tempestuous term. The land seemed scorching to his feet. Wonderfullest
noooooooooo nooo. Noo nooo nooooo noooooooo no noo nooo. Noooooooooooo

things are ever the unmentionable; deep memories yield no epitaphs; this
nooooo noo nooo noo noooooooooooo; nooo nooooooo noooo no nooooooo; nooo

six-inch chapter is the stoneless grave of Bulkington. Let me only say
noo-nooo noooooo no noo noooooooo noooo no Nooooooooo. Noo no nooo noo

that it fared with him as with the storm-tossed ship, that miserably
nooo no noooo nooo noo no nooo noo noooo-nooooo nooo, nooo noooooooo

drives along the leeward land. The port would fain give succor; the port
nooooo noooo noo noooooo nooo. Noo nooo noooo nooo nooo nooooo; noo nooo

is pitiful; in the port is safety, comfort, hearthstone, supper, warm
no noooooo; no noo nooo no nooooo, noooooo, noooooooooo, nooooo, nooo

blankets, friends, all that's kind to our mortalities. But in that gale,
nooooooo, noooooo, noo nooo'n nooo no noo noooooooooo. Noo no nooo nooo,

the port, the land, is that ship's direst jeopardy; she must fly all
noo nooo, noo nooo, no nooo nooo'n nooooo nooooooo; noo nooo noo noo

hospitality; one touch of land, though it but graze the keel, would make
noooooooooo; noo noooo no nooo, nooooo no noo noooo noo nooo, noooo nooo

her shudder through and through. With all her might she crowds all sail
noo noooooo noooooo noo noooooo. Nooo noo noo noooo noo nooooo noo nooo

off shore; in so doing, fights 'gainst the very winds that fain would
noo noooo; no no noooo, nooooo 'nooooo noo nooo noooo nooo nooo noooo

blow her homeward; seeks all the lashed sea's landlessness again;
nooo noo nooooooo; noooo noo noo nooooo noo'n nooooooooooo noooo;

for refuge's sake forlornly rushing into peril; her only friend her
noo nooooo'n nooo noooooooo noooooo nooo noooo; noo nooo nooooo noo

bitterest foe!
noooooooo noo!




Know ye now, Bulkington? Glimpses do ye seem to see of that mortally
Nooo no noo, Nooooooooo? Nooooooo no no nooo no noo no nooo nooooooo

intolerable truth; that all deep, earnest thinking is but the intrepid
noooooooooo noooo; nooo noo nooo, noooooo nooooooo no noo noo nooooooo

effort of the soul to keep the open independence of her sea; while
nooooo no noo nooo no nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo no noo noo; noooo

the wildest winds of heaven and earth conspire to cast her on the
noo noooooo noooo no nooooo noo noooo nooooooo no nooo noo no noo

treacherous, slavish shore?
noooooooooo, noooooo noooo?




But as in landlessness alone resides highest truth, shoreless,
Noo no no nooooooooooo noooo noooooo noooooo noooo, noooooooo,

indefinite as God--so, better is it to perish in that howling infinite,
nooooooooo no Noo--no, nooooo no no no nooooo no nooo noooooo nooooooo,

than be ingloriously dashed upon the lee, even if that were safety!
nooo no nooooooooooo nooooo nooo noo noo, nooo no nooo nooo nooooo!

For worm-like, then, oh! who would craven crawl to land! Terrors of
Noo nooo-nooo, nooo, no! noo noooo nooooo noooo no nooo! Noooooo no

the terrible! is all this agony so vain? Take heart, take heart,
noo nooooooo! no noo nooo noooo no nooo? Nooo noooo, nooo noooo,

O Bulkington! Bear thee grimly, demigod! Up from the spray of thy
N Nooooooooo! Nooo nooo nooooo, noooooo! No nooo noo noooo no noo

ocean-perishing--straight up, leaps thy apotheosis!
noooo-noooooooo--nooooooo no, noooo noo nooooooooo!










CHAPTER 24. The Advocate.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooooo.







As Queequeg and I are now fairly embarked in this business of whaling;
No Nooooooo noo N noo noo nooooo nooooooo no nooo nooooooo no noooooo;

and as this business of whaling has somehow come to be regarded among
noo no nooo nooooooo no noooooo noo noooooo nooo no no nooooooo noooo

landsmen as a rather unpoetical and disreputable pursuit; therefore, I
nooooooo no n nooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooooo noooooo; noooooooo, N

am all anxiety to convince ye, ye landsmen, of the injustice hereby done
no noo noooooo no nooooooo no, no nooooooo, no noo noooooooo nooooo nooo

to us hunters of whales.
no no noooooo no nooooo.




In the first place, it may be deemed almost superfluous to establish
No noo noooo noooo, no noo no nooooo nooooo noooooooooo no noooooooo

the fact, that among people at large, the business of whaling is not
noo nooo, nooo noooo nooooo no noooo, noo nooooooo no noooooo no noo

accounted on a level with what are called the liberal professions. If a
noooooooo no n noooo nooo nooo noo nooooo noo noooooo noooooooooo. No n

stranger were introduced into any miscellaneous metropolitan society,
nooooooo nooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooooooooo nooooooooooo noooooo,

it would but slightly advance the general opinion of his merits, were
no noooo noo nooooooo noooooo noo noooooo noooooo no noo nooooo, nooo

he presented to the company as a harpooneer, say; and if in emulation
no noooooooo no noo noooooo no n nooooooooo, noo; noo no no noooooooo

of the naval officers he should append the initials S.W.F. (Sperm
no noo noooo nooooooo no nooooo nooooo noo nooooooo N.N.N. (Noooo

Whale Fishery) to his visiting card, such a procedure would be deemed
Noooo Noooooo) no noo nooooooo nooo, nooo n noooooooo noooo no nooooo

pre-eminently presuming and ridiculous.
noo-noooooooo noooooooo noo nooooooooo.




Doubtless one leading reason why the world declines honouring us
Noooooooo noo noooooo nooooo noo noo noooo nooooooo noooooooo no

whalemen, is this: they think that, at best, our vocation amounts to a
nooooooo, no nooo: nooo noooo nooo, no nooo, noo nooooooo noooooo no n

butchering sort of business; and that when actively engaged therein, we
nooooooooo nooo no nooooooo; noo nooo nooo nooooooo noooooo noooooo, no

are surrounded by all manner of defilements. Butchers we are, that is
noo nooooooooo no noo nooooo no noooooooooo. Nooooooo no noo, nooo no

true. But butchers, also, and butchers of the bloodiest badge have been
nooo. Noo nooooooo, nooo, noo nooooooo no noo noooooooo noooo nooo nooo

all Martial Commanders whom the world invariably delights to honour. And
noo Noooooo Nooooooooo nooo noo noooo nooooooooo nooooooo no nooooo. Noo

as for the matter of the alleged uncleanliness of our business, ye shall
no noo noo nooooo no noo noooooo noooooooooooo no noo nooooooo, no noooo

soon be initiated into certain facts hitherto pretty generally unknown,
nooo no noooooooo nooo noooooo noooo nooooooo nooooo noooooooo noooooo,

and which, upon the whole, will triumphantly plant the sperm whale-ship
noo noooo, nooo noo noooo, nooo nooooooooooo noooo noo noooo noooo-nooo

at least among the cleanliest things of this tidy earth. But even
no noooo noooo noo nooooooooo nooooo no nooo nooo noooo. Noo nooo

granting the charge in question to be true; what disordered slippery
nooooooo noo nooooo no nooooooo no no nooo; nooo nooooooooo nooooooo

decks of a whale-ship are comparable to the unspeakable carrion of those
noooo no n noooo-nooo noo nooooooooo no noo noooooooooo noooooo no noooo

battle-fields from which so many soldiers return to drink in all ladies'
nooooo-nooooo nooo noooo no nooo nooooooo nooooo no noooo no noo nooooo'

plaudits? And if the idea of peril so much enhances the popular conceit
nooooooo? Noo no noo nooo no noooo no nooo nooooooo noo noooooo noooooo

of the soldier's profession; let me assure ye that many a veteran
no noo noooooo'n nooooooooo; noo no nooooo no nooo nooo n noooooo

who has freely marched up to a battery, would quickly recoil at the
noo noo nooooo noooooo no no n noooooo, noooo noooooo nooooo no noo

apparition of the sperm whale's vast tail, fanning into eddies the air
nooooooooo no noo noooo noooo'n nooo nooo, noooooo nooo nooooo noo noo

over his head. For what are the comprehensible terrors of man compared
nooo noo nooo. Noo nooo noo noo nooooooooooooo noooooo no noo nooooooo

with the interlinked terrors and wonders of God!
nooo noo noooooooooo noooooo noo noooooo no Noo!




But, though the world scouts at us whale hunters, yet does it
Noo, nooooo noo noooo nooooo no no noooo noooooo, noo nooo no

unwittingly pay us the profoundest homage; yea, an all-abounding
noooooooooo noo no noo noooooooooo nooooo; noo, no noo-noooooooo

adoration! for almost all the tapers, lamps, and candles that burn round
noooooooo! noo nooooo noo noo nooooo, noooo, noo noooooo nooo nooo noooo

the globe, burn, as before so many shrines, to our glory!
noo noooo, nooo, no nooooo no nooo noooooo, no noo noooo!




But look at this matter in other lights; weigh it in all sorts of
Noo nooo no nooo nooooo no noooo nooooo; noooo no no noo noooo no

scales; see what we whalemen are, and have been.
nooooo; noo nooo no nooooooo noo, noo nooo nooo.




Why did the Dutch in De Witt's time have admirals of their whaling
Noo noo noo Noooo no No Nooo'n nooo nooo nooooooo no noooo noooooo

fleets? Why did Louis XVI. of France, at his own personal expense, fit
nooooo? Noo noo Noooo NOO. no Nooooo, no noo noo nooooooo noooooo, noo

out whaling ships from Dunkirk, and politely invite to that town some
noo noooooo noooo nooo Noooooo, noo nooooooo nooooo no nooo nooo nooo

score or two of families from our own island of Nantucket? Why did
noooo no noo no nooooooo nooo noo noo nooooo no Noooooooo? Noo noo

Britain between the years 1750 and 1788 pay to her whalemen in bounties
Noooooo noooooo noo noooo nooo noo nooo noo no noo nooooooo no nooooooo

upwards of L1,000,000? And lastly, how comes it that we whalemen of
noooooo no NO,noo,noo? Noo nooooo, noo noooo no nooo no nooooooo no

America now outnumber all the rest of the banded whalemen in the world;
Noooooo noo noooooooo noo noo nooo no noo nooooo nooooooo no noo noooo;

sail a navy of upwards of seven hundred vessels; manned by eighteen
nooo n nooo no noooooo no noooo noooooo noooooo; nooooo no nooooooo

thousand men; yearly consuming 4,000,000 of dollars; the ships worth,
nooooooo noo; nooooo noooooooo n,noo,noo no noooooo; noo noooo noooo,

at the time of sailing, $20,000,000! and every year importing into our
no noo nooo no noooooo, $no,noo,noo! noo noooo nooo noooooooo nooo noo

harbors a well reaped harvest of $7,000,000. How comes all this, if
noooooo n nooo nooooo noooooo no $n,noo,noo. Noo noooo noo nooo, no

there be not something puissant in whaling?
noooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo no noooooo?




But this is not the half; look again.
Noo nooo no noo noo nooo; nooo noooo.




I freely assert, that the cosmopolite philosopher cannot, for his life,
N nooooo nooooo, nooo noo noooooooooo noooooooooo nooooo, noo noo nooo,

point out one single peaceful influence, which within the last sixty
noooo noo noo nooooo nooooooo noooooooo, noooo nooooo noo nooo noooo

years has operated more potentially upon the whole broad world, taken in
noooo noo nooooooo nooo noooooooooo nooo noo noooo noooo noooo, noooo no

one aggregate, than the high and mighty business of whaling. One way
noo noooooooo, nooo noo nooo noo nooooo nooooooo no noooooo. Noo noo

and another, it has begotten events so remarkable in themselves, and so
noo noooooo, no noo nooooooo nooooo no nooooooooo no nooooooooo, noo no

continuously momentous in their sequential issues, that whaling may
nooooooooooo noooooooo no noooo nooooooooo nooooo, nooo noooooo noo

well be regarded as that Egyptian mother, who bore offspring themselves
nooo no nooooooo no nooo Nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo noooooooo nooooooooo

pregnant from her womb. It would be a hopeless, endless task to
nooooooo nooo noo nooo. No noooo no n nooooooo, noooooo nooo no

catalogue all these things. Let a handful suffice. For many years past
noooooooo noo noooo nooooo. Noo n noooooo noooooo. Noo nooo noooo nooo

the whale-ship has been the pioneer in ferreting out the remotest and
noo noooo-nooo noo nooo noo noooooo no noooooooo noo noo nooooooo noo

least known parts of the earth. She has explored seas and archipelagoes
noooo noooo noooo no noo noooo. Noo noo nooooooo nooo noo noooooooooooo

which had no chart, where no Cook or Vancouver had ever sailed. If
noooo noo no noooo, noooo no Nooo no Noooooooo noo nooo nooooo. No

American and European men-of-war now peacefully ride in once savage
Nooooooo noo Nooooooo noo-no-noo noo nooooooooo nooo no nooo nooooo

harbors, let them fire salutes to the honour and glory of the
noooooo, noo nooo nooo noooooo no noo nooooo noo noooo no noo

whale-ship, which originally showed them the way, and first interpreted
noooo-nooo, noooo nooooooooo nooooo nooo noo noo, noo noooo noooooooooo

between them and the savages. They may celebrate as they will the heroes
noooooo nooo noo noo noooooo. Nooo noo noooooooo no nooo nooo noo nooooo

of Exploring Expeditions, your Cooks, your Krusensterns; but I say that
no Noooooooo Noooooooooo, nooo Noooo, nooo Nooooooooooo; noo N noo nooo

scores of anonymous Captains have sailed out of Nantucket, that were
nooooo no noooooooo Nooooooo nooo nooooo noo no Noooooooo, nooo nooo

as great, and greater than your Cook and your Krusenstern. For in their
no noooo, noo noooooo nooo nooo Nooo noo nooo Noooooooooo. Noo no noooo

succourless empty-handedness, they, in the heathenish sharked waters,
noooooooooo noooo-nooooooooo, nooo, no noo nooooooooo noooooo nooooo,

and by the beaches of unrecorded, javelin islands, battled with virgin
noo no noo noooooo no nooooooooo, noooooo noooooo, noooooo nooo nooooo

wonders and terrors that Cook with all his marines and muskets would
noooooo noo noooooo nooo Nooo nooo noo noo noooooo noo noooooo noooo

not willingly have dared. All that is made such a flourish of in the old
noo noooooooo nooo noooo. Noo nooo no nooo nooo n nooooooo no no noo noo

South Sea Voyages, those things were but the life-time commonplaces of
Noooo Noo Noooooo, noooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooo-nooo nooooooooooo no

our heroic Nantucketers. Often, adventures which Vancouver dedicates
noo nooooo Nooooooooooo. Noooo, nooooooooo noooo Noooooooo noooooooo

three chapters to, these men accounted unworthy of being set down in the
noooo nooooooo no, noooo noo noooooooo nooooooo no noooo noo nooo no noo

ship's common log. Ah, the world! Oh, the world!
nooo'n nooooo noo. No, noo noooo! No, noo noooo!




Until the whale fishery rounded Cape Horn, no commerce but colonial,
Noooo noo noooo noooooo noooooo Nooo Nooo, no nooooooo noo nooooooo,

scarcely any intercourse but colonial, was carried on between Europe and
nooooooo noo noooooooooo noo nooooooo, noo noooooo no noooooo Nooooo noo

the long line of the opulent Spanish provinces on the Pacific coast.
noo nooo nooo no noo noooooo Noooooo noooooooo no noo Noooooo noooo.

It was the whaleman who first broke through the jealous policy of the
No noo noo nooooooo noo noooo noooo noooooo noo noooooo nooooo no noo

Spanish crown, touching those colonies; and, if space permitted, it
Noooooo noooo, nooooooo noooo nooooooo; noo, no noooo noooooooo, no

might be distinctly shown how from those whalemen at last eventuated the
noooo no nooooooooo noooo noo nooo noooo nooooooo no nooo nooooooooo noo

liberation of Peru, Chili, and Bolivia from the yoke of Old Spain, and
nooooooooo no Nooo, Noooo, noo Noooooo nooo noo nooo no Noo Noooo, noo

the establishment of the eternal democracy in those parts.
noo noooooooooooo no noo noooooo noooooooo no noooo noooo.




That great America on the other side of the sphere, Australia, was given
Nooo noooo Noooooo no noo noooo nooo no noo nooooo, Noooooooo, noo noooo

to the enlightened world by the whaleman. After its first blunder-born
no noo noooooooooo noooo no noo nooooooo. Noooo noo noooo noooooo-nooo

discovery by a Dutchman, all other ships long shunned those shores
noooooooo no n Nooooooo, noo noooo noooo nooo noooooo noooo nooooo

as pestiferously barbarous; but the whale-ship touched there. The
no noooooooooooo noooooooo; noo noo noooo-nooo noooooo noooo. Noo

whale-ship is the true mother of that now mighty colony. Moreover,
noooo-nooo no noo nooo nooooo no nooo noo nooooo nooooo. Nooooooo,

in the infancy of the first Australian settlement, the emigrants were
no noo noooooo no noo noooo Nooooooooo nooooooooo, noo noooooooo nooo

several times saved from starvation by the benevolent biscuit of the
noooooo noooo noooo nooo nooooooooo no noo nooooooooo noooooo no noo

whale-ship luckily dropping an anchor in their waters. The uncounted
noooo-nooo noooooo nooooooo no nooooo no noooo nooooo. Noo noooooooo

isles of all Polynesia confess the same truth, and do commercial homage
noooo no noo Noooooooo noooooo noo nooo noooo, noo no nooooooooo nooooo

to the whale-ship, that cleared the way for the missionary and the
no noo noooo-nooo, nooo noooooo noo noo noo noo nooooooooo noo noo

merchant, and in many cases carried the primitive missionaries to their
nooooooo, noo no nooo noooo noooooo noo noooooooo nooooooooooo no noooo

first destinations. If that double-bolted land, Japan, is ever to become
noooo nooooooooooo. No nooo nooooo-nooooo nooo, Noooo, no nooo no nooooo

hospitable, it is the whale-ship alone to whom the credit will be due;
nooooooooo, no no noo noooo-nooo noooo no nooo noo nooooo nooo no noo;

for already she is on the threshold.
noo noooooo noo no no noo noooooooo.




But if, in the face of all this, you still declare that whaling has no
Noo no, no noo nooo no noo nooo, noo noooo noooooo nooo noooooo noo no

aesthetically noble associations connected with it, then am I ready to
noooooooooooo noooo nooooooooooo noooooooo nooo no, nooo no N noooo no

shiver fifty lances with you there, and unhorse you with a split helmet
nooooo noooo nooooo nooo noo noooo, noo noooooo noo nooo n noooo nooooo

every time.
noooo nooo.




The whale has no famous author, and whaling no famous chronicler, you
Noo noooo noo no nooooo nooooo, noo noooooo no nooooo nooooooooo, noo

will say.
nooo noo.




THE WHALE NO FAMOUS AUTHOR, AND WHALING NO FAMOUS CHRONICLER? Who wrote
NOO NOOOO NO NOOOOO NOOOOO, NOO NOOOOOO NO NOOOOO NOOOOOOOOO? Noo noooo

the first account of our Leviathan? Who but mighty Job! And who composed
noo noooo noooooo no noo Noooooooo? Noo noo nooooo Noo! Noo noo nooooooo

noo noooo noooooooo no n noooooo-nooooo? Noo, noo no nooo n nooooo nooo

Nooooo noo Noooo, noo, nooo noo noo noooo noo, nooo nooo noo noooo nooo

Other, the Norwegian whale-hunter of those times! And who pronounced our
Noooo, noo Noooooooo noooo-nooooo no noooo noooo! Noo noo nooooooooo noo

glowing eulogy in Parliament? Who, but Edmund Burke!
noooooo nooooo no Nooooooooo? Noo, noo Nooooo Noooo!




True enough, but then whalemen themselves are poor devils; they have no
Nooo nooooo, noo nooo nooooooo nooooooooo noo nooo nooooo; nooo nooo no

good blood in their veins.
nooo noooo no noooo noooo.




NO GOOD BLOOD IN THEIR VEINS? They have something better than royal
NO NOOO NOOOO NO NOOOO NOOOO? Nooo nooo noooooooo nooooo nooo noooo

blood there. The grandmother of Benjamin Franklin was Mary Morrel;
noooo noooo. Noo noooooooooo no Nooooooo Nooooooo noo Nooo Nooooo;

afterwards, by marriage, Mary Folger, one of the old settlers
nooooooooo, no nooooooo, Nooo Nooooo, noo no noo noo nooooooo

of Nantucket, and the ancestress to a long line of Folgers and
no Noooooooo, noo noo nooooooooo no n nooo nooo no Noooooo noo

harpooneers--all kith and kin to noble Benjamin--this day darting the
noooooooooo--noo nooo noo noo no noooo Nooooooo--nooo noo noooooo noo

barbed iron from one side of the world to the other.
nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo no noo noooo no noo noooo.




Good again; but then all confess that somehow whaling is not
Nooo noooo; noo nooo noo noooooo nooo noooooo noooooo no noo

respectable.
noooooooooo.




WHALING NOT RESPECTABLE? Whaling is imperial! By old English statutory
NOOOOOO NOO NOOOOOOOOOO? Noooooo no nooooooo! No noo Noooooo noooooooo

law, the whale is declared "a royal fish."*
noo, noo noooo no nooooooo "n noooo nooo."*




Oh, that's only nominal! The whale himself has never figured in any
No, nooo'n nooo noooooo! Noo noooo noooooo noo noooo noooooo no noo

grand imposing way.
noooo nooooooo noo.




THE WHALE NEVER FIGURED IN ANY GRAND IMPOSING WAY? In one of the mighty
NOO NOOOO NOOOO NOOOOOO NO NOO NOOOO NOOOOOOO NOO? No noo no noo nooooo

noo noooo no n noooo, noooooo noo noo noo nooo noo Nooooo noooo, nooo

noo nooo noooooooooo nooooo no noo noooooooo nooooooooo.*







*See subsequent chapters for something more on this head.
*Noo nooooooooo nooooooo noo noooooooo nooo no nooo nooo.







Grant it, since you cite it; but, say what you will, there is no real
Noooo no, noooo noo nooo no; noo, noo nooo noo nooo, noooo no no nooo

dignity in whaling.
noooooo no noooooo.




NO DIGNITY IN WHALING? The dignity of our calling the very heavens
NO NOOOOOO NO NOOOOOO? Noo noooooo no noo noooooo noo nooo noooooo

attest. Cetus is a constellation in the South! No more! Drive down your
nooooo. Noooo no n noooooooooooo no noo Noooo! No nooo! Noooo nooo nooo

hat in presence of the Czar, and take it off to Queequeg! No more! I
noo no nooooooo no noo Nooo, noo nooo no noo no Nooooooo! No nooo! N

know a man that, in his lifetime, has taken three hundred and fifty
nooo n noo nooo, no noo nooooooo, noo noooo noooo noooooo noo noooo

whales. I account that man more honourable than that great captain of
nooooo. N noooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo nooo nooo noooo noooooo no

antiquity who boasted of taking as many walled towns.
noooooooo noo noooooo no nooooo no nooo nooooo noooo.




And, as for me, if, by any possibility, there be any as yet undiscovered
Noo, no noo no, no, no noo noooooooooo, noooo no noo no noo nooooooooooo

prime thing in me; if I shall ever deserve any real repute in that small
noooo noooo no no; no N noooo nooo noooooo noo nooo nooooo no nooo noooo

noo nooo nooooo noooo noooo N noooo noo no nooooooooooo noooooooo no; no

noooooooo N noooo no nooooooo nooo, nooo noo noooo, n noo noooo nooooo

nooo nooo nooo no nooo nooo nooooo; no, no no noooo, no noooooooo, no

nooo nooooooo no noooooooo, nooo noo nooooooo NOO. no no nooo, nooo nooo
