N noooooooooooo noooooo noo noo nooooo noo noo noooo no noooooo; noo n

whale-ship was my Yale College and my Harvard.
noooo-nooo noo no Nooo Noooooo noo no Noooooo.










CHAPTER 25. Postscript.
NOOOOOO no. Nooooooooo.







In behalf of the dignity of whaling, I would fain advance naught but
No nooooo no noo noooooo no noooooo, N noooo nooo noooooo nooooo noo

substantiated facts. But after embattling his facts, an advocate who
noooooooooooo noooo. Noo noooo nooooooooo noo noooo, no nooooooo noo

should wholly suppress a not unreasonable surmise, which might
nooooo nooooo nooooooo n noo nooooooooooo noooooo, noooo noooo

tell eloquently upon his cause--such an advocate, would he not be
nooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooo--nooo no nooooooo, noooo no noo no

blameworthy?
noooooooooo?




It is well known that at the coronation of kings and queens, even modern
No no nooo noooo nooo no noo nooooooooo no noooo noo nooooo, nooo nooooo

ones, a certain curious process of seasoning them for their functions is
nooo, n noooooo noooooo noooooo no noooooooo nooo noo noooo noooooooo no

gone through. There is a saltcellar of state, so called, and there
nooo noooooo. Noooo no n nooooooooo no noooo, no nooooo, noo noooo

may be a castor of state. How they use the salt, precisely--who knows?
noo no n nooooo no noooo. Noo nooo noo noo nooo, noooooooo--noo noooo?

Certain I am, however, that a king's head is solemnly oiled at his
Noooooo N no, noooooo, nooo n nooo'n nooo no nooooooo noooo no noo

coronation, even as a head of salad. Can it be, though, that they
nooooooooo, nooo no n nooo no noooo. Noo no no, nooooo, nooo nooo

anoint it with a view of making its interior run well, as they anoint
nooooo no nooo n nooo no nooooo noo nooooooo noo nooo, no nooo nooooo

machinery? Much might be ruminated here, concerning the essential
noooooooo? Nooo noooo no noooooooo nooo, nooooooooo noo noooooooo

dignity of this regal process, because in common life we esteem but
noooooo no nooo noooo noooooo, noooooo no nooooo nooo no nooooo noo

meanly and contemptibly a fellow who anoints his hair, and palpably
nooooo noo nooooooooooo n nooooo noo noooooo noo nooo, noo nooooooo

smells of that anointing. In truth, a mature man who uses hair-oil,
nooooo no nooo noooooooo. No noooo, n nooooo noo noo nooo nooo-noo,

unless medicinally, that man has probably got a quoggy spot in him
nooooo noooooooooo, nooo noo noo nooooooo noo n nooooo nooo no noo

somewhere. As a general rule, he can't amount to much in his totality.
noooooooo. No n noooooo nooo, no noo'n nooooo no nooo no noo nooooooo.




But the only thing to be considered here, is this--what kind of oil is
Noo noo nooo noooo no no nooooooooo nooo, no nooo--nooo nooo no noo no

used at coronations? Certainly it cannot be olive oil, nor macassar oil,
nooo no noooooooooo? Noooooooo no nooooo no noooo noo, noo nooooooo noo,

nor castor oil, nor bear's oil, nor train oil, nor cod-liver oil. What
noo nooooo noo, noo nooo'n noo, noo noooo noo, noo noo-noooo noo. Nooo

then can it possibly be, but sperm oil in its unmanufactured, unpolluted
nooo noo no nooooooo no, noo noooo noo no noo nooooooooooooo, nooooooooo

state, the sweetest of all oils?
noooo, noo nooooooo no noo nooo?




Think of that, ye loyal Britons! we whalemen supply your kings and
Noooo no nooo, no noooo Noooooo! no nooooooo nooooo nooo noooo noo

queens with coronation stuff!
nooooo nooo nooooooooo noooo!










CHAPTER 26. Knights and Squires.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooo noo Noooooo.







The chief mate of the Pequod was Starbuck, a native of Nantucket, and a
Noo noooo nooo no noo Nooooo noo Nooooooo, n nooooo no Noooooooo, noo n

Quaker by descent. He was a long, earnest man, and though born on an icy
Nooooo no noooooo. No noo n nooo, noooooo noo, noo nooooo nooo no no noo

coast, seemed well adapted to endure hot latitudes, his flesh being hard
noooo, nooooo nooo noooooo no nooooo noo noooooooo, noo noooo noooo nooo

as twice-baked biscuit. Transported to the Indies, his live blood would
no noooo-noooo noooooo. Noooooooooo no noo Nooooo, noo nooo noooo noooo

not spoil like bottled ale. He must have been born in some time of
noo noooo nooo noooooo noo. No nooo nooo nooo nooo no nooo nooo no

general drought and famine, or upon one of those fast days for which
noooooo noooooo noo nooooo, no nooo noo no noooo nooo nooo noo noooo

his state is famous. Only some thirty arid summers had he seen; those
noo noooo no nooooo. Nooo nooo nooooo nooo noooooo noo no nooo; noooo

summers had dried up all his physical superfluousness. But this, his
noooooo noo noooo no noo noo nooooooo noooooooooooooo. Noo nooo, noo

thinness, so to speak, seemed no more the token of wasting anxieties and
nooooooo, no no noooo, nooooo no nooo noo noooo no noooooo noooooooo noo

cares, than it seemed the indication of any bodily blight. It was merely
noooo, nooo no nooooo noo nooooooooo no noo nooooo nooooo. No noo nooooo

the condensation of the man. He was by no means ill-looking; quite the
noo nooooooooooo no noo noo. No noo no no noooo noo-noooooo; noooo noo

contrary. His pure tight skin was an excellent fit; and closely wrapped
nooooooo. Noo nooo noooo nooo noo no noooooooo noo; noo noooooo noooooo

up in it, and embalmed with inner health and strength, like a revivified
no no no, noo nooooooo nooo noooo nooooo noo nooooooo, nooo n nooooooooo

Egyptian, this Starbuck seemed prepared to endure for long ages to come,
Nooooooo, nooo Nooooooo nooooo nooooooo no nooooo noo nooo nooo no nooo,

and to endure always, as now; for be it Polar snow or torrid sun, like
noo no nooooo nooooo, no noo; noo no no Noooo nooo no nooooo noo, nooo

a patent chronometer, his interior vitality was warranted to do well
n nooooo noooooooooo, noo nooooooo nooooooo noo noooooooo no no nooo

in all climates. Looking into his eyes, you seemed to see there the yet
no noo nooooooo. Noooooo nooo noo nooo, noo nooooo no noo noooo noo noo

lingering images of those thousand-fold perils he had calmly confronted
noooooooo nooooo no noooo nooooooo-nooo nooooo no noo nooooo nooooooooo

through life. A staid, steadfast man, whose life for the most part was a
noooooo nooo. N noooo, noooooooo noo, noooo nooo noo noo nooo nooo noo n

telling pantomime of action, and not a tame chapter of sounds. Yet, for
noooooo noooooooo no nooooo, noo noo n nooo noooooo no nooooo. Noo, noo

all his hardy sobriety and fortitude, there were certain qualities
noo noo noooo nooooooo noo noooooooo, noooo nooo noooooo noooooooo

in him which at times affected, and in some cases seemed well nigh to
no noo noooo no noooo nooooooo, noo no nooo noooo nooooo nooo nooo no

overbalance all the rest. Uncommonly conscientious for a seaman, and
noooooooooo noo noo nooo. Nooooooooo noooooooooooo noo n nooooo, noo

endued with a deep natural reverence, the wild watery loneliness of his
nooooo nooo n nooo noooooo noooooooo, noo nooo nooooo nooooooooo no noo

life did therefore strongly incline him to superstition; but to that
nooo noo noooooooo nooooooo noooooo noo no nooooooooooo; noo no nooo

sort of superstition, which in some organizations seems rather to
nooo no nooooooooooo, noooo no nooo noooooooooooo noooo nooooo no

spring, somehow, from intelligence than from ignorance. Outward portents
nooooo, noooooo, nooo nooooooooooo nooo nooo noooooooo. Noooooo nooooooo

and inward presentiments were his. And if at times these things bent the
noo nooooo noooooooooooo nooo noo. Noo no no noooo noooo nooooo nooo noo

welded iron of his soul, much more did his far-away domestic memories
nooooo nooo no noo nooo, nooo nooo noo noo noo-nooo nooooooo nooooooo

of his young Cape wife and child, tend to bend him still more from the
no noo noooo Nooo nooo noo noooo, nooo no nooo noo noooo nooo nooo noo

original ruggedness of his nature, and open him still further to those
nooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo, noo nooo noo noooo noooooo no noooo

latent influences which, in some honest-hearted men, restrain the gush
nooooo nooooooooo noooo, no nooo nooooo-noooooo noo, nooooooo noo nooo

of dare-devil daring, so often evinced by others in the more perilous
no nooo-noooo nooooo, no noooo noooooo no nooooo no noo nooo nooooooo

vicissitudes of the fishery. "I will have no man in my boat," said
nooooooooooo no noo noooooo. "N nooo nooo no noo no no nooo," nooo

Starbuck, "who is not afraid of a whale." By this, he seemed to mean,
Nooooooo, "noo no noo nooooo no n noooo." No nooo, no nooooo no nooo,

not only that the most reliable and useful courage was that which arises
noo nooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo noo nooooo noooooo noo nooo noooo nooooo

from the fair estimation of the encountered peril, but that an utterly
nooo noo nooo nooooooooo no noo noooooooooo noooo, noo nooo no noooooo

fearless man is a far more dangerous comrade than a coward.
nooooooo noo no n noo nooo noooooooo noooooo nooo n nooooo.




"Aye, aye," said Stubb, the second mate, "Starbuck, there, is as careful
"Noo, noo," nooo Noooo, noo nooooo nooo, "Nooooooo, noooo, no no noooooo

a man as you'll find anywhere in this fishery." But we shall ere long
n noo no noo'no nooo nooooooo no nooo noooooo." Noo no noooo noo nooo

see what that word "careful" precisely means when used by a man like
noo nooo nooo nooo "noooooo" noooooooo noooo nooo nooo no n noo nooo

Stubb, or almost any other whale hunter.
Noooo, no nooooo noo noooo noooo nooooo.




Starbuck was no crusader after perils; in him courage was not a
Nooooooo noo no nooooooo noooo nooooo; no noo noooooo noo noo n

sentiment; but a thing simply useful to him, and always at hand upon all
noooooooo; noo n noooo nooooo nooooo no noo, noo nooooo no nooo nooo noo

mortally practical occasions. Besides, he thought, perhaps, that in this
nooooooo noooooooo noooooooo. Noooooo, no noooooo, noooooo, nooo no nooo

business of whaling, courage was one of the great staple outfits of
nooooooo no noooooo, noooooo noo noo no noo noooo nooooo noooooo no

the ship, like her beef and her bread, and not to be foolishly wasted.
noo nooo, nooo noo nooo noo noo noooo, noo noo no no noooooooo nooooo.

Wherefore he had no fancy for lowering for whales after sun-down; nor
Noooooooo no noo no noooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo noooo noo-nooo; noo

for persisting in fighting a fish that too much persisted in fighting
noo nooooooooo no nooooooo n nooo nooo noo nooo noooooooo no nooooooo

him. For, thought Starbuck, I am here in this critical ocean to kill
noo. Noo, noooooo Nooooooo, N no nooo no nooo nooooooo noooo no nooo

whales for my living, and not to be killed by them for theirs; and that
nooooo noo no nooooo, noo noo no no nooooo no nooo noo nooooo; noo nooo

hundreds of men had been so killed Starbuck well knew. What doom was
nooooooo no noo noo nooo no nooooo Nooooooo nooo nooo. Nooo nooo noo

his own father's? Where, in the bottomless deeps, could he find the torn
noo noo nooooo'n? Noooo, no noo nooooooooo noooo, noooo no nooo noo nooo

limbs of his brother?
noooo no noo noooooo?




With memories like these in him, and, moreover, given to a certain
Nooo nooooooo nooo noooo no noo, noo, nooooooo, noooo no n noooooo

superstitiousness, as has been said; the courage of this Starbuck which
noooooooooooooooo, no noo nooo nooo; noo noooooo no nooo Nooooooo noooo

could, nevertheless, still flourish, must indeed have been extreme. But
noooo, nooooooooooo, noooo nooooooo, nooo nooooo nooo nooo noooooo. Noo

it was not in reasonable nature that a man so organized, and with such
no noo noo no nooooooooo nooooo nooo n noo no noooooooo, noo nooo nooo

terrible experiences and remembrances as he had; it was not in nature
nooooooo noooooooooo noo nooooooooooo no no noo; no noo noo no nooooo

that these things should fail in latently engendering an element in
nooo noooo nooooo nooooo nooo no nooooooo noooooooooo no noooooo no

him, which, under suitable circumstances, would break out from its
noo, noooo, noooo nooooooo noooooooooooo, noooo noooo noo nooo noo

confinement, and burn all his courage up. And brave as he might be, it
noooooooooo, noo nooo noo noo noooooo no. Noo noooo no no noooo no, no

was that sort of bravery chiefly, visible in some intrepid men, which,
noo nooo nooo no noooooo noooooo, noooooo no nooo nooooooo noo, noooo,

while generally abiding firm in the conflict with seas, or winds, or
noooo noooooooo noooooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooo nooo, no noooo, no

whales, or any of the ordinary irrational horrors of the world, yet
nooooo, no noo no noo nooooooo nooooooooo noooooo no noo noooo, noo

cannot withstand those more terrific, because more spiritual terrors,
nooooo noooooooo noooo nooo nooooooo, noooooo nooo noooooooo noooooo,

which sometimes menace you from the concentrating brow of an enraged and
noooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo noo noooooooooooo nooo no no noooooo noo

mighty man.
nooooo noo.




But were the coming narrative to reveal in any instance, the complete
Noo nooo noo nooooo noooooooo no nooooo no noo nooooooo, noo nooooooo

abasement of poor Starbuck's fortitude, scarce might I have the heart to
noooooooo no nooo Nooooooo'n noooooooo, nooooo noooo N nooo noo noooo no

write it; for it is a thing most sorrowful, nay shocking, to expose
noooo no; noo no no n noooo nooo noooooooo, noo nooooooo, no nooooo

the fall of valour in the soul. Men may seem detestable as joint
noo nooo no nooooo no noo nooo. Noo noo nooo nooooooooo no noooo

stock-companies and nations; knaves, fools, and murderers there may be;
noooo-noooooooo noo noooooo; nooooo, noooo, noo noooooooo noooo noo no;

men may have mean and meagre faces; but man, in the ideal, is so noble
noo noo nooo nooo noo nooooo noooo; noo noo, no noo noooo, no no noooo

and so sparkling, such a grand and glowing creature, that over any
noo no noooooooo, nooo n noooo noo noooooo nooooooo, nooo nooo noo

ignominious blemish in him all his fellows should run to throw their
noooooooooo noooooo no noo noo noo noooooo nooooo noo no noooo noooo

costliest robes. That immaculate manliness we feel within ourselves,
noooooooo noooo. Nooo nooooooooo noooooooo no nooo nooooo noooooooo,

so far within us, that it remains intact though all the outer character
no noo nooooo no, nooo no noooooo nooooo nooooo noo noo noooo noooooooo

seem gone; bleeds with keenest anguish at the undraped spectacle of
nooo nooo; nooooo nooo noooooo noooooo no noo nooooooo noooooooo no

a valor-ruined man. Nor can piety itself, at such a shameful sight,
n noooo-nooooo noo. Noo noo noooo nooooo, no nooo n nooooooo noooo,

completely stifle her upbraidings against the permitting stars. But this
nooooooooo nooooo noo noooooooooo noooooo noo nooooooooo noooo. Noo nooo

august dignity I treat of, is not the dignity of kings and robes, but
nooooo noooooo N noooo no, no noo noo noooooo no noooo noo noooo, noo

that abounding dignity which has no robed investiture. Thou shalt see it
nooo noooooooo noooooo noooo noo no noooo noooooooooo. Nooo noooo noo no

shining in the arm that wields a pick or drives a spike; that democratic
noooooo no noo noo nooo nooooo n nooo no nooooo n noooo; nooo nooooooooo

dignity which, on all hands, radiates without end from God; Himself! The
noooooo noooo, no noo noooo, nooooooo noooooo noo nooo Noo; Noooooo! Noo

great God absolute! The centre and circumference of all democracy! His
noooo Noo nooooooo! Noo nooooo noo noooooooooooo no noo noooooooo! Noo

omnipresence, our divine equality!
nooooooooooo, noo nooooo nooooooo!




If, then, to meanest mariners, and renegades and castaways, I shall
No, nooo, no noooooo nooooooo, noo noooooooo noo noooooooo, N noooo

hereafter ascribe high qualities, though dark; weave round them tragic
noooooooo noooooo nooo noooooooo, nooooo nooo; noooo noooo nooo nooooo

graces; if even the most mournful, perchance the most abased, among them
nooooo; no nooo noo nooo nooooooo, noooooooo noo nooo nooooo, noooo nooo

all, shall at times lift himself to the exalted mounts; if I shall touch
noo, noooo no noooo nooo noooooo no noo noooooo nooooo; no N noooo noooo

that workman's arm with some ethereal light; if I shall spread a rainbow
nooo noooooo'n noo nooo nooo nooooooo noooo; no N noooo nooooo n noooooo

over his disastrous set of sun; then against all mortal critics bear
nooo noo nooooooooo noo no noo; nooo noooooo noo nooooo noooooo nooo

me out in it, thou Just Spirit of Equality, which hast spread one royal
no noo no no, nooo Nooo Nooooo no Nooooooo, noooo nooo nooooo noo noooo

mantle of humanity over all my kind! Bear me out in it, thou great
nooooo no nooooooo nooo noo no nooo! Nooo no noo no no, nooo noooo

democratic God! who didst not refuse to the swart convict, Bunyan, the
nooooooooo Noo! noo noooo noo nooooo no noo noooo noooooo, Nooooo, noo

pale, poetic pearl; Thou who didst clothe with doubly hammered leaves
nooo, nooooo noooo; Nooo noo noooo nooooo nooo nooooo nooooooo nooooo

of finest gold, the stumped and paupered arm of old Cervantes; Thou who
no nooooo nooo, noo noooooo noo nooooooo noo no noo Noooooooo; Nooo noo

didst pick up Andrew Jackson from the pebbles; who didst hurl him upon a
noooo nooo no Nooooo Noooooo nooo noo noooooo; noo noooo nooo noo nooo n

war-horse; who didst thunder him higher than a throne! Thou who, in all
noo-noooo; noo noooo noooooo noo nooooo nooo n nooooo! Nooo noo, no noo

Thy mighty, earthly marchings, ever cullest Thy selectest champions from
Noo nooooo, noooooo noooooooo, nooo noooooo Noo noooooooo noooooooo nooo

the kingly commons; bear me out in it, O God!
noo nooooo noooooo; nooo no noo no no, N Noo!










CHAPTER 27. Knights and Squires.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooo noo Noooooo.







Stubb was the second mate. He was a native of Cape Cod; and hence,
Noooo noo noo nooooo nooo. No noo n nooooo no Nooo Noo; noo noooo,

according to local usage, was called a Cape-Cod-man. A happy-go-lucky;
noooooooo no noooo noooo, noo nooooo n Nooo-Noo-noo. N noooo-no-noooo;

neither craven nor valiant; taking perils as they came with an
noooooo nooooo noo noooooo; nooooo nooooo no nooo nooo nooo no

indifferent air; and while engaged in the most imminent crisis of the
noooooooooo noo; noo noooo noooooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooooo no noo

chase, toiling away, calm and collected as a journeyman joiner engaged
noooo, noooooo nooo, nooo noo noooooooo no n nooooooooo nooooo noooooo

for the year. Good-humored, easy, and careless, he presided over his
noo noo nooo. Nooo-noooooo, nooo, noo nooooooo, no nooooooo nooo noo

whale-boat as if the most deadly encounter were but a dinner, and his
noooo-nooo no no noo nooo nooooo noooooooo nooo noo n nooooo, noo noo

crew all invited guests. He was as particular about the comfortable
nooo noo noooooo nooooo. No noo no nooooooooo noooo noo noooooooooo

arrangement of his part of the boat, as an old stage-driver is about the
noooooooooo no noo nooo no noo nooo, no no noo noooo-nooooo no noooo noo

snugness of his box. When close to the whale, in the very death-lock of
nooooooo no noo noo. Nooo noooo no noo noooo, no noo nooo noooo-nooo no

the fight, he handled his unpitying lance coolly and off-handedly, as
noo noooo, no noooooo noo noooooooo noooo nooooo noo noo-nooooooo, no

a whistling tinker his hammer. He would hum over his old rigadig tunes
n noooooooo nooooo noo nooooo. No noooo noo nooo noo noo noooooo noooo

while flank and flank with the most exasperated monster. Long usage had,
noooo noooo noo noooo nooo noo nooo noooooooooo noooooo. Nooo noooo noo,

for this Stubb, converted the jaws of death into an easy chair. What he
noo nooo Noooo, noooooooo noo nooo no noooo nooo no nooo noooo. Nooo no

thought of death itself, there is no telling. Whether he ever thought of
noooooo no noooo nooooo, noooo no no noooooo. Noooooo no nooo noooooo no

it at all, might be a question; but, if he ever did chance to cast his
no no noo, noooo no n nooooooo; noo, no no nooo noo nooooo no nooo noo

mind that way after a comfortable dinner, no doubt, like a good sailor,
nooo nooo noo noooo n noooooooooo nooooo, no noooo, nooo n nooo nooooo,

he took it to be a sort of call of the watch to tumble aloft, and bestir
no nooo no no no n nooo no nooo no noo noooo no nooooo noooo, noo nooooo

themselves there, about something which he would find out when he obeyed
nooooooooo noooo, noooo noooooooo noooo no noooo nooo noo nooo no nooooo

the order, and not sooner.
noo noooo, noo noo nooooo.




What, perhaps, with other things, made Stubb such an easy-going,
Nooo, noooooo, nooo noooo nooooo, nooo Noooo nooo no nooo-noooo,

unfearing man, so cheerily trudging off with the burden of life in a
noooooooo noo, no nooooooo nooooooo noo nooo noo nooooo no nooo no n

world full of grave pedlars, all bowed to the ground with their packs;
noooo nooo no noooo noooooo, noo noooo no noo nooooo nooo noooo noooo;

what helped to bring about that almost impious good-humor of his; that
nooo nooooo no noooo noooo nooo nooooo noooooo nooo-noooo no noo; nooo

thing must have been his pipe. For, like his nose, his short, black
noooo nooo nooo nooo noo nooo. Noo, nooo noo nooo, noo noooo, noooo

little pipe was one of the regular features of his face. You would
nooooo nooo noo noo no noo noooooo nooooooo no noo nooo. Noo noooo

almost as soon have expected him to turn out of his bunk without his
nooooo no nooo nooo nooooooo noo no nooo noo no noo nooo noooooo noo

nose as without his pipe. He kept a whole row of pipes there ready
nooo no noooooo noo nooo. No nooo n noooo noo no noooo noooo noooo

loaded, stuck in a rack, within easy reach of his hand; and, whenever he
nooooo, noooo no n nooo, nooooo nooo noooo no noo nooo; noo, nooooooo no

turned in, he smoked them all out in succession, lighting one from
nooooo no, no nooooo nooo noo noo no nooooooooo, nooooooo noo nooo

the other to the end of the chapter; then loading them again to be in
noo noooo no noo noo no noo noooooo; nooo noooooo nooo noooo no no no

readiness anew. For, when Stubb dressed, instead of first putting his
noooooooo nooo. Noo, nooo Noooo noooooo, noooooo no noooo noooooo noo

legs into his trowsers, he put his pipe into his mouth.
nooo nooo noo nooooooo, no noo noo nooo nooo noo noooo.




I say this continual smoking must have been one cause, at least, of his
N noo nooo noooooooo noooooo nooo nooo nooo noo noooo, no noooo, no noo

peculiar disposition; for every one knows that this earthly air, whether
nooooooo noooooooooo; noo noooo noo noooo nooo nooo noooooo noo, noooooo

ashore or afloat, is terribly infected with the nameless miseries of
nooooo no nooooo, no nooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooooo no

the numberless mortals who have died exhaling it; and as in time of the
noo nooooooooo noooooo noo nooo nooo nooooooo no; noo no no nooo no noo

cholera, some people go about with a camphorated handkerchief to their
noooooo, nooo nooooo no noooo nooo n noooooooooo nooooooooooo no noooo

mouths; so, likewise, against all mortal tribulations, Stubb's tobacco
nooooo; no, nooooooo, noooooo noo nooooo nooooooooooo, Noooo'n noooooo

smoke might have operated as a sort of disinfecting agent.
noooo noooo nooo nooooooo no n nooo no nooooooooooo noooo.




The third mate was Flask, a native of Tisbury, in Martha's Vineyard. A
Noo noooo nooo noo Noooo, n nooooo no Noooooo, no Nooooo'n Nooooooo. N

short, stout, ruddy young fellow, very pugnacious concerning whales,
noooo, noooo, noooo noooo nooooo, nooo nooooooooo nooooooooo nooooo,

who somehow seemed to think that the great leviathans had personally
noo noooooo nooooo no noooo nooo noo noooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo

and hereditarily affronted him; and therefore it was a sort of point of
noo nooooooooooo noooooooo noo; noo noooooooo no noo n nooo no noooo no

honour with him, to destroy them whenever encountered. So utterly lost
nooooo nooo noo, no noooooo nooo nooooooo noooooooooo. No noooooo nooo

was he to all sense of reverence for the many marvels of their majestic
noo no no noo noooo no noooooooo noo noo nooo noooooo no noooo nooooooo

bulk and mystic ways; and so dead to anything like an apprehension of
nooo noo nooooo nooo; noo no nooo no nooooooo nooo no nooooooooooo no

any possible danger from encountering them; that in his poor opinion,
noo nooooooo nooooo nooo nooooooooooo nooo; nooo no noo nooo noooooo,

the wondrous whale was but a species of magnified mouse, or at least
noo nooooooo noooo noo noo n noooooo no noooooooo noooo, no no noooo

water-rat, requiring only a little circumvention and some small
noooo-noo, noooooooo nooo n nooooo noooooooooooo noo nooo noooo

application of time and trouble in order to kill and boil. This
noooooooooo no nooo noo noooooo no noooo no nooo noo nooo. Nooo

ignorant, unconscious fearlessness of his made him a little waggish in
nooooooo, noooooooooo nooooooooooo no noo nooo noo n nooooo noooooo no

the matter of whales; he followed these fish for the fun of it; and a
noo nooooo no nooooo; no nooooooo noooo nooo noo noo noo no no; noo n

three years' voyage round Cape Horn was only a jolly joke that lasted
noooo noooo' nooooo noooo Nooo Nooo noo nooo n noooo nooo nooo nooooo

that length of time. As a carpenter's nails are divided into wrought
nooo nooooo no nooo. No n noooooooo'n noooo noo noooooo nooo noooooo

nails and cut nails; so mankind may be similarly divided. Little Flask
noooo noo noo noooo; no noooooo noo no noooooooo noooooo. Nooooo Noooo

was one of the wrought ones; made to clinch tight and last long. They
noo noo no noo noooooo nooo; nooo no nooooo noooo noo nooo nooo. Nooo

called him King-Post on board of the Pequod; because, in form, he could
nooooo noo Nooo-Nooo no noooo no noo Nooooo; noooooo, no nooo, no noooo

be well likened to the short, square timber known by that name in Arctic
no nooo noooooo no noo noooo, nooooo nooooo noooo no nooo nooo no Nooooo

whalers; and which by the means of many radiating side timbers inserted
noooooo; noo noooo no noo noooo no nooo noooooooo nooo noooooo nooooooo

into it, serves to brace the ship against the icy concussions of those
nooo no, nooooo no noooo noo nooo noooooo noo noo noooooooooo no noooo

battering seas.
noooooooo nooo.




Now these three mates--Starbuck, Stubb, and Flask, were momentous
Noo noooo noooo noooo--Nooooooo, Noooo, noo Noooo, nooo noooooooo

men. They it was who by universal prescription commanded three of the
noo. Nooo no noo noo no noooooooo nooooooooooo noooooooo noooo no noo

Pequod's boats as headsmen. In that grand order of battle in which
Nooooo'n noooo no nooooooo. No nooo noooo noooo no nooooo no noooo

Captain Ahab would probably marshal his forces to descend on the whales,
Noooooo Nooo noooo nooooooo noooooo noo nooooo no noooooo no noo nooooo,

these three headsmen were as captains of companies. Or, being armed with
noooo noooo nooooooo nooo no nooooooo no noooooooo. No, noooo noooo nooo

their long keen whaling spears, they were as a picked trio of lancers;
noooo nooo nooo noooooo nooooo, nooo nooo no n nooooo nooo no noooooo;

even as the harpooneers were flingers of javelins.
nooo no noo noooooooooo nooo nooooooo no nooooooo.




And since in this famous fishery, each mate or headsman, like a Gothic
Noo noooo no nooo nooooo noooooo, nooo nooo no nooooooo, nooo n Nooooo

Knight of old, is always accompanied by his boat-steerer or harpooneer,
Nooooo no noo, no nooooo noooooooooo no noo nooo-noooooo no nooooooooo,

who in certain conjunctures provides him with a fresh lance, when
noo no noooooo nooooooooooo nooooooo noo nooo n noooo noooo, nooo

the former one has been badly twisted, or elbowed in the assault; and
noo nooooo noo noo nooo noooo noooooo, no noooooo no noo noooooo; noo

moreover, as there generally subsists between the two, a close intimacy
nooooooo, no noooo noooooooo nooooooo noooooo noo noo, n noooo nooooooo

and friendliness; it is therefore but meet, that in this place we set
noo nooooooooooo; no no noooooooo noo nooo, nooo no nooo noooo no noo

down who the Pequod's harpooneers were, and to what headsman each of
nooo noo noo Nooooo'n noooooooooo nooo, noo no nooo nooooooo nooo no

them belonged.
nooo nooooooo.




First of all was Queequeg, whom Starbuck, the chief mate, had selected
Noooo no noo noo Nooooooo, nooo Nooooooo, noo noooo nooo, noo nooooooo

for his squire. But Queequeg is already known.
noo noo nooooo. Noo Nooooooo no noooooo noooo.




Next was Tashtego, an unmixed Indian from Gay Head, the most westerly
Nooo noo Nooooooo, no noooooo Nooooo nooo Noo Nooo, noo nooo nooooooo

promontory of Martha's Vineyard, where there still exists the last
nooooooooo no Nooooo'n Nooooooo, noooo noooo noooo nooooo noo nooo

remnant of a village of red men, which has long supplied the neighboring
noooooo no n noooooo no noo noo, noooo noo nooo nooooooo noo noooooooooo

island of Nantucket with many of her most daring harpooneers. In the
nooooo no Noooooooo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooooo noooooooooo. No noo

fishery, they usually go by the generic name of Gay-Headers. Tashtego's
noooooo, nooo noooooo no no noo noooooo nooo no Noo-Noooooo. Nooooooo'n

long, lean, sable hair, his high cheek bones, and black rounding
nooo, nooo, noooo nooo, noo nooo noooo noooo, noo noooo nooooooo

eyes--for an Indian, Oriental in their largeness, but Antarctic in their
nooo--noo no Nooooo, Nooooooo no noooo noooooooo, noo Noooooooo no noooo

glittering expression--all this sufficiently proclaimed him an inheritor
nooooooooo nooooooooo--noo nooo nooooooooooo nooooooooo noo no noooooooo

of the unvitiated blood of those proud warrior hunters, who, in quest
no noo nooooooooo noooo no noooo noooo noooooo noooooo, noo, no noooo

of the great New England moose, had scoured, bow in hand, the aboriginal
no noo noooo Noo Noooooo noooo, noo noooooo, noo no nooo, noo nooooooooo

forests of the main. But no longer snuffing in the trail of the wild
noooooo no noo nooo. Noo no nooooo nooooooo no noo noooo no noo nooo

beasts of the woodland, Tashtego now hunted in the wake of the great
nooooo no noo nooooooo, Nooooooo noo nooooo no noo nooo no noo noooo

whales of the sea; the unerring harpoon of the son fitly replacing the
nooooo no noo noo; noo nooooooo noooooo no noo noo noooo noooooooo noo

infallible arrow of the sires. To look at the tawny brawn of his lithe
nooooooooo noooo no noo noooo. No nooo no noo noooo noooo no noo noooo

snaky limbs, you would almost have credited the superstitions of some of
noooo noooo, noo noooo nooooo nooo nooooooo noo noooooooooooo no nooo no

the earlier Puritans, and half-believed this wild Indian to be a son
noo noooooo Nooooooo, noo nooo-nooooooo nooo nooo Nooooo no no n noo

of the Prince of the Powers of the Air. Tashtego was Stubb the second
no noo Nooooo no noo Nooooo no noo Noo. Nooooooo noo Noooo noo nooooo

mate's squire.
nooo'n nooooo.




Third among the harpooneers was Daggoo, a gigantic, coal-black
Noooo noooo noo noooooooooo noo Nooooo, n nooooooo, nooo-noooo

negro-savage, with a lion-like tread--an Ahasuerus to behold. Suspended
noooo-nooooo, nooo n nooo-nooo noooo--no Noooooooo no nooooo. Noooooooo

from his ears were two golden hoops, so large that the sailors called
nooo noo nooo nooo noo nooooo noooo, no noooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo

them ring-bolts, and would talk of securing the top-sail halyards to
nooo nooo-noooo, noo noooo nooo no nooooooo noo noo-nooo nooooooo no

them. In his youth Daggoo had voluntarily shipped on board of a whaler,
nooo. No noo noooo Nooooo noo noooooooooo noooooo no noooo no n nooooo,

lying in a lonely bay on his native coast. And never having been
noooo no n nooooo noo no noo nooooo noooo. Noo noooo nooooo nooo

anywhere in the world but in Africa, Nantucket, and the pagan harbors
nooooooo no noo noooo noo no Nooooo, Noooooooo, noo noo noooo noooooo

most frequented by whalemen; and having now led for many years the bold
nooo nooooooooo no nooooooo; noo nooooo noo noo noo nooo noooo noo nooo

life of the fishery in the ships of owners uncommonly heedful of what
nooo no noo noooooo no noo noooo no nooooo nooooooooo noooooo no nooo

manner of men they shipped; Daggoo retained all his barbaric virtues,
nooooo no noo nooo noooooo; Nooooo nooooooo noo noo nooooooo noooooo,

and erect as a giraffe, moved about the decks in all the pomp of six
noo noooo no n noooooo, noooo noooo noo noooo no noo noo nooo no noo

feet five in his socks. There was a corporeal humility in looking up at
nooo nooo no noo noooo. Noooo noo n noooooooo nooooooo no noooooo no no

him; and a white man standing before him seemed a white flag come to
noo; noo n noooo noo nooooooo nooooo noo nooooo n noooo nooo nooo no

beg truce of a fortress. Curious to tell, this imperial negro, Ahasuerus
noo noooo no n nooooooo. Noooooo no nooo, nooo nooooooo noooo, Noooooooo

Daggoo, was the Squire of little Flask, who looked like a chess-man
Nooooo, noo noo Nooooo no nooooo Noooo, noo nooooo nooo n noooo-noo

beside him. As for the residue of the Pequod's company, be it said, that
nooooo noo. No noo noo noooooo no noo Nooooo'n noooooo, no no nooo, nooo

at the present day not one in two of the many thousand men before the
no noo noooooo noo noo noo no noo no noo nooo nooooooo noo nooooo noo

mast employed in the American whale fishery, are Americans born, though
nooo nooooooo no noo Nooooooo noooo noooooo, noo Noooooooo nooo, nooooo

pretty nearly all the officers are. Herein it is the same with the
nooooo nooooo noo noo nooooooo noo. Nooooo no no noo nooo nooo noo

American whale fishery as with the American army and military and
Nooooooo noooo noooooo no nooo noo Nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo noo

merchant navies, and the engineering forces employed in the construction
nooooooo nooooo, noo noo noooooooooo nooooo nooooooo no noo nooooooooooo

of the American Canals and Railroads. The same, I say, because in all
no noo Nooooooo Nooooo noo Noooooooo. Noo nooo, N noo, noooooo no noo

these cases the native American liberally provides the brains, the rest
noooo noooo noo nooooo Nooooooo noooooooo nooooooo noo nooooo, noo nooo

of the world as generously supplying the muscles. No small number of
no noo noooo no nooooooooo noooooooo noo noooooo. No noooo nooooo no

these whaling seamen belong to the Azores, where the outward bound
noooo noooooo nooooo nooooo no noo Nooooo, noooo noo noooooo noooo

Nantucket whalers frequently touch to augment their crews from the hardy
Noooooooo noooooo nooooooooo noooo no noooooo noooo noooo nooo noo noooo

peasants of those rocky shores. In like manner, the Greenland whalers
nooooooo no noooo noooo nooooo. No nooo nooooo, noo Noooooooo noooooo

sailing out of Hull or London, put in at the Shetland Islands, to
noooooo noo no Nooo no Nooooo, noo no no noo Nooooooo Noooooo, no

receive the full complement of their crew. Upon the passage homewards,
noooooo noo nooo nooooooooo no noooo nooo. Nooo noo noooooo noooooooo,

they drop them there again. How it is, there is no telling, but
nooo nooo nooo noooo noooo. Noo no no, noooo no no noooooo, noo

Islanders seem to make the best whalemen. They were nearly all Islanders
Noooooooo nooo no nooo noo nooo nooooooo. Nooo nooo nooooo noo Noooooooo

in the Pequod, ISOLATOES too, I call such, not acknowledging the common
no noo Nooooo, NOOOOOOOO noo, N nooo nooo, noo noooooooooooo noo nooooo

continent of men, but each ISOLATO living on a separate continent of his
noooooooo no noo, noo nooo NOOOOOO nooooo no n nooooooo noooooooo no noo

own. Yet now, federated along one keel, what a set these Isolatoes were!
noo. Noo noo, noooooooo noooo noo nooo, nooo n noo noooo Noooooooo nooo!

An Anacharsis Clootz deputation from all the isles of the sea, and all
No Nooooooooo Nooooo nooooooooo nooo noo noo noooo no noo noo, noo noo

the ends of the earth, accompanying Old Ahab in the Pequod to lay the
noo nooo no noo noooo, nooooooooooo Noo Nooo no noo Nooooo no noo noo

world's grievances before that bar from which not very many of them ever
noooo'n nooooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooo noooo noo nooo nooo no nooo nooo

come back. Black Little Pip--he never did--oh, no! he went before. Poor
nooo nooo. Noooo Nooooo Noo--no noooo noo--no, no! no nooo nooooo. Nooo

Alabama boy! On the grim Pequod's forecastle, ye shall ere long see him,
Noooooo noo! No noo nooo Nooooo'n nooooooooo, no noooo noo nooo noo noo,

beating his tambourine; prelusive of the eternal time, when sent for,
noooooo noo nooooooooo; noooooooo no noo noooooo nooo, nooo nooo noo,

to the great quarter-deck on high, he was bid strike in with angels, and
no noo noooo noooooo-nooo no nooo, no noo noo nooooo no nooo nooooo, noo

beat his tambourine in glory; called a coward here, hailed a hero there!
nooo noo nooooooooo no noooo; nooooo n nooooo nooo, nooooo n nooo noooo!










CHAPTER 28. Ahab.
NOOOOOO no. Nooo.







For several days after leaving Nantucket, nothing above hatches was seen
Noo noooooo nooo noooo noooooo Noooooooo, noooooo noooo noooooo noo nooo

of Captain Ahab. The mates regularly relieved each other at the watches,
no Noooooo Nooo. Noo noooo noooooooo nooooooo nooo noooo no noo noooooo,

and for aught that could be seen to the contrary, they seemed to be the
noo noo noooo nooo noooo no nooo no noo nooooooo, nooo nooooo no no noo

only commanders of the ship; only they sometimes issued from the cabin
nooo nooooooooo no noo nooo; nooo nooo noooooooo nooooo nooo noo noooo

with orders so sudden and peremptory, that after all it was plain they
nooo nooooo no nooooo noo nooooooooo, nooo noooo noo no noo noooo nooo

but commanded vicariously. Yes, their supreme lord and dictator was
noo noooooooo noooooooooo. Noo, noooo noooooo nooo noo nooooooo noo

there, though hitherto unseen by any eyes not permitted to penetrate
noooo, nooooo nooooooo nooooo no noo nooo noo noooooooo no noooooooo

into the now sacred retreat of the cabin.
nooo noo noo nooooo noooooo no noo noooo.




Every time I ascended to the deck from my watches below, I instantly
Noooo nooo N nooooooo no noo nooo nooo no noooooo noooo, N noooooooo

gazed aft to mark if any strange face were visible; for my first vague
noooo noo no nooo no noo noooooo nooo nooo noooooo; noo no noooo noooo

disquietude touching the unknown captain, now in the seclusion of the
noooooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo noooooo, noo no noo noooooooo no noo

sea, became almost a perturbation. This was strangely heightened
noo, nooooo nooooo n nooooooooooo. Nooo noo noooooooo nooooooooo

at times by the ragged Elijah's diabolical incoherences uninvitedly
no noooo no noo nooooo Nooooo'n nooooooooo nooooooooooo noooooooooo

recurring to me, with a subtle energy I could not have before conceived
noooooooo no no, nooo n nooooo nooooo N noooo noo nooo nooooo noooooooo

of. But poorly could I withstand them, much as in other moods I was
no. Noo nooooo noooo N noooooooo nooo, nooo no no noooo noooo N noo

almost ready to smile at the solemn whimsicalities of that outlandish
nooooo noooo no noooo no noo nooooo nooooooooooooo no nooo nooooooooo

prophet of the wharves. But whatever it was of apprehensiveness or
noooooo no noo noooooo. Noo nooooooo no noo no nooooooooooooooo no

uneasiness--to call it so--which I felt, yet whenever I came to look
nooooooooo--no nooo no no--noooo N nooo, noo nooooooo N nooo no nooo

about me in the ship, it seemed against all warrantry to cherish such
noooo no no noo nooo, no nooooo noooooo noo noooooooo no noooooo nooo

emotions. For though the harpooneers, with the great body of the crew,
nooooooo. Noo nooooo noo noooooooooo, nooo noo noooo nooo no noo nooo,

were a far more barbaric, heathenish, and motley set than any of the
nooo n noo nooo nooooooo, nooooooooo, noo nooooo noo nooo noo no noo

tame merchant-ship companies which my previous experiences had made me
nooo nooooooo-nooo noooooooo noooo no nooooooo noooooooooo noo nooo no

acquainted with, still I ascribed this--and rightly ascribed it--to the
nooooooooo nooo, noooo N nooooooo nooo--noo noooooo nooooooo no--no noo

fierce uniqueness of the very nature of that wild Scandinavian vocation
nooooo nooooooooo no noo nooo nooooo no nooo nooo Nooooooooooo nooooooo

in which I had so abandonedly embarked. But it was especially the aspect
no noooo N noo no noooooooooo nooooooo. Noo no noo nooooooooo noo nooooo

of the three chief officers of the ship, the mates, which was most
no noo noooo noooo nooooooo no noo nooo, noo noooo, noooo noo nooo

forcibly calculated to allay these colourless misgivings, and induce
nooooooo nooooooooo no noooo noooo nooooooooo nooooooooo, noo nooooo

confidence and cheerfulness in every presentment of the voyage. Three
nooooooooo noo nooooooooooo no noooo noooooooooo no noo nooooo. Noooo

better, more likely sea-officers and men, each in his own different way,
nooooo, nooo nooooo noo-nooooooo noo noo, nooo no noo noo noooooooo noo,

could not readily be found, and they were every one of them Americans; a
noooo noo noooooo no noooo, noo nooo nooo noooo noo no nooo Noooooooo; n

Nantucketer, a Vineyarder, a Cape man. Now, it being Christmas when the
Noooooooooo, n Nooooooooo, n Nooo noo. Noo, no noooo Noooooooo nooo noo

ship shot from out her harbor, for a space we had biting Polar weather,
nooo nooo nooo noo noo nooooo, noo n noooo no noo nooooo Noooo noooooo,

though all the time running away from it to the southward; and by every
nooooo noo noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo no no noo noooooooo; noo no noooo

degree and minute of latitude which we sailed, gradually leaving that
nooooo noo nooooo no nooooooo noooo no nooooo, noooooooo noooooo nooo

merciless winter, and all its intolerable weather behind us. It was one
noooooooo nooooo, noo noo noo noooooooooo noooooo nooooo no. No noo noo

of those less lowering, but still grey and gloomy enough mornings of the
no noooo nooo nooooooo, noo noooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo nooooooo no noo

transition, when with a fair wind the ship was rushing through the water
nooooooooo, nooo nooo n nooo nooo noo nooo noo noooooo noooooo noo noooo

with a vindictive sort of leaping and melancholy rapidity, that as I
nooo n nooooooooo nooo no noooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo, nooo no N

mounted to the deck at the call of the forenoon watch, so soon as I
noooooo no noo nooo no noo nooo no noo nooooooo noooo, no nooo no N

levelled my glance towards the taffrail, foreboding shivers ran over me.
nooooooo no nooooo noooooo noo nooooooo, nooooooooo noooooo noo nooo no.

Reality outran apprehension; Captain Ahab stood upon his quarter-deck.
Noooooo nooooo nooooooooooo; Noooooo Nooo noooo nooo noo noooooo-nooo.




There seemed no sign of common bodily illness about him, nor of the
Noooo nooooo no nooo no nooooo nooooo noooooo noooo noo, noo no noo

recovery from any. He looked like a man cut away from the stake, when
nooooooo nooo noo. No nooooo nooo n noo noo nooo nooo noo noooo, nooo

the fire has overrunningly wasted all the limbs without consuming them,
noo nooo noo noooooooooooo nooooo noo noo noooo noooooo noooooooo nooo,

or taking away one particle from their compacted aged robustness. His
no nooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo noooo noooooooo nooo nooooooooo. Noo

whole high, broad form, seemed made of solid bronze, and shaped in an
noooo nooo, noooo nooo, nooooo nooo no noooo nooooo, noo nooooo no no

unalterable mould, like Cellini's cast Perseus. Threading its way out
noooooooooo noooo, nooo Noooooo'n nooo Noooooo. Noooooooo noo noo noo

from among his grey hairs, and continuing right down one side of his
nooo noooo noo nooo noooo, noo nooooooooo noooo nooo noo nooo no noo

tawny scorched face and neck, till it disappeared in his clothing,
noooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo, nooo no noooooooooo no noo nooooooo,

you saw a slender rod-like mark, lividly whitish. It resembled that
noo noo n noooooo noo-nooo nooo, noooooo noooooo. No noooooooo nooo

perpendicular seam sometimes made in the straight, lofty trunk of
noooooooooooo nooo noooooooo nooo no noo nooooooo, noooo noooo no

a great tree, when the upper lightning tearingly darts down it, and
n noooo nooo, nooo noo noooo noooooooo noooooooo noooo nooo no, noo

without wrenching a single twig, peels and grooves out the bark from top
noooooo noooooooo n nooooo nooo, noooo noo noooooo noo noo nooo nooo noo

to bottom, ere running off into the soil, leaving the tree still greenly
no nooooo, noo noooooo noo nooo noo nooo, noooooo noo nooo noooo noooooo

alive, but branded. Whether that mark was born with him, or whether it
noooo, noo noooooo. Noooooo nooo nooo noo nooo nooo noo, no noooooo no

was the scar left by some desperate wound, no one could certainly say.
noo noo nooo nooo no nooo noooooooo noooo, no noo noooo noooooooo noo.

By some tacit consent, throughout the voyage little or no allusion was
No nooo noooo noooooo, nooooooooo noo nooooo nooooo no no nooooooo noo

made to it, especially by the mates. But once Tashtego's senior, an old
nooo no no, nooooooooo no noo noooo. Noo nooo Nooooooo'n nooooo, no noo

Gay-Head Indian among the crew, superstitiously asserted that not till
Noo-Nooo Nooooo noooo noo nooo, noooooooooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo

he was full forty years old did Ahab become that way branded, and
no noo nooo noooo noooo noo noo Nooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo, noo

then it came upon him, not in the fury of any mortal fray, but in
nooo no nooo nooo noo, noo no noo nooo no noo nooooo nooo, noo no

an elemental strife at sea. Yet, this wild hint seemed inferentially
no noooooooo nooooo no noo. Noo, nooo nooo nooo nooooo noooooooooooo

negatived, by what a grey Manxman insinuated, an old sepulchral man,
noooooooo, no nooo n nooo Noooooo nooooooooo, no noo nooooooooo noo,

who, having never before sailed out of Nantucket, had never ere this
noo, nooooo noooo nooooo nooooo noo no Noooooooo, noo noooo noo nooo

laid eye upon wild Ahab. Nevertheless, the old sea-traditions, the
nooo noo nooo nooo Nooo. Nooooooooooo, noo noo noo-nooooooooo, noo

immemorial credulities, popularly invested this old Manxman with
nooooooooo noooooooooo, noooooooo nooooooo nooo noo Noooooo nooo

preternatural powers of discernment. So that no white sailor seriously
noooooooooooo nooooo no noooooooooo. No nooo no noooo nooooo noooooooo

contradicted him when he said that if ever Captain Ahab should
nooooooooooo noo nooo no nooo nooo no nooo Noooooo Nooo nooooo

be tranquilly laid out--which might hardly come to pass, so he
no nooooooooo nooo noo--noooo noooo nooooo nooo no nooo, no no

muttered--then, whoever should do that last office for the dead, would
nooooooo--nooo, noooooo nooooo no nooo nooo nooooo noo noo nooo, noooo

find a birth-mark on him from crown to sole.
nooo n noooo-nooo no noo nooo noooo no nooo.




So powerfully did the whole grim aspect of Ahab affect me, and the livid
No nooooooooo noo noo noooo nooo nooooo no Nooo nooooo no, noo noo noooo

brand which streaked it, that for the first few moments I hardly noted
noooo noooo nooooooo no, nooo noo noo noooo noo noooooo N nooooo noooo

that not a little of this overbearing grimness was owing to the barbaric
nooo noo n nooooo no nooo noooooooooo nooooooo noo noooo no noo nooooooo

white leg upon which he partly stood. It had previously come to me that
noooo noo nooo noooo no nooooo noooo. No noo nooooooooo nooo no no nooo

this ivory leg had at sea been fashioned from the polished bone of
nooo noooo noo noo no noo nooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo no

the sperm whale's jaw. "Aye, he was dismasted off Japan," said the old
noo noooo noooo'n noo. "Noo, no noo noooooooo noo Noooo," nooo noo noo

Gay-Head Indian once; "but like his dismasted craft, he shipped another
Noo-Nooo Nooooo nooo; "noo nooo noo noooooooo noooo, no noooooo noooooo

mast without coming home for it. He has a quiver of 'em."
nooo noooooo nooooo nooo noo no. No noo n nooooo no 'no."




I was struck with the singular posture he maintained. Upon each side of
N noo nooooo nooo noo nooooooo noooooo no nooooooooo. Nooo nooo nooo no

the Pequod's quarter deck, and pretty close to the mizzen shrouds, there
noo Nooooo'n noooooo nooo, noo nooooo noooo no noo nooooo noooooo, noooo

was an auger hole, bored about half an inch or so, into the plank.
noo no noooo nooo, noooo noooo nooo no nooo no no, nooo noo noooo.

His bone leg steadied in that hole; one arm elevated, and holding by a
Noo nooo noo nooooooo no nooo nooo; noo noo nooooooo, noo noooooo no n

shroud; Captain Ahab stood erect, looking straight out beyond the
nooooo; Noooooo Nooo noooo noooo, noooooo nooooooo noo nooooo noo

ship's ever-pitching prow. There was an infinity of firmest fortitude,
nooo'n nooo-nooooooo nooo. Noooo noo no nooooooo no noooooo noooooooo,

a determinate, unsurrenderable wilfulness, in the fixed and fearless,
n noooooooooo, noooooooooooooo nooooooooo, no noo noooo noo nooooooo,

forward dedication of that glance. Not a word he spoke; nor did his
noooooo nooooooooo no nooo nooooo. Noo n nooo no noooo; noo noo noo

officers say aught to him; though by all their minutest gestures
nooooooo noo noooo no noo; nooooo no noo noooo nooooooo nooooooo

and expressions, they plainly showed the uneasy, if not painful,
noo noooooooooo, nooo noooooo nooooo noo nooooo, no noo noooooo,

consciousness of being under a troubled master-eye. And not only that,
noooooooooooo no noooo noooo n nooooooo nooooo-noo. Noo noo nooo nooo,

but moody stricken Ahab stood before them with a crucifixion in his
noo noooo nooooooo Nooo noooo nooooo nooo nooo n noooooooooo no noo

face; in all the nameless regal overbearing dignity of some mighty woe.
nooo; no noo noo nooooooo noooo noooooooooo noooooo no nooo nooooo noo.




Ere long, from his first visit in the air, he withdrew into his cabin.
Noo nooo, nooo noo noooo noooo no noo noo, no nooooooo nooo noo noooo.

But after that morning, he was every day visible to the crew; either
Noo noooo nooo noooooo, no noo noooo noo noooooo no noo nooo; nooooo

standing in his pivot-hole, or seated upon an ivory stool he had; or
nooooooo no noo noooo-nooo, no nooooo nooo no noooo noooo no noo; no

heavily walking the deck. As the sky grew less gloomy; indeed, began to
noooooo noooooo noo nooo. No noo noo nooo nooo nooooo; nooooo, noooo no

grow a little genial, he became still less and less a recluse; as
nooo n nooooo nooooo, no nooooo noooo nooo noo nooo n noooooo; no

if, when the ship had sailed from home, nothing but the dead wintry
no, nooo noo nooo noo nooooo nooo nooo, noooooo noo noo nooo nooooo

bleakness of the sea had then kept him so secluded. And, by and by, it
noooooooo no noo noo noo nooo nooo noo no nooooooo. Noo, no noo no, no

came to pass, that he was almost continually in the air; but, as yet,
nooo no nooo, nooo no noo nooooo noooooooooo no noo noo; noo, no noo,

no nooooo no noooooooooo noooo no noooooo nooo. Noo noo Nooooo noo

nooo nooooo n noooooo noo; noo noooooooo nooooooo; nooooo noo noooooo

preparatives needing supervision the mates were fully competent to, so

nooooooo noooo no nooo nooooooooo nooo.




Nevertheless, ere long, the warm, warbling persuasiveness of the
Nooooooooooo, noo nooo, noo nooo, nooooooo nooooooooooooo no noo

noo nooo. Noo, no nooo noo noo-noooooo, noooooo noooo, Noooo noo Noo,

other man, would have soon flowered out in a smile.
noooo noo, noooo nooo nooo nooooooo noo no n noooo.










CHAPTER 29. Enter Ahab; to Him, Stubb.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo Nooo; no Noo, Noooo.







Some days elapsed, and ice and icebergs all astern, the Pequod now
Nooo nooo noooooo, noo noo noo nooooooo noo nooooo, noo Nooooo noo

nooo noooooo noooooo noo nooooo Noooo nooooo, noooo, no noo, nooooo

noooooooooo nooooo no noo noooooooo no noo noooooo Nooooo no noo Nooooo.

Noo nooooo nooo, noooo, noooooo, nooooooo, noooooooooo, noooooooo nooo,

nooooo nooooooooo Noooo, noo nooooo nooooooo nooo! Noo nooooooo noo,

'nooo nooo no nooooo noooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo nooooo.

Noo noo noo nooooooooo no nooo nooooooo noooooo noo noo nooooo nooo noo

noooooo.




Old age is always wakeful; as if, the longer linked with life, the less
Noo noo no nooooo noooooo; no no, noo nooooo nooooo nooo nooo, noo nooo

man has to do with aught that looks like death. Among sea-commanders,
noo noo no no nooo noooo nooo noooo nooo noooo. Noooo noo-nooooooooo,

noo noo nooooooooo nooo nooooooo noooo noooo nooooo no noooo noo

noo noooooo nooo no no no nooooooooo nooo nooooo noooooo, no no no no

grave-dug berth."
noooo-noo noooo."




So, almost every twenty-four hours, when the watches of the night were

CHAPTER 30. The Pipe.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo.







When Stubb had departed, Ahab stood for a while leaning over the
Nooo Noooo noo nooooooo, Nooo noooo noo n noooo noooooo nooo noo

bulwarks; and then, as had been usual with him of late, calling a sailor
nooooooo; noo nooo, no noo nooo noooo nooo noo no nooo, noooooo n nooooo

of the watch, he sent him below for his ivory stool, and also his pipe.
no noo noooo, no nooo noo noooo noo noo noooo noooo, noo nooo noo nooo.

Lighting the pipe at the binnacle lamp and planting the stool on the
Nooooooo noo nooo no noo nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo noo noooo no noo

weather side of the deck, he sat and smoked.
noooooo nooo no noo nooo, no noo noo nooooo.




In old Norse times, the thrones of the sea-loving Danish kings were
No noo Noooo noooo, noo noooooo no noo noo-nooooo Nooooo noooo nooo

fabricated, saith tradition, of the tusks of the narwhale. How could one
nooooooooo, noooo noooooooo, no noo noooo no noo nooooooo. Noo noooo noo

nooo no Nooo nooo, nooooo no nooo nooooo no noooo, noooooo nooooooooo

noo no noo noooooo no nooooooooo? Noo n Nooo no noo noooo, noo n nooo no

the sea, and a great lord of Leviathans was Ahab.
noo noo, noo n noooo nooo no Nooooooooo noo Nooo.




Some moments passed, during which the thick vapour came from his mouth

nooooo noooooo. No, no nooo! nooo nooo no no nooo no no noo noooo no

nooo! Nooo nooo N nooo noooooooooooo noooooo, noo nooooooooo--noo, noo

noooooooo noo noooooo no noooooo. Nooo nooooooo nooo N nooo nooo nooo?

noooo nooo noooo noooo, noo noooo nooo nooo-nooo noooo nooo nooo. N'no

noooo no nooo--"

CHAPTER 31. Queen Mab.

Next morning Stubb accosted Flask.

CHAPTER 32. Cetology.
NOOOOOO no. Nooooooo.







Already we are boldly launched upon the deep; but soon we shall be lost
Noooooo no noo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo; noo nooo no noooo no nooo

no noo nooooooo, noooooooooo noooooooooo. Noo nooo nooo no nooo; noo noo

Nooooo'n noooo nooo noooo nooo no nooo nooo noo noooooooo noooo no noo

follow.
nooooo.




It is some systematized exhibition of the whale in his broad genera,

Nooooooo," nooo Noooooo Nooooooo, N.N. nooo.

Of the names in this list of whale authors, only those following Owen

nooo noo nooooo no noo nooo. No no noo nooo no noo noooo noo noooooo

nooo noooooo noo nooo noo Noooooooo noooo, noooooo noo noooo, noo no

nooo noo noooooo no noo nooo. Noo noo nooo noo no nooo nooo noo n noo

Noooooooo noooo no noooooo,--noo noooo noooo noooo noo nooooooo!

noooooooo nooo.




Now the various species of whales need some sort of popular

Nooooo noo nooo no noo no nooo! Noo N nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo noo

nooooo noooooo nooooo; N nooo noo no no nooo nooooo nooo noooo noooooo

nooooo.




First: The uncertain, unsettled condition of this science of Cetology
Noooo: Noo noooooooo, noooooooo noooooooo no nooo noooooo no Nooooooo

is in the very vestibule attested by the fact, that in some quarters it
no no noo nooo noooooooo nooooooo no noo nooo, nooo no nooo nooooooo no

still remains a moot point whether a whale be a fish. In his System of
noooo noooooo n nooo noooo noooooo n noooo no n nooo. No noo Nooooo no

Nooooo, N.N. nooo, Nooooooo nooooooo, "N nooooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo

the fish." But of my own knowledge, I know that down to the year 1850,
noo nooo." Noo no no noo noooooooo, N nooo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooo,

sharks and shad, alewives and herring, against Linnaeus's express edict,
nooooo noo nooo, nooooooo noo noooooo, noooooo Nooooooo'n noooooo noooo,

were still found dividing the possession of the same seas with the
nooo noooo noooo nooooooo noo nooooooooo no noo nooo nooo nooo noo

Leviathan.
Noooooooo.




The grounds upon which Linnaeus would fain have banished the whales from
Noo noooooo nooo noooo Nooooooo noooo nooo nooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo

the waters, he states as follows: "On account of their warm bilocular
noo nooooo, no nooooo no noooooo: "No noooooo no noooo nooo noooooooo

heart, their lungs, their movable eyelids, their hollow ears, penem
noooo, noooo noooo, noooo noooooo noooooo, noooo nooooo nooo, noooo

noooooooo noooooo nooooo noooooooo," noo noooooo, "no nooo noooooo nooo

noooooooo." N noooooooo noo nooo no no noooooo Nooooo Noooo noo Noooooo

Coffin, of Nantucket, both messmates of mine in a certain voyage, and
Nooooo, no Noooooooo, nooo noooooooo no nooo no n noooooo nooooo, noo

they united in the opinion that the reasons set forth were altogether
nooo nooooo no noo noooooo nooo noo noooooo noo noooo nooo nooooooooo

insufficient. Charley profanely hinted they were humbug.
nooooooooooo. Noooooo noooooooo nooooo nooo nooo nooooo.




Be it known that, waiving all argument, I take the good old fashioned
No no noooo nooo, noooooo noo nooooooo, N nooo noo nooo noo noooooooo

ground that the whale is a fish, and call upon holy Jonah to back me.
nooooo nooo noo noooo no n nooo, noo nooo nooo nooo Noooo no nooo no.

This fundamental thing settled, the next point is, in what internal
Nooo noooooooooo noooo noooooo, noo nooo noooo no, no nooo nooooooo

respect does the whale differ from other fish. Above, Linnaeus has given
noooooo nooo noo noooo nooooo nooo noooo nooo. Noooo, Nooooooo noo noooo

you those items. But in brief, they are these: lungs and warm blood;
noo noooo noooo. Noo no noooo, nooo noo noooo: noooo noo nooo noooo;

whereas, all other fish are lungless and cold blooded.
noooooo, noo noooo nooo noo nooooooo noo nooo noooooo.




Next: how shall we define the whale, by his obvious externals, so as
Nooo: noo noooo no nooooo noo noooo, no noo noooooo noooooooo, no no

conspicuously to label him for all time to come? To be short, then, a
noooooooooooo no noooo noo noo noo nooo no nooo? No no noooo, nooo, n

whale is A SPOUTING FISH WITH A HORIZONTAL TAIL. There you have
noooo no N NOOOOOOO NOOO NOOO N NOOOOOOOOO NOOO. Noooo noo nooo

him. However contracted, that definition is the result of expanded
noo. Noooooo nooooooooo, nooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo no nooooooo

meditation. A walrus spouts much like a whale, but the walrus is not a
nooooooooo. N nooooo nooooo nooo nooo n noooo, noo noo nooooo no noo n

fish, because he is amphibious. But the last term of the definition is
nooo, noooooo no no nooooooooo. Noo noo nooo nooo no noo nooooooooo no

still more cogent, as coupled with the first. Almost any one must have
noooo nooo nooooo, no noooooo nooo noo noooo. Nooooo noo noo nooo nooo

noticed that all the fish familiar to landsmen have not a flat, but a
noooooo nooo noo noo nooo nooooooo no nooooooo nooo noo n nooo, noo n

vertical, or up-and-down tail. Whereas, among spouting fish the tail,
nooooooo, no no-noo-nooo nooo. Noooooo, noooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo,

though it may be similarly shaped, invariably assumes a horizontal
nooooo no noo no noooooooo nooooo, nooooooooo noooooo n nooooooooo

position.
nooooooo.




By the above definition of what a whale is, I do by no means exclude
No noo noooo nooooooooo no nooo n noooo no, N no no no noooo noooooo

from the leviathanic brotherhood any sea creature hitherto identified
nooo noo noooooooooo noooooooooo noo noo nooooooo nooooooo nooooooooo

with the whale by the best informed Nantucketers; nor, on the other
nooo noo noooo no noo nooo nooooooo Nooooooooooo; noo, no noo noooo

hand, link with it any fish hitherto authoritatively regarded as alien.*
nooo, nooo nooo no noo nooo nooooooo noooooooooooooo nooooooo no noooo.*

Hence, all the smaller, spouting, and horizontal tailed fish must be
Noooo, noo noo noooooo, nooooooo, noo nooooooooo nooooo nooo nooo no

included in this ground-plan of Cetology. Now, then, come the grand
nooooooo no nooo nooooo-nooo no Nooooooo. Noo, nooo, nooo noo noooo

divisions of the entire whale host.
noooooooo no noo nooooo noooo nooo.







*I am aware that down to the present time, the fish styled Lamatins and
*N no noooo nooo nooo no noo noooooo nooo, noo nooo nooooo Nooooooo noo

Dugongs (Pig-fish and Sow-fish of the Coffins of Nantucket) are included
Noooooo (Noo-nooo noo Noo-nooo no noo Noooooo no Noooooooo) noo nooooooo

by many naturalists among the whales. But as these pig-fish are a noisy,
no nooo noooooooooo noooo noo nooooo. Noo no noooo noo-nooo noo n noooo,

contemptible set, mostly lurking in the mouths of rivers, and feeding on
nooooooooooo noo, nooooo noooooo no noo nooooo no nooooo, noo noooooo no

wet hay, and especially as they do not spout, I deny their credentials
noo noo, noo nooooooooo no nooo no noo noooo, N nooo noooo noooooooooo

as whales; and have presented them with their passports to quit the
no nooooo; noo nooo noooooooo nooo nooo noooo noooooooo no nooo noo

Kingdom of Cetology.
Noooooo no Nooooooo.







First: According to magnitude I divide the whales into three primary
Noooo: Noooooooo no noooooooo N nooooo noo nooooo nooo noooo noooooo

BOOKS (subdivisible into CHAPTERS), and these shall comprehend them all,
NOOOO (nooooooooooo nooo NOOOOOOO), noo noooo noooo nooooooooo nooo noo,

both small and large.
nooo noooo noo noooo.




I. THE FOLIO WHALE; II. the OCTAVO WHALE; III. the DUODECIMO WHALE.
N. NOO NOOOO NOOOO; NO. noo NOOOOO NOOOO; NOO. noo NOOOOOOOO NOOOO.




As the type of the FOLIO I present the SPERM WHALE; of the OCTAVO, the
No noo nooo no noo NOOOO N noooooo noo NOOOO NOOOO; no noo NOOOOO, noo

GRAMPUS; of the DUODECIMO, the PORPOISE.
NOOOOOO; no noo NOOOOOOOO, noo NOOOOOOO.




FOLIOS. Among these I here include the following chapters:--I. The SPERM
NOOOOO. Noooo noooo N nooo noooooo noo noooooooo nooooooo:--N. Noo NOOOO

WHALE; II. the RIGHT WHALE; III. the FIN-BACK WHALE; IV. the HUMP-BACKED

BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER I. (SPERM WHALE).--This whale, among the
NOOO N. (NOOOO), NOOOOOO N. (NOOOO NOOOO).--Nooo noooo, noooo noo

English of old vaguely known as the Trumpa whale, and the Physeter
Noooooo no noo noooooo noooo no noo Nooooo noooo, noo noo Nooooooo

whale, and the Anvil Headed whale, is the present Cachalot of the
noooo, noo noo Noooo Nooooo noooo, no noo noooooo Nooooooo no noo

French, and the Pottsfich of the Germans, and the Macrocephalus of the
Nooooo, noo noo Noooooooo no noo Noooooo, noo noo Noooooooooooo no noo

Long Words. He is, without doubt, the largest inhabitant of the globe;
Nooo Noooo. No no, noooooo noooo, noo noooooo nooooooooo no noo noooo;

the most formidable of all whales to encounter; the most majestic in
noo nooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo no noooooooo; noo nooo nooooooo no

aspect; and lastly, by far the most valuable in commerce; he being
nooooo; noo nooooo, no noo noo nooo nooooooo no nooooooo; no noooo

the only creature from which that valuable substance, spermaceti, is
noo nooo nooooooo nooo noooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo, nooooooooo, no

obtained. All his peculiarities will, in many other places, be enlarged
nooooooo. Noo noo noooooooooooo nooo, no nooo noooo nooooo, no nooooooo

upon. It is chiefly with his name that I now have to do. Philologically
nooo. No no noooooo nooo noo nooo nooo N noo nooo no no. Nooooooooooooo

considered, it is absurd. Some centuries ago, when the Sperm whale was
nooooooooo, no no nooooo. Nooo noooooooo noo, nooo noo Noooo noooo noo

almost wholly unknown in his own proper individuality, and when his oil
nooooo nooooo noooooo no noo noo nooooo noooooooooooo, noo nooo noo noo

was only accidentally obtained from the stranded fish; in those days
noo nooo nooooooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo; no noooo nooo

spermaceti, it would seem, was popularly supposed to be derived from a
nooooooooo, no noooo nooo, noo noooooooo nooooooo no no noooooo nooo n

creature identical with the one then known in England as the Greenland
nooooooo noooooooo nooo noo noo nooo noooo no Noooooo no noo Noooooooo

or Right Whale. It was the idea also, that this same spermaceti was that
no Noooo Noooo. No noo noo nooo nooo, nooo nooo nooo nooooooooo noo nooo

quickening humor of the Greenland Whale which the first syllable of
nooooooooo noooo no noo Noooooooo Noooo noooo noo noooo nooooooo no

the word literally expresses. In those times, also, spermaceti was
noo nooo noooooooo noooooooo. No noooo noooo, nooo, nooooooooo noo

exceedingly scarce, not being used for light, but only as an ointment
noooooooooo nooooo, noo noooo nooo noo noooo, noo nooo no no nooooooo

and medicament. It was only to be had from the druggists as you nowadays
noo nooooooooo. No noo nooo no no noo nooo noo noooooooo no noo nooooooo

buy an ounce of rhubarb. When, as I opine, in the course of time, the
noo no noooo no noooooo. Nooo, no N noooo, no noo nooooo no nooo, noo

true nature of spermaceti became known, its original name was still
nooo nooooo no nooooooooo nooooo noooo, noo nooooooo nooo noo noooo

retained by the dealers; no doubt to enhance its value by a notion so
nooooooo no noo noooooo; no noooo no noooooo noo noooo no n nooooo no

strangely significant of its scarcity. And so the appellation must at
noooooooo noooooooooo no noo nooooooo. Noo no noo noooooooooo nooo no

last have come to be bestowed upon the whale from which this spermaceti
nooo nooo nooo no no nooooooo nooo noo noooo nooo noooo nooo nooooooooo

was really derived.
noo nooooo noooooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER II. (RIGHT WHALE).--In one respect this is the
NOOO N. (NOOOO), NOOOOOO NO. (NOOOO NOOOO).--No noo noooooo nooo no noo

most venerable of the leviathans, being the one first regularly hunted
nooo noooooooo no noo nooooooooo, noooo noo noo noooo noooooooo nooooo

by man. It yields the article commonly known as whalebone or baleen; and
no noo. No nooooo noo noooooo nooooooo noooo no noooooooo no nooooo; noo

the oil specially known as "whale oil," an inferior article in commerce.
noo noo noooooooo noooo no "noooo noo," no nooooooo noooooo no nooooooo.

Among the fishermen, he is indiscriminately designated by all the
Noooo noo noooooooo, no no nooooooooooooooo nooooooooo no noo noo

following titles: The Whale; the Greenland Whale; the Black Whale;
noooooooo nooooo: Noo Noooo; noo Noooooooo Noooo; noo Noooo Noooo;

the Great Whale; the True Whale; the Right Whale. There is a deal of
noo Noooo Noooo; noo Nooo Noooo; noo Noooo Noooo. Noooo no n nooo no

obscurity concerning the identity of the species thus multitudinously
noooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooo no noo noooooo nooo noooooooooooooo

baptised. What then is the whale, which I include in the second species
nooooooo. Nooo nooo no noo noooo, noooo N noooooo no noo nooooo noooooo

of my Folios? It is the Great Mysticetus of the English naturalists; the
no no Nooooo? No no noo Noooo Nooooooooo no noo Noooooo noooooooooo; noo

Greenland Whale of the English whalemen; the Baliene Ordinaire of the
Noooooooo Noooo no noo Noooooo nooooooo; noo Noooooo Noooooooo no noo

French whalemen; the Growlands Walfish of the Swedes. It is the whale
Nooooo nooooooo; noo Noooooooo Noooooo no noo Nooooo. No no noo noooo

which for more than two centuries past has been hunted by the Dutch and
noooo noo nooo nooo noo noooooooo nooo noo nooo nooooo no noo Noooo noo

English in the Arctic seas; it is the whale which the American fishermen
Noooooo no noo Nooooo nooo; no no noo noooo noooo noo Nooooooo noooooooo

have long pursued in the Indian ocean, on the Brazil Banks, on the Nor'
nooo nooo noooooo no noo Nooooo noooo, no noo Nooooo Noooo, no noo Noo'

West Coast, and various other parts of the world, designated by them
Nooo Noooo, noo noooooo noooo noooo no noo noooo, nooooooooo no nooo

Right Whale Cruising Grounds.
Noooo Noooo Nooooooo Noooooo.




Some pretend to see a difference between the Greenland whale of the
Nooo noooooo no noo n nooooooooo noooooo noo Noooooooo noooo no noo

English and the right whale of the Americans. But they precisely agree
Noooooo noo noo noooo noooo no noo Noooooooo. Noo nooo noooooooo noooo

in all their grand features; nor has there yet been presented a single
no noo noooo noooo nooooooo; noo noo noooo noo nooo noooooooo n nooooo

determinate fact upon which to ground a radical distinction. It is by
noooooooooo nooo nooo noooo no nooooo n noooooo noooooooooo. No no no

endless subdivisions based upon the most inconclusive differences, that
noooooo nooooooooooo noooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo noooooooooo, nooo

some departments of natural history become so repellingly intricate. The
nooo noooooooooo no noooooo noooooo nooooo no noooooooooo noooooooo. Noo

right whale will be elsewhere treated of at some length, with reference
noooo noooo nooo no noooooooo noooooo no no nooo nooooo, nooo noooooooo

to elucidating the sperm whale.
no noooooooooo noo noooo noooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER III. (FIN-BACK).--Under this head I reckon
NOOO N. (NOOOO), NOOOOOO NOO. (NOO-NOOO).--Noooo nooo nooo N nooooo

a monster which, by the various names of Fin-Back, Tall-Spout, and
n noooooo noooo, no noo noooooo noooo no Noo-Nooo, Nooo-Noooo, noo

Long-John, has been seen almost in every sea and is commonly the whale
Nooo-Nooo, noo nooo nooo nooooo no noooo noo noo no nooooooo noo noooo

whose distant jet is so often descried by passengers crossing the
noooo noooooo noo no no noooo nooooooo no nooooooooo nooooooo noo

Atlantic, in the New York packet-tracks. In the length he attains, and
Nooooooo, no noo Noo Nooo nooooo-nooooo. No noo nooooo no noooooo, noo

in his baleen, the Fin-back resembles the right whale, but is of a less
no noo nooooo, noo Noo-nooo noooooooo noo noooo noooo, noo no no n nooo

portly girth, and a lighter colour, approaching to olive. His great lips
nooooo noooo, noo n noooooo nooooo, noooooooooo no noooo. Noo noooo nooo

present a cable-like aspect, formed by the intertwisting, slanting folds
noooooo n noooo-nooo nooooo, nooooo no noo noooooooooooo, nooooooo noooo

of large wrinkles. His grand distinguishing feature, the fin, from which
no noooo nooooooo. Noo noooo nooooooooooooo noooooo, noo noo, nooo noooo

he derives his name, is often a conspicuous object. This fin is some
no noooooo noo nooo, no noooo n noooooooooo nooooo. Nooo noo no nooo

three or four feet long, growing vertically from the hinder part of the
noooo no nooo nooo nooo, noooooo nooooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo no noo

back, of an angular shape, and with a very sharp pointed end. Even if
nooo, no no noooooo noooo, noo nooo n nooo noooo noooooo noo. Nooo no

not the slightest other part of the creature be visible, this isolated
noo noo noooooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooooo no noooooo, nooo nooooooo

fin will, at times, be seen plainly projecting from the surface. When
noo nooo, no noooo, no nooo noooooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooo. Nooo

the sea is moderately calm, and slightly marked with spherical ripples,
noo noo no nooooooooo nooo, noo nooooooo nooooo nooo noooooooo noooooo,

and this gnomon-like fin stands up and casts shadows upon the wrinkled
noo nooo nooooo-nooo noo nooooo no noo noooo noooooo nooo noo nooooooo

surface, it may well be supposed that the watery circle surrounding it
noooooo, no noo nooo no nooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noooooooooo no

somewhat resembles a dial, with its style and wavy hour-lines graved on
nooooooo noooooooo n nooo, nooo noo noooo noo nooo nooo-noooo nooooo no

it. On that Ahaz-dial the shadow often goes back. The Fin-Back is not
no. No nooo Nooo-nooo noo nooooo noooo nooo nooo. Noo Noo-Nooo no noo

gregarious. He seems a whale-hater, as some men are man-haters. Very
nooooooooo. No noooo n noooo-noooo, no nooo noo noo noo-nooooo. Nooo

shy; always going solitary; unexpectedly rising to the surface in the
noo; nooooo noooo nooooooo; nooooooooooo nooooo no noo noooooo no noo

remotest and most sullen waters; his straight and single lofty jet
nooooooo noo nooo nooooo nooooo; noo nooooooo noo nooooo noooo noo

rising like a tall misanthropic spear upon a barren plain; gifted with
nooooo nooo n nooo nooooooooooo noooo nooo n nooooo noooo; nooooo nooo

such wondrous power and velocity in swimming, as to defy all present
nooo nooooooo noooo noo nooooooo no nooooooo, no no nooo noo noooooo

pursuit from man; this leviathan seems the banished and unconquerable
noooooo nooo noo; nooo noooooooo noooo noo nooooooo noo noooooooooooo

Cain of his race, bearing for his mark that style upon his back. From
Nooo no noo nooo, noooooo noo noo nooo nooo noooo nooo noo nooo. Nooo

having the baleen in his mouth, the Fin-Back is sometimes included with
nooooo noo nooooo no noo noooo, noo Noo-Nooo no noooooooo nooooooo nooo

the right whale, among a theoretic species denominated WHALEBONE WHALES,
noo noooo noooo, noooo n noooooooo noooooo noooooooooo NOOOOOOOO NOOOOO,

that is, whales with baleen. Of these so called Whalebone whales, there
nooo no, nooooo nooo nooooo. No noooo no nooooo Noooooooo nooooo, noooo

would seem to be several varieties, most of which, however, are little
noooo nooo no no noooooo noooooooo, nooo no noooo, noooooo, noo nooooo

known. Broad-nosed whales and beaked whales; pike-headed whales; bunched
noooo. Noooo-noooo nooooo noo nooooo nooooo; nooo-nooooo nooooo; noooooo

whales; under-jawed whales and rostrated whales, are the fishermen's
nooooo; noooo-noooo nooooo noo noooooooo nooooo, noo noo noooooooo'n

names for a few sorts.
noooo noo n noo noooo.




In connection with this appellative of "Whalebone whales," it is of
No nooooooooo nooo nooo noooooooooo no "Noooooooo nooooo," no no no

great importance to mention, that however such a nomenclature may be
noooo nooooooooo no noooooo, nooo noooooo nooo n nooooooooooo noo no

convenient in facilitating allusions to some kind of whales, yet it is
nooooooooo no nooooooooooo noooooooo no nooo nooo no nooooo, noo no no

in vain to attempt a clear classification of the Leviathan, founded upon
no nooo no noooooo n noooo nooooooooooooo no noo Noooooooo, noooooo nooo

either his baleen, or hump, or fin, or teeth; notwithstanding that those
nooooo noo nooooo, no nooo, no noo, no noooo; noooooooooooooo nooo noooo

marked parts or features very obviously seem better adapted to afford
nooooo noooo no nooooooo nooo noooooooo nooo nooooo noooooo no nooooo

the basis for a regular system of Cetology than any other detached
noo noooo noo n noooooo nooooo no Nooooooo nooo noo noooo nooooooo

bodily distinctions, which the whale, in his kinds, presents. How
nooooo nooooooooooo, noooo noo noooo, no noo noooo, nooooooo. Noo

then? The baleen, hump, back-fin, and teeth; these are things whose
nooo? Noo nooooo, nooo, nooo-noo, noo noooo; noooo noo nooooo noooo

peculiarities are indiscriminately dispersed among all sorts of whales,
noooooooooooo noo nooooooooooooooo noooooooo noooo noo noooo no nooooo,

without any regard to what may be the nature of their structure in other
noooooo noo nooooo no nooo noo no noo nooooo no noooo noooooooo no noooo

and more essential particulars. Thus, the sperm whale and the humpbacked
noo nooo noooooooo noooooooooo. Nooo, noo noooo noooo noo noo nooooooooo

whale, each has a hump; but there the similitude ceases. Then, this same
noooo, nooo noo n nooo; noo noooo noo nooooooooo nooooo. Nooo, nooo nooo

humpbacked whale and the Greenland whale, each of these has baleen;
nooooooooo noooo noo noo Noooooooo noooo, nooo no noooo noo nooooo;

but there again the similitude ceases. And it is just the same with the
noo noooo noooo noo nooooooooo nooooo. Noo no no nooo noo nooo nooo noo

other parts above mentioned. In various sorts of whales, they form such
noooo noooo noooo noooooooo. No noooooo noooo no nooooo, nooo nooo nooo

irregular combinations; or, in the case of any one of them detached,
noooooooo nooooooooooo; no, no noo nooo no noo noo no nooo nooooooo,

such an irregular isolation; as utterly to defy all general
nooo no noooooooo noooooooo; no noooooo no nooo noo noooooo

methodization formed upon such a basis. On this rock every one of the
noooooooooooo nooooo nooo nooo n noooo. No nooo nooo noooo noo no noo

whale-naturalists has split.
noooo-noooooooooo noo noooo.




But it may possibly be conceived that, in the internal parts of the
Noo no noo nooooooo no noooooooo nooo, no noo nooooooo noooo no noo

whale, in his anatomy--there, at least, we shall be able to hit the
noooo, no noo noooooo--noooo, no noooo, no noooo no nooo no noo noo

right classification. Nay; what thing, for example, is there in the
noooo nooooooooooooo. Noo; nooo noooo, noo noooooo, no noooo no noo

Greenland whale's anatomy more striking than his baleen? Yet we have
Noooooooo noooo'n noooooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo? Noo no nooo

seen that by his baleen it is impossible correctly to classify the
nooo nooo no noo nooooo no no nooooooooo noooooooo no nooooooo noo

Greenland whale. And if you descend into the bowels of the various
Noooooooo noooo. Noo no noo noooooo nooo noo nooooo no noo noooooo

leviathans, why there you will not find distinctions a fiftieth part as
nooooooooo, noo noooo noo nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo n nooooooo nooo no

available to the systematizer as those external ones already enumerated.
noooooooo no noo nooooooooooo no noooo nooooooo nooo noooooo nooooooooo.

What then remains? nothing but to take hold of the whales bodily, in
Nooo nooo noooooo? noooooo noo no nooo nooo no noo nooooo nooooo, no

their entire liberal volume, and boldly sort them that way. And this is
noooo nooooo noooooo nooooo, noo nooooo nooo nooo nooo noo. Noo nooo no

the Bibliographical system here adopted; and it is the only one that can
noo Noooooooooooooo nooooo nooo noooooo; noo no no noo nooo noo nooo noo

possibly succeed, for it alone is practicable. To proceed.
nooooooo noooooo, noo no noooo no noooooooooo. No noooooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO) CHAPTER IV. (HUMP-BACK).--This whale is often seen on
NOOO N. (NOOOO) NOOOOOO NO. (NOOO-NOOO).--Nooo noooo no noooo nooo no

the northern American coast. He has been frequently captured there, and
noo nooooooo Nooooooo noooo. No noo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noooo, noo

towed into harbor. He has a great pack on him like a peddler; or you
noooo nooo nooooo. No noo n noooo nooo no noo nooo n noooooo; no noo

might call him the Elephant and Castle whale. At any rate, the popular
noooo nooo noo noo Nooooooo noo Nooooo noooo. No noo nooo, noo noooooo

name for him does not sufficiently distinguish him, since the sperm
nooo noo noo nooo noo nooooooooooo noooooooooo noo, noooo noo noooo

whale also has a hump though a smaller one. His oil is not very
noooo nooo noo n nooo nooooo n noooooo noo. Noo noo no noo nooo

valuable. He has baleen. He is the most gamesome and light-hearted of
nooooooo. No noo nooooo. No no noo nooo nooooooo noo noooo-noooooo no

all the whales, making more gay foam and white water generally than any
noo noo nooooo, nooooo nooo noo nooo noo noooo noooo noooooooo nooo noo

other of them.
noooo no nooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER V. (RAZOR-BACK).--Of this whale little is known
NOOO N. (NOOOO), NOOOOOO N. (NOOOO-NOOO).--No nooo noooo nooooo no noooo

but his name. I have seen him at a distance off Cape Horn. Of a retiring
noo noo nooo. N nooo nooo noo no n nooooooo noo Nooo Nooo. No n nooooooo

nature, he eludes both hunters and philosophers. Though no coward, he
nooooo, no nooooo nooo noooooo noo nooooooooooo. Nooooo no nooooo, no

has never yet shown any part of him but his back, which rises in a long
noo noooo noo noooo noo nooo no noo noo noo nooo, noooo noooo no n nooo
