sharp ridge. Let him go. I know little more of him, nor does anybody
noooo noooo. Noo noo no. N nooo nooooo nooo no noo, noo nooo noooooo

else.
nooo.




BOOK I. (FOLIO), CHAPTER VI. (SULPHUR-BOTTOM).--Another retiring
NOOO N. (NOOOO), NOOOOOO NO. (NOOOOOO-NOOOOO).--Noooooo nooooooo

gentleman, with a brimstone belly, doubtless got by scraping along the
noooooooo, nooo n noooooooo noooo, noooooooo noo no nooooooo noooo noo

Tartarian tiles in some of his profounder divings. He is seldom seen;
Noooooooo noooo no nooo no noo nooooooooo noooooo. No no nooooo nooo;

at least I have never seen him except in the remoter southern seas,
no noooo N nooo noooo nooo noo nooooo no noo noooooo nooooooo nooo,

and then always at too great a distance to study his countenance. He is
noo nooo nooooo no noo noooo n nooooooo no noooo noo noooooooooo. No no

never chased; he would run away with rope-walks of line. Prodigies are
noooo nooooo; no noooo noo nooo nooo nooo-noooo no nooo. Noooooooo noo

told of him. Adieu, Sulphur Bottom! I can say nothing more that is true
nooo no noo. Noooo, Noooooo Nooooo! N noo noo noooooo nooo nooo no nooo

of ye, nor can the oldest Nantucketer.
no no, noo noo noo nooooo Noooooooooo.




Thus ends BOOK I. (FOLIO), and now begins BOOK II. (OCTAVO).
Nooo nooo NOOO N. (NOOOO), noo noo nooooo NOOO NO. (NOOOOO).




OCTAVOES.*--These embrace the whales of middling magnitude, among which
NOOOOOOO.*--Noooo noooooo noo nooooo no nooooooo noooooooo, noooo noooo

present may be numbered:--I., the GRAMPUS; II., the BLACK FISH; III.,
noooooo noo no nooooooo:--N., noo NOOOOOO; NO., noo NOOOO NOOO; NOO.,

the NARWHALE; IV., the THRASHER; V., the KILLER.
noo NOOOOOOO; NO., noo NOOOOOOO; N., noo NOOOOO.







*Why this book of whales is not denominated the Quarto is very plain.
*Noo nooo nooo no nooooo no noo noooooooooo noo Nooooo no nooo noooo.

Because, while the whales of this order, though smaller than those of
Noooooo, noooo noo nooooo no nooo noooo, nooooo noooooo nooo noooo no

the former order, nevertheless retain a proportionate likeness to them
noo nooooo noooo, nooooooooooo nooooo n noooooooooooo nooooooo no nooo

in figure, yet the bookbinder's Quarto volume in its dimensioned form
no nooooo, noo noo nooooooooo'n Nooooo nooooo no noo noooooooooo nooo

does not preserve the shape of the Folio volume, but the Octavo volume
nooo noo nooooooo noo noooo no noo Noooo nooooo, noo noo Nooooo nooooo

does.
nooo.







BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER I. (GRAMPUS).--Though this fish, whose
NOOO NO. (NOOOOO), NOOOOOO N. (NOOOOOO).--Nooooo nooo nooo, noooo

loud sonorous breathing, or rather blowing, has furnished a proverb
nooo nooooooo noooooooo, no nooooo noooooo, noo noooooooo n noooooo

to landsmen, is so well known a denizen of the deep, yet is he not
no nooooooo, no no nooo noooo n noooooo no noo nooo, noo no no noo

popularly classed among whales. But possessing all the grand distinctive
noooooooo noooooo noooo nooooo. Noo nooooooooo noo noo noooo noooooooooo

features of the leviathan, most naturalists have recognised him for one.
nooooooo no noo noooooooo, nooo noooooooooo nooo nooooooooo noo noo noo.

He is of moderate octavo size, varying from fifteen to twenty-five feet
No no no nooooooo nooooo nooo, noooooo nooo noooooo no nooooo-nooo nooo

in length, and of corresponding dimensions round the waist. He swims in
no nooooo, noo no noooooooooooo nooooooooo noooo noo noooo. No noooo no

herds; he is never regularly hunted, though his oil is considerable in
noooo; no no noooo noooooooo nooooo, nooooo noo noo no nooooooooooo no

quantity, and pretty good for light. By some fishermen his approach is
nooooooo, noo nooooo nooo noo noooo. No nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo no

regarded as premonitory of the advance of the great sperm whale.
nooooooo no noooooooooo no noo noooooo no noo noooo noooo noooo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER II. (BLACK FISH).--I give the popular
NOOO NO. (NOOOOO), NOOOOOO NO. (NOOOO NOOO).--N nooo noo noooooo

fishermen's names for all these fish, for generally they are the best.
noooooooo'n noooo noo noo noooo nooo, noo noooooooo nooo noo noo nooo.

Where any name happens to be vague or inexpressive, I shall say so,
Noooo noo nooo noooooo no no noooo no nooooooooooo, N noooo noo no,

and suggest another. I do so now, touching the Black Fish, so-called,
noo noooooo noooooo. N no no noo, nooooooo noo Noooo Nooo, no-nooooo,

because blackness is the rule among almost all whales. So, call him the
noooooo noooooooo no noo nooo noooo nooooo noo nooooo. No, nooo noo noo

Hyena Whale, if you please. His voracity is well known, and from the
Noooo Noooo, no noo nooooo. Noo nooooooo no nooo noooo, noo nooo noo

circumstance that the inner angles of his lips are curved upwards, he
nooooooooooo nooo noo noooo nooooo no noo nooo noo nooooo noooooo, no

carries an everlasting Mephistophelean grin on his face. This whale
noooooo no noooooooooo Noooooooooooooo nooo no noo nooo. Nooo noooo

averages some sixteen or eighteen feet in length. He is found in almost
nooooooo nooo noooooo no nooooooo nooo no nooooo. No no noooo no nooooo

all latitudes. He has a peculiar way of showing his dorsal hooked fin
noo noooooooo. No noo n nooooooo noo no noooooo noo nooooo nooooo noo

in swimming, which looks something like a Roman nose. When not more
no nooooooo, noooo noooo noooooooo nooo n Noooo nooo. Nooo noo nooo

profitably employed, the sperm whale hunters sometimes capture the Hyena
nooooooooo nooooooo, noo noooo noooo noooooo noooooooo noooooo noo Noooo

whale, to keep up the supply of cheap oil for domestic employment--as
noooo, no nooo no noo nooooo no noooo noo noo nooooooo nooooooooo--no

some frugal housekeepers, in the absence of company, and quite alone by
nooo nooooo nooooooooooo, no noo noooooo no noooooo, noo noooo noooo no

themselves, burn unsavory tallow instead of odorous wax. Though their
nooooooooo, nooo nooooooo nooooo noooooo no noooooo noo. Nooooo noooo

blubber is very thin, some of these whales will yield you upwards of
noooooo no nooo nooo, nooo no noooo nooooo nooo noooo noo noooooo no

thirty gallons of oil.
nooooo noooooo no noo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER III. (NARWHALE), that is, NOSTRIL
NOOO NO. (NOOOOO), NOOOOOO NOO. (NOOOOOOO), nooo no, NOOOOOO

WHALE.--Another instance of a curiously named whale, so named I suppose
NOOOO.--Noooooo nooooooo no n noooooooo noooo noooo, no noooo N noooooo

from his peculiar horn being originally mistaken for a peaked nose. The
nooo noo nooooooo nooo noooo nooooooooo nooooooo noo n nooooo nooo. Noo

creature is some sixteen feet in length, while its horn averages five
nooooooo no nooo noooooo nooo no nooooo, noooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo

feet, though some exceed ten, and even attain to fifteen feet. Strictly
nooo, nooooo nooo nooooo noo, noo nooo nooooo no noooooo nooo. Nooooooo

speaking, this horn is but a lengthened tusk, growing out from the jaw
nooooooo, nooo nooo no noo n nooooooooo nooo, noooooo noo nooo noo noo

in a line a little depressed from the horizontal. But it is only
no n nooo n nooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooooooo. Noo no no nooo

found on the sinister side, which has an ill effect, giving its owner
noooo no noo nooooooo nooo, noooo noo no noo nooooo, nooooo noo noooo

something analogous to the aspect of a clumsy left-handed man. What
noooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo no n nooooo nooo-nooooo noo. Nooo

precise purpose this ivory horn or lance answers, it would be hard to
noooooo noooooo nooo noooo nooo no noooo noooooo, no noooo no nooo no

say. It does not seem to be used like the blade of the sword-fish and
noo. No nooo noo nooo no no nooo nooo noo noooo no noo noooo-nooo noo

bill-fish; though some sailors tell me that the Narwhale employs it for
nooo-nooo; nooooo nooo noooooo nooo no nooo noo Nooooooo noooooo no noo

a rake in turning over the bottom of the sea for food. Charley Coffin
n nooo no noooooo nooo noo nooooo no noo noo noo nooo. Noooooo Nooooo

said it was used for an ice-piercer; for the Narwhale, rising to the
nooo no noo nooo noo no noo-noooooo; noo noo Nooooooo, nooooo no noo

surface of the Polar Sea, and finding it sheeted with ice, thrusts his
noooooo no noo Noooo Noo, noo noooooo no noooooo nooo noo, noooooo noo

horn up, and so breaks through. But you cannot prove either of these
nooo no, noo no nooooo noooooo. Noo noo nooooo noooo nooooo no noooo

surmises to be correct. My own opinion is, that however this one-sided
nooooooo no no noooooo. No noo noooooo no, nooo noooooo nooo noo-noooo

horn may really be used by the Narwhale--however that may be--it would
nooo noo nooooo no nooo no noo Nooooooo--noooooo nooo noo no--no noooo

certainly be very convenient to him for a folder in reading pamphlets.
noooooooo no nooo nooooooooo no noo noo n nooooo no noooooo noooooooo.

The Narwhale I have heard called the Tusked whale, the Horned whale, and
Noo Nooooooo N nooo noooo nooooo noo Nooooo noooo, noo Nooooo noooo, noo

the Unicorn whale. He is certainly a curious example of the Unicornism
noo Noooooo noooo. No no noooooooo n noooooo noooooo no noo Nooooooooo

to be found in almost every kingdom of animated nature. From certain
no no noooo no nooooo noooo noooooo no nooooooo nooooo. Nooo noooooo

cloistered old authors I have gathered that this same sea-unicorn's horn
nooooooooo noo noooooo N nooo nooooooo nooo nooo nooo noo-noooooo'n nooo

was in ancient days regarded as the great antidote against poison,
noo no noooooo nooo nooooooo no noo noooo nooooooo noooooo nooooo,

and as such, preparations of it brought immense prices. It was also
noo no nooo, nooooooooooo no no noooooo noooooo nooooo. No noo nooo

distilled to a volatile salts for fainting ladies, the same way that the
noooooooo no n nooooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo noo nooo noo

horns of the male deer are manufactured into hartshorn. Originally it
noooo no noo nooo nooo noo nooooooooooo nooo noooooooo. Nooooooooo no

was in itself accounted an object of great curiosity. Black Letter tells
noo no nooooo noooooooo no nooooo no noooo noooooooo. Noooo Nooooo noooo

me that Sir Martin Frobisher on his return from that voyage, when
no nooo Noo Nooooo Noooooooo no noo nooooo nooo nooo nooooo, nooo

Queen Bess did gallantly wave her jewelled hand to him from a window
Noooo Nooo noo noooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo no noo nooo n nooooo

of Greenwich Palace, as his bold ship sailed down the Thames; "when Sir
no Noooooooo Nooooo, no noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo noo Nooooo; "nooo Noo

Martin returned from that voyage," saith Black Letter, "on bended knees
Nooooo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooo," noooo Noooo Nooooo, "no nooooo noooo

he presented to her highness a prodigious long horn of the Narwhale,
no noooooooo no noo nooooooo n nooooooooo nooo nooo no noo Nooooooo,

which for a long period after hung in the castle at Windsor." An Irish
noooo noo n nooo nooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooo no Noooooo." No Noooo

author avers that the Earl of Leicester, on bended knees, did likewise
nooooo noooo nooo noo Nooo no Noooooooo, no nooooo noooo, noo nooooooo

present to her highness another horn, pertaining to a land beast of the
noooooo no noo nooooooo noooooo nooo, nooooooooo no n nooo noooo no noo

unicorn nature.
noooooo nooooo.




The Narwhale has a very picturesque, leopard-like look, being of a
Noo Nooooooo noo n nooo noooooooooo, noooooo-nooo nooo, noooo no n

milk-white ground colour, dotted with round and oblong spots of black.
nooo-noooo nooooo nooooo, nooooo nooo noooo noo nooooo noooo no noooo.

His oil is very superior, clear and fine; but there is little of it, and
Noo noo no nooo nooooooo, noooo noo nooo; noo noooo no nooooo no no, noo

he is seldom hunted. He is mostly found in the circumpolar seas.
no no nooooo nooooo. No no nooooo noooo no noo noooooooooo nooo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER IV. (KILLER).--Of this whale little is
NOOO NO. (NOOOOO), NOOOOOO NO. (NOOOOO).--No nooo noooo nooooo no

precisely known to the Nantucketer, and nothing at all to the professed
noooooooo noooo no noo Noooooooooo, noo noooooo no noo no noo noooooooo

naturalist. From what I have seen of him at a distance, I should say
nooooooooo. Nooo nooo N nooo nooo no noo no n nooooooo, N nooooo noo

that he was about the bigness of a grampus. He is very savage--a sort of
nooo no noo noooo noo noooooo no n noooooo. No no nooo nooooo--n nooo no

Feegee fish. He sometimes takes the great Folio whales by the lip, and
Nooooo nooo. No noooooooo noooo noo noooo Noooo nooooo no noo noo, noo

hangs there like a leech, till the mighty brute is worried to death. The
noooo noooo nooo n noooo, nooo noo nooooo noooo no noooooo no noooo. Noo

Killer is never hunted. I never heard what sort of oil he has. Exception
Nooooo no noooo nooooo. N noooo noooo nooo nooo no noo no noo. Noooooooo

might be taken to the name bestowed upon this whale, on the ground
noooo no noooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooo nooo noooo, no noo nooooo

of its indistinctness. For we are all killers, on land and on sea;
no noo nooooooooooooo. Noo no noo noo noooooo, no nooo noo no noo;

Bonapartes and Sharks included.
Nooooooooo noo Nooooo nooooooo.




BOOK II. (OCTAVO), CHAPTER V. (THRASHER).--This gentleman is famous for
NOOO NO. (NOOOOO), NOOOOOO N. (NOOOOOOO).--Nooo noooooooo no nooooo noo

his tail, which he uses for a ferule in thrashing his foes. He mounts
noo nooo, noooo no nooo noo n nooooo no noooooooo noo nooo. No nooooo

the Folio whale's back, and as he swims, he works his passage by
noo Noooo noooo'n nooo, noo no no noooo, no noooo noo noooooo no

flogging him; as some schoolmasters get along in the world by a similar
nooooooo noo; no nooo noooooooooooo noo noooo no noo noooo no n noooooo

process. Still less is known of the Thrasher than of the Killer. Both
noooooo. Noooo nooo no noooo no noo Nooooooo nooo no noo Nooooo. Nooo

are outlaws, even in the lawless seas.
noo noooooo, nooo no noo noooooo nooo.




Thus ends BOOK II. (OCTAVO), and begins BOOK III. (DUODECIMO).
Nooo nooo NOOO NO. (NOOOOO), noo nooooo NOOO NOO. (NOOOOOOOO).




DUODECIMOES.--These include the smaller whales. I. The Huzza Porpoise.
NOOOOOOOOOO.--Noooo noooooo noo noooooo nooooo. N. Noo Noooo Nooooooo.

II. The Algerine Porpoise. III. The Mealy-mouthed Porpoise.
NO. Noo Nooooooo Nooooooo. NOO. Noo Noooo-noooooo Nooooooo.




To those who have not chanced specially to study the subject, it may
No noooo noo nooo noo noooooo noooooooo no noooo noo noooooo, no noo

possibly seem strange, that fishes not commonly exceeding four or five
nooooooo nooo noooooo, nooo nooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo nooo no nooo

feet should be marshalled among WHALES--a word, which, in the popular
nooo nooooo no nooooooooo noooo NOOOOO--n nooo, noooo, no noo noooooo

sense, always conveys an idea of hugeness. But the creatures set
noooo, nooooo noooooo no nooo no nooooooo. Noo noo noooooooo noo

down above as Duodecimoes are infallibly whales, by the terms of my
nooo noooo no Noooooooooo noo nooooooooo nooooo, no noo noooo no no

definition of what a whale is--i.e. a spouting fish, with a horizontal
nooooooooo no nooo n noooo no--n.n. n nooooooo nooo, nooo n nooooooooo

tail.
nooo.




BOOK III. (DUODECIMO), CHAPTER 1. (HUZZA PORPOISE).--This is the
NOOO NOO. (NOOOOOOOO), NOOOOOO n. (NOOOO NOOOOOOO).--Nooo no noo

common porpoise found almost all over the globe. The name is of my own
nooooo nooooooo noooo nooooo noo nooo noo noooo. Noo nooo no no no noo

bestowal; for there are more than one sort of porpoises, and something
nooooooo; noo noooo noo nooo nooo noo nooo no noooooooo, noo noooooooo

must be done to distinguish them. I call him thus, because he always
nooo no nooo no noooooooooo nooo. N nooo noo nooo, noooooo no nooooo

swims in hilarious shoals, which upon the broad sea keep tossing
noooo no noooooooo nooooo, noooo nooo noo noooo noo nooo noooooo

themselves to heaven like caps in a Fourth-of-July crowd. Their
nooooooooo no nooooo nooo nooo no n Nooooo-no-Nooo noooo. Noooo

appearance is generally hailed with delight by the mariner. Full of fine
nooooooooo no noooooooo nooooo nooo noooooo no noo noooooo. Nooo no nooo

spirits, they invariably come from the breezy billows to windward. They
noooooo, nooo nooooooooo nooo nooo noo nooooo noooooo no nooooooo. Nooo

are the lads that always live before the wind. They are accounted a
noo noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo nooooo noo nooo. Nooo noo noooooooo n

lucky omen. If you yourself can withstand three cheers at beholding
noooo nooo. No noo nooooooo noo noooooooo noooo nooooo no noooooooo

these vivacious fish, then heaven help ye; the spirit of godly
noooo noooooooo nooo, nooo nooooo nooo no; noo nooooo no noooo

gamesomeness is not in ye. A well-fed, plump Huzza Porpoise will
nooooooooooo no noo no no. N nooo-noo, noooo Noooo Nooooooo nooo

yield you one good gallon of good oil. But the fine and delicate fluid
noooo noo noo nooo nooooo no nooo noo. Noo noo nooo noo nooooooo noooo

extracted from his jaws is exceedingly valuable. It is in request among
noooooooo nooo noo nooo no noooooooooo nooooooo. No no no noooooo noooo

jewellers and watchmakers. Sailors put it on their hones. Porpoise
noooooooo noo noooooooooo. Noooooo noo no no noooo noooo. Nooooooo

meat is good eating, you know. It may never have occurred to you that
nooo no nooo nooooo, noo nooo. No noo noooo nooo nooooooo no noo nooo

a porpoise spouts. Indeed, his spout is so small that it is not very
n nooooooo nooooo. Nooooo, noo noooo no no noooo nooo no no noo nooo

readily discernible. But the next time you have a chance, watch him; and
noooooo noooooooooo. Noo noo nooo nooo noo nooo n nooooo, noooo noo; noo

you will then see the great Sperm whale himself in miniature.
noo nooo nooo noo noo noooo Noooo noooo noooooo no noooooooo.




BOOK III. (DUODECIMO), CHAPTER II. (ALGERINE PORPOISE).--A pirate. Very
NOOO NOO. (NOOOOOOOO), NOOOOOO NO. (NOOOOOOO NOOOOOOO).--N nooooo. Nooo

savage. He is only found, I think, in the Pacific. He is somewhat larger
nooooo. No no nooo noooo, N noooo, no noo Noooooo. No no nooooooo nooooo

than the Huzza Porpoise, but much of the same general make. Provoke him,
nooo noo Noooo Nooooooo, noo nooo no noo nooo noooooo nooo. Noooooo noo,

and he will buckle to a shark. I have lowered for him many times, but
noo no nooo nooooo no n noooo. N nooo noooooo noo noo nooo noooo, noo

never yet saw him captured.
noooo noo noo noo nooooooo.




BOOK III. (DUODECIMO), CHAPTER III. (MEALY-MOUTHED PORPOISE).--The
NOOO NOO. (NOOOOOOOO), NOOOOOO NOO. (NOOOO-NOOOOOO NOOOOOOO).--Noo

largest kind of Porpoise; and only found in the Pacific, so far as it is
noooooo nooo no Nooooooo; noo nooo noooo no noo Noooooo, no noo no no no

known. The only English name, by which he has hitherto been designated,
noooo. Noo nooo Noooooo nooo, no noooo no noo nooooooo nooo nooooooooo,

is that of the fishers--Right-Whale Porpoise, from the circumstance that
no nooo no noo noooooo--Noooo-Noooo Nooooooo, nooo noo nooooooooooo nooo

he is chiefly found in the vicinity of that Folio. In shape, he differs
no no noooooo noooo no noo nooooooo no nooo Noooo. No noooo, no noooooo

in some degree from the Huzza Porpoise, being of a less rotund and jolly
no nooo nooooo nooo noo Noooo Nooooooo, noooo no n nooo nooooo noo noooo

girth; indeed, he is of quite a neat and gentleman-like figure. He has
noooo; nooooo, no no no noooo n nooo noo noooooooo-nooo nooooo. No noo

no fins on his back (most other porpoises have), he has a lovely tail,
no nooo no noo nooo (nooo noooo noooooooo nooo), no noo n nooooo nooo,

and sentimental Indian eyes of a hazel hue. But his mealy-mouth spoils
noo noooooooooo Nooooo nooo no n noooo noo. Noo noo noooo-noooo nooooo

all. Though his entire back down to his side fins is of a deep sable,
noo. Nooooo noo nooooo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooo no no n nooo noooo,

yet a boundary line, distinct as the mark in a ship's hull, called
noo n nooooooo nooo, nooooooo no noo nooo no n nooo'n nooo, nooooo

the "bright waist," that line streaks him from stem to stern, with two
noo "nooooo noooo," nooo nooo noooooo noo nooo nooo no noooo, nooo noo

separate colours, black above and white below. The white comprises part
nooooooo noooooo, noooo noooo noo noooo noooo. Noo noooo noooooooo nooo

of his head, and the whole of his mouth, which makes him look as if he
no noo nooo, noo noo noooo no noo noooo, noooo noooo noo nooo no no no

had just escaped from a felonious visit to a meal-bag. A most mean and
noo nooo noooooo nooo n noooooooo noooo no n nooo-noo. N nooo nooo noo

mealy aspect! His oil is much like that of the common porpoise.
noooo nooooo! Noo noo no nooo nooo nooo no noo nooooo nooooooo.







Beyond the DUODECIMO, this system does not proceed, inasmuch as
Nooooo noo NOOOOOOOO, nooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo, nooooooo no

the Porpoise is the smallest of the whales. Above, you have all the
noo Nooooooo no noo nooooooo no noo nooooo. Noooo, noo nooo noo noo

Leviathans of note. But there are a rabble of uncertain, fugitive,
Nooooooooo no nooo. Noo noooo noo n nooooo no noooooooo, nooooooo,

half-fabulous whales, which, as an American whaleman, I know by
nooo-nooooooo nooooo, noooo, no no Nooooooo nooooooo, N nooo no

reputation, but not personally. I shall enumerate them by their
nooooooooo, noo noo nooooooooo. N noooo noooooooo nooo no noooo

fore-castle appellations; for possibly such a list may be valuable to
nooo-nooooo nooooooooooo; noo nooooooo nooo n nooo noo no nooooooo no

future investigators, who may complete what I have here but begun. If
nooooo noooooooooooo, noo noo nooooooo nooo N nooo nooo noo noooo. No

any of the following whales, shall hereafter be caught and marked, then
noo no noo noooooooo nooooo, noooo noooooooo no nooooo noo nooooo, nooo

he can readily be incorporated into this System, according to his Folio,
no noo noooooo no nooooooooooo nooo nooo Nooooo, noooooooo no noo Noooo,

Octavo, or Duodecimo magnitude:--The Bottle-Nose Whale; the Junk Whale;
Nooooo, no Noooooooo noooooooo:--Noo Nooooo-Nooo Noooo; noo Nooo Noooo;

the Pudding-Headed Whale; the Cape Whale; the Leading Whale; the Cannon
noo Noooooo-Nooooo Noooo; noo Nooo Noooo; noo Noooooo Noooo; noo Nooooo

Whale; the Scragg Whale; the Coppered Whale; the Elephant Whale; the
Noooo; noo Nooooo Noooo; noo Nooooooo Noooo; noo Nooooooo Noooo; noo

Iceberg Whale; the Quog Whale; the Blue Whale; etc. From Icelandic,
Noooooo Noooo; noo Nooo Noooo; noo Nooo Noooo; noo. Nooo Noooooooo,

Dutch, and old English authorities, there might be quoted other lists of
Noooo, noo noo Noooooo noooooooooo, noooo noooo no nooooo noooo noooo no

uncertain whales, blessed with all manner of uncouth names. But I omit
noooooooo nooooo, noooooo nooo noo nooooo no noooooo noooo. Noo N nooo

them as altogether obsolete; and can hardly help suspecting them for
nooo no nooooooooo nooooooo; noo noo nooooo nooo nooooooooo nooo noo

mere sounds, full of Leviathanism, but signifying nothing.
nooo nooooo, nooo no Nooooooooooo, noo nooooooooo noooooo.




Finally: It was stated at the outset, that this system would not be
Noooooo: No noo nooooo no noo nooooo, nooo nooo nooooo noooo noo no

here, and at once, perfected. You cannot but plainly see that I have
nooo, noo no nooo, noooooooo. Noo nooooo noo noooooo noo nooo N nooo

kept my word. But I now leave my cetological System standing thus
nooo no nooo. Noo N noo noooo no noooooooooo Nooooo nooooooo nooo

unfinished, even as the great Cathedral of Cologne was left, with the
nooooooooo, nooo no noo noooo Noooooooo no Noooooo noo nooo, nooo noo

crane still standing upon the top of the uncompleted tower. For small
noooo noooo nooooooo nooo noo noo no noo noooooooooo noooo. Noo noooo

erections may be finished by their first architects; grand ones, true
noooooooo noo no nooooooo no noooo noooo nooooooooo; noooo nooo, nooo

ones, ever leave the copestone to posterity. God keep me from ever
nooo, nooo noooo noo noooooooo no noooooooo. Noo nooo no nooo nooo

completing anything. This whole book is but a draught--nay, but the
nooooooooo nooooooo. Nooo noooo nooo no noo n noooooo--noo, noo noo

draught of a draught. Oh, Time, Strength, Cash, and Patience!
noooooo no n noooooo. No, Nooo, Nooooooo, Nooo, noo Nooooooo!










CHAPTER 33. The Specksynder.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooooooo.







Concerning the officers of the whale-craft, this seems as good a place
Nooooooooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo-noooo, nooo noooo no nooo n noooo

as any to set down a little domestic peculiarity on ship-board, arising
no noo no noo nooo n nooooo nooooooo noooooooooo no nooo-noooo, noooooo

from the existence of the harpooneer class of officers, a class unknown
nooo noo noooooooo no noo nooooooooo noooo no nooooooo, n noooo noooooo

of course in any other marine than the whale-fleet.
no nooooo no noo noooo nooooo nooo noo noooo-noooo.




The large importance attached to the harpooneer's vocation is evinced
Noo noooo nooooooooo nooooooo no noo nooooooooo'n nooooooo no noooooo

by the fact, that originally in the old Dutch Fishery, two centuries
no noo nooo, nooo nooooooooo no noo noo Noooo Noooooo, noo noooooooo

and more ago, the command of a whale ship was not wholly lodged in
noo nooo noo, noo noooooo no n noooo nooo noo noo nooooo nooooo no

the person now called the captain, but was divided between him and an
noo nooooo noo nooooo noo noooooo, noo noo noooooo noooooo noo noo no

officer called the Specksynder. Literally this word means Fat-Cutter;
noooooo nooooo noo Noooooooooo. Noooooooo nooo nooo noooo Noo-Nooooo;

usage, however, in time made it equivalent to Chief Harpooneer. In
noooo, noooooo, no nooo nooo no nooooooooo no Noooo Nooooooooo. No

those days, the captain's authority was restricted to the navigation
noooo nooo, noo noooooo'n noooooooo noo nooooooooo no noo nooooooooo

and general management of the vessel; while over the whale-hunting
noo noooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo; noooo nooo noo noooo-noooooo

department and all its concerns, the Specksynder or Chief Harpooneer
nooooooooo noo noo noo nooooooo, noo Noooooooooo no Noooo Nooooooooo

reigned supreme. In the British Greenland Fishery, under the corrupted
noooooo noooooo. No noo Noooooo Noooooooo Noooooo, noooo noo noooooooo

title of Specksioneer, this old Dutch official is still retained, but
noooo no Nooooooooooo, nooo noo Noooo nooooooo no noooo nooooooo, noo

his former dignity is sadly abridged. At present he ranks simply
noo nooooo noooooo no noooo nooooooo. No noooooo no noooo nooooo

as senior Harpooneer; and as such, is but one of the captain's more
no nooooo Nooooooooo; noo no nooo, no noo noo no noo noooooo'n nooo

inferior subalterns. Nevertheless, as upon the good conduct of the
nooooooo nooooooooo. Nooooooooooo, no nooo noo nooo noooooo no noo

harpooneers the success of a whaling voyage largely depends, and since
noooooooooo noo noooooo no n noooooo nooooo noooooo noooooo, noo noooo

in the American Fishery he is not only an important officer in the boat,
no noo Nooooooo Noooooo no no noo nooo no noooooooo noooooo no noo nooo,

but under certain circumstances (night watches on a whaling ground) the
noo noooo noooooo noooooooooooo (noooo noooooo no n noooooo nooooo) noo

command of the ship's deck is also his; therefore the grand political
noooooo no noo nooo'n nooo no nooo noo; noooooooo noo noooo noooooooo

maxim of the sea demands, that he should nominally live apart from
noooo no noo noo noooooo, nooo no nooooo noooooooo nooo noooo nooo

the men before the mast, and be in some way distinguished as their
noo noo nooooo noo nooo, noo no no nooo noo noooooooooooo no noooo

professional superior; though always, by them, familiarly regarded as
nooooooooooo nooooooo; nooooo nooooo, no nooo, nooooooooo nooooooo no

their social equal.
noooo nooooo noooo.




Now, the grand distinction drawn between officer and man at sea, is
Noo, noo noooo noooooooooo noooo noooooo noooooo noo noo no noo, no

this--the first lives aft, the last forward. Hence, in whale-ships and
nooo--noo noooo noooo noo, noo nooo noooooo. Noooo, no noooo-noooo noo

merchantmen alike, the mates have their quarters with the captain; and
noooooooooo noooo, noo noooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooo noo noooooo; noo

so, too, in most of the American whalers the harpooneers are lodged in
no, noo, no nooo no noo Nooooooo noooooo noo noooooooooo noo nooooo no

the after part of the ship. That is to say, they take their meals in the
noo noooo nooo no noo nooo. Nooo no no noo, nooo nooo noooo noooo no noo

captain's cabin, and sleep in a place indirectly communicating with it.
noooooo'n noooo, noo noooo no n noooo nooooooooo noooooooooooo nooo no.




Though the long period of a Southern whaling voyage (by far the longest
Nooooo noo nooo nooooo no n Nooooooo noooooo nooooo (no noo noo noooooo

of all voyages now or ever made by man), the peculiar perils of it, and
no noo noooooo noo no nooo nooo no noo), noo nooooooo nooooo no no, noo

the community of interest prevailing among a company, all of whom, high
noo noooooooo no nooooooo nooooooooo noooo n noooooo, noo no nooo, nooo

or low, depend for their profits, not upon fixed wages, but upon their
no noo, nooooo noo noooo noooooo, noo nooo noooo noooo, noo nooo noooo

common luck, together with their common vigilance, intrepidity, and
nooooo nooo, nooooooo nooo noooo nooooo noooooooo, noooooooooo, noo

hard work; though all these things do in some cases tend to beget a less
nooo nooo; nooooo noo noooo nooooo no no nooo noooo nooo no noooo n nooo

rigorous discipline than in merchantmen generally; yet, never mind
nooooooo nooooooooo nooo no noooooooooo noooooooo; noo, noooo nooo

how much like an old Mesopotamian family these whalemen may, in some
noo nooo nooo no noo Nooooooooooo nooooo noooo nooooooo noo, no nooo

primitive instances, live together; for all that, the punctilious
noooooooo noooooooo, nooo nooooooo; noo noo nooo, noo noooooooooo

externals, at least, of the quarter-deck are seldom materially relaxed,
noooooooo, no noooo, no noo noooooo-nooo noo nooooo nooooooooo noooooo,

and in no instance done away. Indeed, many are the Nantucket ships in
noo no no nooooooo nooo nooo. Nooooo, nooo noo noo Noooooooo noooo no

which you will see the skipper parading his quarter-deck with an elated
noooo noo nooo noo noo noooooo nooooooo noo noooooo-nooo nooo no nooooo

grandeur not surpassed in any military navy; nay, extorting almost
nooooooo noo noooooooo no noo nooooooo nooo; noo, noooooooo nooooo

as much outward homage as if he wore the imperial purple, and not the
no nooo noooooo nooooo no no no nooo noo nooooooo nooooo, noo noo noo

shabbiest of pilot-cloth.
noooooooo no noooo-noooo.




And though of all men the moody captain of the Pequod was the least
Noo nooooo no noo noo noo noooo noooooo no noo Nooooo noo noo noooo

given to that sort of shallowest assumption; and though the only homage
noooo no nooo nooo no nooooooooo nooooooooo; noo nooooo noo nooo nooooo

he ever exacted, was implicit, instantaneous obedience; though he
no nooo noooooo, noo nooooooo, noooooooooooo noooooooo; nooooo no

required no man to remove the shoes from his feet ere stepping upon
nooooooo no noo no nooooo noo noooo nooo noo nooo noo nooooooo nooo

the quarter-deck; and though there were times when, owing to peculiar
noo noooooo-nooo; noo nooooo noooo nooo noooo nooo, noooo no nooooooo

circumstances connected with events hereafter to be detailed, he
noooooooooooo noooooooo nooo nooooo noooooooo no no nooooooo, no

addressed them in unusual terms, whether of condescension or IN
noooooooo nooo no noooooo noooo, noooooo no noooooooooooo no NO

TERROREM, or otherwise; yet even Captain Ahab was by no means
NOOOOOOO, no noooooooo; noo nooo Noooooo Nooo noo no no noooo

unobservant of the paramount forms and usages of the sea.
noooooooooo no noo noooooooo noooo noo nooooo no noo noo.




Nor, perhaps, will it fail to be eventually perceived, that behind those
Noo, noooooo, nooo no nooo no no nooooooooo noooooooo, nooo nooooo noooo

forms and usages, as it were, he sometimes masked himself; incidentally
noooo noo nooooo, no no nooo, no noooooooo nooooo noooooo; nooooooooooo

making use of them for other and more private ends than they were
nooooo noo no nooo noo noooo noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo

legitimately intended to subserve. That certain sultanism of his brain,
nooooooooooo nooooooo no nooooooo. Nooo noooooo noooooooo no noo noooo,

which had otherwise in a good degree remained unmanifested; through
noooo noo noooooooo no n nooo nooooo nooooooo nooooooooooo; noooooo

those forms that same sultanism became incarnate in an irresistible
noooo noooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooo noooooooo no no nooooooooooo

dictatorship. For be a man's intellectual superiority what it will,
nooooooooooo. Noo no n noo'n nooooooooooo noooooooooo nooo no nooo,

it can never assume the practical, available supremacy over other men,
no noo noooo nooooo noo noooooooo, noooooooo noooooooo nooo noooo noo,

without the aid of some sort of external arts and entrenchments, always,
noooooo noo noo no nooo nooo no nooooooo nooo noo noooooooooooo, nooooo,

in themselves, more or less paltry and base. This it is, that for ever
no nooooooooo, nooo no nooo nooooo noo nooo. Nooo no no, nooo noo nooo

keeps God's true princes of the Empire from the world's hustings; and
noooo Noo'n nooo noooooo no noo Nooooo nooo noo noooo'n nooooooo; noo

leaves the highest honours that this air can give, to those men who
nooooo noo noooooo noooooo nooo nooo noo noo nooo, no noooo noo noo

become famous more through their infinite inferiority to the choice
nooooo nooooo nooo noooooo noooo nooooooo noooooooooo no noo nooooo

hidden handful of the Divine Inert, than through their undoubted
nooooo noooooo no noo Nooooo Noooo, nooo noooooo noooo noooooooo

superiority over the dead level of the mass. Such large virtue lurks
noooooooooo nooo noo nooo noooo no noo nooo. Nooo noooo nooooo noooo

in these small things when extreme political superstitions invest them,
no noooo noooo nooooo nooo noooooo noooooooo noooooooooooo nooooo nooo,

that in some royal instances even to idiot imbecility they have imparted
nooo no nooo noooo noooooooo nooo no noooo nooooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo

potency. But when, as in the case of Nicholas the Czar, the ringed crown
noooooo. Noo nooo, no no noo nooo no Nooooooo noo Nooo, noo nooooo noooo

of geographical empire encircles an imperial brain; then, the plebeian
no nooooooooooo nooooo noooooooo no nooooooo noooo; nooo, noo nooooooo

herds crouch abased before the tremendous centralization. Nor, will the
noooo nooooo nooooo nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooooooooo. Noo, nooo noo

tragic dramatist who would depict mortal indomitableness in its fullest
nooooo noooooooo noo noooo nooooo nooooo noooooooooooooo no noo noooooo

sweep and direct swing, ever forget a hint, incidentally so important in
noooo noo nooooo noooo, nooo nooooo n nooo, nooooooooooo no noooooooo no

his art, as the one now alluded to.
noo noo, no noo noo noo noooooo no.




But Ahab, my Captain, still moves before me in all his Nantucket
Noo Nooo, no Noooooo, noooo noooo nooooo no no noo noo Noooooooo

grimness and shagginess; and in this episode touching Emperors and
nooooooo noo nooooooooo; noo no nooo noooooo nooooooo Nooooooo noo

Kings, I must not conceal that I have only to do with a poor old
Noooo, N nooo noo noooooo nooo N nooo nooo no no nooo n nooo noo

whale-hunter like him; and, therefore, all outward majestical trappings
noooo-nooooo nooo noo; noo, noooooooo, noo noooooo nooooooooo noooooooo

and housings are denied me. Oh, Ahab! what shall be grand in thee, it
noo nooooooo noo nooooo no. No, Nooo! nooo noooo no noooo no nooo, no

must needs be plucked at from the skies, and dived for in the deep, and
nooo noooo no noooooo no nooo noo noooo, noo noooo noo no noo nooo, noo

featured in the unbodied air!
nooooooo no noo nooooooo noo!










CHAPTER 34. The Cabin-Table.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo-Noooo.







It is noon; and Dough-Boy, the steward, thrusting his pale loaf-of-bread
No no nooo; noo Noooo-Noo, noo noooooo, noooooooo noo nooo nooo-no-noooo

face from the cabin-scuttle, announces dinner to his lord and
nooo nooo noo noooo-noooooo, noooooooo nooooo no noo nooo noo

master; who, sitting in the lee quarter-boat, has just been taking an
nooooo; noo, noooooo no noo noo noooooo-nooo, noo nooo nooo nooooo no

observation of the sun; and is now mutely reckoning the latitude on the
noooooooooo no noo noo; noo no noo nooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo no noo

smooth, medallion-shaped tablet, reserved for that daily purpose on
nooooo, noooooooo-nooooo nooooo, nooooooo noo nooo noooo noooooo no

the upper part of his ivory leg. From his complete inattention to the
noo noooo nooo no noo noooo noo. Nooo noo nooooooo noooooooooo no noo

tidings, you would think that moody Ahab had not heard his menial. But
noooooo, noo noooo noooo nooo noooo Nooo noo noo noooo noo nooooo. Noo

presently, catching hold of the mizen shrouds, he swings himself to
noooooooo, nooooooo nooo no noo noooo noooooo, no nooooo noooooo no

the deck, and in an even, unexhilarated voice, saying, "Dinner, Mr.
noo nooo, noo no no nooo, noooooooooooo noooo, nooooo, "Nooooo, No.

Starbuck," disappears into the cabin.
Nooooooo," nooooooooo nooo noo noooo.




When the last echo of his sultan's step has died away, and Starbuck, the
Nooo noo nooo nooo no noo nooooo'n nooo noo nooo nooo, noo Nooooooo, noo

first Emir, has every reason to suppose that he is seated, then Starbuck
noooo Nooo, noo noooo nooooo no noooooo nooo no no nooooo, nooo Nooooooo

rouses from his quietude, takes a few turns along the planks, and, after
nooooo nooo noo nooooooo, noooo n noo noooo noooo noo nooooo, noo, noooo

a grave peep into the binnacle, says, with some touch of pleasantness,
n noooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo, nooo, nooo nooo noooo no nooooooooooo,

"Dinner, Mr. Stubb," and descends the scuttle. The second Emir lounges
"Nooooo, No. Noooo," noo nooooooo noo noooooo. Noo nooooo Nooo noooooo

about the rigging awhile, and then slightly shaking the main brace, to
noooo noo noooooo nooooo, noo nooo nooooooo noooooo noo nooo noooo, no

see whether it will be all right with that important rope, he likewise
noo noooooo no nooo no noo noooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooo, no nooooooo

takes up the old burden, and with a rapid "Dinner, Mr. Flask," follows
noooo no noo noo nooooo, noo nooo n noooo "Nooooo, No. Noooo," noooooo

after his predecessors.
noooo noo nooooooooooo.




But the third Emir, now seeing himself all alone on the quarter-deck,
Noo noo noooo Nooo, noo nooooo noooooo noo noooo no noo noooooo-nooo,

seems to feel relieved from some curious restraint; for, tipping all
noooo no nooo nooooooo nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo; noo, noooooo noo

sorts of knowing winks in all sorts of directions, and kicking off his
noooo no noooooo noooo no noo noooo no nooooooooo, noo noooooo noo noo

shoes, he strikes into a sharp but noiseless squall of a hornpipe right
noooo, no noooooo nooo n noooo noo noooooooo nooooo no n nooooooo noooo

over the Grand Turk's head; and then, by a dexterous sleight, pitching
nooo noo Noooo Nooo'n nooo; noo nooo, no n noooooooo noooooo, nooooooo

his cap up into the mizentop for a shelf, he goes down rollicking so
noo noo no nooo noo nooooooo noo n noooo, no nooo nooo nooooooooo no

far at least as he remains visible from the deck, reversing all other
noo no noooo no no noooooo noooooo nooo noo nooo, noooooooo noo noooo

processions, by bringing up the rear with music. But ere stepping into
noooooooooo, no nooooooo no noo nooo nooo noooo. Noo noo nooooooo nooo

the cabin doorway below, he pauses, ships a new face altogether, and,
noo noooo noooooo noooo, no nooooo, noooo n noo nooo nooooooooo, noo,

then, independent, hilarious little Flask enters King Ahab's presence,
nooo, noooooooooo, noooooooo nooooo Noooo nooooo Nooo Nooo'n nooooooo,

in the character of Abjectus, or the Slave.
no noo noooooooo no Nooooooo, no noo Noooo.




It is not the least among the strange things bred by the intense
No no noo noo noooo noooo noo noooooo nooooo nooo no noo noooooo

artificialness of sea-usages, that while in the open air of the deck
nooooooooooooo no noo-nooooo, nooo noooo no noo nooo noo no noo nooo

some officers will, upon provocation, bear themselves boldly and
nooo nooooooo nooo, nooo noooooooooo, nooo nooooooooo nooooo noo

defyingly enough towards their commander; yet, ten to one, let those
noooooooo nooooo noooooo noooo noooooooo; noo, noo no noo, noo noooo

very officers the next moment go down to their customary dinner in that
nooo nooooooo noo nooo nooooo no nooo no noooo noooooooo nooooo no nooo

same commander's cabin, and straightway their inoffensive, not to say
nooo noooooooo'n noooo, noo noooooooooo noooo noooooooooo, noo no noo

deprecatory and humble air towards him, as he sits at the head of
noooooooooo noo nooooo noo noooooo noo, no no nooo no noo nooo no

the table; this is marvellous, sometimes most comical. Wherefore this
noo noooo; nooo no nooooooooo, noooooooo nooo noooooo. Noooooooo nooo

difference? A problem? Perhaps not. To have been Belshazzar, King of
nooooooooo? N noooooo? Noooooo noo. No nooo nooo Nooooooooo, Nooo no

Babylon; and to have been Belshazzar, not haughtily but courteously,
Noooooo; noo no nooo nooo Nooooooooo, noo noooooooo noo noooooooooo,

therein certainly must have been some touch of mundane grandeur. But he
noooooo noooooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo noooo no noooooo nooooooo. Noo no

who in the rightly regal and intelligent spirit presides over his own
noo no noo noooooo noooo noo noooooooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo noo

private dinner-table of invited guests, that man's unchallenged power
noooooo nooooo-noooo no noooooo nooooo, nooo noo'n nooooooooooo noooo

and dominion of individual influence for the time; that man's royalty of
noo nooooooo no nooooooooo noooooooo noo noo nooo; nooo noo'n noooooo no

state transcends Belshazzar's, for Belshazzar was not the greatest. Who
noooo nooooooooo Nooooooooo'n, noo Nooooooooo noo noo noo nooooooo. Noo

has but once dined his friends, has tasted what it is to be Caesar. It
noo noo nooo noooo noo noooooo, noo nooooo nooo no no no no Nooooo. No

is a witchery of social czarship which there is no withstanding. Now,
no n nooooooo no nooooo nooooooo noooo noooo no no nooooooooooo. Noo,

if to this consideration you superadd the official supremacy of a
no no nooo noooooooooooo noo nooooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo no n

ship-master, then, by inference, you will derive the cause of that
nooo-nooooo, nooo, no noooooooo, noo nooo nooooo noo noooo no nooo

peculiarity of sea-life just mentioned.
noooooooooo no noo-nooo nooo noooooooo.




Over his ivory-inlaid table, Ahab presided like a mute, maned
Nooo noo noooo-nooooo noooo, Nooo nooooooo nooo n nooo, noooo

sea-lion on the white coral beach, surrounded by his warlike but still
noo-nooo no noo noooo noooo noooo, nooooooooo no noo noooooo noo noooo

deferential cubs. In his own proper turn, each officer waited to be
noooooooooo nooo. No noo noo nooooo nooo, nooo noooooo nooooo no no

served. They were as little children before Ahab; and yet, in Ahab,
nooooo. Nooo nooo no nooooo nooooooo nooooo Nooo; noo noo, no Nooo,

there seemed not to lurk the smallest social arrogance. With one mind,
noooo nooooo noo no nooo noo nooooooo nooooo noooooooo. Nooo noo nooo,

their intent eyes all fastened upon the old man's knife, as he carved
noooo nooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo noo noo noo'n noooo, no no nooooo

the chief dish before him. I do not suppose that for the world they
noo noooo nooo nooooo noo. N no noo noooooo nooo noo noo noooo nooo

would have profaned that moment with the slightest observation, even
noooo nooo nooooooo nooo nooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooooooooo, nooo

upon so neutral a topic as the weather. No! And when reaching out his
nooo no noooooo n noooo no noo noooooo. No! Noo nooo nooooooo noo noo

knife and fork, between which the slice of beef was locked, Ahab thereby
noooo noo nooo, noooooo noooo noo noooo no nooo noo nooooo, Nooo noooooo

motioned Starbuck's plate towards him, the mate received his meat as
nooooooo Nooooooo'n noooo noooooo noo, noo nooo nooooooo noo nooo no

though receiving alms; and cut it tenderly; and a little started
nooooo noooooooo nooo; noo noo no nooooooo; noo n nooooo noooooo

if, perchance, the knife grazed against the plate; and chewed it
no, noooooooo, noo noooo nooooo noooooo noo noooo; noo nooooo no

noiselessly; and swallowed it, not without circumspection. For, like
noooooooooo; noo noooooooo no, noo noooooo nooooooooooooo. Noo, nooo

the Coronation banquet at Frankfort, where the German Emperor profoundly
noo Nooooooooo noooooo no Noooooooo, noooo noo Nooooo Noooooo nooooooooo

dines with the seven Imperial Electors, so these cabin meals were
noooo nooo noo noooo Nooooooo Nooooooo, no noooo noooo noooo nooo

somehow solemn meals, eaten in awful silence; and yet at table old Ahab
noooooo nooooo noooo, noooo no noooo noooooo; noo noo no noooo noo Nooo

forbade not conversation; only he himself was dumb. What a relief it was
noooooo noo nooooooooooo; nooo no noooooo noo nooo. Nooo n nooooo no noo

to choking Stubb, when a rat made a sudden racket in the hold below. And
no noooooo Noooo, nooo n noo nooo n nooooo nooooo no noo nooo noooo. Noo

poor little Flask, he was the youngest son, and little boy of this weary
nooo nooooo Noooo, no noo noo nooooooo noo, noo nooooo noo no nooo noooo

family party. His were the shinbones of the saline beef; his would have
nooooo noooo. Noo nooo noo noooooooo no noo nooooo nooo; noo noooo nooo

been the drumsticks. For Flask to have presumed to help himself, this
nooo noo nooooooooo. Noo Noooo no nooo nooooooo no nooo noooooo, nooo

must have seemed to him tantamount to larceny in the first degree. Had
nooo nooo nooooo no noo nooooooooo no noooooo no noo noooo nooooo. Noo

he helped himself at that table, doubtless, never more would he have
no nooooo noooooo no nooo noooo, noooooooo, noooo nooo noooo no nooo

been able to hold his head up in this honest world; nevertheless,
nooo nooo no nooo noo nooo no no nooo nooooo noooo; nooooooooooo,

strange to say, Ahab never forbade him. And had Flask helped himself,
noooooo no noo, Nooo noooo noooooo noo. Noo noo Noooo nooooo noooooo,

the chances were Ahab had never so much as noticed it. Least of all, did
noo noooooo nooo Nooo noo noooo no nooo no noooooo no. Noooo no noo, noo

Flask presume to help himself to butter. Whether he thought the owners
Noooo noooooo no nooo noooooo no nooooo. Noooooo no noooooo noo nooooo

of the ship denied it to him, on account of its clotting his clear,
no noo nooo nooooo no no noo, no noooooo no noo nooooooo noo noooo,

sunny complexion; or whether he deemed that, on so long a voyage in such
noooo nooooooooo; no noooooo no nooooo nooo, no no nooo n nooooo no nooo

marketless waters, butter was at a premium, and therefore was not for
nooooooooo nooooo, nooooo noo no n noooooo, noo noooooooo noo noo noo

him, a subaltern; however it was, Flask, alas! was a butterless man!
noo, n noooooooo; noooooo no noo, Noooo, nooo! noo n nooooooooo noo!




Another thing. Flask was the last person down at the dinner, and Flask
Noooooo noooo. Noooo noo noo nooo nooooo nooo no noo nooooo, noo Noooo

is the first man up. Consider! For hereby Flask's dinner was badly
no noo noooo noo no. Nooooooo! Noo nooooo Noooo'n nooooo noo noooo

jammed in point of time. Starbuck and Stubb both had the start of him;
nooooo no noooo no nooo. Nooooooo noo Noooo nooo noo noo noooo no noo;

and yet they also have the privilege of lounging in the rear. If Stubb
noo noo nooo nooo nooo noo noooooooo no nooooooo no noo nooo. No Noooo

even, who is but a peg higher than Flask, happens to have but a small
nooo, noo no noo n noo nooooo nooo Noooo, noooooo no nooo noo n noooo

appetite, and soon shows symptoms of concluding his repast, then Flask
nooooooo, noo nooo noooo nooooooo no nooooooooo noo nooooo, nooo Noooo

must bestir himself, he will not get more than three mouthfuls that day;
nooo nooooo noooooo, no nooo noo noo nooo nooo noooo noooooooo nooo noo;

for it is against holy usage for Stubb to precede Flask to the deck.
noo no no noooooo nooo noooo noo Noooo no noooooo Noooo no noo nooo.

Therefore it was that Flask once admitted in private, that ever since he
Noooooooo no noo nooo Noooo nooo nooooooo no noooooo, nooo nooo noooo no

had arisen to the dignity of an officer, from that moment he had never
noo nooooo no noo noooooo no no noooooo, nooo nooo nooooo no noo noooo

known what it was to be otherwise than hungry, more or less. For what
noooo nooo no noo no no noooooooo nooo nooooo, nooo no nooo. Noo nooo

he ate did not so much relieve his hunger, as keep it immortal in him.
no noo noo noo no nooo noooooo noo nooooo, no nooo no nooooooo no noo.

Peace and satisfaction, thought Flask, have for ever departed from
Noooo noo nooooooooooo, noooooo Noooo, nooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo

my stomach. I am an officer; but, how I wish I could fish a bit of
no noooooo. N no no noooooo; noo, noo N nooo N noooo nooo n noo no

old-fashioned beef in the forecastle, as I used to when I was before the
noo-noooooooo nooo no noo nooooooooo, no N nooo no nooo N noo nooooo noo

mast. There's the fruits of promotion now; there's the vanity of glory:
nooo. Noooo'n noo nooooo no noooooooo noo; noooo'n noo nooooo no noooo:

there's the insanity of life! Besides, if it were so that any mere
noooo'n noo nooooooo no nooo! Noooooo, no no nooo no nooo noo nooo

sailor of the Pequod had a grudge against Flask in Flask's official
nooooo no noo Nooooo noo n nooooo noooooo Noooo no Noooo'n nooooooo

capacity, all that sailor had to do, in order to obtain ample vengeance,
nooooooo, noo nooo nooooo noo no no, no noooo no nooooo noooo noooooooo,

was to go aft at dinner-time, and get a peep at Flask through the cabin
noo no no noo no nooooo-nooo, noo noo n nooo no Noooo noooooo noo noooo

sky-light, sitting silly and dumfoundered before awful Ahab.
noo-noooo, noooooo noooo noo nooooooooooo nooooo noooo Nooo.




Now, Ahab and his three mates formed what may be called the first table
Noo, Nooo noo noo noooo noooo nooooo nooo noo no nooooo noo noooo noooo

in the Pequod's cabin. After their departure, taking place in inverted
no noo Nooooo'n noooo. Noooo noooo noooooooo, nooooo noooo no nooooooo

order to their arrival, the canvas cloth was cleared, or rather was
noooo no noooo noooooo, noo nooooo noooo noo noooooo, no nooooo noo

restored to some hurried order by the pallid steward. And then the three
nooooooo no nooo noooooo noooo no noo nooooo noooooo. Noo nooo noo noooo

harpooneers were bidden to the feast, they being its residuary legatees.
noooooooooo nooo nooooo no noo noooo, nooo noooo noo noooooooo nooooooo.

They made a sort of temporary servants' hall of the high and mighty
Nooo nooo n nooo no noooooooo nooooooo' nooo no noo nooo noo nooooo

cabin.
noooo.




In strange contrast to the hardly tolerable constraint and nameless
No noooooo nooooooo no noo nooooo noooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooo

invisible domineerings of the captain's table, was the entire care-free
noooooooo nooooooooooo no noo noooooo'n noooo, noo noo nooooo nooo-nooo

license and ease, the almost frantic democracy of those inferior fellows
noooooo noo nooo, noo nooooo noooooo noooooooo no noooo nooooooo noooooo

the harpooneers. While their masters, the mates, seemed afraid of the
noo noooooooooo. Noooo noooo noooooo, noo noooo, nooooo nooooo no noo

sound of the hinges of their own jaws, the harpooneers chewed their food
noooo no noo nooooo no noooo noo nooo, noo noooooooooo nooooo noooo nooo

with such a relish that there was a report to it. They dined like lords;
nooo nooo n nooooo nooo noooo noo n nooooo no no. Nooo noooo nooo noooo;

they filled their bellies like Indian ships all day loading with spices.
nooo nooooo noooo noooooo nooo Nooooo noooo noo noo noooooo nooo nooooo.

Such portentous appetites had Queequeg and Tashtego, that to fill out
Nooo nooooooooo noooooooo noo Nooooooo noo Nooooooo, nooo no nooo noo

the vacancies made by the previous repast, often the pale Dough-Boy was
noo noooooooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooooo, noooo noo nooo Noooo-Noo noo

fain to bring on a great baron of salt-junk, seemingly quarried out of
nooo no noooo no n noooo noooo no nooo-nooo, noooooooo nooooooo noo no

the solid ox. And if he were not lively about it, if he did not go with
noo noooo no. Noo no no nooo noo nooooo noooo no, no no noo noo no nooo

a nimble hop-skip-and-jump, then Tashtego had an ungentlemanly way of
n nooooo noo-nooo-noo-nooo, nooo Nooooooo noo no noooooooooooo noo no

accelerating him by darting a fork at his back, harpoon-wise. And once
nooooooooooo noo no noooooo n nooo no noo nooo, noooooo-nooo. Noo nooo

Daggoo, seized with a sudden humor, assisted Dough-Boy's memory by
Nooooo, nooooo nooo n nooooo noooo, nooooooo Noooo-Noo'n nooooo no

snatching him up bodily, and thrusting his head into a great empty
noooooooo noo no nooooo, noo noooooooo noo nooo nooo n noooo noooo

wooden trencher, while Tashtego, knife in hand, began laying out the
nooooo nooooooo, noooo Nooooooo, noooo no nooo, noooo nooooo noo noo

circle preliminary to scalping him. He was naturally a very nervous,
nooooo noooooooooo no nooooooo noo. No noo noooooooo n nooo noooooo,

shuddering sort of little fellow, this bread-faced steward; the progeny
nooooooooo nooo no nooooo nooooo, nooo noooo-noooo noooooo; noo noooooo

of a bankrupt baker and a hospital nurse. And what with the standing
no n nooooooo noooo noo n nooooooo noooo. Noo nooo nooo noo nooooooo

spectacle of the black terrific Ahab, and the periodical tumultuous
noooooooo no noo noooo nooooooo Nooo, noo noo nooooooooo nooooooooo

visitations of these three savages, Dough-Boy's whole life was one
noooooooooo no noooo noooo noooooo, Noooo-Noo'n noooo nooo noo noo

continual lip-quiver. Commonly, after seeing the harpooneers furnished
noooooooo noo-nooooo. Nooooooo, noooo nooooo noo noooooooooo noooooooo

with all things they demanded, he would escape from their clutches into
nooo noo nooooo nooo nooooooo, no noooo nooooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooo

his little pantry adjoining, and fearfully peep out at them through the
noo nooooo nooooo noooooooo, noo noooooooo nooo noo no nooo noooooo noo

blinds of its door, till all was over.
nooooo no noo nooo, nooo noo noo nooo.




It was a sight to see Queequeg seated over against Tashtego, opposing
No noo n noooo no noo Nooooooo nooooo nooo noooooo Nooooooo, nooooooo

his filed teeth to the Indian's: crosswise to them, Daggoo seated on the
noo noooo noooo no noo Nooooo'n: noooooooo no nooo, Nooooo nooooo no noo

floor, for a bench would have brought his hearse-plumed head to the low
noooo, noo n noooo noooo nooo noooooo noo nooooo-nooooo nooo no noo noo

carlines; at every motion of his colossal limbs, making the low cabin
nooooooo; no noooo nooooo no noo nooooooo noooo, nooooo noo noo noooo

framework to shake, as when an African elephant goes passenger in a
noooooooo no noooo, no nooo no Noooooo nooooooo nooo noooooooo no n

ship. But for all this, the great negro was wonderfully abstemious,
nooo. Noo noo noo nooo, noo noooo noooo noo noooooooooo nooooooooo,

not to say dainty. It seemed hardly possible that by such comparatively
noo no noo nooooo. No nooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo no nooo noooooooooooo

small mouthfuls he could keep up the vitality diffused through so broad,
noooo noooooooo no noooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooooooo noooooo no noooo,

baronial, and superb a person. But, doubtless, this noble savage fed
nooooooo, noo nooooo n nooooo. Noo, noooooooo, nooo noooo nooooo noo

strong and drank deep of the abounding element of air; and through his
nooooo noo noooo nooo no noo noooooooo noooooo no noo; noo noooooo noo

dilated nostrils snuffed in the sublime life of the worlds. Not by
noooooo nooooooo noooooo no noo noooooo nooo no noo nooooo. Noo no

beef or by bread, are giants made or nourished. But Queequeg, he had a
nooo no no noooo, noo nooooo nooo no noooooooo. Noo Nooooooo, no noo n

mortal, barbaric smack of the lip in eating--an ugly sound enough--so
nooooo, nooooooo noooo no noo noo no nooooo--no nooo noooo nooooo--no

much so, that the trembling Dough-Boy almost looked to see whether
nooo no, nooo noo noooooooo Noooo-Noo nooooo nooooo no noo noooooo

any marks of teeth lurked in his own lean arms. And when he would hear
noo noooo no noooo nooooo no noo noo nooo nooo. Noo nooo no noooo nooo

Tashtego singing out for him to produce himself, that his bones might be
Nooooooo noooooo noo noo noo no noooooo noooooo, nooo noo noooo noooo no

picked, the simple-witted steward all but shattered the crockery hanging
nooooo, noo nooooo-nooooo noooooo noo noo noooooooo noo nooooooo noooooo

round him in the pantry, by his sudden fits of the palsy. Nor did the
noooo noo no noo nooooo, no noo nooooo nooo no noo noooo. Noo noo noo

whetstone which the harpooneers carried in their pockets, for their
noooooooo noooo noo noooooooooo noooooo no noooo noooooo, noo noooo

lances and other weapons; and with which whetstones, at dinner, they
nooooo noo noooo noooooo; noo nooo noooo nooooooooo, no nooooo, nooo

would ostentatiously sharpen their knives; that grating sound did not at
noooo nooooooooooooo noooooo noooo nooooo; nooo noooooo noooo noo noo no

all tend to tranquillize poor Dough-Boy. How could he forget that in his
noo nooo no nooooooooooo nooo Noooo-Noo. Noo noooo no nooooo nooo no noo

Island days, Queequeg, for one, must certainly have been guilty of some
Nooooo nooo, Nooooooo, noo noo, nooo noooooooo nooo nooo nooooo no nooo

murderous, convivial indiscretions. Alas! Dough-Boy! hard fares the
noooooooo, noooooooo noooooooooooo. Nooo! Noooo-Noo! nooo noooo noo

white waiter who waits upon cannibals. Not a napkin should he carry on
noooo nooooo noo noooo nooo noooooooo. Noo n nooooo nooooo no noooo no

his arm, but a buckler. In good time, though, to his great delight,
noo noo, noo n noooooo. No nooo nooo, nooooo, no noo noooo noooooo,

the three salt-sea warriors would rise and depart; to his credulous,
noo noooo nooo-noo nooooooo noooo nooo noo nooooo; no noo noooooooo,

fable-mongering ears, all their martial bones jingling in them at every
noooo-noooooooo nooo, noo noooo noooooo noooo nooooooo no nooo no noooo

step, like Moorish scimetars in scabbards.
nooo, nooo Noooooo noooooooo no noooooooo.




But, though these barbarians dined in the cabin, and nominally lived
Noo, nooooo noooo nooooooooo noooo no noo noooo, noo noooooooo noooo

there; still, being anything but sedentary in their habits, they were
noooo; noooo, noooo nooooooo noo noooooooo no noooo nooooo, nooo nooo

scarcely ever in it except at mealtimes, and just before sleeping-time,
nooooooo nooo no no nooooo no noooooooo, noo nooo nooooo nooooooo-nooo,

when they passed through it to their own peculiar quarters.
nooo nooo nooooo noooooo no no noooo noo nooooooo nooooooo.




In this one matter, Ahab seemed no exception to most American whale
No nooo noo nooooo, Nooo nooooo no noooooooo no nooo Nooooooo noooo

captains, who, as a set, rather incline to the opinion that by rights
nooooooo, noo, no n noo, nooooo noooooo no noo noooooo nooo no nooooo

the ship's cabin belongs to them; and that it is by courtesy alone that
noo nooo'n noooo noooooo no nooo; noo nooo no no no nooooooo noooo nooo

anybody else is, at any time, permitted there. So that, in real truth,
noooooo nooo no, no noo nooo, noooooooo noooo. No nooo, no nooo noooo,

the mates and harpooneers of the Pequod might more properly be said to
noo noooo noo noooooooooo no noo Nooooo noooo nooo nooooooo no nooo no

have lived out of the cabin than in it. For when they did enter it, it
nooo noooo noo no noo noooo nooo no no. Noo nooo nooo noo noooo no, no

was something as a street-door enters a house; turning inwards for
noo noooooooo no n nooooo-nooo nooooo n noooo; noooooo noooooo noo

a moment, only to be turned out the next; and, as a permanent thing,
n nooooo, nooo no no nooooo noo noo nooo; noo, no n noooooooo noooo,

residing in the open air. Nor did they lose much hereby; in the cabin
nooooooo no noo nooo noo. Noo noo nooo nooo nooo nooooo; no noo noooo

was no companionship; socially, Ahab was inaccessible. Though nominally
noo no noooooooooooo; nooooooo, Nooo noo nooooooooooo. Nooooo noooooooo

included in the census of Christendom, he was still an alien to it. He
nooooooo no noo nooooo no Noooooooooo, no noo noooo no noooo no no. No

lived in the world, as the last of the Grisly Bears lived in settled
noooo no noo noooo, no noo nooo no noo Nooooo Noooo noooo no noooooo

Missouri. And as when Spring and Summer had departed, that wild Logan of
Nooooooo. Noo no nooo Nooooo noo Nooooo noo nooooooo, nooo nooo Noooo no

the woods, burying himself in the hollow of a tree, lived out the winter
noo noooo, noooooo noooooo no noo nooooo no n nooo, noooo noo noo nooooo

there, sucking his own paws; so, in his inclement, howling old age,
noooo, noooooo noo noo nooo; no, no noo noooooooo, noooooo noo noo,

Ahab's soul, shut up in the caved trunk of his body, there fed upon the
Nooo'n nooo, nooo no no noo noooo noooo no noo nooo, noooo noo nooo noo

sullen paws of its gloom!
nooooo nooo no noo noooo!










CHAPTER 35. The Mast-Head.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo-Nooo.







It was during the more pleasant weather, that in due rotation with the
No noo nooooo noo nooo nooooooo noooooo, nooo no noo nooooooo nooo noo

other seamen my first mast-head came round.
noooo nooooo no noooo nooo-nooo nooo noooo.




In most American whalemen the mast-heads are manned almost
No nooo Nooooooo nooooooo noo nooo-noooo noo nooooo nooooo

simultaneously with the vessel's leaving her port; even though she may
nooooooooooooo nooo noo nooooo'n noooooo noo nooo; nooo nooooo noo noo

have fifteen thousand miles, and more, to sail ere reaching her proper
nooo noooooo nooooooo noooo, noo nooo, no nooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo

cruising ground. And if, after a three, four, or five years' voyage
nooooooo nooooo. Noo no, noooo n noooo, nooo, no nooo noooo' nooooo

she is drawing nigh home with anything empty in her--say, an empty vial
noo no noooooo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo noooo no noo--noo, no noooo nooo

even--then, her mast-heads are kept manned to the last; and not till her
nooo--nooo, noo nooo-noooo noo nooo nooooo no noo nooo; noo noo nooo noo

skysail-poles sail in among the spires of the port, does she altogether
noooooo-noooo nooo no noooo noo nooooo no noo nooo, nooo noo nooooooooo

relinquish the hope of capturing one whale more.
nooooooooo noo nooo no noooooooo noo noooo nooo.




Now, as the business of standing mast-heads, ashore or afloat, is a very
Noo, no noo nooooooo no nooooooo nooo-noooo, nooooo no nooooo, no n nooo

ancient and interesting one, let us in some measure expatiate here.
noooooo noo noooooooooo noo, noo no no nooo noooooo noooooooo nooo.

I take it, that the earliest standers of mast-heads were the old
N nooo no, nooo noo nooooooo nooooooo no nooo-noooo nooo noo noo

Egyptians; because, in all my researches, I find none prior to them.
Noooooooo; noooooo, no noo no nooooooooo, N nooo nooo noooo no nooo.

For though their progenitors, the builders of Babel, must doubtless, by
Noo nooooo noooo noooooooooo, noo nooooooo no Noooo, nooo noooooooo, no

their tower, have intended to rear the loftiest mast-head in all Asia,
noooo noooo, nooo nooooooo no nooo noo nooooooo nooo-nooo no noo Nooo,

or Africa either; yet (ere the final truck was put to it) as that great
no Nooooo nooooo; noo (noo noo noooo noooo noo noo no no) no nooo noooo

stone mast of theirs may be said to have gone by the board, in the dread
noooo nooo no nooooo noo no nooo no nooo nooo no noo noooo, no noo noooo

gale of God's wrath; therefore, we cannot give these Babel builders
nooo no Noo'n noooo; noooooooo, no nooooo nooo noooo Noooo nooooooo

priority over the Egyptians. And that the Egyptians were a nation of
nooooooo nooo noo Noooooooo. Noo nooo noo Noooooooo nooo n nooooo no

mast-head standers, is an assertion based upon the general belief among
nooo-nooo nooooooo, no no noooooooo noooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo noooo

archaeologists, that the first pyramids were founded for astronomical
nooooooooooooo, nooo noo noooo nooooooo nooo noooooo noo nooooooooooo

purposes: a theory singularly supported by the peculiar stair-like
nooooooo: n nooooo nooooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooooo noooo-nooo

formation of all four sides of those edifices; whereby, with prodigious
noooooooo no noo nooo noooo no noooo nooooooo; noooooo, nooo nooooooooo

long upliftings of their legs, those old astronomers were wont to mount
nooo nooooooooo no noooo nooo, noooo noo noooooooooo nooo nooo no noooo

to the apex, and sing out for new stars; even as the look-outs of a
no noo nooo, noo nooo noo noo noo noooo; nooo no noo nooo-nooo no n

modern ship sing out for a sail, or a whale just bearing in sight. In
nooooo nooo nooo noo noo n nooo, no n noooo nooo noooooo no noooo. No

Saint Stylites, the famous Christian hermit of old times, who built him
Noooo Nooooooo, noo nooooo Noooooooo nooooo no noo noooo, noo noooo noo

a lofty stone pillar in the desert and spent the whole latter portion of
n noooo noooo nooooo no noo nooooo noo noooo noo noooo nooooo noooooo no

his life on its summit, hoisting his food from the ground with a
noo nooo no noo nooooo, nooooooo noo nooo nooo noo nooooo nooo n

tackle; in him we have a remarkable instance of a dauntless
nooooo; no noo no nooo n nooooooooo nooooooo no n noooooooo

stander-of-mast-heads; who was not to be driven from his place by fogs
noooooo-no-nooo-noooo; noo noo noo no no nooooo nooo noo noooo no nooo

or frosts, rain, hail, or sleet; but valiantly facing everything out to
no nooooo, nooo, nooo, no noooo; noo noooooooo nooooo nooooooooo noo no

the last, literally died at his post. Of modern standers-of-mast-heads
noo nooo, noooooooo nooo no noo nooo. No nooooo nooooooo-no-nooo-noooo

we have but a lifeless set; mere stone, iron, and bronze men; who,
no nooo noo n nooooooo noo; nooo noooo, nooo, noo nooooo noo; noo,

though well capable of facing out a stiff gale, are still entirely
nooooo nooo noooooo no nooooo noo n noooo nooo, noo noooo nooooooo

incompetent to the business of singing out upon discovering any strange
noooooooooo no noo nooooooo no noooooo noo nooo noooooooooo noo noooooo

sight. There is Napoleon; who, upon the top of the column of Vendome,
noooo. Noooo no Nooooooo; noo, nooo noo noo no noo nooooo no Noooooo,

stands with arms folded, some one hundred and fifty feet in the air;
nooooo nooo nooo nooooo, nooo noo noooooo noo noooo nooo no noo noo;

careless, now, who rules the decks below; whether Louis Philippe, Louis
nooooooo, noo, noo noooo noo noooo noooo; noooooo Noooo Nooooooo, Noooo

Blanc, or Louis the Devil. Great Washington, too, stands high aloft on
Noooo, no Noooo noo Noooo. Noooo Nooooooooo, noo, nooooo nooo noooo no

his towering main-mast in Baltimore, and like one of Hercules' pillars,
noo nooooooo nooo-nooo no Noooooooo, noo nooo noo no Nooooooo' noooooo,

his column marks that point of human grandeur beyond which few mortals
noo nooooo noooo nooo noooo no noooo nooooooo nooooo noooo noo noooooo

will go. Admiral Nelson, also, on a capstan of gun-metal, stands his
nooo no. Noooooo Nooooo, nooo, no n noooooo no noo-noooo, nooooo noo

mast-head in Trafalgar Square; and ever when most obscured by that
nooo-nooo no Noooooooo Nooooo; noo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo no nooo

London smoke, token is yet given that a hidden hero is there; for
Nooooo noooo, noooo no noo noooo nooo n nooooo nooo no noooo; noo

where there is smoke, must be fire. But neither great Washington, nor
noooo noooo no noooo, nooo no nooo. Noo noooooo noooo Nooooooooo, noo

Napoleon, nor Nelson, will answer a single hail from below, however
Nooooooo, noo Nooooo, nooo nooooo n nooooo nooo nooo noooo, noooooo

madly invoked to befriend by their counsels the distracted decks
noooo noooooo no nooooooo no noooo nooooooo noo nooooooooo noooo

upon which they gaze; however it may be surmised, that their spirits
nooo noooo nooo nooo; noooooo no noo no nooooooo, nooo noooo noooooo

penetrate through the thick haze of the future, and descry what shoals
noooooooo noooooo noo noooo nooo no noo nooooo, noo nooooo nooo nooooo

and what rocks must be shunned.
noo nooo noooo nooo no noooooo.




It may seem unwarrantable to couple in any respect the mast-head
No noo nooo noooooooooooo no nooooo no noo noooooo noo nooo-nooo

standers of the land with those of the sea; but that in truth it is
nooooooo no noo nooo nooo noooo no noo noo; noo nooo no noooo no no

not so, is plainly evinced by an item for which Obed Macy, the sole
noo no, no noooooo noooooo no no nooo noo noooo Nooo Nooo, noo nooo

historian of Nantucket, stands accountable. The worthy Obed tells us,
noooooooo no Noooooooo, nooooo noooooooooo. Noo nooooo Nooo noooo no,

that in the early times of the whale fishery, ere ships were regularly
nooo no noo noooo noooo no noo noooo noooooo, noo noooo nooo noooooooo

launched in pursuit of the game, the people of that island erected lofty
nooooooo no noooooo no noo nooo, noo nooooo no nooo nooooo noooooo noooo

spars along the sea-coast, to which the look-outs ascended by means
noooo noooo noo noo-noooo, no noooo noo nooo-nooo nooooooo no noooo

of nailed cleats, something as fowls go upstairs in a hen-house. A few
no nooooo nooooo, noooooooo no noooo no nooooooo no n noo-noooo. N noo

years ago this same plan was adopted by the Bay whalemen of New Zealand,
noooo noo nooo nooo nooo noo noooooo no noo Noo nooooooo no Noo Noooooo,

who, upon descrying the game, gave notice to the ready-manned boats nigh
noo, nooo noooooooo noo nooo, nooo nooooo no noo noooo-nooooo noooo nooo

the beach. But this custom has now become obsolete; turn we then to the
noo noooo. Noo nooo nooooo noo noo nooooo nooooooo; nooo no nooo no noo

one proper mast-head, that of a whale-ship at sea. The three mast-heads
noo nooooo nooo-nooo, nooo no n noooo-nooo no noo. Noo noooo nooo-noooo

are kept manned from sun-rise to sun-set; the seamen taking their
noo nooo nooooo nooo noo-nooo no noo-noo; noo nooooo nooooo noooo

regular turns (as at the helm), and relieving each other every two
noooooo noooo (no no noo nooo), noo noooooooo nooo noooo noooo noo

hours. In the serene weather of the tropics it is exceedingly pleasant
noooo. No noo nooooo noooooo no noo noooooo no no noooooooooo nooooooo

the mast-head; nay, to a dreamy meditative man it is delightful. There
noo nooo-nooo; noo, no n nooooo nooooooooo noo no no nooooooooo. Noooo

you stand, a hundred feet above the silent decks, striding along the
noo noooo, n noooooo nooo noooo noo nooooo noooo, nooooooo noooo noo

deep, as if the masts were gigantic stilts, while beneath you and
nooo, no no noo noooo nooo nooooooo nooooo, noooo noooooo noo noo

between your legs, as it were, swim the hugest monsters of the sea, even
noooooo nooo nooo, no no nooo, nooo noo nooooo nooooooo no noo noo, nooo

as ships once sailed between the boots of the famous Colossus at old
no noooo nooo nooooo noooooo noo noooo no noo nooooo Nooooooo no noo

Rhodes. There you stand, lost in the infinite series of the sea, with
Nooooo. Noooo noo noooo, nooo no noo nooooooo nooooo no noo noo, nooo

nothing ruffled but the waves. The tranced ship indolently rolls; the
noooooo noooooo noo noo noooo. Noo noooooo nooo nooooooooo noooo; noo

drowsy trade winds blow; everything resolves you into languor. For the
nooooo noooo noooo nooo; nooooooooo nooooooo noo nooo noooooo. Noo noo

most part, in this tropic whaling life, a sublime uneventfulness invests
nooo nooo, no nooo nooooo noooooo nooo, n noooooo nooooooooooooo noooooo

you; you hear no news; read no gazettes; extras with startling accounts
noo; noo nooo no nooo; nooo no nooooooo; nooooo nooo noooooooo nooooooo

of commonplaces never delude you into unnecessary excitements; you hear
no nooooooooooo noooo nooooo noo nooo noooooooooo noooooooooo; noo nooo

of no domestic afflictions; bankrupt securities; fall of stocks; are
no no nooooooo noooooooooo; nooooooo nooooooooo; nooo no nooooo; noo

never troubled with the thought of what you shall have for dinner--for
noooo nooooooo nooo noo noooooo no nooo noo noooo nooo noo nooooo--noo

all your meals for three years and more are snugly stowed in casks, and
noo nooo noooo noo noooo noooo noo nooo noo nooooo nooooo no noooo, noo

your bill of fare is immutable.
nooo nooo no nooo no noooooooo.




In one of those southern whalesmen, on a long three or four years'
No noo no noooo nooooooo noooooooo, no n nooo noooo no nooo noooo'

voyage, as often happens, the sum of the various hours you spend at the
nooooo, no noooo noooooo, noo noo no noo noooooo noooo noo noooo no noo

mast-head would amount to several entire months. And it is much to be
nooo-nooo noooo nooooo no noooooo nooooo nooooo. Noo no no nooo no no

deplored that the place to which you devote so considerable a portion
nooooooo nooo noo noooo no noooo noo nooooo no nooooooooooo n noooooo

of the whole term of your natural life, should be so sadly destitute
no noo noooo nooo no nooo noooooo nooo, nooooo no no noooo noooooooo

of anything approaching to a cosy inhabitiveness, or adapted to breed a
no nooooooo noooooooooo no n nooo nooooooooooooo, no noooooo no noooo n

comfortable localness of feeling, such as pertains to a bed, a hammock,
noooooooooo noooooooo no noooooo, nooo no nooooooo no n noo, n noooooo,

a hearse, a sentry box, a pulpit, a coach, or any other of those small
n nooooo, n nooooo noo, n nooooo, n noooo, no noo noooo no noooo noooo

and snug contrivances in which men temporarily isolate themselves. Your
noo nooo nooooooooooo no noooo noo noooooooooo noooooo nooooooooo. Nooo

most usual point of perch is the head of the t' gallant-mast, where you
nooo noooo noooo no noooo no noo nooo no noo n' noooooo-nooo, noooo noo

stand upon two thin parallel sticks (almost peculiar to whalemen) called
noooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo nooooo (nooooo nooooooo no nooooooo) nooooo

the t' gallant cross-trees. Here, tossed about by the sea, the beginner
noo n' noooooo noooo-noooo. Nooo, nooooo noooo no noo noo, noo nooooooo

feels about as cosy as he would standing on a bull's horns. To be sure,
noooo noooo no nooo no no noooo nooooooo no n nooo'n noooo. No no nooo,

in cold weather you may carry your house aloft with you, in the shape of
no nooo noooooo noo noo noooo nooo noooo noooo nooo noo, no noo noooo no

a watch-coat; but properly speaking the thickest watch-coat is no more
n noooo-nooo; noo nooooooo nooooooo noo nooooooo noooo-nooo no no nooo

of a house than the unclad body; for as the soul is glued inside of its
no n noooo nooo noo nooooo nooo; noo no noo nooo no noooo nooooo no noo

fleshy tabernacle, and cannot freely move about in it, nor even move out
nooooo nooooooooo, noo nooooo nooooo nooo noooo no no, noo nooo nooo noo

of it, without running great risk of perishing (like an ignorant pilgrim
no no, noooooo noooooo noooo nooo no noooooooo (nooo no nooooooo noooooo

crossing the snowy Alps in winter); so a watch-coat is not so much of
nooooooo noo noooo Nooo no nooooo); no n noooo-nooo no noo no nooo no

a house as it is a mere envelope, or additional skin encasing you. You
n noooo no no no n nooo nooooooo, no nooooooooo nooo nooooooo noo. Noo

cannot put a shelf or chest of drawers in your body, and no more can you
nooooo noo n noooo no noooo no noooooo no nooo nooo, noo no nooo noo noo

make a convenient closet of your watch-coat.
nooo n nooooooooo nooooo no nooo noooo-nooo.




Concerning all this, it is much to be deplored that the mast-heads of a
Nooooooooo noo nooo, no no nooo no no nooooooo nooo noo nooo-noooo no n

southern whale ship are unprovided with those enviable little tents
nooooooo noooo nooo noo nooooooooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooooo noooo

or pulpits, called CROW'S-NESTS, in which the look-outs of a Greenland
no noooooo, nooooo NOOO'N-NOOOO, no noooo noo nooo-nooo no n Noooooooo

whaler are protected from the inclement weather of the frozen seas. In
nooooo noo noooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooooo no noo nooooo nooo. No

the fireside narrative of Captain Sleet, entitled "A Voyage among the
noo nooooooo noooooooo no Noooooo Noooo, nooooooo "N Nooooo noooo noo

a charmingly circumstantial account of the then recently invented
n nooooooooo nooooooooooooo noooooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooooooo

CROW'S-NEST of the Glacier, which was the name of Captain Sleet's good
NOOO'N-NOOO no noo Noooooo, noooo noo noo nooo no Noooooo Noooo'n nooo

craft. He called it the SLEET'S CROW'S-NEST, in honour of himself; he
noooo. No nooooo no noo NOOOO'N NOOO'N-NOOO, no nooooo no noooooo; no

being the original inventor and patentee, and free from all ridiculous
noooo noo nooooooo nooooooo noo nooooooo, noo nooo nooo noo nooooooooo

noooo nooooooo, noo noooooo nooo no no nooo noo noo nooooooo noooo noo

own names (we fathers being the original inventors and patentees), so
noo noooo (no noooooo noooo noo nooooooo noooooooo noo noooooooo), no

nooooooo nooooo no nooooooooo noooo noooooooo noo noooo noooooooo no

may beget. In shape, the Sleet's crow's-nest is something like a large
noo noooo. No noooo, noo Noooo'n nooo'n-nooo no noooooooo nooo n noooo

tierce or pipe; it is open above, however, where it is furnished with
nooooo no nooo; no no nooo noooo, noooooo, noooo no no noooooooo nooo

a movable side-screen to keep to windward of your head in a hard gale.
n noooooo nooo-nooooo no nooo no nooooooo no nooo nooo no n nooo nooo.

Being fixed on the summit of the mast, you ascend into it through a
Noooo noooo no noo nooooo no noo nooo, noo nooooo nooo no noooooo n

little trap-hatch in the bottom. On the after side, or side next the
nooooo nooo-noooo no noo nooooo. No noo noooo nooo, no nooo nooo noo

stern of the ship, is a comfortable seat, with a locker underneath for
noooo no noo nooo, no n noooooooooo nooo, nooo n nooooo nooooooooo noo
