nooo nooooo nooo noo nooooooo, Nooo, no nooo noo noo, noo noo noooooo n

thousand fold more potency than ever he had sanely brought to bear upon
nooooooo nooo nooo noooooo nooo nooo no noo nooooo noooooo no nooo nooo

any one reasonable object.
noo noo nooooooooo nooooo.




This is much; yet Ahab's larger, darker, deeper part remains unhinted.
Nooo no nooo; noo Nooo'n nooooo, nooooo, nooooo nooo noooooo nooooooo.

But vain to popularize profundities, and all truth is profound. Winding
Noo nooo no nooooooooo nooooooooooo, noo noo noooo no nooooooo. Noooooo

far down from within the very heart of this spiked Hotel de Cluny where
noo nooo nooo nooooo noo nooo noooo no nooo nooooo Noooo no Noooo noooo

we here stand--however grand and wonderful, now quit it;--and take your
no nooo noooo--noooooo noooo noo noooooooo, noo nooo no;--noo nooo nooo

way, ye nobler, sadder souls, to those vast Roman halls of Thermes;
noo, no nooooo, nooooo noooo, no noooo nooo Noooo noooo no Noooooo;

where far beneath the fantastic towers of man's upper earth, his root
noooo noo noooooo noo noooooooo nooooo no noo'n noooo noooo, noo nooo

of grandeur, his whole awful essence sits in bearded state; an antique
no nooooooo, noo noooo noooo noooooo nooo no noooooo noooo; no noooooo

buried beneath antiquities, and throned on torsoes! So with a broken
nooooo noooooo noooooooooo, noo noooooo no noooooo! No nooo n nooooo

throne, the great gods mock that captive king; so like a Caryatid, he
nooooo, noo noooo nooo nooo nooo noooooo nooo; no nooo n Nooooooo, no

patient sits, upholding on his frozen brow the piled entablatures of
noooooo nooo, noooooooo no noo nooooo nooo noo noooo nooooooooooo no

ages. Wind ye down there, ye prouder, sadder souls! question that proud,
nooo. Nooo no nooo noooo, no noooooo, nooooo noooo! nooooooo nooo noooo,

sad king! A family likeness! aye, he did beget ye, ye young exiled
noo nooo! N nooooo nooooooo! noo, no noo noooo no, no noooo nooooo

royalties; and from your grim sire only will the old State-secret come.
noooooooo; noo nooo nooo nooo nooo nooo nooo noo noo Noooo-nooooo nooo.




Now, in his heart, Ahab had some glimpse of this, namely: all my means
Noo, no noo noooo, Nooo noo nooo noooooo no nooo, nooooo: noo no noooo

are sane, my motive and my object mad. Yet without power to kill, or
noo nooo, no nooooo noo no nooooo noo. Noo noooooo noooo no nooo, no

change, or shun the fact; he likewise knew that to mankind he did long
nooooo, no nooo noo nooo; no nooooooo nooo nooo no noooooo no noo nooo

dissemble; in some sort, did still. But that thing of his dissembling
noooooooo; no nooo nooo, noo noooo. Noo nooo noooo no noo noooooooooo

was only subject to his perceptibility, not to his will determinate.
noo nooo noooooo no noo nooooooooooooo, noo no noo nooo noooooooooo.

Nevertheless, so well did he succeed in that dissembling, that when
Nooooooooooo, no nooo noo no noooooo no nooo noooooooooo, nooo nooo

with ivory leg he stepped ashore at last, no Nantucketer thought him
nooo noooo noo no noooooo nooooo no nooo, no Noooooooooo noooooo noo

otherwise than but naturally grieved, and that to the quick, with the
noooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooooo, noo nooo no noo noooo, nooo noo

terrible casualty which had overtaken him.
nooooooo nooooooo noooo noo noooooooo noo.




The report of his undeniable delirium at sea was likewise popularly
Noo nooooo no noo nooooooooo nooooooo no noo noo nooooooo noooooooo

ascribed to a kindred cause. And so too, all the added moodiness which
nooooooo no n noooooo noooo. Noo no noo, noo noo noooo noooooooo noooo

always afterwards, to the very day of sailing in the Pequod on the
nooooo nooooooooo, no noo nooo noo no noooooo no noo Nooooo no noo

present voyage, sat brooding on his brow. Nor is it so very unlikely,
noooooo nooooo, noo nooooooo no noo nooo. Noo no no no nooo nooooooo,

that far from distrusting his fitness for another whaling voyage, on
nooo noo nooo noooooooooo noo noooooo noo noooooo noooooo nooooo, no

account of such dark symptoms, the calculating people of that prudent
noooooo no nooo nooo nooooooo, noo noooooooooo nooooo no nooo noooooo

isle were inclined to harbor the conceit, that for those very reasons he
nooo nooo nooooooo no nooooo noo noooooo, nooo noo noooo nooo noooooo no

was all the better qualified and set on edge, for a pursuit so full
noo noo noo nooooo noooooooo noo noo no nooo, noo n noooooo no nooo

of rage and wildness as the bloody hunt of whales. Gnawed within and
no nooo noo nooooooo no noo nooooo nooo no nooooo. Nooooo nooooo noo

scorched without, with the infixed, unrelenting fangs of some incurable
nooooooo noooooo, nooo noo noooooo, noooooooooo noooo no nooo noooooooo

idea; such an one, could he be found, would seem the very man to dart
nooo; nooo no noo, noooo no no noooo, noooo nooo noo nooo noo no nooo

his iron and lift his lance against the most appalling of all brutes.
noo nooo noo nooo noo noooo noooooo noo nooo noooooooo no noo nooooo.

Or, if for any reason thought to be corporeally incapacitated for that,
No, no noo noo nooooo noooooo no no noooooooooo noooooooooooo noo nooo,

yet such an one would seem superlatively competent to cheer and howl on
noo nooo no noo noooo nooo noooooooooooo noooooooo no noooo noo nooo no

his underlings to the attack. But be all this as it may, certain it is,
noo nooooooooo no noo nooooo. Noo no noo nooo no no noo, noooooo no no,

that with the mad secret of his unabated rage bolted up and keyed in
nooo nooo noo noo nooooo no noo nooooooo nooo nooooo no noo noooo no

him, Ahab had purposely sailed upon the present voyage with the one only
noo, Nooo noo noooooooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooo

and all-engrossing object of hunting the White Whale. Had any one of his
noo noo-nooooooooo nooooo no noooooo noo Noooo Noooo. Noo noo noo no noo

old acquaintances on shore but half dreamed of what was lurking in him
noo noooooooooooo no noooo noo nooo noooooo no nooo noo noooooo no noo

then, how soon would their aghast and righteous souls have wrenched the
nooo, noo nooo noooo noooo nooooo noo noooooooo noooo nooo nooooooo noo

ship from such a fiendish man! They were bent on profitable cruises, the
nooo nooo nooo n nooooooo noo! Nooo nooo nooo no nooooooooo noooooo, noo

profit to be counted down in dollars from the mint. He was intent on an
nooooo no no noooooo nooo no noooooo nooo noo nooo. No noo nooooo no no

audacious, immitigable, and supernatural revenge.
noooooooo, noooooooooo, noo nooooooooooo noooooo.




Here, then, was this grey-headed, ungodly old man, chasing with curses a
Nooo, nooo, noo nooo nooo-nooooo, noooooo noo noo, noooooo nooo nooooo n

Job's whale round the world, at the head of a crew, too, chiefly made
Noo'n noooo noooo noo noooo, no noo nooo no n nooo, noo, noooooo nooo

up of mongrel renegades, and castaways, and cannibals--morally enfeebled
no no noooooo noooooooo, noo noooooooo, noo noooooooo--noooooo noooooooo

also, by the incompetence of mere unaided virtue or right-mindedness in
nooo, no noo nooooooooooo no nooo noooooo nooooo no noooo-nooooooooo no

Starbuck, the invunerable jollity of indifference and recklessness in
Nooooooo, noo noooooooooo noooooo no nooooooooooo noo nooooooooooo no

Stubb, and the pervading mediocrity in Flask. Such a crew, so officered,
Noooo, noo noo noooooooo nooooooooo no Noooo. Nooo n nooo, no noooooooo,

seemed specially picked and packed by some infernal fatality to help him
nooooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooooo no nooo nooooooo nooooooo no nooo noo

to his monomaniac revenge. How it was that they so aboundingly responded
no noo nooooooooo noooooo. Noo no noo nooo nooo no noooooooooo noooooooo

to the old man's ire--by what evil magic their souls were possessed,
no noo noo noo'n noo--no nooo nooo noooo noooo noooo nooo noooooooo,

that at times his hate seemed almost theirs; the White Whale as much
nooo no noooo noo nooo nooooo nooooo nooooo; noo Noooo Noooo no nooo

their insufferable foe as his; how all this came to be--what the White
noooo nooooooooooo noo no noo; noo noo nooo nooo no no--nooo noo Noooo

Whale was to them, or how to their unconscious understandings, also, in
Noooo noo no nooo, no noo no noooo noooooooooo nooooooooooooo, nooo, no

some dim, unsuspected way, he might have seemed the gliding great demon
nooo noo, noooooooooo noo, no noooo nooo nooooo noo noooooo noooo noooo

of the seas of life,--all this to explain, would be to dive deeper than
no noo nooo no nooo,--noo nooo no noooooo, noooo no no nooo nooooo nooo

Ishmael can go. The subterranean miner that works in us all, how can one
Noooooo noo no. Noo nooooooooooo noooo nooo noooo no no noo, noo noo noo

tell whither leads his shaft by the ever shifting, muffled sound of his
nooo noooooo noooo noo noooo no noo nooo nooooooo, noooooo noooo no noo

pick? Who does not feel the irresistible arm drag? What skiff in tow
nooo? Noo nooo noo nooo noo nooooooooooo noo nooo? Nooo noooo no noo

of a seventy-four can stand still? For one, I gave myself up to the
no n noooooo-nooo noo noooo noooo? Noo noo, N nooo nooooo no no noo

abandonment of the time and the place; but while yet all a-rush to
noooooooooo no noo nooo noo noo noooo; noo noooo noo noo n-nooo no

encounter the whale, could see naught in that brute but the deadliest
noooooooo noo noooo, noooo noo nooooo no nooo noooo noo noo noooooooo

ill.
noo.










CHAPTER 42. The Whiteness of The Whale.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooooo no Noo Noooo.







What the white whale was to Ahab, has been hinted; what, at times, he
Nooo noo noooo noooo noo no Nooo, noo nooo nooooo; nooo, no noooo, no

was to me, as yet remains unsaid.
noo no no, no noo noooooo nooooo.




Aside from those more obvious considerations touching Moby Dick, which
Noooo nooo noooo nooo noooooo nooooooooooooo nooooooo Nooo Nooo, noooo

could not but occasionally awaken in any man's soul some alarm, there
noooo noo noo nooooooooooo nooooo no noo noo'n nooo nooo noooo, noooo

was another thought, or rather vague, nameless horror concerning him,
noo noooooo noooooo, no nooooo noooo, nooooooo nooooo nooooooooo noo,

which at times by its intensity completely overpowered all the rest; and
noooo no noooo no noo noooooooo nooooooooo noooooooooo noo noo nooo; noo

yet so mystical and well nigh ineffable was it, that I almost despair of
noo no nooooooo noo nooo nooo noooooooo noo no, nooo N nooooo noooooo no

putting it in a comprehensible form. It was the whiteness of the whale
noooooo no no n nooooooooooooo nooo. No noo noo noooooooo no noo noooo

that above all things appalled me. But how can I hope to explain myself
nooo noooo noo nooooo nooooooo no. Noo noo noo N nooo no noooooo nooooo

here; and yet, in some dim, random way, explain myself I must, else all
nooo; noo noo, no nooo noo, nooooo noo, noooooo nooooo N nooo, nooo noo

these chapters might be naught.
noooo nooooooo noooo no nooooo.




Though in many natural objects, whiteness refiningly enhances beauty, as
Nooooo no nooo noooooo noooooo, noooooooo nooooooooo nooooooo nooooo, no

if imparting some special virtue of its own, as in marbles, japonicas,
no noooooooo nooo noooooo nooooo no noo noo, no no noooooo, noooooooo,

and pearls; and though various nations have in some way recognised a
noo nooooo; noo nooooo noooooo noooooo nooo no nooo noo nooooooooo n

certain royal preeminence in this hue; even the barbaric, grand old
noooooo noooo noooooooooo no nooo noo; nooo noo nooooooo, noooo noo

kings of Pegu placing the title "Lord of the White Elephants" above all
noooo no Nooo noooooo noo noooo "Nooo no noo Noooo Noooooooo" noooo noo

their other magniloquent ascriptions of dominion; and the modern kings
noooo noooo nooooooooooo noooooooooo no nooooooo; noo noo nooooo noooo

of Siam unfurling the same snow-white quadruped in the royal standard;
no Nooo noooooooo noo nooo nooo-noooo noooooooo no noo noooo nooooooo;

and the Hanoverian flag bearing the one figure of a snow-white charger;
noo noo Nooooooooo nooo noooooo noo noo nooooo no n nooo-noooo noooooo;

and the great Austrian Empire, Caesarian, heir to overlording Rome,
noo noo noooo Nooooooo Nooooo, Noooooooo, nooo no noooooooooo Nooo,

having for the imperial colour the same imperial hue; and though this
nooooo noo noo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo nooooooo noo; noo nooooo nooo

pre-eminence in it applies to the human race itself, giving the white
noo-nooooooo no no noooooo no noo noooo nooo nooooo, nooooo noo noooo

man ideal mastership over every dusky tribe; and though, besides, all
noo noooo nooooooooo nooo noooo noooo noooo; noo nooooo, noooooo, noo

this, whiteness has been even made significant of gladness, for among
nooo, noooooooo noo nooo nooo nooo noooooooooo no nooooooo, noo noooo

the Romans a white stone marked a joyful day; and though in other mortal
noo Nooooo n noooo noooo nooooo n nooooo noo; noo nooooo no noooo nooooo

sympathies and symbolizings, this same hue is made the emblem of many
nooooooooo noo nooooooooooo, nooo nooo noo no nooo noo nooooo no nooo

touching, noble things--the innocence of brides, the benignity of age;
nooooooo, noooo nooooo--noo noooooooo no nooooo, noo noooooooo no noo;

though among the Red Men of America the giving of the white belt
nooooo noooo noo Noo Noo no Noooooo noo nooooo no noo noooo nooo

of wampum was the deepest pledge of honour; though in many climes,
no nooooo noo noo noooooo nooooo no nooooo; nooooo no nooo nooooo,

whiteness typifies the majesty of Justice in the ermine of the Judge,
noooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo no Noooooo no noo nooooo no noo Noooo,

and contributes to the daily state of kings and queens drawn by
noo noooooooooo no noo noooo noooo no noooo noo nooooo noooo no

milk-white steeds; though even in the higher mysteries of the most
nooo-noooo nooooo; nooooo nooo no noo nooooo noooooooo no noo nooo

august religions it has been made the symbol of the divine spotlessness
nooooo noooooooo no noo nooo nooo noo nooooo no noo nooooo nooooooooooo

and power; by the Persian fire worshippers, the white forked flame being
noo noooo; no noo Noooooo nooo noooooooooo, noo noooo nooooo noooo noooo

held the holiest on the altar; and in the Greek mythologies, Great Jove
nooo noo noooooo no noo noooo; noo no noo Noooo noooooooooo, Noooo Nooo

himself being made incarnate in a snow-white bull; and though to the
noooooo noooo nooo noooooooo no n nooo-noooo nooo; noo nooooo no noo

noble Iroquois, the midwinter sacrifice of the sacred White Dog was
noooo Nooooooo, noo noooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo Noooo Noo noo

by far the holiest festival of their theology, that spotless, faithful
no noo noo noooooo nooooooo no noooo nooooooo, nooo nooooooo, nooooooo

creature being held the purest envoy they could send to the Great Spirit
nooooooo noooo nooo noo nooooo noooo nooo noooo nooo no noo Noooo Nooooo

with the annual tidings of their own fidelity; and though directly from
nooo noo nooooo noooooo no noooo noo nooooooo; noo nooooo nooooooo nooo

the Latin word for white, all Christian priests derive the name of
noo Noooo nooo noo noooo, noo Noooooooo noooooo nooooo noo nooo no

one part of their sacred vesture, the alb or tunic, worn beneath the
noo nooo no noooo nooooo noooooo, noo noo no noooo, nooo noooooo noo

cassock; and though among the holy pomps of the Romish faith, white is
noooooo; noo nooooo noooo noo nooo noooo no noo Nooooo noooo, noooo no

specially employed in the celebration of the Passion of our Lord; though
noooooooo nooooooo no noo noooooooooo no noo Noooooo no noo Nooo; nooooo

in the Vision of St. John, white robes are given to the redeemed, and
no noo Nooooo no No. Nooo, noooo noooo noo noooo no noo nooooooo, noo

the four-and-twenty elders stand clothed in white before the great-white
noo nooo-noo-nooooo nooooo noooo noooooo no noooo nooooo noo noooo-noooo

throne, and the Holy One that sitteth there white like wool; yet for all
nooooo, noo noo Nooo Noo nooo noooooo noooo noooo nooo nooo; noo noo noo

these accumulated associations, with whatever is sweet, and honourable,
noooo noooooooooo nooooooooooo, nooo nooooooo no noooo, noo nooooooooo,

and sublime, there yet lurks an elusive something in the innermost idea
noo noooooo, noooo noo noooo no noooooo noooooooo no noo noooooooo nooo

of this hue, which strikes more of panic to the soul than that redness
no nooo noo, noooo noooooo nooo no noooo no noo nooo nooo nooo noooooo

which affrights in blood.
noooo noooooooo no noooo.




This elusive quality it is, which causes the thought of whiteness, when
Nooo noooooo noooooo no no, noooo nooooo noo noooooo no noooooooo, nooo

divorced from more kindly associations, and coupled with any object
nooooooo nooo nooo nooooo nooooooooooo, noo noooooo nooo noo nooooo

terrible in itself, to heighten that terror to the furthest bounds.
nooooooo no nooooo, no nooooooo nooo nooooo no noo nooooooo nooooo.

Witness the white bear of the poles, and the white shark of the tropics;
Noooooo noo noooo nooo no noo noooo, noo noo noooo noooo no noo noooooo;

what but their smooth, flaky whiteness makes them the transcendent
nooo noo noooo nooooo, noooo noooooooo noooo nooo noo nooooooooooo

horrors they are? That ghastly whiteness it is which imparts such an
noooooo nooo noo? Nooo noooooo noooooooo no no noooo noooooo nooo no

abhorrent mildness, even more loathsome than terrific, to the dumb
noooooooo nooooooo, nooo nooo noooooooo nooo nooooooo, no noo nooo

gloating of their aspect. So that not the fierce-fanged tiger in his
nooooooo no noooo nooooo. No nooo noo noo nooooo-nooooo noooo no noo

heraldic coat can so stagger courage as the white-shrouded bear or
nooooooo nooo noo no noooooo noooooo no noo noooo-nooooooo nooo no

shark.*
noooo.*







*With reference to the Polar bear, it may possibly be urged by him
*Nooo noooooooo no noo Noooo nooo, no noo nooooooo no noooo no noo

who would fain go still deeper into this matter, that it is not
noo noooo nooo no noooo nooooo nooo nooo nooooo, nooo no no noo

the whiteness, separately regarded, which heightens the intolerable
noo noooooooo, nooooooooo nooooooo, noooo noooooooo noo noooooooooo

hideousness of that brute; for, analysed, that heightened hideousness,
noooooooooo no nooo noooo; noo, nooooooo, nooo nooooooooo noooooooooo,

it might be said, only rises from the circumstance, that the
no noooo no nooo, nooo noooo nooo noo nooooooooooo, nooo noo

irresponsible ferociousness of the creature stands invested in the
noooooooooooo noooooooooooo no noo nooooooo nooooo nooooooo no noo

fleece of celestial innocence and love; and hence, by bringing together
nooooo no noooooooo noooooooo noo nooo; noo noooo, no nooooooo nooooooo

two such opposite emotions in our minds, the Polar bear frightens us
noo nooo nooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo, noo Noooo nooo noooooooo no

with so unnatural a contrast. But even assuming all this to be true;
nooo no noooooooo n nooooooo. Noo nooo nooooooo noo nooo no no nooo;

yet, were it not for the whiteness, you would not have that intensified
noo, nooo no noo noo noo noooooooo, noo noooo noo nooo nooo noooooooooo

terror.
nooooo.




As for the white shark, the white gliding ghostliness of repose in that
No noo noo noooo noooo, noo noooo noooooo noooooooooo no nooooo no nooo

creature, when beheld in his ordinary moods, strangely tallies with the
nooooooo, nooo nooooo no noo nooooooo noooo, noooooooo noooooo nooo noo

same quality in the Polar quadruped. This peculiarity is most vividly
nooo noooooo no noo Noooo noooooooo. Nooo noooooooooo no nooo noooooo

hit by the French in the name they bestow upon that fish. The Romish
noo no noo Nooooo no noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo nooo. Noo Nooooo

mass for the dead begins with "Requiem eternam" (eternal rest), whence
nooo noo noo nooo nooooo nooo "Noooooo noooooo" (noooooo nooo), nooooo

REQUIEM denominating the mass itself, and any other funeral music. Now,
NOOOOOO nooooooooooo noo nooo nooooo, noo noo noooo noooooo noooo. Noo,

in allusion to the white, silent stillness of death in this shark, and
no nooooooo no noo noooo, nooooo noooooooo no noooo no nooo noooo, noo

the mild deadliness of his habits, the French call him REQUIN.
noo nooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo, noo Nooooo nooo noo NOOOOO.







Bethink thee of the albatross, whence come those clouds of spiritual
Noooooo nooo no noo noooooooo, nooooo nooo noooo nooooo no noooooooo

wonderment and pale dread, in which that white phantom sails in all
nooooooooo noo nooo noooo, no noooo nooo noooo noooooo noooo no noo

imaginations? Not Coleridge first threw that spell; but God's great,
nooooooooooo? Noo Noooooooo noooo noooo nooo noooo; noo Noo'n noooo,

unflattering laureate, Nature.*
nooooooooooo nooooooo, Nooooo.*







*I remember the first albatross I ever saw. It was during a prolonged
*N nooooooo noo noooo noooooooo N nooo noo. No noo nooooo n noooooooo

gale, in waters hard upon the Antarctic seas. From my forenoon watch
nooo, no nooooo nooo nooo noo Noooooooo nooo. Nooo no nooooooo noooo

below, I ascended to the overclouded deck; and there, dashed upon the
noooo, N nooooooo no noo noooooooooo nooo; noo noooo, nooooo nooo noo

main hatches, I saw a regal, feathery thing of unspotted whiteness, and
nooo noooooo, N noo n noooo, nooooooo noooo no noooooooo noooooooo, noo

with a hooked, Roman bill sublime. At intervals, it arched forth
nooo n nooooo, Noooo nooo noooooo. No noooooooo, no nooooo noooo

its vast archangel wings, as if to embrace some holy ark. Wondrous
noo nooo noooooooo noooo, no no no noooooo nooo nooo noo. Nooooooo

flutterings and throbbings shook it. Though bodily unharmed, it uttered
noooooooooo noo nooooooooo noooo no. Nooooo nooooo nooooooo, no noooooo

cries, as some king's ghost in supernatural distress. Through its
noooo, no nooo nooo'n noooo no nooooooooooo nooooooo. Noooooo noo

inexpressible, strange eyes, methought I peeped to secrets which took
noooooooooooo, noooooo nooo, noooooooo N nooooo no noooooo noooo nooo

hold of God. As Abraham before the angels, I bowed myself; the white
nooo no Noo. No Noooooo nooooo noo nooooo, N noooo nooooo; noo noooo

thing was so white, its wings so wide, and in those for ever exiled
noooo noo no noooo, noo noooo no nooo, noo no noooo noo nooo nooooo

waters, I had lost the miserable warping memories of traditions and of
nooooo, N noo nooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooooooo no nooooooooo noo no

towns. Long I gazed at that prodigy of plumage. I cannot tell, can only
noooo. Nooo N noooo no nooo noooooo no noooooo. N nooooo nooo, noo nooo

hint, the things that darted through me then. But at last I awoke; and
nooo, noo nooooo nooo nooooo noooooo no nooo. Noo no nooo N noooo; noo

turning, asked a sailor what bird was this. A goney, he replied. Goney!
noooooo, noooo n nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo. N noooo, no noooooo. Noooo!

never had heard that name before; is it conceivable that this glorious
noooo noo noooo nooo nooo nooooo; no no noooooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo

thing is utterly unknown to men ashore! never! But some time after, I
noooo no noooooo noooooo no noo nooooo! noooo! Noo nooo nooo noooo, N

learned that goney was some seaman's name for albatross. So that by no
noooooo nooo noooo noo nooo nooooo'n nooo noo noooooooo. No nooo no no

possibility could Coleridge's wild Rhyme have had aught to do with those
noooooooooo noooo Noooooooo'n nooo Noooo nooo noo noooo no no nooo noooo

mystical impressions which were mine, when I saw that bird upon our
nooooooo noooooooooo noooo nooo nooo, nooo N noo nooo nooo nooo noo

deck. For neither had I then read the Rhyme, nor knew the bird to be
nooo. Noo noooooo noo N nooo nooo noo Noooo, noo nooo noo nooo no no

an albatross. Yet, in saying this, I do but indirectly burnish a little
no noooooooo. Noo, no nooooo nooo, N no noo nooooooooo noooooo n nooooo

brighter the noble merit of the poem and the poet.
nooooooo noo noooo noooo no noo nooo noo noo nooo.




I assert, then, that in the wondrous bodily whiteness of the bird
N nooooo, nooo, nooo no noo nooooooo nooooo noooooooo no noo nooo

chiefly lurks the secret of the spell; a truth the more evinced in this,
noooooo noooo noo nooooo no noo noooo; n noooo noo nooo noooooo no nooo,

that by a solecism of terms there are birds called grey albatrosses;
nooo no n nooooooo no noooo noooo noo noooo nooooo nooo noooooooooo;

and these I have frequently seen, but never with such emotions as when I
noo noooo N nooo nooooooooo nooo, noo noooo nooo nooo nooooooo no nooo N

beheld the Antarctic fowl.
nooooo noo Noooooooo nooo.




But how had the mystic thing been caught? Whisper it not, and I will
Noo noo noo noo nooooo noooo nooo nooooo? Noooooo no noo, noo N nooo

tell; with a treacherous hook and line, as the fowl floated on the sea.
nooo; nooo n noooooooooo nooo noo nooo, no noo nooo noooooo no noo noo.

At last the Captain made a postman of it; tying a lettered, leathern
No nooo noo Noooooo nooo n noooooo no no; noooo n nooooooo, nooooooo

noooo noooo noo nooo, nooo noo nooo'n nooo noo noooo; noo nooo noooooo

no nooooo. Noo N noooo noo, nooo nooooooo noooo, noooo noo noo, noo

noooo noo no Nooooo, nooo noo noooo nooo nooo no nooo noo nooo-noooooo,

noo nooooooo, noo noooooo nooooooo!







Most famous in our Western annals and Indian traditions is that of
Nooo nooooo no noo Noooooo nooooo noo Nooooo nooooooooo no nooo no

noo Noooo Noooo no noo Nooooooo; n noooooooooo nooo-noooo noooooo,

elected Xerxes of vast herds of wild horses, whose pastures in those

noooo-nooooo noo nooooooo no nooo nooooo noooo. Noooooo nooooooo nooo

Let us try. But in a matter like this, subtlety appeals to subtlety,

Nor is it, altogether, the remembrance of her cathedral-toppling

I know that, to the common apprehension, this phenomenon of whiteness

noooooooo nooooooo.




First: The mariner, when drawing nigh the coasts of foreign lands, if by
Noooo: Noo noooooo, nooo noooooo nooo noo nooooo no noooooo noooo, no no

night he hear the roar of breakers, starts to vigilance, and feels just
noooo no nooo noo nooo no nooooooo, nooooo no noooooooo, noo noooo nooo

nooooooo nooooo noooo, no noo nooo no nooo noooooo noooooooo nooo no

noooooo no?"




Second: To the native Indian of Peru, the continual sight of the

noo noooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo.

n noooo nooo nooo noo nooo n nooooo nooo; nooo nooooooooooo no n nooo,

Tell me, why this strong young colt, foaled in some peaceful valley of
Nooo no, noo nooo nooooo noooo nooo, nooooo no nooo nooooooo nooooo no

Noooooo, noo noooooo nooo noo nooooo no nooo--noo no no nooo nooo noo

nooooo no noooooo Nooooo?

nooo noooooo nooo noo no noooooooo nooo nooo.




Thus, then, the muffled rollings of a milky sea; the bleak rustlings

no nooo noooooo nooo no noo nooooooooo nooo!




Though neither knows where lie the nameless things of which the mystic
Nooooo noooooo noooo noooo noo noo nooooooo nooooo no noooo noo nooooo

But not yet have we solved the incantation of this whiteness, and

nooooo noo nooo noooooooo no noooooo.




Is it that by its indefiniteness it shadows forth the heartless voids
No no nooo no noo nooooooooooooo no noooooo noooo noo noooooooo noooo

and immensities of the universe, and thus stabs us from behind with the
noo noooooooooo no noo nooooooo, noo nooo noooo no nooo nooooo nooo noo

noooooo no nooooooooooo, nooo noooooooo noo noooo nooooo no noo noooo

way? Or is it, that as in essence whiteness is not so much a colour as
noo? No no no, nooo no no noooooo noooooooo no noo no nooo n nooooo no

the visible absence of colour; and at the same time the concrete of all
noo noooooo noooooo no nooooo; noo no noo nooo nooo noo nooooooo no noo

colours; is it for these reasons that there is such a dumb blankness,
noooooo; no no noo noooo noooooo nooo noooo no nooo n nooo noooooooo,

full of meaning, in a wide landscape of snows--a colourless, all-colour
nooo no noooooo, no n nooo noooooooo no noooo--n nooooooooo, noo-nooooo

of atheism from which we shrink? And when we consider that other theory
no noooooo nooo noooo no nooooo? Noo nooo no nooooooo nooo noooo nooooo

of the natural philosophers, that all other earthly hues--every stately
no noo noooooo nooooooooooo, nooo noo noooo noooooo nooo--noooo noooooo

or lovely emblazoning--the sweet tinges of sunset skies and woods; yea,
no nooooo noooooooooo--noo noooo nooooo no nooooo noooo noo noooo; noo,

and the gilded velvets of butterflies, and the butterfly cheeks of
noo noo nooooo noooooo no noooooooooo, noo noo noooooooo nooooo no

young girls; all these are but subtile deceits, not actually inherent
noooo noooo; noo noooo noo noo noooooo noooooo, noo nooooooo nooooooo

in substances, but only laid on from without; so that all deified Nature
no nooooooooo, noo nooo nooo no nooo noooooo; no nooo noo noooooo Nooooo

absolutely paints like the harlot, whose allurements cover nothing but
nooooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo, noooo noooooooooo noooo noooooo noo

the charnel-house within; and when we proceed further, and consider that
noo noooooo-noooo nooooo; noo nooo no noooooo noooooo, noo nooooooo nooo

the mystical cosmetic which produces every one of her hues, the great
noo nooooooo nooooooo noooo nooooooo noooo noo no noo nooo, noo noooo

principle of light, for ever remains white or colourless in itself, and
noooooooo no noooo, noo nooo noooooo noooo no nooooooooo no nooooo, noo

if operating without medium upon matter, would touch all objects, even
no noooooooo noooooo nooooo nooo nooooo, noooo noooo noo noooooo, nooo

tulips and roses, with its own blank tinge--pondering all this, the
nooooo noo noooo, nooo noo noo noooo noooo--noooooooo noo nooo, noo

palsied universe lies before us a leper; and like wilful travellers in
noooooo nooooooo nooo nooooo no n noooo; noo nooo nooooo nooooooooo no

Lapland, who refuse to wear coloured and colouring glasses upon their
Noooooo, noo nooooo no nooo nooooooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooo noooo

eyes, so the wretched infidel gazes himself blind at the monumental
nooo, no noo nooooooo noooooo noooo noooooo noooo no noo nooooooooo

white shroud that wraps all the prospect around him. And of all these
noooo nooooo nooo noooo noo noo nooooooo nooooo noo. Noo no noo noooo

things the Albino whale was the symbol. Wonder ye then at the fiery
nooooo noo Nooooo noooo noo noo nooooo. Nooooo no nooo no noo noooo

hunt?
nooo?










CHAPTER 43. Hark!
NOOOOOO no. Nooo!







"HIST! Did you hear that noise, Cabaco?"
"NOOO! Noo noo nooo nooo noooo, Nooooo?"




It was the middle-watch; a fair moonlight; the seamen were standing in a
No noo noo nooooo-noooo; n nooo noooooooo; noo nooooo nooo nooooooo no n

cordon, extending from one of the fresh-water butts in the waist, to the
nooooo, noooooooo nooo noo no noo noooo-noooo noooo no noo noooo, no noo

scuttle-butt near the taffrail. In this manner, they passed the buckets
noooooo-nooo nooo noo nooooooo. No nooo nooooo, nooo nooooo noo noooooo

to fill the scuttle-butt. Standing, for the most part, on the hallowed
no nooo noo noooooo-nooo. Nooooooo, noo noo nooo nooo, no noo nooooooo

precincts of the quarter-deck, they were careful not to speak or rustle
noooooooo no noo noooooo-nooo, nooo nooo noooooo noo no noooo no nooooo

their feet. From hand to hand, the buckets went in the deepest silence,
noooo nooo. Nooo nooo no nooo, noo noooooo nooo no noo noooooo noooooo,

only broken by the occasional flap of a sail, and the steady hum of the
nooo nooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo no n nooo, noo noo nooooo noo no noo

unceasingly advancing keel.
noooooooooo noooooooo nooo.




It was in the midst of this repose, that Archy, one of the cordon, whose
No noo no noo noooo no nooo nooooo, nooo Noooo, noo no noo nooooo, noooo

post was near the after-hatches, whispered to his neighbor, a Cholo, the
nooo noo nooo noo noooo-noooooo, noooooooo no noo nooooooo, n Noooo, noo

words above.
noooo noooo.




"Hist! did you hear that noise, Cabaco?"
"Nooo! noo noo nooo nooo noooo, Nooooo?"




"Take the bucket, will ye, Archy? what noise d'ye mean?"
"Nooo noo nooooo, nooo no, Noooo? nooo noooo n'no nooo?"




"There it is again--under the hatches--don't you hear it--a cough--it
"Noooo no no noooo--noooo noo noooooo--noo'n noo nooo no--n noooo--no

sounded like a cough."
noooooo nooo n noooo."




"Cough be damned! Pass along that return bucket."
"Noooo no nooooo! Nooo noooo nooo nooooo nooooo."




"There again--there it is!--it sounds like two or three sleepers turning
"Noooo noooo--noooo no no!--no nooooo nooo noo no noooo nooooooo noooooo

over, now!"
nooo, noo!"




"Caramba! have done, shipmate, will ye? It's the three soaked biscuits

ye eat for supper turning over inside of ye--nothing else. Look to the

bucket!"
nooooo!"




"Say what ye will, shipmate; I've sharp ears."
"Noo nooo no nooo, nooooooo; N'no noooo nooo."

"Noo, noo noo noo nooo, noo'n no, nooo noooo noo noo no noo noo

Noooooooo'n nooooooo-noooooo noooo noooo no noo nooo Noooooooo; noo'no

the chap."
noo nooo."




"Grin away; we'll see what turns up. Hark ye, Cabaco, there is somebody
"Nooo nooo; no'no noo nooo noooo no. Nooo no, Nooooo, noooo no nooooooo

nooo no noo noooo-nooo nooo noo noo noo nooo nooo no nooo; noo N noooooo

noooooo noooo, nooo noooo noo noooooooo no nooo nooo no noo nooo."

CHAPTER 44. The Chart.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo.







Had you followed Captain Ahab down into his cabin after the squall that
Noo noo nooooooo Noooooo Nooo nooo nooo noo noooo noooo noo nooooo nooo

took place on the night succeeding that wild ratification of his purpose
nooo noooo no noo noooo nooooooooo nooo nooo nooooooooooo no noo noooooo

with his crew, you would have seen him go to a locker in the transom,
nooo noo nooo, noo noooo nooo nooo noo no no n nooooo no noo noooooo,

and bringing out a large wrinkled roll of yellowish sea charts, spread
noo nooooooo noo n noooo nooooooo nooo no noooooooo noo nooooo, nooooo

them before him on his screwed-down table. Then seating himself before
nooo nooooo noo no noo noooooo-nooo noooo. Nooo noooooo noooooo nooooo

it, you would have seen him intently study the various lines and
no, noo noooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo noooo noo noooooo noooo noo

shadings which there met his eye; and with slow but steady pencil trace
nooooooo noooo noooo noo noo noo; noo nooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noooo

additional courses over spaces that before were blank. At intervals, he
nooooooooo noooooo nooo nooooo nooo nooooo nooo noooo. No noooooooo, no

would refer to piles of old log-books beside him, wherein were set down
noooo noooo no noooo no noo noo-noooo nooooo noo, noooooo nooo noo nooo

the seasons and places in which, on various former voyages of various
noo noooooo noo nooooo no noooo, no noooooo nooooo noooooo no noooooo

ships, sperm whales had been captured or seen.
noooo, noooo nooooo noo nooo nooooooo no nooo.




While thus employed, the heavy pewter lamp suspended in chains over his
Noooo nooo nooooooo, noo noooo nooooo nooo noooooooo no nooooo nooo noo

head, continually rocked with the motion of the ship, and for ever threw
nooo, noooooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo no noo nooo, noo noo nooo noooo

shifting gleams and shadows of lines upon his wrinkled brow, till it
nooooooo nooooo noo noooooo no noooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo, nooo no

almost seemed that while he himself was marking out lines and courses
nooooo nooooo nooo noooo no noooooo noo noooooo noo noooo noo noooooo

on the wrinkled charts, some invisible pencil was also tracing lines and
no noo nooooooo nooooo, nooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo noooooo noooo noo

courses upon the deeply marked chart of his forehead.
noooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noooo no noo nooooooo.




But it was not this night in particular that, in the solitude of his
Noo no noo noo nooo noooo no nooooooooo nooo, no noo nooooooo no noo

cabin, Ahab thus pondered over his charts. Almost every night they were
noooo, Nooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo. Nooooo noooo noooo nooo nooo

brought out; almost every night some pencil marks were effaced, and
noooooo noo; nooooo noooo noooo nooo nooooo noooo nooo noooooo, noo

others were substituted. For with the charts of all four oceans before
nooooo nooo noooooooooo. Noo nooo noo nooooo no noo nooo nooooo nooooo

him, Ahab was threading a maze of currents and eddies, with a view to
noo, Nooo noo noooooooo n nooo no nooooooo noo nooooo, nooo n nooo no

the more certain accomplishment of that monomaniac thought of his soul.
noo nooo noooooo nooooooooooooo no nooo nooooooooo noooooo no noo nooo.




Now, to any one not fully acquainted with the ways of the leviathans,
Noo, no noo noo noo noooo nooooooooo nooo noo nooo no noo nooooooooo,

it might seem an absurdly hopeless task thus to seek out one solitary
no noooo nooo no nooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo no nooo noo noo nooooooo

creature in the unhooped oceans of this planet. But not so did it
nooooooo no noo nooooooo nooooo no nooo nooooo. Noo noo no noo no

seem to Ahab, who knew the sets of all tides and currents; and thereby
nooo no Nooo, noo nooo noo nooo no noo noooo noo nooooooo; noo noooooo

calculating the driftings of the sperm whale's food; and, also, calling
noooooooooo noo noooooooo no noo noooo noooo'n nooo; noo, nooo, noooooo

to mind the regular, ascertained seasons for hunting him in particular
no nooo noo noooooo, noooooooooo noooooo noo noooooo noo no nooooooooo

latitudes; could arrive at reasonable surmises, almost approaching to
noooooooo; noooo nooooo no nooooooooo nooooooo, nooooo noooooooooo no

certainties, concerning the timeliest day to be upon this or that ground
noooooooooo, nooooooooo noo noooooooo noo no no nooo nooo no nooo nooooo

in search of his prey.
no nooooo no noo nooo.




So assured, indeed, is the fact concerning the periodicalness of the
No noooooo, nooooo, no noo nooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooooooo no noo

sperm whale's resorting to given waters, that many hunters believe that,
noooo noooo'n noooooooo no noooo nooooo, nooo nooo noooooo noooooo nooo,

could he be closely observed and studied throughout the world; were the
noooo no no noooooo nooooooo noo noooooo nooooooooo noo noooo; nooo noo

logs for one voyage of the entire whale fleet carefully collated,
nooo noo noo nooooo no noo nooooo noooo noooo noooooooo nooooooo,

then the migrations of the sperm whale would be found to correspond in
nooo noo nooooooooo no noo noooo noooo noooo no noooo no nooooooooo no

invariability to those of the herring-shoals or the flights of swallows.
noooooooooooo no noooo no noo noooooo-nooooo no noo noooooo no nooooooo.

On this hint, attempts have been made to construct elaborate migratory
No nooo nooo, nooooooo nooo nooo nooo no noooooooo noooooooo noooooooo

charts of the sperm whale.*
nooooo no noo noooo noooo.*




     *Since the above was written, the statement is happily borne
     *Noooo noo noooo noo noooooo, noo noooooooo no noooooo noooo

     out by an official circular, issued by Lieutenant Maury, of
     noo no no nooooooo nooooooo, nooooo no Nooooooooo Noooo, no

     the National Observatory, Washington, April 16th, 1851. By
     noo Nooooooo Noooooooooo, Nooooooooo, Noooo nooo, nooo. No

     that circular, it appears that precisely such a chart is in
     nooo nooooooo, no noooooo nooo noooooooo nooo n noooo no no

     course of completion; and portions of it are presented in
     nooooo no nooooooooo; noo nooooooo no no noo noooooooo no

     the circular. "This chart divides the ocean into districts
     noo nooooooo. "Nooo noooo noooooo noo noooo nooo noooooooo

     of five degrees of latitude by five degrees of longitude;
     no nooo noooooo no nooooooo no nooo noooooo no noooooooo;

     perpendicularly through each of which districts are twelve
     noooooooooooooo noooooo nooo no noooo noooooooo noo nooooo

     columns for the twelve months; and horizontally through each
     noooooo noo noo nooooo nooooo; noo nooooooooooo noooooo nooo

     of which districts are three lines; one to show the number
     no noooo noooooooo noo noooo noooo; noo no nooo noo nooooo

     of days that have been spent in each month in every
     no nooo nooo nooo nooo noooo no nooo noooo no noooo

     district, and the two others to show the number of days in
     nooooooo, noo noo noo nooooo no nooo noo nooooo no nooo no

     noooo nooooo, noooo no noooo, nooo nooo nooo."




Besides, when making a passage from one feeding-ground to another, the
Noooooo, nooo nooooo n noooooo nooo noo noooooo-nooooo no noooooo, noo

sperm whales, guided by some infallible instinct--say, rather, secret
noooo nooooo, nooooo no nooo nooooooooo nooooooo--noo, nooooo, nooooo

intelligence from the Deity--mostly swim in VEINS, as they are called;
nooooooooooo nooo noo Noooo--nooooo nooo no NOOOO, no nooo noo nooooo;

continuing their way along a given ocean-line with such undeviating
nooooooooo noooo noo noooo n noooo noooo-nooo nooo nooo noooooooooo

exactitude, that no ship ever sailed her course, by any chart, with
nooooooooo, nooo no nooo nooo nooooo noo nooooo, no noo noooo, nooo

one tithe of such marvellous precision. Though, in these cases, the
noo noooo no nooo nooooooooo noooooooo. Nooooo, no noooo noooo, noo

direction taken by any one whale be straight as a surveyor's parallel,
noooooooo noooo no noo noo noooo no nooooooo no n nooooooo'n nooooooo,

and though the line of advance be strictly confined to its own
noo nooooo noo nooo no noooooo no nooooooo nooooooo no noo noo

unavoidable, straight wake, yet the arbitrary VEIN in which at these
noooooooooo, nooooooo nooo, noo noo noooooooo NOOO no noooo no noooo

times he is said to swim, generally embraces some few miles in width
noooo no no nooo no nooo, noooooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo no noooo

(more or less, as the vein is presumed to expand or contract); but
(nooo no nooo, no noo nooo no nooooooo no nooooo no nooooooo); noo

never exceeds the visual sweep from the whale-ship's mast-heads,
noooo noooooo noo nooooo noooo nooo noo noooo-nooo'n nooo-noooo,

when circumspectly gliding along this magic zone. The sum is, that at
nooo noooooooooooo noooooo noooo nooo noooo nooo. Noo noo no, nooo no

particular seasons within that breadth and along that path, migrating
nooooooooo noooooo nooooo nooo noooooo noo noooo nooo nooo, noooooooo

whales may with great confidence be looked for.
nooooo noo nooo noooo nooooooooo no nooooo noo.




And hence not only at substantiated times, upon well known separate
Noo noooo noo nooo no noooooooooooo noooo, nooo nooo noooo nooooooo

feeding-grounds, could Ahab hope to encounter his prey; but in crossing
noooooo-noooooo, noooo Nooo nooo no noooooooo noo nooo; noo no nooooooo

the widest expanses of water between those grounds he could, by his
noo nooooo nooooooo no noooo noooooo noooo noooooo no noooo, no noo

art, so place and time himself on his way, as even then not to be wholly
noo, no noooo noo nooo noooooo no noo noo, no nooo nooo noo no no nooooo

without prospect of a meeting.
noooooo nooooooo no n noooooo.




There was a circumstance which at first sight seemed to entangle his
Noooo noo n nooooooooooo noooo no noooo noooo nooooo no nooooooo noo

delirious but still methodical scheme. But not so in the reality,
noooooooo noo noooo nooooooooo nooooo. Noo noo no no noo noooooo,

perhaps. Though the gregarious sperm whales have their regular seasons
noooooo. Nooooo noo nooooooooo noooo nooooo nooo noooo noooooo noooooo

for particular grounds, yet in general you cannot conclude that the
noo nooooooooo noooooo, noo no noooooo noo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo

herds which haunted such and such a latitude or longitude this year,
noooo noooo noooooo nooo noo nooo n nooooooo no noooooooo nooo nooo,

say, will turn out to be identically the same with those that were found
noo, nooo nooo noo no no noooooooooo noo nooo nooo noooo nooo nooo noooo

there the preceding season; though there are peculiar and unquestionable
noooo noo noooooooo nooooo; nooooo noooo noo nooooooo noo nooooooooooooo

instances where the contrary of this has proved true. In general, the
noooooooo noooo noo nooooooo no nooo noo nooooo nooo. No noooooo, noo

same remark, only within a less wide limit, applies to the solitaries
nooo nooooo, nooo nooooo n nooo nooo noooo, noooooo no noo nooooooooo

and hermits among the matured, aged sperm whales. So that though Moby
noo noooooo noooo noo noooooo, nooo noooo nooooo. No nooo nooooo Nooo

Dick had in a former year been seen, for example, on what is called the
Nooo noo no n nooooo nooo nooo nooo, noo noooooo, no nooo no nooooo noo

Seychelle ground in the Indian ocean, or Volcano Bay on the Japanese
Noooooooo nooooo no noo Nooooo noooo, no Noooooo Noo no noo Nooooooo

Coast; yet it did not follow, that were the Pequod to visit either of
Noooo; noo no noo noo nooooo, nooo nooo noo Nooooo no noooo nooooo no

noooo noooo no noo nooooooooo noooooooooooo nooooo, noo noooo nooooooooo

encounter him there. So, too, with some other feeding grounds, where
noooooooo noo noooo. No, noo, nooo nooo noooo noooooo noooooo, noooo

he had at times revealed himself. But all these seemed only his casual
no noo no noooo nooooooo noooooo. Noo noo noooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo

stopping-places and ocean-inns, so to speak, not his places of prolonged
nooooooo-nooooo noo noooo-nooo, no no noooo, noo noo nooooo no noooooooo

abode. And where Ahab's chances of accomplishing his object have
noooo. Noo noooo Nooo'n noooooo no noooooooooooo noo nooooo nooo

hitherto been spoken of, allusion has only been made to whatever
nooooooo nooo nooooo no, nooooooo noo nooo nooo nooo no nooooooo

way-side, antecedent, extra prospects were his, ere a particular
noo-nooo, nooooooooo, noooo noooooooo nooo noo, noo n nooooooooo

set time or place were attained, when all possibilities would become
noo nooo no noooo nooo nooooooo, nooo noo noooooooooooo noooo nooooo

probabilities, and, as Ahab fondly thought, every possibility the next
noooooooooooo, noo, no Nooo nooooo noooooo, noooo noooooooooo noo nooo

thing to a certainty. That particular set time and place were conjoined
noooo no n noooooooo. Nooo nooooooooo noo nooo noo noooo nooo noooooooo

in the one technical phrase--the Season-on-the-Line. For there and then,
no noo noo noooooooo nooooo--noo Nooooo-no-noo-Nooo. Noo noooo noo nooo,

for several consecutive years, Moby Dick had been periodically descried,
noo noooooo noooooooooo noooo, Nooo Nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo nooooooo,

lingering in those waters for awhile, as the sun, in its annual round,
noooooooo no noooo nooooo noo nooooo, no noo noo, no noo nooooo noooo,

loiters for a predicted interval in any one sign of the Zodiac. There
noooooo noo n noooooooo nooooooo no noo noo nooo no noo Nooooo. Noooo

it was, too, that most of the deadly encounters with the white whale had
no noo, noo, nooo nooo no noo nooooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooo noooo noo

taken place; there the waves were storied with his deeds; there also was
noooo noooo; noooo noo noooo nooo noooooo nooo noo noooo; noooo nooo noo

that tragic spot where the monomaniac old man had found the awful motive
nooo nooooo nooo noooo noo nooooooooo noo noo noo noooo noo noooo nooooo

to his vengeance. But in the cautious comprehensiveness and unloitering
no noo noooooooo. Noo no noo nooooooo noooooooooooooooo noo noooooooooo

vigilance with which Ahab threw his brooding soul into this unfaltering
noooooooo nooo noooo Nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooo noooooooooo

hunt, he would not permit himself to rest all his hopes upon the one
nooo, no noooo noo nooooo noooooo no nooo noo noo noooo nooo noo noo
