nooooooo nooo noooo noooooooo, noooooo nooooooooo no noooo no no noooo

hopes; nor in the sleeplessness of his vow could he so tranquillize his
noooo; noo no noo noooooooooooo no noo noo noooo no no nooooooooooo noo

unquiet heart as to postpone all intervening quest.
noooooo noooo no no nooooooo noo noooooooooo noooo.




Now, the Pequod had sailed from Nantucket at the very beginning of the
Noo, noo Nooooo noo nooooo nooo Noooooooo no noo nooo noooooooo no noo

Season-on-the-Line. No possible endeavor then could enable her commander
Nooooo-no-noo-Nooo. No nooooooo nooooooo nooo noooo nooooo noo noooooooo

to make the great passage southwards, double Cape Horn, and then running
no nooo noo noooo noooooo nooooooooo, nooooo Nooo Nooo, noo nooo noooooo

down sixty degrees of latitude arrive in the equatorial Pacific in time
nooo noooo noooooo no nooooooo nooooo no noo nooooooooo Noooooo no nooo

to cruise there. Therefore, he must wait for the next ensuing season.
no nooooo noooo. Noooooooo, no nooo nooo noo noo nooo noooooo nooooo.

Yet the premature hour of the Pequod's sailing had, perhaps, been
Noo noo noooooooo nooo no noo Nooooo'n noooooo noo, noooooo, nooo

correctly selected by Ahab, with a view to this very complexion of
noooooooo nooooooo no Nooo, nooo n nooo no nooo nooo nooooooooo no

things. Because, an interval of three hundred and sixty-five days
nooooo. Noooooo, no nooooooo no noooo noooooo noo noooo-nooo nooo

and nights was before him; an interval which, instead of impatiently
noo nooooo noo nooooo noo; no nooooooo noooo, noooooo no noooooooooo

enduring ashore, he would spend in a miscellaneous hunt; if by chance
nooooooo nooooo, no noooo noooo no n noooooooooooo nooo; no no nooooo

the White Whale, spending his vacation in seas far remote from his
noo Noooo Noooo, nooooooo noo nooooooo no nooo noo nooooo nooo noo

periodical feeding-grounds, should turn up his wrinkled brow off the
nooooooooo noooooo-noooooo, nooooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooo noo noo

Persian Gulf, or in the Bengal Bay, or China Seas, or in any other
Noooooo Nooo, no no noo Nooooo Noo, no Noooo Nooo, no no noo noooo

waters haunted by his race. So that Monsoons, Pampas, Nor'-Westers,
nooooo noooooo no noo nooo. No nooo Nooooooo, Nooooo, Noo'-Noooooo,

Harmattans, Trades; any wind but the Levanter and Simoon, might
Nooooooooo, Nooooo; noo nooo noo noo Nooooooo noo Nooooo, noooo

blow Moby Dick into the devious zig-zag world-circle of the Pequod's
nooo Nooo Nooo nooo noo noooooo noo-noo noooo-nooooo no noo Nooooo'n

circumnavigating wake.
nooooooooooooooo nooo.




But granting all this; yet, regarded discreetly and coolly, seems it not
Noo nooooooo noo nooo; noo, nooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooo, noooo no noo

but a mad idea, this; that in the broad boundless ocean, one solitary
noo n noo nooo, nooo; nooo no noo noooo noooooooo noooo, noo nooooooo

whale, even if encountered, should be thought capable of individual
noooo, nooo no noooooooooo, nooooo no noooooo noooooo no nooooooooo

recognition from his hunter, even as a white-bearded Mufti in the
noooooooooo nooo noo nooooo, nooo no n noooo-noooooo Noooo no noo

thronged thoroughfares of Constantinople? Yes. For the peculiar
nooooooo noooooooooooo no Nooooooooooooo? Noo. Noo noo nooooooo

snow-white brow of Moby Dick, and his snow-white hump, could not but
nooo-noooo nooo no Nooo Nooo, noo noo nooo-noooo nooo, noooo noo noo

be unmistakable. And have I not tallied the whale, Ahab would mutter
no nooooooooooo. Noo nooo N noo noooooo noo noooo, Nooo noooo nooooo

to himself, as after poring over his charts till long after midnight he
no noooooo, no noooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo no

would throw himself back in reveries--tallied him, and shall he escape?
noooo noooo noooooo nooo no nooooooo--noooooo noo, noo noooo no nooooo?

His broad fins are bored, and scalloped out like a lost sheep's ear! And
Noo noooo nooo noo noooo, noo noooooooo noo nooo n nooo noooo'n noo! Noo

here, his mad mind would run on in a breathless race; till a weariness
nooo, noo noo nooo noooo noo no no n nooooooooo nooo; nooo n noooooooo

and faintness of pondering came over him; and in the open air of the
noo noooooooo no noooooooo nooo nooo noo; noo no noo nooo noo no noo

deck he would seek to recover his strength. Ah, God! what trances
nooo no noooo nooo no noooooo noo nooooooo. No, Noo! nooo noooooo

of torments does that man endure who is consumed with one unachieved
no nooooooo nooo nooo noo nooooo noo no nooooooo nooo noo nooooooooo

revengeful desire. He sleeps with clenched hands; and wakes with his own
nooooooooo nooooo. No nooooo nooo nooooooo noooo; noo noooo nooo noo noo

bloody nails in his palms.
nooooo noooo no noo noooo.




Often, when forced from his hammock by exhausting and intolerably vivid
Noooo, nooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo no nooooooooo noo noooooooooo noooo

dreams of the night, which, resuming his own intense thoughts through
nooooo no noo noooo, noooo, nooooooo noo noo noooooo nooooooo noooooo

the day, carried them on amid a clashing of phrensies, and whirled them
noo noo, noooooo nooo no nooo n nooooooo no noooooooo, noo noooooo nooo

round and round and round in his blazing brain, till the very throbbing
noooo noo noooo noo noooo no noo noooooo noooo, nooo noo nooo noooooooo

of his life-spot became insufferable anguish; and when, as was sometimes
no noo nooo-nooo nooooo nooooooooooo noooooo; noo nooo, no noo noooooooo

the case, these spiritual throes in him heaved his being up from its
noo nooo, noooo noooooooo nooooo no noo nooooo noo noooo no nooo noo

base, and a chasm seemed opening in him, from which forked flames and
nooo, noo n noooo nooooo noooooo no noo, nooo noooo nooooo nooooo noo

lightnings shot up, and accursed fiends beckoned him to leap down among
nooooooooo nooo no, noo nooooooo nooooo nooooooo noo no nooo nooo noooo

them; when this hell in himself yawned beneath him, a wild cry would be
nooo; nooo nooo nooo no noooooo nooooo noooooo noo, n nooo noo noooo no

heard through the ship; and with glaring eyes Ahab would burst from his
noooo noooooo noo nooo; noo nooo noooooo nooo Nooo noooo noooo nooo noo

state room, as though escaping from a bed that was on fire. Yet these,
noooo nooo, no nooooo nooooooo nooo n noo nooo noo no nooo. Noo noooo,

perhaps, instead of being the unsuppressable symptoms of some latent
noooooo, noooooo no noooo noo nooooooooooooo nooooooo no nooo nooooo

weakness, or fright at his own resolve, were but the plainest tokens
nooooooo, no nooooo no noo noo noooooo, nooo noo noo nooooooo nooooo

of its intensity. For, at such times, crazy Ahab, the scheming,
no noo noooooooo. Noo, no nooo noooo, noooo Nooo, noo nooooooo,

unappeasedly steadfast hunter of the white whale; this Ahab that had
nooooooooooo noooooooo nooooo no noo noooo noooo; nooo Nooo nooo noo

gone to his hammock, was not the agent that so caused him to burst from
nooo no noo noooooo, noo noo noo noooo nooo no nooooo noo no noooo nooo

it in horror again. The latter was the eternal, living principle or
no no nooooo noooo. Noo nooooo noo noo noooooo, nooooo noooooooo no

soul in him; and in sleep, being for the time dissociated from the
nooo no noo; noo no noooo, noooo noo noo nooo noooooooooo nooo noo

characterizing mind, which at other times employed it for its outer
nooooooooooooo nooo, noooo no noooo noooo nooooooo no noo noo noooo

vehicle or agent, it spontaneously sought escape from the scorching
noooooo no noooo, no noooooooooooo nooooo nooooo nooo noo noooooooo

contiguity of the frantic thing, of which, for the time, it was no
nooooooooo no noo noooooo noooo, no noooo, noo noo nooo, no noo no

longer an integral. But as the mind does not exist unless leagued with
nooooo no nooooooo. Noo no noo nooo nooo noo noooo nooooo noooooo nooo

the soul, therefore it must have been that, in Ahab's case, yielding up
noo nooo, noooooooo no nooo nooo nooo nooo, no Nooo'n nooo, nooooooo no

all his thoughts and fancies to his one supreme purpose; that purpose,
noo noo nooooooo noo noooooo no noo noo noooooo noooooo; nooo noooooo,

by its own sheer inveteracy of will, forced itself against gods and
no noo noo noooo nooooooooo no nooo, nooooo nooooo noooooo nooo noo

devils into a kind of self-assumed, independent being of its own. Nay,
nooooo nooo n nooo no nooo-noooooo, noooooooooo noooo no noo noo. Noo,

could grimly live and burn, while the common vitality to which it was
noooo nooooo nooo noo nooo, noooo noo nooooo nooooooo no noooo no noo

conjoined, fled horror-stricken from the unbidden and unfathered birth.
noooooooo, nooo nooooo-nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo noo nooooooooo noooo.

Therefore, the tormented spirit that glared out of bodily eyes, when
Noooooooo, noo noooooooo nooooo nooo nooooo noo no nooooo nooo, nooo

what seemed Ahab rushed from his room, was for the time but a vacated
nooo nooooo Nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo, noo noo noo nooo noo n noooooo

thing, a formless somnambulistic being, a ray of living light, to be
noooo, n nooooooo nooooooooooooo noooo, n noo no nooooo noooo, no no

sure, but without an object to colour, and therefore a blankness in
nooo, noo noooooo no nooooo no nooooo, noo noooooooo n noooooooo no

itself. God help thee, old man, thy thoughts have created a creature
nooooo. Noo nooo nooo, noo noo, noo nooooooo nooo noooooo n nooooooo

in thee; and he whose intense thinking thus makes him a Prometheus; a
no nooo; noo no noooo noooooo nooooooo nooo noooo noo n Nooooooooo; n

vulture feeds upon that heart for ever; that vulture the very creature
noooooo noooo nooo nooo noooo noo nooo; nooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooo

he creates.
no noooooo.










CHAPTER 45. The Affidavit.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooooo.







So far as what there may be of a narrative in this book; and, indeed, as
No noo no nooo noooo noo no no n noooooooo no nooo nooo; noo, nooooo, no

indirectly touching one or two very interesting and curious particulars
nooooooooo nooooooo noo no noo nooo noooooooooo noo noooooo noooooooooo

in the habits of sperm whales, the foregoing chapter, in its earlier
no noo nooooo no noooo nooooo, noo noooooooo noooooo, no noo noooooo

part, is as important a one as will be found in this volume; but the
nooo, no no noooooooo n noo no nooo no noooo no nooo nooooo; noo noo

leading matter of it requires to be still further and more familiarly
noooooo nooooo no no nooooooo no no noooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooooo

enlarged upon, in order to be adequately understood, and moreover to
nooooooo nooo, no noooo no no nooooooooo nooooooooo, noo nooooooo no

take away any incredulity which a profound ignorance of the entire
nooo nooo noo noooooooooo noooo n nooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo

subject may induce in some minds, as to the natural verity of the main
noooooo noo nooooo no nooo noooo, no no noo noooooo nooooo no noo nooo

points of this affair.
nooooo no nooo nooooo.




I care not to perform this part of my task methodically; but shall
N nooo noo no noooooo nooo nooo no no nooo nooooooooooo; noo noooo

be content to produce the desired impression by separate citations of
no noooooo no noooooo noo noooooo nooooooooo no nooooooo noooooooo no

items, practically or reliably known to me as a whaleman; and from these
noooo, noooooooooo no nooooooo noooo no no no n nooooooo; noo nooo noooo

citations, I take it--the conclusion aimed at will naturally follow of
noooooooo, N nooo no--noo nooooooooo noooo no nooo noooooooo nooooo no

itself.
nooooo.




First: I have personally known three instances where a whale, after
Noooo: N nooo nooooooooo noooo noooo noooooooo noooo n noooo, noooo

receiving a harpoon, has effected a complete escape; and, after an
noooooooo n noooooo, noo nooooooo n nooooooo nooooo; noo, noooo no

interval (in one instance of three years), has been again struck by
nooooooo (no noo nooooooo no noooo noooo), noo nooo noooo nooooo no

the same hand, and slain; when the two irons, both marked by the same
noo nooo nooo, noo noooo; nooo noo noo noooo, nooo nooooo no noo nooo

private cypher, have been taken from the body. In the instance where
noooooo nooooo, nooo nooo noooo nooo noo nooo. No noo nooooooo noooo

three years intervened between the flinging of the two harpoons; and I
noooo noooo nooooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo no noo noo nooooooo; noo N

think it may have been something more than that; the man who darted
noooo no noo nooo nooo noooooooo nooo nooo nooo; noo noo noo nooooo

them happening, in the interval, to go in a trading ship on a voyage to
nooo noooooooo, no noo nooooooo, no no no n noooooo nooo no n nooooo no

Africa, went ashore there, joined a discovery party, and penetrated far
Nooooo, nooo nooooo noooo, nooooo n noooooooo noooo, noo nooooooooo noo

into the interior, where he travelled for a period of nearly two years,
nooo noo nooooooo, noooo no noooooooo noo n nooooo no nooooo noo noooo,

often endangered by serpents, savages, tigers, poisonous miasmas,
noooo nooooooooo no nooooooo, noooooo, nooooo, noooooooo noooooo,

with all the other common perils incident to wandering in the heart of
nooo noo noo noooo nooooo nooooo nooooooo no noooooooo no noo noooo no

unknown regions. Meanwhile, the whale he had struck must also have
noooooo noooooo. Noooooooo, noo noooo no noo nooooo nooo nooo nooo

been on its travels; no doubt it had thrice circumnavigated the globe,
nooo no noo noooooo; no noooo no noo nooooo noooooooooooooo noo noooo,

brushing with its flanks all the coasts of Africa; but to no purpose.
nooooooo nooo noo nooooo noo noo nooooo no Nooooo; noo no no noooooo.

This man and this whale again came together, and the one vanquished the
Nooo noo noo nooo noooo noooo nooo nooooooo, noo noo noo nooooooooo noo

other. I say I, myself, have known three instances similar to this; that
noooo. N noo N, nooooo, nooo noooo noooo noooooooo noooooo no nooo; nooo

is in two of them I saw the whales struck; and, upon the second attack,
no no noo no nooo N noo noo nooooo nooooo; noo, nooo noo nooooo nooooo,

saw the two irons with the respective marks cut in them, afterwards
noo noo noo noooo nooo noo nooooooooo noooo noo no nooo, nooooooooo

taken from the dead fish. In the three-year instance, it so fell out
noooo nooo noo nooo nooo. No noo noooo-nooo nooooooo, no no nooo noo

that I was in the boat both times, first and last, and the last time
nooo N noo no noo nooo nooo noooo, noooo noo nooo, noo noo nooo nooo

distinctly recognised a peculiar sort of huge mole under the whale's
nooooooooo nooooooooo n nooooooo nooo no nooo nooo noooo noo noooo'n

eye, which I had observed there three years previous. I say three years,
noo, noooo N noo nooooooo noooo noooo noooo nooooooo. N noo noooo noooo,

but I am pretty sure it was more than that. Here are three instances,
noo N no nooooo nooo no noo nooo nooo nooo. Nooo noo noooo noooooooo,

then, which I personally know the truth of; but I have heard of many
nooo, noooo N nooooooooo nooo noo noooo no; noo N nooo noooo no nooo

other instances from persons whose veracity in the matter there is no
noooo noooooooo nooo noooooo noooo nooooooo no noo nooooo noooo no no

good ground to impeach.
nooo nooooo no noooooo.




Secondly: It is well known in the Sperm Whale Fishery, however ignorant
Nooooooo: No no nooo noooo no noo Noooo Noooo Noooooo, noooooo nooooooo

the world ashore may be of it, that there have been several memorable
noo noooo nooooo noo no no no, nooo noooo nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo

historical instances where a particular whale in the ocean has been at
nooooooooo noooooooo noooo n nooooooooo noooo no noo noooo noo nooo no

distant times and places popularly cognisable. Why such a whale became
noooooo noooo noo nooooo noooooooo nooooooooo. Noo nooo n noooo nooooo

thus marked was not altogether and originally owing to his bodily
nooo nooooo noo noo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo noooo no noo nooooo

peculiarities as distinguished from other whales; for however peculiar
noooooooooooo no noooooooooooo nooo noooo nooooo; noo noooooo nooooooo

in that respect any chance whale may be, they soon put an end to his
no nooo noooooo noo nooooo noooo noo no, nooo nooo noo no noo no noo

peculiarities by killing him, and boiling him down into a peculiarly
noooooooooooo no noooooo noo, noo noooooo noo nooo nooo n nooooooooo

valuable oil. No: the reason was this: that from the fatal experiences
nooooooo noo. No: noo nooooo noo nooo: nooo nooo noo noooo noooooooooo

of the fishery there hung a terrible prestige of perilousness about
no noo noooooo noooo nooo n nooooooo nooooooo no nooooooooooo noooo

such a whale as there did about Rinaldo Rinaldini, insomuch that
nooo n noooo no noooo noo noooo Noooooo Noooooooo, nooooooo nooo

most fishermen were content to recognise him by merely touching their
nooo noooooooo nooo noooooo no noooooooo noo no nooooo nooooooo noooo

tarpaulins when he would be discovered lounging by them on the sea,
nooooooooo nooo no noooo no nooooooooo nooooooo no nooo no noo noo,

without seeking to cultivate a more intimate acquaintance. Like some
noooooo noooooo no noooooooo n nooo nooooooo nooooooooooo. Nooo nooo

poor devils ashore that happen to know an irascible great man, they
nooo nooooo nooooo nooo nooooo no nooo no noooooooo noooo noo, nooo

make distant unobtrusive salutations to him in the street, lest if they
nooo noooooo noooooooooo noooooooooo no noo no noo nooooo, nooo no nooo

pursued the acquaintance further, they might receive a summary thump for
noooooo noo nooooooooooo noooooo, nooo noooo noooooo n noooooo noooo noo

their presumption.
noooo noooooooooo.




But not only did each of these famous whales enjoy great individual
Noo noo nooo noo nooo no noooo nooooo nooooo noooo noooo nooooooooo

celebrity--Nay, you may call it an ocean-wide renown; not only was he
noooooooo--Noo, noo noo nooo no no noooo-nooo nooooo; noo nooo noo no

famous in life and now is immortal in forecastle stories after death,
nooooo no nooo noo noo no nooooooo no nooooooooo noooooo noooo noooo,

but he was admitted into all the rights, privileges, and distinctions of
noo no noo nooooooo nooo noo noo nooooo, nooooooooo, noo nooooooooooo no

a name; had as much a name indeed as Cambyses or Caesar. Was it not so,
n nooo; noo no nooo n nooo nooooo no Nooooooo no Nooooo. Noo no noo no,

O Timor Tom! thou famed leviathan, scarred like an iceberg, who so long
N Noooo Noo! nooo noooo noooooooo, noooooo nooo no noooooo, noo no nooo

did'st lurk in the Oriental straits of that name, whose spout was oft
noo'no nooo no noo Nooooooo noooooo no nooo nooo, noooo noooo noo noo

seen from the palmy beach of Ombay? Was it not so, O New Zealand Jack!
nooo nooo noo noooo noooo no Noooo? Noo no noo no, N Noo Noooooo Nooo!

thou terror of all cruisers that crossed their wakes in the vicinity of
nooo nooooo no noo nooooooo nooo noooooo noooo noooo no noo nooooooo no

the Tattoo Land? Was it not so, O Morquan! King of Japan, whose lofty
noo Nooooo Nooo? Noo no noo no, N Noooooo! Nooo no Noooo, noooo noooo

jet they say at times assumed the semblance of a snow-white cross
noo nooo noo no noooo noooooo noo noooooooo no n nooo-noooo noooo

against the sky? Was it not so, O Don Miguel! thou Chilian whale, marked
noooooo noo noo? Noo no noo no, N Noo Nooooo! nooo Noooooo noooo, nooooo

like an old tortoise with mystic hieroglyphics upon the back! In plain
nooo no noo nooooooo nooo nooooo noooooooooooo nooo noo nooo! No noooo

prose, here are four whales as well known to the students of Cetacean
noooo, nooo noo nooo nooooo no nooo noooo no noo nooooooo no Nooooooo

History as Marius or Sylla to the classic scholar.
Noooooo no Nooooo no Noooo no noo noooooo noooooo.




But this is not all. New Zealand Tom and Don Miguel, after at various
Noo nooo no noo noo. Noo Noooooo Noo noo Noo Nooooo, noooo no noooooo

times creating great havoc among the boats of different vessels, were
noooo nooooooo noooo noooo noooo noo noooo no noooooooo noooooo, nooo

finally gone in quest of, systematically hunted out, chased and killed
noooooo nooo no noooo no, nooooooooooooo nooooo noo, nooooo noo nooooo

by valiant whaling captains, who heaved up their anchors with
no noooooo noooooo nooooooo, noo nooooo no noooo noooooo nooo

that express object as much in view, as in setting out through the
nooo noooooo nooooo no nooo no nooo, no no noooooo noo noooooo noo

Narragansett Woods, Captain Butler of old had it in his mind to capture
Nooooooooooo Noooo, Noooooo Nooooo no noo noo no no noo nooo no noooooo

that notorious murderous savage Annawon, the headmost warrior of the
nooo noooooooo noooooooo nooooo Noooooo, noo nooooooo noooooo no noo

Indian King Philip.
Nooooo Nooo Nooooo.




I do not know where I can find a better place than just here, to make
N no noo nooo noooo N noo nooo n nooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo, no nooo

mention of one or two other things, which to me seem important, as in
noooooo no noo no noo noooo nooooo, noooo no no nooo noooooooo, no no

printed form establishing in all respects the reasonableness of the
noooooo nooo nooooooooooo no noo nooooooo noo nooooooooooooo no noo

whole story of the White Whale, more especially the catastrophe. For
noooo noooo no noo Noooo Noooo, nooo nooooooooo noo noooooooooo. Noo

this is one of those disheartening instances where truth requires full
nooo no noo no noooo noooooooooooo noooooooo noooo noooo nooooooo nooo

as much bolstering as error. So ignorant are most landsmen of some of
no nooo nooooooooo no noooo. No nooooooo noo nooo nooooooo no nooo no

the plainest and most palpable wonders of the world, that without
noo nooooooo noo nooo nooooooo noooooo no noo noooo, nooo noooooo

some hints touching the plain facts, historical and otherwise, of the
nooo noooo nooooooo noo noooo noooo, nooooooooo noo noooooooo, no noo

fishery, they might scout at Moby Dick as a monstrous fable, or still
noooooo, nooo noooo noooo no Nooo Nooo no n noooooooo noooo, no noooo

worse and more detestable, a hideous and intolerable allegory.
noooo noo nooo nooooooooo, n noooooo noo noooooooooo nooooooo.




First: Though most men have some vague flitting ideas of the general
Noooo: Nooooo nooo noo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo noooo no noo noooooo

perils of the grand fishery, yet they have nothing like a fixed, vivid
nooooo no noo noooo noooooo, noo nooo nooo noooooo nooo n noooo, noooo

conception of those perils, and the frequency with which they recur.
nooooooooo no noooo nooooo, noo noo noooooooo nooo noooo nooo noooo.

One reason perhaps is, that not one in fifty of the actual disasters and
Noo nooooo noooooo no, nooo noo noo no noooo no noo nooooo noooooooo noo

deaths by casualties in the fishery, ever finds a public record at home,
nooooo no nooooooooo no noo noooooo, nooo noooo n nooooo nooooo no nooo,

however transient and immediately forgotten that record. Do you suppose
noooooo noooooooo noo noooooooooo noooooooo nooo nooooo. No noo noooooo

that that poor fellow there, who this moment perhaps caught by the
nooo nooo nooo nooooo noooo, noo nooo nooooo noooooo nooooo no noo

whale-line off the coast of New Guinea, is being carried down to the
noooo-nooo noo noo noooo no Noo Nooooo, no noooo noooooo nooo no noo

bottom of the sea by the sounding leviathan--do you suppose that that
nooooo no noo noo no noo nooooooo noooooooo--no noo noooooo nooo nooo

poor fellow's name will appear in the newspaper obituary you will read
nooo nooooo'n nooo nooo nooooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo noo nooo nooo

to-morrow at your breakfast? No: because the mails are very irregular
no-nooooo no nooo noooooooo? No: noooooo noo noooo noo nooo noooooooo

between here and New Guinea. In fact, did you ever hear what might be
noooooo nooo noo Noo Nooooo. No nooo, noo noo nooo nooo nooo noooo no

called regular news direct or indirect from New Guinea? Yet I tell you
nooooo noooooo nooo nooooo no nooooooo nooo Noo Nooooo? Noo N nooo noo

that upon one particular voyage which I made to the Pacific, among many
nooo nooo noo nooooooooo nooooo noooo N nooo no noo Noooooo, noooo nooo

others we spoke thirty different ships, every one of which had had a
nooooo no noooo nooooo noooooooo noooo, noooo noo no noooo noo noo n

death by a whale, some of them more than one, and three that had each
noooo no n noooo, nooo no nooo nooo nooo noo, noo noooo nooo noo nooo

lost a boat's crew. For God's sake, be economical with your lamps and
nooo n nooo'n nooo. Noo Noo'n nooo, no nooooooooo nooo nooo noooo noo

candles! not a gallon you burn, but at least one drop of man's blood was
noooooo! noo n nooooo noo nooo, noo no noooo noo nooo no noo'n noooo noo

spilled for it.
noooooo noo no.




Secondly: People ashore have indeed some indefinite idea that a whale is
Nooooooo: Nooooo nooooo nooo nooooo nooo nooooooooo nooo nooo n noooo no

an enormous creature of enormous power; but I have ever found that when
no nooooooo nooooooo no nooooooo noooo; noo N nooo nooo noooo nooo nooo

narrating to them some specific example of this two-fold enormousness,
noooooooo no nooo nooo nooooooo noooooo no nooo noo-nooo nooooooooooo,

they have significantly complimented me upon my facetiousness; when, I
nooo nooo noooooooooooo nooooooooooo no nooo no noooooooooooo; nooo, N

declare upon my soul, I had no more idea of being facetious than Moses,
noooooo nooo no nooo, N noo no nooo nooo no noooo noooooooo nooo Noooo,

when he wrote the history of the plagues of Egypt.
nooo no noooo noo noooooo no noo noooooo no Noooo.




But fortunately the special point I here seek can be established upon
Noo noooooooooo noo noooooo noooo N nooo nooo noo no noooooooooo nooo

testimony entirely independent of my own. That point is this: The Sperm
noooooooo nooooooo noooooooooo no no noo. Nooo noooo no nooo: Noo Noooo

Whale is in some cases sufficiently powerful, knowing, and judiciously
Noooo no no nooo noooo nooooooooooo nooooooo, noooooo, noo noooooooooo

malicious, as with direct aforethought to stave in, utterly destroy, and
noooooooo, no nooo nooooo nooooooooooo no noooo no, noooooo noooooo, noo

sink a large ship; and what is more, the Sperm Whale HAS done it.
nooo n noooo nooo; noo nooo no nooo, noo Noooo Noooo NOO nooo no.




First: In the year 1820 the ship Essex, Captain Pollard, of Nantucket,
Noooo: No noo nooo nooo noo nooo Noooo, Noooooo Noooooo, no Noooooooo,

was cruising in the Pacific Ocean. One day she saw spouts, lowered her
noo nooooooo no noo Noooooo Noooo. Noo noo noo noo nooooo, noooooo noo

boats, and gave chase to a shoal of sperm whales. Ere long, several of
noooo, noo nooo noooo no n noooo no noooo nooooo. Noo nooo, noooooo no

the whales were wounded; when, suddenly, a very large whale escaping
noo nooooo nooo noooooo; nooo, nooooooo, n nooo noooo noooo nooooooo

from the boats, issued from the shoal, and bore directly down upon the
nooo noo noooo, nooooo nooo noo noooo, noo nooo nooooooo nooo nooo noo

ship. Dashing his forehead against her hull, he so stove her in, that in
nooo. Noooooo noo nooooooo noooooo noo nooo, no no noooo noo no, nooo no

less than "ten minutes" she settled down and fell over. Not a surviving
nooo nooo "noo noooooo" noo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooo. Noo n noooooooo

plank of her has been seen since. After the severest exposure, part of
noooo no noo noo nooo nooo noooo. Noooo noo nooooooo nooooooo, nooo no

the crew reached the land in their boats. Being returned home at last,
noo nooo noooooo noo nooo no noooo noooo. Noooo nooooooo nooo no nooo,

Captain Pollard once more sailed for the Pacific in command of another
Noooooo Noooooo nooo nooo nooooo noo noo Noooooo no noooooo no noooooo

ship, but the gods shipwrecked him again upon unknown rocks and
nooo, noo noo nooo noooooooooo noo noooo nooo noooooo noooo noo

breakers; for the second time his ship was utterly lost, and forthwith
nooooooo; noo noo nooooo nooo noo nooo noo noooooo nooo, noo noooooooo

forswearing the sea, he has never tempted it since. At this day Captain
noooooooooo noo noo, no noo noooo noooooo no noooo. No nooo noo Noooooo

Pollard is a resident of Nantucket. I have seen Owen Chace, who was
Noooooo no n nooooooo no Noooooooo. N nooo nooo Nooo Noooo, noo noo

chief mate of the Essex at the time of the tragedy; I have read his
noooo nooo no noo Noooo no noo nooo no noo noooooo; N nooo nooo noo

plain and faithful narrative; I have conversed with his son; and all
noooo noo nooooooo noooooooo; N nooo noooooooo nooo noo noo; noo noo

this within a few miles of the scene of the catastrophe.*
nooo nooooo n noo noooo no noo noooo no noo noooooooooo.*







*The following are extracts from Chace's narrative: "Every fact seemed
*Noo noooooooo noo nooooooo nooo Noooo'n noooooooo: "Noooo nooo nooooo

to warrant me in concluding that it was anything but chance which
no noooooo no no nooooooooo nooo no noo nooooooo noo nooooo noooo

directed his operations; he made two several attacks upon the ship, at
nooooooo noo nooooooooo; no nooo noo noooooo noooooo nooo noo nooo, no

a short interval between them, both of which, according to their
n noooo nooooooo noooooo nooo, nooo no noooo, noooooooo no noooo

direction, were calculated to do us the most injury, by being made
noooooooo, nooo nooooooooo no no no noo nooo nooooo, no noooo nooo

ahead, and thereby combining the speed of the two objects for the shock;
noooo, noo noooooo noooooooo noo noooo no noo noo noooooo noo noo noooo;

to effect which, the exact manoeuvres which he made were necessary. His
no nooooo noooo, noo noooo nooooooooo noooo no nooo nooo noooooooo. Noo

aspect was most horrible, and such as indicated resentment and fury. He
nooooo noo nooo nooooooo, noo nooo no noooooooo nooooooooo noo nooo. No

came directly from the shoal which we had just before entered, and in
nooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo noooo no noo nooo nooooo noooooo, noo no

which we had struck three of his companions, as if fired with revenge
noooo no noo nooooo noooo no noo nooooooooo, no no noooo nooo noooooo

for their sufferings." Again: "At all events, the whole circumstances
noo noooo nooooooooo." Noooo: "No noo nooooo, noo noooo noooooooooooo

taken together, all happening before my own eyes, and producing, at the
noooo nooooooo, noo noooooooo nooooo no noo nooo, noo noooooooo, no noo

time, impressions in my mind of decided, calculating mischief, on the
nooo, noooooooooo no no nooo no noooooo, noooooooooo nooooooo, no noo

part of the whale (many of which impressions I cannot now recall),
nooo no noo noooo (nooo no noooo noooooooooo N nooooo noo nooooo),

induce me to be satisfied that I am correct in my opinion."
nooooo no no no noooooooo nooo N no noooooo no no noooooo."




Here are his reflections some time after quitting the ship, during
Nooo noo noo noooooooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo noo nooo, nooooo

a black night in an open boat, when almost despairing of reaching any
n noooo noooo no no nooo nooo, nooo nooooo nooooooooo no nooooooo noo

hospitable shore. "The dark ocean and swelling waters were nothing; the
nooooooooo noooo. "Noo nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooo nooo noooooo; noo

fears of being swallowed up by some dreadful tempest, or dashed
noooo no noooo noooooooo no no nooo nooooooo noooooo, no nooooo

upon hidden rocks, with all the other ordinary subjects of fearful
nooo nooooo noooo, nooo noo noo noooo nooooooo nooooooo no noooooo

contemplation, seemed scarcely entitled to a moment's thought; the
noooooooooooo, nooooo nooooooo nooooooo no n nooooo'n noooooo; noo

dismal looking wreck, and THE HORRID ASPECT AND REVENGE OF THE WHALE,
nooooo noooooo noooo, noo NOO NOOOOO NOOOOO NOO NOOOOOO NO NOO NOOOO,

wholly engrossed my reflections, until day again made its appearance."
nooooo noooooooo no noooooooooo, noooo noo noooo nooo noo nooooooooo."




In another place--p. 45,--he speaks of "THE MYSTERIOUS AND MORTAL ATTACK
No noooooo noooo--n. no,--no nooooo no "NOO NOOOOOOOOO NOO NOOOOO NOOOOO

OF THE ANIMAL."
NO NOO NOOOOO."







Secondly: The ship Union, also of Nantucket, was in the year 1807
Nooooooo: Noo nooo Noooo, nooo no Noooooooo, noo no noo nooo nooo

totally lost off the Azores by a similar onset, but the authentic
noooooo nooo noo noo Nooooo no n noooooo noooo, noo noo noooooooo

noooooooooo no nooo noooooooooo N nooo noooo noooooo no noooooooo,

no no.




Thirdly: Some eighteen or twenty years ago Commodore J---, then
Noooooo: Nooo nooooooo no nooooo noooo noo Noooooooo N---, nooo

commanding an American sloop-of-war of the first class, happened to be
nooooooooo no Nooooooo noooo-no-noo no noo noooo noooo, nooooooo no no

dining with a party of whaling captains, on board a Nantucket ship in
nooooo nooo n noooo no noooooo nooooooo, no noooo n Noooooooo nooo no

the harbor of Oahu, Sandwich Islands. Conversation turning upon whales,
noo nooooo no Nooo, Nooooooo Noooooo. Nooooooooooo noooooo nooo nooooo,

the Commodore was pleased to be sceptical touching the amazing strength
noo Noooooooo noo noooooo no no noooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo nooooooo

ascribed to them by the professional gentlemen present. He peremptorily
nooooooo no nooo no noo nooooooooooo noooooooo noooooo. No nooooooooooo

denied for example, that any whale could so smite his stout sloop-of-war
nooooo noo noooooo, nooo noo noooo noooo no noooo noo noooo noooo-no-noo

as to cause her to leak so much as a thimbleful. Very good; but there
no no noooo noo no nooo no nooo no n nooooooooo. Nooo nooo; noo noooo

is more coming. Some weeks after, the Commodore set sail in this
no nooo nooooo. Nooo noooo noooo, noo Noooooooo noo nooo no nooo

impregnable craft for Valparaiso. But he was stopped on the way by a
noooooooooo noooo noo Nooooooooo. Noo no noo noooooo no noo noo no n

portly sperm whale, that begged a few moments' confidential business
nooooo noooo noooo, nooo nooooo n noo noooooo' nooooooooooo nooooooo

with him. That business consisted in fetching the Commodore's craft such
nooo noo. Nooo nooooooo noooooooo no nooooooo noo Noooooooo'n noooo nooo

a thwack, that with all his pumps going he made straight for the nearest
n nooooo, nooo nooo noo noo noooo noooo no nooo nooooooo noo noo noooooo

port to heave down and repair. I am not superstitious, but I consider
nooo no noooo nooo noo nooooo. N no noo noooooooooooo, noo N nooooooo

the Commodore's interview with that whale as providential. Was not Saul
noo Noooooooo'n noooooooo nooo nooo noooo no nooooooooooo. Noo noo Nooo

of Tarsus converted from unbelief by a similar fright? I tell you, the
no Nooooo noooooooo nooo nooooooo no n noooooo nooooo? N nooo noo, noo

sperm whale will stand no nonsense.
noooo noooo nooo noooo no nooooooo.




I will now refer you to Langsdorff's Voyages for a little circumstance
N nooo noo noooo noo no Nooooooooo'n Noooooo noo n nooooo nooooooooooo

in point, peculiarly interesting to the writer hereof. Langsdorff, you
no noooo, nooooooooo noooooooooo no noo nooooo nooooo. Nooooooooo, noo

must know by the way, was attached to the Russian Admiral Krusenstern's
nooo nooo no noo noo, noo nooooooo no noo Noooooo Noooooo Noooooooooo'n

famous Discovery Expedition in the beginning of the present century.
nooooo Noooooooo Nooooooooo no noo noooooooo no noo noooooo noooooo.

Captain Langsdorff thus begins his seventeenth chapter:
Noooooo Nooooooooo nooo nooooo noo noooooooooo noooooo:




"By the thirteenth of May our ship was ready to sail, and the next day
"No noo nooooooooo no Noo noo nooo noo noooo no nooo, noo noo nooo noo

we were out in the open sea, on our way to Ochotsh. The weather was very
no nooo noo no noo nooo noo, no noo noo no Noooooo. Noo noooooo noo nooo

clear and fine, but so intolerably cold that we were obliged to keep on
noooo noo nooo, noo no noooooooooo nooo nooo no nooo noooooo no nooo no

our fur clothing. For some days we had very little wind; it was not
noo noo nooooooo. Noo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooooo nooo; no noo noo

till the nineteenth that a brisk gale from the northwest sprang up. An
nooo noo nooooooooo nooo n noooo nooo nooo noo noooooooo nooooo no. No

uncommon large whale, the body of which was larger than the ship itself,
nooooooo noooo noooo, noo nooo no noooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooo nooooo,

lay almost at the surface of the water, but was not perceived by any
noo nooooo no noo noooooo no noo noooo, noo noo noo noooooooo no noo

one on board till the moment when the ship, which was in full sail,
noo no noooo nooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooo, noooo noo no nooo nooo,

was almost upon him, so that it was impossible to prevent its striking
noo nooooo nooo noo, no nooo no noo nooooooooo no noooooo noo nooooooo

against him. We were thus placed in the most imminent danger, as this
noooooo noo. No nooo nooo nooooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooooo, no nooo

gigantic creature, setting up its back, raised the ship three feet at
nooooooo nooooooo, noooooo no noo nooo, nooooo noo nooo noooo nooo no

least out of the water. The masts reeled, and the sails fell altogether,
noooo noo no noo noooo. Noo noooo nooooo, noo noo noooo nooo nooooooooo,

while we who were below all sprang instantly upon the deck, concluding
noooo no noo nooo noooo noo nooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooo, nooooooooo

that we had struck upon some rock; instead of this we saw the monster
nooo no noo nooooo nooo nooo nooo; noooooo no nooo no noo noo noooooo

sailing off with the utmost gravity and solemnity. Captain D'Wolf
noooooo noo nooo noo nooooo noooooo noo noooooooo. Noooooo N'Nooo

applied immediately to the pumps to examine whether or not the vessel
noooooo noooooooooo no noo noooo no noooooo noooooo no noo noo nooooo

had received any damage from the shock, but we found that very happily
noo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo noo noooo, noo no noooo nooo nooo noooooo

it had escaped entirely uninjured."
no noo noooooo nooooooo noooooooo."




Now, the Captain D'Wolf here alluded to as commanding the ship in
Noo, noo Noooooo N'Nooo nooo noooooo no no nooooooooo noo nooo no

question, is a New Englander, who, after a long life of unusual
nooooooo, no n Noo Noooooooo, noo, noooo n nooo nooo no noooooo

adventures as a sea-captain, this day resides in the village of
nooooooooo no n noo-noooooo, nooo noo noooooo no noo noooooo no

Dorchester near Boston. I have the honour of being a nephew of his. I
Nooooooooo nooo Nooooo. N nooo noo nooooo no noooo n nooooo no noo. N

have particularly questioned him concerning this passage in Langsdorff.
nooo nooooooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo nooo noooooo no Nooooooooo.

He substantiates every word. The ship, however, was by no means a large
No noooooooooooo noooo nooo. Noo nooo, noooooo, noo no no noooo n noooo

one: a Russian craft built on the Siberian coast, and purchased by my
noo: n Noooooo noooo noooo no noo Nooooooo noooo, noo noooooooo no no

uncle after bartering away the vessel in which he sailed from home.
noooo noooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo no noooo no nooooo nooo nooo.




In that up and down manly book of old-fashioned adventure, so full, too,
No nooo no noo nooo noooo nooo no noo-noooooooo noooooooo, no nooo, noo,

of honest wonders--the voyage of Lionel Wafer, one of ancient Dampier's
no nooooo noooooo--noo nooooo no Nooooo Noooo, noo no noooooo Noooooo'n

old chums--I found a little matter set down so like that just quoted
noo noooo--N noooo n nooooo nooooo noo nooo no nooo nooo nooo nooooo

from Langsdorff, that I cannot forbear inserting it here for a
nooo Nooooooooo, nooo N nooooo noooooo noooooooo no nooo noo n

corroborative example, if such be needed.
noooooooooooo noooooo, no nooo no nooooo.




Lionel, it seems, was on his way to "John Ferdinando," as he calls
Nooooo, no noooo, noo no noo noo no "Nooo Nooooooooo," no no noooo

the modern Juan Fernandes. "In our way thither," he says, "about four
noo nooooo Nooo Noooooooo. "No noo noo noooooo," no nooo, "noooo nooo

o'clock in the morning, when we were about one hundred and fifty leagues
n'noooo no noo noooooo, nooo no nooo noooo noo noooooo noo noooo noooooo

from the Main of America, our ship felt a terrible shock, which put our
nooo noo Nooo no Noooooo, noo nooo nooo n nooooooo noooo, noooo noo noo

men in such consternation that they could hardly tell where they were
noo no nooo noooooooooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooo nooo noooo nooo nooo

or what to think; but every one began to prepare for death. And, indeed,
no nooo no noooo; noo noooo noo noooo no noooooo noo noooo. Noo, nooooo,

the shock was so sudden and violent, that we took it for granted the
noo noooo noo no nooooo noo noooooo, nooo no nooo no noo noooooo noo

ship had struck against a rock; but when the amazement was a little
nooo noo nooooo noooooo n nooo; noo nooo noo noooooooo noo n nooooo

over, we cast the lead, and sounded, but found no ground..... The
nooo, no nooo noo nooo, noo noooooo, noo noooo no nooooo..... Noo

suddenness of the shock made the guns leap in their carriages, and
nooooooooo no noo noooo nooo noo nooo nooo no noooo noooooooo, noo

several of the men were shaken out of their hammocks. Captain Davis, who
noooooo no noo noo nooo nooooo noo no noooo nooooooo. Noooooo Noooo, noo

lay with his head on a gun, was thrown out of his cabin!" Lionel then
noo nooo noo nooo no n noo, noo nooooo noo no noo noooo!" Nooooo nooo

goes on to impute the shock to an earthquake, and seems to substantiate
nooo no no nooooo noo noooo no no nooooooooo, noo noooo no nooooooooooo

the imputation by stating that a great earthquake, somewhere about
noo nooooooooo no noooooo nooo n noooo nooooooooo, noooooooo noooo

that time, did actually do great mischief along the Spanish land. But
nooo nooo, noo nooooooo no noooo nooooooo noooo noo Noooooo nooo. Noo

I should not much wonder if, in the darkness of that early hour of the
N nooooo noo nooo nooooo no, no noo nooooooo no nooo noooo nooo no noo

morning, the shock was after all caused by an unseen whale vertically
noooooo, noo noooo noo noooo noo nooooo no no nooooo noooo nooooooooo

bumping the hull from beneath.
noooooo noo nooo nooo noooooo.




I might proceed with several more examples, one way or another known to
N noooo noooooo nooo noooooo nooo nooooooo, noo noo no noooooo noooo no

me, of the great power and malice at times of the sperm whale. In more
no, no noo noooo noooo noo nooooo no noooo no noo noooo noooo. No nooo

than one instance, he has been known, not only to chase the assailing
nooo noo nooooooo, no noo nooo noooo, noo nooo no noooo noo noooooooo

boats back to their ships, but to pursue the ship itself, and long
noooo nooo no noooo noooo, noo no nooooo noo nooo nooooo, noo nooo

withstand all the lances hurled at him from its decks. The English ship
noooooooo noo noo nooooo nooooo no noo nooo noo noooo. Noo Noooooo nooo

Pusie Hall can tell a story on that head; and, as for his strength,
Noooo Nooo noo nooo n noooo no nooo nooo; noo, no noo noo nooooooo,

let me say, that there have been examples where the lines attached to a
noo no noo, nooo noooo nooo nooo nooooooo noooo noo noooo nooooooo no n

running sperm whale have, in a calm, been transferred to the ship, and
noooooo noooo noooo nooo, no n nooo, nooo noooooooooo no noo nooo, noo

secured there; the whale towing her great hull through the water, as a
noooooo noooo; noo noooo nooooo noo noooo nooo noooooo noo noooo, no n

horse walks off with a cart. Again, it is very often observed that, if
noooo noooo noo nooo n nooo. Noooo, no no nooo noooo nooooooo nooo, no

the sperm whale, once struck, is allowed time to rally, he then acts,
noo noooo noooo, nooo nooooo, no noooooo nooo no noooo, no nooo nooo,

not so often with blind rage, as with wilful, deliberate designs of
noo no noooo nooo noooo nooo, no nooo nooooo, nooooooooo noooooo no

destruction to his pursuers; nor is it without conveying some eloquent
noooooooooo no noo nooooooo; noo no no noooooo noooooooo nooo nooooooo

indication of his character, that upon being attacked he will frequently
nooooooooo no noo noooooooo, nooo nooo noooo nooooooo no nooo nooooooooo

open his mouth, and retain it in that dread expansion for several
nooo noo noooo, noo nooooo no no nooo noooo noooooooo noo noooooo

consecutive minutes. But I must be content with only one more and a
noooooooooo noooooo. Noo N nooo no noooooo nooo nooo noo nooo noo n

concluding illustration; a remarkable and most significant one, by which
nooooooooo nooooooooooo; n nooooooooo noo nooo noooooooooo noo, no noooo

you will not fail to see, that not only is the most marvellous event in
noo nooo noo nooo no noo, nooo noo nooo no noo nooo nooooooooo noooo no

this book corroborated by plain facts of the present day, but that these
nooo nooo nooooooooooo no noooo noooo no noo noooooo noo, noo nooo noooo

marvels (like all marvels) are mere repetitions of the ages; so that for
noooooo (nooo noo noooooo) noo nooo noooooooooo no noo nooo; no nooo noo

the millionth time we say amen with Solomon--Verily there is nothing new
noo noooooooo nooo no noo nooo nooo Noooooo--Nooooo noooo no noooooo noo

under the sun.
noooo noo noo.




In the sixth Christian century lived Procopius, a Christian magistrate
No noo noooo Noooooooo noooooo noooo Noooooooo, n Noooooooo nooooooooo

of Constantinople, in the days when Justinian was Emperor and Belisarius
no Nooooooooooooo, no noo nooo nooo Noooooooo noo Noooooo noo Nooooooooo

general. As many know, he wrote the history of his own times, a work
noooooo. No nooo nooo, no noooo noo noooooo no noo noo noooo, n nooo

every way of uncommon value. By the best authorities, he has always been
noooo noo no nooooooo noooo. No noo nooo noooooooooo, no noo nooooo nooo

considered a most trustworthy and unexaggerating historian, except in
nooooooooo n nooo noooooooooo noo nooooooooooooo noooooooo, nooooo no

some one or two particulars, not at all affecting the matter presently
nooo noo no noo noooooooooo, noo no noo noooooooo noo nooooo noooooooo

to be mentioned.
no no noooooooo.




Now, in this history of his, Procopius mentions that, during the term
Noo, no nooo noooooo no noo, Noooooooo nooooooo nooo, nooooo noo nooo

of his prefecture at Constantinople, a great sea-monster was captured
no noo nooooooooo no Nooooooooooooo, n noooo noo-noooooo noo nooooooo

in the neighboring Propontis, or Sea of Marmora, after having destroyed
no noo noooooooooo Noooooooo, no Noo no Noooooo, noooo nooooo noooooooo

vessels at intervals in those waters for a period of more than fifty
noooooo no noooooooo no noooo nooooo noo n nooooo no nooo nooo noooo

years. A fact thus set down in substantial history cannot easily be
noooo. N nooo nooo noo nooo no noooooooooo noooooo nooooo nooooo no

gainsaid. Nor is there any reason it should be. Of what precise species
nooooooo. Noo no noooo noo nooooo no nooooo no. No nooo noooooo noooooo

this sea-monster was, is not mentioned. But as he destroyed ships, as
nooo noo-noooooo noo, no noo noooooooo. Noo no no noooooooo noooo, no

well as for other reasons, he must have been a whale; and I am strongly
nooo no noo noooo noooooo, no nooo nooo nooo n noooo; noo N no nooooooo

inclined to think a sperm whale. And I will tell you why. For a long
nooooooo no noooo n noooo noooo. Noo N nooo nooo noo noo. Noo n nooo

time I fancied that the sperm whale had been always unknown in the
nooo N noooooo nooo noo noooo noooo noo nooo nooooo noooooo no noo

Mediterranean and the deep waters connecting with it. Even now I am
Noooooooooooo noo noo nooo nooooo nooooooooo nooo no. Nooo noo N no

certain that those seas are not, and perhaps never can be, in the
noooooo nooo noooo nooo noo noo, noo noooooo noooo noo no, no noo

present constitution of things, a place for his habitual gregarious
noooooo nooooooooooo no nooooo, n noooo noo noo nooooooo nooooooooo

resort. But further investigations have recently proved to me, that in
nooooo. Noo noooooo nooooooooooooo nooo nooooooo nooooo no no, nooo no

modern times there have been isolated instances of the presence of the
nooooo noooo noooo nooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooooo no noo

sperm whale in the Mediterranean. I am told, on good authority, that
noooo noooo no noo Noooooooooooo. N no nooo, no nooo noooooooo, nooo

on the Barbary coast, a Commodore Davis of the British navy found
no noo Noooooo noooo, n Noooooooo Noooo no noo Noooooo nooo noooo

the skeleton of a sperm whale. Now, as a vessel of war readily passes
noo nooooooo no n noooo noooo. Noo, no n nooooo no noo noooooo nooooo

through the Dardanelles, hence a sperm whale could, by the same route,
noooooo noo Noooooooooo, noooo n noooo noooo noooo, no noo nooo noooo,

pass out of the Mediterranean into the Propontis.
nooo noo no noo Noooooooooooo nooo noo Noooooooo.




In the Propontis, as far as I can learn, none of that peculiar substance
No noo Noooooooo, no noo no N noo noooo, nooo no nooo nooooooo noooooooo

called BRIT is to be found, the aliment of the right whale. But I have
nooooo NOOO no no no noooo, noo noooooo no noo noooo noooo. Noo N nooo

every reason to believe that the food of the sperm whale--squid or
noooo nooooo no noooooo nooo noo nooo no noo noooo noooo--noooo no

cuttle-fish--lurks at the bottom of that sea, because large creatures,
nooooo-nooo--noooo no noo nooooo no nooo noo, noooooo noooo noooooooo,

but by no means the largest of that sort, have been found at its
noo no no noooo noo noooooo no nooo nooo, nooo nooo noooo no noo

surface. If, then, you properly put these statements together, and
noooooo. No, nooo, noo nooooooo noo noooo nooooooooo nooooooo, noo

reason upon them a bit, you will clearly perceive that, according to all
nooooo nooo nooo n noo, noo nooo noooooo nooooooo nooo, noooooooo no noo

human reasoning, Procopius's sea-monster, that for half a century stove
noooo noooooooo, Noooooooo'n noo-noooooo, nooo noo nooo n noooooo noooo

the ships of a Roman Emperor, must in all probability have been a sperm
noo noooo no n Noooo Noooooo, nooo no noo noooooooooo nooo nooo n noooo

whale.
noooo.










CHAPTER 46. Surmises.
NOOOOOO no. Nooooooo.







Though, consumed with the hot fire of his purpose, Ahab in all his
Nooooo, nooooooo nooo noo noo nooo no noo noooooo, Nooo no noo noo

thoughts and actions ever had in view the ultimate capture of Moby Dick;
nooooooo noo noooooo nooo noo no nooo noo nooooooo noooooo no Nooo Nooo;

though he seemed ready to sacrifice all mortal interests to that one
nooooo no nooooo noooo no noooooooo noo nooooo noooooooo no nooo noo

passion; nevertheless it may have been that he was by nature and long
noooooo; nooooooooooo no noo nooo nooo nooo no noo no nooooo noo nooo

habituation far too wedded to a fiery whaleman's ways, altogether to
noooooooooo noo noo nooooo no n noooo nooooooo'n nooo, nooooooooo no

abandon the collateral prosecution of the voyage. Or at least if
noooooo noo nooooooooo noooooooooo no noo nooooo. No no noooo no

this were otherwise, there were not wanting other motives much more
nooo nooo noooooooo, noooo nooo noo noooooo noooo noooooo nooo nooo

influential with him. It would be refining too much, perhaps, even
noooooooooo nooo noo. No noooo no nooooooo noo nooo, noooooo, nooo

considering his monomania, to hint that his vindictiveness towards the
noooooooooo noo noooooooo, no nooo nooo noo nooooooooooooo noooooo noo

White Whale might have possibly extended itself in some degree to all
Noooo Noooo noooo nooo nooooooo nooooooo nooooo no nooo nooooo no noo

sperm whales, and that the more monsters he slew by so much the more he
noooo nooooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooooooo no nooo no no nooo noo nooo no

multiplied the chances that each subsequently encountered whale would
nooooooooo noo noooooo nooo nooo nooooooooooo noooooooooo noooo noooo

prove to be the hated one he hunted. But if such an hypothesis be indeed
noooo no no noo noooo noo no nooooo. Noo no nooo no nooooooooo no nooooo

exceptionable, there were still additional considerations which, though
noooooooooooo, noooo nooo noooo nooooooooo nooooooooooooo noooo, nooooo

not so strictly according with the wildness of his ruling passion, yet
noo no nooooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooooo no noo nooooo noooooo, noo

were by no means incapable of swaying him.
nooo no no noooo noooooooo no noooooo noo.




To accomplish his object Ahab must use tools; and of all tools used in
No nooooooooo noo nooooo Nooo nooo noo noooo; noo no noo noooo nooo no

the shadow of the moon, men are most apt to get out of order. He knew,
noo nooooo no noo nooo, noo noo nooo noo no noo noo no noooo. No nooo,

for example, that however magnetic his ascendency in some respects was
noo noooooo, nooo noooooo nooooooo noo nooooooooo no nooo nooooooo noo

over Starbuck, yet that ascendency did not cover the complete spiritual
nooo Nooooooo, noo nooo nooooooooo noo noo noooo noo nooooooo noooooooo

man any more than mere corporeal superiority involves intellectual
noo noo nooo nooo nooo noooooooo noooooooooo nooooooo nooooooooooo

mastership; for to the purely spiritual, the intellectual but stand in a
nooooooooo; noo no noo nooooo noooooooo, noo nooooooooooo noo noooo no n

sort of corporeal relation. Starbuck's body and Starbuck's coerced will
nooo no noooooooo nooooooo. Nooooooo'n nooo noo Nooooooo'n noooooo nooo

were Ahab's, so long as Ahab kept his magnet at Starbuck's brain; still
nooo Nooo'n, no nooo no Nooo nooo noo nooooo no Nooooooo'n noooo; noooo

he knew that for all this the chief mate, in his soul, abhorred his
no nooo nooo noo noo nooo noo noooo nooo, no noo nooo, nooooooo noo

captain's quest, and could he, would joyfully disintegrate himself from
noooooo'n noooo, noo noooo no, noooo nooooooo nooooooooooo noooooo nooo

it, or even frustrate it. It might be that a long interval would elapse
no, no nooo noooooooo no. No noooo no nooo n nooo nooooooo noooo nooooo

ere the White Whale was seen. During that long interval Starbuck
noo noo Noooo Noooo noo nooo. Nooooo nooo nooo nooooooo Nooooooo

would ever be apt to fall into open relapses of rebellion against his
noooo nooo no noo no nooo nooo nooo nooooooo no noooooooo noooooo noo

captain's leadership, unless some ordinary, prudential, circumstantial
noooooo'n nooooooooo, nooooo nooo nooooooo, nooooooooo, nooooooooooooo

nooooooooo nooo noooooo no nooo nooo noo. Noo nooo nooo, noo noo nooooo

insanity of Ahab respecting Moby Dick was noways more significantly
nooooooo no Nooo nooooooooo Nooo Nooo noo nooooo nooo noooooooooooo

nooooooooo nooo no noo noooooooooo noooo noo nooooooooo no nooooooooo

that, for the present, the hunt should in some way be stripped of that
nooo, noo noo noooooo, noo nooo nooooo no nooo noo no nooooooo no nooo

strange imaginative impiousness which naturally invested it; that
noooooo noooooooooo noooooooooo noooo noooooooo nooooooo no; nooo

the full terror of the voyage must be kept withdrawn into the obscure
noo nooo nooooo no noo nooooo nooo no nooo noooooooo nooo noo noooooo

background (for few men's courage is proof against protracted meditation
nooooooooo (noo noo noo'n noooooo no noooo noooooo nooooooooo nooooooooo

unrelieved by action); that when they stood their long night watches,
nooooooooo no nooooo); nooo nooo nooo noooo noooo nooo noooo noooooo,

his officers and men must have some nearer things to think of than Moby
noo nooooooo noo noo nooo nooo nooo nooooo nooooo no noooo no nooo Nooo

Dick. For however eagerly and impetuously the savage crew had hailed the
Nooo. Noo noooooo noooooo noo noooooooooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooooo noo

announcement of his quest; yet all sailors of all sorts are more or less
nooooooooooo no noo noooo; noo noo noooooo no noo noooo noo nooo no nooo

capricious and unreliable--they live in the varying outer weather, and
nooooooooo noo nooooooooo--nooo nooo no noo noooooo noooo noooooo, noo

nooo nooooo noo nooooooooo--noo nooo nooooooo noo noo nooooo nooooo noo

blank in the pursuit, however promissory of life and passion in the
noooo no noo noooooo, noooooo nooooooooo no nooo noo noooooo no noo

end, it is above all things requisite that temporary interests and

noooooooooo nooooo noooooooo noo nooo nooo noooooooo noooooooo noo noo

final dash.
noooo nooo.




Nor was Ahab unmindful of another thing. In times of strong emotion
Noo noo Nooo noooooooo no noooooo noooo. No noooo no nooooo noooooo

mankind disdain all base considerations; but such times are evanescent.
noooooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooooooooo; noo nooo noooo noo nooooooooo.

The permanent constitutional condition of the manufactured man, thought
Noo noooooooo nooooooooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooooooooo noo, noooooo

Ahab, is sordidness. Granting that the White Whale fully incites the
Nooo, no nooooooooo. Nooooooo nooo noo Noooo Noooo noooo noooooo noo

hearts of this my savage crew, and playing round their savageness even
nooooo no nooo no nooooo nooo, noo noooooo noooo noooo nooooooooo nooo

nooooo n noooooo nooooooo nooooo-noooooooo no nooo, noooo, noooo noo noo

love of it they give chase to Moby Dick, they must also have food
nooo no no nooo nooo noooo no Nooo Nooo, nooo nooo nooo nooo nooo

noo noooo nooo nooooo, noooo noooooooo. Noo nooo noo nooo nooooo noo

chivalric Crusaders of old times were not content to traverse two
noooooooo Noooooooo no noo noooo nooo noo noooooo no nooooooo noo

nooooooo noooo no nooo no noooo noo noooo nooo noooooooo, noooooo

noooooooooo no noo noo. Noo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo no noooo noo noooo

and romantic object--that final and romantic object, too many would have
noo nooooooo nooooo--nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo noooo nooo

nooooo nooo no noooooo. N nooo noo noooo noooo noo, noooooo Nooo, no noo

hopes of cash--aye, cash. They may scorn cash now; but let some months
noooo no nooo--noo, nooo. Nooo noo noooo nooo noo; noo noo nooo nooooo

go by, and no perspective promise of it to them, and then this same
no no, noo no noooooooooo noooooo no no no nooo, noo nooo nooo nooo

quiescent cash all at once mutinying in them, this same cash would soon
noooooooo nooo noo no nooo noooooooo no nooo, nooo nooo nooo noooo nooo

cashier Ahab.
noooooo Nooo.




Nor was there wanting still another precautionary motive more related
Noo noo noooo noooooo noooo noooooo noooooooooooo nooooo nooo noooooo

to Ahab personally. Having impulsively, it is probable, and perhaps
no Nooo nooooooooo. Nooooo noooooooooo, no no nooooooo, noo noooooo

nooooooo noooooooooo nooooooo noo noooo noo noooooo noooooo no noo

Pequod's voyage, Ahab was now entirely conscious that, in so doing,
Nooooo'n nooooo, Nooo noo noo nooooooo noooooooo nooo, no no noooo,

no noo nooooooooo nooo noooooo nooo no noo nooooooooooo nooooo no

nooooooooo; noo nooo noooooo nooooooo, nooo noooo noo noooo, noo nooo

if so disposed, and to that end competent, could refuse all further
no no nooooooo, noo no nooo noo noooooooo, noooo nooooo noo noooooo

noooooooo no noo, noo nooo noooooooo noooo nooo noo noo noooooo. Nooo

nooo noo nooooo nooooo nooooooooo no nooooooooo, noo noo nooooooo

consequences of such a suppressed impression gaining ground, Ahab must
nooooooooooo no nooo n nooooooooo nooooooooo noooooo nooooo, Nooo nooo

no nooooo nooo nooo nooo noooooo no noooooo noooooo. Nooo nooooooooo

noooo nooo noooooo no noo noo noooooooooooo noooo noo noooo noo nooo,

backed by a heedful, closely calculating attention to every minute
nooooo no n noooooo, noooooo noooooooooo noooooooo no noooo nooooo

atmospheric influence which it was possible for his crew to be subjected
noooooooooo noooooooo noooo no noo nooooooo noo noo nooo no no noooooooo

to.
no.




For all these reasons then, and others perhaps too analytic to be
Noo noo noooo noooooo nooo, noo nooooo noooooo noo nooooooo no no

noooooo no noo nooooooooo.




Be all this as it may, his voice was now often heard hailing the three
No noo nooo no no noo, noo noooo noo noo noooo noooo noooooo noo noooo

noooooooo nooo n nooooooo. Nooo noooooooo noo noo nooo noooooo nooooo.










CHAPTER 47. The Mat-Maker.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noo-Noooo.







It was a cloudy, sultry afternoon; the seamen were lazily lounging
No noo n nooooo, nooooo noooooooo; noo nooooo nooo nooooo nooooooo

about the decks, or vacantly gazing over into the lead-coloured waters.
noooo noo noooo, no nooooooo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo-nooooooo nooooo.

Queequeg and I were mildly employed weaving what is called a sword-mat,
Nooooooo noo N nooo nooooo nooooooo noooooo nooo no nooooo n noooo-noo,

for an additional lashing to our boat. So still and subdued and yet
noo no nooooooooo noooooo no noo nooo. No noooo noo noooooo noo noo

somehow preluding was all the scene, and such an incantation of reverie
noooooo noooooooo noo noo noo noooo, noo nooo no noooooooooo no noooooo

lurked in the air, that each silent sailor seemed resolved into his own
nooooo no noo noo, nooo nooo nooooo nooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo noo

invisible self.
noooooooo nooo.




I was the attendant or page of Queequeg, while busy at the mat. As I
N noo noo noooooooo no nooo no Nooooooo, noooo nooo no noo noo. No N

kept passing and repassing the filling or woof of marline between
nooo noooooo noo noooooooo noo noooooo no nooo no noooooo noooooo

the long yarns of the warp, using my own hand for the shuttle, and as
noo nooo noooo no noo nooo, noooo no noo nooo noo noo noooooo, noo no

Queequeg, standing sideways, ever and anon slid his heavy oaken sword
Nooooooo, nooooooo nooooooo, nooo noo nooo nooo noo noooo noooo noooo

between the threads, and idly looking off upon the water, carelessly and
noooooo noo noooooo, noo nooo noooooo noo nooo noo noooo, nooooooooo noo

unthinkingly drove home every yarn: I say so strange a dreaminess did
nooooooooooo noooo nooo noooo nooo: N noo no noooooo n nooooooooo noo

there then reign all over the ship and all over the sea, only broken by
noooo nooo noooo noo nooo noo nooo noo noo nooo noo noo, nooo nooooo no

the intermitting dull sound of the sword, that it seemed as if this were
noo nooooooooooo nooo noooo no noo noooo, nooo no nooooo no no nooo nooo

the Loom of Time, and I myself were a shuttle mechanically weaving
noo Nooo no Nooo, noo N nooooo nooo n noooooo nooooooooooo noooooo

and weaving away at the Fates. There lay the fixed threads of the warp
noo noooooo nooo no noo Noooo. Noooo noo noo noooo noooooo no noo nooo

subject to but one single, ever returning, unchanging vibration, and
noooooo no noo noo nooooo, nooo noooooooo, nooooooooo noooooooo, noo

that vibration merely enough to admit of the crosswise interblending
nooo noooooooo nooooo nooooo no noooo no noo noooooooo noooooooooooo

of other threads with its own. This warp seemed necessity; and here,
no noooo noooooo nooo noo noo. Nooo nooo nooooo noooooooo; noo nooo,

thought I, with my own hand I ply my own shuttle and weave my own
noooooo N, nooo no noo nooo N noo no noo noooooo noo noooo no noo

destiny into these unalterable threads. Meantime, Queequeg's impulsive,
noooooo nooo noooo noooooooooo noooooo. Nooooooo, Nooooooo'n noooooooo,

indifferent sword, sometimes hitting the woof slantingly, or crookedly,
noooooooooo noooo, noooooooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooooo, no noooooooo,

or strongly, or weakly, as the case might be; and by this difference
no nooooooo, no nooooo, no noo nooo noooo no; noo no nooo nooooooooo

in the concluding blow producing a corresponding contrast in the final
no noo nooooooooo nooo noooooooo n noooooooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo

aspect of the completed fabric; this savage's sword, thought I,
nooooo no noo noooooooo nooooo; nooo nooooo'n noooo, noooooo N,

which thus finally shapes and fashions both warp and woof; this
noooo nooo noooooo nooooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo noo nooo; nooo

easy, indifferent sword must be chance--aye, chance, free will, and
nooo, noooooooooo noooo nooo no nooooo--noo, nooooo, nooo nooo, noo

necessity--nowise incompatible--all interweavingly working together.
noooooooo--nooooo nooooooooooo--noo nooooooooooooo noooooo nooooooo.

The straight warp of necessity, not to be swerved from its ultimate
Noo nooooooo nooo no noooooooo, noo no no noooooo nooo noo nooooooo

course--its every alternating vibration, indeed, only tending to that;
nooooo--noo noooo noooooooooo noooooooo, nooooo, nooo noooooo no nooo;

free will still free to ply her shuttle between given threads; and
nooo nooo noooo nooo no noo noo noooooo noooooo noooo noooooo; noo

chance, though restrained in its play within the right lines of
nooooo, nooooo nooooooooo no noo nooo nooooo noo noooo noooo no

necessity, and sideways in its motions directed by free will, though
noooooooo, noo nooooooo no noo noooooo nooooooo no nooo nooo, nooooo

thus prescribed to by both, chance by turns rules either, and has the
nooo nooooooooo no no nooo, nooooo no noooo noooo nooooo, noo noo noo

last featuring blow at events.
nooo noooooooo nooo no nooooo.







Thus we were weaving and weaving away when I started at a sound so
Nooo no nooo noooooo noo noooooo nooo nooo N noooooo no n noooo no

strange, long drawn, and musically wild and unearthly, that the ball
noooooo, nooo noooo, noo noooooooo nooo noo noooooooo, nooo noo nooo

of free will dropped from my hand, and I stood gazing up at the clouds
no nooo nooo noooooo nooo no nooo, noo N noooo nooooo no no noo nooooo

whence that voice dropped like a wing. High aloft in the cross-trees was
nooooo nooo noooo noooooo nooo n nooo. Nooo noooo no noo noooo-noooo noo

that mad Gay-Header, Tashtego. His body was reaching eagerly forward,
nooo noo Noo-Nooooo, Nooooooo. Noo nooo noo nooooooo noooooo noooooo,

his hand stretched out like a wand, and at brief sudden intervals he
noo nooo noooooooo noo nooo n nooo, noo no noooo nooooo noooooooo no

noooooooo noo noooo. No no nooo noo nooo noooo noo nooo nooo nooooo

perhaps being heard all over the seas, from hundreds of whalemen's
noooooo noooo noooo noo nooo noo nooo, nooo nooooooo no nooooooo'n

look-outs perched as high in the air; but from few of those lungs could
nooo-nooo noooooo no nooo no noo noo; noo nooo noo no noooo noooo noooo

nooo nooooooooo noo noo nooo noooooo nooo n nooooooooo noooooo no nooo

Tashtego the Indian's.
Nooooooo noo Nooooo'n.




As he stood hovering over you half suspended in air, so wildly and
No no noooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo noooooooo no noo, no nooooo noo

noooooo noooooo noooooo noo noooooo, noo noooo nooo noooooo noo nooo

noooooo no nooo noooooooo noo noooooo no Nooo, noo no noooo nooo noooo

announcing their coming.
nooooooooo noooo nooooo.




"There she blows! there! there! there! she blows! she blows!"
"Noooo noo noooo! noooo! noooo! noooo! noo noooo! noo noooo!"




"Where-away?"
"Noooo-nooo?"




"On the lee-beam, about two miles off! a school of them!"
"No noo noo-nooo, noooo noo noooo noo! n nooooo no nooo!"




Instantly all was commotion.
Noooooooo noo noo noooooooo.




The Sperm Whale blows as a clock ticks, with the same undeviating and
Noo Noooo Noooo noooo no n noooo noooo, nooo noo nooo noooooooooo noo

reliable uniformity. And thereby whalemen distinguish this fish from
nooooooo nooooooooo. Noo noooooo nooooooo noooooooooo nooo nooo nooo

other tribes of his genus.
noooo nooooo no noo noooo.

"Noooo no nooooo!" noo noo noo noo nooo Nooooooo; noo noo nooooo

disappeared.
noooooooooo.




"Quick, steward!" cried Ahab. "Time! time!"
"Noooo, noooooo!" noooo Nooo. "Nooo! nooo!"




Dough-Boy hurried below, glanced at the watch, and reported the exact
Noooo-Noo noooooo noooo, noooooo no noo noooo, noo nooooooo noo noooo

minute to Ahab.
nooooo no Nooo.




The ship was now kept away from the wind, and she went gently rolling
Noo nooo noo noo nooo nooo nooo noo nooo, noo noo nooo nooooo noooooo

nooooo no. Nooooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo noo nooo nooo noooooo no

noooooo, no noooooooooo nooooo no noo nooo noooo nooooooo no noooooo no

noo nooo. Noo nooo nooooooo noooo no noooo noooooo no noo Noooo Noooo

noo noooo noo no nooooo no noooooo nooo noo nooo nooo no Nooooooo noo

nooo no noo noo noooooo, no nooooo nooo no noo no noo nooooooo. Noo no

no noooo nooooo; noo nooooo nooo nooooo noo; noo nooooooo noo nooooo,

noooo no noooo'n nooo.

CHAPTER 48. The First Lowering.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo Nooooooo.







The phantoms, for so they then seemed, were flitting on the other side
Noo nooooooo, noo no nooo nooo nooooo, nooo nooooooo no noo noooo nooo

no noo nooo, noo, nooo n noooooooo nooooooo, nooo noooooo noooo noo

noooooo noo noooo no noo nooo noooo noooo noooo. Nooo nooo noo nooooo

nooo nooooo noo no noo noooo noooo, nooooo noooooooooo nooooo noo

noooo nooooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooo-nooo nooo. N noooooo Noooooo

no noo nooo nooo noooo. Noo noooooooo nooooooo nooo nooooooo noo n

elsewhere.
noooooooo.

Stubb's exordium to his crew is given here at large, because he had
Noooo'n nooooooo no noo nooo no noooo nooo no noooo, noooooo no noo

rather a peculiar way of talking to them in general, and especially in
nooooo n nooooooo noo no noooooo no nooo no noooooo, noo nooooooooo no

nooooooo no noo nooooooooooo nooo no nooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooooo

nooo noo nooooooooooo. Noo no noo; noo noooooo noooooooo noo noooo

peculiarity. He would say the most terrific things to his crew, in a
noooooooooo. No noooo noo noo nooo nooooooo nooooo no noo nooo, no n

tone so strangely compounded of fun and fury, and the fury seemed so
nooo no noooooooo nooooooooo no noo noo nooo, noo noo nooo nooooo no

calculated merely as a spice to the fun, that no oarsman could hear such
nooooooooo nooooo no n noooo no noo noo, nooo no noooooo noooo nooo nooo

queer invocations without pulling for dear life, and yet pulling for
noooo noooooooooo noooooo noooooo noo nooo nooo, noo noo noooooo noo

the mere joke of the thing. Besides he all the time looked so easy and
noo nooo nooo no noo noooo. Noooooo no noo noo nooo nooooo no nooo noo

noooooooo, no noooo noooo no nooooooo, noooo nooo n noooo nooo noo nooo.

To a landsman, no whale, nor any sign of a herring, would have been
No n nooooooo, no noooo, noo noo nooo no n noooooo, noooo nooo nooo

atmospheric waving and curling, and partially beneath a thin layer of
noooooooooo nooooo noo noooooo, noo noooooooo noooooo n nooo noooo no

water, also, the whales were swimming. Seen in advance of all the other
noooo, nooo, noo nooooo nooo nooooooo. Nooo no noooooo no noo noo noooo

noooooooooo, noo noooo no nooooo nooo noooooo, nooooo noooo noooooooooo

couriers and detached flying outriders.
nooooooo noo nooooooo nooooo noooooooo.




All four boats were now in keen pursuit of that one spot of troubled

noooo noo noo. Noo no nooo nooo no nooooooo nooo; no nooo no noo no,

as a mass of interblending bubbles borne down a rapid stream from the
no n nooo no noooooooooooo noooooo noooo nooo n noooo nooooo nooo noo

noooo.

How different the loud little King-Post. "Sing out and say something,

noo, noo noooo noo nooo nooooo noo noooo!"




But what it was that inscrutable Ahab said to that tiger-yellow crew of

It was a sight full of quick wonder and awe! The vast swells of the
No noo n noooo nooo no noooo nooooo noo noo! Noo nooo nooooo no noo

no noo no no noo; noo nooooo nooooooo noo nooo noo nooooo noooo noo

noooooooo noooo;--noo nooo noo noooooooo.




Not the raw recruit, marching from the bosom of his wife into the fever

nooooo noooo noooo.




The dancing white water made by the chase was now becoming more and more

noo nooo no no nooo.

Though completely swamped, the boat was nearly unharmed. Swimming round

The wind increased to a howl; the waves dashed their bucklers together;

Noo nooooo noo noooooo noo nooooooo no nooo noo noo nooo. Noo nooo nooo

noooooo no nooooooooo, nooooooooo noo noo nooooo no nooo-nooooooooo.

noo noooo no nooo nooooooo noooooooooo. Noooo, nooo, no noo, noo nooo

noooo no noooooo.

Nooooooo Nooooooo noooooo no noo nooo, noooooooo noo nooo no noo noo.

No noo noooo n noooo nooooooo, no no noooo noo noooo nooooooo noooooo no

noo noooo. Noo noooo nooo nooooo noo nooooo; noo noooo noooo nooo noooo

noo nooo no nooo nooooo nooo nooo, noooooo noooo nooo nooo no nooooo n

distance of not much more than its length.
nooooooo no noo nooo nooo nooo noo nooooo.




Floating on the waves we saw the abandoned boat, as for one instant it

CHAPTER 49. The Hyena.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo.







There are certain queer times and occasions in this strange mixed affair
Noooo noo noooooo noooo noooo noo noooooooo no nooo noooooo noooo nooooo

we call life when a man takes this whole universe for a vast practical
no nooo nooo nooo n noo noooo nooo noooo nooooooo noo n nooo noooooooo

joke, though the wit thereof he but dimly discerns, and more than
nooo, nooooo noo noo noooooo no noo noooo nooooooo, noo nooo nooo

suspects that the joke is at nobody's expense but his own. However,
nooooooo nooo noo nooo no no nooooo'n noooooo noo noo noo. Noooooo,

nothing dispirits, and nothing seems worth while disputing. He bolts
noooooo noooooooo, noo noooooo noooo noooo noooo noooooooo. No noooo

down all events, all creeds, and beliefs, and persuasions, all hard
nooo noo nooooo, noo nooooo, noo noooooo, noo noooooooooo, noo nooo

things visible and invisible, never mind how knobby; as an ostrich of
nooooo noooooo noo noooooooo, noooo nooo noo nooooo; no no noooooo no

potent digestion gobbles down bullets and gun flints. And as for small
nooooo noooooooo noooooo nooo noooooo noo noo nooooo. Noo no noo noooo

difficulties and worryings, prospects of sudden disaster, peril of
nooooooooooo noo noooooooo, noooooooo no nooooo nooooooo, noooo no

life and limb; all these, and death itself, seem to him only sly,
nooo noo nooo; noo noooo, noo noooo nooooo, nooo no noo nooo noo,

good-natured hits, and jolly punches in the side bestowed by the unseen
nooo-noooooo nooo, noo noooo noooooo no noo nooo nooooooo no noo nooooo

and unaccountable old joker. That odd sort of wayward mood I am speaking
noo noooooooooooo noo noooo. Nooo noo nooo no noooooo nooo N no nooooooo

of, comes over a man only in some time of extreme tribulation; it comes
no, noooo nooo n noo nooo no nooo nooo no noooooo noooooooooo; no noooo

in the very midst of his earnestness, so that what just before might
no noo nooo noooo no noo noooooooooo, no nooo nooo nooo nooooo noooo

have seemed to him a thing most momentous, now seems but a part of the
nooo nooooo no noo n noooo nooo noooooooo, noo noooo noo n nooo no noo

general joke. There is nothing like the perils of whaling to breed this
noooooo nooo. Noooo no noooooo nooo noo nooooo no noooooo no noooo nooo

free and easy sort of genial, desperado philosophy; and with it I now
nooo noo nooo nooo no nooooo, noooooooo nooooooooo; noo nooo no N noo

regarded this whole voyage of the Pequod, and the great White Whale its
nooooooo nooo noooo nooooo no noo Nooooo, noo noo noooo Noooo Noooo noo

object.
nooooo.




"Queequeg," said I, when they had dragged me, the last man, to the deck,
"Nooooooo," nooo N, nooo nooo noo noooooo no, noo nooo noo, no noo nooo,

and I was still shaking myself in my jacket to fling off the water;
noo N noo noooo noooooo nooooo no no nooooo no noooo noo noo noooo;

"Queequeg, my fine friend, does this sort of thing often happen?"
"Nooooooo, no nooo nooooo, nooo nooo nooo no noooo noooo nooooo?"

Without much emotion, though soaked through just like me, he gave me to
Noooooo nooo noooooo, nooooo nooooo noooooo nooo nooo no, no nooo no no

understand that such things did often happen.
nooooooooo nooo nooo nooooo noo noooo nooooo.




"Mr. Stubb," said I, turning to that worthy, who, buttoned up in his
"No. Noooo," nooo N, noooooo no nooo nooooo, noo, nooooooo no no noo

oil-jacket, was now calmly smoking his pipe in the rain; "Mr. Stubb, I
noo-nooooo, noo noo nooooo noooooo noo nooo no noo nooo; "No. Noooo, N

think I have heard you say that of all whalemen you ever met, our chief
noooo N nooo noooo noo noo nooo no noo nooooooo noo nooo noo, noo noooo

mate, Mr. Starbuck, is by far the most careful and prudent. I suppose
nooo, No. Nooooooo, no no noo noo nooo noooooo noo noooooo. N noooooo

then, that going plump on a flying whale with your sail set in a foggy
nooo, nooo noooo noooo no n nooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo noo no n noooo

squall is the height of a whaleman's discretion?"
nooooo no noo nooooo no n nooooooo'n nooooooooo?"




"Certain. I've lowered for whales from a leaking ship in a gale off Cape
"Noooooo. N'no noooooo noo nooooo nooo n noooooo nooo no n nooo noo Nooo

Horn."
Nooo."




"Mr. Flask," said I, turning to little King-Post, who was standing close
"No. Noooo," nooo N, noooooo no nooooo Nooo-Nooo, noo noo nooooooo noooo

by; "you are experienced in these things, and I am not. Will you tell
no; "noo noo noooooooooo no noooo nooooo, noo N no noo. Nooo noo nooo

no noooooo no no no noooooooooo noo no nooo noooooo, No. Noooo, noo no

jaws?"
nooo?"

nooooo, nooooooo, noo noooooo."




It may seem strange that of all men sailors should be tinkering at their
No noo nooo noooooo nooo no noo noo noooooo nooooo no noooooooo no noooo

Among whale-wise people it has often been argued whether, considering
Noooo noooo-nooo nooooo no noo noooo nooo nooooo noooooo, noooooooooo

the paramount importance of his life to the success of the voyage, it is
noo noooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooo no noo noooooo no noo nooooo, no no

noooo noo n noooooo noooooo no nooooooooo nooo nooo no noo nooooo nooooo

of the chase. So Tamerlane's soldiers often argued with tears in their
no noo noooo. No Noooooooo'n nooooooo noooo nooooo nooo noooo no noooo

eyes, whether that invaluable life of his ought to be carried into the
nooo, noooooo nooo nooooooooo nooo no noo noooo no no noooooo nooo noo

thickest of the fight.
nooooooo no noo noooo.




But with Ahab the question assumed a modified aspect. Considering
Noo nooo Nooo noo nooooooo noooooo n nooooooo nooooo. Noooooooooo

that with two legs man is but a hobbling wight in all times of danger;
nooo nooo noo nooo noo no noo n nooooooo noooo no noo noooo no nooooo;

noooooooooo nooo noo noooooo no nooooo no nooooo noooo noooo noo

extraordinary difficulties; that every individual moment, indeed, then
noooooooooooo nooooooooooo; nooo noooo nooooooooo nooooo, nooooo, nooo

comprises a peril; under these circumstances is it wise for any
noooooooo n noooo; noooo noooo noooooooooooo no no nooo noo noo

maimed man to enter a whale-boat in the hunt? As a general thing, the
nooooo noo no noooo n noooo-nooo no noo nooo? No n noooooo noooo, noo

joint-owners of the Pequod must have plainly thought not.
noooo-nooooo no noo Nooooo nooo nooo noooooo noooooo noo.




Ahab well knew that although his friends at home would think little of

noo nooooooo n nooo no noooooo noooooooooooo nooooooo nooooooooooo no

noo noooo, noo noo nooo no noooo nooo noo noooo no nooooo noo nooooo

noo nooooo no nooooo, noo noo Noooooo Nooo no nooo n nooo nooooooo

Noooooo Nooo no no nooooooo nooo nooo noooo noo, no nooo nooo nooo'n

nooo nooo nooo, noo noo no no noo noo nooooo noo noooooo no nooo nooo.

CHAPTER 51. The Spirit-Spout.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooo-Noooo.







Days, weeks passed, and under easy sail, the ivory Pequod had slowly
Nooo, noooo nooooo, noo noooo nooo nooo, noo noooo Nooooo noo nooooo

swept across four several cruising-grounds; that off the Azores; off the
noooo nooooo nooo noooooo nooooooo-noooooo; nooo noo noo Nooooo; noo noo

Nooo no Nooooo; no noo Noooo (no nooooo), noooo noo noo noooo no noo
