CHAPTER 55. Of the Monstrous Pictures of Whales.
NOOOOOO no. No noo Noooooooo Nooooooo no Nooooo.







I shall ere long paint to you as well as one can without canvas,
N noooo noo nooo noooo no noo no nooo no noo noo noooooo nooooo,

something like the true form of the whale as he actually appears to the
noooooooo nooo noo nooo nooo no noo noooo no no nooooooo noooooo no noo

eye of the whaleman when in his own absolute body the whale is moored
noo no noo nooooooo nooo no noo noo nooooooo nooo noo noooo no nooooo

alongside the whale-ship so that he can be fairly stepped upon there.
noooooooo noo noooo-nooo no nooo no noo no nooooo noooooo nooo noooo.

It may be worth while, therefore, previously to advert to those
No noo no noooo noooo, noooooooo, nooooooooo no nooooo no noooo

curious imaginary portraits of him which even down to the present day
noooooo noooooooo noooooooo no noo noooo nooo nooo no noo noooooo noo

confidently challenge the faith of the landsman. It is time to set the
noooooooooo noooooooo noo noooo no noo nooooooo. No no nooo no noo noo

world right in this matter, by proving such pictures of the whale all
noooo noooo no nooo nooooo, no noooooo nooo nooooooo no noo noooo noo

wrong.
noooo.




It may be that the primal source of all those pictorial delusions will
No noo no nooo noo nooooo nooooo no noo noooo noooooooo noooooooo nooo

be found among the oldest Hindoo, Egyptian, and Grecian sculptures. For
no noooo noooo noo nooooo Nooooo, Nooooooo, noo Noooooo nooooooooo. Noo

ever since those inventive but unscrupulous times when on the marble
nooo noooo noooo noooooooo noo nooooooooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooo

panellings of temples, the pedestals of statues, and on shields,
nooooooooo no noooooo, noo noooooooo no noooooo, noo no noooooo,

medallions, cups, and coins, the dolphin was drawn in scales of
nooooooooo, nooo, noo noooo, noo noooooo noo noooo no nooooo no

chain-armor like Saladin's, and a helmeted head like St. George's; ever
noooo-noooo nooo Noooooo'n, noo n nooooooo nooo nooo No. Nooooo'n; nooo

since then has something of the same sort of license prevailed, not
noooo nooo noo noooooooo no noo nooo nooo no noooooo noooooooo, noo

only in most popular pictures of the whale, but in many scientific
nooo no nooo noooooo nooooooo no noo noooo, noo no nooo nooooooooo

presentations of him.
noooooooooooo no noo.




Now, by all odds, the most ancient extant portrait anyways purporting to
Noo, no noo nooo, noo nooo noooooo nooooo nooooooo noooooo nooooooooo no

be the whale's, is to be found in the famous cavern-pagoda of Elephanta,
no noo noooo'n, no no no noooo no noo nooooo nooooo-nooooo no Noooooooo,

in India. The Brahmins maintain that in the almost endless sculptures of
no Noooo. Noo Nooooooo nooooooo nooo no noo nooooo noooooo nooooooooo no

that immemorial pagoda, all the trades and pursuits, every conceivable
nooo nooooooooo nooooo, noo noo nooooo noo nooooooo, noooo noooooooooo

avocation of man, were prefigured ages before any of them actually came
noooooooo no noo, nooo nooooooooo nooo nooooo noo no nooo nooooooo nooo

into being. No wonder then, that in some sort our noble profession of
nooo noooo. No nooooo nooo, nooo no nooo nooo noo noooo nooooooooo no

whaling should have been there shadowed forth. The Hindoo whale
noooooo nooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo noooo. Noo Nooooo noooo

referred to, occurs in a separate department of the wall, depicting the
nooooooo no, nooooo no n nooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooo, noooooooo noo

incarnation of Vishnu in the form of leviathan, learnedly known as the
noooooooooo no Nooooo no noo nooo no noooooooo, noooooooo noooo no noo

Matse Avatar. But though this sculpture is half man and half whale, so
Noooo Nooooo. Noo nooooo nooo noooooooo no nooo noo noo nooo noooo, no

as only to give the tail of the latter, yet that small section of him is
no nooo no nooo noo nooo no noo nooooo, noo nooo noooo noooooo no noo no

all wrong. It looks more like the tapering tail of an anaconda, than the
noo noooo. No noooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo no no nooooooo, nooo noo

broad palms of the true whale's majestic flukes.
noooo noooo no noo nooo noooo'n nooooooo nooooo.




But go to the old Galleries, and look now at a great Christian painter's
Noo no no noo noo Noooooooo, noo nooo noo no n noooo Noooooooo noooooo'n

portrait of this fish; for he succeeds no better than the antediluvian
nooooooo no nooo nooo; noo no nooooooo no nooooo nooo noo nooooooooooo

Hindoo. It is Guido's picture of Perseus rescuing Andromeda from the
Nooooo. No no Noooo'n noooooo no Noooooo nooooooo Noooooooo nooo noo

sea-monster or whale. Where did Guido get the model of such a strange
noo-noooooo no noooo. Noooo noo Noooo noo noo noooo no nooo n noooooo

creature as that? Nor does Hogarth, in painting the same scene in his
nooooooo no nooo? Noo nooo Noooooo, no nooooooo noo nooo noooo no noo

own "Perseus Descending," make out one whit better. The huge corpulence
noo "Noooooo Nooooooooo," nooo noo noo nooo nooooo. Noo nooo nooooooooo

of that Hogarthian monster undulates on the surface, scarcely drawing
no nooo Nooooooooo noooooo noooooooo no noo noooooo, nooooooo noooooo

one inch of water. It has a sort of howdah on its back, and its
noo nooo no noooo. No noo n nooo no nooooo no noo nooo, noo noo

distended tusked mouth into which the billows are rolling, might be
noooooooo nooooo noooo nooo noooo noo noooooo noo noooooo, noooo no

taken for the Traitors' Gate leading from the Thames by water into the
noooo noo noo Nooooooo' Nooo noooooo nooo noo Nooooo no noooo nooo noo

Tower. Then, there are the Prodromus whales of old Scotch Sibbald, and
Noooo. Nooo, noooo noo noo Noooooooo nooooo no noo Nooooo Noooooo, noo

Jonah's whale, as depicted in the prints of old Bibles and the cuts of
Noooo'n noooo, no nooooooo no noo nooooo no noo Nooooo noo noo nooo no

old primers. What shall be said of these? As for the book-binder's whale
noo noooooo. Nooo noooo no nooo no noooo? No noo noo nooo-nooooo'n noooo

winding like a vine-stalk round the stock of a descending anchor--as
noooooo nooo n nooo-noooo noooo noo noooo no n nooooooooo nooooo--no

stamped and gilded on the backs and title-pages of many books both
noooooo noo nooooo no noo noooo noo noooo-noooo no nooo noooo nooo

old and new--that is a very picturesque but purely fabulous creature,
noo noo noo--nooo no n nooo noooooooooo noo nooooo nooooooo nooooooo,

imitated, I take it, from the like figures on antique vases.
nooooooo, N nooo no, nooo noo nooo noooooo no noooooo noooo.

Though universally denominated a dolphin, I nevertheless call this
Nooooo noooooooooo noooooooooo n noooooo, N nooooooooooo nooo nooo

book-binder's fish an attempt at a whale; because it was so intended
nooo-nooooo'n nooo no noooooo no n noooo; noooooo no noo no nooooooo

when the device was first introduced. It was introduced by an old
nooo noo nooooo noo noooo nooooooooo. No noo nooooooooo no no noo

Italian publisher somewhere about the 15th century, during the Revival
Noooooo noooooooo noooooooo noooo noo nooo noooooo, nooooo noo Noooooo

of Learning; and in those days, and even down to a comparatively
no Nooooooo; noo no noooo nooo, noo nooo nooo no n noooooooooooo

late period, dolphins were popularly supposed to be a species of the
nooo nooooo, nooooooo nooo noooooooo nooooooo no no n noooooo no noo

Leviathan.
Noooooooo.




In the vignettes and other embellishments of some ancient books you will
No noo noooooooo noo noooo nooooooooooooo no nooo noooooo noooo noo nooo

at times meet with very curious touches at the whale, where all manner
no noooo nooo nooo nooo noooooo noooooo no noo noooo, noooo noo nooooo

of spouts, jets d'eau, hot springs and cold, Saratoga and Baden-Baden,
no nooooo, nooo n'noo, noo noooooo noo nooo, Nooooooo noo Noooo-Noooo,

come bubbling up from his unexhausted brain. In the title-page of the
nooo nooooooo no nooo noo noooooooooo noooo. No noo noooo-nooo no noo

original edition of the "Advancement of Learning" you will find some
nooooooo noooooo no noo "Noooooooooo no Nooooooo" noo nooo nooo nooo

curious whales.
noooooo nooooo.




But quitting all these unprofessional attempts, let us glance at those
Noo nooooooo noo noooo nooooooooooooo nooooooo, noo no nooooo no noooo

pictures of leviathan purporting to be sober, scientific delineations,
nooooooo no noooooooo nooooooooo no no noooo, nooooooooo nooooooooooo,

by those who know. In old Harris's collection of voyages there are some
no noooo noo nooo. No noo Nooooo'n nooooooooo no noooooo noooo noo nooo

plates of whales extracted from a Dutch book of voyages, A.D. 1671,
nooooo no nooooo noooooooo nooo n Noooo nooo no noooooo, N.N. nooo,

entitled "A Whaling Voyage to Spitzbergen in the ship Jonas in the
nooooooo "N Noooooo Nooooo no Noooooooooo no noo nooo Noooo no noo

Whale, Peter Peterson of Friesland, master." In one of those plates the
Noooo, Noooo Nooooooo no Noooooooo, nooooo." No noo no noooo nooooo noo

whales, like great rafts of logs, are represented lying among ice-isles,
nooooo, nooo noooo noooo no nooo, noo noooooooooo noooo noooo noo-noooo,

with white bears running over their living backs. In another plate, the
nooo noooo noooo noooooo nooo noooo nooooo noooo. No noooooo noooo, noo

prodigious blunder is made of representing the whale with perpendicular
nooooooooo noooooo no nooo no nooooooooooo noo noooo nooo noooooooooooo

flukes.
nooooo.




Then again, there is an imposing quarto, written by one Captain Colnett,
Nooo noooo, noooo no no nooooooo nooooo, noooooo no noo Noooooo Noooooo,

a Post Captain in the English navy, entitled "A Voyage round Cape Horn
n Nooo Noooooo no noo Noooooo nooo, nooooooo "N Nooooo noooo Nooo Nooo

into the South Seas, for the purpose of extending the Spermaceti Whale
nooo noo Noooo Nooo, noo noo noooooo no noooooooo noo Nooooooooo Noooo

Fisheries." In this book is an outline purporting to be a "Picture of
Noooooooo." No nooo nooo no no noooooo nooooooooo no no n "Noooooo no

a Physeter or Spermaceti whale, drawn by scale from one killed on the
n Nooooooo no Nooooooooo noooo, noooo no noooo nooo noo nooooo no noo

coast of Mexico, August, 1793, and hoisted on deck." I doubt not the
noooo no Nooooo, Nooooo, nooo, noo noooooo no nooo." N noooo noo noo

captain had this veracious picture taken for the benefit of his marines.
noooooo noo nooo noooooooo noooooo noooo noo noo noooooo no noo noooooo.

To mention but one thing about it, let me say that it has an eye which
No noooooo noo noo noooo noooo no, noo no noo nooo no noo no noo noooo

applied, according to the accompanying scale, to a full grown sperm
noooooo, noooooooo no noo nooooooooooo noooo, no n nooo noooo noooo

whale, would make the eye of that whale a bow-window some five feet
noooo, noooo nooo noo noo no nooo noooo n noo-nooooo nooo nooo nooo

long. Ah, my gallant captain, why did ye not give us Jonah looking out
nooo. No, no noooooo noooooo, noo noo no noo nooo no Noooo noooooo noo

of that eye!
no nooo noo!




Nor are the most conscientious compilations of Natural History for
Noo noo noo nooo noooooooooooo nooooooooooo no Noooooo Noooooo noo

the benefit of the young and tender, free from the same heinousness of
noo noooooo no noo noooo noo nooooo, nooo nooo noo nooo noooooooooo no

mistake. Look at that popular work "Goldsmith's Animated Nature." In the
noooooo. Nooo no nooo noooooo nooo "Noooooooo'n Nooooooo Nooooo." No noo

abridged London edition of 1807, there are plates of an alleged "whale"
nooooooo Nooooo noooooo no nooo, noooo noo nooooo no no noooooo "noooo"

and a "narwhale." I do not wish to seem inelegant, but this unsightly
noo n "nooooooo." N no noo nooo no nooo noooooooo, noo nooo noooooooo

whale looks much like an amputated sow; and, as for the narwhale, one
noooo noooo nooo nooo no noooooooo noo; noo, no noo noo nooooooo, noo

glimpse at it is enough to amaze one, that in this nineteenth century
noooooo no no no nooooo no noooo noo, nooo no nooo nooooooooo noooooo

such a hippogriff could be palmed for genuine upon any intelligent
nooo n nooooooooo noooo no nooooo noo noooooo nooo noo noooooooooo

public of schoolboys.
nooooo no nooooooooo.




Then, again, in 1825, Bernard Germain, Count de Lacepede, a great
Nooo, noooo, no nooo, Noooooo Noooooo, Noooo no Nooooooo, n noooo

naturalist, published a scientific systemized whale book, wherein are
nooooooooo, noooooooo n nooooooooo nooooooooo noooo nooo, noooooo noo

several pictures of the different species of the Leviathan. All these
noooooo nooooooo no noo noooooooo noooooo no noo Noooooooo. Noo noooo

are not only incorrect, but the picture of the Mysticetus or Greenland
noo noo nooo noooooooo, noo noo noooooo no noo Nooooooooo no Noooooooo

whale (that is to say, the Right whale), even Scoresby, a long
noooo (nooo no no noo, noo Noooo noooo), nooo Nooooooo, n nooo

experienced man as touching that species, declares not to have its
noooooooooo noo no nooooooo nooo noooooo, nooooooo noo no nooo noo

counterpart in nature.
noooooooooo no nooooo.




But the placing of the cap-sheaf to all this blundering business was
Noo noo noooooo no noo noo-noooo no noo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noo

reserved for the scientific Frederick Cuvier, brother to the famous
nooooooo noo noo nooooooooo Noooooooo Nooooo, noooooo no noo nooooo

Baron. In 1836, he published a Natural History of Whales, in which he
Noooo. No nooo, no noooooooo n Noooooo Noooooo no Nooooo, no noooo no

gives what he calls a picture of the Sperm Whale. Before showing that
noooo nooo no noooo n noooooo no noo Noooo Noooo. Nooooo noooooo nooo

picture to any Nantucketer, you had best provide for your summary
noooooo no noo Noooooooooo, noo noo nooo noooooo noo nooo noooooo

retreat from Nantucket. In a word, Frederick Cuvier's Sperm Whale is not
noooooo nooo Noooooooo. No n nooo, Noooooooo Nooooo'n Noooo Noooo no noo

a Sperm Whale, but a squash. Of course, he never had the benefit of
n Noooo Noooo, noo n nooooo. No nooooo, no noooo noo noo noooooo no

a whaling voyage (such men seldom have), but whence he derived that
n noooooo nooooo (nooo noo nooooo nooo), noo nooooo no noooooo nooo

picture, who can tell? Perhaps he got it as his scientific predecessor
noooooo, noo noo nooo? Noooooo no noo no no noo nooooooooo noooooooooo

in the same field, Desmarest, got one of his authentic abortions; that
no noo nooo noooo, Noooooooo, noo noo no noo noooooooo noooooooo; nooo

is, from a Chinese drawing. And what sort of lively lads with the pencil
no, nooo n Noooooo noooooo. Noo nooo nooo no nooooo nooo nooo noo nooooo

those Chinese are, many queer cups and saucers inform us.
noooo Noooooo noo, nooo noooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo no.




As for the sign-painters' whales seen in the streets hanging over the
No noo noo nooo-nooooooo' nooooo nooo no noo noooooo noooooo nooo noo

shops of oil-dealers, what shall be said of them? They are generally
noooo no noo-noooooo, nooo noooo no nooo no nooo? Nooo noo noooooooo

Richard III. whales, with dromedary humps, and very savage; breakfasting
Noooooo NOO. nooooo, nooo noooooooo noooo, noo nooo nooooo; nooooooooooo

no noooo no nooo nooooo noooo, nooo no nooooooooo nooo no nooooooo:

But these manifold mistakes in depicting the whale are not so very
Noo noooo nooooooo nooooooo no noooooooo noo noooo noo noo no nooo

surprising after all. Consider! Most of the scientific drawings have
nooooooooo noooo noo. Nooooooo! Nooo no noo nooooooooo nooooooo nooo

been taken from the stranded fish; and these are about as correct as a
nooo noooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo; noo noooo noo noooo no noooooo no n

drawing of a wrecked ship, with broken back, would correctly represent
noooooo no n noooooo nooo, nooo nooooo nooo, noooo noooooooo noooooooo

the noble animal itself in all its undashed pride of hull and spars.
noo noooo nooooo nooooo no noo noo nooooooo noooo no nooo noo noooo.

Though elephants have stood for their full-lengths, the living Leviathan
Nooooo noooooooo nooo noooo noo noooo nooo-noooooo, noo nooooo Noooooooo

has never yet fairly floated himself for his portrait. The living whale,
noo noooo noo nooooo noooooo noooooo noo noo nooooooo. Noo nooooo noooo,

in his full majesty and significance, is only to be seen at sea in
no noo nooo noooooo noo nooooooooooo, no nooo no no nooo no noo no

unfathomable waters; and afloat the vast bulk of him is out of sight,
nooooooooooo nooooo; noo nooooo noo nooo nooo no noo no noo no noooo,

like a launched line-of-battle ship; and out of that element it is a
nooo n nooooooo nooo-no-nooooo nooo; noo noo no nooo noooooo no no n

thing eternally impossible for mortal man to hoist him bodily into the
noooo noooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooo noo no noooo noo nooooo nooo noo

air, so as to preserve all his mighty swells and undulations. And, not
noo, no no no nooooooo noo noo nooooo nooooo noo noooooooooo. Noo, noo

to speak of the highly presumable difference of contour between a young
no noooo no noo nooooo nooooooooo nooooooooo no noooooo noooooo n noooo

sucking whale and a full-grown Platonian Leviathan; yet, even in the
noooooo noooo noo n nooo-noooo Noooooooo Noooooooo; noo, nooo no noo

case of one of those young sucking whales hoisted to a ship's deck, such
nooo no noo no noooo noooo noooooo nooooo noooooo no n nooo'n nooo, nooo

is then the outlandish, eel-like, limbered, varying shape of him, that
no nooo noo nooooooooo, noo-nooo, nooooooo, noooooo noooo no noo, nooo

his precise expression the devil himself could not catch.
noo noooooo nooooooooo noo noooo noooooo noooo noo noooo.




But it may be fancied, that from the naked skeleton of the stranded
Noo no noo no noooooo, nooo nooo noo noooo nooooooo no noo nooooooo

whale, accurate hints may be derived touching his true form. Not at all.
noooo, nooooooo noooo noo no noooooo nooooooo noo nooo nooo. Noo no noo.

For it is one of the more curious things about this Leviathan, that
Noo no no noo no noo nooo noooooo nooooo noooo nooo Noooooooo, nooo

his skeleton gives very little idea of his general shape. Though Jeremy
noo nooooooo noooo nooo nooooo nooo no noo noooooo noooo. Nooooo Nooooo

Bentham's skeleton, which hangs for candelabra in the library of one of
Noooooo'n nooooooo, noooo noooo noo nooooooooo no noo noooooo no noo no

his executors, correctly conveys the idea of a burly-browed utilitarian
noo noooooooo, noooooooo noooooo noo nooo no n noooo-nooooo noooooooooo

old gentleman, with all Jeremy's other leading personal characteristics;
noo noooooooo, nooo noo Nooooo'n noooo noooooo nooooooo noooooooooooooo;

yet nothing of this kind could be inferred from any leviathan's
noo noooooo no nooo nooo noooo no nooooooo nooo noo noooooooo'n

articulated bones. In fact, as the great Hunter says, the mere skeleton
noooooooooo noooo. No nooo, no noo noooo Nooooo nooo, noo nooo nooooooo

of the whale bears the same relation to the fully invested and padded
no noo noooo noooo noo nooo nooooooo no noo noooo nooooooo noo nooooo

animal as the insect does to the chrysalis that so roundingly envelopes
nooooo no noo nooooo nooo no noo noooooooo nooo no nooooooooo noooooooo

it. This peculiarity is strikingly evinced in the head, as in some
no. Nooo noooooooooo no nooooooooo noooooo no noo nooo, no no nooo

part of this book will be incidentally shown. It is also very curiously
nooo no nooo nooo nooo no nooooooooooo noooo. No no nooo nooo noooooooo

displayed in the side fin, the bones of which almost exactly answer to
noooooooo no noo nooo noo, noo noooo no noooo nooooo noooooo nooooo no

the bones of the human hand, minus only the thumb. This fin has four
noo noooo no noo noooo nooo, noooo nooo noo noooo. Nooo noo noo nooo

regular bone-fingers, the index, middle, ring, and little finger. But
noooooo nooo-noooooo, noo noooo, nooooo, nooo, noo nooooo nooooo. Noo

all these are permanently lodged in their fleshy covering, as the human
noo noooo noo noooooooooo nooooo no noooo nooooo nooooooo, no noo noooo

fingers in an artificial covering. "However recklessly the whale may
noooooo no no nooooooooo nooooooo. "Noooooo nooooooooo noo noooo noo

sometimes serve us," said humorous Stubb one day, "he can never be truly
noooooooo noooo no," nooo nooooooo Noooo noo noo, "no noo noooo no noooo

said to handle us without mittens."
nooo no nooooo no noooooo noooooo."




For all these reasons, then, any way you may look at it, you must needs
Noo noo noooo noooooo, nooo, noo noo noo noo nooo no no, noo nooo noooo

conclude that the great Leviathan is that one creature in the world
nooooooo nooo noo noooo Noooooooo no nooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo

which must remain unpainted to the last. True, one portrait may hit
noooo nooo nooooo noooooooo no noo nooo. Nooo, noo nooooooo noo noo

the mark much nearer than another, but none can hit it with any very
noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo noooooo, noo nooo noo noo no nooo noo nooo

considerable degree of exactness. So there is no earthly way of finding
nooooooooooo nooooo no noooooooo. No noooo no no noooooo noo no noooooo

out precisely what the whale really looks like. And the only mode in
noo noooooooo nooo noo noooo nooooo noooo nooo. Noo noo nooo nooo no

which you can derive even a tolerable idea of his living contour, is
noooo noo noo nooooo nooo n noooooooo nooo no noo nooooo noooooo, no

by going a whaling yourself; but by so doing, you run no small risk of
no noooo n noooooo nooooooo; noo no no noooo, noo noo no noooo nooo no

being eternally stove and sunk by him. Wherefore, it seems to me you had
noooo noooooooo noooo noo nooo no noo. Noooooooo, no noooo no no noo noo

best not be too fastidious in your curiosity touching this Leviathan.
nooo noo no noo nooooooooo no nooo noooooooo nooooooo nooo Noooooooo.










CHAPTER 56. Of the Less Erroneous Pictures of Whales, and the True
NOOOOOO no. No noo Nooo Noooooooo Nooooooo no Nooooo, noo noo Nooo

Pictures of Whaling Scenes.
Nooooooo no Noooooo Nooooo.







In connexion with the monstrous pictures of whales, I am strongly
No noooooooo nooo noo noooooooo nooooooo no nooooo, N no nooooooo

noooooo nooo no noooo nooo noooo noooo nooo noooooooo noooooo no

them which are to be found in certain books, both ancient and modern,
nooo noooo noo no no noooo no noooooo noooo, nooo noooooo noo nooooo,

especially in Pliny, Purchas, Hackluyt, Harris, Cuvier, etc. But I pass
nooooooooo no Noooo, Noooooo, Nooooooo, Nooooo, Nooooo, noo. Noo N nooo

that matter by.
nooo nooooo no.




I know of only four published outlines of the great Sperm Whale;
N nooo no nooo nooo noooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo Noooo Noooo;

Colnett's, Huggins's, Frederick Cuvier's, and Beale's. In the previous
Noooooo'n, Noooooo'n, Noooooooo Nooooo'n, noo Noooo'n. No noo nooooooo

chapter Colnett and Cuvier have been referred to. Huggins's is far
noooooo Noooooo noo Nooooo nooo nooo nooooooo no. Noooooo'n no noo

better than theirs; but, by great odds, Beale's is the best. All Beale's
nooooo nooo nooooo; noo, no noooo nooo, Noooo'n no noo nooo. Noo Noooo'n

drawings of this whale are good, excepting the middle figure in the
nooooooo no nooo noooo noo nooo, noooooooo noo nooooo nooooo no noo

picture of three whales in various attitudes, capping his second
noooooo no noooo nooooo no noooooo noooooooo, noooooo noo nooooo

noooooo. Noo nooooooooooo, noooo noooooooo Noooo Nooooo, nooooo no

doubt calculated to excite the civil scepticism of some parlor men, is
noooo nooooooooo no nooooo noo noooo nooooooooo no nooo nooooo noo, no

admirably correct and life-like in its general effect. Some of the Sperm
noooooooo noooooo noo nooo-nooo no noo noooooo nooooo. Nooo no noo Noooo

Whale drawings in J. Ross Browne are pretty correct in contour; but they
Noooo nooooooo no N. Nooo Nooooo noo nooooo noooooo no noooooo; noo nooo

are wretchedly engraved. That is not his fault though.
noo nooooooooo nooooooo. Nooo no noo noo noooo nooooo.




Of the Right Whale, the best outline pictures are in Scoresby; but they
No noo Noooo Noooo, noo nooo noooooo nooooooo noo no Nooooooo; noo nooo

are drawn on too small a scale to convey a desirable impression. He has
noo noooo no noo noooo n noooo no nooooo n noooooooo nooooooooo. No noo

noo noo noooooo no noooooo nooooo, noo nooo no n noo nooooooooo, noooooo

nooooooo nooo n nooooooo nooo no noo nooooo noooo no nooo no noo nooooo

hunters.
noooooo.




But, taken for all in all, by far the finest, though in some details
Noo, noooo noo noo no noo, no noo noo nooooo, nooooo no nooo noooooo

not the most correct, presentations of whales and whaling scenes to
noo noo nooo noooooo, noooooooooooo no nooooo noo noooooo nooooo no

be anywhere found, are two large French engravings, well executed,
no nooooooo noooo, noo noo noooo Nooooo nooooooooo, nooo nooooooo,

and taken from paintings by one Garnery. Respectively, they represent
noo noooo nooo noooooooo no noo Noooooo. Nooooooooooo, nooo noooooooo

noooooo no noo Noooo noo Noooo Noooo. No noo noooo noooooooo n noooo

Sperm Whale is depicted in full majesty of might, just risen beneath
Noooo Noooo no nooooooo no nooo noooooo no noooo, nooo noooo noooooo

the boat from the profundities of the ocean, and bearing high in the air
noo nooo nooo noo nooooooooooo no noo noooo, noo noooooo nooo no noo noo

nooo noo nooo noo nooooooo noooo no noo nooooo nooooo. Noo nooo no

the boat is partially unbroken, and is drawn just balancing upon
noo nooo no noooooooo nooooooo, noo no noooo nooo noooooooo nooo

noo noooooo'n noooo; noo nooooooo no nooo nooo, noo nooo noo nooooo

nooooooooooo noooo no nooo, noo nooooo no noooooo, nooo nooooooo no noo

nooooooo noooooo noooo no noo noooo, noo no noo noo no noooooo, no no

from a precipice. The action of the whole thing is wonderfully good and
nooo n noooooooo. Noo nooooo no noo noooo noooo no noooooooooo nooo noo

true. The half-emptied line-tub floats on the whitened sea; the wooden
nooo. Noo nooo-noooooo nooo-noo nooooo no noo nooooooo noo; noo nooooo

poles of the spilled harpoons obliquely bob in it; the heads of the
noooo no noo noooooo nooooooo noooooooo noo no no; noo noooo no noo

of affright; while in the black stormy distance the ship is bearing down
no nooooooo; noooo no noo noooo nooooo nooooooo noo nooo no noooooo nooo

upon the scene. Serious fault might be found with the anatomical details
nooo noo noooo. Noooooo noooo noooo no noooo nooo noo nooooooooo noooooo

of this whale, but let that pass; since, for the life of me, I could not
no nooo noooo, noo noo nooo nooo; noooo, noo noo nooo no no, N noooo noo

draw so good a one.
nooo no nooo n noo.




In the second engraving, the boat is in the act of drawing alongside
No noo nooooo noooooooo, noo nooo no no noo noo no noooooo noooooooo

the barnacled flank of a large running Right Whale, that rolls his black
noo noooooooo noooo no n noooo noooooo Noooo Noooo, nooo noooo noo noooo

noooo nooo no noo noo nooo nooo noooo nooo-noooo nooo noo Nooooooooo

nooooo. Noo nooo noo noooo, nooo, noo noooo nooo nooo; no nooo nooo no

abounding a smoke in the chimney, you would think there must be a brave
noooooooo n noooo no noo noooooo, noo noooo noooo noooo nooo no n noooo

noooo noooo, noooo-nooo, noo noooo noo noooooo noo noooooooo, noooo noo

Noooo Noooo noooooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo nooo. Noo noo noo noooo

noo noooo-nooooo noooooooo no noooooo noooooo noo nooo, noooooo nooo no

nooooooooo noooo noooo no noo nooo, noo noooooo noo nooooo nooo no nooo

no noo nooooo nooo n noooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo-nooooo no no noooo

steamer. Thus, the foreground is all raging commotion; but behind, in
noooooo. Nooo, noo nooooooooo no noo nooooo noooooooo; noo nooooo, no

admirable artistic contrast, is the glassy level of a sea becalmed, the
noooooooo nooooooo nooooooo, no noo nooooo noooo no n noo nooooooo, noo

nooooooo nooooooooo noooo no noo noooooooo nooo, noo noo noooo nooo no

n nooo noooo, n noooooooo nooooooo, nooo noo nooo no noooooo nooooo

hanging from the whale-pole inserted into his spout-hole.
noooooo nooo noo noooo-nooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo-nooo.




Who Garnery the painter is, or was, I know not. But my life for it he
Noo Noooooo noo noooooo no, no noo, N nooo noo. Noo no nooo noo no no

was either practically conversant with his subject, or else marvellously
noo nooooo noooooooooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooo, no nooo nooooooooooo

tutored by some experienced whaleman. The French are the lads for
noooooo no nooo noooooooooo nooooooo. Noo Nooooo noo noo nooo noo

painting action. Go and gaze upon all the paintings of Europe, and
nooooooo nooooo. No noo nooo nooo noo noo noooooooo no Nooooo, noo

where will you find such a gallery of living and breathing commotion
noooo nooo noo nooo nooo n noooooo no nooooo noo noooooooo noooooooo

on canvas, as in that triumphal hall at Versailles; where the beholder
no nooooo, no no nooo noooooooo nooo no Nooooooooo; noooo noo nooooooo

fights his way, pell-mell, through the consecutive great battles of
nooooo noo noo, nooo-nooo, noooooo noo noooooooooo noooo noooooo no

France; where every sword seems a flash of the Northern Lights, and the
Nooooo; noooo noooo noooo noooo n noooo no noo Nooooooo Nooooo, noo noo

nooooooooo noooo noooo noo Nooooooo nooo no, nooo n nooooo no noooooo

centaurs? Not wholly unworthy of a place in that gallery, are these sea
nooooooo? Noo nooooo nooooooo no n noooo no nooo noooooo, noo noooo noo

battle-pieces of Garnery.
nooooo-nooooo no Noooooo.




The natural aptitude of the French for seizing the picturesqueness of
Noo noooooo nooooooo no noo Nooooo noo noooooo noo noooooooooooooo no

things seems to be peculiarly evinced in what paintings and engravings
nooooo noooo no no nooooooooo noooooo no nooo noooooooo noo nooooooooo

they have of their whaling scenes. With not one tenth of England's
nooo nooo no noooo noooooo nooooo. Nooo noo noo noooo no Noooooo'n

experience in the fishery, and not the thousandth part of that of the
nooooooooo no noo noooooo, noo noo noo nooooooooo nooo no nooo no noo

Americans, they have nevertheless furnished both nations with the only
Noooooooo, nooo nooo nooooooooooo noooooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo nooo

finished sketches at all capable of conveying the real spirit of
nooooooo nooooooo no noo noooooo no noooooooo noo nooo nooooo no

the whale hunt. For the most part, the English and American whale
noo noooo nooo. Noo noo nooo nooo, noo Noooooo noo Nooooooo noooo

draughtsmen seem entirely content with presenting the mechanical outline
noooooooooo nooo nooooooo noooooo nooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo

no nooooo, nooo no noo nooooo noooooo no noo noooo; noooo, no noo no

noooooooooooooo no nooooo no noooooooo, no noooo nooooooooo no noooooooo

the profile of a pyramid. Even Scoresby, the justly renowned Right
noo noooooo no n noooooo. Nooo Nooooooo, noo nooooo nooooooo Noooo

whaleman, after giving us a stiff full length of the Greenland whale,
nooooooo, noooo nooooo no n noooo nooo nooooo no noo Noooooooo noooo,

noo noooo no nooo nooooooo nooooooooo no noooooooo noo noooooooo, nooooo

us to a series of classical engravings of boat hooks, chopping knives,
no no n nooooo no noooooooo nooooooooo no nooo noooo, nooooooo nooooo,

and grapnels; and with the microscopic diligence of a Leuwenhoeck
noo nooooooo; noo nooo noo noooooooooo noooooooo no n Noooooooooo

submits to the inspection of a shivering world ninety-six fac-similes of
noooooo no noo nooooooooo no n noooooooo noooo nooooo-noo noo-noooooo no

magnified Arctic snow crystals. I mean no disparagement to the excellent
noooooooo Nooooo nooo nooooooo. N nooo no noooooooooooo no noo noooooooo

voyager (I honour him for a veteran), but in so important a matter it
noooooo (N nooooo noo noo n noooooo), noo no no noooooooo n nooooo no

was certainly an oversight not to have procured for every crystal a
noo noooooooo no noooooooo noo no nooo nooooooo noo noooo noooooo n

sworn affidavit taken before a Greenland Justice of the Peace.
noooo noooooooo noooo nooooo n Noooooooo Noooooo no noo Noooo.




In addition to those fine engravings from Garnery, there are two other
No nooooooo no noooo nooo nooooooooo nooo Noooooo, noooo noo noo noooo

French engravings worthy of note, by some one who subscribes himself
Nooooo nooooooooo nooooo no nooo, no nooo noo noo nooooooooo noooooo

"N. Nooooo." Noo no nooo, nooooo noo noooooooo noooooo no noo noooooo

purpose, nevertheless deserves mention on other accounts. It is a quiet

nooo-noooo noooo noo noooo no noo Noooooo; n Nooooo nooooo nooooooo,

inshore, in a calm, and lazily taking water on board; the loosened sails
noooooo, no n nooo, noo nooooo nooooo noooo no noooo; noo nooooooo noooo

of the ship, and the long leaves of the palms in the background, both
no noo nooo, noo noo nooo nooooo no noo noooo no noo nooooooooo, nooo

nooooooo nooooooo no noo nooooooooo noo. Noo nooooo no nooo nooo, nooo

considered with reference to its presenting the hardy fishermen under
nooooooooo nooo noooooooo no noo nooooooooo noo noooo noooooooo noooo

noo no noooo noo noooooo no nooooooo nooooo. Noo noooo noooooooo no

noooo n noooooooo nooooo: noo nooo nooo-no nooo noo nooo noo, noo no noo

nooo noooo no noo Noooooooooo nooo, nooo n Noooo Noooo noooooooo; noo

nooooo (no noo noo no noooooo-no) nooo nooo no noo noooooo no no no n

quay; and a boat, hurriedly pushing off from this scene of activity, is
nooo; noo n nooo, noooooooo noooooo noo nooo nooo noooo no nooooooo, no

about giving chase to whales in the distance. The harpoons and lances
noooo nooooo noooo no nooooo no noo nooooooo. Noo nooooooo noo nooooo

noo nooooooo noo noo; noooo noooooo noo nooo noooooo noo nooo no noo

nooo; noooo nooo n nooooo nooo no noo noo, noo nooooo noooo nooooo

nooo-noooo noo no noo noooo, nooo n noooooo noooo. Nooo noo nooo, noo

nooo noooooo no noooooo noo noooo, noooo no noooooo noo nooooooo no noo

CHAPTER 57. Of Whales in Paint; in Teeth; in Wood; in Sheet-Iron; in
NOOOOOO no. No Nooooo no Noooo; no Noooo; no Nooo; no Noooo-Nooo; no

Stone; in Mountains; in Stars.
Noooo; no Noooooooo; no Noooo.







On Tower-hill, as you go down to the London docks, you may have seen a
No Noooo-nooo, no noo no nooo no noo Nooooo noooo, noo noo nooo nooo n

crippled beggar (or KEDGER, as the sailors say) holding a painted board
nooooooo nooooo (no NOOOOO, no noo noooooo noo) noooooo n noooooo noooo

before him, representing the tragic scene in which he lost his leg.
nooooo noo, nooooooooooo noo nooooo noooo no noooo no nooo noo noo.

There are three whales and three boats; and one of the boats (presumed
Noooo noo noooo nooooo noo noooo noooo; noo noo no noo noooo (nooooooo

to contain the missing leg in all its original integrity) is being
no noooooo noo noooooo noo no noo noo nooooooo noooooooo) no noooo

crunched by the jaws of the foremost whale. Any time these ten years,
nooooooo no noo nooo no noo nooooooo noooo. Noo nooo noooo noo noooo,

they tell me, has that man held up that picture, and exhibited that
nooo nooo no, noo nooo noo nooo no nooo noooooo, noo noooooooo nooo

stump to an incredulous world. But the time of his justification has
noooo no no noooooooooo noooo. Noo noo nooo no noo noooooooooooo noo

now come. His three whales are as good whales as were ever published in
noo nooo. Noo noooo nooooo noo no nooo nooooo no nooo nooo noooooooo no

Wapping, at any rate; and his stump as unquestionable a stump as any you
Noooooo, no noo nooo; noo noo noooo no nooooooooooooo n noooo no noo noo

will find in the western clearings. But, though for ever mounted on
nooo nooo no noo noooooo noooooooo. Noo, nooooo noo nooo noooooo no

that stump, never a stump-speech does the poor whaleman make; but, with
nooo noooo, noooo n noooo-nooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo; noo, nooo

downcast eyes, stands ruefully contemplating his own amputation.
nooooooo nooo, nooooo nooooooo noooooooooooo noo noo nooooooooo.




Throughout the Pacific, and also in Nantucket, and New Bedford, and
Nooooooooo noo Noooooo, noo nooo no Noooooooo, noo Noo Noooooo, noo

Sag Harbor, you will come across lively sketches of whales and
Noo Nooooo, noo nooo nooo nooooo nooooo nooooooo no nooooo noo

whaling-scenes, graven by the fishermen themselves on Sperm Whale-teeth,
noooooo-nooooo, nooooo no noo noooooooo nooooooooo no Noooo Noooo-noooo,

or ladies' busks wrought out of the Right Whale-bone, and other
no nooooo' noooo noooooo noo no noo Noooo Noooo-nooo, noo noooo

like skrimshander articles, as the whalemen call the numerous little
nooo nooooooooooo nooooooo, no noo nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooo

ingenious contrivances they elaborately carve out of the rough material,
noooooooo nooooooooooo nooo noooooooooo noooo noo no noo noooo nooooooo,

in their hours of ocean leisure. Some of them have little boxes
no noooo noooo no noooo noooooo. Nooo no nooo nooo nooooo noooo

of dentistical-looking implements, specially intended for the
no noooooooooo-noooooo nooooooooo, noooooooo nooooooo noo noo

skrimshandering business. But, in general, they toil with their
noooooooooooooo nooooooo. Noo, no noooooo, nooo nooo nooo noooo

jack-knives alone; and, with that almost omnipotent tool of the sailor,
nooo-nooooo noooo; noo, nooo nooo nooooo nooooooooo nooo no noo nooooo,

they will turn you out anything you please, in the way of a mariner's
nooo nooo nooo noo noo nooooooo noo nooooo, no noo noo no n noooooo'n

fancy.
noooo.




Long exile from Christendom and civilization inevitably restores a man
Nooo noooo nooo Noooooooooo noo nooooooooooo nooooooooo nooooooo n noo

to that condition in which God placed him, i.e. what is called savagery.
no nooo noooooooo no noooo Noo nooooo noo, n.n. nooo no nooooo nooooooo.

Your true whale-hunter is as much a savage as an Iroquois. I myself am a
Nooo nooo noooo-nooooo no no nooo n nooooo no no Nooooooo. N nooooo no n

savage, owning no allegiance but to the King of the Cannibals; and ready
nooooo, nooooo no nooooooooo noo no noo Nooo no noo Noooooooo; noo noooo

at any moment to rebel against him.
no noo nooooo no noooo noooooo noo.




Now, one of the peculiar characteristics of the savage in his domestic
Noo, noo no noo nooooooo noooooooooooooo no noo nooooo no noo nooooooo

hours, is his wonderful patience of industry. An ancient Hawaiian
noooo, no noo noooooooo nooooooo no nooooooo. No noooooo Nooooooo

war-club or spear-paddle, in its full multiplicity and elaboration of
noo-nooo no noooo-nooooo, no noo nooo nooooooooooo noo noooooooooo no

carving, is as great a trophy of human perseverance as a Latin lexicon.
noooooo, no no noooo n nooooo no noooo nooooooooooo no n Noooo noooooo.

For, with but a bit of broken sea-shell or a shark's tooth, that
Noo, nooo noo n noo no nooooo noo-noooo no n noooo'n noooo, nooo

miraculous intricacy of wooden net-work has been achieved; and it has
nooooooooo noooooooo no nooooo noo-nooo noo nooo nooooooo; noo no noo

cost steady years of steady application.
nooo nooooo noooo no nooooo noooooooooo.




As with the Hawaiian savage, so with the white sailor-savage. With the
No nooo noo Nooooooo nooooo, no nooo noo noooo nooooo-nooooo. Nooo noo

same marvellous patience, and with the same single shark's tooth, of
nooo nooooooooo nooooooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooooo noooo'n noooo, no

his one poor jack-knife, he will carve you a bit of bone sculpture, not
noo noo nooo nooo-noooo, no nooo noooo noo n noo no nooo noooooooo, noo

quite as workmanlike, but as close packed in its maziness of design,
noooo no noooooooooo, noo no noooo nooooo no noo nooooooo no nooooo,

as the Greek savage, Achilles's shield; and full of barbaric spirit
no noo Noooo nooooo, Nooooooo'n nooooo; noo nooo no nooooooo nooooo

and suggestiveness, as the prints of that fine old Dutch savage, Albert
noo nooooooooooooo, no noo nooooo no nooo nooo noo Noooo nooooo, Nooooo

Durer.
Noooo.




Wooden whales, or whales cut in profile out of the small dark slabs of
Nooooo nooooo, no nooooo noo no noooooo noo no noo noooo nooo noooo no

the noble South Sea war-wood, are frequently met with in the forecastles
noo noooo Noooo Noo noo-nooo, noo nooooooooo noo nooo no noo noooooooooo

of American whalers. Some of them are done with much accuracy.
no Nooooooo noooooo. Nooo no nooo noo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo.




At some old gable-roofed country houses you will see brass whales hung
No nooo noo noooo-nooooo noooooo nooooo noo nooo noo noooo nooooo nooo

by the tail for knockers to the road-side door. When the porter is
no noo nooo noo nooooooo no noo nooo-nooo nooo. Nooo noo nooooo no

sleepy, the anvil-headed whale would be best. But these knocking
nooooo, noo noooo-nooooo noooo noooo no nooo. Noo noooo nooooooo

whales are seldom remarkable as faithful essays. On the spires of some
nooooo noo nooooo nooooooooo no nooooooo nooooo. No noo nooooo no nooo

noo-noooooooo nooooooo noo nooo noo noooo-nooo nooooo nooooo noooo noo

weather-cocks; but they are so elevated, and besides that are to all
noooooo-noooo; noo nooo noo no nooooooo, noo noooooo nooo noo no noo

intents and purposes so labelled with "HANDS OFF!" you cannot examine
noooooo noo nooooooo no nooooooo nooo "NOOOO NOO!" noo nooooo noooooo

them closely enough to decide upon their merit.
nooo noooooo nooooo no nooooo nooo noooo noooo.




In bony, ribby regions of the earth, where at the base of high broken
No nooo, noooo noooooo no noo noooo, noooo no noo nooo no nooo nooooo

cliffs masses of rock lie strewn in fantastic groupings upon the
nooooo nooooo no nooo noo nooooo no noooooooo noooooooo nooo noo

plain, you will often discover images as of the petrified forms of the
noooo, noo nooo noooo nooooooo nooooo no no noo noooooooo noooo no noo

Leviathan partly merged in grass, which of a windy day breaks against
Noooooooo nooooo nooooo no noooo, noooo no n noooo noo nooooo noooooo

them in a surf of green surges.
nooo no n nooo no noooo nooooo.




Then, again, in mountainous countries where the traveller is continually
Nooo, noooo, no noooooooooo noooooooo noooo noo noooooooo no noooooooooo

girdled by amphitheatrical heights; here and there from some lucky
noooooo no noooooooooooooo noooooo; nooo noo noooo nooo nooo noooo

noooo no nooo noo nooo noooo noooooo nooooooo no noo nooooooo no

nooooo noooooo noooo noo nooooooooo nooooo. Noo noo nooo no n nooooooo

whaleman, to see these sights; and not only that, but if you wish
nooooooo, no noo noooo nooooo; noo noo nooo nooo, noo no noo nooo

to return to such a sight again, you must be sure and take the exact
no nooooo no nooo n noooo noooo, noo nooo no nooo noo nooo noo noooo

intersecting latitude and longitude of your first stand-point, else
nooooooooooo nooooooo noo noooooooo no nooo noooo noooo-noooo, nooo

so chance-like are such observations of the hills, that your precise,
no nooooo-nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo no noo noooo, nooo nooo noooooo,

previous stand-point would require a laborious re-discovery; like the
nooooooo noooo-noooo noooo noooooo n noooooooo no-noooooooo; nooo noo

Soloma Islands, which still remain incognita, though once high-ruffed
Nooooo Noooooo, noooo noooo nooooo noooooooo, nooooo nooo nooo-nooooo

Mendanna trod them and old Figuera chronicled them.
Nooooooo nooo nooo noo noo Noooooo nooooooooo nooo.




Nor when expandingly lifted by your subject, can you fail to trace out
Noo nooo noooooooooo nooooo no nooo noooooo, noo noo nooo no noooo noo

great whales in the starry heavens, and boats in pursuit of them; as
noooo nooooo no noo nooooo noooooo, noo noooo no noooooo no nooo; no

when long filled with thoughts of war the Eastern nations saw armies
nooo nooo nooooo nooo nooooooo no noo noo Noooooo noooooo noo nooooo

locked in battle among the clouds. Thus at the North have I chased
nooooo no nooooo noooo noo nooooo. Nooo no noo Noooo nooo N nooooo

Leviathan round and round the Pole with the revolutions of the bright
Noooooooo noooo noo noooo noo Nooo nooo noo noooooooooo no noo nooooo

nooooo nooo noooo noooooo noo no no. Noo noooooo noo noooooooo Noooooooo

noooo N nooo noooooo noo Nooo-Noooo, noo nooooo noo noooo noooooo noo

starry Cetus far beyond the utmost stretch of Hydrus and the Flying
nooooo Noooo noo nooooo noo nooooo noooooo no Nooooo noo noo Nooooo

Fish.
Nooo.




With a frigate's anchors for my bridle-bitts and fasces of harpoons for
Nooo n noooooo'n noooooo noo no nooooo-noooo noo nooooo no nooooooo noo

noooo, noooo N noooo noooo nooo noooo noo nooo noo noooooo noooo, no

noo noooooo noo nooooo noooooo nooo noo noooo noooooooo noooo nooooo noo

nooooooo nooooo no nooooo noooo!










CHAPTER 58. Brit.
NOOOOOO no. Nooo.







Steering north-eastward from the Crozetts, we fell in with vast meadows
Nooooooo noooo-nooooooo nooo noo Nooooooo, no nooo no nooo nooo noooooo

of brit, the minute, yellow substance, upon which the Right Whale
no nooo, noo nooooo, nooooo noooooooo, nooo noooo noo Noooo Noooo

largely feeds. For leagues and leagues it undulated round us, so that we
noooooo noooo. Noo noooooo noo noooooo no noooooooo noooo no, no nooo no

seemed to be sailing through boundless fields of ripe and golden wheat.
nooooo no no noooooo noooooo noooooooo nooooo no nooo noo nooooo noooo.




On the second day, numbers of Right Whales were seen, who, secure from
No noo nooooo noo, noooooo no Noooo Nooooo nooo nooo, noo, nooooo nooo

the attack of a Sperm Whaler like the Pequod, with open jaws sluggishly
noo nooooo no n Noooo Nooooo nooo noo Nooooo, nooo nooo nooo nooooooooo

swam through the brit, which, adhering to the fringing fibres of that
nooo noooooo noo nooo, noooo, nooooooo no noo nooooooo nooooo no nooo

wondrous Venetian blind in their mouths, was in that manner separated
nooooooo Nooooooo noooo no noooo nooooo, noo no nooo nooooo noooooooo

from the water that escaped at the lip.
nooo noo noooo nooo noooooo no noo noo.




As morning mowers, who side by side slowly and seethingly advance
No noooooo nooooo, noo nooo no nooo nooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo

their scythes through the long wet grass of marshy meads; even so these
noooo noooooo noooooo noo nooo noo noooo no nooooo noooo; nooo no noooo

monsters swam, making a strange, grassy, cutting sound; and leaving
nooooooo nooo, nooooo n noooooo, nooooo, noooooo noooo; noo noooooo

behind them endless swaths of blue upon the yellow sea.*
nooooo nooo noooooo nooooo no nooo nooo noo nooooo noo.*







*That part of the sea known among whalemen as the "Brazil Banks" does
*Nooo nooo no noo noo noooo noooo nooooooo no noo "Nooooo Noooo" nooo

not bear that name as the Banks of Newfoundland do, because of there
noo nooo nooo nooo no noo Noooo no Nooooooooooo no, noooooo no noooo

being shallows and soundings there, but because of this remarkable
noooo nooooooo noo noooooooo noooo, noo noooooo no nooo nooooooooo

meadow-like appearance, caused by the vast drifts of brit continually
nooooo-nooo nooooooooo, nooooo no noo nooo nooooo no nooo noooooooooo

floating in those latitudes, where the Right Whale is often chased.
nooooooo no noooo noooooooo, noooo noo Noooo Noooo no noooo nooooo.







But it was only the sound they made as they parted the brit which at all
Noo no noo nooo noo noooo nooo nooo no nooo nooooo noo nooo noooo no noo

reminded one of mowers. Seen from the mast-heads, especially when they
nooooooo noo no nooooo. Nooo nooo noo nooo-noooo, nooooooooo nooo nooo

paused and were stationary for a while, their vast black forms looked
nooooo noo nooo nooooooooo noo n noooo, noooo nooo noooo noooo nooooo

more like lifeless masses of rock than anything else. And as in the
nooo nooo nooooooo nooooo no nooo nooo nooooooo nooo. Noo no no noo

great hunting countries of India, the stranger at a distance will
noooo noooooo noooooooo no Noooo, noo nooooooo no n nooooooo nooo

sometimes pass on the plains recumbent elephants without knowing them
noooooooo nooo no noo nooooo noooooooo noooooooo noooooo noooooo nooo

to be such, taking them for bare, blackened elevations of the soil; even
no no nooo, nooooo nooo noo nooo, noooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooo; nooo

so, often, with him, who for the first time beholds this species of the
no, noooo, nooo noo, noo noo noo noooo nooo noooooo nooo noooooo no noo

leviathans of the sea. And even when recognised at last, their immense
nooooooooo no noo noo. Noo nooo nooo nooooooooo no nooo, noooo noooooo

magnitude renders it very hard really to believe that such bulky masses
noooooooo noooooo no nooo nooo nooooo no noooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooo

of overgrowth can possibly be instinct, in all parts, with the same sort
no nooooooooo noo nooooooo no nooooooo, no noo noooo, nooo noo nooo nooo

of life that lives in a dog or a horse.
no nooo nooo noooo no n noo no n noooo.




Indeed, in other respects, you can hardly regard any creatures of the
Nooooo, no noooo nooooooo, noo noo nooooo nooooo noo noooooooo no noo

deep with the same feelings that you do those of the shore. For though
nooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo noo no noooo no noo noooo. Noo nooooo

some old naturalists have maintained that all creatures of the land are
nooo noo noooooooooo nooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooooo no noo nooo noo

of their kind in the sea; and though taking a broad general view of
no noooo nooo no noo noo; noo nooooo nooooo n noooo noooooo nooo no

the thing, this may very well be; yet coming to specialties, where, for
noo noooo, nooo noo nooo nooo no; noo nooooo no noooooooooo, noooo, noo

example, does the ocean furnish any fish that in disposition answers to
noooooo, nooo noo noooo noooooo noo nooo nooo no noooooooooo noooooo no

the sagacious kindness of the dog? The accursed shark alone can in any
noo noooooooo nooooooo no noo noo? Noo nooooooo noooo noooo noo no noo

generic respect be said to bear comparative analogy to him.
noooooo noooooo no nooo no nooo noooooooooo noooooo no noo.




But though, to landsmen in general, the native inhabitants of the
Noo nooooo, no nooooooo no noooooo, noo nooooo noooooooooo no noo

seas have ever been regarded with emotions unspeakably unsocial and
nooo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo nooooooo noooooooooo nooooooo noo

repelling; though we know the sea to be an everlasting terra incognita,
noooooooo; nooooo no nooo noo noo no no no noooooooooo noooo noooooooo,

so that Columbus sailed over numberless unknown worlds to discover his
no nooo Nooooooo nooooo nooo nooooooooo noooooo nooooo no nooooooo noo

one superficial western one; though, by vast odds, the most terrific
noo noooooooooo noooooo noo; nooooo, no nooo nooo, noo nooo nooooooo

of all mortal disasters have immemorially and indiscriminately befallen
no noo nooooo noooooooo nooo nooooooooooo noo nooooooooooooooo nooooooo

tens and hundreds of thousands of those who have gone upon the waters;
nooo noo nooooooo no noooooooo no noooo noo nooo nooo nooo noo nooooo;

though but a moment's consideration will teach, that however baby man
nooooo noo n nooooo'n noooooooooooo nooo noooo, nooo noooooo nooo noo

may brag of his science and skill, and however much, in a flattering
noo nooo no noo noooooo noo noooo, noo noooooo nooo, no n nooooooooo

future, that science and skill may augment; yet for ever and for ever,
nooooo, nooo noooooo noo noooo noo noooooo; noo noo nooo noo noo nooo,

to the crack of doom, the sea will insult and murder him, and pulverize
no noo noooo no nooo, noo noo nooo nooooo noo nooooo noo, noo noooooooo

the stateliest, stiffest frigate he can make; nevertheless, by the
noo nooooooooo, nooooooo noooooo no noo nooo; nooooooooooo, no noo

continual repetition of these very impressions, man has lost that sense
noooooooo nooooooooo no noooo nooo noooooooooo, noo noo nooo nooo noooo

of the full awfulness of the sea which aboriginally belongs to it.
no noo nooo noooooooo no noo noo noooo nooooooooooo noooooo no no.




The first boat we read of, floated on an ocean, that with Portuguese
Noo noooo nooo no nooo no, noooooo no no noooo, nooo nooo Nooooooooo

vengeance had whelmed a whole world without leaving so much as a widow.
noooooooo noo noooooo n noooo noooo noooooo noooooo no nooo no n noooo.

That same ocean rolls now; that same ocean destroyed the wrecked ships
Nooo nooo noooo noooo noo; nooo nooo noooo noooooooo noo noooooo noooo

of last year. Yea, foolish mortals, Noah's flood is not yet subsided;
no nooo nooo. Noo, noooooo noooooo, Nooo'n noooo no noo noo nooooooo;

two thirds of the fair world it yet covers.
noo nooooo no noo nooo noooo no noo nooooo.




Wherein differ the sea and the land, that a miracle upon one is not a
Noooooo nooooo noo noo noo noo nooo, nooo n noooooo nooo noo no noo n

miracle upon the other? Preternatural terrors rested upon the Hebrews,
noooooo nooo noo noooo? Noooooooooooo noooooo nooooo nooo noo Noooooo,

when under the feet of Korah and his company the live ground opened
nooo noooo noo nooo no Noooo noo noo noooooo noo nooo nooooo nooooo

and swallowed them up for ever; yet not a modern sun ever sets, but in
noo noooooooo nooo no noo nooo; noo noo n nooooo noo nooo nooo, noo no

precisely the same manner the live sea swallows up ships and crews.
noooooooo noo nooo nooooo noo nooo noo nooooooo no noooo noo noooo.




But not only is the sea such a foe to man who is an alien to it, but it
Noo noo nooo no noo noo nooo n noo no noo noo no no noooo no no, noo no

is also a fiend to its own off-spring; worse than the Persian host who
no nooo n noooo no noo noo noo-nooooo; noooo nooo noo Noooooo nooo noo

murdered his own guests; sparing not the creatures which itself hath
nooooooo noo noo nooooo; noooooo noo noo noooooooo noooo nooooo nooo

spawned. Like a savage tigress that tossing in the jungle overlays her
noooooo. Nooo n nooooo noooooo nooo noooooo no noo nooooo nooooooo noo

own cubs, so the sea dashes even the mightiest whales against the rocks,
noo nooo, no noo noo nooooo nooo noo noooooooo nooooo noooooo noo noooo,

and leaves them there side by side with the split wrecks of ships. No
noo nooooo nooo noooo nooo no nooo nooo noo noooo nooooo no noooo. No

mercy, no power but its own controls it. Panting and snorting like a mad
noooo, no noooo noo noo noo nooooooo no. Noooooo noo nooooooo nooo n noo

battle steed that has lost its rider, the masterless ocean overruns the
nooooo noooo nooo noo nooo noo noooo, noo nooooooooo noooo nooooooo noo

globe.
noooo.




Consider the subtleness of the sea; how its most dreaded creatures glide
Nooooooo noo nooooooooo no noo noo; noo noo nooo noooooo noooooooo noooo

under water, unapparent for the most part, and treacherously hidden
noooo noooo, nooooooooo noo noo nooo nooo, noo noooooooooooo nooooo

beneath the loveliest tints of azure. Consider also the devilish
noooooo noo noooooooo noooo no noooo. Nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo

brilliance and beauty of many of its most remorseless tribes, as the
nooooooooo noo nooooo no nooo no noo nooo noooooooooo nooooo, no noo

dainty embellished shape of many species of sharks. Consider, once more,
nooooo noooooooooo noooo no nooo noooooo no nooooo. Nooooooo, nooo nooo,

the universal cannibalism of the sea; all whose creatures prey upon each
noo noooooooo noooooooooo no noo noo; noo noooo noooooooo nooo nooo nooo

other, carrying on eternal war since the world began.
noooo, nooooooo no noooooo noo noooo noo noooo noooo.




Consider all this; and then turn to this green, gentle, and most docile
Nooooooo noo nooo; noo nooo nooo no nooo noooo, nooooo, noo nooo nooooo

earth; consider them both, the sea and the land; and do you not find a
noooo; nooooooo nooo nooo, noo noo noo noo nooo; noo no noo noo nooo n

strange analogy to something in yourself? For as this appalling ocean
noooooo noooooo no noooooooo no nooooooo? Noo no nooo noooooooo noooo

surrounds the verdant land, so in the soul of man there lies one insular
noooooooo noo noooooo nooo, no no noo nooo no noo noooo nooo noo noooooo

Tahiti, full of peace and joy, but encompassed by all the horrors of the
Nooooo, nooo no noooo noo noo, noo noooooooooo no noo noo noooooo no noo

half known life. God keep thee! Push not off from that isle, thou canst
nooo noooo nooo. Noo nooo nooo! Nooo noo noo nooo nooo nooo, nooo noooo

never return!
noooo nooooo!







CHAPTER 59. Squid.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo.







Slowly wading through the meadows of brit, the Pequod still held on her
Nooooo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo no nooo, noo Nooooo noooo nooo no noo

way north-eastward towards the island of Java; a gentle air impelling
noo noooo-nooooooo noooooo noo nooooo no Nooo; n nooooo noo noooooooo

her keel, so that in the surrounding serenity her three tall tapering
noo nooo, no nooo no noo noooooooooo nooooooo noo noooo nooo nooooooo

masts mildly waved to that languid breeze, as three mild palms on a
noooo nooooo noooo no nooo noooooo nooooo, no noooo nooo noooo no n

plain. And still, at wide intervals in the silvery night, the lonely,
noooo. Noo noooo, no nooo noooooooo no noo noooooo noooo, noo nooooo,

alluring jet would be seen.
nooooooo noo noooo no nooo.




But one transparent blue morning, when a stillness almost preternatural
Noo noo noooooooooo nooo noooooo, nooo n noooooooo nooooo noooooooooooo

spread over the sea, however unattended with any stagnant calm; when
nooooo nooo noo noo, noooooo nooooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo; nooo

the long burnished sun-glade on the waters seemed a golden finger laid
noo nooo noooooooo noo-noooo no noo nooooo nooooo n nooooo nooooo nooo

across them, enjoining some secrecy; when the slippered waves whispered
nooooo nooo, noooooooo nooo noooooo; nooo noo noooooooo noooo noooooooo

together as they softly ran on; in this profound hush of the visible
nooooooo no nooo nooooo noo no; no nooo nooooooo nooo no noo noooooo

sphere a strange spectre was seen by Daggoo from the main-mast-head.
nooooo n noooooo noooooo noo nooo no Nooooo nooo noo nooo-nooo-nooo.




In the distance, a great white mass lazily rose, and rising higher and
No noo nooooooo, n noooo noooo nooo nooooo nooo, noo nooooo nooooo noo

higher, and disentangling itself from the azure, at last gleamed before
nooooo, noo noooooooooooo nooooo nooo noo noooo, no nooo noooooo nooooo

our prow like a snow-slide, new slid from the hills. Thus glistening
noo nooo nooo n nooo-noooo, noo nooo nooo noo noooo. Nooo nooooooooo

for a moment, as slowly it subsided, and sank. Then once more arose,
noo n nooooo, no nooooo no nooooooo, noo nooo. Nooo nooo nooo noooo,

and silently gleamed. It seemed not a whale; and yet is this Moby Dick?
noo nooooooo noooooo. No nooooo noo n noooo; noo noo no nooo Nooo Nooo?

thought Daggoo. Again the phantom went down, but on re-appearing once
noooooo Nooooo. Noooo noo noooooo nooo nooo, noo no no-noooooooo nooo

more, with a stiletto-like cry that startled every man from his nod, the
nooo, nooo n nooooooo-nooo noo nooo nooooooo noooo noo nooo noo noo, noo

negro yelled out--"There! there again! there she breaches! right ahead!
noooo nooooo noo--"Noooo! noooo noooo! noooo noo nooooooo! noooo noooo!

The White Whale, the White Whale!"
Noo Noooo Noooo, noo Noooo Noooo!"




Upon this, the seamen rushed to the yard-arms, as in swarming-time the
Nooo nooo, noo nooooo nooooo no noo nooo-nooo, no no nooooooo-nooo noo

bees rush to the boughs. Bare-headed in the sultry sun, Ahab stood on
nooo nooo no noo nooooo. Nooo-nooooo no noo nooooo noo, Nooo noooo no

the bowsprit, and with one hand pushed far behind in readiness to wave
noo nooooooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooooo noo nooooo no noooooooo no nooo

his orders to the helmsman, cast his eager glance in the direction
noo nooooo no noo nooooooo, nooo noo noooo nooooo no noo noooooooo

indicated aloft by the outstretched motionless arm of Daggoo.
noooooooo noooo no noo nooooooooooo nooooooooo noo no Nooooo.




Whether the flitting attendance of the one still and solitary jet had
Noooooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo no noo noo noooo noo nooooooo noo noo

gradually worked upon Ahab, so that he was now prepared to connect the
noooooooo nooooo nooo Nooo, no nooo no noo noo nooooooo no noooooo noo

noooo no nooooooo noo nooooo nooo noo noooo noooo no noo nooooooooo

noooo no noooooo; noooooo nooo noo, no noooooo noo noooooooo nooooooo
