noo; noooooooo noo no noooo nooo nooo, no nooooo noo no nooooooooo

perceive the white mass, than with a quick intensity he instantly gave
nooooooo noo noooo nooo, nooo nooo n noooo noooooooo no noooooooo nooo

orders for lowering.
nooooo noo nooooooo.




The four boats were soon on the water; Ahab's in advance, and all
Noo nooo noooo nooo nooo no noo noooo; Nooo'n no noooooo, noo noo

swiftly pulling towards their prey. Soon it went down, and while, with
noooooo noooooo noooooo noooo nooo. Nooo no nooo nooo, noo noooo, nooo

oars suspended, we were awaiting its reappearance, lo! in the same
nooo noooooooo, no nooo nooooooo noo nooooooooooo, no! no noo nooo

spot where it sank, once more it slowly rose. Almost forgetting for
nooo noooo no nooo, nooo nooo no nooooo nooo. Nooooo nooooooooo noo

the moment all thoughts of Moby Dick, we now gazed at the most wondrous
noo nooooo noo nooooooo no Nooo Nooo, no noo noooo no noo nooo nooooooo

phenomenon which the secret seas have hitherto revealed to mankind.
nooooooooo noooo noo nooooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooooooo no noooooo.

A vast pulpy mass, furlongs in length and breadth, of a glancing
N nooo noooo nooo, nooooooo no nooooo noo noooooo, no n nooooooo

cream-colour, lay floating on the water, innumerable long arms radiating
noooo-nooooo, noo nooooooo no noo noooo, noooooooooo nooo nooo noooooooo

from its centre, and curling and twisting like a nest of anacondas, as
nooo noo nooooo, noo noooooo noo nooooooo nooo n nooo no noooooooo, no

if blindly to clutch at any hapless object within reach. No perceptible
no noooooo no nooooo no noo noooooo nooooo nooooo noooo. No noooooooooo

face or front did it have; no conceivable token of either sensation or
nooo no noooo noo no nooo; no noooooooooo noooo no nooooo noooooooo no

instinct; but undulated there on the billows, an unearthly, formless,
nooooooo; noo noooooooo noooo no noo noooooo, no noooooooo, nooooooo,

chance-like apparition of life.
nooooo-nooo nooooooooo no nooo.




As with a low sucking sound it slowly disappeared again, Starbuck still
No nooo n noo noooooo noooo no nooooo noooooooooo noooo, Nooooooo noooo

gazing at the agitated waters where it had sunk, with a wild voice
nooooo no noo nooooooo nooooo noooo no noo nooo, nooo n nooo noooo

exclaimed--"Almost rather had I seen Moby Dick and fought him, than to
noooooooo--"Nooooo nooooo noo N nooo Nooo Nooo noo nooooo noo, nooo no

have seen thee, thou white ghost!"
nooo nooo nooo, nooo noooo noooo!"




"What was it, Sir?" said Flask.
"Nooo noo no, Noo?" nooo Noooo.




"The great live squid, which, they say, few whale-ships ever beheld, and
"Noo noooo nooo noooo, noooo, nooo noo, noo noooo-noooo nooo nooooo, noo

returned to their ports to tell of it."
nooooooo no noooo noooo no nooo no no."




But Ahab said nothing; turning his boat, he sailed back to the vessel;
Noo Nooo nooo noooooo; noooooo noo nooo, no nooooo nooo no noo nooooo;

the rest as silently following.
noo nooo no nooooooo noooooooo.




Whatever superstitions the sperm whalemen in general have connected with
Nooooooo noooooooooooo noo noooo nooooooo no noooooo nooo noooooooo nooo

the sight of this object, certain it is, that a glimpse of it being
noo noooo no nooo nooooo, noooooo no no, nooo n noooooo no no noooo

so very unusual, that circumstance has gone far to invest it with
no nooo noooooo, nooo nooooooooooo noo nooo noo no nooooo no nooo

portentousness. So rarely is it beheld, that though one and all of them
nooooooooooooo. No nooooo no no nooooo, nooo nooooo noo noo noo no nooo

declare it to be the largest animated thing in the ocean, yet very few
noooooo no no no noo noooooo nooooooo noooo no noo noooo, noo nooo noo

of them have any but the most vague ideas concerning its true nature and
no nooo nooo noo noo noo nooo noooo noooo nooooooooo noo nooo nooooo noo

form; notwithstanding, they believe it to furnish to the sperm whale
nooo; noooooooooooooo, nooo noooooo no no noooooo no noo noooo noooo

his only food. For though other species of whales find their food above
noo nooo nooo. Noo nooooo noooo noooooo no nooooo nooo noooo nooo noooo

water, and may be seen by man in the act of feeding, the spermaceti
noooo, noo noo no nooo no noo no noo noo no noooooo, noo nooooooooo

whale obtains his whole food in unknown zones below the surface; and
noooo noooooo noo noooo nooo no noooooo noooo noooo noo noooooo; noo

only by inference is it that any one can tell of what, precisely, that
nooo no noooooooo no no nooo noo noo noo nooo no nooo, noooooooo, nooo

food consists. At times, when closely pursued, he will disgorge what
nooo nooooooo. No noooo, nooo noooooo noooooo, no nooo nooooooo nooo

are supposed to be the detached arms of the squid; some of them thus
noo nooooooo no no noo nooooooo nooo no noo noooo; nooo no nooo nooo

exhibited exceeding twenty and thirty feet in length. They fancy that
noooooooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooooo nooo no nooooo. Nooo noooo nooo

the monster to which these arms belonged ordinarily clings by them to
noo noooooo no noooo noooo nooo nooooooo nooooooooo nooooo no nooo no

the bed of the ocean; and that the sperm whale, unlike other species, is
noo noo no noo noooo; noo nooo noo noooo noooo, nooooo noooo noooooo, no

supplied with teeth in order to attack and tear it.
nooooooo nooo noooo no noooo no nooooo noo nooo no.




There seems some ground to imagine that the great Kraken of Bishop
Noooo noooo nooo nooooo no noooooo nooo noo noooo Nooooo no Nooooo

Pontoppodan may ultimately resolve itself into Squid. The manner in
Noooooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo nooooo nooo Noooo. Noo nooooo no

which the Bishop describes it, as alternately rising and sinking, with
noooo noo Nooooo noooooooo no, no noooooooooo nooooo noo noooooo, nooo

some other particulars he narrates, in all this the two correspond.
nooo noooo noooooooooo no nooooooo, no noo nooo noo noo nooooooooo.

But much abatement is necessary with respect to the incredible bulk he
Noo nooo noooooooo no noooooooo nooo noooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo no

assigns it.
noooooo no.




By some naturalists who have vaguely heard rumors of the mysterious
No nooo noooooooooo noo nooo noooooo noooo nooooo no noo nooooooooo

creature, here spoken of, it is included among the class of cuttle-fish,
nooooooo, nooo nooooo no, no no nooooooo noooo noo noooo no nooooo-nooo,

to which, indeed, in certain external respects it would seem to belong,
no noooo, nooooo, no noooooo nooooooo nooooooo no noooo nooo no nooooo,

but only as the Anak of the tribe.
noo nooo no noo Nooo no noo noooo.










CHAPTER 60. The Line.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo.







With reference to the whaling scene shortly to be described, as well as
Nooo noooooooo no noo noooooo noooo noooooo no no noooooooo, no nooo no

for the better understanding of all similar scenes elsewhere presented,
noo noo nooooo noooooooooooo no noo noooooo nooooo noooooooo noooooooo,

I have here to speak of the magical, sometimes horrible whale-line.
N nooo nooo no noooo no noo noooooo, noooooooo nooooooo noooo-nooo.




The line originally used in the fishery was of the best hemp, slightly
Noo nooo nooooooooo nooo no noo noooooo noo no noo nooo nooo, nooooooo

vapoured with tar, not impregnated with it, as in the case of ordinary
nooooooo nooo noo, noo noooooooooo nooo no, no no noo nooo no nooooooo

ropes; for while tar, as ordinarily used, makes the hemp more pliable to
noooo; noo noooo noo, no nooooooooo nooo, noooo noo nooo nooo noooooo no

the rope-maker, and also renders the rope itself more convenient to the
noo nooo-noooo, noo nooo noooooo noo nooo nooooo nooo nooooooooo no noo

sailor for common ship use; yet, not only would the ordinary quantity
nooooo noo nooooo nooo noo; noo, noo nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooooo

too much stiffen the whale-line for the close coiling to which it must
noo nooo noooooo noo noooo-nooo noo noo noooo noooooo no noooo no nooo

be subjected; but as most seamen are beginning to learn, tar in general
no noooooooo; noo no nooo nooooo noo noooooooo no noooo, noo no noooooo

by no means adds to the rope's durability or strength, however much it
no no noooo nooo no noo nooo'n nooooooooo no nooooooo, noooooo nooo no

may give it compactness and gloss.
noo nooo no noooooooooo noo noooo.




Of late years the Manilla rope has in the American fishery almost
No nooo noooo noo Noooooo nooo noo no noo Nooooooo noooooo nooooo

entirely superseded hemp as a material for whale-lines; for, though not
nooooooo nooooooooo nooo no n nooooooo noo noooo-noooo; noo, nooooo noo

so durable as hemp, it is stronger, and far more soft and elastic; and
no noooooo no nooo, no no nooooooo, noo noo nooo nooo noo noooooo; noo

I will add (since there is an aesthetics in all things), is much more
N nooo noo (noooo noooo no no nooooooooo no noo nooooo), no nooo nooo

handsome and becoming to the boat, than hemp. Hemp is a dusky, dark
nooooooo noo nooooooo no noo nooo, nooo nooo. Nooo no n noooo, nooo

fellow, a sort of Indian; but Manilla is as a golden-haired Circassian
nooooo, n nooo no Nooooo; noo Noooooo no no n nooooo-nooooo Nooooooooo

to behold.
no nooooo.




The whale-line is only two-thirds of an inch in thickness. At first
Noo noooo-nooo no nooo noo-nooooo no no nooo no noooooooo. No noooo

sight, you would not think it so strong as it really is. By experiment
noooo, noo noooo noo noooo no no nooooo no no nooooo no. No nooooooooo

its one and fifty yarns will each suspend a weight of one hundred and
noo noo noo noooo noooo nooo nooo noooooo n nooooo no noo noooooo noo

twenty pounds; so that the whole rope will bear a strain nearly equal
nooooo nooooo; no nooo noo noooo nooo nooo nooo n nooooo nooooo noooo

to three tons. In length, the common sperm whale-line measures something
no noooo nooo. No nooooo, noo nooooo noooo noooo-nooo nooooooo noooooooo

over two hundred fathoms. Towards the stern of the boat it is spirally
nooo noo noooooo noooooo. Noooooo noo noooo no noo nooo no no nooooooo

coiled away in the tub, not like the worm-pipe of a still though, but so
nooooo nooo no noo noo, noo nooo noo nooo-nooo no n noooo nooooo, noo no

as to form one round, cheese-shaped mass of densely bedded "sheaves," or
no no nooo noo noooo, nooooo-nooooo nooo no noooooo nooooo "noooooo," no

layers of concentric spiralizations, without any hollow but the "heart,"
nooooo no nooooooooo nooooooooooooo, noooooo noo nooooo noo noo "noooo,"

or minute vertical tube formed at the axis of the cheese. As the least
no nooooo nooooooo nooo nooooo no noo nooo no noo nooooo. No noo noooo

tangle or kink in the coiling would, in running out, infallibly take
nooooo no nooo no noo noooooo noooo, no noooooo noo, nooooooooo nooo

somebody's arm, leg, or entire body off, the utmost precaution is used
nooooooo'n noo, noo, no nooooo nooo noo, noo nooooo nooooooooo no nooo

in stowing the line in its tub. Some harpooneers will consume almost an
no noooooo noo nooo no noo noo. Nooo noooooooooo nooo noooooo nooooo no

entire morning in this business, carrying the line high aloft and then
nooooo noooooo no nooo nooooooo, nooooooo noo nooo nooo noooo noo nooo

reeving it downwards through a block towards the tub, so as in the act
noooooo no noooooooo noooooo n noooo noooooo noo noo, no no no noo noo

of coiling to free it from all possible wrinkles and twists.
no noooooo no nooo no nooo noo nooooooo nooooooo noo nooooo.




In the English boats two tubs are used instead of one; the same line
No noo Noooooo noooo noo nooo noo nooo noooooo no noo; noo nooo nooo

being continuously coiled in both tubs. There is some advantage in this;
noooo nooooooooooo nooooo no nooo nooo. Noooo no nooo noooooooo no nooo;

because these twin-tubs being so small they fit more readily into the
noooooo noooo nooo-nooo noooo no noooo nooo noo nooo noooooo nooo noo

boat, and do not strain it so much; whereas, the American tub, nearly
nooo, noo no noo nooooo no no nooo; noooooo, noo Nooooooo noo, nooooo

three feet in diameter and of proportionate depth, makes a rather bulky
noooo nooo no nooooooo noo no noooooooooooo noooo, noooo n nooooo noooo

freight for a craft whose planks are but one half-inch in thickness; for
noooooo noo n noooo noooo nooooo noo noo noo nooo-nooo no noooooooo; noo

the bottom of the whale-boat is like critical ice, which will bear up
noo nooooo no noo noooo-nooo no nooo nooooooo noo, noooo nooo nooo no

a considerable distributed weight, but not very much of a concentrated
n nooooooooooo noooooooooo nooooo, noo noo nooo nooo no n nooooooooooo

one. When the painted canvas cover is clapped on the American line-tub,
noo. Nooo noo noooooo nooooo noooo no noooooo no noo Nooooooo nooo-noo,

the boat looks as if it were pulling off with a prodigious great
noo nooo noooo no no no nooo noooooo noo nooo n nooooooooo noooo

wedding-cake to present to the whales.
noooooo-nooo no noooooo no noo nooooo.




Both ends of the line are exposed; the lower end terminating in an
Nooo nooo no noo nooo noo noooooo; noo noooo noo noooooooooo no no

eye-splice or loop coming up from the bottom against the side of the
noo-nooooo no nooo nooooo no nooo noo nooooo noooooo noo nooo no noo

tub, and hanging over its edge completely disengaged from everything.
noo, noo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo nooooooooo nooo nooooooooo.

This arrangement of the lower end is necessary on two accounts. First:
Nooo noooooooooo no noo noooo noo no noooooooo no noo nooooooo. Noooo:

In order to facilitate the fastening to it of an additional line from a
No noooo no nooooooooo noo noooooooo no no no no nooooooooo nooo nooo n

neighboring boat, in case the stricken whale should sound so deep as
noooooooooo nooo, no nooo noo nooooooo noooo nooooo noooo no nooo no

to threaten to carry off the entire line originally attached to the
no nooooooo no noooo noo noo nooooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo no noo

harpoon. In these instances, the whale of course is shifted like a mug
noooooo. No noooo noooooooo, noo noooo no nooooo no noooooo nooo n noo

of ale, as it were, from the one boat to the other; though the
no noo, no no nooo, nooo noo noo nooo no noo noooo; nooooo noo

first boat always hovers at hand to assist its consort. Second: This
noooo nooo nooooo nooooo no nooo no nooooo noo noooooo. Nooooo: Nooo

arrangement is indispensable for common safety's sake; for were the
noooooooooo no noooooooooooo noo nooooo nooooo'n nooo; noo nooo noo

lower end of the line in any way attached to the boat, and were the
noooo noo no noo nooo no noo noo nooooooo no noo nooo, noo nooo noo

whale then to run the line out to the end almost in a single, smoking
noooo nooo no noo noo nooo noo no noo noo nooooo no n nooooo, noooooo

minute as he sometimes does, he would not stop there, for the doomed
nooooo no no noooooooo nooo, no noooo noo nooo noooo, noo noo nooooo

boat would infallibly be dragged down after him into the profundity of
nooo noooo nooooooooo no noooooo nooo noooo noo nooo noo nooooooooo no

the sea; and in that case no town-crier would ever find her again.
noo noo; noo no nooo nooo no nooo-noooo noooo nooo nooo noo noooo.




Before lowering the boat for the chase, the upper end of the line is
Nooooo nooooooo noo nooo noo noo noooo, noo noooo noo no noo nooo no

taken aft from the tub, and passing round the loggerhead there, is again
noooo noo nooo noo noo, noo noooooo noooo noo nooooooooo noooo, no noooo

carried forward the entire length of the boat, resting crosswise upon
noooooo noooooo noo nooooo nooooo no noo nooo, noooooo noooooooo nooo

the loom or handle of every man's oar, so that it jogs against his wrist
noo nooo no nooooo no noooo noo'n noo, no nooo no nooo noooooo noo noooo

in rowing; and also passing between the men, as they alternately sit at
no nooooo; noo nooo noooooo noooooo noo noo, no nooo noooooooooo noo no

the opposite gunwales, to the leaded chocks or grooves in the extreme
noo nooooooo nooooooo, no noo nooooo nooooo no noooooo no noo noooooo

pointed prow of the boat, where a wooden pin or skewer the size of a
noooooo nooo no noo nooo, noooo n nooooo noo no nooooo noo nooo no n

common quill, prevents it from slipping out. From the chocks it hangs
nooooo noooo, nooooooo no nooo nooooooo noo. Nooo noo nooooo no noooo

in a slight festoon over the bows, and is then passed inside the boat
no n nooooo noooooo nooo noo nooo, noo no nooo nooooo nooooo noo nooo

again; and some ten or twenty fathoms (called box-line) being coiled
noooo; noo nooo noo no nooooo noooooo (nooooo noo-nooo) noooo nooooo

upon the box in the bows, it continues its way to the gunwale still a
nooo noo noo no noo nooo, no noooooooo noo noo no noo noooooo noooo n

little further aft, and is then attached to the short-warp--the rope
nooooo noooooo noo, noo no nooo nooooooo no noo noooo-nooo--noo nooo

which is immediately connected with the harpoon; but previous to that
noooo no noooooooooo noooooooo nooo noo noooooo; noo nooooooo no nooo

connexion, the short-warp goes through sundry mystifications too tedious
noooooooo, noo noooo-nooo nooo noooooo nooooo nooooooooooooo noo noooooo

to detail.
no nooooo.




Thus the whale-line folds the whole boat in its complicated coils,
Nooo noo noooo-nooo noooo noo noooo nooo no noo noooooooooo noooo,

twisting and writhing around it in almost every direction. All the
nooooooo noo nooooooo nooooo no no nooooo noooo noooooooo. Noo noo

oarsmen are involved in its perilous contortions; so that to the timid
noooooo noo nooooooo no noo nooooooo noooooooooo; no nooo no noo noooo

eye of the landsman, they seem as Indian jugglers, with the deadliest
noo no noo nooooooo, nooo nooo no Nooooo nooooooo, nooo noo noooooooo

snakes sportively festooning their limbs. Nor can any son of mortal
nooooo nooooooooo nooooooooo noooo noooo. Noo noo noo noo no nooooo

woman, for the first time, seat himself amid those hempen intricacies,
noooo, noo noo noooo nooo, nooo noooooo nooo noooo nooooo noooooooooo,

and while straining his utmost at the oar, bethink him that at any
noo noooo noooooooo noo nooooo no noo noo, noooooo noo nooo no noo

unknown instant the harpoon may be darted, and all these horrible
noooooo noooooo noo noooooo noo no nooooo, noo noo noooo nooooooo

contortions be put in play like ringed lightnings; he cannot be thus
noooooooooo no noo no nooo nooo nooooo nooooooooo; no nooooo no nooo

circumstanced without a shudder that makes the very marrow in his bones
noooooooooooo noooooo n noooooo nooo noooo noo nooo nooooo no noo noooo

to quiver in him like a shaken jelly. Yet habit--strange thing! what
no nooooo no noo nooo n nooooo noooo. Noo noooo--noooooo noooo! nooo

cannot habit accomplish?--Gayer sallies, more merry mirth, better jokes,
nooooo noooo nooooooooo?--Noooo noooooo, nooo noooo noooo, nooooo noooo,

and brighter repartees, you never heard over your mahogany, than you
noo nooooooo noooooooo, noo noooo noooo nooo nooo nooooooo, nooo noo

will hear over the half-inch white cedar of the whale-boat, when thus
nooo nooo nooo noo nooo-nooo noooo noooo no noo noooo-nooo, nooo nooo

hung in hangman's nooses; and, like the six burghers of Calais before
nooo no noooooo'n nooooo; noo, nooo noo noo nooooooo no Nooooo nooooo

King Edward, the six men composing the crew pull into the jaws of death,
Nooo Nooooo, noo noo noo noooooooo noo nooo nooo nooo noo nooo no noooo,

with a halter around every neck, as you may say.
nooo n nooooo nooooo noooo nooo, no noo noo noo.




Perhaps a very little thought will now enable you to account for
Noooooo n nooo nooooo noooooo nooo noo nooooo noo no noooooo noo

those repeated whaling disasters--some few of which are casually
noooo nooooooo noooooo noooooooo--nooo noo no noooo noo nooooooo

chronicled--of this man or that man being taken out of the boat by the
nooooooooo--no nooo noo no nooo noo noooo noooo noo no noo nooo no noo

line, and lost. For, when the line is darting out, to be seated then in
nooo, noo nooo. Noo, nooo noo nooo no noooooo noo, no no nooooo nooo no

the boat, is like being seated in the midst of the manifold whizzings
noo nooo, no nooo noooo nooooo no noo noooo no noo nooooooo noooooooo

of a steam-engine in full play, when every flying beam, and shaft, and
no n noooo-nooooo no nooo nooo, nooo noooo nooooo nooo, noo noooo, noo

wheel, is grazing you. It is worse; for you cannot sit motionless in the
noooo, no noooooo noo. No no noooo; noo noo nooooo noo nooooooooo no noo

heart of these perils, because the boat is rocking like a cradle, and
noooo no noooo nooooo, noooooo noo nooo no noooooo nooo n nooooo, noo

you are pitched one way and the other, without the slightest warning;
noo noo noooooo noo noo noo noo noooo, noooooo noo noooooooo noooooo;

and only by a certain self-adjusting buoyancy and simultaneousness of
noo nooo no n noooooo nooo-noooooooo nooooooo noo nooooooooooooooo no

volition and action, can you escape being made a Mazeppa of, and run
nooooooo noo nooooo, noo noo nooooo noooo nooo n Noooooo no, noo noo

away with where the all-seeing sun himself could never pierce you out.
nooo nooo noooo noo noo-nooooo noo noooooo noooo noooo nooooo noo noo.




Again: as the profound calm which only apparently precedes and
Noooo: no noo nooooooo nooo noooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noo

prophesies of the storm, is perhaps more awful than the storm itself;
nooooooooo no noo noooo, no noooooo nooo noooo nooo noo noooo nooooo;

for, indeed, the calm is but the wrapper and envelope of the storm; and
noo, nooooo, noo nooo no noo noo noooooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo; noo

contains it in itself, as the seemingly harmless rifle holds the fatal
nooooooo no no nooooo, no noo noooooooo nooooooo noooo noooo noo noooo

powder, and the ball, and the explosion; so the graceful repose of the
nooooo, noo noo nooo, noo noo noooooooo; no noo nooooooo nooooo no noo

line, as it silently serpentines about the oarsmen before being brought
nooo, no no nooooooo noooooooooo noooo noo noooooo nooooo noooo noooooo

into actual play--this is a thing which carries more of true terror than
nooo nooooo nooo--nooo no n noooo noooo noooooo nooo no nooo nooooo nooo

any other aspect of this dangerous affair. But why say more? All men
noo noooo nooooo no nooo noooooooo nooooo. Noo noo noo nooo? Noo noo

live enveloped in whale-lines. All are born with halters round their
nooo noooooooo no noooo-noooo. Noo noo nooo nooo noooooo noooo noooo

necks; but it is only when caught in the swift, sudden turn of death,
noooo; noo no no nooo nooo nooooo no noo noooo, nooooo nooo no noooo,

that mortals realize the silent, subtle, ever-present perils of life.
nooo noooooo noooooo noo nooooo, nooooo, nooo-noooooo nooooo no nooo.

And if you be a philosopher, though seated in the whale-boat, you would
Noo no noo no n noooooooooo, nooooo nooooo no noo noooo-nooo, noo noooo

not at heart feel one whit more of terror, than though seated before
noo no noooo nooo noo nooo nooo no nooooo, nooo nooooo nooooo nooooo

your evening fire with a poker, and not a harpoon, by your side.
nooo noooooo nooo nooo n noooo, noo noo n noooooo, no nooo nooo.










CHAPTER 61. Stubb Kills a Whale.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo Noooo n Noooo.







If to Starbuck the apparition of the Squid was a thing of portents, to
No no Nooooooo noo nooooooooo no noo Noooo noo n noooo no nooooooo, no

Queequeg it was quite a different object.
Nooooooo no noo noooo n noooooooo nooooo.




"When you see him 'quid," said the savage, honing his harpoon in the bow
"Nooo noo noo noo 'nooo," nooo noo nooooo, nooooo noo noooooo no noo noo

of his hoisted boat, "then you quick see him 'parm whale."
no noo noooooo nooo, "nooo noo noooo noo noo 'nooo noooo."




The next day was exceedingly still and sultry, and with nothing special
Noo nooo noo noo noooooooooo noooo noo nooooo, noo nooo noooooo noooooo

to engage them, the Pequod's crew could hardly resist the spell of sleep
no nooooo nooo, noo Nooooo'n nooo noooo nooooo nooooo noo noooo no noooo

induced by such a vacant sea. For this part of the Indian Ocean through
noooooo no nooo n nooooo noo. Noo nooo nooo no noo Nooooo Noooo noooooo

which we then were voyaging is not what whalemen call a lively ground;
noooo no nooo nooo nooooooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooo n nooooo nooooo;

that is, it affords fewer glimpses of porpoises, dolphins, flying-fish,
nooo no, no noooooo noooo nooooooo no noooooooo, nooooooo, nooooo-nooo,

and other vivacious denizens of more stirring waters, than those off the
noo noooo noooooooo nooooooo no nooo nooooooo nooooo, nooo noooo noo noo

Rio de la Plata, or the in-shore ground off Peru.
Noo no no Noooo, no noo no-noooo nooooo noo Nooo.




It was my turn to stand at the foremast-head; and with my shoulders
No noo no nooo no noooo no noo nooooooo-nooo; noo nooo no noooooooo

leaning against the slackened royal shrouds, to and fro I idly swayed in
noooooo noooooo noo noooooooo noooo noooooo, no noo noo N nooo nooooo no

what seemed an enchanted air. No resolution could withstand it; in that
nooo nooooo no noooooooo noo. No nooooooooo noooo noooooooo no; no nooo

dreamy mood losing all consciousness, at last my soul went out of my
nooooo nooo nooooo noo noooooooooooo, no nooo no nooo nooo noo no no

body; though my body still continued to sway as a pendulum will, long
nooo; nooooo no nooo noooo noooooooo no nooo no n nooooooo nooo, nooo

after the power which first moved it is withdrawn.
noooo noo noooo noooo noooo noooo no no noooooooo.




Ere forgetfulness altogether came over me, I had noticed that the seamen
Noo noooooooooooo nooooooooo nooo nooo no, N noo noooooo nooo noo nooooo

at the main and mizzen-mast-heads were already drowsy. So that at last
no noo nooo noo nooooo-nooo-noooo nooo noooooo nooooo. No nooo no nooo

all three of us lifelessly swung from the spars, and for every swing
noo noooo no no nooooooooo noooo nooo noo noooo, noo noo noooo noooo

that we made there was a nod from below from the slumbering helmsman.
nooo no nooo noooo noo n noo nooo noooo nooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo.

The waves, too, nodded their indolent crests; and across the wide trance
Noo noooo, noo, nooooo noooo nooooooo nooooo; noo nooooo noo nooo nooooo

of the sea, east nodded to west, and the sun over all.
no noo noo, nooo nooooo no nooo, noo noo noo nooo noo.




Suddenly bubbles seemed bursting beneath my closed eyes; like vices my
Nooooooo noooooo nooooo nooooooo noooooo no nooooo nooo; nooo noooo no

hands grasped the shrouds; some invisible, gracious agency preserved me;
noooo noooooo noo noooooo; nooo noooooooo, nooooooo nooooo noooooooo no;

with a shock I came back to life. And lo! close under our lee, not forty
nooo n noooo N nooo nooo no nooo. Noo no! noooo noooo noo noo, noo noooo

fathoms off, a gigantic Sperm Whale lay rolling in the water like the
noooooo noo, n nooooooo Noooo Noooo noo noooooo no noo noooo nooo noo

capsized hull of a frigate, his broad, glossy back, of an Ethiopian hue,
nooooooo nooo no n noooooo, noo noooo, nooooo nooo, no no Noooooooo noo,

glistening in the sun's rays like a mirror. But lazily undulating in
nooooooooo no noo noo'n nooo nooo n nooooo. Noo nooooo nooooooooo no

the trough of the sea, and ever and anon tranquilly spouting his vapoury
noo nooooo no noo noo, noo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo

jet, the whale looked like a portly burgher smoking his pipe of a warm
noo, noo noooo nooooo nooo n nooooo noooooo noooooo noo nooo no n nooo

afternoon. But that pipe, poor whale, was thy last. As if struck by some
noooooooo. Noo nooo nooo, nooo noooo, noo noo nooo. No no nooooo no nooo

enchanter's wand, the sleepy ship and every sleeper in it all at once
noooooooo'n nooo, noo nooooo nooo noo noooo noooooo no no noo no nooo

started into wakefulness; and more than a score of voices from all parts
noooooo nooo noooooooooo; noo nooo nooo n noooo no nooooo nooo noo noooo

of the vessel, simultaneously with the three notes from aloft, shouted
no noo nooooo, nooooooooooooo nooo noo noooo noooo nooo noooo, noooooo

forth the accustomed cry, as the great fish slowly and regularly spouted
noooo noo nooooooooo noo, no noo noooo nooo nooooo noo noooooooo noooooo

the sparkling brine into the air.
noo noooooooo noooo nooo noo noo.




"Clear away the boats! Luff!" cried Ahab. And obeying his own order, he
"Noooo nooo noo noooo! Nooo!" noooo Nooo. Noo noooooo noo noo noooo, no

dashed the helm down before the helmsman could handle the spokes.
nooooo noo nooo nooo nooooo noo nooooooo noooo nooooo noo nooooo.




The sudden exclamations of the crew must have alarmed the whale; and ere
Noo nooooo nooooooooooo no noo nooo nooo nooo noooooo noo noooo; noo noo

the boats were down, majestically turning, he swam away to the leeward,
noo noooo nooo nooo, nooooooooooo noooooo, no nooo nooo no noo noooooo,

but with such a steady tranquillity, and making so few ripples as he
noo nooo nooo n nooooo nooooooooooo, noo nooooo no noo noooooo no no

nooo, nooo nooooooo noooo noo no noooo noo no noo no noooooo, Nooo nooo

nooooo nooo noo no noo nooooo no nooo, noo no noo nooo noooo noo no

nooooooo. No nooooo nooo Noooooo Noooooo no noo nooooooo no noo noooo,

no noooooo noo nooooooo noooooo noooo; noo nooo noo noooooooo no noo

noooooooo noooo noooo noo. Noooooooo, no no nooo nooooo no noooo, noo

monster perpendicularly flitted his tail forty feet into the air, and
noooooo noooooooooooooo noooooo noo nooo noooo nooo nooo noo noo, noo

then sank out of sight like a tower swallowed up.
nooo nooo noo no noooo nooo n noooo noooooooo no.




"There go flukes!" was the cry, an announcement immediately followed by
"Noooo no nooooo!" noo noo noo, no nooooooooooo noooooooooo nooooooo no

Stubb's producing his match and igniting his pipe, for now a respite was
Noooo'n noooooooo noo noooo noo nooooooo noo nooo, noo noo n noooooo noo

granted. After the full interval of his sounding had elapsed, the whale
noooooo. Noooo noo nooo nooooooo no noo nooooooo noo noooooo, noo noooo

nooo noooo, noo noooo noo no noooooo no noo nooooo'n nooo, noo nooo

nearer to it than to any of the others, Stubb counted upon the honour
nooooo no no nooo no noo no noo nooooo, Noooo noooooo nooo noo nooooo

of the capture. It was obvious, now, that the whale had at length become
no noo noooooo. No noo noooooo, noo, nooo noo noooo noo no nooooo nooooo

noooo no noo nooooooo. Noo noooooo no nooooooooooo noo noooooooo no

nooooo no noo. Noooooo nooo noooooo, noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo. Noo

still puffing at his pipe, Stubb cheered on his crew to the assault.
noooo noooooo no noo nooo, Noooo noooooo no noo nooo no noo noooooo.




Yes, a mighty change had come over the fish. All alive to his jeopardy,
Noo, n nooooo nooooo noo nooo nooo noo nooo. Noo noooo no noo nooooooo,

he was going "head out"; that part obliquely projecting from the mad
no noo noooo "nooo noo"; nooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooo nooo noo noo

yeast which he brewed.*
noooo noooo no nooooo.*







*It will be seen in some other place of what a very light substance
*No nooo no nooo no nooo noooo noooo no nooo n nooo noooo noooooooo

the entire interior of the sperm whale's enormous head consists. Though
noo nooooo nooooooo no noo noooo noooo'n nooooooo nooo nooooooo. Nooooo

apparently the most massive, it is by far the most buoyant part about
nooooooooo noo nooo noooooo, no no no noo noo nooo noooooo nooo noooo

noo. No nooo nooo nooo no nooooooo no no noo noo, noo nooooooooo nooo

so when going at his utmost speed. Besides, such is the breadth of the
no nooo noooo no noo nooooo noooo. Noooooo, nooo no noo noooooo no noo

noooo nooo no noo noooo no noo nooo, noo nooo noo nooooooo noo-noooo

noooooooo no noo noooo nooo, nooo no noooooooo noooooooo noo nooo, no

thereby may be said to transform himself from a bluff-bowed sluggish
noooooo noo no nooo no noooooooo noooooo nooo n noooo-noooo nooooooo

galliot into a sharppointed New York pilot-boat.
noooooo nooo n nooooooooooo Noo Nooo noooo-nooo.

*Partly to show the indispensableness of this act, it may here be

From the vibrating line extending the entire length of the upper part of
Nooo noo noooooooo nooo noooooooo noo nooooo nooooo no noo noooo nooo no

N noooooooo noooooo nooooo no noo nooo; n noooooooo nooooooo nooo no

noo nooooo.




"Haul in--haul in!" cried Stubb to the bowsman! and, facing round

towards the whale, all hands began pulling the boat up to him, while yet
noooooo noo noooo, noo noooo noooo noooooo noo nooo no no noo, noooo noo

noo no noo noo no noo noooo'n nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo noooooo no noo

noooooo noooo.




The red tide now poured from all sides of the monster like brooks down a
Noo noo nooo noo nooooo nooo noo noooo no noo noooooo nooo nooooo nooo n

hill. His tormented body rolled not in brine but in blood, which bubbled
nooo. Noo noooooooo nooo nooooo noo no noooo noo no noooo, noooo noooooo

and seethed for furlongs behind in their wake. The slanting sun playing
noo noooooo noo nooooooo nooooo no noooo nooo. Noo nooooooo noo noooooo

nooo nooo noooooo nooo no noo noo, nooo nooo noo nooooooooo nooo noooo

nooo, no nooo nooo noo nooooo no nooo noooo nooo noo noo. Noo noo

the while, jet after jet of white smoke was agonizingly shot from the
noo noooo, noo noooo noo no noooo noooo noo noooooooooo nooo nooo noo

spiracle of the whale, and vehement puff after puff from the mouth of
nooooooo no noo noooo, noo nooooooo nooo noooo nooo nooo noo noooo no

the excited headsman; as at every dart, hauling in upon his crooked
noo noooooo nooooooo; no no noooo nooo, noooooo no nooo noo noooooo

noooo (no noo nooo nooooooo no no), Noooo nooooooooooo no noooo noo

noooo, no n noo noooo noooo noooooo noo noooooo, nooo noooo noo noooo

nooo no nooo noo noooo.




"Pull up--pull up!" he now cried to the bowsman, as the waning whale
"Nooo no--nooo no!" no noo noooo no noo noooooo, no noo nooooo noooo

relaxed in his wrath. "Pull up!--close to!" and the boat ranged along
noooooo no noo noooo. "Nooo no!--noooo no!" noo noo nooo nooooo noooo

the fish's flank. When reaching far over the bow, Stubb slowly churned
noo nooo'n noooo. Nooo nooooooo noo nooo noo noo, Noooo nooooo noooooo

his long sharp lance into the fish, and kept it there, carefully
noo nooo noooo noooo nooo noo nooo, noo nooo no noooo, noooooooo

noooo nooo noo noooo noooo nooo noooooooo, noo noooo no noo noooooo no

nooooooo noo no noooo nooo no noo. Noo nooo nooo noooo no nooooo noo noo

noooooooo nooo no noo nooo. Noo noo no no nooooo; noo, nooooooo nooo

his trance into that unspeakable thing called his "flurry," the monster
noo nooooo nooo nooo noooooooooo noooo nooooo noo "nooooo," noo noooooo

nooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo, noooooooooo noooooo no nooooooooooo,

noo, noooooo noooo, no nooo noo nooooooooo noooo, noooooooo nooooooo

astern, had much ado blindly to struggle out from that phrensied
nooooo, noo nooo noo noooooo no nooooooo noo nooo nooo noooooooo

twilight into the clear air of the day.
nooooooo nooo noo noooo noo no noo noo.




And now abating in his flurry, the whale once more rolled out into view;
Noo noo noooooo no noo nooooo, noo noooo nooo nooo nooooo noo nooo nooo;

surging from side to side; spasmodically dilating and contracting his
noooooo nooo nooo no nooo; noooooooooooo nooooooo noo noooooooooo noo

noooo-nooo, nooo noooo, nooooooo, nooooooo nooooooooooo. No nooo, nooo

noooo nooo no noooooo noo nooo, no no no noo nooo noo nooooo nooo no noo

nooo, nooo nooo noo nooooooo noo; noo noooooo nooo noooo, noo nooooooo

nooo noo nooooooooo nooooo nooo noo noo. Noo noooo noo noooo!

"No'n nooo, No. Noooo," nooo Nooooo.

CHAPTER 62. The Dart.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo.







A word concerning an incident in the last chapter.
N nooo nooooooooo no nooooooo no noo nooo noooooo.




According to the invariable usage of the fishery, the whale-boat pushes
Noooooooo no noo nooooooooo noooo no noo noooooo, noo noooo-nooo nooooo

off from the ship, with the headsman or whale-killer as temporary
noo nooo noo nooo, nooo noo nooooooo no noooo-nooooo no noooooooo

steersman, and the harpooneer or whale-fastener pulling the foremost
noooooooo, noo noo nooooooooo no noooo-nooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo

oar, the one known as the harpooneer-oar. Now it needs a strong, nervous
noo, noo noo noooo no noo nooooooooo-noo. Noo no noooo n nooooo, noooooo

arm to strike the first iron into the fish; for often, in what is called
noo no nooooo noo noooo nooo nooo noo nooo; noo noooo, no nooo no nooooo

a long dart, the heavy implement has to be flung to the distance of
n nooo nooo, noo noooo noooooooo noo no no noooo no noo nooooooo no

twenty or thirty feet. But however prolonged and exhausting the chase,
nooooo no nooooo nooo. Noo noooooo noooooooo noo nooooooooo noo noooo,

the harpooneer is expected to pull his oar meanwhile to the uttermost;
noo nooooooooo no nooooooo no nooo noo noo noooooooo no noo noooooooo;

indeed, he is expected to set an example of superhuman activity to the
nooooo, no no nooooooo no noo no noooooo no nooooooooo nooooooo no noo

rest, not only by incredible rowing, but by repeated loud and intrepid
nooo, noo nooo no nooooooooo nooooo, noo no nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo

exclamations; and what it is to keep shouting at the top of one's
nooooooooooo; noo nooo no no no nooo nooooooo no noo noo no noo'n

compass, while all the other muscles are strained and half started--what
noooooo, noooo noo noo noooo noooooo noo nooooooo noo nooo noooooo--nooo

that is none know but those who have tried it. For one, I cannot bawl
nooo no nooo nooo noo noooo noo nooo noooo no. Noo noo, N nooooo nooo

very heartily and work very recklessly at one and the same time. In this
nooo nooooooo noo nooo nooo nooooooooo no noo noo noo nooo nooo. No nooo

straining, bawling state, then, with his back to the fish, all at once
noooooooo, noooooo noooo, nooo, nooo noo nooo no noo nooo, noo no nooo

the exhausted harpooneer hears the exciting cry--"Stand up, and give it
noo noooooooo nooooooooo noooo noo nooooooo noo--"Noooo no, noo nooo no

to him!" He now has to drop and secure his oar, turn round on his
no noo!" No noo noo no nooo noo nooooo noo noo, nooo noooo no noo

centre half way, seize his harpoon from the crotch, and with what little
nooooo nooo noo, noooo noo noooooo nooo noo nooooo, noo nooo nooo nooooo

strength may remain, he essays to pitch it somehow into the whale. No
nooooooo noo nooooo, no nooooo no noooo no noooooo nooo noo noooo. No

wonder, taking the whole fleet of whalemen in a body, that out of fifty
nooooo, nooooo noo noooo noooo no nooooooo no n nooo, nooo noo no noooo

fair chances for a dart, not five are successful; no wonder that so many
nooo noooooo noo n nooo, noo nooo noo nooooooooo; no nooooo nooo no nooo

hapless harpooneers are madly cursed and disrated; no wonder that some
noooooo noooooooooo noo noooo nooooo noo nooooooo; no nooooo nooo nooo

of them actually burst their blood-vessels in the boat; no wonder that
no nooo nooooooo noooo noooo noooo-noooooo no noo nooo; no nooooo nooo

some sperm whalemen are absent four years with four barrels; no wonder
nooo noooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo noooo nooo nooo noooooo; no nooooo

that to many ship owners, whaling is but a losing concern; for it is the
nooo no nooo nooo nooooo, noooooo no noo n nooooo noooooo; noo no no noo

harpooneer that makes the voyage, and if you take the breath out of his
nooooooooo nooo noooo noo nooooo, noo no noo nooo noo nooooo noo no noo

body how can you expect to find it there when most wanted!
nooo noo noo noo nooooo no nooo no noooo nooo nooo nooooo!




Again, if the dart be successful, then at the second critical instant,
Noooo, no noo nooo no nooooooooo, nooo no noo nooooo nooooooo noooooo,

that is, when the whale starts to run, the boatheader and harpooneer
nooo no, nooo noo noooo nooooo no noo, noo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo

likewise start to running fore and aft, to the imminent jeopardy of
nooooooo noooo no noooooo nooo noo noo, no noo nooooooo nooooooo no

themselves and every one else. It is then they change places; and
nooooooooo noo noooo noo nooo. No no nooo nooo nooooo nooooo; noo

the headsman, the chief officer of the little craft, takes his proper
noo nooooooo, noo noooo noooooo no noo nooooo noooo, noooo noo nooooo

station in the bows of the boat.
noooooo no noo nooo no noo nooo.




Now, I care not who maintains the contrary, but all this is both foolish
Noo, N nooo noo noo noooooooo noo nooooooo, noo noo nooo no nooo noooooo

and unnecessary. The headsman should stay in the bows from first to
noo noooooooooo. Noo nooooooo nooooo nooo no noo nooo nooo noooo no

last; he should both dart the harpoon and the lance, and no rowing
nooo; no nooooo nooo nooo noo noooooo noo noo noooo, noo no nooooo

whatever should be expected of him, except under circumstances obvious
nooooooo nooooo no nooooooo no noo, nooooo noooo noooooooooooo noooooo

to any fisherman. I know that this would sometimes involve a slight loss
no noo noooooooo. N nooo nooo nooo noooo noooooooo noooooo n nooooo nooo

of speed in the chase; but long experience in various whalemen of more
no noooo no noo noooo; noo nooo nooooooooo no noooooo nooooooo no nooo

than one nation has convinced me that in the vast majority of failures
nooo noo nooooo noo noooooooo no nooo no noo nooo nooooooo no nooooooo

in the fishery, it has not by any means been so much the speed of the
no noo noooooo, no noo noo no noo noooo nooo no nooo noo noooo no noo

whale as the before described exhaustion of the harpooneer that has
noooo no noo nooooo noooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo noo

caused them.
nooooo nooo.




To insure the greatest efficiency in the dart, the harpooneers of this
No nooooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooo, noo noooooooooo no nooo

world must start to their feet from out of idleness, and not from out of
noooo nooo noooo no noooo nooo nooo noo no nooooooo, noo noo nooo noo no

toil.
nooo.










CHAPTER 63. The Crotch.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooo.







Out of the trunk, the branches grow; out of them, the twigs. So, in
Noo no noo noooo, noo nooooooo nooo; noo no nooo, noo noooo. No, no

productive subjects, grow the chapters.
nooooooooo nooooooo, nooo noo nooooooo.




The crotch alluded to on a previous page deserves independent mention.
Noo nooooo noooooo no no n nooooooo nooo nooooooo noooooooooo noooooo.

It is a notched stick of a peculiar form, some two feet in length, which
No no n noooooo noooo no n nooooooo nooo, nooo noo nooo no nooooo, noooo

is perpendicularly inserted into the starboard gunwale near the bow,
no noooooooooooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooo noo noo,

for the purpose of furnishing a rest for the wooden extremity of the
noo noo noooooo no nooooooooo n nooo noo noo nooooo noooooooo no noo

harpoon, whose other naked, barbed end slopingly projects from the prow.
noooooo, noooo noooo noooo, nooooo noo noooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo.

Thereby the weapon is instantly at hand to its hurler, who snatches it
Noooooo noo nooooo no noooooooo no nooo no noo nooooo, noo nooooooo no

up as readily from its rest as a backwoodsman swings his rifle from
no no noooooo nooo noo nooo no n nooooooooooo nooooo noo noooo nooo

the wall. It is customary to have two harpoons reposing in the crotch,
noo nooo. No no noooooooo no nooo noo nooooooo nooooooo no noo nooooo,

respectively called the first and second irons.
nooooooooooo nooooo noo noooo noo nooooo noooo.




But these two harpoons, each by its own cord, are both connected with
Noo noooo noo nooooooo, nooo no noo noo nooo, noo nooo noooooooo nooo

the line; the object being this: to dart them both, if possible, one
noo nooo; noo nooooo noooo nooo: no nooo nooo nooo, no nooooooo, noo

instantly after the other into the same whale; so that if, in the coming
noooooooo noooo noo noooo nooo noo nooo noooo; no nooo no, no noo nooooo

drag, one should draw out, the other may still retain a hold. It is a
nooo, noo nooooo nooo noo, noo noooo noo noooo nooooo n nooo. No no n

doubling of the chances. But it very often happens that owing to the
nooooooo no noo noooooo. Noo no nooo noooo noooooo nooo noooo no noo

instantaneous, violent, convulsive running of the whale upon receiving
noooooooooooo, noooooo, nooooooooo noooooo no noo noooo nooo noooooooo

the first iron, it becomes impossible for the harpooneer, however
noo noooo nooo, no noooooo nooooooooo noo noo nooooooooo, noooooo

lightning-like in his movements, to pitch the second iron into him.
noooooooo-nooo no noo noooooooo, no noooo noo nooooo nooo nooo noo.

Nevertheless, as the second iron is already connected with the line,
Nooooooooooo, no noo nooooo nooo no noooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooo,

and the line is running, hence that weapon must, at all events, be
noo noo nooo no noooooo, noooo nooo nooooo nooo, no noo nooooo, no

anticipatingly tossed out of the boat, somehow and somewhere; else the
nooooooooooooo nooooo noo no noo nooo, noooooo noo noooooooo; nooo noo

most terrible jeopardy would involve all hands. Tumbled into the water,
nooo nooooooo nooooooo noooo noooooo noo noooo. Noooooo nooo noo noooo,

it accordingly is in such cases; the spare coils of box line (mentioned
no noooooooooo no no nooo noooo; noo noooo noooo no noo nooo (noooooooo

in a preceding chapter) making this feat, in most instances, prudently
no n noooooooo noooooo) nooooo nooo nooo, no nooo noooooooo, noooooooo

practicable. But this critical act is not always unattended with the
noooooooooo. Noo nooo nooooooo noo no noo nooooo nooooooooo nooo noo

saddest and most fatal casualties.
noooooo noo nooo noooo nooooooooo.




Furthermore: you must know that when the second iron is thrown
Noooooooooo: noo nooo nooo nooo nooo noo nooooo nooo no nooooo

overboard, it thenceforth becomes a dangling, sharp-edged terror,
noooooooo, no noooooooooo noooooo n nooooooo, noooo-noooo nooooo,

skittishly curvetting about both boat and whale, entangling the lines,
nooooooooo nooooooooo noooo nooo nooo noo noooo, nooooooooo noo noooo,

or cutting them, and making a prodigious sensation in all directions.
no noooooo nooo, noo nooooo n nooooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooooooo.

Nor, in general, is it possible to secure it again until the whale is
Noo, no noooooo, no no nooooooo no nooooo no noooo noooo noo noooo no

fairly captured and a corpse.
nooooo nooooooo noo n nooooo.




Consider, now, how it must be in the case of four boats all engaging
Nooooooo, noo, noo no nooo no no noo nooo no nooo noooo noo nooooooo

one unusually strong, active, and knowing whale; when owing to these
noo noooooooo nooooo, nooooo, noo noooooo noooo; nooo noooo no noooo

qualities in him, as well as to the thousand concurring accidents of
noooooooo no noo, no nooo no no noo nooooooo nooooooooo noooooooo no

such an audacious enterprise, eight or ten loose second irons may be
nooo no noooooooo nooooooooo, noooo no noo noooo nooooo noooo noo no

simultaneously dangling about him. For, of course, each boat is supplied
nooooooooooooo nooooooo noooo noo. Noo, no nooooo, nooo nooo no nooooooo

with several harpoons to bend on to the line should the first one
nooo noooooo nooooooo no nooo no no noo nooo nooooo noo noooo noo

be ineffectually darted without recovery. All these particulars are
no noooooooooooo nooooo noooooo nooooooo. Noo noooo noooooooooo noo

faithfully narrated here, as they will not fail to elucidate several
nooooooooo nooooooo nooo, no nooo nooo noo nooo no noooooooo noooooo

most important, however intricate passages, in scenes hereafter to be
nooo noooooooo, noooooo noooooooo nooooooo, no nooooo noooooooo no no

painted.
noooooo.










CHAPTER 64. Stubb's Supper.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo'n Nooooo.







Stubb's whale had been killed some distance from the ship. It was
Noooo'n noooo noo nooo nooooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo. No noo

a calm; so, forming a tandem of three boats, we commenced the slow
n nooo; no, noooooo n nooooo no noooo noooo, no noooooooo noo nooo

business of towing the trophy to the Pequod. And now, as we eighteen men
nooooooo no nooooo noo nooooo no noo Nooooo. Noo noo, no no nooooooo noo

with our thirty-six arms, and one hundred and eighty thumbs and fingers,
nooo noo nooooo-noo nooo, noo noo noooooo noo nooooo nooooo noo noooooo,

slowly toiled hour after hour upon that inert, sluggish corpse in the
nooooo nooooo nooo noooo nooo nooo nooo noooo, nooooooo nooooo no noo

sea; and it seemed hardly to budge at all, except at long intervals;
noo; noo no nooooo nooooo no noooo no noo, nooooo no nooo noooooooo;

good evidence was hereby furnished of the enormousness of the mass we
nooo nooooooo noo nooooo noooooooo no noo nooooooooooo no noo nooo no

moved. For, upon the great canal of Hang-Ho, or whatever they call
noooo. Noo, nooo noo noooo noooo no Nooo-No, no nooooooo nooo nooo

it, in China, four or five laborers on the foot-path will draw a bulky
no, no Noooo, nooo no nooo nooooooo no noo nooo-nooo nooo nooo n noooo

freighted junk at the rate of a mile an hour; but this grand argosy we
noooooooo nooo no noo nooo no n nooo no nooo; noo nooo noooo nooooo no

towed heavily forged along, as if laden with pig-lead in bulk.
noooo noooooo nooooo noooo, no no noooo nooo noo-nooo no nooo.




Darkness came on; but three lights up and down in the Pequod's
Nooooooo nooo no; noo noooo nooooo no noo nooo no noo Nooooo'n

main-rigging dimly guided our way; till drawing nearer we saw Ahab
nooo-noooooo noooo nooooo noo noo; nooo noooooo nooooo no noo Nooo

dropping one of several more lanterns over the bulwarks. Vacantly eyeing
nooooooo noo no noooooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo. Nooooooo nooooo

the heaving whale for a moment, he issued the usual orders for securing
noo noooooo noooo noo n nooooo, no nooooo noo noooo nooooo noo nooooooo

it for the night, and then handing his lantern to a seaman, went his way
no noo noo noooo, noo nooo noooooo noo noooooo no n nooooo, nooo noo noo

into the cabin, and did not come forward again until morning.
nooo noo noooo, noo noo noo nooo noooooo noooo noooo noooooo.




Though, in overseeing the pursuit of this whale, Captain Ahab had
Nooooo, no nooooooooo noo noooooo no nooo noooo, Noooooo Nooo noo

evinced his customary activity, to call it so; yet now that the creature
noooooo noo noooooooo nooooooo, no nooo no no; noo noo nooo noo nooooooo

was dead, some vague dissatisfaction, or impatience, or despair, seemed
noo nooo, nooo noooo noooooooooooooo, no nooooooooo, no noooooo, nooooo

working in him; as if the sight of that dead body reminded him that
noooooo no noo; no no noo noooo no nooo nooo nooo nooooooo noo nooo

Moby Dick was yet to be slain; and though a thousand other whales were
Nooo Nooo noo noo no no noooo; noo nooooo n nooooooo noooo nooooo nooo

brought to his ship, all that would not one jot advance his grand,
noooooo no noo nooo, noo nooo noooo noo noo noo noooooo noo noooo,

monomaniac object. Very soon you would have thought from the sound on
nooooooooo nooooo. Nooo nooo noo noooo nooo noooooo nooo noo noooo no

the Pequod's decks, that all hands were preparing to cast anchor in
noo Nooooo'n noooo, nooo noo noooo nooo noooooooo no nooo nooooo no

the deep; for heavy chains are being dragged along the deck, and thrust
noo nooo; noo noooo nooooo noo noooo noooooo noooo noo nooo, noo nooooo

rattling out of the port-holes. But by those clanking links, the vast
nooooooo noo no noo nooo-noooo. Noo no noooo nooooooo noooo, noo nooo

corpse itself, not the ship, is to be moored. Tied by the head to the
nooooo nooooo, noo noo nooo, no no no nooooo. Nooo no noo nooo no noo

stern, and by the tail to the bows, the whale now lies with its black
noooo, noo no noo nooo no noo nooo, noo noooo noo nooo nooo noo noooo

hull close to the vessel's and seen through the darkness of the night,
nooo noooo no noo nooooo'n noo nooo noooooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo,

which obscured the spars and rigging aloft, the two--ship and whale,
noooo nooooooo noo noooo noo noooooo noooo, noo noo--nooo noo noooo,

seemed yoked together like colossal bullocks, whereof one reclines while
nooooo noooo nooooooo nooo nooooooo nooooooo, noooooo noo nooooooo noooo

the other remains standing.*
noo noooo noooooo nooooooo.*







*A little item may as well be related here. The strongest and most
*N nooooo nooo noo no nooo no noooooo nooo. Noo noooooooo noo nooo

reliable hold which the ship has upon the whale when moored alongside,
nooooooo nooo noooo noo nooo noo nooo noo noooo nooo nooooo noooooooo,

is by the flukes or tail; and as from its greater density that part
no no noo nooooo no nooo; noo no nooo noo noooooo noooooo nooo nooo

is relatively heavier than any other (excepting the side-fins), its
no nooooooooo noooooo nooo noo noooo (noooooooo noo nooo-nooo), noo

flexibility even in death, causes it to sink low beneath the surface; so
noooooooooo nooo no noooo, nooooo no no nooo noo noooooo noo noooooo; no

that with the hand you cannot get at it from the boat, in order to
nooo nooo noo nooo noo nooooo noo no no nooo noo nooo, no noooo no

put the chain round it. But this difficulty is ingeniously overcome: a
noo noo noooo noooo no. Noo nooo nooooooooo no noooooooooo nooooooo: n

small, strong line is prepared with a wooden float at its outer end, and
noooo, nooooo nooo no nooooooo nooo n nooooo noooo no noo noooo noo, noo

a weight in its middle, while the other end is secured to the ship. By
n nooooo no noo nooooo, noooo noo noooo noo no noooooo no noo nooo. No

adroit management the wooden float is made to rise on the other side
nooooo nooooooooo noo nooooo noooo no nooo no nooo no noo noooo nooo

of the mass, so that now having girdled the whale, the chain is readily
no noo nooo, no nooo noo nooooo noooooo noo noooo, noo noooo no noooooo

made to follow suit; and being slipped along the body, is at last locked
nooo no nooooo nooo; noo noooo noooooo noooo noo nooo, no no nooo nooooo

fast round the smallest part of the tail, at the point of junction with
nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo no noo nooo, no noo noooo no nooooooo nooo

its broad flukes or lobes.
noo noooo nooooo no noooo.







If moody Ahab was now all quiescence, at least so far as could be known
No noooo Nooo noo noo noo nooooooooo, no noooo no noo no noooo no noooo

on deck, Stubb, his second mate, flushed with conquest, betrayed an
no nooo, Noooo, noo nooooo nooo, noooooo nooo nooooooo, nooooooo no

unusual but still good-natured excitement. Such an unwonted bustle was
noooooo noo noooo nooo-noooooo nooooooooo. Nooo no nooooooo nooooo noo

he in that the staid Starbuck, his official superior, quietly resigned
no no nooo noo noooo Nooooooo, noo nooooooo nooooooo, noooooo nooooooo

to him for the time the sole management of affairs. One small, helping
no noo noo noo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo no noooooo. Noo noooo, noooooo

cause of all this liveliness in Stubb, was soon made strangely manifest.
noooo no noo nooo nooooooooo no Noooo, noo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooooo.

Stubb was a high liver; he was somewhat intemperately fond of the whale
Noooo noo n nooo noooo; no noo nooooooo noooooooooooo nooo no noo noooo

as a flavorish thing to his palate.
no n noooooooo noooo no noo nooooo.




"A steak, a steak, ere I sleep! You, Daggoo! overboard you go, and cut
"N noooo, n noooo, noo N noooo! Noo, Nooooo! noooooooo noo no, noo noo

me one from his small!"
no noo nooo noo noooo!"




Here be it known, that though these wild fishermen do not, as a general
Nooo no no noooo, nooo nooooo noooo nooo noooooooo no noo, no n noooooo

thing, and according to the great military maxim, make the enemy defray
noooo, noo noooooooo no noo noooo nooooooo noooo, nooo noo noooo nooooo

the current expenses of the war (at least before realizing the proceeds
noo noooooo nooooooo no noo noo (no noooo nooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo

no noo nooooo), noo noo noo nooo noo nooo nooo no noooo Nooooooooooo

noo nooo n noooooo nooooo noo nooo nooooooooo nooo no noo Noooo Noooo

nooooooooo no Noooo; nooooooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo no noo nooo.




About midnight that steak was cut and cooked; and lighted by two
Noooo nooooooo nooo noooo noo noo noo nooooo; noo noooooo no noo

lanterns of sperm oil, Stubb stoutly stood up to his spermaceti supper
nooooooo no noooo noo, Noooo noooooo noooo no no noo nooooooooo nooooo

at the capstan-head, as if that capstan were a sideboard. Nor was Stubb
no noo noooooo-nooo, no no nooo noooooo nooo n noooooooo. Noo noo Noooo

the only banqueter on whale's flesh that night. Mingling their mumblings
noo nooo noooooooo no noooo'n noooo nooo noooo. Nooooooo noooo noooooooo

with his own mastications, thousands on thousands of sharks, swarming
nooo noo noo nooooooooooo, noooooooo no noooooooo no nooooo, nooooooo

noooo noo nooo noooooooo, nooooooooo noooooo no noo noooooo. Noo noo

sleepers below in their bunks were often startled by the sharp slapping
nooooooo noooo no noooo noooo nooo noooo nooooooo no noo noooo nooooooo

of their tails against the hull, within a few inches of the sleepers'
no noooo noooo noooooo noo nooo, nooooo n noo nooooo no noo nooooooo'

hearts. Peering over the side you could just see them (as before you
nooooo. Noooooo nooo noo nooo noo noooo nooo noo nooo (no nooooo noo

heard them) wallowing in the sullen, black waters, and turning over on
noooo nooo) noooooooo no noo nooooo, noooo nooooo, noo noooooo nooo no

their backs as they scooped out huge globular pieces of the whale of the
noooo noooo no nooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooo nooooo no noo noooo no noo

bigness of a human head. This particular feat of the shark seems all
noooooo no n noooo nooo. Nooo nooooooooo nooo no noo noooo noooo noo

but miraculous. How at such an apparently unassailable surface, they
noo nooooooooo. Noo no nooo no nooooooooo nooooooooooo noooooo, nooo

contrive to gouge out such symmetrical mouthfuls, remains a part of the
nooooooo no noooo noo nooo noooooooooo noooooooo, noooooo n nooo no noo

universal problem of all things. The mark they thus leave on the whale,
noooooooo noooooo no noo nooooo. Noo nooo nooo nooo noooo no noo noooo,

may best be likened to the hollow made by a carpenter in countersinking
noo nooo no noooooo no noo nooooo nooo no n noooooooo no nooooooooooooo

for a screw.
noo n noooo.




Though amid all the smoking horror and diabolism of a sea-fight, sharks
Nooooo nooo noo noo noooooo nooooo noo noooooooo no n noo-noooo, nooooo

will be seen longingly gazing up to the ship's decks, like hungry dogs
nooo no nooo noooooooo nooooo no no noo nooo'n noooo, nooo nooooo nooo

round a table where red meat is being carved, ready to bolt down
noooo n noooo noooo noo nooo no noooo nooooo, noooo no nooo nooo

noooo nooooo noo nooo no nooooo no nooo; noo nooooo, noooo noo noooooo

nooooooo nooo noo nooo-noooo noo nooo nooooooooo noooooo nooo noooo'n

nooo nooo nooo noooooo-nooooo noo nooooo noo noooooooo, noo nooooo,

also, with their jewel-hilted mouths, are quarrelsomely carving away
nooo, nooo noooo noooo-nooooo nooooo, noo noooooooooooo noooooo nooo

noooo noo noooo no noo nooo nooo; noo nooooo, nooo noo no nooo noo noooo

affair upside down, it would still be pretty much the same thing, that
nooooo nooooo nooo, no noooo noooo no nooooo nooo noo nooo noooo, nooo

is to say, a shocking sharkish business enough for all parties; and
no no noo, n nooooooo nooooooo nooooooo nooooo noo noo noooooo; noo

though sharks also are the invariable outriders of all slave ships
nooooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooooooooo noooooooo no noo noooo noooo

crossing the Atlantic, systematically trotting alongside, to be handy in
nooooooo noo Nooooooo, nooooooooooooo nooooooo noooooooo, no no noooo no

case a parcel is to be carried anywhere, or a dead slave to be decently
nooo n nooooo no no no noooooo nooooooo, no n nooo noooo no no nooooooo

buried; and though one or two other like instances might be set down,
nooooo; noo nooooo noo no noo noooo nooo noooooooo noooo no noo nooo,

touching the set terms, places, and occasions, when sharks do most
nooooooo noo noo noooo, nooooo, noo noooooooo, nooo nooooo no nooo

socially congregate, and most hilariously feast; yet is there no
nooooooo nooooooooo, noo nooo noooooooooo noooo; noo no noooo no

conceivable time or occasion when you will find them in such countless
noooooooooo nooo no nooooooo nooo noo nooo nooo nooo no nooo noooooooo

numbers, and in gayer or more jovial spirits, than around a dead sperm
noooooo, noo no noooo no nooo nooooo noooooo, nooo nooooo n nooo noooo

whale, moored by night to a whaleship at sea. If you have never
noooo, nooooo no noooo no n noooooooo no noo. No noo nooo noooo

seen that sight, then suspend your decision about the propriety of
nooo nooo noooo, nooo noooooo nooo nooooooo noooo noo noooooooo no

devil-worship, and the expediency of conciliating the devil.
noooo-noooooo, noo noo nooooooooo no nooooooooooo noo noooo.




But, as yet, Stubb heeded not the mumblings of the banquet that was
Noo, no noo, Noooo nooooo noo noo noooooooo no noo noooooo nooo noo

going on so nigh him, no more than the sharks heeded the smacking of his
noooo no no nooo noo, no nooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noo nooooooo no noo

own epicurean lips.
noo noooooooo nooo.




"Cook, cook!--where's that old Fleece?" he cried at length, widening
"Nooo, nooo!--noooo'n nooo noo Nooooo?" no noooo no nooooo, nooooooo

his legs still further, as if to form a more secure base for his supper;
noo nooo noooo noooooo, no no no nooo n nooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooooo;

and, at the same time darting his fork into the dish, as if stabbing
noo, no noo nooo nooo noooooo noo nooo nooo noo nooo, no no nooooooo

with his lance; "cook, you cook!--sail this way, cook!"
nooo noo noooo; "nooo, noo nooo!--nooo nooo noo, nooo!"




The old black, not in any very high glee at having been previously
Noo noo noooo, noo no noo nooo nooo nooo no nooooo nooo nooooooooo

roused from his warm hammock at a most unseasonable hour, came shambling
nooooo nooo noo nooo noooooo no n nooo nooooooooooo nooo, nooo noooooooo

noooo nooo noo nooooo, noo, nooo nooo noo nooooo, noooo noo noooooooo

noo noooo nooo; nooo noo Nooooo, no nooo nooooo noo, nooo noooooooo noo

noooooo noooo, noooooooo noo nooo nooo noo noooo, noooo, noooo n nooooo

fashion, were made of straightened iron hoops; this old Ebony floundered
noooooo, nooo nooo no nooooooooooo nooo noooo; nooo noo Noooo nooooooooo

noooo, noo no noooooooo no noo nooo no noooooo, nooo no n nooo nooo no

noo nooooooo nooo no Noooo'n noooooooo; nooo, nooo nooo noooo nooooo

noooo noooooo nooo, no noo nooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo noo nooo, no no

to bring his best ear into play.
no noooo noo nooo noo nooo nooo.




"Cook," said Stubb, rapidly lifting a rather reddish morsel to his

mouth, "don't you think this steak is rather overdone? You've been

noooooo nooo noooo noo nooo, nooo; no'n noo nooooo. Noo'n N nooooo noo

nooo no no nooo, n noooo-noooo nooo no noooo? Noooo noo noooo nooooo

noo nooo noo nooo, noo'n noo noo nooo nooooo no noooo noo nooo? Nooo n

shindy they are kicking up! Cook, go and talk to 'em; tell 'em they are
nooooo nooo noo noooooo no! Nooo, no noo nooo no 'no; nooo 'no nooo noo

welcome to help themselves civilly, and in moderation, but they must

nooo noooo. Noooo no, no N noo nooo no noo noooo. Nooo, nooo, noo

noooooo no noooooo. Nooo, nooo nooo noooooo," noooooooo noo nooo noo

noooooooo; "noo nooo, no noo nooooo no 'no!"

nooooo, noooooooo noo nooo noo nooo.

'no noooooooooo."

Nooo nooo noo nooooo noooooooo.

noo noooo; noo noo no nooo noooo noooooooo noo no noooo noooooo; no noo

CHAPTER 65. The Whale as a Dish.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo no n Nooo.







That mortal man should feed upon the creature that feeds his lamp, and,
Nooo nooooo noo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo noooo noo nooo, noo,

like Stubb, eat him by his own light, as you may say; this seems so
nooo Noooo, noo noo no noo noo noooo, no noo noo noo; nooo noooo no

outlandish a thing that one must needs go a little into the history and
nooooooooo n noooo nooo noo nooo noooo no n nooooo nooo noo noooooo noo

philosophy of it.
nooooooooo no no.




It is upon record, that three centuries ago the tongue of the Right
No no nooo nooooo, nooo noooo noooooooo noo noo nooooo no noo Noooo

Whale was esteemed a great delicacy in France, and commanded large
Noooo noo nooooooo n noooo nooooooo no Nooooo, noo noooooooo noooo

prices there. Also, that in Henry VIIIth's time, a certain cook of the
nooooo noooo. Nooo, nooo no Noooo NOOOoo'n nooo, n noooooo nooo no noo

court obtained a handsome reward for inventing an admirable sauce to be
noooo nooooooo n nooooooo nooooo noo noooooooo no noooooooo noooo no no

eaten with barbacued porpoises, which, you remember, are a species of
noooo nooo noooooooo noooooooo, noooo, noo nooooooo, noo n noooooo no

whale. Porpoises, indeed, are to this day considered fine eating. The
noooo. Noooooooo, nooooo, noo no nooo noo nooooooooo nooo nooooo. Noo

meat is made into balls about the size of billiard balls, and being well
nooo no nooo nooo noooo noooo noo nooo no nooooooo noooo, noo noooo nooo

seasoned and spiced might be taken for turtle-balls or veal balls.
nooooooo noo nooooo noooo no noooo noo nooooo-noooo no nooo noooo.

The old monks of Dunfermline were very fond of them. They had a great
Noo noo noooo no Noooooooooo nooo nooo nooo no nooo. Nooo noo n noooo

porpoise grant from the crown.
nooooooo noooo nooo noo noooo.




The fact is, that among his hunters at least, the whale would by all
Noo nooo no, nooo noooo noo noooooo no noooo, noo noooo noooo no noo

hands be considered a noble dish, were there not so much of him; but
noooo no nooooooooo n noooo nooo, nooo noooo noo no nooo no noo; noo

when you come to sit down before a meat-pie nearly one hundred feet
nooo noo nooo no noo nooo nooooo n nooo-noo nooooo noo noooooo nooo

long, it takes away your appetite. Only the most unprejudiced of men
nooo, no noooo nooo nooo nooooooo. Nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo no noo

like Stubb, nowadays partake of cooked whales; but the Esquimaux are not
nooo Noooo, nooooooo noooooo no nooooo nooooo; noo noo Noooooooo noo noo

so fastidious. We all know how they live upon whales, and have rare
no nooooooooo. No noo nooo noo nooo nooo nooo nooooo, noo nooo nooo

old vintages of prime old train oil. Zogranda, one of their most famous
noo nooooooo no noooo noo noooo noo. Nooooooo, noo no noooo nooo nooooo

doctors, recommends strips of blubber for infants, as being exceedingly
noooooo, nooooooooo nooooo no noooooo noo noooooo, no noooo noooooooooo

juicy and nourishing. And this reminds me that certain Englishmen, who
noooo noo nooooooooo. Noo nooo noooooo no nooo noooooo Nooooooooo, noo

long ago were accidentally left in Greenland by a whaling vessel--that
nooo noo nooo nooooooooooo nooo no Noooooooo no n noooooo nooooo--nooo

these men actually lived for several months on the mouldy scraps of
noooo noo nooooooo noooo noo noooooo nooooo no noo nooooo nooooo no

whales which had been left ashore after trying out the blubber. Among
nooooo noooo noo nooo nooo nooooo noooo nooooo noo noo noooooo. Noooo

the Dutch whalemen these scraps are called "fritters"; which, indeed,
noo Noooo nooooooo noooo nooooo noo nooooo "nooooooo"; noooo, nooooo,

they greatly resemble, being brown and crisp, and smelling something
nooo noooooo nooooooo, noooo noooo noo noooo, noo nooooooo noooooooo

like old Amsterdam housewives' dough-nuts or oly-cooks, when fresh. They
nooo noo Noooooooo nooooooooo' noooo-nooo no noo-noooo, nooo noooo. Nooo

have such an eatable look that the most self-denying stranger can hardly
nooo nooo no noooooo nooo nooo noo nooo nooo-noooooo nooooooo noo nooooo

keep his hands off.
nooo noo noooo noo.




But what further depreciates the whale as a civilized dish, is his
Noo nooo noooooo noooooooooo noo noooo no n noooooooo nooo, no noo

exceeding richness. He is the great prize ox of the sea, too fat to be
noooooooo nooooooo. No no noo noooo noooo no no noo noo, noo noo no no

delicately good. Look at his hump, which would be as fine eating as
nooooooooo nooo. Nooo no noo nooo, noooo noooo no no nooo nooooo no

the buffalo's (which is esteemed a rare dish), were it not such a solid
noo noooooo'n (noooo no nooooooo n nooo nooo), nooo no noo nooo n noooo

pyramid of fat. But the spermaceti itself, how bland and creamy that
noooooo no noo. Noo noo nooooooooo nooooo, noo noooo noo nooooo nooo

is; like the transparent, half-jellied, white meat of a cocoanut in the
no; nooo noo noooooooooo, nooo-noooooo, noooo nooo no n nooooooo no noo

third month of its growth, yet far too rich to supply a substitute for
noooo noooo no noo nooooo, noo noo noo nooo no nooooo n nooooooooo noo

butter. Nevertheless, many whalemen have a method of absorbing it into
nooooo. Nooooooooooo, nooo nooooooo nooo n nooooo no noooooooo no nooo

some other substance, and then partaking of it. In the long try
nooo noooo noooooooo, noo nooo noooooooo no no. No noo nooo noo

watches of the night it is a common thing for the seamen to dip their
noooooo no noo noooo no no n nooooo noooo noo noo nooooo no noo noooo

ship-biscuit into the huge oil-pots and let them fry there awhile. Many
nooo-noooooo nooo noo nooo noo-nooo noo noo nooo noo noooo nooooo. Nooo

a good supper have I thus made.
n nooo nooooo nooo N nooo nooo.




In the case of a small Sperm Whale the brains are accounted a fine dish.
No noo nooo no n noooo Noooo Noooo noo nooooo noo noooooooo n nooo nooo.

The casket of the skull is broken into with an axe, and the two plump,
Noo nooooo no noo noooo no nooooo nooo nooo no noo, noo noo noo noooo,

whitish lobes being withdrawn (precisely resembling two large puddings),
noooooo noooo noooo noooooooo (noooooooo nooooooooo noo noooo nooooooo),

they are then mixed with flour, and cooked into a most delectable mess,
nooo noo nooo noooo nooo noooo, noo nooooo nooo n nooo nooooooooo nooo,

in flavor somewhat resembling calves' head, which is quite a dish among
no nooooo nooooooo nooooooooo nooooo' nooo, noooo no noooo n nooo noooo

some epicures; and every one knows that some young bucks among the
nooo nooooooo; noo noooo noo noooo nooo nooo noooo noooo noooo noo

epicures, by continually dining upon calves' brains, by and by get to
nooooooo, no noooooooooo nooooo nooo nooooo' nooooo, no noo no noo no

have a little brains of their own, so as to be able to tell a
nooo n nooooo nooooo no noooo noo, no no no no nooo no nooo n

calf's head from their own heads; which, indeed, requires uncommon
nooo'n nooo nooo noooo noo noooo; noooo, nooooo, nooooooo nooooooo

discrimination. And that is the reason why a young buck with an
nooooooooooooo. Noo nooo no noo nooooo noo n noooo nooo nooo no

intelligent looking calf's head before him, is somehow one of the
noooooooooo noooooo nooo'n nooo nooooo noo, no noooooo noo no noo

saddest sights you can see. The head looks a sort of reproachfully at
noooooo nooooo noo noo noo. Noo nooo noooo n nooo no noooooooooooo no

him, with an "Et tu Brute!" expression.
noo, nooo no "No no Noooo!" nooooooooo.




It is not, perhaps, entirely because the whale is so excessively
No no noo, noooooo, nooooooo noooooo noo noooo no no noooooooooo

unctuous that landsmen seem to regard the eating of him with abhorrence;
nooooooo nooo nooooooo nooo no nooooo noo nooooo no noo nooo nooooooooo;

that appears to result, in some way, from the consideration before
nooo noooooo no nooooo, no nooo noo, nooo noo noooooooooooo nooooo

mentioned: i.e. that a man should eat a newly murdered thing of the sea,
noooooooo: n.n. nooo n noo nooooo noo n noooo nooooooo noooo no noo noo,

and eat it too by its own light. But no doubt the first man that ever
noo noo no noo no noo noo noooo. Noo no noooo noo noooo noo nooo nooo

murdered an ox was regarded as a murderer; perhaps he was hung; and if
nooooooo no no noo nooooooo no n nooooooo; noooooo no noo nooo; noo no

he had been put on his trial by oxen, he certainly would have been; and
no noo nooo noo no noo noooo no nooo, no noooooooo noooo nooo nooo; noo

he certainly deserved it if any murderer does. Go to the meat-market
no noooooooo nooooooo no no noo nooooooo nooo. No no noo nooo-nooooo

of a Saturday night and see the crowds of live bipeds staring up at the
no n Nooooooo noooo noo noo noo nooooo no nooo nooooo noooooo no no noo

long rows of dead quadrupeds. Does not that sight take a tooth out of
nooo nooo no nooo nooooooooo. Nooo noo nooo noooo nooo n noooo noo no

the cannibal's jaw? Cannibals? who is not a cannibal? I tell you it will
noo nooooooo'n noo? Noooooooo? noo no noo n nooooooo? N nooo noo no nooo

be more tolerable for the Fejee that salted down a lean missionary in
no nooo noooooooo noo noo Noooo nooo nooooo nooo n nooo nooooooooo no

his cellar against a coming famine; it will be more tolerable for that
noo nooooo noooooo n nooooo nooooo; no nooo no nooo noooooooo noo nooo

provident Fejee, I say, in the day of judgment, than for thee, civilized
noooooooo Noooo, N noo, no noo noo no nooooooo, nooo noo nooo, noooooooo

and enlightened gourmand, who nailest geese to the ground and feastest
noo noooooooooo nooooooo, noo noooooo noooo no noo nooooo noo nooooooo

on their bloated livers in thy pate-de-foie-gras.
no noooo noooooo nooooo no noo nooo-no-nooo-nooo.




But Stubb, he eats the whale by its own light, does he? and that is
Noo Noooo, no nooo noo noooo no noo noo noooo, nooo no? noo nooo no

adding insult to injury, is it? Look at your knife-handle, there, my
nooooo nooooo no nooooo, no no? Nooo no nooo noooo-nooooo, noooo, no

civilized and enlightened gourmand dining off that roast beef, what is
noooooooo noo noooooooooo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo noooo nooo, nooo no

nooo nooooo nooo no?--nooo noo noo noooo no noo noooooo no noo nooo no

you are eating? And what do you pick your teeth with, after devouring
noo noo nooooo? Noo nooo no noo nooo nooo noooo nooo, noooo noooooooo

that fat goose? With a feather of the same fowl. And with what quill did
nooo noo noooo? Nooo n noooooo no noo nooo nooo. Noo nooo nooo noooo noo

the Secretary of the Society for the Suppression of Cruelty to Ganders
noo Noooooooo no noo Noooooo noo noo Noooooooooo no Noooooo no Noooooo
