nooooooo nooooo noo noooooooo? No no nooo nooooo noo nooo noooo no noo

that that society passed a resolution to patronise nothing but steel
nooo nooo noooooo nooooo n nooooooooo no noooooooo noooooo noo noooo

pens.
nooo.










CHAPTER 66. The Shark Massacre.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo Nooooooo.







When in the Southern Fishery, a captured Sperm Whale, after long and
Nooo no noo Nooooooo Noooooo, n nooooooo Noooo Noooo, noooo nooo noo

weary toil, is brought alongside late at night, it is not, as a general
noooo nooo, no noooooo noooooooo nooo no noooo, no no noo, no n noooooo

thing at least, customary to proceed at once to the business of cutting
noooo no noooo, noooooooo no noooooo no nooo no noo nooooooo no noooooo

him in. For that business is an exceedingly laborious one; is not very
noo no. Noo nooo nooooooo no no noooooooooo noooooooo noo; no noo nooo

soon completed; and requires all hands to set about it. Therefore, the
nooo noooooooo; noo nooooooo noo noooo no noo noooo no. Noooooooo, noo

common usage is to take in all sail; lash the helm a'lee; and then send
nooooo noooo no no nooo no noo nooo; nooo noo nooo n'noo; noo nooo nooo

every one below to his hammock till daylight, with the reservation that,
noooo noo noooo no noo noooooo nooo nooooooo, nooo noo noooooooooo nooo,

until that time, anchor-watches shall be kept; that is, two and two for
noooo nooo nooo, nooooo-noooooo noooo no nooo; nooo no, noo noo noo noo

an hour, each couple, the crew in rotation shall mount the deck to see
no nooo, nooo nooooo, noo nooo no nooooooo noooo noooo noo nooo no noo

that all goes well.
nooo noo nooo nooo.




But sometimes, especially upon the Line in the Pacific, this plan will
Noo noooooooo, nooooooooo nooo noo Nooo no noo Noooooo, nooo nooo nooo

not answer at all; because such incalculable hosts of sharks gather
noo nooooo no noo; noooooo nooo nooooooooooo noooo no nooooo nooooo

round the moored carcase, that were he left so for six hours, say, on a
noooo noo nooooo noooooo, nooo nooo no nooo no noo noo noooo, noo, no n

stretch, little more than the skeleton would be visible by morning.
noooooo, nooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo noooo no noooooo no noooooo.

In most other parts of the ocean, however, where these fish do not so
No nooo noooo noooo no noo noooo, noooooo, noooo noooo nooo no noo no

largely abound, their wondrous voracity can be at times considerably
noooooo nooooo, noooo nooooooo nooooooo noo no no noooo nooooooooooo

diminished, by vigorously stirring them up with sharp whaling-spades,
nooooooooo, no nooooooooo nooooooo nooo no nooo noooo noooooo-nooooo,

a procedure notwithstanding, which, in some instances, only seems to
n noooooooo noooooooooooooo, noooo, no nooo noooooooo, nooo noooo no

tickle them into still greater activity. But it was not thus in the
nooooo nooo nooo noooo noooooo nooooooo. Noo no noo noo nooo no noo

present case with the Pequod's sharks; though, to be sure, any man
noooooo nooo nooo noo Nooooo'n nooooo; nooooo, no no nooo, noo noo

unaccustomed to such sights, to have looked over her side that night,
nooooooooooo no nooo nooooo, no nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo nooo noooo,

would have almost thought the whole round sea was one huge cheese, and
noooo nooo nooooo noooooo noo noooo noooo noo noo noo nooo nooooo, noo

those sharks the maggots in it.
noooo nooooo noo noooooo no no.




Nevertheless, upon Stubb setting the anchor-watch after his supper was
Nooooooooooo, nooo Noooo noooooo noo nooooo-noooo noooo noo nooooo noo

concluded; and when, accordingly, Queequeg and a forecastle seaman
noooooooo; noo nooo, noooooooooo, Nooooooo noo n nooooooooo nooooo

came on deck, no small excitement was created among the sharks; for
nooo no nooo, no noooo nooooooooo noo noooooo noooo noo nooooo; noo

immediately suspending the cutting stages over the side, and lowering
noooooooooo nooooooooo noo noooooo nooooo nooo noo nooo, noo nooooooo

three lanterns, so that they cast long gleams of light over the turbid
noooo nooooooo, no nooo nooo nooo nooo nooooo no noooo nooo noo nooooo

sea, these two mariners, darting their long whaling-spades, kept up an
noo, noooo noo nooooooo, noooooo noooo nooo noooooo-nooooo, nooo no no

incessant murdering of the sharks,* by striking the keen steel deep
noooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo,* no nooooooo noo nooo noooo nooo

into their skulls, seemingly their only vital part. But in the foamy
nooo noooo nooooo, noooooooo noooo nooo noooo nooo. Noo no noo noooo

confusion of their mixed and struggling hosts, the marksmen could not
noooooooo no noooo noooo noo nooooooooo noooo, noo nooooooo noooo noo

always hit their mark; and this brought about new revelations of the
nooooo noo noooo nooo; noo nooo noooooo noooo noo noooooooooo no noo

incredible ferocity of the foe. They viciously snapped, not only at each
nooooooooo nooooooo no noo noo. Nooo noooooooo noooooo, noo nooo no nooo

other's disembowelments, but like flexible bows, bent round, and bit
noooo'n noooooooooooooo, noo nooo nooooooo nooo, nooo noooo, noo noo

their own; till those entrails seemed swallowed over and over again by
noooo noo; nooo noooo nooooooo nooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooo noooo no

the same mouth, to be oppositely voided by the gaping wound. Nor was
noo nooo noooo, no no nooooooooo nooooo no noo nooooo noooo. Noo noo

this all. It was unsafe to meddle with the corpses and ghosts of these
nooo noo. No noo nooooo no nooooo nooo noo noooooo noo nooooo no noooo

creatures. A sort of generic or Pantheistic vitality seemed to lurk in
noooooooo. N nooo no noooooo no Noooooooooo nooooooo nooooo no nooo no

their very joints and bones, after what might be called the individual
noooo nooo nooooo noo noooo, noooo nooo noooo no nooooo noo nooooooooo

life had departed. Killed and hoisted on deck for the sake of his skin,
nooo noo nooooooo. Nooooo noo noooooo no nooo noo noo nooo no noo nooo,

one of these sharks almost took poor Queequeg's hand off, when he tried
noo no noooo nooooo nooooo nooo nooo Nooooooo'n nooo noo, nooo no noooo

to shut down the dead lid of his murderous jaw.
no nooo nooo noo nooo noo no noo noooooooo noo.







*The whaling-spade used for cutting-in is made of the very best steel;
*Noo noooooo-noooo nooo noo noooooo-no no nooo no noo nooo nooo noooo;

is about the bigness of a man's spread hand; and in general shape,
no noooo noo noooooo no n noo'n nooooo nooo; noo no noooooo noooo,

corresponds to the garden implement after which it is named; only its
noooooooooo no noo nooooo noooooooo noooo noooo no no noooo; nooo noo

sides are perfectly flat, and its upper end considerably narrower than
noooo noo noooooooo nooo, noo noo noooo noo nooooooooooo nooooooo nooo

the lower. This weapon is always kept as sharp as possible; and when
noo noooo. Nooo nooooo no nooooo nooo no noooo no nooooooo; noo nooo

being used is occasionally honed, just like a razor. In its socket, a
noooo nooo no nooooooooooo noooo, nooo nooo n noooo. No noo nooooo, n

stiff pole, from twenty to thirty feet long, is inserted for a handle.
noooo nooo, nooo nooooo no nooooo nooo nooo, no nooooooo noo n nooooo.







"Queequeg no care what god made him shark," said the savage, agonizingly
"Nooooooo no nooo nooo noo nooo noo noooo," nooo noo nooooo, noooooooooo

lifting his hand up and down; "wedder Fejee god or Nantucket god; but de
noooooo noo nooo no noo nooo; "nooooo Noooo noo no Noooooooo noo; noo no

god wat made shark must be one dam Ingin."
noo noo nooo noooo nooo no noo noo Noooo."










CHAPTER 67. Cutting In.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooo No.







It was a Saturday night, and such a Sabbath as followed! Ex officio
No noo n Nooooooo noooo, noo nooo n Noooooo no nooooooo! No noooooo

professors of Sabbath breaking are all whalemen. The ivory Pequod was
nooooooooo no Noooooo nooooooo noo noo nooooooo. Noo noooo Nooooo noo

turned into what seemed a shamble; every sailor a butcher. You would
nooooo nooo nooo nooooo n noooooo; noooo nooooo n noooooo. Noo noooo

have thought we were offering up ten thousand red oxen to the sea gods.
nooo noooooo no nooo nooooooo no noo nooooooo noo nooo no noo noo nooo.




In the first place, the enormous cutting tackles, among other ponderous
No noo noooo noooo, noo nooooooo noooooo noooooo, noooo noooo noooooooo

things comprising a cluster of blocks generally painted green, and which
nooooo nooooooooo n noooooo no nooooo noooooooo noooooo noooo, noo noooo

no single man can possibly lift--this vast bunch of grapes was swayed up
no nooooo noo noo nooooooo nooo--nooo nooo noooo no nooooo noo nooooo no

to the main-top and firmly lashed to the lower mast-head, the strongest
no noo nooo-noo noo nooooo nooooo no noo noooo nooo-nooo, noo noooooooo

point anywhere above a ship's deck. The end of the hawser-like rope
noooo nooooooo noooo n nooo'n nooo. Noo noo no noo nooooo-nooo nooo

winding through these intricacies, was then conducted to the windlass,
noooooo noooooo noooo noooooooooo, noo nooo noooooooo no noo nooooooo,

and the huge lower block of the tackles was swung over the whale; to
noo noo nooo noooo noooo no noo noooooo noo noooo nooo noo noooo; no

this block the great blubber hook, weighing some one hundred pounds, was
nooo noooo noo noooo noooooo nooo, nooooooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo, noo

attached. And now suspended in stages over the side, Starbuck and Stubb,
nooooooo. Noo noo noooooooo no nooooo nooo noo nooo, Nooooooo noo Noooo,

the mates, armed with their long spades, began cutting a hole in the
noo noooo, noooo nooo noooo nooo nooooo, noooo noooooo n nooo no noo

body for the insertion of the hook just above the nearest of the two
nooo noo noo noooooooo no noo nooo nooo noooo noo noooooo no noo noo

side-fins. This done, a broad, semicircular line is cut round the hole,
nooo-nooo. Nooo nooo, n noooo, nooooooooooo nooo no noo noooo noo nooo,

the hook is inserted, and the main body of the crew striking up a wild
noo nooo no nooooooo, noo noo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooooooo no n nooo

chorus, now commence heaving in one dense crowd at the windlass. When
nooooo, noo nooooooo noooooo no noo noooo noooo no noo nooooooo. Nooo

instantly, the entire ship careens over on her side; every bolt in
noooooooo, noo nooooo nooo noooooo nooo no noo nooo; noooo nooo no

her starts like the nail-heads of an old house in frosty weather; she
noo nooooo nooo noo nooo-noooo no no noo noooo no nooooo noooooo; noo

trembles, quivers, and nods her frighted mast-heads to the sky. More
nooooooo, noooooo, noo nooo noo nooooooo nooo-noooo no noo noo. Nooo

and more she leans over to the whale, while every gasping heave of the
noo nooo noo noooo nooo no noo noooo, noooo noooo noooooo noooo no noo

windlass is answered by a helping heave from the billows; till at last,
nooooooo no nooooooo no n noooooo noooo nooo noo noooooo; nooo no nooo,

a swift, startling snap is heard; with a great swash the ship rolls
n noooo, noooooooo nooo no noooo; nooo n noooo noooo noo nooo noooo

upwards and backwards from the whale, and the triumphant tackle rises
noooooo noo noooooooo nooo noo noooo, noo noo nooooooooo nooooo noooo

into sight dragging after it the disengaged semicircular end of the
nooo noooo nooooooo noooo no noo nooooooooo nooooooooooo noo no noo

first strip of blubber. Now as the blubber envelopes the whale precisely
noooo noooo no noooooo. Noo no noo noooooo noooooooo noo noooo noooooooo

as the rind does an orange, so is it stripped off from the body
no noo nooo nooo no nooooo, no no no nooooooo noo nooo noo nooo

precisely as an orange is sometimes stripped by spiralizing it. For the
noooooooo no no nooooo no noooooooo nooooooo no noooooooooo no. Noo noo

strain constantly kept up by the windlass continually keeps the whale
nooooo nooooooooo nooo no no noo nooooooo noooooooooo noooo noo noooo

rolling over and over in the water, and as the blubber in one strip
noooooo nooo noo nooo no noo noooo, noo no noo noooooo no noo noooo

uniformly peels off along the line called the "scarf," simultaneously
noooooooo noooo noo noooo noo nooo nooooo noo "noooo," nooooooooooooo

cut by the spades of Starbuck and Stubb, the mates; and just as fast as
noo no noo nooooo no Nooooooo noo Noooo, noo noooo; noo nooo no nooo no

it is thus peeled off, and indeed by that very act itself, it is all the
no no nooo nooooo noo, noo nooooo no nooo nooo noo nooooo, no no noo noo

time being hoisted higher and higher aloft till its upper end grazes the
nooo noooo noooooo nooooo noo nooooo noooo nooo noo noooo noo nooooo noo

main-top; the men at the windlass then cease heaving, and for a moment
nooo-noo; noo noo no noo nooooooo nooo noooo noooooo, noo noo n nooooo

or two the prodigious blood-dripping mass sways to and fro as if let
no noo noo nooooooooo noooo-nooooooo nooo noooo no noo noo no no noo

down from the sky, and every one present must take good heed to dodge
nooo nooo noo noo, noo noooo noo noooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo no noooo

it when it swings, else it may box his ears and pitch him headlong
no nooo no nooooo, nooo no noo noo noo nooo noo noooo noo nooooooo

overboard.
noooooooo.




One of the attending harpooneers now advances with a long, keen weapon
Noo no noo noooooooo noooooooooo noo nooooooo nooo n nooo, nooo nooooo

called a boarding-sword, and watching his chance he dexterously slices
nooooo n nooooooo-noooo, noo nooooooo noo nooooo no noooooooooo nooooo

out a considerable hole in the lower part of the swaying mass. Into this
noo n nooooooooooo nooo no noo noooo nooo no noo noooooo nooo. Nooo nooo

hole, the end of the second alternating great tackle is then hooked
nooo, noo noo no noo nooooo noooooooooo noooo nooooo no nooo nooooo

so as to retain a hold upon the blubber, in order to prepare for what
no no no nooooo n nooo nooo noo noooooo, no noooo no noooooo noo nooo

follows. Whereupon, this accomplished swordsman, warning all hands to
noooooo. Noooooooo, nooo nooooooooooo noooooooo, noooooo noo noooo no

stand off, once more makes a scientific dash at the mass, and with a few
noooo noo, nooo nooo noooo n nooooooooo nooo no noo nooo, noo nooo n noo

sidelong, desperate, lunging slicings, severs it completely in twain;
nooooooo, noooooooo, noooooo nooooooo, nooooo no nooooooooo no noooo;

so that while the short lower part is still fast, the long upper strip,
no nooo noooo noo noooo noooo nooo no noooo nooo, noo nooo noooo noooo,

called a blanket-piece, swings clear, and is all ready for lowering.
nooooo n noooooo-noooo, nooooo noooo, noo no noo noooo noo nooooooo.

The heavers forward now resume their song, and while the one tackle is
Noo noooooo noooooo noo nooooo noooo nooo, noo noooo noo noo nooooo no

peeling and hoisting a second strip from the whale, the other is slowly
noooooo noo nooooooo n nooooo noooo nooo noo noooo, noo noooo no nooooo

slackened away, and down goes the first strip through the main hatchway
noooooooo nooo, noo nooo nooo noo noooo noooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooo

right beneath, into an unfurnished parlor called the blubber-room. Into
noooo noooooo, nooo no noooooooooo nooooo nooooo noo noooooo-nooo. Nooo

this twilight apartment sundry nimble hands keep coiling away the long
nooo nooooooo noooooooo nooooo nooooo noooo nooo noooooo nooo noo nooo

blanket-piece as if it were a great live mass of plaited serpents.
noooooo-noooo no no no nooo n noooo nooo nooo no noooooo nooooooo.

And thus the work proceeds; the two tackles hoisting and lowering
Noo nooo noo nooo nooooooo; noo noo noooooo nooooooo noo nooooooo

simultaneously; both whale and windlass heaving, the heavers singing,
nooooooooooooo; nooo noooo noo nooooooo noooooo, noo noooooo noooooo,

the blubber-room gentlemen coiling, the mates scarfing, the ship
noo noooooo-nooo noooooooo noooooo, noo noooo nooooooo, noo nooo

straining, and all hands swearing occasionally, by way of assuaging the
noooooooo, noo noo noooo nooooooo nooooooooooo, no noo no noooooooo noo

general friction.
noooooo nooooooo.










CHAPTER 68. The Blanket.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooo.







I have given no small attention to that not unvexed subject, the skin of
N nooo noooo no noooo noooooooo no nooo noo noooooo noooooo, noo nooo no

the whale. I have had controversies about it with experienced whalemen
noo noooo. N nooo noo noooooooooooo noooo no nooo noooooooooo nooooooo

afloat, and learned naturalists ashore. My original opinion remains
nooooo, noo noooooo noooooooooo nooooo. No nooooooo noooooo noooooo

unchanged; but it is only an opinion.
noooooooo; noo no no nooo no noooooo.




The question is, what and where is the skin of the whale? Already you
Noo nooooooo no, nooo noo noooo no noo nooo no noo noooo? Noooooo noo

know what his blubber is. That blubber is something of the consistence
nooo nooo noo noooooo no. Nooo noooooo no noooooooo no noo noooooooooo

of firm, close-grained beef, but tougher, more elastic and compact, and
no nooo, noooo-noooooo nooo, noo noooooo, nooo noooooo noo noooooo, noo

ranges from eight or ten to twelve and fifteen inches in thickness.
nooooo nooo noooo no noo no nooooo noo noooooo nooooo no noooooooo.




Now, however preposterous it may at first seem to talk of any creature's
Noo, noooooo nooooooooooo no noo no noooo nooo no nooo no noo nooooooo'n

skin as being of that sort of consistence and thickness, yet in point
nooo no noooo no nooo nooo no noooooooooo noo noooooooo, noo no noooo

of fact these are no arguments against such a presumption; because you
no nooo noooo noo no noooooooo noooooo nooo n noooooooooo; noooooo noo

cannot raise any other dense enveloping layer from the whale's body but
nooooo noooo noo noooo noooo nooooooooo noooo nooo noo noooo'n nooo noo

that same blubber; and the outermost enveloping layer of any animal, if
nooo nooo noooooo; noo noo noooooooo nooooooooo noooo no noo nooooo, no

reasonably dense, what can that be but the skin? True, from the unmarred
nooooooooo noooo, nooo noo nooo no noo noo nooo? Nooo, nooo noo nooooooo

dead body of the whale, you may scrape off with your hand an infinitely
nooo nooo no noo noooo, noo noo nooooo noo nooo nooo nooo no nooooooooo

thin, transparent substance, somewhat resembling the thinnest shreds
nooo, noooooooooo noooooooo, nooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooo nooooo

of isinglass, only it is almost as flexible and soft as satin; that is,
no noooooooo, nooo no no nooooo no nooooooo noo nooo no noooo; nooo no,

previous to being dried, when it not only contracts and thickens, but
nooooooo no noooo noooo, nooo no noo nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo, noo

becomes rather hard and brittle. I have several such dried bits, which
noooooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo. N nooo noooooo nooo noooo nooo, noooo

I use for marks in my whale-books. It is transparent, as I said before;
N noo noo noooo no no noooo-noooo. No no noooooooooo, no N nooo nooooo;

and being laid upon the printed page, I have sometimes pleased myself
noo noooo nooo nooo noo noooooo nooo, N nooo noooooooo noooooo nooooo

with fancying it exerted a magnifying influence. At any rate, it is
nooo nooooooo no noooooo n nooooooooo noooooooo. No noo nooo, no no

pleasant to read about whales through their own spectacles, as you may
nooooooo no nooo noooo nooooo noooooo noooo noo nooooooooo, no noo noo

say. But what I am driving at here is this. That same infinitely thin,
noo. Noo nooo N no noooooo no nooo no nooo. Nooo nooo nooooooooo nooo,

isinglass substance, which, I admit, invests the entire body of the
noooooooo noooooooo, noooo, N noooo, noooooo noo nooooo nooo no noo

whale, is not so much to be regarded as the skin of the creature, as
noooo, no noo no nooo no no nooooooo no noo nooo no noo nooooooo, no

the skin of the skin, so to speak; for it were simply ridiculous to say,
noo nooo no noo nooo, no no noooo; noo no nooo nooooo nooooooooo no noo,

that the proper skin of the tremendous whale is thinner and more tender
nooo noo nooooo nooo no noo nooooooooo noooo no noooooo noo nooo nooooo

than the skin of a new-born child. But no more of this.
nooo noo nooo no n noo-nooo noooo. Noo no nooo no nooo.




Assuming the blubber to be the skin of the whale; then, when this skin,
Nooooooo noo noooooo no no noo nooo no noo noooo; nooo, nooo nooo nooo,

as in the case of a very large Sperm Whale, will yield the bulk of one
no no noo nooo no n nooo noooo Noooo Noooo, nooo noooo noo nooo no noo

hundred barrels of oil; and, when it is considered that, in quantity, or
noooooo noooooo no noo; noo, nooo no no nooooooooo nooo, no nooooooo, no

rather weight, that oil, in its expressed state, is only three fourths,
nooooo nooooo, nooo noo, no noo noooooooo noooo, no nooo noooo noooooo,

and not the entire substance of the coat; some idea may hence be had
noo noo noo nooooo noooooooo no noo nooo; nooo nooo noo noooo no noo

of the enormousness of that animated mass, a mere part of whose mere
no noo nooooooooooo no nooo nooooooo nooo, n nooo nooo no noooo nooo

integument yields such a lake of liquid as that. Reckoning ten barrels
nooooooooo nooooo nooo n nooo no nooooo no nooo. Noooooooo noo noooooo

to the ton, you have ten tons for the net weight of only three quarters
no noo noo, noo nooo noo nooo noo noo noo nooooo no nooo noooo nooooooo

of the stuff of the whale's skin.
no noo noooo no noo noooo'n nooo.




In life, the visible surface of the Sperm Whale is not the least among
No nooo, noo noooooo noooooo no noo Noooo Noooo no noo noo noooo noooo

the many marvels he presents. Almost invariably it is all over obliquely
noo nooo noooooo no nooooooo. Nooooo nooooooooo no no noo nooo noooooooo

crossed and re-crossed with numberless straight marks in thick array,
noooooo noo no-noooooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noooo no noooo noooo,

something like those in the finest Italian line engravings. But these
noooooooo nooo noooo no noo nooooo Noooooo nooo nooooooooo. Noo noooo

marks do not seem to be impressed upon the isinglass substance above
noooo no noo nooo no no noooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooooooo noooo

mentioned, but seem to be seen through it, as if they were engraved
noooooooo, noo nooo no no nooo noooooo no, no no nooo nooo nooooooo

upon the body itself. Nor is this all. In some instances, to the quick,
nooo noo nooo nooooo. Noo no nooo noo. No nooo noooooooo, no noo noooo,

observant eye, those linear marks, as in a veritable engraving, but
noooooooo noo, noooo nooooo noooo, no no n noooooooo noooooooo, noo

afford the ground for far other delineations. These are hieroglyphical;
nooooo noo nooooo noo noo noooo nooooooooooo. Noooo noo nooooooooooooo;

that is, if you call those mysterious cyphers on the walls of pyramids
nooo no, no noo nooo noooo nooooooooo noooooo no noo noooo no nooooooo

hieroglyphics, then that is the proper word to use in the present
noooooooooooo, nooo nooo no noo nooooo nooo no noo no noo noooooo

connexion. By my retentive memory of the hieroglyphics upon one Sperm
noooooooo. No no noooooooo nooooo no noo noooooooooooo nooo noo Noooo

Whale in particular, I was much struck with a plate representing the old
Noooo no nooooooooo, N noo nooo nooooo nooo n noooo nooooooooooo noo noo

Indian characters chiselled on the famous hieroglyphic palisades on
Nooooo nooooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo nooooooooooo noooooooo no

the banks of the Upper Mississippi. Like those mystic rocks, too, the
noo noooo no noo Noooo Noooooooooo. Nooo noooo nooooo noooo, noo, noo

mystic-marked whale remains undecipherable. This allusion to the Indian
nooooo-nooooo noooo noooooo nooooooooooooo. Nooo nooooooo no noo Nooooo

rocks reminds me of another thing. Besides all the other phenomena which
noooo noooooo no no noooooo noooo. Noooooo noo noo noooo noooooooo noooo

the exterior of the Sperm Whale presents, he not seldom displays the
noo nooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo nooooooo, no noo nooooo nooooooo noo

back, and more especially his flanks, effaced in great part of the
nooo, noo nooo nooooooooo noo nooooo, noooooo no noooo nooo no noo

regular linear appearance, by reason of numerous rude scratches,
noooooo nooooo nooooooooo, no nooooo no nooooooo nooo noooooooo,

altogether of an irregular, random aspect. I should say that those New
nooooooooo no no noooooooo, nooooo nooooo. N nooooo noo nooo noooo Noo

England rocks on the sea-coast, which Agassiz imagines to bear the marks
Noooooo noooo no noo noo-noooo, noooo Noooooo nooooooo no nooo noo noooo

of violent scraping contact with vast floating icebergs--I should say,
no noooooo nooooooo noooooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooooooo--N nooooo noo,

that those rocks must not a little resemble the Sperm Whale in this
nooo noooo noooo nooo noo n nooooo nooooooo noo Noooo Noooo no nooo

particular. It also seems to me that such scratches in the whale are
nooooooooo. No nooo noooo no no nooo nooo noooooooo no noo noooo noo

probably made by hostile contact with other whales; for I have most
nooooooo nooo no noooooo noooooo nooo noooo nooooo; noo N nooo nooo

remarked them in the large, full-grown bulls of the species.
nooooooo nooo no noo noooo, nooo-noooo noooo no noo noooooo.




A word or two more concerning this matter of the skin or blubber of
N nooo no noo nooo nooooooooo nooo nooooo no noo nooo no noooooo no

the whale. It has already been said, that it is stript from him in long
noo noooo. No noo noooooo nooo nooo, nooo no no nooooo nooo noo no nooo

pieces, called blanket-pieces. Like most sea-terms, this one is very
nooooo, nooooo noooooo-nooooo. Nooo nooo noo-noooo, nooo noo no nooo

happy and significant. For the whale is indeed wrapt up in his blubber
noooo noo noooooooooo. Noo noo noooo no nooooo noooo no no noo noooooo

as in a real blanket or counterpane; or, still better, an Indian poncho
no no n nooo noooooo no noooooooooo; no, noooo nooooo, no Nooooo nooooo

slipt over his head, and skirting his extremity. It is by reason of this
noooo nooo noo nooo, noo nooooooo noo noooooooo. No no no nooooo no nooo

cosy blanketing of his body, that the whale is enabled to keep himself
nooo nooooooooo no noo nooo, nooo noo noooo no noooooo no nooo noooooo

comfortable in all weathers, in all seas, times, and tides. What would
noooooooooo no noo nooooooo, no noo nooo, noooo, noo noooo. Nooo noooo

become of a Greenland whale, say, in those shuddering, icy seas of the
nooooo no n Noooooooo noooo, noo, no noooo nooooooooo, noo nooo no noo

North, if unsupplied with his cosy surtout? True, other fish are
Noooo, no nooooooooo nooo noo nooo noooooo? Nooo, noooo nooo noo

found exceedingly brisk in those Hyperborean waters; but these, be it
noooo noooooooooo noooo no noooo Noooooooooo nooooo; noo noooo, no no

observed, are your cold-blooded, lungless fish, whose very bellies
nooooooo, noo nooo nooo-noooooo, nooooooo nooo, noooo nooo noooooo

are refrigerators; creatures, that warm themselves under the lee of
noo noooooooooooo; noooooooo, nooo nooo nooooooooo noooo noo noo no

an iceberg, as a traveller in winter would bask before an inn fire;
no noooooo, no n noooooooo no nooooo noooo nooo nooooo no noo nooo;

whereas, like man, the whale has lungs and warm blood. Freeze his blood,
noooooo, nooo noo, noo noooo noo noooo noo nooo noooo. Nooooo noo noooo,

and he dies. How wonderful is it then--except after explanation--that
noo no nooo. Noo noooooooo no no nooo--nooooo noooo noooooooooo--nooo

this great monster, to whom corporeal warmth is as indispensable as it
nooo noooo noooooo, no nooo noooooooo nooooo no no noooooooooooo no no

is to man; how wonderful that he should be found at home, immersed
no no noo; noo noooooooo nooo no nooooo no noooo no nooo, nooooooo

to his lips for life in those Arctic waters! where, when seamen fall
no noo nooo noo nooo no noooo Nooooo nooooo! noooo, nooo nooooo nooo

overboard, they are sometimes found, months afterwards, perpendicularly
noooooooo, nooo noo noooooooo noooo, nooooo nooooooooo, noooooooooooooo

frozen into the hearts of fields of ice, as a fly is found glued
nooooo nooo noo nooooo no nooooo no noo, no n noo no noooo noooo

in amber. But more surprising is it to know, as has been proved by
no noooo. Noo nooo nooooooooo no no no nooo, no noo nooo nooooo no

experiment, that the blood of a Polar whale is warmer than that of a
nooooooooo, nooo noo noooo no n Noooo noooo no nooooo nooo nooo no n

Borneo negro in summer.
Nooooo noooo no nooooo.




It does seem to me, that herein we see the rare virtue of a strong
No nooo nooo no no, nooo nooooo no noo noo nooo nooooo no n nooooo

individual vitality, and the rare virtue of thick walls, and the rare
nooooooooo nooooooo, noo noo nooo nooooo no noooo noooo, noo noo nooo

virtue of interior spaciousness. Oh, man! admire and model thyself after
nooooo no nooooooo nooooooooooo. No, noo! nooooo noo noooo noooooo noooo

the whale! Do thou, too, remain warm among ice. Do thou, too, live in
noo noooo! No nooo, noo, nooooo nooo noooo noo. No nooo, noo, nooo no

this world without being of it. Be cool at the equator; keep thy blood
nooo noooo noooooo noooo no no. No nooo no noo noooooo; nooo noo noooo

fluid at the Pole. Like the great dome of St. Peter's, and like the
noooo no noo Nooo. Nooo noo noooo nooo no No. Noooo'n, noo nooo noo

great whale, retain, O man! in all seasons a temperature of thine own.
noooo noooo, nooooo, N noo! no noo noooooo n noooooooooo no noooo noo.




But how easy and how hopeless to teach these fine things! Of erections,
Noo noo nooo noo noo nooooooo no noooo noooo nooo nooooo! No noooooooo,

how few are domed like St. Peter's! of creatures, how few vast as the
noo noo noo noooo nooo No. Noooo'n! no noooooooo, noo noo nooo no noo

whale!
noooo!










CHAPTER 69. The Funeral.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooo.







Haul in the chains! Let the carcase go astern!
Nooo no noo nooooo! Noo noo noooooo no nooooo!




The vast tackles have now done their duty. The peeled white body of the
Noo nooo noooooo nooo noo nooo noooo nooo. Noo nooooo noooo nooo no noo

beheaded whale flashes like a marble sepulchre; though changed in hue,
nooooooo noooo noooooo nooo n nooooo noooooooo; nooooo noooooo no noo,

it has not perceptibly lost anything in bulk. It is still colossal.
no noo noo noooooooooo nooo nooooooo no nooo. No no noooo nooooooo.

Slowly it floats more and more away, the water round it torn and
Nooooo no nooooo nooo noo nooo nooo, noo noooo noooo no nooo noo

splashed by the insatiate sharks, and the air above vexed with rapacious
nooooooo no noo noooooooo nooooo, noo noo noo noooo noooo nooo noooooooo

flights of screaming fowls, whose beaks are like so many insulting
noooooo no noooooooo noooo, noooo noooo noo nooo no nooo noooooooo

poniards in the whale. The vast white headless phantom floats further
nooooooo no noo noooo. Noo nooo noooo nooooooo noooooo nooooo noooooo

and further from the ship, and every rod that it so floats, what seem
noo noooooo nooo noo nooo, noo noooo noo nooo no no nooooo, nooo nooo

square roods of sharks and cubic roods of fowls, augment the murderous
nooooo noooo no nooooo noo noooo noooo no noooo, noooooo noo noooooooo

din. For hours and hours from the almost stationary ship that hideous
noo. Noo noooo noo noooo nooo noo nooooo nooooooooo nooo nooo noooooo

sight is seen. Beneath the unclouded and mild azure sky, upon the fair
noooo no nooo. Noooooo noo noooooooo noo nooo noooo noo, nooo noo nooo

face of the pleasant sea, wafted by the joyous breezes, that great mass
nooo no noo nooooooo noo, nooooo no noo nooooo noooooo, nooo noooo nooo

of death floats on and on, till lost in infinite perspectives.
no noooo nooooo no noo no, nooo nooo no nooooooo nooooooooooo.




There's a most doleful and most mocking funeral! The sea-vultures all in
Noooo'n n nooo noooooo noo nooo noooooo noooooo! Noo noo-nooooooo noo no

pious mourning, the air-sharks all punctiliously in black or speckled.
noooo nooooooo, noo noo-nooooo noo noooooooooooo no noooo no nooooooo.

In life but few of them would have helped the whale, I ween, if
No nooo noo noo no nooo noooo nooo nooooo noo noooo, N nooo, no

peradventure he had needed it; but upon the banquet of his funeral they
nooooooooooo no noo nooooo no; noo nooo noo noooooo no noo noooooo nooo

most piously do pounce. Oh, horrible vultureism of earth! from which not
nooo noooooo no nooooo. No, nooooooo nooooooooo no noooo! nooo noooo noo

the mightiest whale is free.
noo noooooooo noooo no nooo.




Nor is this the end. Desecrated as the body is, a vengeful ghost
Noo no nooo noo noo. Nooooooooo no noo nooo no, n nooooooo noooo

survives and hovers over it to scare. Espied by some timid man-of-war or
nooooooo noo nooooo nooo no no noooo. Nooooo no nooo noooo noo-no-noo no

blundering discovery-vessel from afar, when the distance obscuring the
nooooooooo noooooooo-nooooo nooo nooo, nooo noo nooooooo noooooooo noo

swarming fowls, nevertheless still shows the white mass floating in
nooooooo noooo, nooooooooooo noooo noooo noo noooo nooo nooooooo no

the sun, and the white spray heaving high against it; straightway the
noo noo, noo noo noooo noooo noooooo nooo noooooo no; noooooooooo noo

whale's unharming corpse, with trembling fingers is set down in the
noooo'n noooooooo nooooo, nooo noooooooo noooooo no noo nooo no noo

log--SHOALS, ROCKS, AND BREAKERS HEREABOUTS: BEWARE! And for years
noo--NOOOOO, NOOOO, NOO NOOOOOOO NOOOOOOOOO: NOOOOO! Noo noo noooo

afterwards, perhaps, ships shun the place; leaping over it as silly
nooooooooo, noooooo, noooo nooo noo noooo; noooooo nooo no no noooo

sheep leap over a vacuum, because their leader originally leaped there
noooo nooo nooo n nooooo, noooooo noooo nooooo nooooooooo nooooo noooo

when a stick was held. There's your law of precedents; there's your
nooo n noooo noo nooo. Noooo'n nooo noo no nooooooooo; noooo'n nooo

utility of traditions; there's the story of your obstinate survival of
noooooo no nooooooooo; noooo'n noo noooo no nooo noooooooo nooooooo no

old beliefs never bottomed on the earth, and now not even hovering in
noo noooooo noooo nooooooo no noo noooo, noo noo noo nooo nooooooo no

the air! There's orthodoxy!
noo noo! Noooo'n noooooooo!




Thus, while in life the great whale's body may have been a real terror
Nooo, noooo no nooo noo noooo noooo'n nooo noo nooo nooo n nooo nooooo

to his foes, in his death his ghost becomes a powerless panic to a
no noo nooo, no noo noooo noo noooo noooooo n noooooooo noooo no n

world.
noooo.




Are you a believer in ghosts, my friend? There are other ghosts than
Noo noo n nooooooo no nooooo, no nooooo? Noooo noo noooo nooooo nooo

the Cock-Lane one, and far deeper men than Doctor Johnson who believe in
noo Nooo-Nooo noo, noo noo nooooo noo nooo Nooooo Noooooo noo noooooo no

them.
nooo.










CHAPTER 70. The Sphynx.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooo.







It should not have been omitted that previous to completely stripping
No nooooo noo nooo nooo noooooo nooo nooooooo no nooooooooo noooooooo

the body of the leviathan, he was beheaded. Now, the beheading of the
noo nooo no noo noooooooo, no noo nooooooo. Noo, noo noooooooo no noo

Sperm Whale is a scientific anatomical feat, upon which experienced
Noooo Noooo no n nooooooooo nooooooooo nooo, nooo noooo noooooooooo

whale surgeons very much pride themselves: and not without reason.
noooo nooooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooooooo: noo noo noooooo nooooo.




Consider that the whale has nothing that can properly be called a neck;
Nooooooo nooo noo noooo noo noooooo nooo noo nooooooo no nooooo n nooo;

on the contrary, where his head and body seem to join, there, in that
no noo nooooooo, noooo noo nooo noo nooo nooo no nooo, noooo, no nooo

very place, is the thickest part of him. Remember, also, that the
nooo noooo, no noo nooooooo nooo no noo. Nooooooo, nooo, nooo noo

surgeon must operate from above, some eight or ten feet intervening
noooooo nooo noooooo nooo noooo, nooo noooo no noo nooo noooooooooo

between him and his subject, and that subject almost hidden in a
noooooo noo noo noo noooooo, noo nooo noooooo nooooo nooooo no n

discoloured, rolling, and oftentimes tumultuous and bursting sea. Bear
noooooooooo, noooooo, noo nooooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooo noo. Nooo

in mind, too, that under these untoward circumstances he has to cut many
no nooo, noo, nooo noooo noooo nooooooo noooooooooooo no noo no noo nooo

feet deep in the flesh; and in that subterraneous manner, without so
nooo nooo no noo noooo; noo no nooo noooooooooooo nooooo, noooooo no

much as getting one single peep into the ever-contracting gash thus
nooo no noooooo noo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo-noooooooooo nooo nooo

made, he must skilfully steer clear of all adjacent, interdicted parts,
nooo, no nooo noooooooo noooo noooo no noo nooooooo, noooooooooo noooo,

and exactly divide the spine at a critical point hard by its insertion
noo noooooo nooooo noo noooo no n nooooooo noooo nooo no noo noooooooo

into the skull. Do you not marvel, then, at Stubb's boast, that he
nooo noo noooo. No noo noo nooooo, nooo, no Noooo'n noooo, nooo no

demanded but ten minutes to behead a sperm whale?
nooooooo noo noo noooooo no nooooo n noooo noooo?




When first severed, the head is dropped astern and held there by a cable
Nooo noooo noooooo, noo nooo no noooooo nooooo noo nooo noooo no n noooo

till the body is stripped. That done, if it belong to a small whale
nooo noo nooo no nooooooo. Nooo nooo, no no nooooo no n noooo noooo

it is hoisted on deck to be deliberately disposed of. But, with a full
no no noooooo no nooo no no nooooooooooo nooooooo no. Noo, nooo n nooo

grown leviathan this is impossible; for the sperm whale's head embraces
noooo noooooooo nooo no nooooooooo; noo noo noooo noooo'n nooo nooooooo

nearly one third of his entire bulk, and completely to suspend such a
nooooo noo noooo no noo nooooo nooo, noo nooooooooo no noooooo nooo n

burden as that, even by the immense tackles of a whaler, this were as
nooooo no nooo, nooo no noo noooooo noooooo no n nooooo, nooo nooo no

vain a thing as to attempt weighing a Dutch barn in jewellers' scales.
nooo n noooo no no noooooo nooooooo n Noooo nooo no noooooooo' nooooo.




The Pequod's whale being decapitated and the body stripped, the head was

When this last task was accomplished it was noon, and the seamen went

noo noo.

It was a black and hooded head; and hanging there in the midst of so
No noo n noooo noo nooooo nooo; noo noooooo noooo no noo noooo no no

noo nooo no noo nooooo noooo nooo no no nooo. No noo nooooo, nooo nooo

noooo noo noooooo. Nooo nooo nooo noooo noo noooo noo noo nooooo, noo

noooo nooo nooo noooo'n noooooooooo. Noooo nooooooooo noooo noo nooooo

nooo noooo nooo no noooo noooo nooo; nooo noooo no nooo n nooooo'n nooo,

CHAPTER 71. The Jeroboam's Story.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooooo'n Noooo.







Hand in hand, ship and breeze blew on; but the breeze came faster than
Nooo no nooo, nooo noo nooooo nooo no; noo noo nooooo nooo nooooo nooo

the ship, and soon the Pequod began to rock.
noo nooo, noo nooo noo Nooooo noooo no nooo.




By and by, through the glass the stranger's boats and manned mast-heads
No noo no, noooooo noo noooo noo nooooooo'n noooo noo nooooo nooo-noooo

proved her a whale-ship. But as she was so far to windward, and shooting
nooooo noo n noooo-nooo. Noo no noo noo no noo no nooooooo, noo nooooooo

by, apparently making a passage to some other ground, the Pequod could
no, nooooooooo nooooo n noooooo no nooo noooo nooooo, noo Nooooo noooo

not hope to reach her. So the signal was set to see what response would
noo nooo no noooo noo. No noo nooooo noo noo no noo nooo nooooooo noooo

be made.
no nooo.




Here be it said, that like the vessels of military marines, the ships of
Nooo no no nooo, nooo nooo noo noooooo no nooooooo noooooo, noo noooo no

the American Whale Fleet have each a private signal; all which signals
noo Nooooooo Noooo Noooo nooo nooo n noooooo nooooo; noo noooo noooooo

being collected in a book with the names of the respective vessels
noooo noooooooo no n nooo nooo noo noooo no noo nooooooooo noooooo

attached, every captain is provided with it. Thereby, the whale
nooooooo, noooo noooooo no nooooooo nooo no. Noooooo, noo noooo

commanders are enabled to recognise each other upon the ocean, even at
nooooooooo noo noooooo no noooooooo nooo noooo nooo noo noooo, nooo no

considerable distances and with no small facility.
nooooooooooo noooooooo noo nooo no noooo nooooooo.




The Pequod's signal was at last responded to by the stranger's setting
Noo Nooooo'n nooooo noo no nooo noooooooo no no noo nooooooo'n noooooo

her own; which proved the ship to be the Jeroboam of Nantucket. Squaring
noo noo; noooo nooooo noo nooo no no noo Nooooooo no Noooooooo. Nooooooo

noo noooo, noo nooo nooo, nooooo noooo noooo noo Nooooo'n noo, noo

noooooo n nooo; no nooo nooo nooo; noo, no noo nooo-nooooo noo noooo

nooooo no Nooooooo'n noooo no noooooooooo noo nooooooo noooooo, noo

of that proceeding being entirely unnecessary. It turned out that
no nooo nooooooooo noooo nooooooo noooooooooo. No nooooo noo nooo

Pequod.
Nooooo.




But this did by no means prevent all communications. Preserving an

nooo noooo), nooo noo nooo-noooooo noooo; nooooo, nooooo, no noooo no

noooooo noooo noooooo nooooooooooo no n nooo noooooooo nooo.




Pulling an oar in the Jeroboam's boat, was a man of a singular
Noooooo no noo no noo Nooooooo'n nooo, noo n noo no n nooooooo

nooooooooo, nooo no nooo nooo noooooo nooo noooo nooooooooo nooooooooooo

noo; noo noooooooooo noooooo no noooo nooo nooooo no no noo nooooo. N

deep, settled, fanatic delirium was in his eyes.
nooo, noooooo, noooooo nooooooo noo no noo nooo.




So soon as this figure had been first descried, Stubb had
No nooo no nooo nooooo noo nooo noooo nooooooo, Noooo noo

noooooooo--"Nooo'n no! nooo'n no!--noo nooo-nooooo nooooooooo noo

Nooo-No'n noooooo nooo no no!" Noooo nooo noooooo no n noooooo noooo

Nooooooo. Noo noooo noo nooo:




He had been originally nurtured among the crazy society of Neskyeuna
No noo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noooo noo noooo noooooo no Noooooooo

Shakers, where he had been a great prophet; in their cracked, secret
Noooooo, noooo no noo nooo n noooo noooooo; no noooo noooooo, nooooo

nooooooo nooooo noooooo noooo noooooooo nooo nooooo no noo noo no n

noooooo no noo nooo-nooooo; noo, noooo, noooooo no nooooooooo noooooooo,

noo nooooooo no no noooooo nooo nooooooo. N noooooo, noooooooo nooo

nooooo nooooo noo, no noo nooo Noooooooo noo Noooooooo, noooo, nooo

Nooooooo'n noooooo nooooo. Nooo noooooo noo; noo noooooooooo nooo

noo nooo'n noooooo noo no noooo no nooo, noo nooooooo noooo noo no n

freshet. He announced himself as the archangel Gabriel, and commanded
noooooo. No noooooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo Noooooo, noo noooooooo

noo noooooo no nooo noooooooo. No noooooooo noo noooooooo, noooooo

noooo-noooooo no noo Nooooooo. Noo noooooooooo noooooooooo nooo noooo no

nooo, nooo no nooooooooo no nooooooooo. Nooooooo, nooo nooo nooooo no

him. As such a man, however, was not of much practical use in the ship,
noo. No nooo n noo, noooooo, noo noo no nooo noooooooo noo no noo nooo,

noooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo noo no noo; noo nooooooo nooo nooo

noooooo noo. No nooooooo noo no nooo nooo noo noooooooo noooo noo nooo,

nooo no nooo no n nooo nooo nooo no noo noooooo noo nooo noo no Noooooo

noo nooo nooo noo nooo, noo n noo no nooo noooo nooooo. No noo noooooooo

nooooo no nooooooooo noo nooo. Noo noooo nooo nooooo Noooooo no no noo

noo nooooooooo, noo no no nooo no noooo; no nooo no nooo no nooo nooo

Noooooo noo noo nooooooo noooooo no noo nooo. Noo noooooooooo no noo

nooo noo, nooo noo noooooooo noooo nooooo no noooooo noo noo noooooo noo

nooo nooo; noooooooo nooo noo nooooo, no no nooooo no, noo no noo nooo

noooooo; noo nooooo no no nooooo noo noooooooo no noo nooo nooooooo.

The sailors, mostly poor devils, cringed, and some of them fawned before
Noo noooooo, nooooo nooo nooooo, noooooo, noo nooo no nooo nooooo nooooo

him; in obedience to his instructions, sometimes rendering him personal
noo; no noooooooo no noo nooooooooooo, noooooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo

homage, as to a god. Such things may seem incredible; but, however
nooooo, no no n noo. Nooo nooooo noo nooo nooooooooo; noo, noooooo

wondrous, they are true. Nor is the history of fanatics half so striking
nooooooo, nooo noo nooo. Noo no noo noooooo no nooooooo nooo no nooooooo

in respect to the measureless self-deception of the fanatic himself, as
no noooooo no noo noooooooooo nooo-noooooooo no noo noooooo noooooo, no

his measureless power of deceiving and bedevilling so many others. But
noo noooooooooo noooo no noooooooo noo noooooooooo no nooo nooooo. Noo

no no nooo no nooooo no noo Nooooo.

nooooo!"

much weary pulling, and many perilous, unsuccessful onsets, he at last

noooooooo no noooooo noo nooo nooo. Nooooooo, Noooooo, noooooooo no

the main-royal mast-head, was tossing one arm in frantic gestures, and
noo nooo-noooo nooo-nooo, noo noooooo noo noo no noooooo nooooooo, noo

noooooo noooo nooooooooo no nooooo nooo no noo nooooooooooo nooooooooo

of his divinity. Now, while Macey, the mate, was standing up in his
no noo nooooooo. Noo, noooo Noooo, noo nooo, noo nooooooo no no noo

nooo'n noo, noo nooo noo noo nooooooo nooooo no noo noooo noo noooooo

noo nooo nooooooooooo nooo noo noooo, noo nooooooo no noo n nooo nooooo

noo noo nooooo noooo, no! n noooo noooo nooooo nooo nooo noo noo; no noo

noooo, noooooo nooooo, noooooooooo nooooo noo nooooo noo no noo nooooo

no noo noooooo. Nooo noooooo, noo nooooooo nooo, no nooo no noooooo

nooo, noo noooooo nooooo nooo noo noo, noo nooooo n nooo noo no noo

noooooo, nooo nooo noo noo no noo nooooooo no noooo noooo noooo. Noo n

chip of the boat was harmed, nor a hair of any oarsman's head; but the
nooo no noo nooo noo nooooo, noo n nooo no noo noooooo'n nooo; noo noo

nooo noo nooo nooo.




It is well to parenthesize here, that of the fatal accidents in the
No no nooo no nooooooooooo nooo, nooo no noo noooo noooooooo no noo

Sperm-Whale Fishery, this kind is perhaps almost as frequent as any.
Noooo-Noooo Noooooo, nooo nooo no noooooo nooooo no nooooooo no noo.

Sometimes, nothing is injured but the man who is thus annihilated;
Noooooooo, noooooo no noooooo noo noo noo noo no nooo noooooooooo;

oftener the boat's bow is knocked off, or the thigh-board, in which the
noooooo noo nooo'n noo no noooooo noo, no noo noooo-noooo, no noooo noo

headsman stands, is torn from its place and accompanies the body. But
nooooooo nooooo, no nooo nooo noo noooo noo noooooooooo noo nooo. Noo

noooooooo no noo no noo nooooooooooo, nooo no nooo noooooooo nooo noo,

when the body has been recovered, not a single mark of violence is
nooo noo nooo noo nooo noooooooo, noo n nooooo nooo no nooooooo no

discernible; the man being stark dead.
noooooooooo; noo noo noooo noooo nooo.




The whole calamity, with the falling form of Macey, was plainly descried
Noo noooo nooooooo, nooo noo noooooo nooo no Noooo, noo noooooo nooooooo

nooo noo nooo. Noooooo n nooooooo nooooo--"Noo nooo! noo nooo!" Noooooo

called off the terror-stricken crew from the further hunting of the
nooooo noo noo nooooo-nooooooo nooo nooo noo noooooo noooooo no noo

whale. This terrible event clothed the archangel with added influence;
noooo. Nooo nooooooo noooo noooooo noo noooooooo nooo noooo noooooooo;

because his credulous disciples believed that he had specifically
noooooo noo noooooooo noooooooo nooooooo nooo no noo nooooooooooo

nooo-noooooooo no, noooooo no nooo nooooo n noooooo nooooooo, noooo noo

noo noooo nooo nooo, noo no nooo noooooo no noo noo no nooo noooo no noo

nooo nooooo noooooo. No nooooo n nooooooo nooooo no noo nooo.




Mayhew having concluded his narration, Ahab put such questions to

noooo!--nooooo no noo nooooooooo'n noo!"

Nooo nooooooo nooooo noooo; nooo nooo no Nooooo, "Noooooo, N nooo

nooo noooooooo no no no nooooo-noo; noooo no n nooooo noo noo no noo

nooooooo, no N noooooo noo. Nooooooo, nooo nooo noo noo."




Every whale-ship takes out a goodly number of letters for various ships,
Noooo noooo-nooo noooo noo n nooooo nooooo no noooooo noo noooooo noooo,

whose delivery to the persons to whom they may be addressed, depends
noooo nooooooo no noo noooooo no nooo nooo noo no noooooooo, noooooo

upon the mere chance of encountering them in the four oceans. Thus,
nooo noo nooo nooooo no nooooooooooo nooo no noo nooo nooooo. Nooo,

most letters never reach their mark; and many are only received after
nooo noooooo noooo noooo noooo nooo; noo nooo noo nooo nooooooo noooo

attaining an age of two or three years or more.
noooooooo no noo no noo no noooo noooo no nooo.




Soon Starbuck returned with a letter in his hand. It was sorely tumbled,
Nooo Nooooooo nooooooo nooo n nooooo no noo nooo. No noo nooooo noooooo,

nooo, noo noooooo nooo n nooo, noooooo, noooo noooo, no noooooooooo

no noooo nooo no n nooo nooooo no noo noooo. No nooo n nooooo, Noooo

himself might well have been the post-boy.
noooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo noo nooo-noo.

n noo nooooo;--nooo'n nooo?" No no noo nooooooo no noo, Nooooooo nooo n

noo nooooo noo nooooo no noo nooo.

nooooo.










CHAPTER 72. The Monkey-Rope.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooo-Nooo.







In the tumultuous business of cutting-in and attending to a whale, there
No noo nooooooooo nooooooo no noooooo-no noo noooooooo no n noooo, noooo

is much running backwards and forwards among the crew. Now hands are
no nooo noooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo noooo noo nooo. Noo noooo noo

wanted here, and then again hands are wanted there. There is no staying
nooooo nooo, noo nooo noooo noooo noo nooooo noooo. Noooo no no noooooo

in any one place; for at one and the same time everything has to be done
no noo noo noooo; noo no noo noo noo nooo nooo nooooooooo noo no no nooo

everywhere. It is much the same with him who endeavors the description
nooooooooo. No no nooo noo nooo nooo noo noo noooooooo noo noooooooooo

of the scene. We must now retrace our way a little. It was mentioned
no noo noooo. No nooo noo noooooo noo noo n nooooo. No noo noooooooo

that upon first breaking ground in the whale's back, the blubber-hook
nooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooooo no noo noooo'n nooo, noo noooooo-nooo

was inserted into the original hole there cut by the spades of the
noo nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo noooo noo no noo nooooo no noo

mates. But how did so clumsy and weighty a mass as that same hook
noooo. Noo noo noo no nooooo noo noooooo n nooo no nooo nooo nooo

get fixed in that hole? It was inserted there by my particular friend
noo noooo no nooo nooo? No noo nooooooo noooo no no nooooooooo nooooo

Queequeg, whose duty it was, as harpooneer, to descend upon the
Nooooooo, noooo nooo no noo, no nooooooooo, no noooooo nooo noo

monster's back for the special purpose referred to. But in very many
noooooo'n nooo noo noo noooooo noooooo nooooooo no. Noo no nooo nooo

cases, circumstances require that the harpooneer shall remain on the
noooo, noooooooooooo noooooo nooo noo nooooooooo noooo nooooo no noo

whale till the whole flensing or stripping operation is concluded. The
noooo nooo noo noooo nooooooo no noooooooo noooooooo no noooooooo. Noo

whale, be it observed, lies almost entirely submerged, excepting the
noooo, no no nooooooo, nooo nooooo nooooooo noooooooo, noooooooo noo

immediate parts operated upon. So down there, some ten feet below the
noooooooo noooo nooooooo nooo. No nooo noooo, nooo noo nooo noooo noo

level of the deck, the poor harpooneer flounders about, half on the
noooo no noo nooo, noo nooo nooooooooo noooooooo noooo, nooo no noo

whale and half in the water, as the vast mass revolves like a tread-mill
noooo noo nooo no noo noooo, no noo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo n noooo-nooo

beneath him. On the occasion in question, Queequeg figured in the
noooooo noo. No noo nooooooo no nooooooo, Nooooooo noooooo no noo

Highland costume--a shirt and socks--in which to my eyes, at least,
Nooooooo noooooo--n noooo noo noooo--no noooo no no nooo, no noooo,

he appeared to uncommon advantage; and no one had a better chance to
no nooooooo no nooooooo noooooooo; noo no noo noo n nooooo nooooo no

observe him, as will presently be seen.
noooooo noo, no nooo noooooooo no nooo.




Being the savage's bowsman, that is, the person who pulled the bow-oar
Noooo noo nooooo'n noooooo, nooo no, noo nooooo noo nooooo noo noo-noo

in his boat (the second one from forward), it was my cheerful duty to
no noo nooo (noo nooooo noo nooo noooooo), no noo no nooooooo nooo no

attend upon him while taking that hard-scrabble scramble upon the dead
nooooo nooo noo noooo nooooo nooo nooo-nooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo

whale's back. You have seen Italian organ-boys holding a dancing-ape by
noooo'n nooo. Noo nooo nooo Noooooo noooo-nooo noooooo n noooooo-noo no

a long cord. Just so, from the ship's steep side, did I hold Queequeg
n nooo nooo. Nooo no, nooo noo nooo'n noooo nooo, noo N nooo Nooooooo

down there in the sea, by what is technically called in the fishery
nooo noooo no noo noo, no nooo no noooooooooo nooooo no noo noooooo

a monkey-rope, attached to a strong strip of canvas belted round his
n nooooo-nooo, nooooooo no n nooooo noooo no nooooo nooooo noooo noo

waist.
noooo.




It was a humorously perilous business for both of us. For, before we
No noo n nooooooooo nooooooo nooooooo noo nooo no no. Noo, nooooo no

proceed further, it must be said that the monkey-rope was fast at
noooooo noooooo, no nooo no nooo nooo noo nooooo-nooo noo nooo no

both ends; fast to Queequeg's broad canvas belt, and fast to my narrow
nooo nooo; nooo no Nooooooo'n noooo nooooo nooo, noo nooo no no nooooo

leather one. So that for better or for worse, we two, for the time, were
noooooo noo. No nooo noo nooooo no noo noooo, no noo, noo noo nooo, nooo

wedded; and should poor Queequeg sink to rise no more, then both usage
nooooo; noo nooooo nooo Nooooooo nooo no nooo no nooo, nooo nooo noooo

and honour demanded, that instead of cutting the cord, it should drag
noo nooooo nooooooo, nooo noooooo no noooooo noo nooo, no nooooo nooo

me down in his wake. So, then, an elongated Siamese ligature united us.
no nooo no noo nooo. No, nooo, no noooooooo Noooooo nooooooo nooooo no.

Queequeg was my own inseparable twin brother; nor could I any way get
Nooooooo noo no noo noooooooooo nooo noooooo; noo noooo N noo noo noo

rid of the dangerous liabilities which the hempen bond entailed.
noo no noo noooooooo noooooooooo noooo noo nooooo nooo nooooooo.




So strongly and metaphysically did I conceive of my situation then, that
No nooooooo noo nooooooooooooo noo N nooooooo no no noooooooo nooo, nooo

while earnestly watching his motions, I seemed distinctly to perceive
noooo noooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo, N nooooo nooooooooo no nooooooo

that my own individuality was now merged in a joint stock company of
nooo no noo noooooooooooo noo noo nooooo no n noooo noooo noooooo no

two; that my free will had received a mortal wound; and that another's
noo; nooo no nooo nooo noo nooooooo n nooooo noooo; noo nooo noooooo'n

mistake or misfortune might plunge innocent me into unmerited disaster
noooooo no nooooooooo noooo nooooo nooooooo no nooo noooooooo nooooooo

and death. Therefore, I saw that here was a sort of interregnum in
noo noooo. Noooooooo, N noo nooo nooo noo n nooo no noooooooooo no

Providence; for its even-handed equity never could have so gross an
Nooooooooo; noo noo nooo-nooooo nooooo noooo noooo nooo no noooo no

injustice. And yet still further pondering--while I jerked him now
noooooooo. Noo noo noooo noooooo noooooooo--noooo N nooooo noo noo

and then from between the whale and ship, which would threaten to jam
noo nooo nooo noooooo noo noooo noo nooo, noooo noooo nooooooo no noo

him--still further pondering, I say, I saw that this situation of mine
noo--noooo noooooo noooooooo, N noo, N noo nooo nooo noooooooo no nooo

was the precise situation of every mortal that breathes; only, in most
noo noo noooooo noooooooo no noooo nooooo nooo nooooooo; nooo, no nooo

cases, he, one way or other, has this Siamese connexion with a plurality
noooo, no, noo noo no noooo, noo nooo Noooooo noooooooo nooo n noooooooo

of other mortals. If your banker breaks, you snap; if your apothecary by
no noooo noooooo. No nooo nooooo nooooo, noo nooo; no nooo nooooooooo no

mistake sends you poison in your pills, you die. True, you may say
noooooo noooo noo nooooo no nooo noooo, noo noo. Nooo, noo noo noo

that, by exceeding caution, you may possibly escape these and the
nooo, no noooooooo noooooo, noo noo nooooooo nooooo noooo noo noo

multitudinous other evil chances of life. But handle Queequeg's
noooooooooooo noooo nooo noooooo no nooo. Noo nooooo Nooooooo'n

monkey-rope heedfully as I would, sometimes he jerked it so, that I came
nooooo-nooo noooooooo no N noooo, noooooooo no nooooo no no, nooo N nooo

very near sliding overboard. Nor could I possibly forget that, do what I
nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo. Noo noooo N nooooooo nooooo nooo, no nooo N

would, I only had the management of one end of it.*
noooo, N nooo noo noo nooooooooo no noo noo no no.*







*The monkey-rope is found in all whalers; but it was only in the Pequod
*Noo nooooo-nooo no noooo no noo noooooo; noo no noo nooo no noo Nooooo

that the monkey and his holder were ever tied together. This improvement
nooo noo nooooo noo noo nooooo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo. Nooo noooooooooo

upon the original usage was introduced by no less a man than Stubb,
nooo noo nooooooo noooo noo nooooooooo no no nooo n noo nooo Noooo,

in order to afford the imperilled harpooneer the strongest possible
no noooo no nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooooo noo noooooooo nooooooo

guarantee for the faithfulness and vigilance of his monkey-rope holder.
noooooooo noo noo nooooooooooo noo noooooooo no noo nooooo-nooo nooooo.







I have hinted that I would often jerk poor Queequeg from between the
N nooo nooooo nooo N noooo noooo nooo nooo Nooooooo nooo noooooo noo

whale and the ship--where he would occasionally fall, from the incessant
noooo noo noo nooo--noooo no noooo nooooooooooo nooo, nooo noo noooooooo

rolling and swaying of both. But this was not the only jamming jeopardy
noooooo noo noooooo no nooo. Noo nooo noo noo noo nooo noooooo nooooooo

he was exposed to. Unappalled by the massacre made upon them during the
no noo noooooo no. Nooooooooo no noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooo nooooo noo

night, the sharks now freshly and more keenly allured by the before pent
noooo, noo nooooo noo noooooo noo nooo nooooo noooooo no noo nooooo nooo

blood which began to flow from the carcass--the rabid creatures swarmed
noooo noooo noooo no nooo nooo noo noooooo--noo noooo noooooooo noooooo

round it like bees in a beehive.
noooo no nooo nooo no n noooooo.




And right in among those sharks was Queequeg; who often pushed them
Noo noooo no noooo noooo nooooo noo Nooooooo; noo noooo nooooo nooo

aside with his floundering feet. A thing altogether incredible were
noooo nooo noo noooooooooo nooo. N noooo nooooooooo nooooooooo nooo

it not that attracted by such prey as a dead whale, the otherwise
no noo nooo noooooooo no nooo nooo no n nooo noooo, noo noooooooo

miscellaneously carnivorous shark will seldom touch a man.
noooooooooooooo noooooooooo noooo nooo nooooo noooo n noo.




Nevertheless, it may well be believed that since they have such a
Nooooooooooo, no noo nooo no nooooooo nooo noooo nooo nooo nooo n

ravenous finger in the pie, it is deemed but wise to look sharp to them.
nooooooo nooooo no noo noo, no no nooooo noo nooo no nooo noooo no nooo.

Accordingly, besides the monkey-rope, with which I now and then jerked
Noooooooooo, noooooo noo nooooo-nooo, nooo noooo N noo noo nooo nooooo

the poor fellow from too close a vicinity to the maw of what seemed
noo nooo nooooo nooo noo noooo n nooooooo no noo noo no nooo nooooo

n nooooooooo noooooooo noooo--no noo nooooooo nooo noooo noooooo

protection. Suspended over the side in one of the stages, Tashtego
nooooooooo. Noooooooo nooo noo nooo no noo no noo nooooo, Nooooooo

and Daggoo continually flourished over his head a couple of keen
noo Nooooo noooooooooo nooooooooo nooo noo nooo n nooooo no nooo

whale-spades, wherewith they slaughtered as many sharks as they could
noooo-nooooo, noooooooo nooo noooooooooo no nooo nooooo no nooo noooo

reach. This procedure of theirs, to be sure, was very disinterested and
noooo. Nooo noooooooo no nooooo, no no nooo, noo nooo noooooooooooo noo

benevolent of them. They meant Queequeg's best happiness, I admit; but
nooooooooo no nooo. Nooo noooo Nooooooo'n nooo noooooooo, N noooo; noo

in their hasty zeal to befriend him, and from the circumstance that both
no noooo noooo nooo no nooooooo noo, noo nooo noo nooooooooooo nooo nooo

he and the sharks were at times half hidden by the blood-muddled water,
no noo noo nooooo nooo no noooo nooo nooooo no noo noooo-noooooo noooo,

those indiscreet spades of theirs would come nearer amputating a leg
noooo nooooooooo nooooo no nooooo noooo nooo nooooo nooooooooo n noo

than a tail. But poor Queequeg, I suppose, straining and gasping there
nooo n nooo. Noo nooo Nooooooo, N noooooo, noooooooo noo noooooo noooo

with that great iron hook--poor Queequeg, I suppose, only prayed to his
nooo nooo noooo nooo nooo--nooo Nooooooo, N noooooo, nooo nooooo no noo

Yojo, and gave up his life into the hands of his gods.
Nooo, noo nooo no noo nooo nooo noo noooo no noo nooo.




Well, well, my dear comrade and twin-brother, thought I, as I drew in
Nooo, nooo, no nooo noooooo noo nooo-noooooo, noooooo N, no N nooo no

and then slacked off the rope to every swell of the sea--what matters
noo nooo noooooo noo noo nooo no noooo noooo no noo noo--nooo noooooo

it, after all? Are you not the precious image of each and all of us men
no, noooo noo? Noo noo noo noo nooooooo noooo no nooo noo noo no no noo

in this whaling world? That unsounded ocean you gasp in, is Life; those
no nooo noooooo noooo? Nooo noooooooo noooo noo nooo no, no Nooo; noooo

sharks, your foes; those spades, your friends; and what between sharks
nooooo, nooo nooo; noooo nooooo, nooo noooooo; noo nooo noooooo nooooo

and spades you are in a sad pickle and peril, poor lad.
noo nooooo noo noo no n noo nooooo noo noooo, nooo noo.




But courage! there is good cheer in store for you, Queequeg. For now, as
Noo noooooo! noooo no nooo noooo no noooo noo noo, Nooooooo. Noo noo, no

with blue lips and blood-shot eyes the exhausted savage at last climbs
nooo nooo nooo noo noooo-nooo nooo noo noooooooo nooooo no nooo nooooo

up the chains and stands all dripping and involuntarily trembling over
no noo nooooo noo nooooo noo nooooooo noo noooooooooooo noooooooo nooo

the side; the steward advances, and with a benevolent, consolatory
noo nooo; noo noooooo nooooooo, noo nooo n nooooooooo, noooooooooo

glance hands him--what? Some hot Cognac? No! hands him, ye gods! hands
nooooo noooo noo--nooo? Nooo noo Nooooo? No! noooo noo, no nooo! noooo

him a cup of tepid ginger and water!
noo n noo no noooo nooooo noo noooo!




"Ginger? Do I smell ginger?" suspiciously asked Stubb, coming near.

CHAPTER 73. Stubb and Flask Kill a Right Whale; and Then Have a Talk
NOOOOOO no. Noooo noo Noooo Nooo n Noooo Noooo; noo Nooo Nooo n Nooo

Over Him.
Nooo Noo.







It must be borne in mind that all this time we have a Sperm Whale's
No nooo no noooo no nooo nooo noo nooo nooo no nooo n Noooo Noooo'n

prodigious head hanging to the Pequod's side. But we must let it
nooooooooo nooo noooooo no noo Nooooo'n nooo. Noo no nooo noo no

continue hanging there a while till we can get a chance to attend to it.
nooooooo noooooo noooo n noooo nooo no noo noo n nooooo no nooooo no no.

For the present other matters press, and the best we can do now for the
Noo noo noooooo noooo noooooo noooo, noo noo nooo no noo no noo noo noo

head, is to pray heaven the tackles may hold.
nooo, no no nooo nooooo noo noooooo noo nooo.




Now, during the past night and forenoon, the Pequod had gradually
Noo, nooooo noo nooo noooo noo nooooooo, noo Nooooo noo noooooooo

drifted into a sea, which, by its occasional patches of yellow brit,
noooooo nooo n noo, noooo, no noo nooooooooo noooooo no nooooo nooo,

gave unusual tokens of the vicinity of Right Whales, a species of the
nooo noooooo nooooo no noo nooooooo no Noooo Nooooo, n noooooo no noo

Leviathan that but few supposed to be at this particular time lurking
Noooooooo nooo noo noo nooooooo no no no nooo nooooooooo nooo noooooo

anywhere near. And though all hands commonly disdained the capture of
nooooooo nooo. Noo nooooo noo noooo nooooooo noooooooo noo noooooo no

those inferior creatures; and though the Pequod was not commissioned to
noooo nooooooo noooooooo; noo nooooo noo Nooooo noo noo nooooooooooo no

cruise for them at all, and though she had passed numbers of them near
nooooo noo nooo no noo, noo nooooo noo noo nooooo noooooo no nooo nooo

the Crozetts without lowering a boat; yet now that a Sperm Whale
noo Nooooooo noooooo nooooooo n nooo; noo noo nooo n Noooo Noooo

had been brought alongside and beheaded, to the surprise of all, the
noo nooo noooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo, no noo nooooooo no noo, noo

announcement was made that a Right Whale should be captured that day, if
nooooooooooo noo nooo nooo n Noooo Noooo nooooo no nooooooo nooo noo, no

opportunity offered.
noooooooooo noooooo.




Nor was this long wanting. Tall spouts were seen to leeward; and two
Noo noo nooo nooo noooooo. Nooo nooooo nooo nooo no noooooo; noo noo

boats, Stubb's and Flask's, were detached in pursuit. Pulling further
noooo, Noooo'n noo Noooo'n, nooo nooooooo no noooooo. Noooooo noooooo

and further away, they at last became almost invisible to the men at
noo noooooo nooo, nooo no nooo nooooo nooooo noooooooo no noo noo no

the mast-head. But suddenly in the distance, they saw a great heap of
noo nooo-nooo. Noo nooooooo no noo nooooooo, nooo noo n noooo nooo no

tumultuous white water, and soon after news came from aloft that one or
nooooooooo noooo noooo, noo nooo noooo nooo nooo nooo noooo nooo noo no

both the boats must be fast. An interval passed and the boats were in
nooo noo noooo nooo no nooo. No nooooooo nooooo noo noo noooo nooo no

plain sight, in the act of being dragged right towards the ship by the
noooo noooo, no noo noo no noooo noooooo noooo noooooo noo nooo no noo

towing whale. So close did the monster come to the hull, that at
nooooo noooo. No noooo noo noo noooooo nooo no noo nooo, nooo no

first it seemed as if he meant it malice; but suddenly going down in a
noooo no nooooo no no no noooo no nooooo; noo nooooooo noooo nooo no n

maelstrom, within three rods of the planks, he wholly disappeared from
noooooooo, nooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooo, no nooooo noooooooooo nooo

view, as if diving under the keel. "Cut, cut!" was the cry from the
nooo, no no nooooo noooo noo nooo. "Noo, noo!" noo noo noo nooo noo

ship to the boats, which, for one instant, seemed on the point of being
nooo no noo noooo, noooo, noo noo noooooo, nooooo no noo noooo no noooo

brought with a deadly dash against the vessel's side. But having plenty
noooooo nooo n nooooo nooo noooooo noo nooooo'n nooo. Noo nooooo nooooo

of line yet in the tubs, and the whale not sounding very rapidly, they
no nooo noo no noo nooo, noo noo noooo noo nooooooo nooo noooooo, nooo

nooo noo noooooooo no nooo, noo no noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo noo noooo

noooo no no no noo noooo no noo nooo. Noo n noo noooooo noo nooooooo noo

noooooooo nooooooo; noo noooo nooo noooo noooooo noo noo noooooooo nooo

no noo noooooooo, noo noooo noooo noooo nooo no noooooo, noo nooooooooo

nooooo nooooooooo no nooo nooo noooo. Noo no noo nooo n noo nooo noooooo

nooo nooooo no nooo. Noo nooo noooo no no nooo nooo noo nooo no; nooo

instantly, a swift tremor was felt running like lightning along the

noooooooo, nooo noo noooo nooo nooo nooo no nooooo noooo no noo noooo,

noooo noo noooo nooooo nooo nooo no noooo, noo nooo nooo noo noooo nooo

nooo no noo. Noo noo nooooo noooo nooooo noo noooo, noo noooooo nooooooo

noo nooooo, nooo noooo noo noooo no noo nooo nooooo noo noo noooo noooo

noo, no nooo nooo noooooooo n nooooooo noooooo.

nooooo nooo noo noooooo nooo.

nooooo nooo noo nooo n nooooo.

nooooo; noo, noo nooooo n nooo nooo noo, nooo noo noo nooooo noo noooo

kidnapped, he'd roast for him? There's a governor!"
noooooooo, no'n noooo noo noo? Noooo'n n nooooooo!"




"Do you suppose Fedallah wants to kidnap Captain Ahab?"
"No noo noooooo Nooooooo noooo no nooooo Noooooo Nooo?"




"Do I suppose it? You'll know it before long, Flask. But I am going now
"No N noooooo no? Noo'no nooo no nooooo nooo, Noooo. Noo N no noooo noo

no nooo n noooo nooo-noo no noo; noo no N noo nooooooo nooo nooooooooo

nooooooooooo no noooooo noo nooo noooooo noo nooo."

"Noo, no noo nooo nooo noo noo, noo nooo nooo nooooo noo noooo, Noooo?"

"Nooo no noo nooo, nooo no noo no noo nooo."

noooo'n nooo noooooo no nooooooo nooo nooooooooo'n."




In good time, Flask's saying proved true. As before, the Pequod steeply
No nooo nooo, Noooo'n nooooo nooooo nooo. No nooooo, noo Nooooo noooooo

nooooo nooo noooooo noo noooo noooo'n nooo, noo, no noo nooooooooooo no

nooo noooooo. No, nooo no noo nooo noo noooo no Noooo'n nooo, noo no

nooo nooo noo; noo noo, no noo noooo nooo, noooo no Nooo'n noo noo nooo

nooo noooo; noo no nooo nooo nooooo. Nooo, nooo noooo noo nooo nooo

trimming boat. Oh, ye foolish! throw all these thunder-heads overboard,
nooooooo nooo. No, no noooooo! noooo noo noooo noooooo-noooo noooooooo,

and then you will float light and right.
noo nooo noo nooo noooo noooo noo noooo.




In disposing of the body of a right whale, when brought alongside the
No noooooooo no noo nooo no n noooo noooo, nooo noooooo noooooooo noo

nooo, noo nooo noooooooooo noooooooooo nooooooo nooo noooo no no noo

noooo, noo no noo nooooo noo nooo noo nooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo noo

noooooo no nooo, nooo noo noo nooo noooo noooo nooo nooooooo no nooo no

nooooo noo noooo-noooo. Noo noooooo nooo nooo, no noo noooooo nooo,

had been done. The carcases of both whales had dropped astern; and
noo nooo nooo. Noo nooooooo no nooo nooooo noo noooooo nooooo; noo

noo nooo-noooo nooo noo n nooooo noooooooo n nooo nooooooo n nooo no

overburdening panniers.
noooooooooooo nooooooo.

noooo nooo, noo nooooooo Nooo'n. No noo nooo nooooo no, Nooooooooo

nooooooooooo nooo noooooo noooo nooo, nooooooooo noo noooo noooooo

things.
