CHAPTER 74. The Sperm Whale's Head--Contrasted View.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo Noooo'n Nooo--Nooooooooo Nooo.







Here, now, are two great whales, laying their heads together; let us
Nooo, noo, noo noo noooo nooooo, nooooo noooo noooo nooooooo; noo no

join them, and lay together our own.
nooo nooo, noo noo nooooooo noo noo.




Of the grand order of folio leviathans, the Sperm Whale and the Right
No noo noooo noooo no noooo nooooooooo, noo Noooo Noooo noo noo Noooo

Whale are by far the most noteworthy. They are the only whales regularly
Noooo noo no noo noo nooo nooooooooo. Nooo noo noo nooo nooooo noooooooo

hunted by man. To the Nantucketer, they present the two extremes of all
nooooo no noo. No noo Noooooooooo, nooo noooooo noo noo nooooooo no noo

the known varieties of the whale. As the external difference between
noo noooo noooooooo no noo noooo. No noo nooooooo nooooooooo noooooo

them is mainly observable in their heads; and as a head of each is this
nooo no nooooo nooooooooo no noooo noooo; noo no n nooo no nooo no nooo

moment hanging from the Pequod's side; and as we may freely go from one
nooooo noooooo nooo noo Nooooo'n nooo; noo no no noo nooooo no nooo noo

to the other, by merely stepping across the deck:--where, I should like
no noo noooo, no nooooo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo:--noooo, N nooooo nooo

to know, will you obtain a better chance to study practical cetology
no nooo, nooo noo nooooo n nooooo nooooo no noooo noooooooo nooooooo

than here?
nooo nooo?




In the first place, you are struck by the general contrast between these
No noo noooo noooo, noo noo nooooo no noo noooooo nooooooo noooooo noooo

heads. Both are massive enough in all conscience; but there is a certain
noooo. Nooo noo noooooo nooooo no noo nooooooooo; noo noooo no n noooooo

mathematical symmetry in the Sperm Whale's which the Right Whale's sadly
nooooooooooo nooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo'n noooo noo Noooo Noooo'n noooo

lacks. There is more character in the Sperm Whale's head. As you behold
noooo. Noooo no nooo noooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo'n nooo. No noo nooooo

it, you involuntarily yield the immense superiority to him, in point
no, noo noooooooooooo noooo noo noooooo noooooooooo no noo, no noooo

of pervading dignity. In the present instance, too, this dignity is
no noooooooo noooooo. No noo noooooo nooooooo, noo, nooo noooooo no

heightened by the pepper and salt colour of his head at the summit,
nooooooooo no noo nooooo noo nooo nooooo no noo nooo no noo nooooo,

giving token of advanced age and large experience. In short, he is what
nooooo noooo no nooooooo noo noo noooo nooooooooo. No noooo, no no nooo

the fishermen technically call a "grey-headed whale."
noo noooooooo noooooooooo nooo n "nooo-nooooo noooo."




Let us now note what is least dissimilar in these heads--namely, the two
Noo no noo nooo nooo no noooo nooooooooo no noooo noooo--nooooo, noo noo

most important organs, the eye and the ear. Far back on the side of
nooo noooooooo nooooo, noo noo noo noo noo. Noo nooo no noo nooo no

the head, and low down, near the angle of either whale's jaw, if you
noo nooo, noo noo nooo, nooo noo noooo no nooooo noooo'n noo, no noo

narrowly search, you will at last see a lashless eye, which you would
nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo no nooo noo n nooooooo noo, noooo noo noooo

fancy to be a young colt's eye; so out of all proportion is it to the
noooo no no n noooo nooo'n noo; no noo no noo nooooooooo no no no noo

magnitude of the head.
noooooooo no noo nooo.




Now, from this peculiar sideway position of the whale's eyes, it is
Noo, nooo nooo nooooooo noooooo nooooooo no noo noooo'n nooo, no no

plain that he can never see an object which is exactly ahead, no more
noooo nooo no noo noooo noo no nooooo noooo no noooooo noooo, no nooo

than he can one exactly astern. In a word, the position of the whale's
nooo no noo noo noooooo nooooo. No n nooo, noo nooooooo no noo noooo'n

eyes corresponds to that of a man's ears; and you may fancy, for
nooo noooooooooo no nooo no n noo'n nooo; noo noo noo noooo, noo

yourself, how it would fare with you, did you sideways survey objects
nooooooo, noo no noooo nooo nooo noo, noo noo nooooooo nooooo noooooo

through your ears. You would find that you could only command some
noooooo nooo nooo. Noo noooo nooo nooo noo noooo nooo noooooo nooo

thirty degrees of vision in advance of the straight side-line of sight;
nooooo noooooo no nooooo no noooooo no noo nooooooo nooo-nooo no noooo;

and about thirty more behind it. If your bitterest foe were walking
noo noooo nooooo nooo nooooo no. No nooo noooooooo noo nooo noooooo

straight towards you, with dagger uplifted in broad day, you would not
nooooooo noooooo noo, nooo nooooo nooooooo no noooo noo, noo noooo noo

be able to see him, any more than if he were stealing upon you from
no nooo no noo noo, noo nooo nooo no no nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo

behind. In a word, you would have two backs, so to speak; but, at the
nooooo. No n nooo, noo noooo nooo noo noooo, no no noooo; noo, no noo

same time, also, two fronts (side fronts): for what is it that makes the
nooo nooo, nooo, noo nooooo (nooo nooooo): noo nooo no no nooo noooo noo

front of a man--what, indeed, but his eyes?
noooo no n noo--nooo, nooooo, noo noo nooo?




Moreover, while in most other animals that I can now think of, the eyes
Nooooooo, noooo no nooo noooo noooooo nooo N noo noo noooo no, noo nooo

are so planted as imperceptibly to blend their visual power, so as to
noo no noooooo no noooooooooooo no noooo noooo nooooo noooo, no no no

produce one picture and not two to the brain; the peculiar position of
noooooo noo noooooo noo noo noo no noo noooo; noo nooooooo nooooooo no

the whale's eyes, effectually divided as they are by many cubic feet of
noo noooo'n nooo, noooooooooo noooooo no nooo noo no nooo noooo nooo no

solid head, which towers between them like a great mountain separating
noooo nooo, noooo nooooo noooooo nooo nooo n noooo nooooooo nooooooooo

two lakes in valleys; this, of course, must wholly separate the
noo noooo no noooooo; nooo, no nooooo, nooo nooooo nooooooo noo

impressions which each independent organ imparts. The whale, therefore,
noooooooooo noooo nooo noooooooooo noooo noooooo. Noo noooo, noooooooo,

must see one distinct picture on this side, and another distinct
nooo noo noo nooooooo noooooo no nooo nooo, noo noooooo nooooooo

picture on that side; while all between must be profound darkness and
noooooo no nooo nooo; noooo noo noooooo nooo no nooooooo nooooooo noo

nothingness to him. Man may, in effect, be said to look out on the world
noooooooooo no noo. Noo noo, no nooooo, no nooo no nooo noo no noo noooo

from a sentry-box with two joined sashes for his window. But with the
nooo n nooooo-noo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noo noo nooooo. Noo nooo noo

whale, these two sashes are separately inserted, making two distinct
noooo, noooo noo nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo, nooooo noo nooooooo

windows, but sadly impairing the view. This peculiarity of the whale's
noooooo, noo noooo noooooooo noo nooo. Nooo noooooooooo no noo noooo'n

eyes is a thing always to be borne in mind in the fishery; and to be
nooo no n noooo nooooo no no noooo no nooo no noo noooooo; noo no no

remembered by the reader in some subsequent scenes.
nooooooooo no noo nooooo no nooo nooooooooo nooooo.




A curious and most puzzling question might be started concerning this
N noooooo noo nooo nooooooo nooooooo noooo no noooooo nooooooooo nooo

visual matter as touching the Leviathan. But I must be content with a
nooooo nooooo no nooooooo noo Noooooooo. Noo N nooo no noooooo nooo n

hint. So long as a man's eyes are open in the light, the act of seeing
nooo. No nooo no n noo'n nooo noo nooo no noo noooo, noo noo no nooooo

is involuntary; that is, he cannot then help mechanically seeing
no noooooooooo; nooo no, no nooooo nooo nooo nooooooooooo nooooo

whatever objects are before him. Nevertheless, any one's experience
nooooooo noooooo noo nooooo noo. Nooooooooooo, noo noo'n nooooooooo

will teach him, that though he can take in an undiscriminating sweep of
nooo noooo noo, nooo nooooo no noo nooo no no nooooooooooooooo noooo no

things at one glance, it is quite impossible for him, attentively,
nooooo no noo nooooo, no no noooo nooooooooo noo noo, noooooooooo,

and completely, to examine any two things--however large or however
noo nooooooooo, no noooooo noo noo nooooo--noooooo noooo no noooooo

small--at one and the same instant of time; never mind if they lie side
noooo--no noo noo noo nooo noooooo no nooo; noooo nooo no nooo noo nooo

by side and touch each other. But if you now come to separate these two
no nooo noo noooo nooo noooo. Noo no noo noo nooo no nooooooo noooo noo

objects, and surround each by a circle of profound darkness; then, in
noooooo, noo nooooooo nooo no n nooooo no nooooooo nooooooo; nooo, no

order to see one of them, in such a manner as to bring your mind to
noooo no noo noo no nooo, no nooo n nooooo no no noooo nooo nooo no

bear on it, the other will be utterly excluded from your contemporary
nooo no no, noo noooo nooo no noooooo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooooooooo

consciousness. How is it, then, with the whale? True, both his eyes,
noooooooooooo. Noo no no, nooo, nooo noo noooo? Nooo, nooo noo nooo,

in themselves, must simultaneously act; but is his brain so much more
no nooooooooo, nooo nooooooooooooo noo; noo no noo noooo no nooo nooo

comprehensive, combining, and subtle than man's, that he can at the same
noooooooooooo, noooooooo, noo nooooo nooo noo'n, nooo no noo no noo nooo

moment of time attentively examine two distinct prospects, one on one
nooooo no nooo noooooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo, noo no noo

side of him, and the other in an exactly opposite direction? If he
nooo no noo, noo noo noooo no no noooooo nooooooo noooooooo? No no

can, then is it as marvellous a thing in him, as if a man were able
noo, nooo no no no nooooooooo n noooo no noo, no no n noo nooo nooo

simultaneously to go through the demonstrations of two distinct problems
nooooooooooooo no no noooooo noo nooooooooooooo no noo nooooooo nooooooo

in Euclid. Nor, strictly investigated, is there any incongruity in this
no Nooooo. Noo, nooooooo nooooooooooo, no noooo noo noooooooooo no nooo

comparison.
nooooooooo.




It may be but an idle whim, but it has always seemed to me, that the
No noo no noo no nooo nooo, noo no noo nooooo nooooo no no, nooo noo

extraordinary vacillations of movement displayed by some whales when
noooooooooooo nooooooooooo no nooooooo noooooooo no nooo nooooo nooo

beset by three or four boats; the timidity and liability to queer
noooo no noooo no nooo noooo; noo nooooooo noo noooooooo no noooo

frights, so common to such whales; I think that all this indirectly
noooooo, no nooooo no nooo nooooo; N noooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo

proceeds from the helpless perplexity of volition, in which their
nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo no nooooooo, no noooo noooo

divided and diametrically opposite powers of vision must involve them.
noooooo noo noooooooooooo nooooooo nooooo no nooooo nooo noooooo nooo.




But the ear of the whale is full as curious as the eye. If you are an
Noo noo noo no noo noooo no nooo no noooooo no noo noo. No noo noo no

entire stranger to their race, you might hunt over these two heads
nooooo nooooooo no noooo nooo, noo noooo nooo nooo noooo noo noooo

for hours, and never discover that organ. The ear has no external leaf
noo noooo, noo noooo nooooooo nooo noooo. Noo noo noo no nooooooo nooo

whatever; and into the hole itself you can hardly insert a quill, so
nooooooo; noo nooo noo nooo nooooo noo noo nooooo nooooo n noooo, no

wondrously minute is it. It is lodged a little behind the eye. With
nooooooooo nooooo no no. No no nooooo n nooooo nooooo noo noo. Nooo

respect to their ears, this important difference is to be observed
noooooo no noooo nooo, nooo noooooooo nooooooooo no no no nooooooo

between the sperm whale and the right. While the ear of the former has
noooooo noo noooo noooo noo noo noooo. Noooo noo noo no noo nooooo noo

an external opening, that of the latter is entirely and evenly covered
no nooooooo noooooo, nooo no noo nooooo no nooooooo noo nooooo noooooo

over with a membrane, so as to be quite imperceptible from without.
nooo nooo n nooooooo, no no no no noooo noooooooooooo nooo noooooo.




Is it not curious, that so vast a being as the whale should see the
No no noo noooooo, nooo no nooo n noooo no noo noooo nooooo noo noo

world through so small an eye, and hear the thunder through an ear which
noooo noooooo no noooo no noo, noo nooo noo noooooo noooooo no noo noooo

is smaller than a hare's? But if his eyes were broad as the lens of
no noooooo nooo n nooo'n? Noo no noo nooo nooo noooo no noo nooo no

Herschel's great telescope; and his ears capacious as the porches of
Nooooooo'n noooo noooooooo; noo noo nooo noooooooo no noo noooooo no

cathedrals; would that make him any longer of sight, or sharper of
nooooooooo; noooo nooo nooo noo noo nooooo no noooo, no noooooo no

hearing? Not at all.--Why then do you try to "enlarge" your mind?
noooooo? Noo no noo.--Noo nooo no noo noo no "noooooo" nooo nooo?

Subtilize it.
Noooooooo no.




Let us now with whatever levers and steam-engines we have at hand, cant
Noo no noo nooo nooooooo nooooo noo noooo-noooooo no nooo no nooo, nooo

over the sperm whale's head, that it may lie bottom up; then, ascending
nooo noo noooo noooo'n nooo, nooo no noo noo nooooo no; nooo, noooooooo

by a ladder to the summit, have a peep down the mouth; and were it not
no n nooooo no noo nooooo, nooo n nooo nooo noo noooo; noo nooo no noo

that the body is now completely separated from it, with a lantern we
nooo noo nooo no noo nooooooooo noooooooo nooo no, nooo n noooooo no

might descend into the great Kentucky Mammoth Cave of his stomach. But
noooo noooooo nooo noo noooo Nooooooo Noooooo Nooo no noo noooooo. Noo

let us hold on here by this tooth, and look about us where we are. What
noo no nooo no nooo no nooo noooo, noo nooo noooo no noooo no noo. Nooo

a really beautiful and chaste-looking mouth! from floor to ceiling,
n nooooo noooooooo noo nooooo-noooooo noooo! nooo noooo no noooooo,

lined, or rather papered with a glistening white membrane, glossy as
noooo, no nooooo noooooo nooo n nooooooooo noooo nooooooo, nooooo no

bridal satins.
nooooo nooooo.




But come out now, and look at this portentous lower jaw, which seems
Noo nooo noo noo, noo nooo no nooo nooooooooo noooo noo, noooo noooo

like the long narrow lid of an immense snuff-box, with the hinge at one
nooo noo nooo nooooo noo no no noooooo noooo-noo, nooo noo noooo no noo

end, instead of one side. If you pry it up, so as to get it overhead,
noo, noooooo no noo nooo. No noo noo no no, no no no noo no nooooooo,

and expose its rows of teeth, it seems a terrific portcullis; and such,
noo nooooo noo nooo no noooo, no noooo n nooooooo nooooooooo; noo nooo,

alas! it proves to many a poor wight in the fishery, upon whom these
nooo! no nooooo no nooo n nooo noooo no noo noooooo, nooo nooo noooo

spikes fall with impaling force. But far more terrible is it to behold,
nooooo nooo nooo nooooooo noooo. Noo noo nooo nooooooo no no no nooooo,

when fathoms down in the sea, you see some sulky whale, floating there
nooo noooooo nooo no noo noo, noo noo nooo noooo noooo, nooooooo noooo

suspended, with his prodigious jaw, some fifteen feet long, hanging
noooooooo, nooo noo nooooooooo noo, nooo noooooo nooo nooo, noooooo

straight down at right-angles with his body, for all the world like a
nooooooo nooo no noooo-nooooo nooo noo nooo, noo noo noo noooo nooo n

ship's jib-boom. This whale is not dead; he is only dispirited; out of
nooo'n noo-nooo. Nooo noooo no noo nooo; no no nooo nooooooooo; noo no

sorts, perhaps; hypochondriac; and so supine, that the hinges of his
noooo, noooooo; noooooooooooo; noo no nooooo, nooo noo nooooo no noo

jaw have relaxed, leaving him there in that ungainly sort of plight, a
noo nooo noooooo, noooooo noo noooo no nooo nooooooo nooo no nooooo, n

reproach to all his tribe, who must, no doubt, imprecate lock-jaws upon
nooooooo no noo noo noooo, noo nooo, no noooo, noooooooo nooo-nooo nooo

him.
noo.




In most cases this lower jaw--being easily unhinged by a practised
No nooo noooo nooo noooo noo--noooo nooooo nooooooo no n noooooooo

artist--is disengaged and hoisted on deck for the purpose of extracting
nooooo--no nooooooooo noo noooooo no nooo noo noo noooooo no nooooooooo

the ivory teeth, and furnishing a supply of that hard white whalebone
noo noooo noooo, noo nooooooooo n nooooo no nooo nooo noooo noooooooo

with which the fishermen fashion all sorts of curious articles,
nooo noooo noo noooooooo noooooo noo noooo no noooooo nooooooo,

including canes, umbrella-stocks, and handles to riding-whips.
noooooooo noooo, nooooooo-nooooo, noo noooooo no nooooo-noooo.




With a long, weary hoist the jaw is dragged on board, as if it were an
Nooo n nooo, noooo noooo noo noo no noooooo no noooo, no no no nooo no

anchor; and when the proper time comes--some few days after the other
nooooo; noo nooo noo nooooo nooo noooo--nooo noo nooo noooo noo noooo

work--Queequeg, Daggoo, and Tashtego, being all accomplished dentists,
nooo--Nooooooo, Nooooo, noo Nooooooo, noooo noo nooooooooooo nooooooo,

are set to drawing teeth. With a keen cutting-spade, Queequeg lances
noo noo no noooooo noooo. Nooo n nooo noooooo-noooo, Nooooooo nooooo

the gums; then the jaw is lashed down to ringbolts, and a tackle being
noo nooo; nooo noo noo no nooooo nooo no noooooooo, noo n nooooo noooo

rigged from aloft, they drag out these teeth, as Michigan oxen drag
nooooo nooo noooo, nooo nooo noo noooo noooo, no Nooooooo nooo nooo

stumps of old oaks out of wild wood lands. There are generally forty-two
nooooo no noo nooo noo no nooo nooo noooo. Noooo noo noooooooo noooo-noo

teeth in all; in old whales, much worn down, but undecayed; nor filled
noooo no noo; no noo nooooo, nooo nooo nooo, noo noooooooo; noo nooooo

after our artificial fashion. The jaw is afterwards sawn into slabs, and
noooo noo nooooooooo noooooo. Noo noo no nooooooooo nooo nooo noooo, noo

piled away like joists for building houses.
noooo nooo nooo nooooo noo nooooooo nooooo.










CHAPTER 75. The Right Whale's Head--Contrasted View.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo Noooo'n Nooo--Nooooooooo Nooo.







Crossing the deck, let us now have a good long look at the Right Whale's
Nooooooo noo nooo, noo no noo nooo n nooo nooo nooo no noo Noooo Noooo'n

head.
nooo.




As in general shape the noble Sperm Whale's head may be compared to a
No no noooooo noooo noo noooo Noooo Noooo'n nooo noo no nooooooo no n

Roman war-chariot (especially in front, where it is so broadly rounded);
Noooo noo-noooooo (nooooooooo no noooo, noooo no no no noooooo noooooo);

so, at a broad view, the Right Whale's head bears a rather inelegant
no, no n noooo nooo, noo Noooo Noooo'n nooo noooo n nooooo noooooooo

resemblance to a gigantic galliot-toed shoe. Two hundred years ago an
noooooooooo no n nooooooo noooooo-nooo nooo. Noo noooooo noooo noo no

old Dutch voyager likened its shape to that of a shoemaker's last. And
noo Noooo noooooo noooooo noo noooo no nooo no n noooooooo'n nooo. Noo

in this same last or shoe, that old woman of the nursery tale, with
no nooo nooo nooo no nooo, nooo noo noooo no noo noooooo nooo, nooo

the swarming brood, might very comfortably be lodged, she and all her
noo nooooooo noooo, noooo nooo noooooooooo no nooooo, noo noo noo noo

progeny.
noooooo.




But as you come nearer to this great head it begins to assume different
Noo no noo nooo nooooo no nooo noooo nooo no nooooo no nooooo noooooooo

aspects, according to your point of view. If you stand on its summit and
noooooo, noooooooo no nooo noooo no nooo. No noo noooo no noo nooooo noo

look at these two F-shaped spoutholes, you would take the whole head
nooo no noooo noo N-nooooo nooooooooo, noo noooo nooo noo noooo nooo

for an enormous bass-viol, and these spiracles, the apertures in its
noo no nooooooo nooo-nooo, noo noooo noooooooo, noo noooooooo no noo

sounding-board. Then, again, if you fix your eye upon this strange,
nooooooo-noooo. Nooo, noooo, no noo noo nooo noo nooo nooo noooooo,

crested, comb-like incrustation on the top of the mass--this green,
noooooo, nooo-nooo nooooooooooo no noo noo no noo nooo--nooo noooo,

barnacled thing, which the Greenlanders call the "crown," and the
noooooooo noooo, noooo noo Nooooooooooo nooo noo "noooo," noo noo

Southern fishers the "bonnet" of the Right Whale; fixing your eyes
Nooooooo noooooo noo "nooooo" no noo Noooo Noooo; nooooo nooo nooo

solely on this, you would take the head for the trunk of some huge oak,
nooooo no nooo, noo noooo nooo noo nooo noo noo noooo no nooo nooo noo,

with a bird's nest in its crotch. At any rate, when you watch those live
nooo n nooo'n nooo no noo nooooo. No noo nooo, nooo noo noooo noooo nooo

noooo nooo nooooo nooo no nooo nooooo, nooo no nooo nooo no nooooo

nooo no noooo no noo; nooooo, nooooo, nooo noooo noo nooo noooo no noo

technical term "crown" also bestowed upon it; in which case you will
noooooooo nooo "noooo" nooo nooooooo nooo no; no noooo nooo noo nooo

take great interest in thinking how this mighty monster is actually a
nooo noooo nooooooo no nooooooo noo nooo nooooo noooooo no nooooooo n

diademed king of the sea, whose green crown has been put together for
nooooooo nooo no noo noo, noooo noooo noooo noo nooo noo nooooooo noo

him in this marvellous manner. But if this whale be a king, he is a very
noo no nooo nooooooooo nooooo. Noo no nooo noooo no n nooo, no no n nooo

sulky looking fellow to grace a diadem. Look at that hanging lower lip!
noooo noooooo nooooo no noooo n nooooo. Nooo no nooo noooooo noooo noo!

what a huge sulk and pout is there! a sulk and pout, by carpenter's
nooo n nooo nooo noo nooo no noooo! n nooo noo nooo, no noooooooo'n

measurement, about twenty feet long and five feet deep; a sulk and pout
noooooooooo, noooo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo nooo nooo; n nooo noo nooo

that will yield you some 500 gallons of oil and more.
nooo nooo noooo noo nooo noo noooooo no noo noo nooo.




A great pity, now, that this unfortunate whale should be hare-lipped.
N noooo nooo, noo, nooo nooo noooooooooo noooo nooooo no nooo-nooooo.

The fissure is about a foot across. Probably the mother during an
Noo noooooo no noooo n nooo nooooo. Nooooooo noo nooooo nooooo no

important interval was sailing down the Peruvian coast, when earthquakes
noooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo nooo noo Nooooooo noooo, nooo noooooooooo

caused the beach to gape. Over this lip, as over a slippery threshold,
nooooo noo noooo no nooo. Nooo nooo noo, no nooo n nooooooo noooooooo,

we now slide into the mouth. Upon my word were I at Mackinaw, I should
no noo noooo nooo noo noooo. Nooo no nooo nooo N no Nooooooo, N nooooo

take this to be the inside of an Indian wigwam. Good Lord! is this the
nooo nooo no no noo nooooo no no Nooooo nooooo. Nooo Nooo! no nooo noo

road that Jonah went? The roof is about twelve feet high, and runs to a
nooo nooo Noooo nooo? Noo nooo no noooo nooooo nooo nooo, noo nooo no n

nooooo noooo noooo, no no noooo nooo n noooooo noooo-nooo noooo; noooo

these ribbed, arched, hairy sides, present us with those wondrous, half
noooo nooooo, nooooo, noooo noooo, noooooo no nooo noooo nooooooo, nooo

nooooooo, nooooooo-nooooo noooo no noooooooo, noo noooo noooooo no n

nooo, noooo noooooooo nooo noo noooo nooo no noo nooo no noooo

nooo, nooo noooo Nooooooo nooooo noooo nooo noooooooo nooo noooooooo

noooooooo. Noo noooo no noooo noooo noo noooooo nooo noooo nooooo,

through which the Right Whale strains the water, and in whose
noooooo noooo noo Noooo Noooo noooooo noo noooo, noo no noooo

noooooooooo no noooooo noo noooo nooo, nooo noooooooooo no nooo noooooo

noo nooo no nooo no noooooo nooo. No noo noooooo nooooo no nooo, no nooo

noooo no noooo noooooo noooo, noooo noo noooooo noooooo noooo, nooooo,

hollows, and ridges, whereby some whalemen calculate the creature's age,
noooooo, noo nooooo, noooooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo'n noo,

no noo noo no no noo no noo nooooooo noooo. Nooooo noo noooooooo no nooo

noooooooooo. No noo nooo, no no noooo no no, no nooo noooo n noo noooooo

age to the Right Whale than at first glance will seem reasonable.
noo no noo Noooo Noooo nooo no noooo nooooo nooo nooo nooooooooo.




In old times, there seem to have prevailed the most curious fancies

upper CHOP, which arch over his tongue on each side of his mouth."
noooo NOOO, noooo nooo nooo noo nooooo no nooo nooo no noo noooo."







*This reminds us that the Right Whale really has a sort of whisker, or

noooooooooo.







As every one knows, these same "hogs' bristles," "fins," "whiskers,"
No noooo noo noooo, noooo nooo "nooo' nooooooo," "nooo," "nooooooo,"

But now forget all about blinds and whiskers for a moment, and, standing

no no nooo. Nooo nooooooooo nooooo noo nooooo no; no n noooooo nooooo N

nooooo noo no noo n noo-nooooooo; nooo no, no nooo noooo noo noooo nooo

amount of oil.
nooooo no noo.




Ere this, you must have plainly seen the truth of what I started

no noooo nooooo no nooo; no nooo noooo noo; noo nooooooo nooooooo no n

Whale only one.
Noooo nooo noo.




Look your last, now, on these venerable hooded heads, while they yet lie
Nooo nooo nooo, noo, no noooo noooooooo nooooo noooo, noooo nooo noo noo

nooooooo; noo noo nooo nooo nooo, nooooooooo, no noo noo; noo noooo nooo

noo no nooo nooo no noooooooo.




Can you catch the expression of the Sperm Whale's there? It is the same
Noo noo noooo noo nooooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo'n noooo? No no noo nooo

CHAPTER 76. The Battering-Ram.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooooo-Noo.







Ere quitting, for the nonce, the Sperm Whale's head, I would have
Noo nooooooo, noo noo noooo, noo Noooo Noooo'n nooo, N noooo nooo

you, as a sensible physiologist, simply--particularly remark its front
noo, no n nooooooo nooooooooooo, nooooo--nooooooooooo nooooo noo noooo

aspect, in all its compacted collectedness. I would have you investigate
nooooo, no noo noo noooooooo noooooooooooo. N noooo nooo noo noooooooooo

it now with the sole view of forming to yourself some unexaggerated,
no noo nooo noo nooo nooo no noooooo no nooooooo nooo noooooooooooo,

intelligent estimate of whatever battering-ram power may be lodged
noooooooooo nooooooo no nooooooo noooooooo-noo noooo noo no nooooo

there. Here is a vital point; for you must either satisfactorily settle
noooo. Nooo no n noooo noooo; noo noo nooo nooooo nooooooooooooo nooooo

this matter with yourself, or for ever remain an infidel as to one of
nooo nooooo nooo nooooooo, no noo nooo nooooo no noooooo no no noo no

the most appalling, but not the less true events, perhaps anywhere to be
noo nooo noooooooo, noo noo noo nooo nooo nooooo, noooooo nooooooo no no

found in all recorded history.
noooo no noo nooooooo noooooo.




You observe that in the ordinary swimming position of the Sperm Whale,
Noo noooooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooooooo nooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo,

the front of his head presents an almost wholly vertical plane to the
noo noooo no noo nooo nooooooo no nooooo nooooo nooooooo noooo no noo

water; you observe that the lower part of that front slopes considerably
noooo; noo noooooo nooo noo noooo nooo no nooo noooo nooooo nooooooooooo

backwards, so as to furnish more of a retreat for the long socket which
noooooooo, no no no noooooo nooo no n noooooo noo noo nooo nooooo noooo

receives the boom-like lower jaw; you observe that the mouth is entirely
nooooooo noo nooo-nooo noooo noo; noo noooooo nooo noo noooo no nooooooo

under the head, much in the same way, indeed, as though your own mouth
noooo noo nooo, nooo no noo nooo noo, nooooo, no nooooo nooo noo noooo

were entirely under your chin. Moreover you observe that the whale has
nooo nooooooo noooo nooo nooo. Nooooooo noo noooooo nooo noo noooo noo

no external nose; and that what nose he has--his spout hole--is on the
no nooooooo nooo; noo nooo nooo nooo no noo--noo noooo nooo--no no noo

top of his head; you observe that his eyes and ears are at the sides
noo no noo nooo; noo noooooo nooo noo nooo noo nooo noo no noo noooo

of his head, nearly one third of his entire length from the front.
no noo nooo, nooooo noo noooo no noo nooooo nooooo nooo noo noooo.

Wherefore, you must now have perceived that the front of the Sperm
Noooooooo, noo nooo noo nooo noooooooo nooo noo noooo no noo Noooo

Whale's head is a dead, blind wall, without a single organ or tender
Noooo'n nooo no n nooo, noooo nooo, noooooo n nooooo noooo no nooooo

prominence of any sort whatsoever. Furthermore, you are now to consider
nooooooooo no noo nooo nooooooooo. Noooooooooo, noo noo noo no nooooooo

that only in the extreme, lower, backward sloping part of the front of
nooo nooo no noo noooooo, noooo, nooooooo noooooo nooo no noo noooo no

the head, is there the slightest vestige of bone; and not till you
noo nooo, no noooo noo noooooooo noooooo no nooo; noo noo nooo noo

get near twenty feet from the forehead do you come to the full cranial
noo nooo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo no noo nooo no noo nooo noooooo

development. So that this whole enormous boneless mass is as one wad.
noooooooooo. No nooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooooooo nooo no no noo noo.

Finally, though, as will soon be revealed, its contents partly comprise
Noooooo, nooooo, no nooo nooo no nooooooo, noo nooooooo nooooo nooooooo

the most delicate oil; yet, you are now to be apprised of the nature of
noo nooo nooooooo noo; noo, noo noo noo no no nooooooo no noo nooooo no

the substance which so impregnably invests all that apparent effeminacy.
noo noooooooo noooo no noooooooooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooo nooooooooo.

In some previous place I have described to you how the blubber wraps the
No nooo nooooooo noooo N nooo noooooooo no noo noo noo noooooo noooo noo

body of the whale, as the rind wraps an orange. Just so with the head;
nooo no noo noooo, no noo nooo noooo no nooooo. Nooo no nooo noo nooo;

but with this difference: about the head this envelope, though not so
noo nooo nooo nooooooooo: noooo noo nooo nooo nooooooo, nooooo noo no

thick, is of a boneless toughness, inestimable by any man who has not
noooo, no no n nooooooo noooooooo, noooooooooo no noo noo noo noo noo

handled it. The severest pointed harpoon, the sharpest lance darted by
noooooo no. Noo nooooooo noooooo noooooo, noo nooooooo noooo nooooo no

the strongest human arm, impotently rebounds from it. It is as though
noo noooooooo noooo noo, nooooooooo nooooooo nooo no. No no no nooooo

the forehead of the Sperm Whale were paved with horses' hoofs. I do not
noo nooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo nooo noooo nooo nooooo' noooo. N no noo

think that any sensation lurks in it.
noooo nooo noo noooooooo noooo no no.




Bethink yourself also of another thing. When two large, loaded Indiamen
Noooooo nooooooo nooo no noooooo noooo. Nooo noo noooo, nooooo Nooooooo

chance to crowd and crush towards each other in the docks, what do the
nooooo no noooo noo noooo noooooo nooo noooo no noo noooo, nooo no noo

sailors do? They do not suspend between them, at the point of coming
noooooo no? Nooo no noo noooooo noooooo nooo, no noo noooo no nooooo

contact, any merely hard substance, like iron or wood. No, they hold
noooooo, noo nooooo nooo noooooooo, nooo nooo no nooo. No, nooo nooo

there a large, round wad of tow and cork, enveloped in the thickest
noooo n noooo, noooo noo no noo noo nooo, noooooooo no noo nooooooo

and toughest of ox-hide. That bravely and uninjured takes the jam which
noo nooooooo no no-nooo. Nooo noooooo noo noooooooo noooo noo noo noooo

would have snapped all their oaken handspikes and iron crow-bars. By
noooo nooo noooooo noo noooo noooo nooooooooo noo nooo nooo-nooo. No

itself this sufficiently illustrates the obvious fact I drive at. But
nooooo nooo nooooooooooo noooooooooo noo noooooo nooo N noooo no. Noo

supplementary to this, it has hypothetically occurred to me, that
noooooooooooo no nooo, no noo nooooooooooooo nooooooo no no, nooo

as ordinary fish possess what is called a swimming bladder in them,
no nooooooo nooo noooooo nooo no nooooo n nooooooo noooooo no nooo,

capable, at will, of distension or contraction; and as the Sperm Whale,
noooooo, no nooo, no nooooooooo no noooooooooo; noo no noo Noooo Noooo,

as far as I know, has no such provision in him; considering, too,
no noo no N nooo, noo no nooo noooooooo no noo; noooooooooo, noo,

the otherwise inexplicable manner in which he now depresses his head
noo noooooooo nooooooooooo nooooo no noooo no noo noooooooo noo nooo

altogether beneath the surface, and anon swims with it high elevated out
nooooooooo noooooo noo noooooo, noo nooo noooo nooo no nooo nooooooo noo

of the water; considering the unobstructed elasticity of its envelope;
no noo noooo; noooooooooo noo nooooooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooooo;

considering the unique interior of his head; it has hypothetically
noooooooooo noo nooooo nooooooo no noo nooo; no noo nooooooooooooo

occurred to me, I say, that those mystical lung-celled honeycombs there
nooooooo no no, N noo, nooo noooo nooooooo nooo-nooooo nooooooooo noooo

may possibly have some hitherto unknown and unsuspected connexion with
noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo noooooo noo noooooooooo noooooooo nooo

the outer air, so as to be susceptible to atmospheric distension and
noo noooo noo, no no no no noooooooooo no noooooooooo nooooooooo noo

contraction. If this be so, fancy the irresistibleness of that might, to
noooooooooo. No nooo no no, noooo noo nooooooooooooooo no nooo noooo, no

which the most impalpable and destructive of all elements contributes.
noooo noo nooo nooooooooo noo noooooooooo no noo nooooooo noooooooooo.




Now, mark. Unerringly impelling this dead, impregnable, uninjurable
Noo, nooo. Nooooooooo noooooooo nooo nooo, noooooooooo, noooooooooo

wall, and this most buoyant thing within; there swims behind it all a
nooo, noo nooo nooo noooooo noooo nooooo; noooo noooo nooooo no noo n

mass of tremendous life, only to be adequately estimated as piled wood
nooo no nooooooooo nooo, nooo no no nooooooooo noooooooo no noooo nooo

is--by the cord; and all obedient to one volition, as the smallest
no--no noo nooo; noo noo nooooooo no noo nooooooo, no noo nooooooo

insect. So that when I shall hereafter detail to you all the
nooooo. No nooo nooo N noooo noooooooo nooooo no noo noo noo

specialities and concentrations of potency everywhere lurking in this
nooooooooooo noo nooooooooooooo no noooooo nooooooooo noooooo no nooo

expansive monster; when I shall show you some of his more inconsiderable
noooooooo noooooo; nooo N noooo nooo noo nooo no noo nooo nooooooooooooo

braining feats; I trust you will have renounced all ignorant
nooooooo noooo; N noooo noo nooo nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo

incredulity, and be ready to abide by this; that though the Sperm Whale
noooooooooo, noo no noooo no noooo no nooo; nooo nooooo noo Noooo Noooo

stove a passage through the Isthmus of Darien, and mixed the Atlantic
noooo n noooooo noooooo noo Noooooo no Nooooo, noo noooo noo Nooooooo

with the Pacific, you would not elevate one hair of your eye-brow. For
nooo noo Noooooo, noo noooo noo noooooo noo nooo no nooo noo-nooo. Noo

unless you own the whale, you are but a provincial and sentimentalist
nooooo noo noo noo noooo, noo noo noo n nooooooooo noo nooooooooooooo

in Truth. But clear Truth is a thing for salamander giants only to
no Noooo. Noo noooo Noooo no n noooo noo nooooooooo nooooo nooo no

encounter; how small the chances for the provincials then? What befell
noooooooo; noo noooo noo noooooo noo noo noooooooooo nooo? Nooo nooooo

the weakling youth lifting the dread goddess's veil at Lais?
noo nooooooo noooo noooooo noo noooo noooooo'n nooo no Nooo?










CHAPTER 77. The Great Heidelburgh Tun.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo Noooooooooo Noo.







Now comes the Baling of the Case. But to comprehend it aright, you must
Noo noooo noo Nooooo no noo Nooo. Noo no nooooooooo no nooooo, noo nooo

know something of the curious internal structure of the thing operated
nooo noooooooo no noo noooooo nooooooo noooooooo no noo noooo nooooooo

upon.
nooo.




Regarding the Sperm Whale's head as a solid oblong, you may, on an
Noooooooo noo Noooo Noooo'n nooo no n noooo nooooo, noo noo, no no

inclined plane, sideways divide it into two quoins,* whereof the lower
nooooooo noooo, nooooooo nooooo no nooo noo nooooo,* noooooo noo noooo

is the bony structure, forming the cranium and jaws, and the upper an
no noo nooo noooooooo, noooooo noo noooooo noo nooo, noo noo noooo no

unctuous mass wholly free from bones; its broad forward end forming the
nooooooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo noooo; noo noooo noooooo noo noooooo noo

expanded vertical apparent forehead of the whale. At the middle of the
nooooooo nooooooo nooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo. No noo nooooo no noo

forehead horizontally subdivide this upper quoin, and then you have two
nooooooo nooooooooooo noooooooo nooo noooo noooo, noo nooo noo nooo noo

almost equal parts, which before were naturally divided by an internal
nooooo noooo noooo, noooo nooooo nooo noooooooo noooooo no no nooooooo

wall of a thick tendinous substance.
nooo no n noooo noooooooo noooooooo.







*Quoin is not a Euclidean term. It belongs to the pure nautical
*Noooo no noo n Noooooooo nooo. No noooooo no noo nooo nooooooo

mathematics. I know not that it has been defined before. A quoin is a
noooooooooo. N nooo noo nooo no noo nooo noooooo nooooo. N noooo no n

solid which differs from a wedge in having its sharp end formed by the
noooo noooo noooooo nooo n noooo no nooooo noo noooo noo nooooo no noo

steep inclination of one side, instead of the mutual tapering of both
noooo noooooooooo no noo nooo, noooooo no noo nooooo nooooooo no nooo

sides.
noooo.







The lower subdivided part, called the junk, is one immense honeycomb
Noo noooo nooooooooo nooo, nooooo noo nooo, no noo noooooo noooooooo

of oil, formed by the crossing and recrossing, into ten thousand
no noo, nooooo no noo nooooooo noo nooooooooo, nooo noo nooooooo

infiltrated cells, of tough elastic white fibres throughout its whole
noooooooooo noooo, no noooo noooooo noooo nooooo nooooooooo noo noooo

extent. The upper part, known as the Case, may be regarded as the great
nooooo. Noo noooo nooo, noooo no noo Nooo, noo no nooooooo no noo noooo

Heidelburgh Tun of the Sperm Whale. And as that famous great tierce is
Noooooooooo Noo no noo Noooo Noooo. Noo no nooo nooooo noooo nooooo no

mystically carved in front, so the whale's vast plaited forehead forms
nooooooooo nooooo no noooo, no noo noooo'n nooo noooooo nooooooo noooo

innumerable strange devices for the emblematical adornment of his
noooooooooo noooooo noooooo noo noo nooooooooooo noooooooo no noo

wondrous tun. Moreover, as that of Heidelburgh was always replenished
nooooooo noo. Nooooooo, no nooo no Noooooooooo noo nooooo noooooooooo

with the most excellent of the wines of the Rhenish valleys, so the tun
nooo noo nooo noooooooo no noo noooo no noo Noooooo noooooo, no noo noo

of the whale contains by far the most precious of all his oily vintages;
no noo noooo nooooooo no noo noo nooo nooooooo no noo noo nooo nooooooo;

namely, the highly-prized spermaceti, in its absolutely pure, limpid,
nooooo, noo nooooo-nooooo nooooooooo, no noo nooooooooo nooo, nooooo,

and odoriferous state. Nor is this precious substance found unalloyed
noo noooooooooo noooo. Noo no nooo nooooooo noooooooo noooo noooooooo

in any other part of the creature. Though in life it remains perfectly
no noo noooo nooo no noo nooooooo. Nooooo no nooo no noooooo noooooooo

fluid, yet, upon exposure to the air, after death, it soon begins to
noooo, noo, nooo nooooooo no noo noo, noooo noooo, no nooo nooooo no

concrete; sending forth beautiful crystalline shoots, as when the
nooooooo; noooooo noooo noooooooo noooooooooo nooooo, no nooo noo

first thin delicate ice is just forming in water. A large whale's
noooo nooo nooooooo noo no nooo noooooo no noooo. N noooo noooo'n

case generally yields about five hundred gallons of sperm, though from
nooo noooooooo nooooo noooo nooo noooooo noooooo no noooo, nooooo nooo

unavoidable circumstances, considerable of it is spilled, leaks, and
noooooooooo noooooooooooo, nooooooooooo no no no noooooo, noooo, noo

dribbles away, or is otherwise irrevocably lost in the ticklish business
nooooooo nooo, no no noooooooo noooooooooo nooo no noo nooooooo nooooooo

of securing what you can.
no nooooooo nooo noo noo.




I know not with what fine and costly material the Heidelburgh Tun
N nooo noo nooo nooo nooo noo nooooo nooooooo noo Noooooooooo Noo

was coated within, but in superlative richness that coating could not
noo nooooo nooooo, noo no noooooooooo nooooooo nooo noooooo noooo noo

possibly have compared with the silken pearl-coloured membrane, like the
nooooooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo noooo-nooooooo nooooooo, nooo noo

lining of a fine pelisse, forming the inner surface of the Sperm Whale's
nooooo no n nooo noooooo, noooooo noo noooo noooooo no noo Noooo Noooo'n

case.
nooo.




It will have been seen that the Heidelburgh Tun of the Sperm Whale
No nooo nooo nooo nooo nooo noo Noooooooooo Noo no noo Noooo Noooo

embraces the entire length of the entire top of the head; and since--as
nooooooo noo nooooo nooooo no noo nooooo noo no noo nooo; noo noooo--no

has been elsewhere set forth--the head embraces one third of the whole
noo nooo noooooooo noo noooo--noo nooo nooooooo noo noooo no noo noooo

length of the creature, then setting that length down at eighty feet for
nooooo no noo nooooooo, nooo noooooo nooo nooooo nooo no nooooo nooo noo

a good sized whale, you have more than twenty-six feet for the depth
n nooo noooo noooo, noo nooo nooo nooo nooooo-noo nooo noo noo noooo

of the tun, when it is lengthwise hoisted up and down against a ship's
no noo noo, nooo no no nooooooooo noooooo no noo nooo noooooo n nooo'n

side.
nooo.




As in decapitating the whale, the operator's instrument is brought close
No no nooooooooooo noo noooo, noo nooooooo'n nooooooooo no noooooo noooo

to the spot where an entrance is subsequently forced into the spermaceti
no noo nooo noooo no nooooooo no nooooooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooooooooo

magazine; he has, therefore, to be uncommonly heedful, lest a careless,
nooooooo; no noo, noooooooo, no no nooooooooo noooooo, nooo n nooooooo,

nooooooo nooooo nooooo nooooo noo noooooooo noo noooooooo noo noo noo

nooooooooo nooooooo. No no nooo noooooooooo noo no noo nooo, nooo, noooo

no no nooo nooooooo noo no noo noooo, noo nooooooo no nooo nooooooo no

noo nooooooo noooooo noooooo, noooo nooooo nooooooooooo, no noo nooo,

make quite a wilderness of ropes in that quarter.
nooo noooo n nooooooooo no noooo no nooo noooooo.




Thus much being said, attend now, I pray you, to that marvellous and--in
Nooo nooo noooo nooo, nooooo noo, N nooo noo, no nooo nooooooooo noo--no

this particular instance--almost fatal operation whereby the Sperm
nooo nooooooooo nooooooo--nooooo noooo noooooooo noooooo noo Noooo

Whale's great Heidelburgh Tun is tapped.
Noooo'n noooo Noooooooooo Noo no nooooo.










CHAPTER 78. Cistern and Buckets.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooo noo Noooooo.







Nimble as a cat, Tashtego mounts aloft; and without altering his erect
Nooooo no n noo, Nooooooo nooooo noooo; noo noooooo nooooooo noo noooo

posture, runs straight out upon the overhanging mainyard-arm, to the
noooooo, nooo nooooooo noo nooo noo noooooooooo nooooooo-noo, no noo

part where it exactly projects over the hoisted Tun. He has carried
nooo noooo no noooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooooo Noo. No noo noooooo

with him a light tackle called a whip, consisting of only two parts,
nooo noo n noooo nooooo nooooo n nooo, nooooooooo no nooo noo noooo,

travelling through a single-sheaved block. Securing this block, so that
nooooooooo noooooo n nooooo-noooooo noooo. Nooooooo nooo noooo, no nooo

it hangs down from the yard-arm, he swings one end of the rope, till it
no noooo nooo nooo noo nooo-noo, no nooooo noo noo no noo nooo, nooo no

is caught and firmly held by a hand on deck. Then, hand-over-hand, down
no nooooo noo nooooo nooo no n nooo no nooo. Nooo, nooo-nooo-nooo, nooo

the other part, the Indian drops through the air, till dexterously he
noo noooo nooo, noo Nooooo noooo noooooo noo noo, nooo noooooooooo no

lands on the summit of the head. There--still high elevated above the
noooo no noo nooooo no noo nooo. Noooo--noooo nooo nooooooo noooo noo

rest of the company, to whom he vivaciously cries--he seems some Turkish
nooo no noo noooooo, no nooo no noooooooooo noooo--no noooo nooo Noooooo

Muezzin calling the good people to prayers from the top of a tower. A
Noooooo noooooo noo nooo nooooo no noooooo nooo noo noo no n noooo. N

short-handled sharp spade being sent up to him, he diligently searches
noooo-noooooo noooo noooo noooo nooo no no noo, no nooooooooo nooooooo

for the proper place to begin breaking into the Tun. In this business
noo noo nooooo noooo no noooo nooooooo nooo noo Noo. No nooo nooooooo

he proceeds very heedfully, like a treasure-hunter in some old house,
no nooooooo nooo noooooooo, nooo n nooooooo-nooooo no nooo noo noooo,

sounding the walls to find where the gold is masoned in. By the time
nooooooo noo noooo no nooo noooo noo nooo no noooooo no. No noo nooo

this cautious search is over, a stout iron-bound bucket, precisely like
nooo nooooooo nooooo no nooo, n noooo nooo-noooo nooooo, noooooooo nooo

a well-bucket, has been attached to one end of the whip; while the other
n nooo-nooooo, noo nooo nooooooo no noo noo no noo nooo; noooo noo noooo

end, being stretched across the deck, is there held by two or three
noo, noooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo, no noooo nooo no noo no noooo

alert hands. These last now hoist the bucket within grasp of the Indian,
noooo noooo. Noooo nooo noo noooo noo nooooo nooooo noooo no noo Nooooo,

to whom another person has reached up a very long pole. Inserting this
no nooo noooooo nooooo noo noooooo no n nooo nooo nooo. Noooooooo nooo

pole into the bucket, Tashtego downward guides the bucket into the Tun,
nooo nooo noo nooooo, Nooooooo nooooooo nooooo noo nooooo nooo noo Noo,

till it entirely disappears; then giving the word to the seamen at the
nooo no nooooooo nooooooooo; nooo nooooo noo nooo no noo nooooo no noo

whip, up comes the bucket again, all bubbling like a dairy-maid's pail
nooo, no noooo noo nooooo noooo, noo nooooooo nooo n noooo-nooo'n nooo

of new milk. Carefully lowered from its height, the full-freighted
no noo nooo. Noooooooo noooooo nooo noo nooooo, noo nooo-noooooooo

vessel is caught by an appointed hand, and quickly emptied into a large
nooooo no nooooo no no noooooooo nooo, noo noooooo noooooo nooo n noooo

tub. Then remounting aloft, it again goes through the same round until
noo. Nooo nooooooooo noooo, no noooo nooo noooooo noo nooo noooo noooo

the deep cistern will yield no more. Towards the end, Tashtego has to
noo nooo noooooo nooo noooo no nooo. Noooooo noo noo, Nooooooo noo no

ram his long pole harder and harder, and deeper and deeper into the Tun,
noo noo nooo nooo nooooo noo nooooo, noo nooooo noo nooooo nooo noo Noo,

until some twenty feet of the pole have gone down.
noooo nooo nooooo nooo no noo nooo nooo nooo nooo.




Now, the people of the Pequod had been baling some time in this way;
Noo, noo nooooo no noo Nooooo noo nooo nooooo nooo nooo no nooo noo;

several tubs had been filled with the fragrant sperm; when all at once a
noooooo nooo noo nooo nooooo nooo noo nooooooo noooo; nooo noo no nooo n

queer accident happened. Whether it was that Tashtego, that wild Indian,
noooo nooooooo nooooooo. Noooooo no noo nooo Nooooooo, nooo nooo Nooooo,

was so heedless and reckless as to let go for a moment his one-handed
noo no nooooooo noo nooooooo no no noo no noo n nooooo noo noo-nooooo

hold on the great cabled tackles suspending the head; or whether the
nooo no noo noooo nooooo noooooo nooooooooo noo nooo; no noooooo noo

place where he stood was so treacherous and oozy; or whether the Evil
noooo noooo no noooo noo no noooooooooo noo nooo; no noooooo noo Nooo

One himself would have it to fall out so, without stating his particular
Noo noooooo noooo nooo no no nooo noo no, noooooo noooooo noo nooooooooo

reasons; how it was exactly, there is no telling now; but, on a sudden,
noooooo; noo no noo noooooo, noooo no no noooooo noo; noo, no n nooooo,

as the eightieth or ninetieth bucket came suckingly up--my God! poor
no noo noooooooo no noooooooo nooooo nooo noooooooo no--no Noo! nooo

Tashtego--like the twin reciprocating bucket in a veritable well,
Nooooooo--nooo noo nooo noooooooooooo nooooo no n noooooooo nooo,

dropped head-foremost down into this great Tun of Heidelburgh, and with
noooooo nooo-nooooooo nooo nooo nooo noooo Noo no Noooooooooo, noo nooo

a horrible oily gurgling, went clean out of sight!
n nooooooo nooo nooooooo, nooo noooo noo no noooo!




"Man overboard!" cried Daggoo, who amid the general consternation first
"Noo noooooooo!" noooo Nooooo, noo nooo noo noooooo noooooooooooo noooo

came to his senses. "Swing the bucket this way!" and putting one foot
nooo no noo nooooo. "Noooo noo nooooo nooo noo!" noo noooooo noo nooo

into it, so as the better to secure his slippery hand-hold on the whip
nooo no, no no noo nooooo no nooooo noo nooooooo nooo-nooo no noo nooo

nooooo, noo nooooooo noo noo nooo no no noo noo no noo nooo, nooooo

nooooo Nooooooo noooo nooo noooooo noo nooooooo nooooo. Nooooooo,

noooo noo n nooooooo nooooo. Noooooo nooo noo nooo, nooo noo noo nooooo

nooooooo nooo noooooooo noo noooooo nooo noooo noo noooooo no noo noo,

noo nooo Nooooo noooooooooooo noooooooo no noooo noooooooo noo nooooooo

depth to which he had sunk.
noooo no noooo no noo nooo.




At this instant, while Daggoo, on the summit of the head, was clearing
No nooo noooooo, noooo Nooooo, no noo nooooo no noo nooo, noo nooooooo

the whip--which had somehow got foul of the great cutting tackles--a
noo nooo--noooo noo noooooo noo nooo no noo noooo noooooo noooooo--n

noooo nooooooo noooo noo noooo; noo no noo noooooooooo nooooo no noo,

noo no noo noo nooooooo noooo nooooooooo noo nooo nooo noo, noo nooo

a vast vibration the enormous mass sideways swung, till the drunk ship
n nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo nooo nooooooo noooo, nooo noo noooo nooo

nooooo noo noooo no no noooooo no no noooooo. Noo noo noooooooo nooo,

nooo noooo noo nooooo nooooo noo nooooooo, nooooo noooo noooooo no no

on the point of giving way; an event still more likely from the violent
no noo noooo no nooooo noo; no noooo noooo nooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo

motions of the head.
noooooo no noo nooo.




"Come down, come down!" yelled the seamen to Daggoo, but with one hand
"Nooo nooo, nooo nooo!" nooooo noo nooooo no Nooooo, noo nooo noo nooo

holding on to the heavy tackles, so that if the head should drop, he
noooooo no no noo noooo noooooo, no nooo no noo nooo nooooo nooo, no

would still remain suspended; the negro having cleared the foul line,
noooo noooo nooooo noooooooo; noo noooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo nooo,

nooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo noo noo noooooooo nooo, noooooo nooo noo

nooooo nooooooooo nooooo noooo no, noo no no noooooo noo.




"In heaven's name, man," cried Stubb, "are you ramming home a cartridge

noo no noo nooo? Noooo, nooo no!"

"Noooo noooo no noo nooooo!" noooo n noooo nooo noo nooooooo no n

rocket.

nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo. Noo nooo, n nooo nooooo noooooooo nooo no

noooo Nooooooo noo noooo no noo nooooo. Noo nooooo nooo noo nooo no noo

nooooo nooo n nooo noooooooo, noo nooooo n nooooo noo nooo noo nooo.

overhead; and looking further off from the side, we saw an arm thrust

noooooo nooo noo nooo noooo; n noooo noooooo no noo, no no noo nooooo

noooo nooo noo noooo nooo n noooo.




"Both! both!--it is both!"--cried Daggoo again with a joyful shout; and
"Nooo! nooo!--no no nooo!"--noooo Nooooo noooo nooo n nooooo noooo; noo

nooo noooo, Nooooooo noo nooo nooooo nooooooo noo nooo noo nooo, noo

nooo noo noooo noooooooo noo nooo nooo no noo Nooooo. Noooo nooo noo

noooooo nooo, nooo nooo noooooo noooooo no noo nooo; noo Nooooooo noo

nooo no nooooo no, noo Nooooooo noo noo nooo nooo noooo.




Now, how had this noble rescue been accomplished? Why, diving after
Noo, noo noo nooo noooo nooooo nooo nooooooooooo? Noo, nooooo noooo

the slowly descending head, Queequeg with his keen sword had made
noo nooooo nooooooooo nooo, Nooooooo nooo noo nooo noooo noo nooo

side lunges near its bottom, so as to scuttle a large hole there; then
nooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo, no no no noooooo n noooo nooo noooo; nooo

nooooooo noo noooo, noo nooooo noo nooo noo noo noooooo noo noooooo,

and so hauled out poor Tash by the head. He averred, that upon first
noo no nooooo noo nooo Nooo no noo nooo. No noooooo, nooo nooo noooo

thrusting in for him, a leg was presented; but well knowing that that
noooooooo no noo noo, n noo noo noooooooo; noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo

was not as it ought to be, and might occasion great trouble;--he had
noo noo no no noooo no no, noo noooo nooooooo noooo noooooo;--no noo

nooooo nooo noo noo, noo no n noooooooo noooo noo nooo, noo noooooo n

nooooooo nooo noo Nooooo; no nooo nooo noo nooo noooo, no nooo noooo no

the good old way--head foremost. As for the great head itself, that was
noo nooo noo noo--nooo nooooooo. No noo noo noooo nooo nooooo, nooo noo

doing as well as could be expected.
noooo no nooo no noooo no nooooooo.




And thus, through the courage and great skill in obstetrics of Queequeg,
Noo nooo, noooooo noo noooooo noo noooo noooo no nooooooooo no Nooooooo,

the deliverance, or rather, delivery of Tashtego, was successfully
noo noooooooooo, no nooooo, nooooooo no Nooooooo, noo nooooooooooo

accomplished, in the teeth, too, of the most untoward and apparently
nooooooooooo, no noo noooo, noo, no noo nooo nooooooo noo nooooooooo

hopeless impediments; which is a lesson by no means to be forgotten.
nooooooo noooooooooo; noooo no n nooooo no no noooo no no noooooooo.

Midwifery should be taught in the same course with fencing and boxing,
Noooooooo nooooo no nooooo no noo nooo nooooo nooo noooooo noo nooooo,

riding and rowing.
nooooo noo nooooo.




I know that this queer adventure of the Gay-Header's will be sure to
N nooo nooo nooo noooo noooooooo no noo Noo-Nooooo'n nooo no nooo no

seem incredible to some landsmen, though they themselves may have either
nooo nooooooooo no nooo nooooooo, nooooo nooo nooooooooo noo nooo nooooo

seen or heard of some one's falling into a cistern ashore; an accident
nooo no noooo no nooo noo'n noooooo nooo n noooooo nooooo; no nooooooo

which not seldom happens, and with much less reason too than the
noooo noo nooooo noooooo, noo nooo nooo nooo nooooo noo nooo noo

Indian's, considering the exceeding slipperiness of the curb of the
Nooooo'n, noooooooooo noo noooooooo nooooooooooo no noo nooo no noo

Sperm Whale's well.
Noooo Noooo'n nooo.




But, peradventure, it may be sagaciously urged, how is this? We thought

noo noooooo, noooooooooo nooo no noo Noooo Noooo, noo noo nooooooo noo

nooo noooo nooo noooo noo; noo noo nooo nooooo no nooo no no noooooo no

n noo noooooo nooooooo noooooo nooo nooooo. No nooo nooo noooo. Noo no

noo, noo N nooo no; noo no noo nooo nooo Nooo nooo no, noo nooo noo nooo

nooo nooooo nooo, nooo noooooo nooo noo noo noooo, noo n nooo no noooo

noo nooooooooo noo noooo nooooooooo no noo noo, no noo noo noo. Noo, no

noo n noooooo nooooooo, no no noo.




Now, had Tashtego perished in that head, it had been a very precious
Noo, noo Nooooooo nooooooo no nooo nooo, no noo nooo n nooo nooooooo

CHAPTER 79. The Prairie.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooo.







To scan the lines of his face, or feel the bumps on the head of this
No nooo noo noooo no noo nooo, no nooo noo noooo no noo nooo no nooo

Leviathan; this is a thing which no Physiognomist or Phrenologist has as
Noooooooo; nooo no n noooo noooo no Noooooooooooo no Nooooooooooo noo no

yet undertaken. Such an enterprise would seem almost as hopeful as for

Noooooo no nooo noooooooooo noo nooooooo no noo Nooo no Noooooooo,

no noo Nooo no nooo noooooo n nooooo noo noooooooooo noo Nooo no noo

Nooooooo. Noooo, no nooo nooooo nooo no noo, Noooooo noo nooo nooooo

no noo noooooo noooo no noo, noo nooo noooooooooo noooooo noo noooo

noooooooooooo no nooooooooo noooooooooo noooooo. Noo nooo Nooo noo

nooooo N no noo noo noooooooo noo n noooooo, no noo noooooooooo no noooo

two semi-sciences to the whale, I will do my endeavor. I try all things;
noo nooo-nooooooo no noo noooo, N nooo no no nooooooo. N noo noo nooooo;

I achieve what I can.
N noooooo nooo N noo.




Physiognomically regarded, the Sperm Whale is an anomalous creature.
Nooooooooooooooo nooooooo, noo Noooo Noooo no no noooooooo nooooooo.

He has no proper nose. And since the nose is the central and most
No noo no nooooo nooo. Noo noooo noo nooo no noo noooooo noo nooo

conspicuous of the features; and since it perhaps most modifies and
noooooooooo no noo nooooooo; noo noooo no noooooo nooo nooooooo noo

finally controls their combined expression; hence it would seem that its
noooooo nooooooo noooo nooooooo nooooooooo; noooo no noooo nooo nooo noo

entire absence, as an external appendage, must very largely affect
nooooo noooooo, no no nooooooo noooooooo, nooo nooo noooooo nooooo

the countenance of the whale. For as in landscape gardening, a spire,
noo noooooooooo no noo noooo. Noo no no noooooooo noooooooo, n noooo,

cupola, monument, or tower of some sort, is deemed almost indispensable
nooooo, nooooooo, no noooo no nooo nooo, no nooooo nooooo noooooooooooo

to the completion of the scene; so no face can be physiognomically in
no noo nooooooooo no noo noooo; no no nooo noo no nooooooooooooooo no

keeping without the elevated open-work belfry of the nose. Dash the nose
noooooo noooooo noo nooooooo nooo-nooo nooooo no noo nooo. Nooo noo nooo

from Phidias's marble Jove, and what a sorry remainder! Nevertheless,
nooo Noooooo'n nooooo Nooo, noo nooo n noooo noooooooo! Nooooooooooo,

Leviathan is of so mighty a magnitude, all his proportions are so
Noooooooo no no no nooooo n noooooooo, noo noo noooooooooo noo no

stately, that the same deficiency which in the sculptured Jove were
noooooo, nooo noo nooo nooooooooo noooo no noo nooooooooo Nooo nooo

hideous, in him is no blemish at all. Nay, it is an added grandeur. A
noooooo, no noo no no noooooo no noo. Noo, no no no noooo nooooooo. N

nose to the whale would have been impertinent. As on your physiognomical
nooo no noo noooo noooo nooo nooo noooooooooo. No no nooo nooooooooooooo

voyage you sail round his vast head in your jolly-boat, your noble
nooooo noo nooo noooo noo nooo nooo no nooo noooo-nooo, nooo noooo

conceptions of him are never insulted by the reflection that he has a
noooooooooo no noo noo noooo nooooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo no noo n

nose to be pulled. A pestilent conceit, which so often will insist upon
nooo no no nooooo. N noooooooo noooooo, noooo no noooo nooo nooooo nooo

noooooooo nooo nooo noooooooo noo noooooooo noooo nooooo no noo nooooo.




In some particulars, perhaps the most imposing physiognomical view to
No nooo noooooooooo, noooooo noo nooo nooooooo nooooooooooooo nooo no

be had of the Sperm Whale, is that of the full front of his head. This
no noo no noo Noooo Noooo, no nooo no noo nooo noooo no noo nooo. Nooo

aspect is sublime.
nooooo no noooooo.




In thought, a fine human brow is like the East when troubled with the
No noooooo, n nooo noooo nooo no nooo noo Nooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo

morning. In the repose of the pasture, the curled brow of the bull has a
noooooo. No noo nooooo no noo noooooo, noo nooooo nooo no noo nooo noo n

touch of the grand in it. Pushing heavy cannon up mountain defiles, the
noooo no noo noooo no no. Noooooo noooo nooooo no nooooooo noooooo, noo

elephant's brow is majestic. Human or animal, the mystical brow is as
nooooooo'n nooo no nooooooo. Noooo no nooooo, noo nooooooo nooo no no

that great golden seal affixed by the German Emperors to their decrees.
nooo noooo nooooo nooo noooooo no noo Nooooo Nooooooo no noooo noooooo.

It signifies--"God: done this day by my hand." But in most creatures,
No noooooooo--"Noo: nooo nooo noo no no nooo." Noo no nooo noooooooo,

nay in man himself, very often the brow is but a mere strip of alpine
noo no noo noooooo, nooo noooo noo nooo no noo n nooo noooo no nooooo

nooo noooo noooo noo nooo nooo. Noo noo noo noooooooo noooo nooo

Noooooooooo'n no Nooooooooo'n nooo no nooo, noo noooooo no noo, nooo noo

nooo nooooooooo nooo noooo, noooooo, nooooooo nooooooo noooo; noo noo

noooo nooo no noo nooooooo'n nooooooo, noo nooo no noooo noo nooooooo

nooo nooooo no noo nooo. Noo no noo noooo Noooo Noooo, nooo nooo noo

nooooo noo-nooo noooooo nooooooo no noo nooo no no noooooooo noooooooo,

noooooo; nooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo no noooo, noo noooo, noo noo.

Nor, in profile, does this wondrous brow diminish; though that way
Noo, no noooooo, nooo nooo nooooooo nooo nooooooo; nooooo nooo noo

But how? Genius in the Sperm Whale? Has the Sperm Whale ever written
Noo noo? Nooooo no noo Noooo Noooo? Noo noo Noooo Noooo nooo noooooo

noooo nooo no.




Champollion deciphered the wrinkled granite hieroglyphics. But there is

CHAPTER 80. The Nut.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noo.







If the Sperm Whale be physiognomically a Sphinx, to the phrenologist his
No noo Noooo Noooo no nooooooooooooooo n Nooooo, no noo nooooooooooo noo

brain seems that geometrical circle which it is impossible to square.
noooo noooo nooo noooooooooo nooooo noooo no no nooooooooo no nooooo.




In the full-grown creature the skull will measure at least twenty feet
No noo nooo-noooo nooooooo noo noooo nooo noooooo no noooo nooooo nooo

in length. Unhinge the lower jaw, and the side view of this skull is as
no nooooo. Noooooo noo noooo noo, noo noo nooo nooo no nooo noooo no no

the side of a moderately inclined plane resting throughout on a level
noo nooo no n nooooooooo nooooooo noooo noooooo nooooooooo no n noooo

base. But in life--as we have elsewhere seen--this inclined plane is
nooo. Noo no nooo--no no nooo noooooooo nooo--nooo nooooooo noooo no

angularly filled up, and almost squared by the enormous superincumbent
noooooooo nooooo no, noo nooooo noooooo no noo nooooooo nooooooooooooo

mass of the junk and sperm. At the high end the skull forms a crater to
nooo no noo nooo noo noooo. No noo nooo noo noo noooo noooo n nooooo no

bed that part of the mass; while under the long floor of this crater--in
noo nooo nooo no noo nooo; noooo noooo noo nooo noooo no nooo nooooo--no

another cavity seldom exceeding ten inches in length and as many in
noooooo nooooo nooooo noooooooo noo nooooo no nooooo noo no nooo no

depth--reposes the mere handful of this monster's brain. The brain is at
noooo--noooooo noo nooo noooooo no nooo noooooo'n noooo. Noo noooo no no

least twenty feet from his apparent forehead in life; it is hidden
noooo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooooo no nooo; no no nooooo

away behind its vast outworks, like the innermost citadel within the
nooo nooooo noo nooo nooooooo, nooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooooo noo

amplified fortifications of Quebec. So like a choice casket is it
noooooooo nooooooooooooo no Nooooo. No nooo n nooooo nooooo no no

secreted in him, that I have known some whalemen who peremptorily deny
nooooooo no noo, nooo N nooo noooo nooo nooooooo noo nooooooooooo nooo

that the Sperm Whale has any other brain than that palpable semblance
nooo noo Noooo Noooo noo noo noooo noooo nooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo

of one formed by the cubic-yards of his sperm magazine. Lying in strange
no noo nooooo no noo noooo-noooo no noo noooo nooooooo. Noooo no noooooo

folds, courses, and convolutions, to their apprehensions, it seems more
noooo, noooooo, noo nooooooooooo, no noooo noooooooooooo, no noooo nooo

in keeping with the idea of his general might to regard that mystic part
no noooooo nooo noo nooo no noo noooooo noooo no nooooo nooo nooooo nooo

of him as the seat of his intelligence.
no noo no noo nooo no noo nooooooooooo.




It is plain, then, that phrenologically the head of this Leviathan, in
No no noooo, nooo, nooo noooooooooooooo noo nooo no nooo Noooooooo, no

the creature's living intact state, is an entire delusion. As for his
noo nooooooo'n nooooo nooooo noooo, no no nooooo nooooooo. No noo noo

true brain, you can then see no indications of it, nor feel any. The
nooo noooo, noo noo nooo noo no noooooooooo no no, noo nooo noo. Noo

whale, like all things that are mighty, wears a false brow to the common
noooo, nooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooooo, noooo n noooo nooo no noo nooooo

world.
noooo.




If you unload his skull of its spermy heaps and then take a rear view
No noo nooooo noo noooo no noo nooooo noooo noo nooo nooo n nooo nooo

of its rear end, which is the high end, you will be struck by its
no noo nooo noo, noooo no noo nooo noo, noo nooo no nooooo no noo

resemblance to the human skull, beheld in the same situation, and from
noooooooooo no noo noooo noooo, nooooo no noo nooo noooooooo, noo nooo

the same point of view. Indeed, place this reversed skull (scaled down
noo nooo noooo no nooo. Nooooo, noooo nooo nooooooo noooo (nooooo nooo

to the human magnitude) among a plate of men's skulls, and you would
no noo noooo noooooooo) noooo n noooo no noo'n nooooo, noo noo noooo

involuntarily confound it with them; and remarking the depressions on
noooooooooooo nooooooo no nooo nooo; noo noooooooo noo noooooooooo no

one part of its summit, in phrenological phrase you would say--This
noo nooo no noo nooooo, no noooooooooooo nooooo noo noooo noo--Nooo

man had no self-esteem, and no veneration. And by those negations,
noo noo no nooo-nooooo, noo no nooooooooo. Noo no noooo noooooooo,

considered along with the affirmative fact of his prodigious bulk and
nooooooooo noooo nooo noo noooooooooo nooo no noo nooooooooo nooo noo

power, you can best form to yourself the truest, though not the most
noooo, noo noo nooo nooo no nooooooo noo nooooo, nooooo noo noo nooo

exhilarating conception of what the most exalted potency is.
nooooooooooo nooooooooo no nooo noo nooo noooooo noooooo no.




But if from the comparative dimensions of the whale's proper brain, you
Noo no nooo noo noooooooooo nooooooooo no noo noooo'n nooooo noooo, noo

deem it incapable of being adequately charted, then I have another idea
nooo no noooooooo no noooo nooooooooo noooooo, nooo N nooo noooooo nooo

for you. If you attentively regard almost any quadruped's spine,
noo noo. No noo noooooooooo nooooo nooooo noo noooooooo'n noooo,

you will be struck with the resemblance of its vertebrae to a strung
noo nooo no nooooo nooo noo noooooooooo no noo noooooooo no n nooooo

necklace of dwarfed skulls, all bearing rudimental resemblance to the
nooooooo no noooooo nooooo, noo noooooo nooooooooo noooooooooo no noo

skull proper. It is a German conceit, that the vertebrae are absolutely
noooo nooooo. No no n Nooooo noooooo, nooo noo noooooooo noo nooooooooo

undeveloped skulls. But the curious external resemblance, I take it
noooooooooo nooooo. Noo noo noooooo nooooooo noooooooooo, N nooo no

the Germans were not the first men to perceive. A foreign friend once
noo Noooooo nooo noo noo noooo noo no nooooooo. N noooooo nooooo nooo

pointed it out to me, in the skeleton of a foe he had slain, and with
noooooo no noo no no, no noo nooooooo no n noo no noo noooo, noo nooo

the vertebrae of which he was inlaying, in a sort of basso-relievo, the
noo noooooooo no noooo no noo nooooooo, no n nooo no noooo-noooooo, noo

beaked prow of his canoe. Now, I consider that the phrenologists have
nooooo nooo no noo noooo. Noo, N nooooooo nooo noo noooooooooooo nooo

omitted an important thing in not pushing their investigations from the
noooooo no noooooooo noooo no noo noooooo noooo nooooooooooooo nooo noo

cerebellum through the spinal canal. For I believe that much of a man's
nooooooooo noooooo noo nooooo noooo. Noo N noooooo nooo nooo no n noo'n

character will be found betokened in his backbone. I would rather feel
noooooooo nooo no noooo noooooooo no noo nooooooo. N noooo nooooo nooo

your spine than your skull, whoever you are. A thin joist of a spine
nooo noooo nooo nooo noooo, noooooo noo noo. N nooo noooo no n noooo

never yet upheld a full and noble soul. I rejoice in my spine, as in the
noooo noo nooooo n nooo noo noooo nooo. N noooooo no no noooo, no no noo

firm audacious staff of that flag which I fling half out to the world.
nooo noooooooo noooo no nooo nooo noooo N noooo nooo noo no noo noooo.




Apply this spinal branch of phrenology to the Sperm Whale. His cranial
Noooo nooo nooooo nooooo no nooooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo. Noo noooooo

cavity is continuous with the first neck-vertebra; and in that vertebra
nooooo no nooooooooo nooo noo noooo nooo-nooooooo; noo no nooo nooooooo

the bottom of the spinal canal will measure ten inches across, being
noo nooooo no noo nooooo noooo nooo noooooo noo nooooo nooooo, noooo

eight in height, and of a triangular figure with the base downwards. As
noooo no nooooo, noo no n nooooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooo noooooooo. No

it passes through the remaining vertebrae the canal tapers in size, but
no nooooo noooooo noo noooooooo noooooooo noo noooo nooooo no nooo, noo

for a considerable distance remains of large capacity. Now, of course,
noo n nooooooooooo nooooooo noooooo no noooo nooooooo. Noo, no nooooo,

this canal is filled with much the same strangely fibrous substance--the
nooo noooo no nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo noooooooo noooooo noooooooo--noo

spinal cord--as the brain; and directly communicates with the brain.
nooooo nooo--no noo noooo; noo nooooooo nooooooooooo nooo noo noooo.

And what is still more, for many feet after emerging from the brain's
Noo nooo no noooo nooo, noo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo'n

cavity, the spinal cord remains of an undecreasing girth, almost
nooooo, noo nooooo nooo noooooo no no nooooooooooo noooo, nooooo

equal to that of the brain. Under all these circumstances, would it be
noooo no nooo no noo noooo. Noooo noo noooo noooooooooooo, noooo no no

unreasonable to survey and map out the whale's spine phrenologically?
nooooooooooo no nooooo noo noo noo noo noooo'n noooo noooooooooooooo?

For, viewed in this light, the wonderful comparative smallness of his
Noo, nooooo no nooo noooo, noo noooooooo noooooooooo noooooooo no noo

brain proper is more than compensated by the wonderful comparative
noooo nooooo no nooo nooo noooooooooo no noo noooooooo noooooooooo

magnitude of his spinal cord.
noooooooo no noo nooooo nooo.




But leaving this hint to operate as it may with the phrenologists, I
Noo noooooo nooo nooo no noooooo no no noo nooo noo noooooooooooo, N

would merely assume the spinal theory for a moment, in reference to the
noooo nooooo nooooo noo nooooo nooooo noo n nooooo, no noooooooo no noo

Sperm Whale's hump. This august hump, if I mistake not, rises over one
Noooo Noooo'n nooo. Nooo nooooo nooo, no N noooooo noo, noooo nooo noo

of the larger vertebrae, and is, therefore, in some sort, the outer
no noo nooooo noooooooo, noo no, noooooooo, no nooo nooo, noo noooo

convex mould of it. From its relative situation then, I should call this
nooooo noooo no no. Nooo noo nooooooo noooooooo nooo, N nooooo nooo nooo

high hump the organ of firmness or indomitableness in the Sperm Whale.
nooo nooo noo noooo no nooooooo no noooooooooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo.

And that the great monster is indomitable, you will yet have reason to
Noo nooo noo noooo noooooo no noooooooooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooooo no

know.
nooo.










CHAPTER 81. The Pequod Meets The Virgin.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooo Noooo Noo Nooooo.







The predestinated day arrived, and we duly met the ship Jungfrau, Derick
Noo noooooooooooo noo noooooo, noo no nooo noo noo nooo Nooooooo, Nooooo

De Deer, master, of Bremen.
No Nooo, nooooo, no Nooooo.




At one time the greatest whaling people in the world, the Dutch and
No noo nooo noo nooooooo noooooo nooooo no noo noooo, noo Noooo noo

Germans are now among the least; but here and there at very wide
Noooooo noo noo noooo noo noooo; noo nooo noo noooo no nooo nooo

intervals of latitude and longitude, you still occasionally meet with
noooooooo no nooooooo noo noooooooo, noo noooo nooooooooooo nooo nooo

their flag in the Pacific.
noooo nooo no noo Noooooo.




For some reason, the Jungfrau seemed quite eager to pay her respects.
Noo nooo nooooo, noo Nooooooo nooooo noooo noooo no noo noo nooooooo.

While yet some distance from the Pequod, she rounded to, and dropping a
Noooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo noo Nooooo, noo noooooo no, noo nooooooo n

boat, her captain was impelled towards us, impatiently standing in the
nooo, noo noooooo noo nooooooo noooooo no, noooooooooo nooooooo no noo

bows instead of the stern.
nooo noooooo no noo noooo.




"What has he in his hand there?" cried Starbuck, pointing to something
"Nooo noo no no noo nooo noooo?" noooo Nooooooo, nooooooo no noooooooo

wavingly held by the German. "Impossible!--a lamp-feeder!"
nooooooo nooo no noo Nooooo. "Nooooooooo!--n nooo-nooooo!"




"Not that," said Stubb, "no, no, it's a coffee-pot, Mr. Starbuck; he's
"Noo nooo," nooo Noooo, "no, no, no'n n nooooo-noo, No. Nooooooo; no'n

coming off to make us our coffee, is the Yarman; don't you see that big
nooooo noo no nooo no noo nooooo, no noo Nooooo; noo'n noo noo nooo noo

tin can there alongside of him?--that's his boiling water. Oh! he's all
noo noo noooo noooooooo no noo?--nooo'n noo noooooo noooo. No! no'n noo

right, is the Yarman."
noooo, no noo Nooooo."




"Go along with you," cried Flask, "it's a lamp-feeder and an oil-can.
"No noooo nooo noo," noooo Noooo, "no'n n nooo-nooooo noo no noo-noo.

He's out of oil, and has come a-begging."
No'n noo no noo, noo noo nooo n-noooooo."




However curious it may seem for an oil-ship to be borrowing oil on the
Noooooo noooooo no noo nooo noo no noo-nooo no no noooooooo noo no noo

whale-ground, and however much it may invertedly contradict the old
noooo-nooooo, noo noooooo nooo no noo nooooooooo nooooooooo noo noo

proverb about carrying coals to Newcastle, yet sometimes such a thing
noooooo noooo nooooooo noooo no Noooooooo, noo noooooooo nooo n noooo

really happens; and in the present case Captain Derick De Deer did
nooooo noooooo; noo no noo noooooo nooo Noooooo Nooooo No Nooo noo

indubitably conduct a lamp-feeder as Flask did declare.
noooooooooo noooooo n nooo-nooooo no Noooo noo noooooo.




As he mounted the deck, Ahab abruptly accosted him, without at all
No no noooooo noo nooo, Nooo nooooooo nooooooo noo, noooooo no noo

heeding what he had in his hand; but in his broken lingo, the German
noooooo nooo no noo no noo nooo; noo no noo nooooo noooo, noo Nooooo

soon evinced his complete ignorance of the White Whale; immediately
nooo noooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo; noooooooooo

noooooo noo nooooooooooo no noo nooo-nooooo noo noo noo, nooo nooo

noooooo nooooooo noo nooooo no nooo nooo noo noooooo no noooo no

profound darkness--his last drop of Bremen oil being gone, and not a
nooooooo nooooooo--noo nooo nooo no Nooooo noo noooo nooo, noo noo n

single flying-fish yet captured to supply the deficiency; concluding
nooooo nooooo-nooo noo nooooooo no nooooo noo nooooooooo; nooooooooo

by hinting that his ship was indeed what in the Fishery is technically
no noooooo nooo noo nooo noo nooooo nooo no noo Noooooo no noooooooooo

called a CLEAN one (that is, an empty one), well deserving the name of
nooooo n NOOOO noo (nooo no, no noooo noo), nooo noooooooo noo nooo no

Jungfrau or the Virgin.
Nooooooo no noo Nooooo.




His necessities supplied, Derick departed; but he had not gained his
Noo noooooooooo nooooooo, Nooooo nooooooo; noo no noo noo nooooo noo

ship's side, when whales were almost simultaneously raised from the
nooo'n nooo, nooo nooooo nooo nooooo nooooooooooooo nooooo nooo noo

mast-heads of both vessels; and so eager for the chase was Derick, that
nooo-noooo no nooo noooooo; noo no noooo noo noo noooo noo Nooooo, nooo

without pausing to put his oil-can and lamp-feeder aboard, he slewed
noooooo noooooo no noo noo noo-noo noo nooo-nooooo nooooo, no nooooo

round his boat and made after the leviathan lamp-feeders.
noooo noo nooo noo nooo noooo noo noooooooo nooo-noooooo.




Now, the game having risen to leeward, he and the other three German
Noo, noo nooo nooooo noooo no noooooo, no noo noo noooo noooo Nooooo

boats that soon followed him, had considerably the start of the Pequod's
noooo nooo nooo nooooooo noo, noo nooooooooooo noo noooo no noo Nooooo'n

keels. There were eight whales, an average pod. Aware of their danger,
noooo. Noooo nooo noooo nooooo, no noooooo noo. Noooo no noooo nooooo,

they were going all abreast with great speed straight before the wind,
nooo nooo noooo noo noooooo nooo noooo noooo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo,

rubbing their flanks as closely as so many spans of horses in harness.
noooooo noooo nooooo no noooooo no no nooo noooo no nooooo no noooooo.

They left a great, wide wake, as though continually unrolling a great
Nooo nooo n noooo, nooo nooo, no nooooo noooooooooo noooooooo n noooo

wide parchment upon the sea.
nooo noooooooo nooo noo noo.




Full in this rapid wake, and many fathoms in the rear, swam a huge,
Nooo no nooo noooo nooo, noo nooo noooooo no noo nooo, nooo n nooo,

humped old bull, which by his comparatively slow progress, as well as
nooooo noo nooo, noooo no noo noooooooooooo nooo nooooooo, no nooo no

by the unusual yellowish incrustations overgrowing him, seemed afflicted
no noo noooooo noooooooo noooooooooooo noooooooooo noo, nooooo noooooooo

with the jaundice, or some other infirmity. Whether this whale belonged
nooo noo nooooooo, no nooo noooo noooooooo. Noooooo nooo noooo nooooooo

to the pod in advance, seemed questionable; for it is not customary for
no noo noo no noooooo, nooooo nooooooooooo; noo no no noo noooooooo noo

such venerable leviathans to be at all social. Nevertheless, he stuck
nooo noooooooo nooooooooo no no no noo nooooo. Nooooooooooo, no noooo

to their wake, though indeed their back water must have retarded him,
no noooo nooo, nooooo nooooo noooo nooo noooo nooo nooo nooooooo noo,

because the white-bone or swell at his broad muzzle was a dashed one,
noooooo noo noooo-nooo no noooo no noo noooo nooooo noo n nooooo noo,

like the swell formed when two hostile currents meet. His spout was
nooo noo noooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo nooooooo nooo. Noo noooo noo

short, slow, and laborious; coming forth with a choking sort of gush,
noooo, nooo, noo noooooooo; nooooo noooo nooo n noooooo nooo no nooo,

and spending itself in torn shreds, followed by strange subterranean
noo nooooooo nooooo no nooo nooooo, nooooooo no noooooo nooooooooooo

commotions in him, which seemed to have egress at his other buried
nooooooooo no noo, noooo nooooo no nooo nooooo no noo noooo nooooo

extremity, causing the waters behind him to upbubble.
noooooooo, noooooo noo nooooo nooooo noo no nooooooo.




"Who's got some paregoric?" said Stubb, "he has the stomach-ache, I'm
"Noo'n noo nooo noooooooo?" nooo Noooo, "no noo noo noooooo-nooo, N'n

afraid. Lord, think of having half an acre of stomach-ache! Adverse
nooooo. Nooo, noooo no nooooo nooo no nooo no noooooo-nooo! Noooooo
