I ever knew to blow from astern; but look, did ever whale yaw so before?
N nooo nooo no nooo nooo nooooo; noo nooo, noo nooo noooo noo no nooooo?

it must be, he's lost his tiller."
no nooo no, no'n nooo noo nooooo."




As an overladen Indiaman bearing down the Hindostan coast with a deck
No no noooooooo Nooooooo noooooo nooo noo Noooooooo noooo nooo n nooo

load of frightened horses, careens, buries, rolls, and wallows on her

noo noo nooooo no noo Noooooo? Nooo n'no noo?"

Fiercely, but evenly incited by the taunts of the German, the Pequod's
Nooooooo, noo nooooo noooooo no noo nooooo no noo Nooooo, noo Nooooo'n

noo Nooooo! Nooo nooo noo!"




But so decided an original start had Derick had, that spite of all
Noo no noooooo no nooooooo noooo noo Nooooo noo, nooo noooo no noo

n noooooooo nooooooo noooooooo nooo noo no n nooo noooo nooooo noo noooo

nooooo noooo nooooooo, noo nooooooooo nooooo no no noo Nooooo'n noooooo.

No noooooo nooo, noo noo nooo noooo nooo nooooooooooo no noo noooo'n

noooooo noooo nooo no nooo.




It was a terrific, most pitiable, and maddening sight. The whale was
No noo n nooooooo, nooo nooooooo, noo noooooooo noooo. Noo noooo noo

now going head out, and sending his spout before him in a continual
noo noooo nooo noo, noo noooooo noo noooo nooooo noo no n noooooooo

tormented jet; while his one poor fin beat his side in an agony of
noooooooo noo; noooo noo noo nooo noo nooo noo nooo no no noooo no

fright. Now to this hand, now to that, he yawed in his faltering flight,
nooooo. Noo no nooo nooo, noo no nooo, no noooo no noo noooooooo nooooo,

and still at every billow that he broke, he spasmodically sank in the
noo noooo no noooo nooooo nooo no noooo, no noooooooooooo nooo no noo

sea, or sideways rolled towards the sky his one beating fin. So have I
noo, no nooooooo nooooo noooooo noo noo noo noo noooooo noo. No nooo N

seen a bird with clipped wing making affrighted broken circles in the
nooo n nooo nooo noooooo nooo nooooo nooooooooo nooooo noooooo no noo

air, vainly striving to escape the piratical hawks. But the bird has a
noo, nooooo nooooooo no nooooo noo noooooooo noooo. Noo noo nooo noo n

voice, and with plaintive cries will make known her fear; but the fear
noooo, noo nooo noooooooo noooo nooo nooo noooo noo nooo; noo noo nooo

of this vast dumb brute of the sea, was chained up and enchanted in him;
no nooo nooo nooo noooo no noo noo, noo noooooo no noo noooooooo no noo;

no noo no noooo, nooo nooo noooooo noooooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo,

and this made the sight of him unspeakably pitiable; while still, in his
noo nooo nooo noo noooo no noo noooooooooo nooooooo; noooo noooo, no noo

amazing bulk, portcullis jaw, and omnipotent tail, there was enough to
noooooo nooo, nooooooooo noo, noo nooooooooo nooo, noooo noo nooooo no

appal the stoutest man who so pitied.
noooo noo nooooooo noo noo no nooooo.




Seeing now that but a very few moments more would give the Pequod's
Nooooo noo nooo noo n nooo noo noooooo nooo noooo nooo noo Nooooo'n

noo noo nooo nooooo noooo noo nooo nooooo.




But no sooner did his harpooneer stand up for the stroke, than all three

noooooo noo noooooooooo nooo!"




But the monster's run was a brief one. Giving a sudden gasp, he
Noo noo noooooo'n noo noo n noooo noo. Nooooo n nooooo nooo, no

tumultuously sounded. With a grating rush, the three lines flew round
nooooooooooo noooooo. Nooo n noooooo nooo, noo noooo noooo nooo noooo

the loggerheads with such a force as to gouge deep grooves in them;
noo noooooooooo nooo nooo n noooo no no noooo nooo noooooo no nooo;

noooo no noooooo nooo noo noooooooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo noooo

nooo noooooo noo noooo, nooo noooo noo noooo noooooooo noooo, nooo

nooo--noooo no noo noooooooooooo nooooo nooo noo nooo-noooo nooooo no

noo noooo, nooooo noo noooo noooo nooo nooooooo nooo nooo noo nooo--noo

nooooooo no noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo noo noooo, noooo noo noooo

nooooo nooooo nooo no noo noo. Noo noo noooo nooo noooooo no noooo,

noo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo no nooo nooooooo, noooooo no noooooooo nooo

nooo, nooooo noo nooooooo noo n nooooo nooooooo. Noo nooooo noooo nooo

nooo noooo nooo noo nooo no nooo noo, noo no no nooo "noooooo no," no no

no nooooo; nooo noooooo no no noo noooo noooo no noo nooo noooo nooo

noo nooo; nooo no no nooo noooo nooooooo noo Noooooooo nooo nooo nooooo

noooo no nooo noo noooo noooo no noo nooo. Noo noo no noooo no noo noooo

of the thing, it is to be doubted whether this course is always the
no noo noooo, no no no no noooooo noooooo nooo nooooo no nooooo noo

noooo noooo noooo noooo, noo nooo no no noooooooo. Noooooo, noooo no noo

nooooooo noooooo no noo--no n nooo noooo noooo noooo noooooooo nooo nooo

2000 square feet--the pressure of the water is immense. We all know

nooo no noooooooooo noooooooooo nooooo no noooooooo noooo no noooo; nooo

nooo, noooo-nooooo, no noo noo; noo nooo, nooo, noo nooooo no n noooo,

noooooo no noo nooo n nooooo no noo noooooo noooooo no noooo! No nooo no

noooo noooo noo nooooo no noooo noooooooooo. Noo nooooooo noo noooooooo

no no noo nooooo no nooooo nooo-no-nooooo noooo, nooo noo noooo nooo,

and stores, and men on board.
noo nooooo, noo noo no noooo.




As the three boats lay there on that gently rolling sea, gazing down
No noo noooo noooo noo noooo no nooo nooooo noooooo noo, nooooo nooo

no nooooooo no noo noooooo no n noooo!" Nooo noo nooooooo? nooo no? No!

His motions plainly denoted his extreme exhaustion. In most land animals
Noo noooooo noooooo noooooo noo noooooo nooooooooo. No nooo nooo noooooo

there are certain valves or flood-gates in many of their veins, whereby
noooo noo noooooo nooooo no noooo-noooo no nooo no noooo noooo, noooooo

nooo noooooo, noo noooo no no nooo nooooo no noooo noooooooo nooo noo no

certain directions. Not so with the whale; one of whose peculiarities
noooooo nooooooooo. Noo no nooo noo noooo; noo no noooo noooooooooooo

it is to have an entire non-valvular structure of the blood-vessels, so
no no no nooo no nooooo noo-nooooooo noooooooo no noo noooo-noooooo, no

that when pierced even by so small a point as a harpoon, a deadly
nooo nooo noooooo nooo no no noooo n noooo no n noooooo, n nooooo

drain is at once begun upon his whole arterial system; and when this is
noooo no no nooo noooo nooo noo noooo nooooooo nooooo; noo nooo nooo no

heightened by the extraordinary pressure of water at a great distance

below the surface, his life may be said to pour from him in incessant

noooooo. Noo no nooo no noo nooooooo no noooo no noo, noo no noooooo

and numerous its interior fountains, that he will keep thus bleeding and
noo nooooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo, nooo no nooo nooo nooo nooooooo noo

bleeding for a considerable period; even as in a drought a river will
nooooooo noo n nooooooooooo nooooo; nooo no no n noooooo n noooo nooo

flow, whose source is in the well-springs of far-off and undiscernible
nooo, noooo nooooo no no noo nooo-noooooo no noo-noo noo noooooooooooo

hills. Even now, when the boats pulled upon this whale, and perilously
noooo. Nooo noo, nooo noo noooo nooooo nooo nooo noooo, noo nooooooooo

drew over his swaying flukes, and the lances were darted into him,
nooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo, noo noo nooooo nooo nooooo nooo noo,

nooo nooo nooooooo no nooooo nooo nooo noo noo nooo noooo, noooo nooo

noooooooooo noooooo, noooo noo noooooo noooo-nooo no noo nooo noo nooo

at intervals, however rapid, sending its affrighted moisture into the
no noooooooo, noooooo noooo, noooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo nooo noo

air. From this last vent no blood yet came, because no vital part of him
noo. Nooo nooo nooo nooo no noooo noo nooo, noooooo no noooo nooo no noo

had thus far been struck. His life, as they significantly call it, was
noo nooo noo nooo nooooo. Noo nooo, no nooo noooooooooooo nooo no, noo

untouched.
noooooooo.

Now, this occasional inevitable sinking of the recently killed Sperm
Noo, nooo nooooooooo nooooooooo noooooo no noo nooooooo nooooo Noooo

Whale is a very curious thing; nor has any fisherman yet adequately
Noooo no n nooo noooooo noooo; noo noo noo noooooooo noo nooooooooo

accounted for it. Usually the dead Sperm Whale floats with great
noooooooo noo no. Noooooo noo nooo Noooo Noooo nooooo nooo noooo

nooooooo, nooo noo nooo no noooo nooooooooooo nooooooo noooo noo

noooooo. No noo nooo nooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo noo, nooooo, noo

nooo noooooo no nooooo no no nooooooo nooooooo noooooo no noo nooo no

noooooo, nooooooooo nooo nooo noooooo no noooooo nooooo no noo. Noo no

nooo, nooo noo noooo noooooo nooo noooo nooo; nooo noooo nooooo, noooooo

nooooo no noooooooo nooo.




Be it said, however, that the Sperm Whale is far less liable to this
No no nooo, noooooo, nooo noo Noooo Noooo no noo nooo nooooo no nooo

accident than any other species. Where one of that sort go down, twenty
nooooooo nooo noo noooo noooooo. Noooo noo no nooo nooo no nooo, nooooo

Right Whales do. This difference in the species is no doubt imputable in
Noooo Nooooo no. Nooo nooooooooo no noo noooooo no no noooo noooooooo no

no small degree to the greater quantity of bone in the Right Whale;
no noooo nooooo no noo noooooo nooooooo no nooo no noo Noooo Noooo;

his Venetian blinds alone sometimes weighing more than a ton; from this
noo Nooooooo nooooo noooo noooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo n noo; nooo nooo

incumbrance the Sperm Whale is wholly free. But there are instances
noooooooooo noo Noooo Noooo no nooooo nooo. Noo noooo noo noooooooo

where, after the lapse of many hours or several days, the sunken whale
noooo, noooo noo noooo no nooo noooo no noooooo nooo, noo nooooo noooo

again rises, more buoyant than in life. But the reason of this
noooo noooo, nooo noooooo nooo no nooo. Noo noo nooooo no nooo

is obvious. Gases are generated in him; he swells to a prodigious
no noooooo. Noooo noo noooooooo no noo; no nooooo no n nooooooooo

magnitude; becomes a sort of animal balloon. A line-of-battle ship could
noooooooo; noooooo n nooo no nooooo noooooo. N nooo-no-nooooo nooo noooo

hardly keep him under then. In the Shore Whaling, on soundings, among
nooooo nooo noo noooo nooo. No noo Noooo Noooooo, no noooooooo, noooo

the Bays of New Zealand, when a Right Whale gives token of sinking, they
noo Nooo no Noo Noooooo, nooo n Noooo Noooo noooo noooo no noooooo, nooo

fasten buoys to him, with plenty of rope; so that when the body has gone
nooooo noooo no noo, nooo nooooo no nooo; no nooo nooo noo nooo noo nooo

down, they know where to look for it when it shall have ascended again.
nooo, nooo nooo noooo no nooo noo no nooo no noooo nooo nooooooo noooo.




It was not long after the sinking of the body that a cry was heard from
No noo noo nooo noooo noo noooooo no noo nooo nooo n noo noo noooo nooo

the Pequod's mast-heads, announcing that the Jungfrau was again lowering
noo Nooooo'n nooo-noooo, nooooooooo nooo noo Nooooooo noo noooo nooooooo

her boats; though the only spout in sight was that of a Fin-Back,
noo noooo; nooooo noo nooo noooo no noooo noo nooo no n Noo-Nooo,

belonging to the species of uncapturable whales, because of its
noooooooo no noo noooooo no nooooooooooo nooooo, noooooo no noo

incredible power of swimming. Nevertheless, the Fin-Back's spout is so
nooooooooo noooo no nooooooo. Nooooooooooo, noo Noo-Nooo'n noooo no no

similar to the Sperm Whale's, that by unskilful fishermen it is often
noooooo no noo Noooo Noooo'n, nooo no noooooooo noooooooo no no noooo

mistaken for it. And consequently Derick and all his host were now in
nooooooo noo no. Noo nooooooooooo Nooooo noo noo noo nooo nooo noo no

valiant chase of this unnearable brute. The Virgin crowding all sail,
noooooo noooo no nooo nooooooooo noooo. Noo Nooooo nooooooo noo nooo,

made after her four young keels, and thus they all disappeared far to
nooo noooo noo nooo noooo noooo, noo nooo nooo noo noooooooooo noo no

leeward, still in bold, hopeful chase.
noooooo, noooo no nooo, noooooo noooo.




Oh! many are the Fin-Backs, and many are the Dericks, my friend.
No! nooo noo noo Noo-Noooo, noo nooo noo noo Noooooo, no nooooo.










CHAPTER 82. The Honour and Glory of Whaling.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooo noo Noooo no Noooooo.







There are some enterprises in which a careful disorderliness is the true
Noooo noo nooo noooooooooo no noooo n noooooo nooooooooooooo no noo nooo

method.
nooooo.




The more I dive into this matter of whaling, and push my researches up
Noo nooo N nooo nooo nooo nooooo no noooooo, noo nooo no nooooooooo no

to the very spring-head of it so much the more am I impressed with its
no noo nooo nooooo-nooo no no no nooo noo nooo no N noooooooo nooo noo

great honourableness and antiquity; and especially when I find so many
noooo nooooooooooooo noo noooooooo; noo nooooooooo nooo N nooo no nooo

great demi-gods and heroes, prophets of all sorts, who one way or other
noooo nooo-nooo noo nooooo, nooooooo no noo noooo, noo noo noo no noooo

have shed distinction upon it, I am transported with the reflection
nooo nooo noooooooooo nooo no, N no noooooooooo nooo noo nooooooooo

that I myself belong, though but subordinately, to so emblazoned a
nooo N nooooo nooooo, nooooo noo noooooooooooo, no no nooooooooo n

fraternity.
nooooooooo.




The gallant Perseus, a son of Jupiter, was the first whaleman; and
Noo noooooo Noooooo, n noo no Noooooo, noo noo noooo nooooooo; noo

to the eternal honour of our calling be it said, that the first whale
no noo noooooo nooooo no noo noooooo no no nooo, nooo noo noooo noooo

attacked by our brotherhood was not killed with any sordid intent. Those
nooooooo no noo noooooooooo noo noo nooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo. Noooo

were the knightly days of our profession, when we only bore arms to
nooo noo nooooooo nooo no noo nooooooooo, nooo no nooo nooo nooo no

succor the distressed, and not to fill men's lamp-feeders. Every one
nooooo noo nooooooooo, noo noo no nooo noo'n nooo-noooooo. Noooo noo

knows the fine story of Perseus and Andromeda; how the lovely Andromeda,
noooo noo nooo noooo no Noooooo noo Noooooooo; noo noo nooooo Noooooooo,

the daughter of a king, was tied to a rock on the sea-coast, and as
noo nooooooo no n nooo, noo nooo no n nooo no noo noo-noooo, noo no

Leviathan was in the very act of carrying her off, Perseus, the prince
Noooooooo noo no noo nooo noo no nooooooo noo noo, Noooooo, noo nooooo

of whalemen, intrepidly advancing, harpooned the monster, and delivered
no nooooooo, nooooooooo noooooooo, noooooooo noo noooooo, noo noooooooo

and married the maid. It was an admirable artistic exploit, rarely
noo noooooo noo nooo. No noo no noooooooo nooooooo noooooo, nooooo

achieved by the best harpooneers of the present day; inasmuch as this
nooooooo no noo nooo noooooooooo no noo noooooo noo; nooooooo no nooo

Leviathan was slain at the very first dart. And let no man doubt this
Noooooooo noo noooo no noo nooo noooo nooo. Noo noo no noo noooo nooo

Arkite story; for in the ancient Joppa, now Jaffa, on the Syrian coast,
Nooooo noooo; noo no noo noooooo Noooo, noo Noooo, no noo Nooooo noooo,

in one of the Pagan temples, there stood for many ages the vast skeleton
no noo no noo Noooo noooooo, noooo noooo noo nooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo

of a whale, which the city's legends and all the inhabitants asserted to
no n noooo, noooo noo nooo'n noooooo noo noo noo noooooooooo nooooooo no

be the identical bones of the monster that Perseus slew. When the Romans
no noo noooooooo noooo no noo noooooo nooo Noooooo nooo. Nooo noo Nooooo

took Joppa, the same skeleton was carried to Italy in triumph. What
nooo Noooo, noo nooo nooooooo noo noooooo no Noooo no noooooo. Nooo

seems most singular and suggestively important in this story, is this:
noooo nooo nooooooo noo nooooooooooo noooooooo no nooo noooo, no nooo:

it was from Joppa that Jonah set sail.
no noo nooo Noooo nooo Noooo noo nooo.




Akin to the adventure of Perseus and Andromeda--indeed, by some supposed
Nooo no noo noooooooo no Noooooo noo Noooooooo--nooooo, no nooo nooooooo

to be indirectly derived from it--is that famous story of St. George and
no no nooooooooo noooooo nooo no--no nooo nooooo noooo no No. Nooooo noo

the Dragon; which dragon I maintain to have been a whale; for in many
noo Nooooo; noooo nooooo N nooooooo no nooo nooo n noooo; noo no nooo

old chronicles whales and dragons are strangely jumbled together, and
noo nooooooooo nooooo noo noooooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooooooo, noo

often stand for each other. "Thou art as a lion of the waters, and as a
noooo noooo noo nooo noooo. "Nooo noo no n nooo no noo nooooo, noo no n

dragon of the sea," saith Ezekiel; hereby, plainly meaning a whale;
nooooo no noo noo," noooo Noooooo; nooooo, noooooo noooooo n noooo;

in truth, some versions of the Bible use that word itself. Besides, it
no noooo, nooo nooooooo no noo Noooo noo nooo nooo nooooo. Noooooo, no

would much subtract from the glory of the exploit had St. George but
noooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo no noo noooooo noo No. Nooooo noo

encountered a crawling reptile of the land, instead of doing battle
noooooooooo n nooooooo noooooo no noo nooo, noooooo no noooo nooooo

with the great monster of the deep. Any man may kill a snake, but only a
nooo noo noooo noooooo no noo nooo. Noo noo noo nooo n noooo, noo nooo n

Perseus, a St. George, a Coffin, have the heart in them to march boldly
Noooooo, n No. Nooooo, n Nooooo, nooo noo noooo no nooo no noooo nooooo

up to a whale.
no no n noooo.




Let not the modern paintings of this scene mislead us; for though
Noo noo noo nooooo noooooooo no nooo noooo noooooo no; noo nooooo

the creature encountered by that valiant whaleman of old is vaguely
noo nooooooo noooooooooo no nooo noooooo nooooooo no noo no noooooo

represented of a griffin-like shape, and though the battle is depicted
noooooooooo no n noooooo-nooo noooo, noo nooooo noo nooooo no nooooooo

on land and the saint on horseback, yet considering the great ignorance
no nooo noo noo noooo no noooooooo, noo noooooooooo noo noooo noooooooo

of those times, when the true form of the whale was unknown to artists;
no noooo noooo, nooo noo nooo nooo no noo noooo noo noooooo no noooooo;

and considering that as in Perseus' case, St. George's whale might have
noo noooooooooo nooo no no Noooooo' nooo, No. Nooooo'n noooo noooo nooo

crawled up out of the sea on the beach; and considering that the animal
noooooo no noo no noo noo no noo noooo; noo noooooooooo nooo noo nooooo

ridden by St. George might have been only a large seal, or sea-horse;
nooooo no No. Nooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo n noooo nooo, no noo-noooo;

bearing all this in mind, it will not appear altogether incompatible
noooooo noo nooo no nooo, no nooo noo nooooo nooooooooo nooooooooooo

with the sacred legend and the ancientest draughts of the scene, to
nooo noo nooooo nooooo noo noo nooooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo, no

hold this so-called dragon no other than the great Leviathan himself. In
nooo nooo no-nooooo nooooo no noooo nooo noo noooo Noooooooo noooooo. No

fact, placed before the strict and piercing truth, this whole story will
nooo, nooooo nooooo noo nooooo noo nooooooo noooo, nooo noooo noooo nooo

fare like that fish, flesh, and fowl idol of the Philistines, Dagon by
nooo nooo nooo nooo, noooo, noo nooo nooo no noo Noooooooooo, Noooo no

name; who being planted before the ark of Israel, his horse's head and
nooo; noo noooo noooooo nooooo noo noo no Nooooo, noo noooo'n nooo noo

both the palms of his hands fell off from him, and only the stump or
nooo noo noooo no noo noooo nooo noo nooo noo, noo nooo noo noooo no

fishy part of him remained. Thus, then, one of our own noble stamp, even
noooo nooo no noo nooooooo. Nooo, nooo, noo no noo noo noooo noooo, nooo

a whaleman, is the tutelary guardian of England; and by good rights, we
n nooooooo, no noo nooooooo nooooooo no Noooooo; noo no nooo nooooo, no

harpooneers of Nantucket should be enrolled in the most noble order
noooooooooo no Noooooooo nooooo no nooooooo no noo nooo noooo noooo

of St. George. And therefore, let not the knights of that honourable
no No. Nooooo. Noo noooooooo, noo noo noo noooooo no nooo nooooooooo

company (none of whom, I venture to say, have ever had to do with a
noooooo (nooo no nooo, N noooooo no noo, nooo nooo noo no no nooo n

whale like their great patron), let them never eye a Nantucketer with
noooo nooo noooo noooo nooooo), noo nooo noooo noo n Noooooooooo nooo

disdain, since even in our woollen frocks and tarred trowsers we are
noooooo, noooo nooo no noo noooooo nooooo noo nooooo nooooooo no noo

much better entitled to St. George's decoration than they.
nooo nooooo nooooooo no No. Nooooo'n nooooooooo nooo nooo.




Whether to admit Hercules among us or not, concerning this I long
Noooooo no noooo Nooooooo noooo no no noo, nooooooooo nooo N nooo

remained dubious: for though according to the Greek mythologies, that
nooooooo noooooo: noo nooooo noooooooo no noo Noooo noooooooooo, nooo

antique Crockett and Kit Carson--that brawny doer of rejoicing good
noooooo Nooooooo noo Noo Nooooo--nooo nooooo nooo no noooooooo nooo

deeds, was swallowed down and thrown up by a whale; still, whether
noooo, noo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo no no n noooo; noooo, noooooo

that strictly makes a whaleman of him, that might be mooted. It nowhere
nooo nooooooo noooo n nooooooo no noo, nooo noooo no nooooo. No noooooo

appears that he ever actually harpooned his fish, unless, indeed,
noooooo nooo no nooo nooooooo noooooooo noo nooo, nooooo, nooooo,

from the inside. Nevertheless, he may be deemed a sort of involuntary
nooo noo nooooo. Nooooooooooo, no noo no nooooo n nooo no noooooooooo

whaleman; at any rate the whale caught him, if he did not the whale. I
nooooooo; no noo nooo noo noooo nooooo noo, no no noo noo noo noooo. N

claim him for one of our clan.
noooo noo noo noo no noo nooo.




But, by the best contradictory authorities, this Grecian story of
Noo, no noo nooo noooooooooooo noooooooooo, nooo Noooooo noooo no

Hercules and the whale is considered to be derived from the still more
Nooooooo noo noo noooo no nooooooooo no no noooooo nooo noo noooo nooo

ancient Hebrew story of Jonah and the whale; and vice versa; certainly
noooooo Nooooo noooo no Noooo noo noo noooo; noo nooo noooo; noooooooo

they are very similar. If I claim the demigod then, why not the prophet?
nooo noo nooo noooooo. No N noooo noo noooooo nooo, noo noo noo noooooo?




Nor do heroes, saints, demigods, and prophets alone comprise the whole
Noo no nooooo, nooooo, nooooooo, noo nooooooo noooo nooooooo noo noooo

roll of our order. Our grand master is still to be named; for like royal
nooo no noo noooo. Noo noooo nooooo no noooo no no noooo; noo nooo noooo

kings of old times, we find the head waters of our fraternity in nothing
noooo no noo noooo, no nooo noo nooo nooooo no noo nooooooooo no noooooo

short of the great gods themselves. That wondrous oriental story is now
noooo no noo noooo nooo nooooooooo. Nooo nooooooo nooooooo noooo no noo

to be rehearsed from the Shaster, which gives us the dread Vishnoo, one
no no noooooooo nooo noo Noooooo, noooo noooo no noo noooo Noooooo, noo

of the three persons in the godhead of the Hindoos; gives us this divine
no noo noooo noooooo no noo noooooo no noo Noooooo; noooo no nooo nooooo

Vishnoo himself for our Lord;--Vishnoo, who, by the first of his ten
Noooooo noooooo noo noo Nooo;--Noooooo, noo, no noo noooo no noo noo

earthly incarnations, has for ever set apart and sanctified the whale.
noooooo nooooooooooo, noo noo nooo noo noooo noo nooooooooo noo noooo.

When Brahma, or the God of Gods, saith the Shaster, resolved to recreate
Nooo Nooooo, no noo Noo no Nooo, noooo noo Noooooo, nooooooo no nooooooo

the world after one of its periodical dissolutions, he gave birth to
noo noooo noooo noo no noo nooooooooo nooooooooooo, no nooo noooo no

Vishnoo, to preside over the work; but the Vedas, or mystical books,
Noooooo, no noooooo nooo noo nooo; noo noo Noooo, no nooooooo noooo,

whose perusal would seem to have been indispensable to Vishnoo before
noooo noooooo noooo nooo no nooo nooo noooooooooooo no Noooooo nooooo

beginning the creation, and which therefore must have contained
noooooooo noo nooooooo, noo noooo noooooooo nooo nooo noooooooo

something in the shape of practical hints to young architects, these
noooooooo no noo noooo no noooooooo noooo no noooo nooooooooo, noooo

Vedas were lying at the bottom of the waters; so Vishnoo became
Noooo nooo noooo no noo nooooo no noo nooooo; no Noooooo nooooo

incarnate in a whale, and sounding down in him to the uttermost depths,
noooooooo no n noooo, noo nooooooo nooo no noo no noo noooooooo nooooo,

rescued the sacred volumes. Was not this Vishnoo a whaleman, then? even
noooooo noo nooooo noooooo. Noo noo nooo Noooooo n nooooooo, nooo? nooo

as a man who rides a horse is called a horseman?
no n noo noo noooo n noooo no nooooo n nooooooo?




Perseus, St. George, Hercules, Jonah, and Vishnoo! there's a member-roll
Noooooo, No. Nooooo, Nooooooo, Noooo, noo Noooooo! noooo'n n nooooo-nooo

for you! What club but the whaleman's can head off like that?
noo noo! Nooo nooo noo noo nooooooo'n noo nooo noo nooo nooo?










CHAPTER 83. Jonah Historically Regarded.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo Nooooooooooo Nooooooo.







Reference was made to the historical story of Jonah and the whale in the
Noooooooo noo nooo no noo nooooooooo noooo no Noooo noo noo noooo no noo

preceding chapter. Now some Nantucketers rather distrust this historical
noooooooo noooooo. Noo nooo Nooooooooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo nooooooooo

story of Jonah and the whale. But then there were some sceptical Greeks
noooo no Noooo noo noo noooo. Noo nooo noooo nooo nooo noooooooo Nooooo

and Romans, who, standing out from the orthodox pagans of their times,
noo Nooooo, noo, nooooooo noo nooo noo nooooooo nooooo no noooo noooo,

equally doubted the story of Hercules and the whale, and Arion and the
noooooo noooooo noo noooo no Nooooooo noo noo noooo, noo Noooo noo noo

dolphin; and yet their doubting those traditions did not make those
noooooo; noo noo noooo nooooooo noooo nooooooooo noo noo nooo noooo

traditions one whit the less facts, for all that.
nooooooooo noo nooo noo nooo noooo, noo noo nooo.




One old Sag-Harbor whaleman's chief reason for questioning the Hebrew
Noo noo Noo-Nooooo nooooooo'n noooo nooooo noo noooooooooo noo Nooooo

story was this:--He had one of those quaint old-fashioned Bibles,
noooo noo nooo:--No noo noo no noooo nooooo noo-noooooooo Nooooo,

embellished with curious, unscientific plates; one of which represented
noooooooooo nooo noooooo, nooooooooooo nooooo; noo no noooo noooooooooo

Jonah's whale with two spouts in his head--a peculiarity only true
Noooo'n noooo nooo noo nooooo no noo nooo--n noooooooooo nooo nooo

with respect to a species of the Leviathan (the Right Whale, and the
nooo noooooo no n noooooo no noo Noooooooo (noo Noooo Noooo, noo noo

varieties of that order), concerning which the fishermen have this
noooooooo no nooo noooo), nooooooooo noooo noo noooooooo nooo nooo

saying, "A penny roll would choke him"; his swallow is so very small.
nooooo, "N noooo nooo noooo noooo noo"; noo noooooo no no nooo noooo.

But, to this, Bishop Jebb's anticipative answer is ready. It is not
Noo, no nooo, Nooooo Nooo'n nooooooooooo nooooo no noooo. No no noo

necessary, hints the Bishop, that we consider Jonah as tombed in the
noooooooo, noooo noo Nooooo, nooo no nooooooo Noooo no nooooo no noo

whale's belly, but as temporarily lodged in some part of his mouth. And
noooo'n noooo, noo no noooooooooo nooooo no nooo nooo no noo noooo. Noo

this seems reasonable enough in the good Bishop. For truly, the
nooo noooo nooooooooo nooooo no noo nooo Nooooo. Noo noooo, noo

Right Whale's mouth would accommodate a couple of whist-tables, and
Noooo Noooo'n noooo noooo noooooooooo n nooooo no noooo-nooooo, noo

comfortably seat all the players. Possibly, too, Jonah might have
noooooooooo nooo noo noo noooooo. Nooooooo, noo, Noooo noooo nooo

ensconced himself in a hollow tooth; but, on second thoughts, the Right
noooooooo noooooo no n nooooo noooo; noo, no nooooo nooooooo, noo Noooo

Whale is toothless.
Noooo no noooooooo.




Another reason which Sag-Harbor (he went by that name) urged for his
Noooooo nooooo noooo Noo-Nooooo (no nooo no nooo nooo) noooo noo noo

want of faith in this matter of the prophet, was something obscurely in
nooo no noooo no nooo nooooo no noo noooooo, noo noooooooo noooooooo no

reference to his incarcerated body and the whale's gastric juices. But
noooooooo no noo nooooooooooo nooo noo noo noooo'n noooooo nooooo. Noo

this objection likewise falls to the ground, because a German exegetist
nooo noooooooo nooooooo noooo no noo nooooo, noooooo n Nooooo noooooooo

supposes that Jonah must have taken refuge in the floating body of a
nooooooo nooo Noooo nooo nooo noooo nooooo no noo nooooooo nooo no n

DEAD whale--even as the French soldiers in the Russian campaign turned
NOOO noooo--nooo no noo Nooooo nooooooo no noo Noooooo nooooooo nooooo

their dead horses into tents, and crawled into them. Besides, it has
noooo nooo nooooo nooo noooo, noo noooooo nooo nooo. Noooooo, no noo

been divined by other continental commentators, that when Jonah was
nooo noooooo no noooo noooooooooo nooooooooooo, nooo nooo Noooo noo

thrown overboard from the Joppa ship, he straightway effected his escape
nooooo noooooooo nooo noo Noooo nooo, no noooooooooo nooooooo noo nooooo

to another vessel near by, some vessel with a whale for a figure-head;
no noooooo nooooo nooo no, nooo nooooo nooo n noooo noo n nooooo-nooo;

and, I would add, possibly called "The Whale," as some craft are
noo, N noooo noo, nooooooo nooooo "Noo Noooo," no nooo noooo noo

nowadays christened the "Shark," the "Gull," the "Eagle." Nor have there
nooooooo nooooooooo noo "Noooo," noo "Nooo," noo "Noooo." Noo nooo noooo

been wanting learned exegetists who have opined that the whale mentioned
nooo noooooo noooooo nooooooooo noo nooo nooooo nooo noo noooo noooooooo

in the book of Jonah merely meant a life-preserver--an inflated bag
no noo nooo no Noooo nooooo noooo n nooo-noooooooo--no nooooooo noo

of wind--which the endangered prophet swam to, and so was saved from a
no nooo--noooo noo nooooooooo noooooo nooo no, noo no noo noooo nooo n

watery doom. Poor Sag-Harbor, therefore, seems worsted all round. But
nooooo nooo. Nooo Noo-Nooooo, noooooooo, noooo noooooo noo noooo. Noo

he had still another reason for his want of faith. It was this, if I
no noo noooo noooooo nooooo noo noo nooo no noooo. No noo nooo, no N

remember right: Jonah was swallowed by the whale in the Mediterranean
nooooooo noooo: Noooo noo noooooooo no noo noooo no noo Noooooooooooo

Sea, and after three days he was vomited up somewhere within three days'
Noo, noo noooo noooo nooo no noo noooooo no noooooooo nooooo noooo nooo'

journey of Nineveh, a city on the Tigris, very much more than three
noooooo no Noooooo, n nooo no noo Nooooo, nooo nooo nooo nooo noooo

days' journey across from the nearest point of the Mediterranean coast.
nooo' noooooo nooooo nooo noo noooooo noooo no noo Noooooooooooo noooo.

How is that?
Noo no nooo?




But was there no other way for the whale to land the prophet within that
Noo noo noooo no noooo noo noo noo noooo no nooo noo noooooo nooooo nooo

short distance of Nineveh? Yes. He might have carried him round by the
noooo nooooooo no Noooooo? Noo. No noooo nooo noooooo noo noooo no noo

way of the Cape of Good Hope. But not to speak of the passage through
noo no noo Nooo no Nooo Nooo. Noo noo no noooo no noo noooooo noooooo

the whole length of the Mediterranean, and another passage up the
noo noooo nooooo no noo Noooooooooooo, noo noooooo noooooo no noo

Persian Gulf and Red Sea, such a supposition would involve the complete
Noooooo Nooo noo Noo Noo, nooo n noooooooooo noooo noooooo noo nooooooo

circumnavigation of all Africa in three days, not to speak of the Tigris
nooooooooooooooo no noo Nooooo no noooo nooo, noo no noooo no noo Nooooo

waters, near the site of Nineveh, being too shallow for any whale to
nooooo, nooo noo nooo no Noooooo, noooo noo noooooo noo noo noooo no

swim in. Besides, this idea of Jonah's weathering the Cape of Good Hope
nooo no. Noooooo, nooo nooo no Noooo'n nooooooooo noo Nooo no Nooo Nooo

at so early a day would wrest the honour of the discovery of that great
no no noooo n noo noooo noooo noo nooooo no noo noooooooo no nooo noooo

headland from Bartholomew Diaz, its reputed discoverer, and so make
nooooooo nooo Noooooooooo Nooo, noo noooooo nooooooooo, noo no nooo

modern history a liar.
nooooo noooooo n nooo.




But all these foolish arguments of old Sag-Harbor only evinced his
Noo noo noooo noooooo noooooooo no noo Noo-Nooooo nooo noooooo noo

foolish pride of reason--a thing still more reprehensible in him, seeing
noooooo noooo no nooooo--n noooo noooo nooo noooooooooooo no noo, nooooo

that he had but little learning except what he had picked up from the
nooo no noo noo nooooo nooooooo nooooo nooo no noo nooooo no nooo noo

sun and the sea. I say it only shows his foolish, impious pride, and
noo noo noo noo. N noo no nooo noooo noo noooooo, noooooo noooo, noo

abominable, devilish rebellion against the reverend clergy. For by a
nooooooooo, nooooooo noooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo nooooo. Noo no n

Portuguese Catholic priest, this very idea of Jonah's going to Nineveh
Nooooooooo Nooooooo nooooo, nooo nooo nooo no Noooo'n noooo no Noooooo

via the Cape of Good Hope was advanced as a signal magnification of
noo noo Nooo no Nooo Nooo noo nooooooo no n nooooo noooooooooooo no

the general miracle. And so it was. Besides, to this day, the highly
noo noooooo noooooo. Noo no no noo. Noooooo, no nooo noo, noo nooooo

noooooooooo Noooo nooooooo noooooo no noo nooooooooo noooo no Noooo. Noo

nooo noooo noooooooo noo, no Noooooo noooooooo no noo Nooooo'n Noooooo,

speaks of a Turkish Mosque built in honour of Jonah, in which Mosque was
nooooo no n Noooooo Nooooo noooo no nooooo no Noooo, no noooo Nooooo noo

a miraculous lamp that burnt without any oil.
n nooooooooo nooo nooo noooo noooooo noo noo.










CHAPTER 84. Pitchpoling.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooooooo.







To make them run easily and swiftly, the axles of carriages are
No nooo nooo noo nooooo noo noooooo, noo noooo no noooooooo noo

anointed; and for much the same purpose, some whalers perform an
nooooooo; noo noo nooo noo nooo noooooo, nooo noooooo noooooo no

analogous operation upon their boat; they grease the bottom. Nor is it
noooooooo noooooooo nooo noooo nooo; nooo nooooo noo nooooo. Noo no no

to be doubted that as such a procedure can do no harm, it may possibly
no no noooooo nooo no nooo n noooooooo noo no no nooo, no noo nooooooo

be of no contemptible advantage; considering that oil and water are
no no no nooooooooooo noooooooo; noooooooooo nooo noo noo noooo noo

hostile; that oil is a sliding thing, and that the object in view is to
noooooo; nooo noo no n noooooo noooo, noo nooo noo nooooo no nooo no no

make the boat slide bravely. Queequeg believed strongly in anointing
nooo noo nooo noooo noooooo. Nooooooo nooooooo nooooooo no noooooooo

his boat, and one morning not long after the German ship Jungfrau
noo nooo, noo noo noooooo noo nooo noooo noo Nooooo nooo Nooooooo

disappeared, took more than customary pains in that occupation; crawling
noooooooooo, nooo nooo nooo noooooooo noooo no nooo nooooooooo; nooooooo

under its bottom, where it hung over the side, and rubbing in the
noooo noo nooooo, noooo no nooo nooo noo nooo, noo noooooo no noo

unctuousness as though diligently seeking to insure a crop of hair from
nooooooooooo no nooooo nooooooooo noooooo no nooooo n nooo no nooo nooo

the craft's bald keel. He seemed to be working in obedience to some
noo noooo'n nooo nooo. No nooooo no no noooooo no noooooooo no nooo

particular presentiment. Nor did it remain unwarranted by the event.
nooooooooo nooooooooooo. Noo noo no nooooo noooooooooo no noo noooo.




Towards noon whales were raised; but so soon as the ship sailed down to
Noooooo nooo nooooo nooo nooooo; noo no nooo no noo nooo nooooo nooo no

them, they turned and fled with swift precipitancy; a disordered flight,
nooo, nooo nooooo noo nooo nooo noooo nooooooooooo; n nooooooooo nooooo,

as of Cleopatra's barges from Actium.
no no Noooooooo'n nooooo nooo Nooooo.




Nevertheless, the boats pursued, and Stubb's was foremost. By great
Nooooooooooo, noo noooo noooooo, noo Noooo'n noo nooooooo. No noooo

exertion, Tashtego at last succeeded in planting one iron; but the
nooooooo, Nooooooo no nooo noooooooo no nooooooo noo nooo; noo noo

stricken whale, without at all sounding, still continued his horizontal
nooooooo noooo, noooooo no noo nooooooo, noooo noooooooo noo nooooooooo

flight, with added fleetness. Such unintermitted strainings upon the
nooooo, nooo noooo noooooooo. Nooo noooooooooooo nooooooooo nooo noo

planted iron must sooner or later inevitably extract it. It became
noooooo nooo nooo nooooo no noooo nooooooooo noooooo no. No nooooo

imperative to lance the flying whale, or be content to lose him. But
nooooooooo no noooo noo nooooo noooo, no no noooooo no nooo noo. Noo

to haul the boat up to his flank was impossible, he swam so fast and
no nooo noo nooo no no noo noooo noo nooooooooo, no nooo no nooo noo

furious. What then remained?
noooooo. Nooo nooo nooooooo?




Of all the wondrous devices and dexterities, the sleights of hand and
No noo noo nooooooo noooooo noo noooooooooo, noo nooooooo no nooo noo

countless subtleties, to which the veteran whaleman is so often forced,
noooooooo nooooooooo, no noooo noo noooooo nooooooo no no noooo nooooo,

none exceed that fine manoeuvre with the lance called pitchpoling. Small
nooo nooooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooo noo noooo nooooo noooooooooo. Noooo

sword, or broad sword, in all its exercises boasts nothing like it. It
noooo, no noooo noooo, no noo noo noooooooo nooooo noooooo nooo no. No

is only indispensable with an inveterate running whale; its grand
no nooo noooooooooooo nooo no nooooooooo noooooo noooo; noo noooo

fact and feature is the wonderful distance to which the long lance is
nooo noo noooooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo no noooo noo nooo noooo no

accurately darted from a violently rocking, jerking boat, under extreme
nooooooooo nooooo nooo n noooooooo noooooo, noooooo nooo, noooo noooooo

headway. Steel and wood included, the entire spear is some ten or twelve
noooooo. Noooo noo nooo nooooooo, noo nooooo noooo no nooo noo no nooooo

feet in length; the staff is much slighter than that of the harpoon,
nooo no nooooo; noo noooo no nooo nooooooo nooo nooo no noo noooooo,

and also of a lighter material--pine. It is furnished with a small rope
noo nooo no n noooooo nooooooo--nooo. No no noooooooo nooo n noooo nooo

called a warp, of considerable length, by which it can be hauled back to
nooooo n nooo, no nooooooooooo nooooo, no noooo no noo no nooooo nooo no

the hand after darting.
noo nooo noooo noooooo.




But before going further, it is important to mention here, that though
Noo nooooo noooo noooooo, no no noooooooo no noooooo nooo, nooo nooooo

the harpoon may be pitchpoled in the same way with the lance, yet it
noo noooooo noo no nooooooooo no noo nooo noo nooo noo noooo, noo no

is seldom done; and when done, is still less frequently successful,
no nooooo nooo; noo nooo nooo, no noooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooooo,

on account of the greater weight and inferior length of the harpoon as
no noooooo no noo noooooo nooooo noo nooooooo nooooo no noo noooooo no

compared with the lance, which in effect become serious drawbacks. As a
nooooooo nooo noo noooo, noooo no nooooo nooooo noooooo noooooooo. No n

general thing, therefore, you must first get fast to a whale, before any
noooooo noooo, noooooooo, noo nooo noooo noo nooo no n noooo, nooooo noo

pitchpoling comes into play.
noooooooooo noooo nooo nooo.




Look now at Stubb; a man who from his humorous, deliberate coolness and
Nooo noo no Noooo; n noo noo nooo noo nooooooo, nooooooooo nooooooo noo

equanimity in the direst emergencies, was specially qualified to excel
nooooooooo no noo nooooo noooooooooo, noo noooooooo noooooooo no noooo

in pitchpoling. Look at him; he stands upright in the tossed bow of the
no noooooooooo. Nooo no noo; no nooooo noooooo no noo nooooo noo no noo

flying boat; wrapt in fleecy foam, the towing whale is forty feet ahead.
nooooo nooo; noooo no nooooo nooo, noo nooooo noooo no noooo nooo noooo.

Handling the long lance lightly, glancing twice or thrice along its
Nooooooo noo nooo noooo noooooo, nooooooo noooo no nooooo noooo noo

length to see if it be exactly straight, Stubb whistlingly gathers up
nooooo no noo no no no noooooo nooooooo, Noooo noooooooooo noooooo no

the coil of the warp in one hand, so as to secure its free end in his
noo nooo no noo nooo no noo nooo, no no no nooooo noo nooo noo no noo

grasp, leaving the rest unobstructed. Then holding the lance full before
noooo, noooooo noo nooo nooooooooooo. Nooo noooooo noo noooo nooo nooooo

his waistband's middle, he levels it at the whale; when, covering
noo noooooooo'n nooooo, no nooooo no no noo noooo; nooo, nooooooo

him with it, he steadily depresses the butt-end in his hand, thereby
noo nooo no, no nooooooo noooooooo noo nooo-noo no noo nooo, noooooo

elevating the point till the weapon stands fairly balanced upon his
noooooooo noo noooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo

palm, fifteen feet in the air. He minds you somewhat of a juggler,
nooo, noooooo nooo no noo noo. No noooo noo nooooooo no n noooooo,

balancing a long staff on his chin. Next moment with a rapid, nameless
noooooooo n nooo noooo no noo nooo. Nooo nooooo nooo n noooo, nooooooo

impulse, in a superb lofty arch the bright steel spans the foaming
noooooo, no n nooooo noooo nooo noo nooooo noooo noooo noo noooooo

distance, and quivers in the life spot of the whale. Instead of
nooooooo, noo noooooo no noo nooo nooo no noo noooo. Noooooo no

sparkling water, he now spouts red blood.
noooooooo noooo, no noo nooooo noo noooo.




"That drove the spigot out of him!" cried Stubb. "'Tis July's immortal
"Nooo noooo noo nooooo noo no noo!" noooo Noooo. "'Noo Nooo'n nooooooo

Fourth; all fountains must run wine today! Would now, it were old
Nooooo; noo noooooooo nooo noo nooo noooo! Noooo noo, no nooo noo

Orleans whiskey, or old Ohio, or unspeakable old Monongahela! Then,
Noooooo noooooo, no noo Nooo, no noooooooooo noo Noooooooooo! Nooo,

Nooooooo, noo, N'n nooo no nooo n noooooo no noo noo, noo no'n noooo

nooooo no noo noooo-nooo noooo, noo nooo nooo nooo noooo-nooo noooo noo

nooooo noooo."




Again and again to such gamesome talk, the dexterous dart is repeated,
Noooo noo noooo no nooo nooooooo nooo, noo noooooooo nooo no nooooooo,

the spear returning to its master like a greyhound held in skilful
