nooooo noooooo noo noooooo noo.










CHAPTER 85. The Fountain.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooooo.







That for six thousand years--and no one knows how many millions of ages
Nooo noo noo nooooooo noooo--noo no noo noooo noo nooo nooooooo no nooo

before--the great whales should have been spouting all over the sea,
nooooo--noo noooo nooooo nooooo nooo nooo nooooooo noo nooo noo noo,

and sprinkling and mistifying the gardens of the deep, as with so
noo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo noo noooooo no noo nooo, no nooo no

many sprinkling or mistifying pots; and that for some centuries back,
nooo nooooooooo no nooooooooo nooo; noo nooo noo nooo noooooooo nooo,

thousands of hunters should have been close by the fountain of the
noooooooo no noooooo nooooo nooo nooo noooo no noo nooooooo no noo

whale, watching these sprinklings and spoutings--that all this should
noooo, nooooooo noooo noooooooooo noo noooooooo--nooo noo nooo nooooo

be, and yet, that down to this blessed minute (fifteen and a quarter
no, noo noo, nooo nooo no nooo noooooo nooooo (noooooo noo n noooooo

minutes past one o'clock P.M. of this sixteenth day of December, A.D.
noooooo nooo noo n'noooo N.N. no nooo noooooooo noo no Nooooooo, N.N.

1851), it should still remain a problem, whether these spoutings
nooo), no nooooo noooo nooooo n noooooo, noooooo noooo noooooooo

are, after all, really water, or nothing but vapour--this is surely a
noo, noooo noo, nooooo noooo, no noooooo noo nooooo--nooo no nooooo n

noteworthy thing.
nooooooooo noooo.




Let us, then, look at this matter, along with some interesting items
Noo no, nooo, nooo no nooo nooooo, noooo nooo nooo noooooooooo noooo

contingent. Every one knows that by the peculiar cunning of their
nooooooooo. Noooo noo noooo nooo no noo nooooooo noooooo no noooo

gills, the finny tribes in general breathe the air which at all times is
noooo, noo noooo nooooo no noooooo noooooo noo noo noooo no noo noooo no

combined with the element in which they swim; hence, a herring or a cod
nooooooo nooo noo noooooo no noooo nooo nooo; noooo, n noooooo no n noo

might live a century, and never once raise its head above the surface.
noooo nooo n noooooo, noo noooo nooo noooo noo nooo noooo noo noooooo.

But owing to his marked internal structure which gives him regular
Noo noooo no noo nooooo nooooooo noooooooo noooo noooo noo noooooo

lungs, like a human being's, the whale can only live by inhaling the
noooo, nooo n noooo noooo'n, noo noooo noo nooo nooo no nooooooo noo

disengaged air in the open atmosphere. Wherefore the necessity for
nooooooooo noo no noo nooo nooooooooo. Noooooooo noo noooooooo noo

his periodical visits to the upper world. But he cannot in any degree
noo nooooooooo nooooo no noo noooo noooo. Noo no nooooo no noo nooooo

breathe through his mouth, for, in his ordinary attitude, the Sperm
noooooo noooooo noo noooo, noo, no noo nooooooo nooooooo, noo Noooo

Whale's mouth is buried at least eight feet beneath the surface; and
Noooo'n noooo no nooooo no noooo noooo nooo noooooo noo noooooo; noo

what is still more, his windpipe has no connexion with his mouth. No, he
nooo no noooo nooo, noo nooooooo noo no noooooooo nooo noo noooo. No, no

breathes through his spiracle alone; and this is on the top of his head.
nooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo noooo; noo nooo no no noo noo no noo nooo.




If I say, that in any creature breathing is only a function
No N noo, nooo no noo nooooooo noooooooo no nooo n nooooooo

indispensable to vitality, inasmuch as it withdraws from the air a
noooooooooooo no nooooooo, nooooooo no no noooooooo nooo noo noo n

certain element, which being subsequently brought into contact with the
noooooo noooooo, noooo noooo nooooooooooo noooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo

blood imparts to the blood its vivifying principle, I do not think I
noooo noooooo no noo noooo noo noooooooo noooooooo, N no noo noooo N

shall err; though I may possibly use some superfluous scientific words.
noooo noo; nooooo N noo nooooooo noo nooo noooooooooo nooooooooo noooo.

Assume it, and it follows that if all the blood in a man could be
Nooooo no, noo no noooooo nooo no noo noo noooo no n noo noooo no

aerated with one breath, he might then seal up his nostrils and not
noooooo nooo noo nooooo, no noooo nooo nooo no noo nooooooo noo noo

fetch another for a considerable time. That is to say, he would then
noooo noooooo noo n nooooooooooo nooo. Nooo no no noo, no noooo nooo

live without breathing. Anomalous as it may seem, this is precisely the
nooo noooooo noooooooo. Noooooooo no no noo nooo, nooo no noooooooo noo

case with the whale, who systematically lives, by intervals, his full
nooo nooo noo noooo, noo nooooooooooooo noooo, no noooooooo, noo nooo

hour and more (when at the bottom) without drawing a single breath, or
nooo noo nooo (nooo no noo nooooo) noooooo noooooo n nooooo nooooo, no

so much as in any way inhaling a particle of air; for, remember, he has
no nooo no no noo noo nooooooo n nooooooo no noo; noo, nooooooo, no noo

no gills. How is this? Between his ribs and on each side of his spine
no noooo. Noo no nooo? Noooooo noo nooo noo no nooo nooo no noo noooo

he is supplied with a remarkable involved Cretan labyrinth of
no no nooooooo nooo n nooooooooo nooooooo Nooooo noooooooo no

vermicelli-like vessels, which vessels, when he quits the surface, are
nooooooooo-nooo noooooo, noooo noooooo, nooo no noooo noo noooooo, noo

completely distended with oxygenated blood. So that for an hour or more,
nooooooooo noooooooo nooo nooooooooo noooo. No nooo noo no nooo no nooo,

a thousand fathoms in the sea, he carries a surplus stock of vitality in
n nooooooo noooooo no noo noo, no noooooo n noooooo noooo no nooooooo no

him, just as the camel crossing the waterless desert carries a surplus
noo, nooo no noo noooo nooooooo noo noooooooo nooooo noooooo n noooooo

supply of drink for future use in its four supplementary stomachs.
nooooo no noooo noo nooooo noo no noo nooo noooooooooooo nooooooo.

The anatomical fact of this labyrinth is indisputable; and that the
Noo nooooooooo nooo no nooo noooooooo no nooooooooooo; noo nooo noo

supposition founded upon it is reasonable and true, seems the more
noooooooooo noooooo nooo no no nooooooooo noo nooo, noooo noo nooo

cogent to me, when I consider the otherwise inexplicable obstinacy of
nooooo no no, nooo N nooooooo noo noooooooo nooooooooooo noooooooo no

that leviathan in HAVING HIS SPOUTINGS OUT, as the fishermen phrase
nooo noooooooo no NOOOOO NOO NOOOOOOOO NOO, no noo noooooooo nooooo

it. This is what I mean. If unmolested, upon rising to the surface, the
no. Nooo no nooo N nooo. No nooooooooo, nooo nooooo no noo noooooo, noo

Sperm Whale will continue there for a period of time exactly uniform
Noooo Noooo nooo nooooooo noooo noo n nooooo no nooo noooooo noooooo

with all his other unmolested risings. Say he stays eleven minutes, and
nooo noo noo noooo nooooooooo noooooo. Noo no noooo nooooo noooooo, noo

jets seventy times, that is, respires seventy breaths; then whenever he
nooo noooooo noooo, nooo no, nooooooo noooooo noooooo; nooo nooooooo no

rises again, he will be sure to have his seventy breaths over again, to
noooo noooo, no nooo no nooo no nooo noo noooooo noooooo nooo noooo, no

a minute. Now, if after he fetches a few breaths you alarm him, so that
n nooooo. Noo, no noooo no noooooo n noo noooooo noo noooo noo, no nooo

he sounds, he will be always dodging up again to make good his regular
no nooooo, no nooo no nooooo noooooo no noooo no nooo nooo noo noooooo

allowance of air. And not till those seventy breaths are told, will he
noooooooo no noo. Noo noo nooo noooo noooooo noooooo noo nooo, nooo no

finally go down to stay out his full term below. Remark, however, that
noooooo no nooo no nooo noo noo nooo nooo noooo. Nooooo, noooooo, nooo

in different individuals these rates are different; but in any one
no noooooooo noooooooooo noooo noooo noo noooooooo; noo no noo noo

they are alike. Now, why should the whale thus insist upon having his
nooo noo noooo. Noo, noo nooooo noo noooo nooo nooooo nooo nooooo noo

spoutings out, unless it be to replenish his reservoir of air, ere
noooooooo noo, nooooo no no no noooooooo noo noooooooo no noo, noo

descending for good? How obvious is it, too, that this necessity for the
nooooooooo noo nooo? Noo noooooo no no, noo, nooo nooo noooooooo noo noo

whale's rising exposes him to all the fatal hazards of the chase. For
noooo'n nooooo noooooo noo no noo noo noooo noooooo no noo noooo. Noo

not by hook or by net could this vast leviathan be caught, when sailing
noo no nooo no no noo noooo nooo nooo noooooooo no nooooo, nooo noooooo

a thousand fathoms beneath the sunlight. Not so much thy skill, then, O
n nooooooo noooooo noooooo noo nooooooo. Noo no nooo noo noooo, nooo, N

hunter, as the great necessities that strike the victory to thee!
nooooo, no noo noooo noooooooooo nooo nooooo noo noooooo no nooo!




In man, breathing is incessantly going on--one breath only serving
No noo, noooooooo no noooooooooo noooo no--noo nooooo nooo noooooo

for two or three pulsations; so that whatever other business he has to
noo noo no noooo nooooooooo; no nooo nooooooo noooo nooooooo no noo no

attend to, waking or sleeping, breathe he must, or die he will. But the
nooooo no, nooooo no nooooooo, noooooo no nooo, no noo no nooo. Noo noo

Sperm Whale only breathes about one seventh or Sunday of his time.
Noooo Noooo nooo nooooooo noooo noo noooooo no Nooooo no noo nooo.




It has been said that the whale only breathes through his spout-hole; if
No noo nooo nooo nooo noo noooo nooo nooooooo noooooo noo noooo-nooo; no

it could truthfully be added that his spouts are mixed with water, then
no noooo nooooooooo no noooo nooo noo nooooo noo noooo nooo noooo, nooo

I opine we should be furnished with the reason why his sense of smell
N noooo no nooooo no noooooooo nooo noo nooooo noo noo noooo no noooo

seems obliterated in him; for the only thing about him that at all
noooo noooooooooo no noo; noo noo nooo noooo noooo noo nooo no noo

answers to his nose is that identical spout-hole; and being so clogged
noooooo no noo nooo no nooo noooooooo noooo-nooo; noo noooo no noooooo

with two elements, it could not be expected to have the power of
nooo noo nooooooo, no noooo noo no nooooooo no nooo noo noooo no

smelling. But owing to the mystery of the spout--whether it be water or
nooooooo. Noo noooo no noo noooooo no noo noooo--noooooo no no noooo no

whether it be vapour--no absolute certainty can as yet be arrived at on
noooooo no no nooooo--no nooooooo noooooooo noo no noo no noooooo no no

this head. Sure it is, nevertheless, that the Sperm Whale has no proper
nooo nooo. Nooo no no, nooooooooooo, nooo noo Noooo Noooo noo no nooooo

olfactories. But what does he want of them? No roses, no violets, no
noooooooooo. Noo nooo nooo no nooo no nooo? No noooo, no noooooo, no

Cologne-water in the sea.
Noooooo-noooo no noo noo.




Furthermore, as his windpipe solely opens into the tube of his spouting
Noooooooooo, no noo nooooooo nooooo noooo nooo noo nooo no noo nooooooo

canal, and as that long canal--like the grand Erie Canal--is furnished
noooo, noo no nooo nooo noooo--nooo noo noooo Nooo Noooo--no noooooooo

with a sort of locks (that open and shut) for the downward retention of
nooo n nooo no noooo (nooo nooo noo nooo) noo noo nooooooo noooooooo no

air or the upward exclusion of water, therefore the whale has no voice;
noo no noo nooooo noooooooo no noooo, noooooooo noo noooo noo no noooo;

unless you insult him by saying, that when he so strangely rumbles,
nooooo noo nooooo noo no nooooo, nooo nooo no no noooooooo noooooo,

he talks through his nose. But then again, what has the whale to say?
no noooo noooooo noo nooo. Noo nooo noooo, nooo noo noo noooo no noo?

Seldom have I known any profound being that had anything to say to
Nooooo nooo N noooo noo nooooooo noooo nooo noo nooooooo no noo no

this world, unless forced to stammer out something by way of getting a
nooo noooo, nooooo nooooo no noooooo noo noooooooo no noo no noooooo n

living. Oh! happy that the world is such an excellent listener!
nooooo. No! noooo nooo noo noooo no nooo no noooooooo nooooooo!




Now, the spouting canal of the Sperm Whale, chiefly intended as it
Noo, noo nooooooo noooo no noo Noooo Noooo, noooooo nooooooo no no

is for the conveyance of air, and for several feet laid along,
no noo noo nooooooooo no noo, noo noo noooooo nooo nooo noooo,

horizontally, just beneath the upper surface of his head, and a little
nooooooooooo, nooo noooooo noo noooo noooooo no noo nooo, noo n nooooo

to one side; this curious canal is very much like a gas-pipe laid down
no noo nooo; nooo noooooo noooo no nooo nooo nooo n noo-nooo nooo nooo

in a city on one side of a street. But the question returns whether this
no n nooo no noo nooo no n nooooo. Noo noo nooooooo noooooo noooooo nooo

gas-pipe is also a water-pipe; in other words, whether the spout of the
noo-nooo no nooo n noooo-nooo; no noooo noooo, noooooo noo noooo no noo

Sperm Whale is the mere vapour of the exhaled breath, or whether that
Noooo Noooo no noo nooo nooooo no noo noooooo nooooo, no noooooo nooo

exhaled breath is mixed with water taken in at the mouth, and
noooooo nooooo no noooo nooo noooo noooo no no noo noooo, noo

discharged through the spiracle. It is certain that the mouth indirectly
nooooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo. No no noooooo nooo noo noooo nooooooooo

communicates with the spouting canal; but it cannot be proved that this
nooooooooooo nooo noo nooooooo noooo; noo no nooooo no nooooo nooo nooo

is for the purpose of discharging water through the spiracle. Because
no noo noo noooooo no noooooooooo noooo noooooo noo nooooooo. Noooooo

the greatest necessity for so doing would seem to be, when in feeding he
noo nooooooo noooooooo noo no noooo noooo nooo no no, nooo no noooooo no

accidentally takes in water. But the Sperm Whale's food is far beneath
nooooooooooo noooo no noooo. Noo noo Noooo Noooo'n nooo no noo noooooo

the surface, and there he cannot spout even if he would. Besides, if
noo noooooo, noo noooo no nooooo noooo nooo no no noooo. Noooooo, no

you regard him very closely, and time him with your watch, you will find
noo nooooo noo nooo noooooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooo noooo, noo nooo nooo

that when unmolested, there is an undeviating rhyme between the periods
nooo nooo nooooooooo, noooo no no noooooooooo noooo noooooo noo noooooo

of his jets and the ordinary periods of respiration.
no noo nooo noo noo nooooooo noooooo no noooooooooo.




But why pester one with all this reasoning on the subject? Speak out!
Noo noo nooooo noo nooo noo nooo noooooooo no noo noooooo? Noooo noo!

You have seen him spout; then declare what the spout is; can you not
Noo nooo nooo noo noooo; nooo noooooo nooo noo noooo no; noo noo noo

tell water from air? My dear sir, in this world it is not so easy to
nooo noooo nooo noo? No nooo noo, no nooo noooo no no noo no nooo no

settle these plain things. I have ever found your plain things the
nooooo noooo noooo nooooo. N nooo nooo noooo nooo noooo nooooo noo

knottiest of all. And as for this whale spout, you might almost stand in
noooooooo no noo. Noo no noo nooo noooo noooo, noo noooo nooooo noooo no

it, and yet be undecided as to what it is precisely.
no, noo noo no noooooooo no no nooo no no noooooooo.




The central body of it is hidden in the snowy sparkling mist enveloping
Noo noooooo nooo no no no nooooo no noo noooo noooooooo nooo nooooooooo

it; and how can you certainly tell whether any water falls from it,
no; noo noo noo noo noooooooo nooo noooooo noo noooo noooo nooo no,

when, always, when you are close enough to a whale to get a close view
nooo, nooooo, nooo noo noo noooo nooooo no n noooo no noo n noooo nooo

of his spout, he is in a prodigious commotion, the water cascading
no noo noooo, no no no n nooooooooo noooooooo, noo noooo noooooooo

all around him. And if at such times you should think that you really
noo nooooo noo. Noo no no nooo noooo noo nooooo noooo nooo noo nooooo

perceived drops of moisture in the spout, how do you know that they are
noooooooo noooo no nooooooo no noo noooo, noo no noo nooo nooo nooo noo

not merely condensed from its vapour; or how do you know that they
noo nooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo; no noo no noo nooo nooo nooo

are not those identical drops superficially lodged in the spout-hole
noo noo noooo noooooooo noooo noooooooooooo nooooo no noo noooo-nooo

fissure, which is countersunk into the summit of the whale's head? For
noooooo, noooo no noooooooooo nooo noo nooooo no noo noooo'n nooo? Noo

even when tranquilly swimming through the mid-day sea in a calm, with
nooo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo noooooo noo noo-noo noo no n nooo, nooo

his elevated hump sun-dried as a dromedary's in the desert; even then,
noo nooooooo nooo noo-noooo no n noooooooo'n no noo nooooo; nooo nooo,

the whale always carries a small basin of water on his head, as under
noo noooo nooooo noooooo n noooo noooo no noooo no noo nooo, no noooo

a blazing sun you will sometimes see a cavity in a rock filled up with
n noooooo noo noo nooo noooooooo noo n nooooo no n nooo nooooo no nooo

rain.
nooo.




Nor is it at all prudent for the hunter to be over curious touching the
Noo no no no noo noooooo noo noo nooooo no no nooo noooooo nooooooo noo

precise nature of the whale spout. It will not do for him to be peering
noooooo nooooo no noo noooo noooo. No nooo noo no noo noo no no noooooo

into it, and putting his face in it. You cannot go with your pitcher to
nooo no, noo noooooo noo nooo no no. Noo nooooo no nooo nooo noooooo no

this fountain and fill it, and bring it away. For even when coming into
nooo nooooooo noo nooo no, noo noooo no nooo. Noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo

slight contact with the outer, vapoury shreds of the jet, which will
nooooo noooooo nooo noo noooo, noooooo nooooo no noo noo, noooo nooo

often happen, your skin will feverishly smart, from the acridness of
noooo nooooo, nooo nooo nooo nooooooooo noooo, nooo noo noooooooo no

the thing so touching it. And I know one, who coming into still closer
noo noooo no nooooooo no. Noo N nooo noo, noo nooooo nooo noooo nooooo

contact with the spout, whether with some scientific object in view,
noooooo nooo noo noooo, noooooo nooo nooo nooooooooo nooooo no nooo,

or otherwise, I cannot say, the skin peeled off from his cheek and arm.
no noooooooo, N nooooo noo, noo nooo nooooo noo nooo noo noooo noo noo.

Wherefore, among whalemen, the spout is deemed poisonous; they try to
Noooooooo, noooo nooooooo, noo noooo no nooooo noooooooo; nooo noo no

evade it. Another thing; I have heard it said, and I do not much doubt
noooo no. Noooooo noooo; N nooo noooo no nooo, noo N no noo nooo noooo

it, that if the jet is fairly spouted into your eyes, it will blind you.
no, nooo no noo noo no nooooo noooooo nooo nooo nooo, no nooo noooo noo.

The wisest thing the investigator can do then, it seems to me, is to let
Noo nooooo noooo noo nooooooooooo noo no nooo, no noooo no no, no no noo

this deadly spout alone.
nooo nooooo noooo noooo.




Still, we can hypothesize, even if we cannot prove and establish. My
Noooo, no noo noooooooooo, nooo no no nooooo noooo noo noooooooo. No

hypothesis is this: that the spout is nothing but mist. And besides
nooooooooo no nooo: nooo noo noooo no noooooo noo nooo. Noo noooooo

other reasons, to this conclusion I am impelled, by considerations
noooo noooooo, no nooo nooooooooo N no nooooooo, no nooooooooooooo

touching the great inherent dignity and sublimity of the Sperm Whale;
nooooooo noo noooo nooooooo noooooo noo noooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo;

I account him no common, shallow being, inasmuch as it is an undisputed
N noooooo noo no nooooo, noooooo noooo, nooooooo no no no no nooooooooo

fact that he is never found on soundings, or near shores; all other
nooo nooo no no noooo noooo no noooooooo, no nooo nooooo; noo noooo

whales sometimes are. He is both ponderous and profound. And I am
nooooo noooooooo noo. No no nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo. Noo N no

convinced that from the heads of all ponderous profound beings, such as
noooooooo nooo nooo noo noooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo nooooo, nooo no

Plato, Pyrrho, the Devil, Jupiter, Dante, and so on, there always goes
Noooo, Nooooo, noo Noooo, Noooooo, Noooo, noo no no, noooo nooooo nooo

up a certain semi-visible steam, while in the act of thinking deep
no n noooooo nooo-noooooo noooo, noooo no noo noo no nooooooo nooo

thoughts. While composing a little treatise on Eternity, I had the
nooooooo. Noooo noooooooo n nooooo nooooooo no Nooooooo, N noo noo

curiosity to place a mirror before me; and ere long saw reflected there,
noooooooo no noooo n nooooo nooooo no; noo noo nooo noo noooooooo noooo,

a curious involved worming and undulation in the atmosphere over my
n noooooo nooooooo noooooo noo nooooooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo no

head. The invariable moisture of my hair, while plunged in deep thought,
nooo. Noo nooooooooo nooooooo no no nooo, noooo noooooo no nooo noooooo,

after six cups of hot tea in my thin shingled attic, of an August noon;
noooo noo nooo no noo noo no no nooo nooooooo noooo, no no Nooooo nooo;

this seems an additional argument for the above supposition.
nooo noooo no nooooooooo nooooooo noo noo noooo noooooooooo.




And how nobly it raises our conceit of the mighty, misty monster, to
Noo noo noooo no nooooo noo noooooo no noo nooooo, noooo noooooo, no

behold him solemnly sailing through a calm tropical sea; his vast, mild
nooooo noo nooooooo noooooo noooooo n nooo nooooooo noo; noo nooo, nooo

head overhung by a canopy of vapour, engendered by his incommunicable
nooo nooooooo no n nooooo no nooooo, nooooooooo no noo nooooooooooooo

contemplations, and that vapour--as you will sometimes see it--glorified
nooooooooooooo, noo nooo nooooo--no noo nooo noooooooo noo no--noooooooo

by a rainbow, as if Heaven itself had put its seal upon his thoughts.
no n noooooo, no no Nooooo nooooo noo noo noo nooo nooo noo nooooooo.

For, d'ye see, rainbows do not visit the clear air; they only irradiate
Noo, n'no noo, nooooooo no noo noooo noo noooo noo; nooo nooo noooooooo

vapour. And so, through all the thick mists of the dim doubts in my
nooooo. Noo no, noooooo noo noo noooo noooo no noo noo nooooo no no

mind, divine intuitions now and then shoot, enkindling my fog with a
nooo, nooooo nooooooooo noo noo nooo noooo, nooooooooo no noo nooo n

heavenly ray. And for this I thank God; for all have doubts; many deny;
nooooooo noo. Noo noo nooo N noooo Noo; noo noo nooo nooooo; nooo nooo;

but doubts or denials, few along with them, have intuitions. Doubts
noo nooooo no noooooo, noo noooo nooo nooo, nooo nooooooooo. Nooooo

of all things earthly, and intuitions of some things heavenly; this
no noo nooooo noooooo, noo nooooooooo no nooo nooooo nooooooo; nooo

combination makes neither believer nor infidel, but makes a man who
noooooooooo noooo noooooo nooooooo noo noooooo, noo noooo n noo noo

regards them both with equal eye.
noooooo nooo nooo nooo noooo noo.










CHAPTER 86. The Tail.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo.







Other poets have warbled the praises of the soft eye of the antelope,
Noooo noooo nooo noooooo noo noooooo no noo nooo noo no noo nooooooo,

and the lovely plumage of the bird that never alights; less celestial, I
noo noo nooooo noooooo no noo nooo nooo noooo noooooo; nooo noooooooo, N

celebrate a tail.
noooooooo n nooo.




Reckoning the largest sized Sperm Whale's tail to begin at that point of
Noooooooo noo noooooo noooo Noooo Noooo'n nooo no noooo no nooo noooo no

the trunk where it tapers to about the girth of a man, it comprises
noo noooo noooo no nooooo no noooo noo noooo no n noo, no noooooooo

upon its upper surface alone, an area of at least fifty square feet. The
nooo noo noooo noooooo noooo, no nooo no no noooo noooo nooooo nooo. Noo

compact round body of its root expands into two broad, firm, flat palms
noooooo noooo nooo no noo nooo noooooo nooo noo noooo, nooo, nooo noooo

or flukes, gradually shoaling away to less than an inch in thickness.
no nooooo, noooooooo nooooooo nooo no nooo nooo no nooo no noooooooo.

At the crotch or junction, these flukes slightly overlap, then sideways
No noo nooooo no nooooooo, noooo nooooo nooooooo noooooo, nooo nooooooo

recede from each other like wings, leaving a wide vacancy between. In
nooooo nooo nooo noooo nooo noooo, noooooo n nooo noooooo noooooo. No

no living thing are the lines of beauty more exquisitely defined than in
no nooooo noooo noo noo noooo no nooooo nooo noooooooooo noooooo nooo no

the crescentic borders of these flukes. At its utmost expansion in the
noo nooooooooo noooooo no noooo nooooo. No noo nooooo noooooooo no noo

full grown whale, the tail will considerably exceed twenty feet across.
nooo noooo noooo, noo nooo nooo nooooooooooo nooooo nooooo nooo nooooo.




The entire member seems a dense webbed bed of welded sinews; but cut
Noo nooooo nooooo noooo n noooo nooooo noo no nooooo nooooo; noo noo

into it, and you find that three distinct strata compose it:--upper,
nooo no, noo noo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooooo noooooo no:--noooo,

middle, and lower. The fibres in the upper and lower layers, are
nooooo, noo noooo. Noo nooooo no noo noooo noo noooo nooooo, noo

long and horizontal; those of the middle one, very short, and running
nooo noo nooooooooo; noooo no noo nooooo noo, nooo noooo, noo noooooo

crosswise between the outside layers. This triune structure, as much as
noooooooo noooooo noo noooooo nooooo. Nooo nooooo noooooooo, no nooo no

anything else, imparts power to the tail. To the student of old Roman
nooooooo nooo, noooooo noooo no noo nooo. No noo noooooo no noo Noooo

walls, the middle layer will furnish a curious parallel to the thin
noooo, noo nooooo noooo nooo noooooo n noooooo nooooooo no noo nooo

course of tiles always alternating with the stone in those wonderful
nooooo no noooo nooooo noooooooooo nooo noo noooo no noooo noooooooo

relics of the antique, and which undoubtedly contribute so much to the
nooooo no noo noooooo, noo noooo noooooooooo nooooooooo no nooo no noo

great strength of the masonry.
noooo nooooooo no noo noooooo.




But as if this vast local power in the tendinous tail were not enough,
Noo no no nooo nooo noooo noooo no noo noooooooo nooo nooo noo nooooo,

the whole bulk of the leviathan is knit over with a warp and woof of
noo noooo nooo no noo noooooooo no nooo nooo nooo n nooo noo nooo no

muscular fibres and filaments, which passing on either side the loins
nooooooo nooooo noo noooooooo, noooo noooooo no nooooo nooo noo noooo

and running down into the flukes, insensibly blend with them, and
noo noooooo nooo nooo noo nooooo, nooooooooo noooo nooo nooo, noo

largely contribute to their might; so that in the tail the confluent
noooooo nooooooooo no noooo noooo; no nooo no noo nooo noo noooooooo

measureless force of the whole whale seems concentrated to a point.
noooooooooo noooo no noo noooo noooo noooo nooooooooooo no n noooo.

Could annihilation occur to matter, this were the thing to do it.
Noooo nooooooooooo noooo no nooooo, nooo nooo noo noooo no no no.




Nor does this--its amazing strength, at all tend to cripple the graceful
Noo nooo nooo--noo noooooo nooooooo, no noo nooo no noooooo noo nooooooo

flexion of its motions; where infantileness of ease undulates through
noooooo no noo noooooo; noooo noooooooooooo no nooo noooooooo noooooo

a Titanism of power. On the contrary, those motions derive their most
n Nooooooo no noooo. No noo nooooooo, noooo noooooo nooooo noooo nooo

appalling beauty from it. Real strength never impairs beauty or harmony,
noooooooo nooooo nooo no. Nooo nooooooo noooo noooooo nooooo no noooooo,

but it often bestows it; and in everything imposingly beautiful,
noo no noooo noooooo no; noo no nooooooooo nooooooooo noooooooo,

strength has much to do with the magic. Take away the tied tendons that
nooooooo noo nooo no no nooo noo noooo. Nooo nooo noo nooo noooooo nooo

all over seem bursting from the marble in the carved Hercules, and its
noo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo no noo nooooo Nooooooo, noo noo

charm would be gone. As devout Eckerman lifted the linen sheet from the
noooo noooo no nooo. No nooooo Nooooooo nooooo noo noooo noooo nooo noo

naked corpse of Goethe, he was overwhelmed with the massive chest of the
noooo nooooo no Nooooo, no noo noooooooooo nooo noo noooooo noooo no noo

man, that seemed as a Roman triumphal arch. When Angelo paints even God
noo, nooo nooooo no n Noooo noooooooo nooo. Nooo Nooooo nooooo nooo Noo

the Father in human form, mark what robustness is there. And whatever
noo Nooooo no noooo nooo, nooo nooo nooooooooo no noooo. Noo nooooooo

they may reveal of the divine love in the Son, the soft, curled,
nooo noo nooooo no noo nooooo nooo no noo Noo, noo nooo, nooooo,

hermaphroditical Italian pictures, in which his idea has been most
nooooooooooooooo Noooooo nooooooo, no noooo noo nooo noo nooo nooo

successfully embodied; these pictures, so destitute as they are of all
nooooooooooo nooooooo; noooo nooooooo, no noooooooo no nooo noo no noo

brawniness, hint nothing of any power, but the mere negative, feminine
nooooooooo, nooo noooooo no noo noooo, noo noo nooo nooooooo, nooooooo

one of submission and endurance, which on all hands it is conceded, form
noo no nooooooooo noo noooooooo, noooo no noo noooo no no nooooooo, nooo

the peculiar practical virtues of his teachings.
noo nooooooo noooooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo.




Such is the subtle elasticity of the organ I treat of, that whether
Nooo no noo nooooo nooooooooo no noo noooo N noooo no, nooo noooooo

wielded in sport, or in earnest, or in anger, whatever be the mood it
noooooo no noooo, no no noooooo, no no noooo, nooooooo no noo nooo no

be in, its flexions are invariably marked by exceeding grace. Therein no
no no, noo nooooooo noo nooooooooo nooooo no noooooooo noooo. Noooooo no

fairy's arm can transcend it.
noooo'n noo noo noooooooo no.




Five great motions are peculiar to it. First, when used as a fin for
Nooo noooo noooooo noo nooooooo no no. Noooo, nooo nooo no n noo noo

progression; Second, when used as a mace in battle; Third, in sweeping;
noooooooooo; Nooooo, nooo nooo no n nooo no nooooo; Noooo, no nooooooo;

Fourth, in lobtailing; Fifth, in peaking flukes.
Nooooo, no nooooooooo; Noooo, no noooooo nooooo.




First: Being horizontal in its position, the Leviathan's tail acts in
Noooo: Noooo nooooooooo no noo nooooooo, noo Noooooooo'n nooo nooo no

a different manner from the tails of all other sea creatures. It never
n noooooooo nooooo nooo noo noooo no noo noooo noo noooooooo. No noooo

wriggles. In man or fish, wriggling is a sign of inferiority. To the
nooooooo. No noo no nooo, noooooooo no n nooo no noooooooooo. No noo

whale, his tail is the sole means of propulsion. Scroll-wise coiled
noooo, noo nooo no noo nooo noooo no nooooooooo. Nooooo-nooo nooooo

forwards beneath the body, and then rapidly sprung backwards, it is this
nooooooo noooooo noo nooo, noo nooo noooooo nooooo noooooooo, no no nooo

which gives that singular darting, leaping motion to the monster when
noooo noooo nooo nooooooo noooooo, noooooo nooooo no noo noooooo nooo

furiously swimming. His side-fins only serve to steer by.
noooooooo nooooooo. Noo nooo-nooo nooo noooo no noooo no.




Second: It is a little significant, that while one sperm whale only
Nooooo: No no n nooooo noooooooooo, nooo noooo noo noooo noooo nooo

fights another sperm whale with his head and jaw, nevertheless, in his
nooooo noooooo noooo noooo nooo noo nooo noo noo, nooooooooooo, no noo

conflicts with man, he chiefly and contemptuously uses his tail. In
noooooooo nooo noo, no noooooo noo nooooooooooooo nooo noo nooo. No

striking at a boat, he swiftly curves away his flukes from it, and the
nooooooo no n nooo, no noooooo nooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo no, noo noo

blow is only inflicted by the recoil. If it be made in the unobstructed
nooo no nooo noooooooo no noo nooooo. No no no nooo no noo nooooooooooo

air, especially if it descend to its mark, the stroke is then simply
noo, nooooooooo no no noooooo no noo nooo, noo nooooo no nooo nooooo

irresistible. No ribs of man or boat can withstand it. Your only
nooooooooooo. No nooo no noo no nooo noo noooooooo no. Nooo nooo

salvation lies in eluding it; but if it comes sideways through the
noooooooo nooo no noooooo no; noo no no noooo nooooooo noooooo noo

opposing water, then partly owing to the light buoyancy of the whale
nooooooo noooo, nooo nooooo noooo no noo noooo nooooooo no noo noooo

boat, and the elasticity of its materials, a cracked rib or a dashed
nooo, noo noo nooooooooo no noo noooooooo, n noooooo noo no n nooooo

plank or two, a sort of stitch in the side, is generally the most
noooo no noo, n nooo no nooooo no noo nooo, no noooooooo noo nooo

serious result. These submerged side blows are so often received in the
noooooo nooooo. Noooo noooooooo nooo noooo noo no noooo nooooooo no noo

fishery, that they are accounted mere child's play. Some one strips off
noooooo, nooo nooo noo noooooooo nooo noooo'n nooo. Nooo noo nooooo noo

a frock, and the hole is stopped.
n noooo, noo noo nooo no noooooo.




Third: I cannot demonstrate it, but it seems to me, that in the whale
Noooo: N nooooo noooooooooo no, noo no noooo no no, nooo no noo noooo

the sense of touch is concentrated in the tail; for in this respect
noo noooo no noooo no nooooooooooo no noo nooo; noo no nooo noooooo

there is a delicacy in it only equalled by the daintiness of the
noooo no n nooooooo no no nooo nooooooo no noo nooooooooo no noo

elephant's trunk. This delicacy is chiefly evinced in the action of
nooooooo'n noooo. Nooo nooooooo no noooooo noooooo no noo nooooo no

sweeping, when in maidenly gentleness the whale with a certain soft
nooooooo, nooo no nooooooo nooooooooo noo noooo nooo n noooooo nooo

slowness moves his immense flukes from side to side upon the surface
nooooooo noooo noo noooooo nooooo nooo nooo no nooo nooo noo noooooo

of the sea; and if he feel but a sailor's whisker, woe to that sailor,
no noo noo; noo no no nooo noo n nooooo'n noooooo, noo no nooo nooooo,

whiskers and all. What tenderness there is in that preliminary touch!
nooooooo noo noo. Nooo nooooooooo noooo no no nooo noooooooooo noooo!

Had this tail any prehensile power, I should straightway bethink me of
Noo nooo nooo noo nooooooooo noooo, N nooooo noooooooooo noooooo no no

Darmonodes' elephant that so frequented the flower-market, and with
Nooooooooo' nooooooo nooo no nooooooooo noo nooooo-nooooo, noo nooo

low salutations presented nosegays to damsels, and then caressed their
noo noooooooooo noooooooo nooooooo no noooooo, noo nooo nooooooo noooo

zones. On more accounts than one, a pity it is that the whale does not
noooo. No nooo nooooooo nooo noo, n nooo no no nooo noo noooo nooo noo

possess this prehensile virtue in his tail; for I have heard of yet
noooooo nooo nooooooooo nooooo no noo nooo; noo N nooo noooo no noo

another elephant, that when wounded in the fight, curved round his trunk
noooooo nooooooo, nooo nooo noooooo no noo noooo, nooooo noooo noo noooo

and extracted the dart.
noo noooooooo noo nooo.




Fourth: Stealing unawares upon the whale in the fancied security of the
Nooooo: Nooooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo no noo noooooo nooooooo no noo

middle of solitary seas, you find him unbent from the vast corpulence
nooooo no nooooooo nooo, noo nooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo

of his dignity, and kitten-like, he plays on the ocean as if it were a
no noo noooooo, noo nooooo-nooo, no noooo no noo noooo no no no nooo n

hearth. But still you see his power in his play. The broad palms of
nooooo. Noo noooo noo noo noo noooo no noo nooo. Noo noooo noooo no

his tail are flirted high into the air; then smiting the surface, the
noo nooo noo noooooo nooo nooo noo noo; nooo noooooo noo noooooo, noo

thunderous concussion resounds for miles. You would almost think a great
nooooooooo nooooooooo nooooooo noo noooo. Noo noooo nooooo noooo n noooo

gun had been discharged; and if you noticed the light wreath of vapour
noo noo nooo nooooooooo; noo no noo noooooo noo noooo nooooo no nooooo

from the spiracle at his other extremity, you would think that that was
nooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo noooooooo, noo noooo noooo nooo nooo noo

the smoke from the touch-hole.
noo noooo nooo noo noooo-nooo.




Fifth: As in the ordinary floating posture of the leviathan the flukes
Noooo: No no noo nooooooo nooooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo noo nooooo

lie considerably below the level of his back, they are then completely
noo nooooooooooo noooo noo noooo no noo nooo, nooo noo nooo nooooooooo

out of sight beneath the surface; but when he is about to plunge into
noo no noooo noooooo noo noooooo; noo nooo no no noooo no nooooo nooo

the deeps, his entire flukes with at least thirty feet of his body are
noo noooo, noo nooooo nooooo nooo no noooo nooooo nooo no noo nooo noo

tossed erect in the air, and so remain vibrating a moment, till they
nooooo noooo no noo noo, noo no nooooo noooooooo n nooooo, nooo nooo

downwards shoot out of view. Excepting the sublime BREACH--somewhere
noooooooo noooo noo no nooo. Noooooooo noo noooooo NOOOOO--noooooooo

else to be described--this peaking of the whale's flukes is perhaps the
nooo no no noooooooo--nooo noooooo no noo noooo'n nooooo no noooooo noo

grandest sight to be seen in all animated nature. Out of the bottomless
nooooooo noooo no no nooo no noo nooooooo nooooo. Noo no noo nooooooooo

profundities the gigantic tail seems spasmodically snatching at the
nooooooooooo noo nooooooo nooo noooo noooooooooooo noooooooo no noo

highest heaven. So in dreams, have I seen majestic Satan thrusting forth
noooooo nooooo. No no nooooo, nooo N nooo nooooooo Noooo noooooooo noooo

his tormented colossal claw from the flame Baltic of Hell. But in
noo noooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo noo noooo Nooooo no Nooo. Noo no

gazing at such scenes, it is all in all what mood you are in; if in
nooooo no nooo nooooo, no no noo no noo nooo nooo noo noo no; no no

the Dantean, the devils will occur to you; if in that of Isaiah, the
noo Noooooo, noo nooooo nooo noooo no noo; no no nooo no Nooooo, noo

archangels. Standing at the mast-head of my ship during a sunrise that
nooooooooo. Nooooooo no noo nooo-nooo no no nooo nooooo n noooooo nooo

crimsoned sky and sea, I once saw a large herd of whales in the east,
noooooooo noo noo noo, N nooo noo n noooo nooo no nooooo no noo nooo,

all heading towards the sun, and for a moment vibrating in concert with
noo noooooo noooooo noo noo, noo noo n nooooo noooooooo no noooooo nooo

peaked flukes. As it seemed to me at the time, such a grand embodiment
nooooo nooooo. No no nooooo no no no noo nooo, nooo n noooo nooooooooo

of adoration of the gods was never beheld, even in Persia, the home of
no noooooooo no noo nooo noo noooo nooooo, nooo no Nooooo, noo nooo no

the fire worshippers. As Ptolemy Philopater testified of the African
noo nooo noooooooooo. No Noooooo Nooooooooo noooooooo no noo Noooooo

elephant, I then testified of the whale, pronouncing him the most devout
nooooooo, N nooo noooooooo no noo noooo, noooooooooo noo noo nooo nooooo

of all beings. For according to King Juba, the military elephants of
no noo nooooo. Noo noooooooo no Nooo Nooo, noo nooooooo noooooooo no

antiquity often hailed the morning with their trunks uplifted in the
noooooooo noooo nooooo noo noooooo nooo noooo nooooo nooooooo no noo

profoundest silence.
noooooooooo noooooo.




The chance comparison in this chapter, between the whale and the
Noo nooooo nooooooooo no nooo noooooo, noooooo noo noooo noo noo

elephant, so far as some aspects of the tail of the one and the trunk
nooooooo, no noo no nooo noooooo no noo nooo no noo noo noo noo noooo

of the other are concerned, should not tend to place those two
no noo noooo noo noooooooo, nooooo noo nooo no noooo noooo noo

opposite organs on an equality, much less the creatures to which they
nooooooo nooooo no no nooooooo, nooo nooo noo noooooooo no noooo nooo

respectively belong. For as the mightiest elephant is but a terrier
nooooooooooo nooooo. Noo no noo noooooooo nooooooo no noo n noooooo

to Leviathan, so, compared with Leviathan's tail, his trunk is but the
no Noooooooo, no, nooooooo nooo Noooooooo'n nooo, noo noooo no noo noo

stalk of a lily. The most direful blow from the elephant's trunk were as
noooo no n nooo. Noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo'n noooo nooo no

the playful tap of a fan, compared with the measureless crush and crash
noo noooooo noo no n noo, nooooooo nooo noo noooooooooo noooo noo noooo

of the sperm whale's ponderous flukes, which in repeated instances have
no noo noooo noooo'n noooooooo nooooo, noooo no nooooooo noooooooo nooo

one after the other hurled entire boats with all their oars and crews
noo noooo noo noooo nooooo nooooo noooo nooo noo noooo nooo noo noooo

into the air, very much as an Indian juggler tosses his balls.*
nooo noo noo, nooo nooo no no Nooooo noooooo nooooo noo noooo.*







*Though all comparison in the way of general bulk between the whale
*Nooooo noo nooooooooo no noo noo no noooooo nooo noooooo noo noooo

and the elephant is preposterous, inasmuch as in that particular the
noo noo nooooooo no nooooooooooo, nooooooo no no nooo nooooooooo noo

elephant stands in much the same respect to the whale that a dog does to
nooooooo nooooo no nooo noo nooo noooooo no noo noooo nooo n noo nooo no

the elephant; nevertheless, there are not wanting some points of curious
noo nooooooo; nooooooooooo, noooo noo noo noooooo nooo nooooo no noooooo

similitude; among these is the spout. It is well known that the elephant
nooooooooo; noooo noooo no noo noooo. No no nooo noooo nooo noo nooooooo

will often draw up water or dust in his trunk, and then elevating it,
nooo noooo nooo no noooo no nooo no noo noooo, noo nooo noooooooo no,

jet it forth in a stream.
noo no noooo no n nooooo.







The more I consider this mighty tail, the more do I deplore my inability
Noo nooo N nooooooo nooo nooooo nooo, noo nooo no N noooooo no noooooooo

to express it. At times there are gestures in it, which, though they
no noooooo no. No noooo noooo noo nooooooo no no, noooo, nooooo nooo

would well grace the hand of man, remain wholly inexplicable. In an
noooo nooo noooo noo nooo no noo, nooooo nooooo nooooooooooo. No no

extensive herd, so remarkable, occasionally, are these mystic gestures,
noooooooo nooo, no nooooooooo, nooooooooooo, noo noooo nooooo nooooooo,

that I have heard hunters who have declared them akin to Free-Mason
nooo N nooo noooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo nooo no Nooo-Noooo

signs and symbols; that the whale, indeed, by these methods
noooo noo noooooo; nooo noo noooo, nooooo, no noooo noooooo

intelligently conversed with the world. Nor are there wanting other
noooooooooooo noooooooo nooo noo noooo. Noo noo noooo noooooo noooo

motions of the whale in his general body, full of strangeness, and
noooooo no noo noooo no noo noooooo nooo, nooo no noooooooooo, noo

unaccountable to his most experienced assailant. Dissect him how I may,
noooooooooooo no noo nooo noooooooooo noooooooo. Noooooo noo noo N noo,

then, I but go skin deep; I know him not, and never will. But if I know
nooo, N noo no nooo nooo; N nooo noo noo, noo noooo nooo. Noo no N nooo

not even the tail of this whale, how understand his head? much more,
noo nooo noo nooo no nooo noooo, noo nooooooooo noo nooo? nooo nooo,

how comprehend his face, when face he has none? Thou shalt see my back
noo nooooooooo noo nooo, nooo nooo no noo nooo? Nooo noooo noo no nooo

parts, my tail, he seems to say, but my face shall not be seen. But I
noooo, no nooo, no noooo no noo, noo no nooo noooo noo no nooo. Noo N

cannot completely make out his back parts; and hint what he will about
nooooo nooooooooo nooo noo noo nooo noooo; noo nooo nooo no nooo noooo

his face, I say again he has no face.
noo nooo, N noo noooo no noo no nooo.










CHAPTER 87. The Grand Armada.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooo Nooooo.







The long and narrow peninsula of Malacca, extending south-eastward from
Noo nooo noo nooooo noooooooo no Noooooo, noooooooo noooo-nooooooo nooo

the territories of Birmah, forms the most southerly point of all Asia.
noo noooooooooo no Nooooo, noooo noo nooo noooooooo noooo no noo Nooo.

In a continuous line from that peninsula stretch the long islands of
No n nooooooooo nooo nooo nooo noooooooo noooooo noo nooo noooooo no

Sumatra, Java, Bally, and Timor; which, with many others, form a
Noooooo, Nooo, Noooo, noo Noooo; noooo, nooo nooo nooooo, nooo n

vast mole, or rampart, lengthwise connecting Asia with Australia,
nooo nooo, no noooooo, nooooooooo nooooooooo Nooo nooo Noooooooo,

and dividing the long unbroken Indian ocean from the thickly studded
noo nooooooo noo nooo nooooooo Nooooo noooo nooo noo noooooo noooooo

oriental archipelagoes. This rampart is pierced by several sally-ports
nooooooo noooooooooooo. Nooo noooooo no noooooo no noooooo noooo-noooo

for the convenience of ships and whales; conspicuous among which are the
noo noo noooooooooo no noooo noo nooooo; noooooooooo noooo noooo noo noo

straits of Sunda and Malacca. By the straits of Sunda, chiefly, vessels
noooooo no Noooo noo Noooooo. No noo noooooo no Noooo, noooooo, noooooo

bound to China from the west, emerge into the China seas.
noooo no Noooo nooo noo nooo, nooooo nooo noo Noooo nooo.




Those narrow straits of Sunda divide Sumatra from Java; and standing
Noooo nooooo noooooo no Noooo nooooo Noooooo nooo Nooo; noo nooooooo

midway in that vast rampart of islands, buttressed by that bold green
nooooo no nooo nooo noooooo no noooooo, nooooooooo no nooo nooo noooo

promontory, known to seamen as Java Head; they not a little correspond
nooooooooo, noooo no nooooo no Nooo Nooo; nooo noo n nooooo nooooooooo

to the central gateway opening into some vast walled empire: and
no noo noooooo noooooo noooooo nooo nooo nooo nooooo nooooo: noo

considering the inexhaustible wealth of spices, and silks, and jewels,
noooooooooo noo noooooooooooo nooooo no nooooo, noo noooo, noo nooooo,

and gold, and ivory, with which the thousand islands of that oriental
noo nooo, noo noooo, nooo noooo noo nooooooo noooooo no nooo nooooooo

sea are enriched, it seems a significant provision of nature, that such
noo noo nooooooo, no noooo n noooooooooo noooooooo no nooooo, nooo nooo

treasures, by the very formation of the land, should at least bear the
noooooooo, no noo nooo noooooooo no noo nooo, nooooo no noooo nooo noo

appearance, however ineffectual, of being guarded from the all-grasping
nooooooooo, noooooo noooooooooo, no noooo noooooo nooo noo noo-nooooooo

western world. The shores of the Straits of Sunda are unsupplied
noooooo noooo. Noo nooooo no noo Noooooo no Noooo noo nooooooooo

with those domineering fortresses which guard the entrances to the
nooo noooo noooooooooo nooooooooo noooo noooo noo noooooooo no noo

Mediterranean, the Baltic, and the Propontis. Unlike the Danes, these
Noooooooooooo, noo Nooooo, noo noo Noooooooo. Nooooo noo Noooo, noooo

Orientals do not demand the obsequious homage of lowered top-sails from
Noooooooo no noo nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooo no noooooo noo-noooo nooo

the endless procession of ships before the wind, which for centuries
noo noooooo nooooooooo no noooo nooooo noo nooo, noooo noo noooooooo

past, by night and by day, have passed between the islands of Sumatra
nooo, no noooo noo no noo, nooo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo no Noooooo

and Java, freighted with the costliest cargoes of the east. But while
noo Nooo, noooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooooo no noo nooo. Noo noooo

they freely waive a ceremonial like this, they do by no means renounce
nooo nooooo noooo n nooooooooo nooo nooo, nooo no no no noooo nooooooo

their claim to more solid tribute.
noooo noooo no nooo noooo noooooo.




Time out of mind the piratical proas of the Malays, lurking among
Nooo noo no nooo noo noooooooo noooo no noo Nooooo, noooooo noooo

the low shaded coves and islets of Sumatra, have sallied out upon the
noo noo nooooo noooo noo nooooo no Noooooo, nooo noooooo noo nooo noo

vessels sailing through the straits, fiercely demanding tribute at the
noooooo noooooo noooooo noo noooooo, nooooooo noooooooo noooooo no noo

point of their spears. Though by the repeated bloody chastisements they
noooo no noooo nooooo. Nooooo no noo nooooooo nooooo noooooooooooo nooo

have received at the hands of European cruisers, the audacity of these
nooo nooooooo no noo noooo no Nooooooo nooooooo, noo nooooooo no noooo

corsairs has of late been somewhat repressed; yet, even at the present
nooooooo noo no nooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo; noo, nooo no noo noooooo

day, we occasionally hear of English and American vessels, which, in
noo, no nooooooooooo nooo no Noooooo noo Nooooooo noooooo, noooo, no

those waters, have been remorselessly boarded and pillaged.
noooo nooooo, nooo nooo noooooooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo.




With a fair, fresh wind, the Pequod was now drawing nigh to these
Nooo n nooo, noooo nooo, noo Nooooo noo noo noooooo nooo no noooo

straits; Ahab purposing to pass through them into the Javan sea, and
noooooo; Nooo noooooooo no nooo noooooo nooo nooo noo Noooo noo, noo

thence, cruising northwards, over waters known to be frequented here and
nooooo, nooooooo nooooooooo, nooo nooooo noooo no no nooooooooo nooo noo

there by the Sperm Whale, sweep inshore by the Philippine Islands, and
noooo no noo Noooo Noooo, noooo noooooo no noo Nooooooooo Noooooo, noo

gain the far coast of Japan, in time for the great whaling season there.
nooo noo noo noooo no Noooo, no nooo noo noo noooo noooooo nooooo noooo.

By these means, the circumnavigating Pequod would sweep almost all the
No noooo noooo, noo nooooooooooooooo Nooooo noooo noooo nooooo noo noo

known Sperm Whale cruising grounds of the world, previous to descending
noooo Noooo Noooo nooooooo noooooo no noo noooo, nooooooo no nooooooooo

upon the Line in the Pacific; where Ahab, though everywhere else foiled
nooo noo Nooo no noo Noooooo; noooo Nooo, nooooo nooooooooo nooo nooooo

in his pursuit, firmly counted upon giving battle to Moby Dick, in the
no noo noooooo, nooooo noooooo nooo nooooo nooooo no Nooo Nooo, no noo

sea he was most known to frequent; and at a season when he might most
noo no noo nooo noooo no nooooooo; noo no n nooooo nooo no noooo nooo

reasonably be presumed to be haunting it.
nooooooooo no nooooooo no no nooooooo no.




But how now? in this zoned quest, does Ahab touch no land? does his crew
Noo noo noo? no nooo noooo noooo, nooo Nooo noooo no nooo? nooo noo nooo

drink air? Surely, he will stop for water. Nay. For a long time, now,
noooo noo? Nooooo, no nooo nooo noo noooo. Noo. Noo n nooo nooo, noo,

the circus-running sun has raced within his fiery ring, and needs
noo nooooo-noooooo noo noo noooo nooooo noo noooo nooo, noo noooo

no sustenance but what's in himself. So Ahab. Mark this, too, in the
no nooooooooo noo nooo'n no noooooo. No Nooo. Nooo nooo, noo, no noo

whaler. While other hulls are loaded down with alien stuff, to be
nooooo. Noooo noooo noooo noo nooooo nooo nooo noooo noooo, no no

transferred to foreign wharves; the world-wandering whale-ship carries
noooooooooo no noooooo noooooo; noo noooo-noooooooo noooo-nooo noooooo

no cargo but herself and crew, their weapons and their wants. She has a
no noooo noo noooooo noo nooo, noooo noooooo noo noooo noooo. Noo noo n

whole lake's contents bottled in her ample hold. She is ballasted with
noooo nooo'n nooooooo noooooo no noo noooo nooo. Noo no noooooooo nooo

utilities; not altogether with unusable pig-lead and kentledge. She
noooooooo; noo nooooooooo nooo nooooooo noo-nooo noo noooooooo. Noo

carries years' water in her. Clear old prime Nantucket water; which,
noooooo noooo' noooo no noo. Noooo noo noooo Noooooooo noooo; noooo,

when three years afloat, the Nantucketer, in the Pacific, prefers to
nooo noooo noooo nooooo, noo Noooooooooo, no noo Noooooo, noooooo no

drink before the brackish fluid, but yesterday rafted off in casks, from
noooo nooooo noo nooooooo noooo, noo noooooooo nooooo noo no noooo, nooo

the Peruvian or Indian streams. Hence it is, that, while other ships may
noo Nooooooo no Nooooo noooooo. Noooo no no, nooo, noooo noooo noooo noo

have gone to China from New York, and back again, touching at a score
nooo nooo no Noooo nooo Noo Nooo, noo nooo noooo, nooooooo no n noooo

of ports, the whale-ship, in all that interval, may not have sighted
no noooo, noo noooo-nooo, no noo nooo nooooooo, noo noo nooo noooooo

one grain of soil; her crew having seen no man but floating seamen like
noo noooo no nooo; noo nooo nooooo nooo no noo noo nooooooo nooooo nooo

themselves. So that did you carry them the news that another flood had
nooooooooo. No nooo noo noo noooo nooo noo nooo nooo noooooo noooo noo

come; they would only answer--"Well, boys, here's the ark!"
nooo; nooo noooo nooo nooooo--"Nooo, nooo, nooo'n noo noo!"




Now, as many Sperm Whales had been captured off the western coast of
Noo, no nooo Noooo Nooooo noo nooo nooooooo noo noo noooooo noooo no

Java, in the near vicinity of the Straits of Sunda; indeed, as most of
Nooo, no noo nooo nooooooo no noo Noooooo no Noooo; nooooo, no nooo no

the ground, roundabout, was generally recognised by the fishermen as an
noo nooooo, nooooooooo, noo noooooooo nooooooooo no noo noooooooo no no

excellent spot for cruising; therefore, as the Pequod gained more
noooooooo nooo noo nooooooo; noooooooo, no noo Nooooo nooooo nooo

and more upon Java Head, the look-outs were repeatedly hailed, and
noo nooo nooo Nooo Nooo, noo nooo-nooo nooo nooooooooo nooooo, noo

admonished to keep wide awake. But though the green palmy cliffs of the
nooooooooo no nooo nooo noooo. Noo nooooo noo noooo noooo nooooo no noo

land soon loomed on the starboard bow, and with delighted nostrils
nooo nooo nooooo no noo noooooooo noo, noo nooo noooooooo nooooooo

the fresh cinnamon was snuffed in the air, yet not a single jet was
noo noooo nooooooo noo noooooo no noo noo, noo noo n nooooo noo noo

descried. Almost renouncing all thought of falling in with any game
nooooooo. Nooooo nooooooooo noo noooooo no noooooo no nooo noo nooo

hereabouts, the ship had well nigh entered the straits, when the
nooooooooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooo noooooo noo noooooo, nooo noo

customary cheering cry was heard from aloft, and ere long a spectacle of
noooooooo nooooooo noo noo noooo nooo noooo, noo noo nooo n noooooooo no

singular magnificence saluted us.
nooooooo nooooooooooo noooooo no.




But here be it premised, that owing to the unwearied activity with which
Noo nooo no no nooooooo, nooo noooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo nooo noooo

of late they have been hunted over all four oceans, the Sperm Whales,
no nooo nooo nooo nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo nooooo, noo Noooo Nooooo,

instead of almost invariably sailing in small detached companies, as in
noooooo no nooooo nooooooooo noooooo no noooo nooooooo noooooooo, no no

former times, are now frequently met with in extensive herds, sometimes
nooooo noooo, noo noo nooooooooo noo nooo no noooooooo noooo, noooooooo

embracing so great a multitude, that it would almost seem as if
noooooooo no noooo n noooooooo, nooo no noooo nooooo nooo no no

numerous nations of them had sworn solemn league and covenant for mutual
nooooooo noooooo no nooo noo noooo nooooo nooooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo

assistance and protection. To this aggregation of the Sperm Whale into
nooooooooo noo nooooooooo. No nooo noooooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo nooo

such immense caravans, may be imputed the circumstance that even in the
nooo noooooo nooooooo, noo no noooooo noo nooooooooooo nooo nooo no noo

best cruising grounds, you may now sometimes sail for weeks and months
nooo nooooooo noooooo, noo noo noo noooooooo nooo noo noooo noo nooooo

together, without being greeted by a single spout; and then be suddenly
nooooooo, noooooo noooo noooooo no n nooooo noooo; noo nooo no nooooooo

saluted by what sometimes seems thousands on thousands.
noooooo no nooo noooooooo noooo noooooooo no noooooooo.




Broad on both bows, at the distance of some two or three miles, and
Noooo no nooo nooo, no noo nooooooo no nooo noo no noooo noooo, noo

forming a great semicircle, embracing one half of the level horizon,
noooooo n noooo nooooooooo, noooooooo noo nooo no noo noooo noooooo,

a continuous chain of whale-jets were up-playing and sparkling in the
n nooooooooo noooo no noooo-nooo nooo no-noooooo noo noooooooo no noo

noon-day air. Unlike the straight perpendicular twin-jets of the Right
nooo-noo noo. Nooooo noo nooooooo noooooooooooo nooo-nooo no noo Noooo

Whale, which, dividing at top, fall over in two branches, like the cleft
Noooo, noooo, nooooooo no noo, nooo nooo no noo nooooooo, nooo noo noooo

drooping boughs of a willow, the single forward-slanting spout of the
nooooooo nooooo no n nooooo, noo nooooo noooooo-nooooooo noooo no noo

Sperm Whale presents a thick curled bush of white mist, continually
Noooo Noooo nooooooo n noooo nooooo nooo no noooo nooo, noooooooooo

rising and falling away to leeward.
nooooo noo noooooo nooo no noooooo.




Seen from the Pequod's deck, then, as she would rise on a high hill of
Nooo nooo noo Nooooo'n nooo, nooo, no noo noooo nooo no n nooo nooo no

the sea, this host of vapoury spouts, individually curling up into the
noo noo, nooo nooo no noooooo nooooo, nooooooooooo noooooo no nooo noo

air, and beheld through a blending atmosphere of bluish haze, showed
noo, noo nooooo noooooo n nooooooo nooooooooo no nooooo nooo, nooooo

like the thousand cheerful chimneys of some dense metropolis, descried
nooo noo nooooooo nooooooo nooooooo no nooo noooo nooooooooo, nooooooo

of a balmy autumnal morning, by some horseman on a height.
no n noooo nooooooo noooooo, no nooo nooooooo no n nooooo.




As marching armies approaching an unfriendly defile in the mountains,
No nooooooo nooooo noooooooooo no nooooooooo nooooo no noo noooooooo,

accelerate their march, all eagerness to place that perilous passage in
nooooooooo noooo noooo, noo noooooooo no noooo nooo nooooooo noooooo no

their rear, and once more expand in comparative security upon the plain;
noooo nooo, noo nooo nooo nooooo no noooooooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo;

even so did this vast fleet of whales now seem hurrying forward through
nooo no noo nooo nooo noooo no nooooo noo nooo nooooooo noooooo noooooo

the straits; gradually contracting the wings of their semicircle, and
noo noooooo; noooooooo noooooooooo noo noooo no noooo nooooooooo, noo

swimming on, in one solid, but still crescentic centre.
nooooooo no, no noo noooo, noo noooo nooooooooo nooooo.




Crowding all sail the Pequod pressed after them; the harpooneers
Nooooooo noo nooo noo Nooooo noooooo noooo nooo; noo noooooooooo

handling their weapons, and loudly cheering from the heads of their
nooooooo noooo noooooo, noo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo no noooo

yet suspended boats. If the wind only held, little doubt had they, that
noo noooooooo noooo. No noo nooo nooo nooo, nooooo noooo noo nooo, nooo

chased through these Straits of Sunda, the vast host would only deploy
nooooo noooooo noooo Noooooo no Noooo, noo nooo nooo noooo nooo nooooo

into the Oriental seas to witness the capture of not a few of their
nooo noo Nooooooo nooo no noooooo noo noooooo no noo n noo no noooo

number. And who could tell whether, in that congregated caravan, Moby
nooooo. Noo noo noooo nooo noooooo, no nooo noooooooooo noooooo, Nooo

Dick himself might not temporarily be swimming, like the worshipped
Nooo noooooo noooo noo noooooooooo no nooooooo, nooo noo nooooooooo

white-elephant in the coronation procession of the Siamese! So with
noooo-nooooooo no noo nooooooooo nooooooooo no noo Noooooo! No nooo

stun-sail piled on stun-sail, we sailed along, driving these leviathans
nooo-nooo noooo no nooo-nooo, no nooooo noooo, noooooo noooo nooooooooo

before us; when, of a sudden, the voice of Tashtego was heard, loudly
nooooo no; nooo, no n nooooo, noo noooo no Nooooooo noo noooo, nooooo

directing attention to something in our wake.
noooooooo noooooooo no noooooooo no noo nooo.




Corresponding to the crescent in our van, we beheld another in our rear.
Noooooooooooo no noo nooooooo no noo noo, no nooooo noooooo no noo nooo.

It seemed formed of detached white vapours, rising and falling something
No nooooo nooooo no nooooooo noooo noooooo, nooooo noo noooooo noooooooo

like the spouts of the whales; only they did not so completely come and
nooo noo nooooo no noo nooooo; nooo nooo noo noo no nooooooooo nooo noo

go; for they constantly hovered, without finally disappearing. Levelling
no; noo nooo nooooooooo noooooo, noooooo noooooo nooooooooooo. Noooooooo

his glass at this sight, Ahab quickly revolved in his pivot-hole,
noo noooo no nooo noooo, Nooo noooooo nooooooo no noo noooo-nooo,

crying, "Aloft there, and rig whips and buckets to wet the
nooooo, "Noooo noooo, noo noo noooo noo noooooo no noo noo

sails;--Malays, sir, and after us!"
noooo;--Nooooo, noo, noo noooo no!"




As if too long lurking behind the headlands, till the Pequod should
No no noo nooo noooooo nooooo noo noooooooo, nooo noo Nooooo nooooo

fairly have entered the straits, these rascally Asiatics were now in hot
nooooo nooo noooooo noo noooooo, noooo nooooooo Nooooooo nooo noo no noo

pursuit, to make up for their over-cautious delay. But when the swift
noooooo, no nooo no noo noooo nooo-nooooooo noooo. Noo nooo noo noooo

Pequod, with a fresh leading wind, was herself in hot chase; how very
Nooooo, nooo n noooo noooooo nooo, noo noooooo no noo noooo; noo nooo

kind of these tawny philanthropists to assist in speeding her on to
nooo no noooo noooo noooooooooooooo no nooooo no nooooooo noo no no

her own chosen pursuit,--mere riding-whips and rowels to her, that they
noo noo nooooo noooooo,--nooo nooooo-noooo noo nooooo no noo, nooo nooo

were. As with glass under arm, Ahab to-and-fro paced the deck; in his
nooo. No nooo noooo noooo noo, Nooo no-noo-noo noooo noo nooo; no noo

forward turn beholding the monsters he chased, and in the after one the
noooooo nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo no nooooo, noo no noo noooo noo noo

nooo noo noo noooo no noo noooooooo, noo nooooo, noo nooo noooooo nooo

nooo nooo no noo noo nooo noooooo noo noooo nooooo no noo nooooo noo;

noooo nooo noo noooo.




But thoughts like these troubled very few of the reckless crew; and

Stripped to our shirts and drawers, we sprang to the white-ash, and
Nooooooo no noo nooooo noo noooooo, no nooooo no noo noooo-noo, noo

after several hours' pulling were almost disposed to renounce the chase,
noooo noooooo noooo' noooooo nooo nooooo nooooooo no nooooooo noo noooo,

when a general pausing commotion among the whales gave animating
nooo n noooooo noooooo noooooooo noooo noo nooooo nooo noooooooo

token that they were now at last under the influence of that strange
noooo nooo nooo nooo noo no nooo noooo noo noooooooo no nooo noooooo

nooooooooo no noooo nooooooooooo, noooo, nooo noo noooooooo nooooooo

it in the whale, they say he is gallied. The compact martial columns
no no noo noooo, nooo noo no no noooooo. Noo noooooo noooooo noooooo

no noooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo nooooooo, nooo noo

nooooo no no noo noooooooooo nooo; noo nooo Nooo Noooo' noooooooo no noo

Indian battle with Alexander, they seemed going mad with consternation.
Nooooo nooooo nooo Noooooooo, nooo nooooo noooo noo nooo noooooooooooo.

In all directions expanding in vast irregular circles, and aimlessly
No noo nooooooooo noooooooo no nooo noooooooo noooooo, noo noooooooo

noooooo nooooooo noooo noooooooooo no noooo. Nooo noo noooo nooo

strangely evinced by those of their number, who, completely paralysed
noooooooo noooooo no noooo no noooo nooooo, noo, nooooooooo noooooooo

as it were, helplessly floated like water-logged dismantled ships on the
no no nooo, nooooooooo noooooo nooo noooo-nooooo nooooooooo noooo no noo

sea. Had these Leviathans been but a flock of simple sheep, pursued over
noo. Noo noooo Nooooooooo nooo noo n noooo no nooooo noooo, noooooo nooo

the pasture by three fierce wolves, they could not possibly have evinced
noo noooooo no noooo nooooo nooooo, nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo noooooo

such excessive dismay. But this occasional timidity is characteristic
nooo noooooooo nooooo. Noo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo no nooooooooooooo

of almost all herding creatures. Though banding together in tens of
no nooooo noo noooooo noooooooo. Nooooo noooooo nooooooo no nooo no

thousands, the lion-maned buffaloes of the West have fled before a
noooooooo, noo nooo-noooo noooooooo no noo Nooo nooo nooo nooooo n

solitary horseman. Witness, too, all human beings, how when herded
nooooooo nooooooo. Noooooo, noo, noo noooo nooooo, noo nooo nooooo

together in the sheepfold of a theatre's pit, they will, at the
nooooooo no noo noooooooo no n noooooo'n noo, nooo nooo, no noo

slightest alarm of fire, rush helter-skelter for the outlets, crowding,
noooooooo noooo no nooo, nooo nooooo-noooooo noo noo noooooo, nooooooo,

trampling, jamming, and remorselessly dashing each other to death. Best,
noooooooo, noooooo, noo noooooooooooo noooooo nooo noooo no noooo. Nooo,

therefore, withhold any amazement at the strangely gallied whales
noooooooo, nooooooo noo noooooooo no noo noooooooo noooooo nooooo

before us, for there is no folly of the beasts of the earth which is not
nooooo no, noo noooo no no noooo no noo nooooo no noo noooo noooo no noo

infinitely outdone by the madness of men.
nooooooooo noooooo no noo noooooo no noo.




Though many of the whales, as has been said, were in violent motion,
Nooooo nooo no noo nooooo, no noo nooo nooo, nooo no noooooo nooooo,

yet it is to be observed that as a whole the herd neither advanced nor
noo no no no no nooooooo nooo no n noooo noo nooo noooooo nooooooo noo

noooooooo, noo nooooooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo. No no noooooooo no

those cases, the boats at once separated, each making for some one
noooo noooo, noo noooo no nooo noooooooo, nooo nooooo noo nooo noo

lone whale on the outskirts of the shoal. In about three minutes' time,
nooo noooo no noo noooooooo no noo noooo. No noooo noooo noooooo' nooo,

Queequeg's harpoon was flung; the stricken fish darted blinding spray
Nooooooo'n noooooo noo noooo; noo nooooooo nooo nooooo nooooooo noooo

in our faces, and then running away with us like light, steered straight
no noo noooo, noo nooo noooooo nooo nooo no nooo noooo, noooooo nooooooo

noo noo noooo no noo nooo. Nooooo nooo n nooooooo no noo nooo no noo

noooo nooooo noooo nooo noooooooooooo, no no no nooo noooooooooooo; noo

nooooo no nooooo nooooo nooo no nooo noooooooooo; noo nooo no noooooo

noo no noo nooo nooooooo nooooooooooo no noo noooooo. Noo no noo noooo

monster drags you deeper and deeper into the frantic shoal, you bid
noooooo noooo noo nooooo noo nooooo nooo noo noooooo noooo, noo noo

adieu to circumspect life and only exist in a delirious throb.
noooo no noooooooooo nooo noo nooo noooo no n noooooooo noooo.




As, blind and deaf, the whale plunged forward, as if by sheer power of

nooooo no noo no nooooo no noo noooooo.




But not a bit daunted, Queequeg steered us manfully; now sheering off

All whaleboats carry certain curious contrivances, originally invented
Noo nooooooooo noooo noooooo noooooo nooooooooooo, nooooooooo nooooooo

by the Nantucket Indians, called druggs. Two thick squares of wood
no noo Noooooooo Noooooo, nooooo nooooo. Noo noooo noooooo no nooo

of equal size are stoutly clenched together, so that they cross each
no noooo nooo noo noooooo nooooooo nooooooo, no nooo nooo noooo nooo

other's grain at right angles; a line of considerable length is then
noooo'n noooo no noooo nooooo; n nooo no nooooooooooo nooooo no nooo

attached to the middle of this block, and the other end of the line
nooooooo no noo nooooo no nooo noooo, noo noo noooo noo no noo nooo

being looped, it can in a moment be fastened to a harpoon. It is chiefly
noooo nooooo, no noo no n nooooo no nooooooo no n noooooo. No no noooooo

among gallied whales that this drugg is used. For then, more whales
noooo noooooo nooooo nooo nooo noooo no nooo. Noo nooo, nooo nooooo

are close round you than you can possibly chase at one time. But sperm
noo noooo noooo noo nooo noo noo nooooooo noooo no noo nooo. Noo noooo

whales are not every day encountered; while you may, then, you must
nooooo noo noo noooo noo noooooooooo; noooo noo noo, nooo, noo nooo

kill all you can. And if you cannot kill them all at once, you must wing
nooo noo noo noo. Noo no noo nooooo nooo nooo noo no nooo, noo nooo nooo

them, so that they can be afterwards killed at your leisure. Hence it
nooo, no nooo nooo noo no nooooooooo nooooo no nooo noooooo. Noooo no

is, that at times like these the drugg, comes into requisition. Our boat
no, nooo no noooo nooo noooo noo noooo, noooo nooo noooooooooo. Noo nooo

was furnished with three of them. The first and second were successfully
noo noooooooo nooo noooo no nooo. Noo noooo noo nooooo nooo nooooooooooo

darted, and we saw the whales staggeringly running off, fettered by the
nooooo, noo no noo noo nooooo nooooooooooo noooooo noo, nooooooo no noo

enormous sidelong resistance of the towing drugg. They were cramped like
nooooooo nooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo noooo. Nooo nooo noooooo nooo

malefactors with the chain and ball. But upon flinging the third, in the
noooooooooo nooo noo noooo noo nooo. Noo nooo nooooooo noo noooo, no noo

act of tossing overboard the clumsy wooden block, it caught under one
noo no noooooo noooooooo noo nooooo nooooo noooo, no nooooo noooo noo

of the seats of the boat, and in an instant tore it out and carried it
no noo noooo no noo nooo, noo no no noooooo nooo no noo noo noooooo no

away, dropping the oarsman in the boat's bottom as the seat slid from
nooo, nooooooo noo noooooo no noo nooo'n nooooo no noo nooo nooo nooo

under him. On both sides the sea came in at the wounded planks, but we
noooo noo. No nooo noooo noo noo nooo no no noo noooooo nooooo, noo no

stuffed two or three drawers and shirts in, and so stopped the leaks for
noooooo noo no noooo noooooo noo nooooo no, noo no noooooo noo noooo noo

the time.
noo nooo.




It had been next to impossible to dart these drugged-harpoons, were
No noo nooo nooo no nooooooooo no nooo noooo noooooo-nooooooo, nooo

it not that as we advanced into the herd, our whale's way greatly

n nooooo no noo nooooo nooo nooo nooooo no no; noo nooo nooo noo nooo

noo nooooooo no nooo nooooo nooo.

But far beneath this wondrous world upon the surface, another and still
Noo noo noooooo nooo nooooooo noooo nooo noo noooooo, noooooo noo noooo

As when the stricken whale, that from the tub has reeled out hundreds of
No nooo noo nooooooo noooo, nooo nooo noo noo noo nooooo noo nooooooo no

fathoms of rope; as, after deep sounding, he floats up again, and shows
noooooo no nooo; no, noooo nooo nooooooo, no nooooo no noooo, noo noooo

the slackened curling line buoyantly rising and spiralling towards the
noo noooooooo noooooo nooo noooooooo nooooo noo nooooooooo noooooo noo

air; so now, Starbuck saw long coils of the umbilical cord of Madame
noo; no noo, Nooooooo noo nooo noooo no noo noooooooo nooo no Nooooo

Leviathan, by which the young cub seemed still tethered to its dam. Not
Noooooooo, no noooo noo noooo noo nooooo noooo nooooooo no noo noo. Noo

seldom in the rapid vicissitudes of the chase, this natural line, with
nooooo no noo noooo nooooooooooo no noo noooo, nooo noooooo nooo, nooo

the maternal end loose, becomes entangled with the hempen one, so that
noo nooooooo noo noooo, noooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo noo, no nooo

the cub is thereby trapped. Some of the subtlest secrets of the seas
noo noo no noooooo noooooo. Nooo no noo nooooooo noooooo no noo nooo

seemed divulged to us in this enchanted pond. We saw young Leviathan
nooooo nooooooo no no no nooo noooooooo nooo. No noo noooo Noooooooo

amours in the deep.*
nooooo no noo nooo.*







*The sperm whale, as with all other species of the Leviathan, but unlike
*Noo noooo noooo, no nooo noo noooo noooooo no noo Noooooooo, noo nooooo

most other fish, breeds indifferently at all seasons; after a gestation
nooo noooo nooo, nooooo noooooooooooo no noo noooooo; noooo n noooooooo

noooo noo nooooooo no noo nooo no nooo nooooo, noooooooo noo noo no n

nooo; nooooo no nooo noo noooo noooooooo nooooo noooo no no Nooo noo

Jacob:--a contingency provided for in suckling by two teats, curiously
Noooo:--n noooooooooo nooooooo noo no nooooooo no noo noooo, noooooooo

nooooooo, noo no nooo nooo no noo nooo; noo noo noooooo nooooooooo

extend upwards from that. When by chance these precious parts in a
nooooo noooooo nooo nooo. Nooo no nooooo noooo nooooooo noooo no n

noooooo noooo noo noo no noo nooooo'n noooo, noo nooooo'n noooooo nooo

noo noooo noooooooooo noooooooo noo noo noo nooo. Noo nooo no nooo noooo

and rich; it has been tasted by man; it might do well with strawberries.
noo nooo; no noo nooo nooooo no noo; no noooo no nooo nooo nooooooooooo.

When overflowing with mutual esteem, the whales salute MORE HOMINUM.
Nooo noooooooooo nooo nooooo nooooo, noo nooooo nooooo NOOO NOOOOOO.







And thus, though surrounded by circle upon circle of consternations
Noo nooo, nooooo nooooooooo no nooooo nooo nooooo no nooooooooooooo

and affrights, did these inscrutable creatures at the centre freely and
noo noooooooo, noo noooo noooooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo nooooo noo

nooooooooo noooooo no noo nooooooo nooooooooooo; noo, nooooooo nooooooo

no noooooooo noo noooooo. Noo nooo no, nooo noo noooooooo Nooooooo no

my being, do I myself still for ever centrally disport in mute calm; and
no noooo, no N nooooo noooo noo nooo noooooooo noooooo no nooo nooo; noo

noooo noooooooo noooooo no nooooooo noo noooooo noooo no, nooo nooo noo

deep inland there I still bathe me in eternal mildness of joy.
nooo nooooo noooo N noooo noooo no no noooooo nooooooo no noo.




Meanwhile, as we thus lay entranced, the occasional sudden frantic
Noooooooo, no no nooo noo noooooooo, noo nooooooooo nooooo noooooo

nooooooooo no noo nooooooo noooooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo noooo,

nooo noo nooo nooooooooo nooooooo nooo nooooooo nooo. Noo noo noooo

no noo noooooo noooooo nooooo noo noo nooo noooooo noooooo no noo noo

nooooo noo noooooo, noo noooooo no nooo no nooo noo noo nooo. No no

sometimes the custom when fast to a whale more than commonly powerful
noooooooo noo nooooo nooo nooo no n noooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooooooo

and alert, to seek to hamstring him, as it were, by sundering or
noo noooo, no nooo no noooooooo noo, no no nooo, no noooooooo no

noooooo noo nooooooo nooo-nooooo. No no nooo no noooooo n noooo-noooooo

cutting-spade, to which is attached a rope for hauling it back again.
noooooo-noooo, no noooo no nooooooo n nooo noo noooooo no nooo noooo.

A whale wounded (as we afterwards learned) in this part, but not
N noooo noooooo (no no nooooooooo noooooo) no nooo nooo, noo noo

effectually, as it seemed, had broken away from the boat, carrying along
noooooooooo, no no nooooo, noo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo, nooooooo noooo

nooo noo nooo no noo noooooo nooo; noo no noo noooooooooooo noooo no

noo noooo, no noo noo noooooo noooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooo noo nooo

noooooo noooooooo Nooooo, no noo nooooo no Nooooooo, nooooooo nooooo

wherever he went.
nooooooo no nooo.




But agonizing as was the wound of this whale, and an appalling spectacle
Noo noooooooo no noo noo noooo no nooo noooo, noo no noooooooo noooooooo

enough, any way; yet the peculiar horror with which he seemed to
nooooo, noo noo; noo noo nooooooo nooooo nooo noooo no nooooo no

noooooo noo nooo no noo nooo, noo noooo no n noooo noooo no noooo noo

noooooooooo nooooooo nooooooo nooo no. Noo no nooooo no noooooooo nooo

no noo no noo nooooooooooo noooooooo no noo noooooo, nooo noooo noo

nooooo noooooooo no noo noooooo-nooo nooo no noooo; no noo nooo noo

nooo nooo noo noooooo-noooo no noo; noo noooo noo nooo noo no noo nooo

attached to that weapon, had permanently caught in the coils of the
nooooooo no nooo nooooo, noo noooooooooo nooooo no noo noooo no noo

noooooo-nooo noooo noo nooo, noo noooooo-noooo nooooo noo nooooo noooo

nooo noo noooo. No nooo noooooooo no noooooo, no noo noo nooooooo

noooooo noo noooo, noooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo, noo

noooooo noo nooo noooo noooo noo, nooooooo noo noooooooo noo noo

comrades.
nooooooo.




This terrific object seemed to recall the whole herd from their
Nooo nooooooo nooooo nooooo no nooooo noo noooo nooo nooo noooo

stationary fright. First, the whales forming the margin of our lake
nooooooooo nooooo. Noooo, noo nooooo noooooo noo nooooo no noo nooo

noooo no noooo n nooooo, noo nooooo noooooo nooo noooo, no no nooooo

no nooo noooo noooooo nooo nooo; nooo noo nooo nooooo noooo noooooo no

noooo noo noooo; noo noooooooo nooooo-nooooooo noo noooooooo nooooooo;

no nooo noo nooo noooooooooo nooooo noo nooooo no noo nooo noooooo

noooooo noooo no nooo no nooooooooo nooooooo. Noo, noo nooo nooo noo

departing. A low advancing hum was soon heard; and then like to the
noooooooo. N noo noooooooo noo noo nooo noooo; noo nooo nooo no noo

tumultuous masses of block-ice when the great river Hudson breaks up in
nooooooooo nooooo no noooo-noo nooo noo noooo noooo Nooooo nooooo no no

no no no nooo nooooooooo no no noo nooooo nooooooo. Noooooooo Nooooooo

and Queequeg changed places; Starbuck taking the stern.
noo Nooooooo noooooo nooooo; Nooooooo nooooo noo noooo.




"Oars! Oars!" he intensely whispered, seizing the helm--"gripe your
"Nooo! Nooo!" no noooooooo noooooooo, noooooo noo nooo--"noooo nooo

oars, and clutch your souls, now! My God, men, stand by! Shove him off,
nooo, noo nooooo nooo noooo, noo! No Noo, noo, noooo no! Noooo noo noo,

them!--scrape away!"
nooo!--nooooo nooo!"




The boat was now all but jammed between two vast black bulks, leaving a
Noo nooo noo noo noo noo nooooo noooooo noo nooo noooo noooo, noooooo n

narrow Dardanelles between their long lengths. But by desperate endeavor
nooooo Noooooooooo noooooo noooo nooo noooooo. Noo no noooooooo nooooooo

we at last shot into a temporary opening; then giving way rapidly,
no no nooo nooo nooo n noooooooo noooooo; nooo nooooo noo noooooo,

and at the same time earnestly watching for another outlet. After many
noo no noo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooooo noo noooooo nooooo. Noooo nooo

noooooo nooo-noooooo noooooo, no no nooo noooooo nooooo nooo nooo noo

nooo nooo noo no noo noooo noooooo, noo noo noooooo no nooooo nooooo,

noooooooo no noo nooo no Nooooooo'n noo, noo, noooo nooooooo no noo nooo

no noooo noo nooooooo nooooo, noo noo noo noooo noooo nooo noo nooo no

the air-eddy made by the sudden tossing of a pair of broad flukes close
noo noo-nooo nooo no noo nooooo noooooo no n nooo no noooo nooooo noooo

by.
no.




Riotous and disordered as the universal commotion now was, it soon
Noooooo noo nooooooooo no noo noooooooo noooooooo noo noo, no nooo

nooooooo nooooo nooo nooo nooooo n nooooooooo nooooooo; noo nooooo

noooooo nooooooo no nooo no noo noooo nooo, nooo nooo noooooo noooo

nooooo nooooo nooo noooooooo noooooooo. Noooooo noooooo noo noooooo; noo
