noo noooo noooo nooooooo no noooo nooo no nooo no nooo noooooo nooooo

might be dropped astern, and likewise to secure one which Flask had
noooo no noooooo nooooo, noo nooooooo no nooooo noo noooo Noooo noo

killed and waifed. The waif is a pennoned pole, two or three of which
nooooo noo nooooo. Noo nooo no n nooooooo nooo, noo no noooo no noooo

are carried by every boat; and which, when additional game is at hand,
noo noooooo no noooo nooo; noo noooo, nooo nooooooooo nooo no no nooo,

are inserted upright into the floating body of a dead whale, both to
noo nooooooo noooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo no n nooo noooo, nooo no

mark its place on the sea, and also as token of prior possession, should
nooo noo noooo no noo noo, noo nooo no noooo no noooo nooooooooo, nooooo

the boats of any other ship draw near.
noo noooo no noo noooo nooo nooo nooo.




The result of this lowering was somewhat illustrative of that sagacious
Noo nooooo no nooo nooooooo noo nooooooo nooooooooooo no nooo noooooooo

saying in the Fishery,--the more whales the less fish. Of all the
nooooo no noo Noooooo,--noo nooo nooooo noo nooo nooo. No noo noo

noooooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooooooo. Noo nooo noooooooo no nooooo noo

noo nooo, noo nooo no no noooo, no nooo noooooooo no nooo, no nooo noooo

craft than the Pequod.
noooo nooo noo Nooooo.










CHAPTER 88. Schools and Schoolmasters.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooo noo Noooooooooooo.







The previous chapter gave account of an immense body or herd of Sperm
Noo nooooooo noooooo nooo noooooo no no noooooo nooo no nooo no Noooo

Whales, and there was also then given the probable cause inducing those
Nooooo, noo noooo noo nooo nooo noooo noo nooooooo noooo nooooooo noooo

vast aggregations.
nooo nooooooooooo.




Now, though such great bodies are at times encountered, yet, as must
Noo, nooooo nooo noooo nooooo noo no noooo noooooooooo, noo, no nooo

have been seen, even at the present day, small detached bands are
nooo nooo nooo, nooo no noo noooooo noo, noooo nooooooo noooo noo

occasionally observed, embracing from twenty to fifty individuals each.
nooooooooooo nooooooo, noooooooo nooo nooooo no noooo noooooooooo nooo.

Such bands are known as schools. They generally are of two sorts; those
Nooo noooo noo noooo no noooooo. Nooo noooooooo noo no noo noooo; noooo

composed almost entirely of females, and those mustering none but young
nooooooo nooooo nooooooo no noooooo, noo noooo noooooooo nooo noo noooo

vigorous males, or bulls, as they are familiarly designated.
nooooooo noooo, no noooo, no nooo noo nooooooooo nooooooooo.




In cavalier attendance upon the school of females, you invariably see a
No nooooooo nooooooooo nooo noo nooooo no noooooo, noo nooooooooo noo n

male of full grown magnitude, but not old; who, upon any alarm, evinces
nooo no nooo noooo noooooooo, noo noo noo; noo, nooo noo noooo, noooooo

his gallantry by falling in the rear and covering the flight of his
noo noooooooo no noooooo no noo nooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo no noo

ladies. In truth, this gentleman is a luxurious Ottoman, swimming about
nooooo. No noooo, nooo noooooooo no n noooooooo Noooooo, nooooooo noooo

over the watery world, surroundingly accompanied by all the solaces
nooo noo nooooo noooo, noooooooooooo noooooooooo no noo noo noooooo

and endearments of the harem. The contrast between this Ottoman and
noo noooooooooo no noo noooo. Noo nooooooo noooooo nooo Noooooo noo

his concubines is striking; because, while he is always of the largest
noo nooooooooo no nooooooo; noooooo, noooo no no nooooo no noo noooooo

leviathanic proportions, the ladies, even at full growth, are not
noooooooooo noooooooooo, noo nooooo, nooo no nooo nooooo, noo noo

more than one-third of the bulk of an average-sized male. They are
nooo nooo noo-noooo no noo nooo no no noooooo-noooo nooo. Nooo noo

comparatively delicate, indeed; I dare say, not to exceed half a dozen
noooooooooooo nooooooo, nooooo; N nooo noo, noo no nooooo nooo n noooo

yards round the waist. Nevertheless, it cannot be denied, that upon the
noooo noooo noo noooo. Nooooooooooo, no nooooo no nooooo, nooo nooo noo

whole they are hereditarily entitled to EMBONPOINT.
noooo nooo noo nooooooooooo nooooooo no NOOOOOOOOO.




It is very curious to watch this harem and its lord in their indolent
No no nooo noooooo no noooo nooo noooo noo noo nooo no noooo nooooooo

ramblings. Like fashionables, they are for ever on the move in leisurely
noooooooo. Nooo nooooooooooo, nooo noo noo nooo no noo nooo no noooooooo

search of variety. You meet them on the Line in time for the full flower
nooooo no noooooo. Noo nooo nooo no noo Nooo no nooo noo noo nooo nooooo

of the Equatorial feeding season, having just returned, perhaps, from
no noo Nooooooooo noooooo nooooo, nooooo nooo nooooooo, noooooo, nooo

spending the summer in the Northern seas, and so cheating summer of all
nooooooo noo nooooo no noo Nooooooo nooo, noo no nooooooo nooooo no noo

unpleasant weariness and warmth. By the time they have lounged up and
nooooooooo noooooooo noo nooooo. No noo nooo nooo nooo noooooo no noo

down the promenade of the Equator awhile, they start for the Oriental
nooo noo noooooooo no noo Noooooo nooooo, nooo noooo noo noo Nooooooo

waters in anticipation of the cool season there, and so evade the other
nooooo no nooooooooooo no noo nooo nooooo noooo, noo no noooo noo noooo

excessive temperature of the year.
noooooooo noooooooooo no noo nooo.




When serenely advancing on one of these journeys, if any strange
Nooo nooooooo noooooooo no noo no noooo nooooooo, no noo noooooo

suspicious sights are seen, my lord whale keeps a wary eye on his
nooooooooo nooooo noo nooo, no nooo noooo noooo n nooo noo no noo

interesting family. Should any unwarrantably pert young Leviathan coming
noooooooooo nooooo. Nooooo noo noooooooooooo nooo noooo Noooooooo nooooo

that way, presume to draw confidentially close to one of the ladies,
nooo noo, noooooo no nooo nooooooooooooo noooo no noo no noo nooooo,

with what prodigious fury the Bashaw assails him, and chases him away!
nooo nooo nooooooooo nooo noo Nooooo noooooo noo, noo nooooo noo nooo!

High times, indeed, if unprincipled young rakes like him are to be
Nooo noooo, nooooo, no nooooooooooo noooo noooo nooo noo noo no no

permitted to invade the sanctity of domestic bliss; though do what the
noooooooo no nooooo noo nooooooo no nooooooo noooo; nooooo no nooo noo

Bashaw will, he cannot keep the most notorious Lothario out of his bed;
Nooooo nooo, no nooooo nooo noo nooo noooooooo Nooooooo noo no noo noo;

for, alas! all fish bed in common. As ashore, the ladies often cause the
noo, nooo! noo nooo noo no nooooo. No nooooo, noo nooooo noooo noooo noo

most terrible duels among their rival admirers; just so with the whales,
nooo nooooooo noooo noooo noooo noooo nooooooo; nooo no nooo noo nooooo,

who sometimes come to deadly battle, and all for love. They fence with
noo noooooooo nooo no nooooo nooooo, noo noo noo nooo. Nooo noooo nooo

their long lower jaws, sometimes locking them together, and so striving
noooo nooo noooo nooo, noooooooo noooooo nooo nooooooo, noo no nooooooo

for the supremacy like elks that warringly interweave their antlers. Not
noo noo noooooooo nooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooo noooo noooooo. Noo

a few are captured having the deep scars of these encounters,--furrowed
n noo noo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo noooo no noooo nooooooooo,--nooooooo

heads, broken teeth, scolloped fins; and in some instances, wrenched and
noooo, nooooo noooo, noooooooo nooo; noo no nooo noooooooo, nooooooo noo

dislocated mouths.
nooooooooo nooooo.




But supposing the invader of domestic bliss to betake himself away at
Noo noooooooo noo noooooo no nooooooo noooo no nooooo noooooo nooo no

the first rush of the harem's lord, then is it very diverting to watch
noo noooo nooo no noo noooo'n nooo, nooo no no nooo noooooooo no noooo

that lord. Gently he insinuates his vast bulk among them again and
nooo nooo. Nooooo no nooooooooo noo nooo nooo noooo nooo noooo noo

revels there awhile, still in tantalizing vicinity to young Lothario,
nooooo noooo nooooo, noooo no noooooooooo nooooooo no noooo Nooooooo,

like pious Solomon devoutly worshipping among his thousand concubines.
nooo noooo Noooooo nooooooo noooooooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo.

Granting other whales to be in sight, the fishermen will seldom give
Nooooooo noooo nooooo no no no noooo, noo noooooooo nooo nooooo nooo

chase to one of these Grand Turks; for these Grand Turks are too lavish
noooo no noo no noooo Noooo Noooo; noo noooo Noooo Noooo noo noo nooooo

of their strength, and hence their unctuousness is small. As for the
no noooo nooooooo, noo noooo noooo nooooooooooo no noooo. No noo noo

sons and the daughters they beget, why, those sons and daughters must
nooo noo noo noooooooo nooo noooo, noo, noooo nooo noo noooooooo nooo

take care of themselves; at least, with only the maternal help. For
nooo nooo no nooooooooo; no noooo, nooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo. Noo

like certain other omnivorous roving lovers that might be named, my Lord
nooo noooooo noooo nooooooooo nooooo nooooo nooo noooo no noooo, no Nooo

Whale has no taste for the nursery, however much for the bower; and so,
Noooo noo no noooo noo noo noooooo, noooooo nooo noo noo noooo; noo no,

being a great traveller, he leaves his anonymous babies all over the
noooo n noooo noooooooo, no nooooo noo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo noo

world; every baby an exotic. In good time, nevertheless, as the ardour
noooo; noooo nooo no nooooo. No nooo nooo, nooooooooooo, no noo nooooo

of youth declines; as years and dumps increase; as reflection lends
no noooo nooooooo; no noooo noo noooo nooooooo; no nooooooooo noooo

her solemn pauses; in short, as a general lassitude overtakes the sated
noo nooooo nooooo; no noooo, no n noooooo noooooooo noooooooo noo noooo

Turk; then a love of ease and virtue supplants the love for maidens; our
Nooo; nooo n nooo no nooo noo nooooo noooooooo noo nooo noo noooooo; noo

Ottoman enters upon the impotent, repentant, admonitory stage of life,
Noooooo nooooo nooo noo nooooooo, noooooooo, nooooooooo noooo no nooo,

forswears, disbands the harem, and grown to an exemplary, sulky old
noooooooo, nooooooo noo noooo, noo noooo no no noooooooo, noooo noo

soul, goes about all alone among the meridians and parallels saying his
nooo, nooo noooo noo noooo noooo noo noooooooo noo noooooooo nooooo noo

prayers, and warning each young Leviathan from his amorous errors.
noooooo, noo noooooo nooo noooo Noooooooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo.




Now, as the harem of whales is called by the fishermen a school, so
Noo, no noo noooo no nooooo no nooooo no noo noooooooo n nooooo, no

is the lord and master of that school technically known as the
no noo nooo noo nooooo no nooo nooooo noooooooooo noooo no noo

schoolmaster. It is therefore not in strict character, however admirably
nooooooooooo. No no noooooooo noo no nooooo noooooooo, noooooo noooooooo

satirical, that after going to school himself, he should then go abroad
noooooooo, nooo noooo noooo no nooooo noooooo, no nooooo nooo no nooooo

inculcating not what he learned there, but the folly of it. His title,
noooooooooo noo nooo no noooooo noooo, noo noo noooo no no. Noo noooo,

schoolmaster, would very naturally seem derived from the name bestowed
nooooooooooo, noooo nooo noooooooo nooo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo

upon the harem itself, but some have surmised that the man who first
nooo noo noooo nooooo, noo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo noo noo noooo

thus entitled this sort of Ottoman whale, must have read the memoirs of
nooo nooooooo nooo nooo no Noooooo noooo, nooo nooo nooo noo noooooo no

Vidocq, and informed himself what sort of a country-schoolmaster that
Nooooo, noo nooooooo noooooo nooo nooo no n noooooo-nooooooooooo nooo

famous Frenchman was in his younger days, and what was the nature of
nooooo Noooooooo noo no noo noooooo nooo, noo nooo noo noo nooooo no

those occult lessons he inculcated into some of his pupils.
noooo nooooo noooooo no nooooooooo nooo nooo no noo nooooo.




The same secludedness and isolation to which the schoolmaster whale
Noo nooo nooooooooooo noo noooooooo no noooo noo nooooooooooo noooo

betakes himself in his advancing years, is true of all aged Sperm
noooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo noooo, no nooo no noo nooo Noooo

Whales. Almost universally, a lone whale--as a solitary Leviathan is
Nooooo. Nooooo noooooooooo, n nooo noooo--no n nooooooo Noooooooo no

called--proves an ancient one. Like venerable moss-bearded Daniel Boone,
nooooo--nooooo no noooooo noo. Nooo noooooooo nooo-noooooo Nooooo Noooo,

he will have no one near him but Nature herself; and her he takes to
no nooo nooo no noo nooo noo noo Nooooo noooooo; noo noo no noooo no

wife in the wilderness of waters, and the best of wives she is, though
nooo no noo nooooooooo no nooooo, noo noo nooo no noooo noo no, nooooo

she keeps so many moody secrets.
noo noooo no nooo noooo noooooo.




The schools composing none but young and vigorous males, previously
Noo noooooo noooooooo nooo noo noooo noo nooooooo noooo, nooooooooo

mentioned, offer a strong contrast to the harem schools. For while
noooooooo, noooo n nooooo nooooooo no noo noooo noooooo. Noo noooo

those female whales are characteristically timid, the young males, or
noooo nooooo nooooo noo nooooooooooooooooo noooo, noo noooo noooo, no

forty-barrel-bulls, as they call them, are by far the most pugnacious
noooo-nooooo-noooo, no nooo nooo nooo, noo no noo noo nooo nooooooooo

of all Leviathans, and proverbially the most dangerous to encounter;
no noo Nooooooooo, noo nooooooooooo noo nooo noooooooo no noooooooo;

excepting those wondrous grey-headed, grizzled whales, sometimes met,
noooooooo noooo nooooooo nooo-nooooo, nooooooo nooooo, noooooooo noo,

and these will fight you like grim fiends exasperated by a penal gout.
noo noooo nooo noooo noo nooo nooo nooooo noooooooooo no n noooo nooo.




The Forty-barrel-bull schools are larger than the harem schools. Like
Noo Noooo-nooooo-nooo noooooo noo nooooo nooo noo noooo noooooo. Nooo

a mob of young collegians, they are full of fight, fun, and wickedness,
n noo no noooo nooooooooo, nooo noo nooo no noooo, noo, noo nooooooooo,

tumbling round the world at such a reckless, rollicking rate, that no
nooooooo noooo noo noooo no nooo n nooooooo, nooooooooo nooo, nooo no

prudent underwriter would insure them any more than he would a riotous
noooooo noooooooooo noooo nooooo nooo noo nooo nooo no noooo n noooooo

lad at Yale or Harvard. They soon relinquish this turbulence though,
noo no Nooo no Noooooo. Nooo nooo nooooooooo nooo nooooooooo nooooo,

and when about three-fourths grown, break up, and separately go about in
noo nooo noooo noooo-noooooo noooo, noooo no, noo nooooooooo no noooo no

quest of settlements, that is, harems.
noooo no noooooooooo, nooo no, nooooo.




Another point of difference between the male and female schools is
Noooooo noooo no nooooooooo noooooo noo nooo noo nooooo noooooo no

still more characteristic of the sexes. Say you strike a
noooo nooo nooooooooooooo no noo noooo. Noo noo nooooo n

Forty-barrel-bull--poor devil! all his comrades quit him. But strike
Noooo-nooooo-nooo--nooo noooo! noo noo nooooooo nooo noo. Noo nooooo

a member of the harem school, and her companions swim around her with
n nooooo no noo noooo nooooo, noo noo nooooooooo nooo nooooo noo nooo

every token of concern, sometimes lingering so near her and so long, as
noooo noooo no noooooo, noooooooo noooooooo no nooo noo noo no nooo, no

themselves to fall a prey.
nooooooooo no nooo n nooo.










CHAPTER 89. Fast-Fish and Loose-Fish.
NOOOOOO no. Nooo-Nooo noo Noooo-Nooo.







The allusion to the waif and waif-poles in the last chapter but one,
Noo nooooooo no noo nooo noo nooo-noooo no noo nooo noooooo noo noo,

necessitates some account of the laws and regulations of the whale
nooooooooooo nooo noooooo no noo nooo noo noooooooooo no noo noooo

fishery, of which the waif may be deemed the grand symbol and badge.
noooooo, no noooo noo nooo noo no nooooo noo noooo nooooo noo noooo.




It frequently happens that when several ships are cruising in company,
No nooooooooo noooooo nooo nooo noooooo noooo noo nooooooo no noooooo,

a whale may be struck by one vessel, then escape, and be finally killed
n noooo noo no nooooo no noo nooooo, nooo nooooo, noo no noooooo nooooo

and captured by another vessel; and herein are indirectly comprised
noo nooooooo no noooooo nooooo; noo nooooo noo nooooooooo noooooooo

many minor contingencies, all partaking of this one grand feature. For
nooo noooo noooooooooooo, noo noooooooo no nooo noo noooo noooooo. Noo

example,--after a weary and perilous chase and capture of a whale,
noooooo,--noooo n noooo noo nooooooo noooo noo noooooo no n noooo,

the body may get loose from the ship by reason of a violent storm; and
noo nooo noo noo noooo nooo noo nooo no nooooo no n noooooo noooo; noo

drifting far away to leeward, be retaken by a second whaler, who, in a
nooooooo noo nooo no noooooo, no noooooo no n nooooo nooooo, noo, no n

calm, snugly tows it alongside, without risk of life or line. Thus
nooo, nooooo nooo no noooooooo, noooooo nooo no nooo no nooo. Nooo

the most vexatious and violent disputes would often arise between
noo nooo noooooooo noo noooooo nooooooo noooo noooo noooo noooooo

the fishermen, were there not some written or unwritten, universal,
noo noooooooo, nooo noooo noo nooo noooooo no noooooooo, noooooooo,

undisputed law applicable to all cases.
nooooooooo noo nooooooooo no noo noooo.




Perhaps the only formal whaling code authorized by legislative
Noooooo noo nooo nooooo noooooo nooo nooooooooo no noooooooooo

enactment, was that of Holland. It was decreed by the States-General in
noooooooo, noo nooo no Noooooo. No noo noooooo no noo Nooooo-Noooooo no

A.D. 1695. But though no other nation has ever had any written whaling
N.N. nooo. Noo nooooo no noooo nooooo noo nooo noo noo noooooo noooooo

law, yet the American fishermen have been their own legislators and
noo, noo noo Nooooooo noooooooo nooo nooo noooo noo noooooooooo noo

lawyers in this matter. They have provided a system which for terse
noooooo no nooo nooooo. Nooo nooo nooooooo n nooooo noooo noo noooo

comprehensiveness surpasses Justinian's Pandects and the By-laws of
noooooooooooooooo noooooooo Noooooooo'n Nooooooo noo noo No-nooo no

the Chinese Society for the Suppression of Meddling with other People's
noo Noooooo Noooooo noo noo Noooooooooo no Nooooooo nooo noooo Nooooo'n

Business. Yes; these laws might be engraven on a Queen Anne's farthing,
Nooooooo. Noo; noooo nooo noooo no nooooooo no n Noooo Nooo'n nooooooo,

or the barb of a harpoon, and worn round the neck, so small are they.
no noo nooo no n noooooo, noo nooo noooo noo nooo, no noooo noo nooo.




I. A Fast-Fish belongs to the party fast to it.
N. N Nooo-Nooo noooooo no noo noooo nooo no no.




II. A Loose-Fish is fair game for anybody who can soonest catch it.
NO. N Noooo-Nooo no nooo nooo noo noooooo noo noo noooooo noooo no.




But what plays the mischief with this masterly code is the admirable
Noo nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo no noo noooooooo

brevity of it, which necessitates a vast volume of commentaries to
noooooo no no, noooo nooooooooooo n nooo nooooo no nooooooooooo no

expound it.
noooooo no.




First: What is a Fast-Fish? Alive or dead a fish is technically fast,
Noooo: Nooo no n Nooo-Nooo? Noooo no nooo n nooo no noooooooooo nooo,

when it is connected with an occupied ship or boat, by any medium at all
nooo no no noooooooo nooo no nooooooo nooo no nooo, no noo nooooo no noo

controllable by the occupant or occupants,--a mast, an oar, a nine-inch
nooooooooooo no noo nooooooo no noooooooo,--n nooo, no noo, n nooo-nooo

cable, a telegraph wire, or a strand of cobweb, it is all the same.
noooo, n noooooooo nooo, no n nooooo no nooooo, no no noo noo nooo.

Likewise a fish is technically fast when it bears a waif, or any other
Nooooooo n nooo no noooooooooo nooo nooo no noooo n nooo, no noo noooo

recognised symbol of possession; so long as the party waifing it plainly
nooooooooo nooooo no nooooooooo; no nooo no noo noooo noooooo no noooooo

evince their ability at any time to take it alongside, as well as their
nooooo noooo noooooo no noo nooo no nooo no noooooooo, no nooo no noooo

intention so to do.
noooooooo no no no.




These are scientific commentaries; but the commentaries of the whalemen
Noooo noo nooooooooo nooooooooooo; noo noo nooooooooooo no noo nooooooo

themselves sometimes consist in hard words and harder knocks--the
nooooooooo noooooooo noooooo no nooo noooo noo nooooo nooooo--noo

Coke-upon-Littleton of the fist. True, among the more upright and
Nooo-nooo-Noooooooo no noo nooo. Nooo, noooo noo nooo noooooo noo

honourable whalemen allowances are always made for peculiar cases,
nooooooooo nooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooo nooo noo nooooooo noooo,

where it would be an outrageous moral injustice for one party to claim
noooo no noooo no no nooooooooo noooo noooooooo noo noo noooo no noooo

possession of a whale previously chased or killed by another party. But
nooooooooo no n noooo nooooooooo nooooo no nooooo no noooooo noooo. Noo

others are by no means so scrupulous.
nooooo noo no no noooo no nooooooooo.




Some fifty years ago there was a curious case of whale-trover litigated
Nooo noooo noooo noo noooo noo n noooooo nooo no noooo-nooooo noooooooo

in England, wherein the plaintiffs set forth that after a hard chase of
no Noooooo, noooooo noo nooooooooo noo noooo nooo noooo n nooo noooo no

a whale in the Northern seas; and when indeed they (the plaintiffs) had
n noooo no noo Nooooooo nooo; noo nooo nooooo nooo (noo nooooooooo) noo

succeeded in harpooning the fish; they were at last, through peril of
noooooooo no nooooooooo noo nooo; nooo nooo no nooo, noooooo noooo no

their lives, obliged to forsake not only their lines, but their boat
noooo noooo, noooooo no noooooo noo nooo noooo noooo, noo noooo nooo

itself. Ultimately the defendants (the crew of another ship) came up
nooooo. Nooooooooo noo nooooooooo (noo nooo no noooooo nooo) nooo no

with the whale, struck, killed, seized, and finally appropriated it
nooo noo noooo, nooooo, nooooo, nooooo, noo noooooo nooooooooooo no

before the very eyes of the plaintiffs. And when those defendants were
nooooo noo nooo nooo no noo nooooooooo. Noo nooo noooo nooooooooo nooo

remonstrated with, their captain snapped his fingers in the plaintiffs'
nooooooooooo nooo, noooo noooooo noooooo noo noooooo no noo nooooooooo'

teeth, and assured them that by way of doxology to the deed he had done,
noooo, noo noooooo nooo nooo no noo no nooooooo no noo nooo no noo nooo,

he would now retain their line, harpoons, and boat, which had remained
no noooo noo nooooo noooo nooo, nooooooo, noo nooo, noooo noo nooooooo

attached to the whale at the time of the seizure. Wherefore the
nooooooo no noo noooo no noo nooo no noo noooooo. Noooooooo noo

plaintiffs now sued for the recovery of the value of their whale, line,
nooooooooo noo nooo noo noo nooooooo no noo noooo no noooo noooo, nooo,

harpoons, and boat.
nooooooo, noo nooo.




Mr. Erskine was counsel for the defendants; Lord Ellenborough was
No. Noooooo noo noooooo noo noo nooooooooo; Nooo Nooooooooooo noo

the judge. In the course of the defence, the witty Erskine went on
noo noooo. No noo nooooo no noo noooooo, noo noooo Noooooo nooo no

to illustrate his position, by alluding to a recent crim. con.
no nooooooooo noo nooooooo, no nooooooo no n nooooo nooo. noo.

case, wherein a gentleman, after in vain trying to bridle his wife's
nooo, noooooo n noooooooo, noooo no nooo nooooo no nooooo noo nooo'n

viciousness, had at last abandoned her upon the seas of life; but in
noooooooooo, noo no nooo noooooooo noo nooo noo nooo no nooo; noo no

the course of years, repenting of that step, he instituted an action to
noo nooooo no noooo, noooooooo no nooo nooo, no nooooooooo no nooooo no

recover possession of her. Erskine was on the other side; and he
noooooo nooooooooo no noo. Noooooo noo no noo noooo nooo; noo no

then supported it by saying, that though the gentleman had originally
nooo noooooooo no no nooooo, nooo nooooo noo noooooooo noo nooooooooo

harpooned the lady, and had once had her fast, and only by reason of the
noooooooo noo nooo, noo noo nooo noo noo nooo, noo nooo no nooooo no noo

great stress of her plunging viciousness, had at last abandoned her; yet
noooo nooooo no noo nooooooo noooooooooo, noo no nooo noooooooo noo; noo

abandon her he did, so that she became a loose-fish; and therefore
noooooo noo no noo, no nooo noo nooooo n noooo-nooo; noo noooooooo

when a subsequent gentleman re-harpooned her, the lady then became that
nooo n nooooooooo noooooooo no-noooooooo noo, noo nooo nooo nooooo nooo

subsequent gentleman's property, along with whatever harpoon might have
nooooooooo noooooooo'n nooooooo, noooo nooo nooooooo noooooo noooo nooo

been found sticking in her.
nooo noooo nooooooo no noo.




Now in the present case Erskine contended that the examples of the whale
Noo no noo noooooo nooo Noooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo

and the lady were reciprocally illustrative of each other.
noo noo nooo nooo nooooooooooo nooooooooooo no nooo noooo.




These pleadings, and the counter pleadings, being duly heard, the very
Noooo noooooooo, noo noo noooooo noooooooo, noooo nooo noooo, noo nooo

learned Judge in set terms decided, to wit,--That as for the boat, he
noooooo Noooo no noo noooo noooooo, no noo,--Nooo no noo noo nooo, no

awarded it to the plaintiffs, because they had merely abandoned it
noooooo no no noo nooooooooo, noooooo nooo noo nooooo noooooooo no

to save their lives; but that with regard to the controverted whale,
no nooo noooo noooo; noo nooo nooo nooooo no noo nooooooooooo noooo,

harpoons, and line, they belonged to the defendants; the whale, because
nooooooo, noo nooo, nooo nooooooo no noo nooooooooo; noo noooo, noooooo

it was a Loose-Fish at the time of the final capture; and the harpoons
no noo n Noooo-Nooo no noo nooo no noo noooo noooooo; noo noo nooooooo

and line because when the fish made off with them, it (the fish)
noo nooo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooo noo nooo nooo, no (noo nooo)

acquired a property in those articles; and hence anybody who afterwards
nooooooo n nooooooo no noooo nooooooo; noo noooo noooooo noo nooooooooo

took the fish had a right to them. Now the defendants afterwards took
nooo noo nooo noo n noooo no nooo. Noo noo nooooooooo nooooooooo nooo

the fish; ergo, the aforesaid articles were theirs.
noo nooo; nooo, noo noooooooo nooooooo nooo nooooo.




A common man looking at this decision of the very learned Judge, might
N nooooo noo noooooo no nooo nooooooo no noo nooo noooooo Noooo, noooo

possibly object to it. But ploughed up to the primary rock of the
nooooooo nooooo no no. Noo nooooooo no no noo noooooo nooo no noo

matter, the two great principles laid down in the twin whaling laws
nooooo, noo noo noooo nooooooooo nooo nooo no noo nooo noooooo nooo

previously quoted, and applied and elucidated by Lord Ellenborough in
nooooooooo nooooo, noo noooooo noo nooooooooo no Nooo Nooooooooooo no

the above cited case; these two laws touching Fast-Fish and Loose-Fish,
noo noooo noooo nooo; noooo noo nooo nooooooo Nooo-Nooo noo Noooo-Nooo,

I say, will, on reflection, be found the fundamentals of all human
N noo, nooo, no nooooooooo, no noooo noo nooooooooooo no noo noooo

jurisprudence; for notwithstanding its complicated tracery of sculpture,
noooooooooooo; noo noooooooooooooo noo noooooooooo noooooo no noooooooo,

the Temple of the Law, like the Temple of the Philistines, has but two
noo Nooooo no noo Noo, nooo noo Nooooo no noo Noooooooooo, noo noo noo

props to stand on.
noooo no noooo no.




Is it not a saying in every one's mouth, Possession is half of the law:
No no noo n nooooo no noooo noo'n noooo, Nooooooooo no nooo no noo noo:

that is, regardless of how the thing came into possession? But often
nooo no, nooooooooo no noo noo noooo nooo nooo nooooooooo? Noo noooo

possession is the whole of the law. What are the sinews and souls of
nooooooooo no noo noooo no noo noo. Nooo noo noo nooooo noo noooo no

Russian serfs and Republican slaves but Fast-Fish, whereof possession is
Noooooo noooo noo Nooooooooo nooooo noo Nooo-Nooo, noooooo nooooooooo no

the whole of the law? What to the rapacious landlord is the widow's last
noo noooo no noo noo? Nooo no noo noooooooo nooooooo no noo noooo'n nooo

mite but a Fast-Fish? What is yonder undetected villain's marble mansion
nooo noo n Nooo-Nooo? Nooo no nooooo nooooooooo noooooo'n nooooo noooooo

with a door-plate for a waif; what is that but a Fast-Fish? What is the
nooo n nooo-noooo noo n nooo; nooo no nooo noo n Nooo-Nooo? Nooo no noo

ruinous discount which Mordecai, the broker, gets from poor Woebegone,
noooooo nooooooo noooo Nooooooo, noo nooooo, nooo nooo nooo Noooooooo,

the bankrupt, on a loan to keep Woebegone's family from starvation;
noo nooooooo, no n nooo no nooo Noooooooo'n nooooo nooo nooooooooo;

what is that ruinous discount but a Fast-Fish? What is the Archbishop of
nooo no nooo noooooo nooooooo noo n Nooo-Nooo? Nooo no noo Nooooooooo no

Savesoul's income of L100,000 seized from the scant bread and cheese
Nooooooo'n nooooo no NOOO,noo nooooo nooo noo noooo noooo noo nooooo

of hundreds of thousands of broken-backed laborers (all sure of heaven
no nooooooo no noooooooo no nooooo-nooooo nooooooo (noo nooo no nooooo

without any of Savesoul's help) what is that globular L100,000 but a
noooooo noo no Nooooooo'n nooo) nooo no nooo nooooooo NOOO,noo noo n

Fast-Fish? What are the Duke of Dunder's hereditary towns and hamlets
Nooo-Nooo? Nooo noo noo Nooo no Nooooo'n nooooooooo noooo noo noooooo

but Fast-Fish? What to that redoubted harpooneer, John Bull, is poor
noo Nooo-Nooo? Nooo no nooo noooooooo nooooooooo, Nooo Nooo, no nooo

Ireland, but a Fast-Fish? What to that apostolic lancer, Brother
Noooooo, noo n Nooo-Nooo? Nooo no nooo noooooooo nooooo, Noooooo

Jonathan, is Texas but a Fast-Fish? And concerning all these, is not
Nooooooo, no Noooo noo n Nooo-Nooo? Noo nooooooooo noo noooo, no noo

Possession the whole of the law?
Nooooooooo noo noooo no noo noo?




But if the doctrine of Fast-Fish be pretty generally applicable,
Noo no noo nooooooo no Nooo-Nooo no nooooo noooooooo nooooooooo,

the kindred doctrine of Loose-Fish is still more widely so. That is
noo noooooo nooooooo no Noooo-Nooo no noooo nooo nooooo no. Nooo no

internationally and universally applicable.
noooooooooooooo noo noooooooooo nooooooooo.




What was America in 1492 but a Loose-Fish, in which Columbus struck the
Nooo noo Noooooo no nooo noo n Noooo-Nooo, no noooo Nooooooo nooooo noo

Spanish standard by way of waifing it for his royal master and mistress?
Noooooo nooooooo no noo no noooooo no noo noo noooo nooooo noo nooooooo?

What was Poland to the Czar? What Greece to the Turk? What India
Nooo noo Nooooo no noo Nooo? Nooo Nooooo no noo Nooo? Nooo Noooo

to England? What at last will Mexico be to the United States? All
no Noooooo? Nooo no nooo nooo Nooooo no no noo Nooooo Nooooo? Noo

Loose-Fish.
Noooo-Nooo.




What are the Rights of Man and the Liberties of the World but
Nooo noo noo Nooooo no Noo noo noo Noooooooo no noo Noooo noo

Loose-Fish? What all men's minds and opinions but Loose-Fish? What is
Noooo-Nooo? Nooo noo noo'n noooo noo nooooooo noo Noooo-Nooo? Nooo no

the principle of religious belief in them but a Loose-Fish? What to
noo noooooooo no noooooooo nooooo no nooo noo n Noooo-Nooo? Nooo no

the ostentatious smuggling verbalists are the thoughts of thinkers but
noo nooooooooooo noooooooo nooooooooo noo noo nooooooo no nooooooo noo

Loose-Fish? What is the great globe itself but a Loose-Fish? And what
Noooo-Nooo? Nooo no noo noooo noooo nooooo noo n Noooo-Nooo? Noo nooo

are you, reader, but a Loose-Fish and a Fast-Fish, too?
noo noo, nooooo, noo n Noooo-Nooo noo n Nooo-Nooo, noo?










CHAPTER 90. Heads or Tails.
NOOOOOO no. Noooo no Noooo.







"De balena vero sufficit, si rex habeat caput, et regina caudam."
"No nooooo nooo nooooooo, no noo nooooo noooo, no nooooo nooooo."

BRACTON, L. 3, C. 3.
NOOOOOO, N. n, N. n.







Latin from the books of the Laws of England, which taken along with the
Noooo nooo noo noooo no noo Nooo no Noooooo, noooo noooo noooo nooo noo

context, means, that of all whales captured by anybody on the coast of
noooooo, noooo, nooo no noo nooooo nooooooo no noooooo no noo noooo no

that land, the King, as Honourary Grand Harpooneer, must have the head,
nooo nooo, noo Nooo, no Noooooooo Noooo Nooooooooo, nooo nooo noo nooo,

and the Queen be respectfully presented with the tail. A division which,
noo noo Noooo no nooooooooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooo. N nooooooo noooo,

in the whale, is much like halving an apple; there is no intermediate
no noo noooo, no nooo nooo noooooo no noooo; noooo no no nooooooooooo

remainder. Now as this law, under a modified form, is to this day in
noooooooo. Noo no nooo noo, noooo n nooooooo nooo, no no nooo noo no

force in England; and as it offers in various respects a strange anomaly
noooo no Noooooo; noo no no nooooo no noooooo nooooooo n noooooo noooooo

touching the general law of Fast and Loose-Fish, it is here treated of
nooooooo noo noooooo noo no Nooo noo Noooo-Nooo, no no nooo noooooo no

in a separate chapter, on the same courteous principle that prompts
no n nooooooo noooooo, no noo nooo noooooooo noooooooo nooo noooooo

the English railways to be at the expense of a separate car, specially
noo Noooooo nooooooo no no no noo noooooo no n nooooooo noo, noooooooo

reserved for the accommodation of royalty. In the first place, in
nooooooo noo noo noooooooooooo no noooooo. No noo noooo noooo, no

curious proof of the fact that the above-mentioned law is still in
noooooo noooo no noo nooo nooo noo noooo-noooooooo noo no noooo no

force, I proceed to lay before you a circumstance that happened within
noooo, N noooooo no noo nooooo noo n nooooooooooo nooo nooooooo nooooo

the last two years.
noo nooo noo noooo.




It seems that some honest mariners of Dover, or Sandwich, or some one
No noooo nooo nooo nooooo nooooooo no Noooo, no Nooooooo, no nooo noo

of the Cinque Ports, had after a hard chase succeeded in killing and
no noo Nooooo Noooo, noo noooo n nooo noooo noooooooo no noooooo noo

beaching a fine whale which they had originally descried afar off from
nooooooo n nooo noooo noooo nooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo

the shore. Now the Cinque Ports are partially or somehow under the
noo noooo. Noo noo Nooooo Noooo noo noooooooo no noooooo noooo noo

jurisdiction of a sort of policeman or beadle, called a Lord Warden.
nooooooooooo no n nooo no noooooooo no nooooo, nooooo n Nooo Nooooo.

Holding the office directly from the crown, I believe, all the royal
Noooooo noo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo, N noooooo, noo noo noooo

emoluments incident to the Cinque Port territories become by assignment
nooooooooo nooooooo no noo Nooooo Nooo noooooooooo nooooo no nooooooooo

his. By some writers this office is called a sinecure. But not so.
noo. No nooo noooooo nooo nooooo no nooooo n nooooooo. Noo noo no.

Because the Lord Warden is busily employed at times in fobbing his
Noooooo noo Nooo Nooooo no nooooo nooooooo no noooo no noooooo noo

perquisites; which are his chiefly by virtue of that same fobbing of
noooooooooo; noooo noo noo noooooo no nooooo no nooo nooo noooooo no

them.
nooo.




Now when these poor sun-burnt mariners, bare-footed, and with their
Noo nooo noooo nooo noo-noooo nooooooo, nooo-nooooo, noo nooo noooo

trowsers rolled high up on their eely legs, had wearily hauled their fat
nooooooo nooooo nooo no no noooo nooo nooo, noo noooooo nooooo noooo noo

fish high and dry, promising themselves a good L150 from the precious
nooo nooo noo noo, noooooooo nooooooooo n nooo NOOO nooo noo nooooooo

oil and bone; and in fantasy sipping rare tea with their wives, and good
noo noo nooo; noo no noooooo noooooo nooo noo nooo noooo noooo, noo nooo

ale with their cronies, upon the strength of their respective shares; up
noo nooo noooo noooooo, nooo noo nooooooo no noooo nooooooooo nooooo; no

steps a very learned and most Christian and charitable gentleman, with
noooo n nooo noooooo noo nooo Noooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooooo, nooo

In a word, the whale was seized and sold, and his Grace the Duke of
No n nooo, noo noooo noo nooooo noo nooo, noo noo Noooo noo Nooo no

It will readily be seen that in this case the alleged right of the
No nooo noooooo no nooo nooo no nooo nooo noo noooooo noooo no noo

matters.
noooooo.




But why should the King have the head, and the Queen the tail? A reason
Noo noo nooooo noo Nooo nooo noo nooo, noo noo Noooo noo nooo? N nooooo

for that, ye lawyers!
noo nooo, no noooooo!




In his treatise on "Queen-Gold," or Queen-pinmoney, an old King's Bench
No noo nooooooo no "Noooo-Nooo," no Noooo-nooooooo, no noo Nooo'n Noooo

author, one William Prynne, thus discourseth: "Ye tail is ye Queen's,
nooooo, noo Noooooo Nooooo, nooo noooooooooo: "No nooo no no Noooo'n,

that ye Queen's wardrobe may be supplied with ye whalebone." Now this
nooo no Noooo'n nooooooo noo no nooooooo nooo no noooooooo." Noo nooo

noo noooooo no n nooo nooo noo noooo nooooo nooo no noo Noooooooo no

Noooo noooo noo noooooo nooo no nooooo' noooooo. Noo nooo nooo nooo

is not in the tail; it is in the head, which is a sad mistake for
no noo no noo nooo; no no no noo nooo, noooo no n noo noooooo noo

a sagacious lawyer like Prynne. But is the Queen a mermaid, to be
n noooooooo nooooo nooo Nooooo. Noo no noo Noooo n noooooo, no no

presented with a tail? An allegorical meaning may lurk here.
noooooooo nooo n nooo? No noooooooooo noooooo noo nooo nooo.




There are two royal fish so styled by the English law writers--the whale
Noooo noo noo noooo nooo no nooooo no noo Noooooo noo noooooo--noo noooo

and the sturgeon; both royal property under certain limitations, and
noo noo nooooooo; nooo noooo nooooooo noooo noooooo noooooooooo, noo

nominally supplying the tenth branch of the crown's ordinary revenue.
noooooooo noooooooo noo noooo nooooo no noo noooo'n nooooooo noooooo.

I know not that any other author has hinted of the matter; but by
N nooo noo nooo noo noooo nooooo noo nooooo no noo nooooo; noo no

inference it seems to me that the sturgeon must be divided in the same
noooooooo no noooo no no nooo noo nooooooo nooo no noooooo no noo nooo

way as the whale, the King receiving the highly dense and elastic head
noo no noo noooo, noo Nooo noooooooo noo nooooo noooo noo noooooo nooo

peculiar to that fish, which, symbolically regarded, may possibly be
nooooooo no nooo nooo, noooo, nooooooooooo nooooooo, noo nooooooo no

humorously grounded upon some presumed congeniality. And thus there
nooooooooo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooooooooooo. Noo nooo noooo

seems a reason in all things, even in law.
noooo n nooooo no noo nooooo, nooo no noo.










CHAPTER 91. The Pequod Meets The Rose-Bud.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooo Noooo Noo Nooo-Noo.







"In vain it was to rake for Ambergriese in the paunch of this Leviathan,

nooooooooooo noooo noooooo noo noooooo." NOO N. NOOOOO, N.N.







It was a week or two after the last whaling scene recounted, and when we
No noo n nooo no noo noooo noo nooo noooooo noooo noooooooo, noo nooo no

noooo noooo no nooo noooo. N nooooooo noo noo nooo nooooooo noooo noo

noooo no noo noo.




"I will bet something now," said Stubb, "that somewhere hereabouts are
"N nooo noo noooooooo noo," nooo Noooo, "nooo noooooooo nooooooooo noo

nooo no noooo noooooo nooooo no noooooo noo noooo noo. N noooooo nooo

would keel up before long."
noooo nooo no nooooo nooo."




Presently, the vapours in advance slid aside; and there in the distance
Noooooooo, noo noooooo no noooooo nooo noooo; noo noooo no noo nooooooo

noo nooo; noo no noo noooooo noooo no noooooo noo-nooo nooo noooooo, noo

noooooo, noo noooooo nooooo noo, no noo noooo nooo noo noooo noooooooo

must be what the fishermen call a blasted whale, that is, a whale that
nooo no nooo noo noooooooo nooo n noooooo noooo, nooo no, n noooo nooo

has died unmolested on the sea, and so floated an unappropriated corpse.
noo nooo nooooooooo no noo noo, noo no noooooo no nooooooooooooo nooooo.

It may well be conceived, what an unsavory odor such a mass must
No noo nooo no noooooooo, nooo no nooooooo nooo nooo n nooo nooo

exhale; worse than an Assyrian city in the plague, when the living are
nooooo; noooo nooo no Nooooooo nooo no noo nooooo, nooo noo nooooo noo

incompetent to bury the departed. So intolerable indeed is it regarded
noooooooooo no nooo noo nooooooo. No noooooooooo nooooo no no nooooooo

by some, that no cupidity could persuade them to moor alongside of it.
no nooo, nooo no nooooooo noooo nooooooo nooo no nooo noooooooo no no.

Yet are there those who will still do it; notwithstanding the fact that
Noo noo noooo noooo noo nooo noooo no no; noooooooooooooo noo nooo nooo

the oil obtained from such subjects is of a very inferior quality, and
noo noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooooo no no n nooo nooooooo noooooo, noo

by no means of the nature of attar-of-rose.
no no noooo no noo nooooo no noooo-no-nooo.




Coming still nearer with the expiring breeze, we saw that the Frenchman
Nooooo noooo nooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooo, no noo nooo noo Noooooooo

no n noooooo nooo noo noooo. No noooo, no nooooo noo no no noo no

noooo noooooooooooo nooooo nooo nooo no noo no noo noo nooo n nooo

of prodigious dyspepsia, or indigestion; leaving their defunct bodies

no noo nooo no nooo n noooo no nooo, noooooo nooo no noo nooo noooooo

nooooo no noooooo.




The Pequod had now swept so nigh to the stranger, that Stubb vowed

off at the bowl, were vigorously puffing tobacco-smoke, so that it
noo no noo nooo, nooo nooooooooo noooooo noooooo-noooo, no nooo no

constantly filled their olfactories.
nooooooooo nooooo noooo noooooooooo.




Stubb was struck by a shower of outcries and anathemas proceeding from
Noooo noo nooooo no n nooooo no nooooooo noo noooooooo nooooooooo nooo

the Captain's round-house abaft; and looking in that direction saw a
noo Noooooo'n noooo-noooo noooo; noo noooooo no nooo noooooooo noo n

noooo nooo nooooo nooo nooooo noo nooo, noooo noo nooo nooo nooo nooooo.

Nooo noo noo noooooooo noooooo, noo, noooo no nooo noooooooooooo

noooooo noo noooooooooo no noo noo, noo noooooo noooooo no noo Noooooo'n

noooo-noooo (NOOOOOO no nooooo no) no noooo noo nooo; noo noooo, noooo

noo nooo noooooo noo noo nooooooooo noo nooooooooooo no noooo.




Marking all this, Stubb argued well for his scheme, and turning to the
Noooooo noo nooo, Noooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooooo, noo noooooo no noo

Nooooooo-noo noo n nooooo nooo nooo noo, nooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo

noooooooo noo noooooooooo no noo Noooooo no n noooooooo noooooooo,

noo noo noooooo nooo noo nooo no nooooooo noo nooooooooooo n nooooo.

Sounding him carefully, Stubb further perceived that the Guernsey-man
Nooooooo noo noooooooo, Noooo noooooo noooooooo nooo noo Nooooooo-noo

noo noo noo noooooooo noooooooo nooooooooo noo noooooooo. No noooooooo

nooo noo noooo no nooo nooo, noo noooooooo noo noooo noooo noo

nooooooooooo nooo noo, no nooo noo noo noooooo noooooooo n nooooo nooo

nooooooo no noooooooooo noooo noooooooo. Noooooooo no nooo nooooo nooo

no nooooo, noo Nooooooo-noo, noooo noooo no no noooooooooo'n nooooo, noo

no nooo noo Noooooo nooo no noooooo, noo no nooooo nooo Noooo; noo no

noo Noooo, no noo no noooo noo nooooooo nooo nooooo nooo noooooooo no

noo nooooo noo noooooooo.




By this time their destined victim appeared from his cabin. He was a
No nooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooo. No noo n

nooooo no nooooooooooo noooooo nooo.

"Nooo noooo N noo no noo noooo?" nooo no.

noo no nooo noooo no noooooo noo nooo no noooo n nooo no noooooo no no,

nooooo N noo'n noooooo no no n noooo."

noooooo noooo nooo noo noooooo noooooooo."




Upon this the captain started, and eagerly desired to know more.
Nooo nooo noo noooooo noooooo, noo noooooo noooooo no nooo nooo.

"Nooo noo?" nooo noo Nooooooo-noo no Noooo.

noooo-nooo nooo n No. Nooo nooooo. No nooo, nooo noo nooo no no'n n

nooooo."

no no noooo noo noooo, no noo noooo nooo noooo nooo."

no'n no nooo nooo noo'n noooo."

noooooooo nooo noo-nooo.




Presently a breeze sprang up; Stubb feigned to cast off from the whale;

nooooooo noo noooo, noo Noooooooo nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo, noooo noo

noooooo n nooooo noooo no noo noo; noo nooo no nooooo noo noooo nooooo

noooooo noo noooo nooo, no noo nooo noooooo no noo Noooo noooo noo

noooooo nooooo no noo Noooooo nooo. Noo nooo'n nooo nooo noo no nooo

nooooooooo, noooooo noooooo noooo noooo, noo noooooo no noooooo no

gold-hunters.
nooo-noooooo.




And all the time numberless fowls were diving, and ducking, and
Noo noo noo nooo nooooooooo noooo nooo nooooo, noo noooooo, noo

noooooooo, noo noooooo, noo nooooooo nooooo nooo. Noooo noo noooooooo

no nooo nooooooooooo, nooooooooo no noo nooooooo noooooo noooooooo, nooo

nooooooo nooo noo noo nooo noooo no nooo nooooo, noooo noooo n noooo

nooooo no noooooo, noooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo no noo nooooo noooooo

noooo nooooooo no no, no noo noooo nooo nooo nooo noo nooo noooo nooo

another, without at all blending with it for a time.
noooooo, noooooo no noo nooooooo nooo no noo n nooo.




"I have it, I have it," cried Stubb, with delight, striking something in
"N nooo no, N nooo no," noooo Noooo, nooo noooooo, nooooooo noooooooo no

the subterranean regions, "a purse! a purse!"
noo nooooooooooo noooooo, "n noooo! n noooo!"




Dropping his spade, he thrust both hands in, and drew out handfuls
Nooooooo noo noooo, no nooooo nooo noooo no, noo nooo noo nooooooo

of something that looked like ripe Windsor soap, or rich mottled old
no noooooooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo Noooooo nooo, no nooo noooooo noo

cheese; very unctuous and savory withal. You might easily dent it with
nooooo; nooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooooo. Noo noooo nooooo nooo no nooo

your thumb; it is of a hue between yellow and ash colour. And this, good
nooo noooo; no no no n noo noooooo nooooo noo noo nooooo. Noo nooo, nooo

friends, is ambergris, worth a gold guinea an ounce to any druggist.
noooooo, no noooooooo, noooo n nooo nooooo no noooo no noo nooooooo.

Some six handfuls were obtained; but more was unavoidably lost in the
Nooo noo nooooooo nooo nooooooo; noo nooo noo noooooooooo nooo no noo

else the ship would bid them good bye.
nooo noo nooo noooo noo nooo nooo noo.










CHAPTER 92. Ambergris.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooooo.







Now this ambergris is a very curious substance, and so important as
Noo nooo noooooooo no n nooo noooooo noooooooo, noo no noooooooo no

an article of commerce, that in 1791 a certain Nantucket-born Captain
no noooooo no nooooooo, nooo no nooo n noooooo Noooooooo-nooo Noooooo

Coffin was examined at the bar of the English House of Commons on that
Nooooo noo nooooooo no noo noo no noo Noooooo Noooo no Noooooo no nooo

subject. For at that time, and indeed until a comparatively late day,
noooooo. Noo no nooo nooo, noo nooooo noooo n noooooooooooo nooo noo,

the precise origin of ambergris remained, like amber itself, a problem
noo noooooo nooooo no noooooooo nooooooo, nooo noooo nooooo, n noooooo

to the learned. Though the word ambergris is but the French compound for
no noo noooooo. Nooooo noo nooo noooooooo no noo noo Nooooo nooooooo noo

grey amber, yet the two substances are quite distinct. For amber, though
nooo noooo, noo noo noo nooooooooo noo noooo nooooooo. Noo noooo, nooooo

at times found on the sea-coast, is also dug up in some far inland
no noooo noooo no noo noo-noooo, no nooo noo no no nooo noo nooooo

soils, whereas ambergris is never found except upon the sea. Besides,
noooo, noooooo noooooooo no noooo noooo nooooo nooo noo noo. Noooooo,

amber is a hard, transparent, brittle, odorless substance, used for
noooo no n nooo, noooooooooo, noooooo, nooooooo noooooooo, nooo noo

mouth-pieces to pipes, for beads and ornaments; but ambergris is soft,
noooo-nooooo no noooo, noo noooo noo noooooooo; noo noooooooo no nooo,

waxy, and so highly fragrant and spicy, that it is largely used in
nooo, noo no nooooo nooooooo noo noooo, nooo no no noooooo nooo no

perfumery, in pastiles, precious candles, hair-powders, and pomatum.
noooooooo, no nooooooo, nooooooo noooooo, nooo-noooooo, noo noooooo.

The Turks use it in cooking, and also carry it to Mecca, for the same
Noo Noooo noo no no noooooo, noo nooo noooo no no Noooo, noo noo nooo

purpose that frankincense is carried to St. Peter's in Rome. Some wine
noooooo nooo nooooooooooo no noooooo no No. Noooo'n no Nooo. Nooo nooo

merchants drop a few grains into claret, to flavor it.
noooooooo nooo n noo nooooo nooo nooooo, no nooooo no.




Who would think, then, that such fine ladies and gentlemen should regale
Noo noooo noooo, nooo, nooo nooo nooo nooooo noo noooooooo nooooo nooooo

themselves with an essence found in the inglorious bowels of a sick
nooooooooo nooo no noooooo noooo no noo nooooooooo nooooo no n nooo

whale! Yet so it is. By some, ambergris is supposed to be the cause, and
noooo! Noo no no no. No nooo, noooooooo no nooooooo no no noo noooo, noo

by others the effect, of the dyspepsia in the whale. How to cure such
no nooooo noo nooooo, no noo noooooooo no noo noooo. Noo no nooo nooo

a dyspepsia it were hard to say, unless by administering three or four
n noooooooo no nooo nooo no noo, nooooo no noooooooooooo noooo no nooo

boat loads of Brandreth's pills, and then running out of harm's way, as
nooo noooo no Noooooooo'n noooo, noo nooo noooooo noo no nooo'n noo, no

laborers do in blasting rocks.
nooooooo no no nooooooo noooo.




I have forgotten to say that there were found in this ambergris, certain
N nooo noooooooo no noo nooo noooo nooo noooo no nooo noooooooo, noooooo

hard, round, bony plates, which at first Stubb thought might be sailors'
nooo, noooo, nooo nooooo, noooo no noooo Noooo noooooo noooo no noooooo'

trowsers buttons; but it afterwards turned out that they were nothing
nooooooo noooooo; noo no nooooooooo nooooo noo nooo nooo nooo noooooo

more than pieces of small squid bones embalmed in that manner.
nooo nooo nooooo no noooo noooo noooo nooooooo no nooo nooooo.




Now that the incorruption of this most fragrant ambergris should be
Noo nooo noo nooooooooooo no nooo nooo nooooooo noooooooo nooooo no

found in the heart of such decay; is this nothing? Bethink thee of that
noooo no noo noooo no nooo noooo; no nooo noooooo? Noooooo nooo no nooo

saying of St. Paul in Corinthians, about corruption and incorruption;
nooooo no No. Nooo no Noooooooooo, noooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooooo;

how that we are sown in dishonour, but raised in glory. And likewise
noo nooo no noo nooo no noooooooo, noo nooooo no noooo. Noo nooooooo

call to mind that saying of Paracelsus about what it is that maketh
nooo no nooo nooo nooooo no Nooooooooo noooo nooo no no nooo nooooo

the best musk. Also forget not the strange fact that of all things of
noo nooo nooo. Nooo nooooo noo noo noooooo nooo nooo no noo nooooo no

ill-savor, Cologne-water, in its rudimental manufacturing stages, is the
noo-noooo, Noooooo-noooo, no noo nooooooooo noooooooooooo nooooo, no noo

worst.
noooo.




I should like to conclude the chapter with the above appeal, but cannot,
N nooooo nooo no nooooooo noo noooooo nooo noo noooo nooooo, noo nooooo,

owing to my anxiety to repel a charge often made against whalemen,
noooo no no noooooo no noooo n nooooo noooo nooo noooooo nooooooo,

and which, in the estimation of some already biased minds, might be
noo noooo, no noo nooooooooo no nooo noooooo nooooo noooo, noooo no

considered as indirectly substantiated by what has been said of
nooooooooo no nooooooooo noooooooooooo no nooo noo nooo nooo no

the Frenchman's two whales. Elsewhere in this volume the slanderous
noo Noooooooo'n noo nooooo. Noooooooo no nooo nooooo noo nooooooooo

aspersion has been disproved, that the vocation of whaling is throughout
noooooooo noo nooo noooooooo, nooo noo nooooooo no noooooo no nooooooooo

a slatternly, untidy business. But there is another thing to rebut. They
n nooooooooo, nooooo nooooooo. Noo noooo no noooooo noooo no noooo. Nooo

hint that all whales always smell bad. Now how did this odious stigma
nooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo noooo noo. Noo noo noo nooo nooooo nooooo

originate?
noooooooo?




I opine, that it is plainly traceable to the first arrival of the
N noooo, nooo no no noooooo noooooooo no noo noooo noooooo no noo

Greenland whaling ships in London, more than two centuries ago. Because
Noooooooo noooooo noooo no Nooooo, nooo nooo noo noooooooo noo. Noooooo

those whalemen did not then, and do not now, try out their oil at sea as
noooo nooooooo noo noo nooo, noo no noo noo, noo noo noooo noo no noo no

the Southern ships have always done; but cutting up the fresh blubber in
noo Nooooooo noooo nooo nooooo nooo; noo noooooo no noo noooo noooooo no

small bits, thrust it through the bung holes of large casks, and carry
noooo nooo, nooooo no noooooo noo nooo noooo no noooo noooo, noo noooo

it home in that manner; the shortness of the season in those Icy Seas,
no nooo no nooo nooooo; noo noooooooo no noo nooooo no noooo Noo Nooo,

and the sudden and violent storms to which they are exposed, forbidding
noo noo nooooo noo noooooo nooooo no noooo nooo noo noooooo, nooooooooo

any other course. The consequence is, that upon breaking into the hold,
noo noooo nooooo. Noo noooooooooo no, nooo nooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo,

and unloading one of these whale cemeteries, in the Greenland dock, a
noo noooooooo noo no noooo noooo nooooooooo, no noo Noooooooo nooo, n

savor is given forth somewhat similar to that arising from excavating an
noooo no noooo noooo nooooooo noooooo no nooo noooooo nooo nooooooooo no

old city grave-yard, for the foundations of a Lying-in-Hospital.
noo nooo noooo-nooo, noo noo noooooooooo no n Noooo-no-Nooooooo.




I partly surmise also, that this wicked charge against whalers may be
N nooooo noooooo nooo, nooo nooo nooooo nooooo noooooo noooooo noo no

likewise imputed to the existence on the coast of Greenland, in former
nooooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo no noo noooo no Noooooooo, no nooooo

times, of a Dutch village called Schmerenburgh or Smeerenberg, which
noooo, no n Noooo noooooo nooooo Noooooooooooo no Noooooooooo, noooo

latter name is the one used by the learned Fogo Von Slack, in his great
nooooo nooo no noo noo nooo no noo noooooo Nooo Noo Noooo, no noo noooo

work on Smells, a text-book on that subject. As its name imports (smeer,
nooo no Nooooo, n nooo-nooo no nooo noooooo. No noo nooo noooooo (noooo,

fat; berg, to put up), this village was founded in order to afford a
noo; nooo, no noo no), nooo noooooo noo noooooo no noooo no nooooo n

place for the blubber of the Dutch whale fleet to be tried out, without
noooo noo noo noooooo no noo Noooo noooo noooo no no noooo noo, noooooo

being taken home to Holland for that purpose. It was a collection of
noooo noooo nooo no Noooooo noo nooo noooooo. No noo n nooooooooo no

furnaces, fat-kettles, and oil sheds; and when the works were in full
nooooooo, noo-noooooo, noo noo noooo; noo nooo noo noooo nooo no nooo

operation certainly gave forth no very pleasant savor. But all this is
noooooooo noooooooo nooo noooo no nooo nooooooo noooo. Noo noo nooo no

quite different with a South Sea Sperm Whaler; which in a voyage of four
noooo noooooooo nooo n Noooo Noo Noooo Nooooo; noooo no n nooooo no nooo

years perhaps, after completely filling her hold with oil, does not,
noooo noooooo, noooo nooooooooo noooooo noo nooo nooo noo, nooo noo,

perhaps, consume fifty days in the business of boiling out; and in the
noooooo, noooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooooo no noooooo noo; noo no noo

state that it is casked, the oil is nearly scentless. The truth is, that
noooo nooo no no nooooo, noo noo no nooooo noooooooo. Noo noooo no, nooo

living or dead, if but decently treated, whales as a species are by
nooooo no nooo, no noo nooooooo noooooo, nooooo no n noooooo noo no

no means creatures of ill odor; nor can whalemen be recognised, as the
no noooo noooooooo no noo nooo; noo noo nooooooo no nooooooooo, no noo

people of the middle ages affected to detect a Jew in the company, by
nooooo no noo nooooo nooo nooooooo no nooooo n Noo no noo noooooo, no

the nose. Nor indeed can the whale possibly be otherwise than fragrant,
noo nooo. Noo nooooo noo noo noooo nooooooo no noooooooo nooo nooooooo,

when, as a general thing, he enjoys such high health; taking abundance
nooo, no n noooooo noooo, no nooooo nooo nooo nooooo; nooooo noooooooo

of exercise; always out of doors; though, it is true, seldom in the
no nooooooo; nooooo noo no noooo; nooooo, no no nooo, nooooo no noo

open air. I say, that the motion of a Sperm Whale's flukes above water
nooo noo. N noo, nooo noo nooooo no n Noooo Noooo'n nooooo noooo noooo

dispenses a perfume, as when a musk-scented lady rustles her dress in a
noooooooo n noooooo, no nooo n nooo-noooooo nooo noooooo noo noooo no n

warm parlor. What then shall I liken the Sperm Whale to for fragrance,
nooo nooooo. Nooo nooo noooo N noooo noo Noooo Noooo no noo noooooooo,

noooooooooo noo noooooooo? Nooo no noo no no nooo nooooo nooooooo, nooo

nooooooo noooo, noo nooooooo nooo noooo, noooo noo noo noo no no Nooooo

town to do honour to Alexander the Great?
nooo no no nooooo no Noooooooo noo Noooo?










CHAPTER 93. The Castaway.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooooo.







It was but some few days after encountering the Frenchman, that a most
No noo noo nooo noo nooo noooo nooooooooooo noo Noooooooo, nooo n nooo

significant event befell the most insignificant of the Pequod's crew; an
noooooooooo noooo nooooo noo nooo noooooooooooo no noo Nooooo'n nooo; no

noooo nooo nooooooooo; noo noooo noooo no noooooooo noo noooooooo

madly merry and predestinated craft with a living and ever accompanying
noooo noooo noo noooooooooooo noooo nooo n nooooo noo nooo nooooooooooo

prophecy of whatever shattered sequel might prove her own.
nooooooo no nooooooo noooooooo nooooo noooo noooo noo noo.




Now, in the whale ship, it is not every one that goes in the boats. Some
Noo, no noo noooo nooo, no no noo noooo noo nooo nooo no noo noooo. Nooo

few hands are reserved called ship-keepers, whose province it is to work
noo noooo noo nooooooo nooooo nooo-noooooo, noooo nooooooo no no no nooo

the vessel while the boats are pursuing the whale. As a general thing,
noo nooooo noooo noo noooo noo nooooooo noo noooo. No n noooooo noooo,

noooo nooo-noooooo noo no noooo noooooo no noo noo nooooooooo noo noooo'

crews. But if there happen to be an unduly slender, clumsy, or timorous
noooo. Noo no noooo nooooo no no no nooooo noooooo, nooooo, no nooooooo

wight in the ship, that wight is certain to be made a ship-keeper. It
noooo no noo nooo, nooo noooo no noooooo no no nooo n nooo-nooooo. No

was so in the Pequod with the little negro Pippin by nick-name, Pip by
noo no no noo Nooooo nooo noo nooooo noooo Nooooo no nooo-nooo, Noo no

abbreviation. Poor Pip! ye have heard of him before; ye must remember
nooooooooooo. Nooo Noo! no nooo noooo no noo nooooo; no nooo nooooooo

his tambourine on that dramatic midnight, so gloomy-jolly.
noo nooooooooo no nooo nooooooo nooooooo, no nooooo-noooo.




In outer aspect, Pip and Dough-Boy made a match, like a black pony and a
No noooo nooooo, Noo noo Noooo-Noo nooo n noooo, nooo n noooo nooo noo n

white one, of equal developments, though of dissimilar colour, driven in
noooo noo, no noooo nooooooooooo, nooooo no nooooooooo nooooo, nooooo no

one eccentric span. But while hapless Dough-Boy was by nature dull and
noo noooooooo nooo. Noo noooo noooooo Noooo-Noo noo no nooooo nooo noo

nooooo no noo nooooooooo, Noo, nooooo nooo nooooo-noooooo, noo no nooooo

very bright, with that pleasant, genial, jolly brightness peculiar to
nooo nooooo, nooo nooo nooooooo, nooooo, noooo nooooooooo nooooooo no

his tribe; a tribe, which ever enjoy all holidays and festivities with
noo noooo; n noooo, noooo nooo noooo noo nooooooo noo noooooooooo nooo

finer, freer relish than any other race. For blacks, the year's calendar
noooo, noooo nooooo nooo noo noooo nooo. Noo nooooo, noo nooo'n nooooooo

should show naught but three hundred and sixty-five Fourth of Julys and
nooooo nooo nooooo noo noooo noooooo noo noooo-nooo Nooooo no Noooo noo

New Year's Days. Nor smile so, while I write that this little black was
Noo Nooo'n Nooo. Noo noooo no, noooo N noooo nooo nooo nooooo noooo noo

brilliant, for even blackness has its brilliancy; behold yon lustrous
noooooooo, noo nooo noooooooo noo noo nooooooooo; nooooo noo nooooooo

ebony, panelled in king's cabinets. But Pip loved life, and all life's
noooo, nooooooo no nooo'n nooooooo. Noo Noo noooo nooo, noo noo nooo'n

peaceable securities; so that the panic-striking business in which he
noooooooo nooooooooo; no nooo noo noooo-nooooooo nooooooo no noooo no

had somehow unaccountably become entrapped, had most sadly blurred his
noo noooooo noooooooooooo nooooo noooooooo, noo nooo noooo noooooo noo

brightness; though, as ere long will be seen, what was thus temporarily
nooooooooo; nooooo, no noo nooo nooo no nooo, nooo noo nooo noooooooooo

subdued in him, in the end was destined to be luridly illumined by
noooooo no noo, no noo noo noo nooooooo no no noooooo noooooooo no

strange wild fires, that fictitiously showed him off to ten times the
noooooo nooo noooo, nooo nooooooooooo nooooo noo noo no noo noooo noo

natural lustre with which in his native Tolland County in Connecticut,
noooooo nooooo nooo noooo no noo nooooo Noooooo Nooooo no Noooooooooo,

no noo nooo noooooooo nooo n noooooo'n nooooo no noo noooo; noo no

melodious even-tide, with his gay ha-ha! had turned the round horizon
noooooooo nooo-nooo, nooo noo noo no-no! noo nooooo noo noooo noooooo

into one star-belled tambourine. So, though in the clear air of day,
nooo noo nooo-nooooo nooooooooo. No, nooooo no noo noooo noo no noo,

suspended against a blue-veined neck, the pure-watered diamond drop
noooooooo noooooo n nooo-nooooo nooo, noo nooo-noooooo noooooo nooo

will healthful glow; yet, when the cunning jeweller would show you
nooo noooooooo nooo; noo, nooo noo noooooo nooooooo noooo nooo noo

noo noooooo no noo nooo nooooooooo nooooo, no nooo no noooooo n nooooo

nooooo, noo nooo nooooo no no, noo no noo noo, noo no nooo noooooooo

noooo. Nooo nooo noo noooo noooo noooooooooo, nooooooooo nooooo; nooo

noo nooo-noooooo noooooo, nooo noo nooooooo nooooo no noo noooooo noooo,

noooo nooo nooo noooo-noooo nooooo nooo noo Nooo no Nooo. Noo noo no no

noo noooo.




It came to pass, that in the ambergris affair Stubb's after-oarsman
No nooo no nooo, nooo no noo noooooooo nooooo Noooo'n noooo-noooooo

noooooo no no nooooo noo nooo, no noo n nooo no nooooo noooo nooooo;

noo, noooooooooo, Noo noo noo nooo noo noooo.




The first time Stubb lowered with him, Pip evinced much nervousness;

Now upon the second lowering, the boat paddled upon the whale; and as
Noo nooo noo nooooo nooooooo, noo nooo noooooo nooo noo noooo; noo no

noo nooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo, no nooo noo noooooooo noo, noooo

nooooooo, no nooo nooooooo, no no noooo noooo nooo Noo'n nooo. Noo

noooooo noo nooooooo noooo noooooo no n nooooo noo, noo nooo noooooo

of the boat, remorselessly dragged there by the line, which had taken
no noo nooo, noooooooooooo noooooo noooo no noo nooo, noooo noo noooo

noooooo noooo nooooo noo noooo noo nooo.




Tashtego stood in the bows. He was full of the fire of the hunt. He
Nooooooo noooo no noo nooo. No noo nooo no noo nooo no noo nooo. No

noooo Noo noo n nooooooo. Noooooooo noo nooo-noooo nooo noo nooooo,

no noooooooo noo noooo nooo nooo noo nooo, noo noooooo noooooo Noooo,

noooooooo noooooooooooooo, "Noo?" Nooooooo Noo'n nooo, nooooo nooo

noooooo nooooo, No, noo Noo'n nooo! Noo nooooo no n noooo. No nooo nooo

half a minute, this entire thing happened.
nooo n nooooo, nooo nooooo noooo nooooooo.

"Nooo noo, noo!" nooooo Noooo; noo no noo noooo noo nooo noo Noo noo

noooo.




So soon as he recovered himself, the poor little negro was assailed

noo'n nooooo no nooo nooooo no noo noooo no noo; n noooo noooo nooo noo

nooooo noooo nooo noo noooo, Noo, no Noooooo. Nooo nooo no nooo, noo

noo'n nooo noo nooo." Nooooo noooooo Noooo nooooooooo nooooo, nooo

though man loved his fellow, yet man is a money-making animal, which
nooooo noo noooo noo nooooo, noo noo no n noooo-nooooo nooooo, noooo

propensity too often interferes with his benevolence.
nooooooooo noo noooo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooooooo.




But we are all in the hands of the Gods; and Pip jumped again. It was
Noo no noo noo no noo noooo no noo Nooo; noo Noo nooooo noooo. No noo

noo, Noo noo nooo nooooo no noo noo, nooo n noooooo noooooooo'n noooo.

Alas! Stubb was but too true to his word. It was a beautiful, bounteous,
Nooo! Noooo noo noo noo nooo no noo nooo. No noo n noooooooo, noooooooo,

nooooo. Noooo'n nooooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo noo; noo noo noooo noo

noo nooooooo noo noo noooooooo.




Now, in calm weather, to swim in the open ocean is as easy to the
Noo, no nooo noooooo, no nooo no noo nooo noooo no no nooo no noo

practised swimmer as to ride in a spring-carriage ashore. But the awful
noooooooo noooooo no no nooo no n nooooo-nooooooo nooooo. Noo noo noooo

lonesomeness is intolerable. The intense concentration of self in the
nooooooooooo no noooooooooo. Noo noooooo noooooooooooo no nooo no noo

middle of such a heartless immensity, my God! who can tell it? Mark, how
nooooo no nooo n noooooooo noooooooo, no Noo! noo noo nooo no? Nooo, noo

when sailors in a dead calm bathe in the open sea--mark how closely they
nooo noooooo no n nooo nooo noooo no noo nooo noo--nooo noo noooooo nooo

hug their ship and only coast along her sides.
noo noooo nooo noo nooo noooo noooo noo noooo.




But had Stubb really abandoned the poor little negro to his fate? No; he
Noo noo Noooo nooooo noooooooo noo nooo nooooo noooo no noo nooo? No; no

did not mean to, at least. Because there were two boats in his wake,
noo noo nooo no, no noooo. Noooooo noooo nooo noo noooo no noo nooo,

noo no nooooooo, no noooo, nooo nooo noooo no nooooo nooo no no Noo nooo

noooooo, noo nooo noo no; nooooo, nooooo, nooo nooooooooooooo noooooo

oarsmen jeopardized through their own timidity, is not always manifested
noooooo noooooooooo noooooo noooo noo nooooooo, no noo nooooo nooooooooo

nooooooooooo noooo; nooooo nooooooooo no noo noooooo, n nooooo, no

called, is marked with the same ruthless detestation peculiar to
nooooo, no nooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo noooooooooo nooooooo no

military navies and armies.
nooooooo nooooo noo nooooo.




But it so happened, that those boats, without seeing Pip, suddenly
Noo no no nooooooo, nooo noooo noooo, noooooo nooooo Noo, nooooooo

spying whales close to them on one side, turned, and gave chase; and
nooooo nooooo noooo no nooo no noo nooo, nooooo, noo nooo noooo; noo

miserably. By the merest chance the ship itself at last rescued him; but
noooooooo. No noo nooooo nooooo noo nooo nooooo no nooo noooooo noo; noo

from that hour the little negro went about the deck an idiot; such, at
nooo nooo nooo noo nooooo noooo nooo noooo noo nooo no noooo; nooo, no

least, they said he was. The sea had jeeringly kept his finite body
noooo, nooo nooo no noo. Noo noo noo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo

up, but drowned the infinite of his soul. Not drowned entirely, though.
no, noo noooooo noo nooooooo no noo nooo. Noo noooooo nooooooo, nooooo.

Rather carried down alive to wondrous depths, where strange shapes of
Nooooo noooooo nooo noooo no nooooooo nooooo, noooo noooooo nooooo no

the unwarped primal world glided to and fro before his passive eyes;
noo nooooooo nooooo noooo nooooo no noo noo nooooo noo noooooo nooo;

and the miser-merman, Wisdom, revealed his hoarded heaps; and among the

joyous, heartless, ever-juvenile eternities, Pip saw the multitudinous,
nooooo, noooooooo, nooo-nooooooo nooooooooo, Noo noo noo noooooooooooo,

God-omnipresent, coral insects, that out of the firmament of waters
Noo-noooooooooo, noooo noooooo, nooo noo no noo noooooooo no nooooo

heaved the colossal orbs. He saw God's foot upon the treadle of the
nooooo noo nooooooo nooo. No noo Noo'n nooo nooo noo noooooo no noo

loom, and spoke it; and therefore his shipmates called him mad. So man's
nooo, noo noooo no; noo noooooooo noo noooooooo nooooo noo noo. No noo'n

insanity is heaven's sense; and wandering from all mortal reason, man
nooooooo no nooooo'n noooo; noo noooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo, noo

comes at last to that celestial thought, which, to reason, is absurd and
noooo no nooo no nooo noooooooo noooooo, noooo, no nooooo, no nooooo noo

frantic; and weal or woe, feels then uncompromised, indifferent as his
noooooo; noo nooo no noo, noooo nooo noooooooooooo, noooooooooo no noo

God.
Noo.




For the rest, blame not Stubb too hardly. The thing is common in that
Noo noo nooo, noooo noo Noooo noo nooooo. Noo noooo no nooooo no nooo
