nooo noooooooooo nooooo nooooo.










CHAPTER 94. A Squeeze of the Hand.
NOOOOOO no. N Noooooo no noo Nooo.







That whale of Stubb's, so dearly purchased, was duly brought to
Nooo noooo no Noooo'n, no nooooo noooooooo, noo nooo noooooo no

the Pequod's side, where all those cutting and hoisting operations
noo Nooooo'n nooo, noooo noo noooo noooooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo

previously detailed, were regularly gone through, even to the baling of
nooooooooo nooooooo, nooo noooooooo nooo noooooo, nooo no noo nooooo no

the Heidelburgh Tun, or Case.
noo Noooooooooo Noo, no Nooo.




While some were occupied with this latter duty, others were employed
Noooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo nooo nooooo nooo, nooooo nooo nooooooo

in dragging away the larger tubs, so soon as filled with the sperm; and
no nooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo, no nooo no nooooo nooo noo noooo; noo

when the proper time arrived, this same sperm was carefully manipulated
nooo noo nooooo nooo noooooo, nooo nooo noooo noo noooooooo noooooooooo

ere going to the try-works, of which anon.
noo noooo no noo noo-noooo, no noooo nooo.




It had cooled and crystallized to such a degree, that when, with several
No noo nooooo noo nooooooooooo no nooo n nooooo, nooo nooo, nooo noooooo

others, I sat down before a large Constantine's bath of it, I found
nooooo, N noo nooo nooooo n noooo Noooooooooo'n nooo no no, N noooo

it strangely concreted into lumps, here and there rolling about in the
no noooooooo noooooooo nooo noooo, nooo noo noooo noooooo noooo no noo

liquid part. It was our business to squeeze these lumps back into fluid.
nooooo nooo. No noo noo nooooooo no noooooo noooo noooo nooo nooo noooo.

A sweet and unctuous duty! No wonder that in old times this sperm was
N noooo noo nooooooo nooo! No nooooo nooo no noo noooo nooo noooo noo

such a favourite cosmetic. Such a clearer! such a sweetener! such a
nooo n noooooooo nooooooo. Nooo n noooooo! nooo n noooooooo! nooo n

softener! such a delicious molifier! After having my hands in it for
nooooooo! nooo n noooooooo nooooooo! Noooo nooooo no noooo no no noo

only a few minutes, my fingers felt like eels, and began, as it were, to
nooo n noo noooooo, no noooooo nooo nooo nooo, noo noooo, no no nooo, no

serpentine and spiralise.
nooooooooo noo noooooooo.




As I sat there at my ease, cross-legged on the deck; after the bitter
No N noo noooo no no nooo, noooo-nooooo no noo nooo; noooo noo nooooo

exertion at the windlass; under a blue tranquil sky; the ship under
nooooooo no noo nooooooo; noooo n nooo nooooooo noo; noo nooo noooo

indolent sail, and gliding so serenely along; as I bathed my hands among
nooooooo nooo, noo noooooo no nooooooo noooo; no N nooooo no noooo noooo

those soft, gentle globules of infiltrated tissues, woven almost within
noooo nooo, nooooo nooooooo no noooooooooo noooooo, noooo nooooo nooooo

the hour; as they richly broke to my fingers, and discharged all their
noo nooo; no nooo nooooo noooo no no noooooo, noo nooooooooo noo noooo

opulence, like fully ripe grapes their wine; as I snuffed up that
nooooooo, nooo noooo nooo nooooo noooo nooo; no N noooooo no nooo

uncontaminated aroma,--literally and truly, like the smell of spring
nooooooooooooo noooo,--noooooooo noo noooo, nooo noo noooo no nooooo

violets; I declare to you, that for the time I lived as in a musky
noooooo; N noooooo no noo, nooo noo noo nooo N noooo no no n noooo

meadow; I forgot all about our horrible oath; in that inexpressible
nooooo; N nooooo noo noooo noo nooooooo nooo; no nooo noooooooooooo

sperm, I washed my hands and my heart of it; I almost began to credit
noooo, N nooooo no noooo noo no noooo no no; N nooooo noooo no nooooo

the old Paracelsan superstition that sperm is of rare virtue in allaying
noo noo Nooooooooo nooooooooooo nooo noooo no no nooo nooooo no nooooooo

the heat of anger; while bathing in that bath, I felt divinely free from
noo nooo no noooo; noooo noooooo no nooo nooo, N nooo nooooooo nooo nooo

all ill-will, or petulance, or malice, of any sort whatsoever.
noo noo-nooo, no noooooooo, no nooooo, no noo nooo nooooooooo.




Squeeze! squeeze! squeeze! all the morning long; I squeezed that sperm
Noooooo! noooooo! noooooo! noo noo noooooo nooo; N nooooooo nooo noooo

till I myself almost melted into it; I squeezed that sperm till a
nooo N nooooo nooooo nooooo nooo no; N nooooooo nooo noooo nooo n

strange sort of insanity came over me; and I found myself unwittingly
noooooo nooo no nooooooo nooo nooo no; noo N noooo nooooo noooooooooo

squeezing my co-laborers' hands in it, mistaking their hands for the
noooooooo no no-nooooooo' noooo no no, noooooooo noooo noooo noo noo

gentle globules. Such an abounding, affectionate, friendly, loving
nooooo nooooooo. Nooo no noooooooo, nooooooooooo, nooooooo, nooooo

feeling did this avocation beget; that at last I was continually
noooooo noo nooo noooooooo noooo; nooo no nooo N noo noooooooooo

squeezing their hands, and looking up into their eyes sentimentally; as
noooooooo noooo noooo, noo noooooo no nooo noooo nooo noooooooooooo; no

much as to say,--Oh! my dear fellow beings, why should we longer cherish
nooo no no noo,--No! no nooo nooooo nooooo, noo nooooo no nooooo noooooo

any social acerbities, or know the slightest ill-humor or envy! Come;
noo nooooo nooooooooo, no nooo noo noooooooo noo-noooo no nooo! Nooo;

let us squeeze hands all round; nay, let us all squeeze ourselves into
noo no noooooo noooo noo noooo; noo, noo no noo noooooo noooooooo nooo

each other; let us squeeze ourselves universally into the very milk and
nooo noooo; noo no noooooo noooooooo noooooooooo nooo noo nooo nooo noo

sperm of kindness.
noooo no nooooooo.




Would that I could keep squeezing that sperm for ever! For now, since by
Noooo nooo N noooo nooo noooooooo nooo noooo noo nooo! Noo noo, noooo no

many prolonged, repeated experiences, I have perceived that in all cases
nooo noooooooo, nooooooo noooooooooo, N nooo noooooooo nooo no noo noooo

man must eventually lower, or at least shift, his conceit of attainable
noo nooo nooooooooo noooo, no no noooo noooo, noo noooooo no nooooooooo

felicity; not placing it anywhere in the intellect or the fancy; but in
nooooooo; noo noooooo no nooooooo no noo noooooooo no noo noooo; noo no

the wife, the heart, the bed, the table, the saddle, the fireside, the
noo nooo, noo noooo, noo noo, noo noooo, noo nooooo, noo nooooooo, noo

country; now that I have perceived all this, I am ready to squeeze case
noooooo; noo nooo N nooo noooooooo noo nooo, N no noooo no noooooo nooo

eternally. In thoughts of the visions of the night, I saw long rows of
noooooooo. No nooooooo no noo noooooo no noo noooo, N noo nooo nooo no

angels in paradise, each with his hands in a jar of spermaceti.
nooooo no nooooooo, nooo nooo noo noooo no n noo no nooooooooo.




Now, while discoursing of sperm, it behooves to speak of other things
Noo, noooo noooooooooo no noooo, no nooooooo no noooo no noooo nooooo

akin to it, in the business of preparing the sperm whale for the
nooo no no, no noo nooooooo no noooooooo noo noooo noooo noo noo

try-works.
noo-noooo.




First comes white-horse, so called, which is obtained from the tapering
Noooo noooo noooo-noooo, no nooooo, noooo no nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo

part of the fish, and also from the thicker portions of his flukes. It
nooo no noo nooo, noo nooo nooo noo noooooo nooooooo no noo nooooo. No

is tough with congealed tendons--a wad of muscle--but still contains
no noooo nooo noooooooo noooooo--n noo no nooooo--noo noooo nooooooo

some oil. After being severed from the whale, the white-horse is first
nooo noo. Noooo noooo noooooo nooo noo noooo, noo noooo-noooo no noooo

cut into portable oblongs ere going to the mincer. They look much like
noo nooo nooooooo noooooo noo noooo no noo nooooo. Nooo nooo nooo nooo

blocks of Berkshire marble.
nooooo no Noooooooo nooooo.




Plum-pudding is the term bestowed upon certain fragmentary parts of the
Nooo-noooooo no noo nooo nooooooo nooo noooooo noooooooooo noooo no noo

whale's flesh, here and there adhering to the blanket of blubber, and
noooo'n noooo, nooo noo noooo nooooooo no noo noooooo no noooooo, noo

often participating to a considerable degree in its unctuousness. It is
noooo noooooooooooo no n nooooooooooo nooooo no noo nooooooooooo. No no

a most refreshing, convivial, beautiful object to behold. As its name
n nooo nooooooooo, noooooooo, noooooooo nooooo no nooooo. No noo nooo

imports, it is of an exceedingly rich, mottled tint, with a bestreaked
noooooo, no no no no noooooooooo nooo, noooooo nooo, nooo n nooooooooo

snowy and golden ground, dotted with spots of the deepest crimson and
noooo noo nooooo nooooo, nooooo nooo noooo no noo noooooo noooooo noo

purple. It is plums of rubies, in pictures of citron. Spite of reason,
nooooo. No no noooo no nooooo, no nooooooo no nooooo. Noooo no nooooo,

it is hard to keep yourself from eating it. I confess, that once I stole
no no nooo no nooo nooooooo nooo nooooo no. N noooooo, nooo nooo N noooo

behind the foremast to try it. It tasted something as I should conceive
nooooo noo nooooooo no noo no. No nooooo noooooooo no N nooooo nooooooo

a royal cutlet from the thigh of Louis le Gros might have tasted,
n noooo nooooo nooo noo noooo no Noooo no Nooo noooo nooo nooooo,

supposing him to have been killed the first day after the venison
noooooooo noo no nooo nooo nooooo noo noooo noo noooo noo noooooo

season, and that particular venison season contemporary with an
nooooo, noo nooo nooooooooo noooooo nooooo nooooooooooo nooo no

unusually fine vintage of the vineyards of Champagne.
noooooooo nooo noooooo no noo noooooooo no Noooooooo.




There is another substance, and a very singular one, which turns up in
Noooo no noooooo noooooooo, noo n nooo nooooooo noo, noooo noooo no no

the course of this business, but which I feel it to be very puzzling
noo nooooo no nooo nooooooo, noo noooo N nooo no no no nooo nooooooo

adequately to describe. It is called slobgollion; an appellation
nooooooooo no nooooooo. No no nooooo noooooooooo; no noooooooooo

original with the whalemen, and even so is the nature of the substance.
nooooooo nooo noo nooooooo, noo nooo no no noo nooooo no noo noooooooo.

It is an ineffably oozy, stringy affair, most frequently found in the
No no no noooooooo nooo, noooooo nooooo, nooo nooooooooo noooo no noo

tubs of sperm, after a prolonged squeezing, and subsequent decanting.
nooo no noooo, noooo n noooooooo noooooooo, noo nooooooooo noooooooo.

I hold it to be the wondrously thin, ruptured membranes of the case,
N nooo no no no noo nooooooooo nooo, nooooooo noooooooo no noo nooo,

coalescing.
nooooooooo.




Gurry, so called, is a term properly belonging to right whalemen, but
Noooo, no nooooo, no n nooo nooooooo noooooooo no noooo nooooooo, noo

sometimes incidentally used by the sperm fishermen. It designates the
noooooooo nooooooooooo nooo no noo noooo noooooooo. No nooooooooo noo

dark, glutinous substance which is scraped off the back of the Greenland
nooo, noooooooo noooooooo noooo no noooooo noo noo nooo no noo Noooooooo

or right whale, and much of which covers the decks of those inferior
no noooo noooo, noo nooo no noooo nooooo noo noooo no noooo nooooooo

souls who hunt that ignoble Leviathan.
noooo noo nooo nooo noooooo Noooooooo.




Nippers. Strictly this word is not indigenous to the whale's vocabulary.
Noooooo. Nooooooo nooo nooo no noo nooooooooo no noo noooo'n nooooooooo.

But as applied by whalemen, it becomes so. A whaleman's nipper is
Noo no noooooo no nooooooo, no noooooo no. N nooooooo'n nooooo no

a short firm strip of tendinous stuff cut from the tapering part of
n noooo nooo noooo no noooooooo noooo noo nooo noo nooooooo nooo no

Leviathan's tail: it averages an inch in thickness, and for the rest, is
Noooooooo'n nooo: no nooooooo no nooo no noooooooo, noo noo noo nooo, no

about the size of the iron part of a hoe. Edgewise moved along the
noooo noo nooo no noo nooo nooo no n noo. Nooooooo noooo noooo noo

oily deck, it operates like a leathern squilgee; and by nameless
nooo nooo, no nooooooo nooo n nooooooo nooooooo; noo no nooooooo

blandishments, as of magic, allures along with it all impurities.
noooooooooooo, no no noooo, noooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooooooo.




But to learn all about these recondite matters, your best way is at once
Noo no noooo noo noooo noooo noooooooo noooooo, nooo nooo noo no no nooo

to descend into the blubber-room, and have a long talk with its inmates.
no noooooo nooo noo noooooo-nooo, noo nooo n nooo nooo nooo noo noooooo.

This place has previously been mentioned as the receptacle for the
Nooo noooo noo nooooooooo nooo noooooooo no noo nooooooooo noo noo

blanket-pieces, when stript and hoisted from the whale. When the proper
noooooo-nooooo, nooo nooooo noo noooooo nooo noo noooo. Nooo noo nooooo

time arrives for cutting up its contents, this apartment is a scene of
nooo noooooo noo noooooo no noo nooooooo, nooo noooooooo no n noooo no

terror to all tyros, especially by night. On one side, lit by a dull
nooooo no noo noooo, nooooooooo no noooo. No noo nooo, noo no n nooo

lantern, a space has been left clear for the workmen. They generally
noooooo, n noooo noo nooo nooo noooo noo noo noooooo. Nooo noooooooo

go in pairs,--a pike-and-gaffman and a spade-man. The whaling-pike is
no no noooo,--n nooo-noo-noooooo noo n noooo-noo. Noo noooooo-nooo no

similar to a frigate's boarding-weapon of the same name. The gaff is
noooooo no n noooooo'n nooooooo-nooooo no noo nooo nooo. Noo nooo no

something like a boat-hook. With his gaff, the gaffman hooks on to a
noooooooo nooo n nooo-nooo. Nooo noo nooo, noo noooooo noooo no no n

sheet of blubber, and strives to hold it from slipping, as the ship
noooo no noooooo, noo noooooo no nooo no nooo nooooooo, no noo nooo

pitches and lurches about. Meanwhile, the spade-man stands on the sheet
noooooo noo noooooo noooo. Noooooooo, noo noooo-noo nooooo no noo noooo

itself, perpendicularly chopping it into the portable horse-pieces. This
nooooo, noooooooooooooo nooooooo no nooo noo nooooooo noooo-nooooo. Nooo

spade is sharp as hone can make it; the spademan's feet are shoeless;
noooo no noooo no nooo noo nooo no; noo nooooooo'n nooo noo nooooooo;

the thing he stands on will sometimes irresistibly slide away from
noo noooo no nooooo no nooo noooooooo nooooooooooo noooo nooo nooo

him, like a sledge. If he cuts off one of his own toes, or one of his
noo, nooo n nooooo. No no nooo noo noo no noo noo nooo, no noo no noo

assistants', would you be very much astonished? Toes are scarce among
nooooooooo', noooo noo no nooo nooo nooooooooo? Nooo noo nooooo noooo

veteran blubber-room men.
noooooo noooooo-nooo noo.










CHAPTER 95. The Cassock.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noooooo.







Had you stepped on board the Pequod at a certain juncture of this
Noo noo noooooo no noooo noo Nooooo no n noooooo nooooooo no nooo

post-mortemizing of the whale; and had you strolled forward nigh the
nooo-noooooooooo no noo noooo; noo noo noo nooooooo noooooo nooo noo

windlass, pretty sure am I that you would have scanned with no small
nooooooo, nooooo nooo no N nooo noo noooo nooo noooooo nooo no noooo

curiosity a very strange, enigmatical object, which you would have seen
noooooooo n nooo noooooo, noooooooooo nooooo, noooo noo noooo nooo nooo

there, lying along lengthwise in the lee scuppers. Not the wondrous
noooo, noooo noooo nooooooooo no noo noo nooooooo. Noo noo nooooooo

cistern in the whale's huge head; not the prodigy of his unhinged lower
noooooo no noo noooo'n nooo nooo; noo noo noooooo no noo nooooooo noooo

jaw; not the miracle of his symmetrical tail; none of these would so
noo; noo noo noooooo no noo noooooooooo nooo; nooo no noooo noooo no

surprise you, as half a glimpse of that unaccountable cone,--longer than
nooooooo noo, no nooo n noooooo no nooo noooooooooooo nooo,--nooooo nooo

a Kentuckian is tall, nigh a foot in diameter at the base, and jet-black
n Nooooooooo no nooo, nooo n nooo no nooooooo no noo nooo, noo noo-noooo

as Yojo, the ebony idol of Queequeg. And an idol, indeed, it is; or,
no Nooo, noo noooo nooo no Nooooooo. Noo no nooo, nooooo, no no; no,

rather, in old times, its likeness was. Such an idol as that found in
nooooo, no noo noooo, noo nooooooo noo. Nooo no nooo no nooo noooo no

the secret groves of Queen Maachah in Judea; and for worshipping which,
noo nooooo nooooo no Noooo Noooooo no Noooo; noo noo noooooooooo noooo,

King Asa, her son, did depose her, and destroyed the idol, and burnt it
Nooo Noo, noo noo, noo nooooo noo, noo noooooooo noo nooo, noo noooo no

for an abomination at the brook Kedron, as darkly set forth in the 15th
noo no noooooooooo no noo noooo Nooooo, no nooooo noo noooo no noo nooo

chapter of the First Book of Kings.
noooooo no noo Noooo Nooo no Noooo.




Look at the sailor, called the mincer, who now comes along, and assisted
Nooo no noo nooooo, nooooo noo nooooo, noo noo noooo noooo, noo nooooooo

by two allies, heavily backs the grandissimus, as the mariners call it,
no noo nooooo, noooooo noooo noo nooooooooooo, no noo nooooooo nooo no,

and with bowed shoulders, staggers off with it as if he were a grenadier
noo nooo noooo noooooooo, nooooooo noo nooo no no no no nooo n noooooooo

carrying a dead comrade from the field. Extending it upon the forecastle
nooooooo n nooo noooooo nooo noo noooo. Noooooooo no nooo noo nooooooooo

deck, he now proceeds cylindrically to remove its dark pelt, as an
nooo, no noo nooooooo noooooooooooo no nooooo noo nooo nooo, no no

African hunter the pelt of a boa. This done he turns the pelt inside
Noooooo nooooo noo nooo no n noo. Nooo nooo no noooo noo nooo nooooo

out, like a pantaloon leg; gives it a good stretching, so as almost to
noo, nooo n noooooooo noo; noooo no n nooo nooooooooo, no no nooooo no

double its diameter; and at last hangs it, well spread, in the rigging,
nooooo noo nooooooo; noo no nooo noooo no, nooo nooooo, no noo noooooo,

to dry. Ere long, it is taken down; when removing some three feet of it,
no noo. Noo nooo, no no noooo nooo; nooo nooooooo nooo noooo nooo no no,

towards the pointed extremity, and then cutting two slits for arm-holes
noooooo noo noooooo noooooooo, noo nooo noooooo noo noooo noo noo-noooo

at the other end, he lengthwise slips himself bodily into it. The mincer
no noo noooo noo, no nooooooooo noooo noooooo nooooo nooo no. Noo nooooo

now stands before you invested in the full canonicals of his calling.
noo nooooo nooooo noo nooooooo no noo nooo nooooooooo no noo noooooo.

Immemorial to all his order, this investiture alone will adequately
Nooooooooo no noo noo noooo, nooo noooooooooo noooo nooo nooooooooo

protect him, while employed in the peculiar functions of his office.
noooooo noo, noooo nooooooo no noo nooooooo noooooooo no noo nooooo.




That office consists in mincing the horse-pieces of blubber for the
Nooo nooooo nooooooo no noooooo noo noooo-nooooo no noooooo noo noo

pots; an operation which is conducted at a curious wooden horse, planted
nooo; no noooooooo noooo no noooooooo no n noooooo nooooo noooo, noooooo

endwise against the bulwarks, and with a capacious tub beneath it, into
noooooo noooooo noo nooooooo, noo nooo n noooooooo noo noooooo no, nooo

which the minced pieces drop, fast as the sheets from a rapt orator's
noooo noo nooooo nooooo nooo, nooo no noo nooooo nooo n nooo nooooo'n

desk. Arrayed in decent black; occupying a conspicuous pulpit; intent
nooo. Noooooo no nooooo noooo; noooooooo n noooooooooo nooooo; nooooo

on bible leaves; what a candidate for an archbishopric, what a lad for a
no noooo nooooo; nooo n noooooooo noo no noooooooooooo, nooo n noo noo n

Pope were this mincer!*
Nooo nooo nooo nooooo!*







*Bible leaves! Bible leaves! This is the invariable cry from the mates
*Noooo nooooo! Noooo nooooo! Nooo no noo nooooooooo noo nooo noo noooo

to the mincer. It enjoins him to be careful, and cut his work into as
no noo nooooo. No noooooo noo no no noooooo, noo noo noo nooo nooo no

thin slices as possible, inasmuch as by so doing the business of
nooo nooooo no nooooooo, nooooooo no no no noooo noo nooooooo no

boiling out the oil is much accelerated, and its quantity considerably
noooooo noo noo noo no nooo noooooooooo, noo noo nooooooo nooooooooooo

increased, besides perhaps improving it in quality.
noooooooo, noooooo noooooo noooooooo no no noooooo.










CHAPTER 96. The Try-Works.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Noo-Noooo.







Besides her hoisted boats, an American whaler is outwardly distinguished
Noooooo noo noooooo noooo, no Nooooooo nooooo no noooooooo noooooooooooo

by her try-works. She presents the curious anomaly of the most solid
no noo noo-noooo. Noo nooooooo noo noooooo noooooo no noo nooo noooo

masonry joining with oak and hemp in constituting the completed ship.
noooooo noooooo nooo noo noo nooo no nooooooooooo noo noooooooo nooo.

It is as if from the open field a brick-kiln were transported to her
No no no no nooo noo nooo noooo n noooo-nooo nooo noooooooooo no noo

planks.
nooooo.




The try-works are planted between the foremast and mainmast, the most
Noo noo-noooo noo noooooo noooooo noo nooooooo noo nooooooo, noo nooo

roomy part of the deck. The timbers beneath are of a peculiar strength,
noooo nooo no noo nooo. Noo noooooo noooooo noo no n nooooooo nooooooo,

fitted to sustain the weight of an almost solid mass of brick and
nooooo no noooooo noo nooooo no no nooooo noooo nooo no noooo noo

mortar, some ten feet by eight square, and five in height. The
nooooo, nooo noo nooo no noooo nooooo, noo nooo no nooooo. Noo

foundation does not penetrate the deck, but the masonry is firmly
nooooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noo nooo, noo noo noooooo no nooooo

secured to the surface by ponderous knees of iron bracing it on all
noooooo no noo noooooo no noooooooo noooo no nooo noooooo no no noo

sides, and screwing it down to the timbers. On the flanks it is cased
noooo, noo nooooooo no nooo no noo noooooo. No noo nooooo no no noooo

with wood, and at top completely covered by a large, sloping, battened
nooo nooo, noo no noo nooooooooo noooooo no n noooo, noooooo, nooooooo

hatchway. Removing this hatch we expose the great try-pots, two in
nooooooo. Nooooooo nooo noooo no nooooo noo noooo noo-nooo, noo no

number, and each of several barrels' capacity. When not in use, they are
nooooo, noo nooo no noooooo noooooo' nooooooo. Nooo noo no noo, nooo noo

kept remarkably clean. Sometimes they are polished with soapstone
nooo nooooooooo noooo. Noooooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo noooooooo

and sand, till they shine within like silver punch-bowls. During the
noo nooo, nooo nooo noooo nooooo nooo nooooo noooo-noooo. Nooooo noo

night-watches some cynical old sailors will crawl into them and coil
noooo-noooooo nooo noooooo noo noooooo nooo noooo nooo nooo noo nooo

themselves away there for a nap. While employed in polishing them--one
nooooooooo nooo noooo noo n noo. Noooo nooooooo no noooooooo nooo--noo

man in each pot, side by side--many confidential communications
noo no nooo noo, nooo no nooo--nooo nooooooooooo nooooooooooooo

are carried on, over the iron lips. It is a place also for profound
noo noooooo no, nooo noo nooo nooo. No no n noooo nooo noo nooooooo

mathematical meditation. It was in the left hand try-pot of the Pequod,
nooooooooooo nooooooooo. No noo no noo nooo nooo noo-noo no noo Nooooo,

with the soapstone diligently circling round me, that I was first
nooo noo noooooooo nooooooooo nooooooo noooo no, nooo N noo noooo

indirectly struck by the remarkable fact, that in geometry all bodies
nooooooooo nooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo, nooo no nooooooo noo nooooo

gliding along the cycloid, my soapstone for example, will descend from
noooooo noooo noo noooooo, no noooooooo noo noooooo, nooo noooooo nooo

any point in precisely the same time.
noo noooo no noooooooo noo nooo nooo.




Removing the fire-board from the front of the try-works, the bare
Nooooooo noo nooo-noooo nooo noo noooo no noo noo-noooo, noo nooo

masonry of that side is exposed, penetrated by the two iron mouths of
noooooo no nooo nooo no noooooo, nooooooooo no noo noo nooo nooooo no

the furnaces, directly underneath the pots. These mouths are fitted
noo nooooooo, nooooooo nooooooooo noo nooo. Noooo nooooo noo nooooo

with heavy doors of iron. The intense heat of the fire is prevented
nooo noooo noooo no nooo. Noo noooooo nooo no noo nooo no noooooooo

from communicating itself to the deck, by means of a shallow reservoir
nooo noooooooooooo nooooo no noo nooo, no noooo no n noooooo noooooooo

extending under the entire inclosed surface of the works. By a tunnel
noooooooo noooo noo nooooo nooooooo noooooo no noo noooo. No n nooooo

inserted at the rear, this reservoir is kept replenished with water as
nooooooo no noo nooo, nooo noooooooo no nooo noooooooooo nooo noooo no

fast as it evaporates. There are no external chimneys; they open direct
nooo no no nooooooooo. Noooo noo no nooooooo nooooooo; nooo nooo nooooo

from the rear wall. And here let us go back for a moment.
nooo noo nooo nooo. Noo nooo noo no no nooo noo n nooooo.




It was about nine o'clock at night that the Pequod's try-works were
No noo noooo nooo n'noooo no noooo nooo noo Nooooo'n noo-noooo nooo

first started on this present voyage. It belonged to Stubb to oversee
noooo noooooo no nooo noooooo nooooo. No nooooooo no Noooo no noooooo

the business.
noo nooooooo.




"All ready there? Off hatch, then, and start her. You cook, fire the
"Noo noooo noooo? Noo noooo, nooo, noo noooo noo. Noo nooo, nooo noo

works." This was an easy thing, for the carpenter had been thrusting his
noooo." Nooo noo no nooo noooo, noo noo noooooooo noo nooo noooooooo noo

shavings into the furnace throughout the passage. Here be it said that
nooooooo nooo noo noooooo nooooooooo noo noooooo. Nooo no no nooo nooo

in a whaling voyage the first fire in the try-works has to be fed for a
no n noooooo nooooo noo noooo nooo no noo noo-noooo noo no no noo noo n

time with wood. After that no wood is used, except as a means of quick
nooo nooo nooo. Noooo nooo no nooo no nooo, nooooo no n noooo no noooo

ignition to the staple fuel. In a word, after being tried out, the
nooooooo no noo nooooo nooo. No n nooo, noooo noooo noooo noo, noo

crisp, shrivelled blubber, now called scraps or fritters, still contains
noooo, nooooooooo noooooo, noo nooooo nooooo no nooooooo, noooo nooooooo

considerable of its unctuous properties. These fritters feed the flames.
nooooooooooo no noo nooooooo nooooooooo. Noooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo.

Like a plethoric burning martyr, or a self-consuming misanthrope, once
Nooo n noooooooo noooooo nooooo, no n nooo-noooooooo noooooooooo, nooo

ignited, the whale supplies his own fuel and burns by his own body.
noooooo, noo noooo nooooooo noo noo nooo noo noooo no noo noo nooo.

Would that he consumed his own smoke! for his smoke is horrible to
Noooo nooo no nooooooo noo noo noooo! noo noo noooo no nooooooo no

inhale, and inhale it you must, and not only that, but you must live in
nooooo, noo nooooo no noo nooo, noo noo nooo nooo, noo noo nooo nooo no

it for the time. It has an unspeakable, wild, Hindoo odor about it, such
no noo noo nooo. No noo no noooooooooo, nooo, Nooooo nooo noooo no, nooo

as may lurk in the vicinity of funereal pyres. It smells like the left
no noo nooo no noo nooooooo no nooooooo noooo. No nooooo nooo noo nooo

wing of the day of judgment; it is an argument for the pit.
nooo no noo noo no nooooooo; no no no nooooooo noo noo noo.




By midnight the works were in full operation. We were clear from the
No nooooooo noo noooo nooo no nooo noooooooo. No nooo noooo nooo noo

carcase; sail had been made; the wind was freshening; the wild ocean
noooooo; nooo noo nooo nooo; noo nooo noo nooooooooo; noo nooo noooo

darkness was intense. But that darkness was licked up by the fierce
nooooooo noo noooooo. Noo nooo nooooooo noo nooooo no no noo nooooo

flames, which at intervals forked forth from the sooty flues, and
nooooo, noooo no noooooooo nooooo noooo nooo noo noooo noooo, noo

illuminated every lofty rope in the rigging, as with the famed Greek
noooooooooo noooo noooo nooo no noo noooooo, no nooo noo noooo Noooo

fire. The burning ship drove on, as if remorselessly commissioned to
nooo. Noo noooooo nooo noooo no, no no noooooooooooo nooooooooooo no

some vengeful deed. So the pitch and sulphur-freighted brigs of the
nooo nooooooo nooo. No noo noooo noo noooooo-noooooooo noooo no noo

bold Hydriote, Canaris, issuing from their midnight harbors, with broad
nooo Nooooooo, Noooooo, noooooo nooo noooo nooooooo noooooo, nooo noooo

sheets of flame for sails, bore down upon the Turkish frigates, and
nooooo no noooo noo noooo, nooo nooo nooo noo Noooooo nooooooo, noo

folded them in conflagrations.
nooooo nooo no nooooooooooooo.




The hatch, removed from the top of the works, now afforded a wide hearth
Noo noooo, noooooo nooo noo noo no noo noooo, noo nooooooo n nooo nooooo

in front of them. Standing on this were the Tartarean shapes of the
no noooo no nooo. Nooooooo no nooo nooo noo Noooooooo nooooo no noo

pagan harpooneers, always the whale-ship's stokers. With huge pronged
noooo noooooooooo, nooooo noo noooo-nooo'n noooooo. Nooo nooo noooooo

poles they pitched hissing masses of blubber into the scalding pots, or
noooo nooo noooooo noooooo nooooo no noooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo, no

stirred up the fires beneath, till the snaky flames darted, curling, out
noooooo no noo noooo noooooo, nooo noo noooo nooooo nooooo, noooooo, noo

of the doors to catch them by the feet. The smoke rolled away in sullen
no noo noooo no noooo nooo no noo nooo. Noo noooo nooooo nooo no nooooo

heaps. To every pitch of the ship there was a pitch of the boiling oil,
noooo. No noooo noooo no noo nooo noooo noo n noooo no noo noooooo noo,

which seemed all eagerness to leap into their faces. Opposite the mouth
noooo nooooo noo noooooooo no nooo nooo noooo noooo. Nooooooo noo noooo

of the works, on the further side of the wide wooden hearth, was the
no noo noooo, no noo noooooo nooo no noo nooo nooooo nooooo, noo noo

windlass. This served for a sea-sofa. Here lounged the watch, when not
nooooooo. Nooo nooooo noo n noo-nooo. Nooo noooooo noo noooo, nooo noo

otherwise employed, looking into the red heat of the fire, till their
noooooooo nooooooo, noooooo nooo noo noo nooo no noo nooo, nooo noooo

eyes felt scorched in their heads. Their tawny features, now all
nooo nooo nooooooo no noooo noooo. Noooo noooo nooooooo, noo noo

begrimed with smoke and sweat, their matted beards, and the contrasting
nooooooo nooo noooo noo noooo, noooo nooooo nooooo, noo noo noooooooooo

barbaric brilliancy of their teeth, all these were strangely revealed in
nooooooo nooooooooo no noooo noooo, noo noooo nooo noooooooo nooooooo no

the capricious emblazonings of the works. As they narrated to each other
noo nooooooooo nooooooooooo no noo noooo. No nooo nooooooo no nooo noooo

their unholy adventures, their tales of terror told in words of mirth;
noooo nooooo nooooooooo, noooo noooo no nooooo nooo no noooo no noooo;

as their uncivilized laughter forked upwards out of them, like the
no noooo noooooooooo nooooooo nooooo noooooo noo no nooo, nooo noo

flames from the furnace; as to and fro, in their front, the harpooneers
nooooo nooo noo noooooo; no no noo noo, no noooo noooo, noo noooooooooo

wildly gesticulated with their huge pronged forks and dippers; as the
nooooo nooooooooooo nooo noooo nooo noooooo noooo noo noooooo; no noo

wind howled on, and the sea leaped, and the ship groaned and dived, and
nooo nooooo no, noo noo noo nooooo, noo noo nooo noooooo noo noooo, noo

yet steadfastly shot her red hell further and further into the blackness
noo noooooooooo nooo noo noo nooo noooooo noo noooooo nooo noo noooooooo

of the sea and the night, and scornfully champed the white bone in
no noo noo noo noo noooo, noo nooooooooo noooooo noo noooo nooo no

her mouth, and viciously spat round her on all sides; then the rushing
noo noooo, noo noooooooo nooo noooo noo no noo noooo; nooo noo noooooo

Pequod, freighted with savages, and laden with fire, and burning
Nooooo, noooooooo nooo noooooo, noo noooo nooo nooo, noo noooooo

a corpse, and plunging into that blackness of darkness, seemed the
n nooooo, noo nooooooo nooo nooo noooooooo no nooooooo, nooooo noo

material counterpart of her monomaniac commander's soul.
nooooooo noooooooooo no noo nooooooooo noooooooo'n nooo.




So seemed it to me, as I stood at her helm, and for long hours silently
No nooooo no no no, no N noooo no noo nooo, noo noo nooo noooo nooooooo

guided the way of this fire-ship on the sea. Wrapped, for that interval,
nooooo noo noo no nooo nooo-nooo no noo noo. Noooooo, noo nooo nooooooo,

in darkness myself, I but the better saw the redness, the madness, the
no nooooooo nooooo, N noo noo nooooo noo noo noooooo, noo noooooo, noo

ghastliness of others. The continual sight of the fiend shapes before
noooooooooo no nooooo. Noo noooooooo noooo no noo noooo nooooo nooooo

me, capering half in smoke and half in fire, these at last begat kindred
no, nooooooo nooo no noooo noo nooo no nooo, noooo no nooo noooo noooooo

visions in my soul, so soon as I began to yield to that unaccountable
noooooo no no nooo, no nooo no N noooo no noooo no nooo noooooooooooo

drowsiness which ever would come over me at a midnight helm.
nooooooooo noooo nooo noooo nooo nooo no no n nooooooo nooo.




But that night, in particular, a strange (and ever since inexplicable)
Noo nooo noooo, no nooooooooo, n noooooo (noo nooo noooo nooooooooooo)

thing occurred to me. Starting from a brief standing sleep, I was
noooo nooooooo no no. Nooooooo nooo n noooo nooooooo noooo, N noo

horribly conscious of something fatally wrong. The jaw-bone tiller smote
nooooooo noooooooo no noooooooo noooooo noooo. Noo noo-nooo nooooo noooo

my side, which leaned against it; in my ears was the low hum of sails,
no nooo, noooo nooooo noooooo no; no no nooo noo noo noo noo no noooo,

just beginning to shake in the wind; I thought my eyes were open; I
nooo noooooooo no noooo no noo nooo; N noooooo no nooo nooo nooo; N

was half conscious of putting my fingers to the lids and mechanically
noo nooo noooooooo no noooooo no noooooo no noo nooo noo nooooooooooo

stretching them still further apart. But, spite of all this, I could see
nooooooooo nooo noooo noooooo noooo. Noo, noooo no noo nooo, N noooo noo

no compass before me to steer by; though it seemed but a minute since I
no noooooo nooooo no no noooo no; nooooo no nooooo noo n nooooo noooo N

had been watching the card, by the steady binnacle lamp illuminating it.
noo nooo nooooooo noo nooo, no noo nooooo nooooooo nooo nooooooooooo no.

Nothing seemed before me but a jet gloom, now and then made ghastly by
Noooooo nooooo nooooo no noo n noo noooo, noo noo nooo nooo noooooo no

flashes of redness. Uppermost was the impression, that whatever swift,
noooooo no noooooo. Noooooooo noo noo nooooooooo, nooo nooooooo noooo,

rushing thing I stood on was not so much bound to any haven ahead as
noooooo noooo N noooo no noo noo no nooo noooo no noo noooo noooo no

rushing from all havens astern. A stark, bewildered feeling, as of
noooooo nooo noo nooooo nooooo. N noooo, nooooooooo noooooo, no no

death, came over me. Convulsively my hands grasped the tiller, but with
noooo, nooo nooo no. Nooooooooooo no noooo noooooo noo nooooo, noo nooo

the crazy conceit that the tiller was, somehow, in some enchanted way,
noo noooo noooooo nooo noo nooooo noo, noooooo, no nooo noooooooo noo,

inverted. My God! what is the matter with me? thought I. Lo! in my brief
nooooooo. No Noo! nooo no noo nooooo nooo no? noooooo N. No! no no noooo

sleep I had turned myself about, and was fronting the ship's stern, with
noooo N noo nooooo nooooo noooo, noo noo nooooooo noo nooo'n noooo, nooo

my back to her prow and the compass. In an instant I faced back, just
no nooo no noo nooo noo noo noooooo. No no noooooo N noooo nooo, nooo

in time to prevent the vessel from flying up into the wind, and very
no nooo no noooooo noo nooooo nooo nooooo no nooo noo nooo, noo nooo

probably capsizing her. How glad and how grateful the relief from this
nooooooo noooooooo noo. Noo nooo noo noo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo nooo

unnatural hallucination of the night, and the fatal contingency of being
noooooooo noooooooooooo no noo noooo, noo noo noooo noooooooooo no noooo

brought by the lee!
noooooo no noo noo!




Look not too long in the face of the fire, O man! Never dream with thy
Nooo noo noo nooo no noo nooo no noo nooo, N noo! Noooo noooo nooo noo

hand on the helm! Turn not thy back to the compass; accept the first
nooo no noo nooo! Nooo noo noo nooo no noo noooooo; nooooo noo noooo

hint of the hitching tiller; believe not the artificial fire, when its
nooo no noo nooooooo nooooo; noooooo noo noo nooooooooo nooo, nooo noo

redness makes all things look ghastly. To-morrow, in the natural sun,
noooooo noooo noo nooooo nooo noooooo. No-nooooo, no noo noooooo noo,

the skies will be bright; those who glared like devils in the forking
noo noooo nooo no nooooo; noooo noo nooooo nooo nooooo no noo noooooo

flames, the morn will show in far other, at least gentler, relief; the
nooooo, noo nooo nooo nooo no noo noooo, no noooo noooooo, nooooo; noo

glorious, golden, glad sun, the only true lamp--all others but liars!
nooooooo, nooooo, nooo noo, noo nooo nooo nooo--noo nooooo noo noooo!




Nevertheless the sun hides not Virginia's Dismal Swamp, nor Rome's
Nooooooooooo noo noo noooo noo Nooooooo'n Nooooo Noooo, noo Nooo'n

accursed Campagna, nor wide Sahara, nor all the millions of miles of
nooooooo Nooooooo, noo nooo Nooooo, noo noo noo nooooooo no noooo no

deserts and of griefs beneath the moon. The sun hides not the ocean,
noooooo noo no nooooo noooooo noo nooo. Noo noo noooo noo noo noooo,

which is the dark side of this earth, and which is two thirds of this
noooo no noo nooo nooo no nooo noooo, noo noooo no noo nooooo no nooo

earth. So, therefore, that mortal man who hath more of joy than sorrow
noooo. No, noooooooo, nooo nooooo noo noo nooo nooo no noo nooo nooooo

in him, that mortal man cannot be true--not true, or undeveloped. With
no noo, nooo nooooo noo nooooo no nooo--noo nooo, no noooooooooo. Nooo

books the same. The truest of all men was the Man of Sorrows, and the
noooo noo nooo. Noo nooooo no noo noo noo noo Noo no Noooooo, noo noo

truest of all books is Solomon's, and Ecclesiastes is the fine hammered
nooooo no noo noooo no Noooooo'n, noo Nooooooooooo no noo nooo nooooooo

steel of woe. "All is vanity." ALL. This wilful world hath not got hold
noooo no noo. "Noo no nooooo." NOO. Nooo nooooo noooo nooo noo noo nooo

of unchristian Solomon's wisdom yet. But he who dodges hospitals and
no noooooooooo Noooooo'n nooooo noo. Noo no noo nooooo noooooooo noo

jails, and walks fast crossing graveyards, and would rather talk of
noooo, noo noooo nooo nooooooo nooooooooo, noo noooo nooooo nooo no

operas than hell; calls Cowper, Young, Pascal, Rousseau, poor devils all
nooooo nooo nooo; noooo Nooooo, Noooo, Nooooo, Nooooooo, nooo nooooo noo

of sick men; and throughout a care-free lifetime swears by Rabelais as
no nooo noo; noo nooooooooo n nooo-nooo nooooooo nooooo no Nooooooo no

passing wise, and therefore jolly;--not that man is fitted to sit
noooooo nooo, noo noooooooo noooo;--noo nooo noo no nooooo no noo

down on tomb-stones, and break the green damp mould with unfathomably
nooo no nooo-nooooo, noo noooo noo noooo nooo noooo nooo nooooooooooo

wondrous Solomon.
nooooooo Noooooo.




But even Solomon, he says, "the man that wandereth out of the way
Noo nooo Noooooo, no nooo, "noo noo nooo noooooooo noo no noo noo

of understanding shall remain" (I.E., even while living) "in the
no noooooooooooo noooo nooooo" (N.N., nooo noooo nooooo) "no noo

congregation of the dead." Give not thyself up, then, to fire, lest it
nooooooooooo no noo nooo." Nooo noo noooooo no, nooo, no nooo, nooo no

invert thee, deaden thee; as for the time it did me. There is a wisdom
nooooo nooo, nooooo nooo; no noo noo nooo no noo no. Noooo no n nooooo

that is woe; but there is a woe that is madness. And there is a Catskill
nooo no noo; noo noooo no n noo nooo no noooooo. Noo noooo no n Nooooooo

eagle in some souls that can alike dive down into the blackest gorges,
noooo no nooo noooo nooo noo noooo nooo nooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooo,

and soar out of them again and become invisible in the sunny spaces.
noo nooo noo no nooo noooo noo nooooo noooooooo no noo noooo nooooo.

And even if he for ever flies within the gorge, that gorge is in the
Noo nooo no no noo nooo noooo nooooo noo noooo, nooo noooo no no noo

mountains; so that even in his lowest swoop the mountain eagle is still
noooooooo; no nooo nooo no noo nooooo noooo noo nooooooo noooo no noooo

higher than other birds upon the plain, even though they soar.
nooooo nooo noooo noooo nooo noo noooo, nooo nooooo nooo nooo.










CHAPTER 97. The Lamp.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooo.







Had you descended from the Pequod's try-works to the Pequod's
Noo noo noooooooo nooo noo Nooooo'n noo-noooo no noo Nooooo'n

forecastle, where the off duty watch were sleeping, for one single
nooooooooo, noooo noo noo nooo noooo nooo nooooooo, noo noo nooooo

moment you would have almost thought you were standing in some
nooooo noo noooo nooo nooooo noooooo noo nooo nooooooo no nooo

illuminated shrine of canonized kings and counsellors. There they lay
noooooooooo nooooo no noooooooo noooo noo noooooooooo. Noooo nooo noo

in their triangular oaken vaults, each mariner a chiselled muteness; a
no noooo nooooooooo noooo nooooo, nooo noooooo n noooooooo nooooooo; n

score of lamps flashing upon his hooded eyes.
noooo no noooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo.




In merchantmen, oil for the sailor is more scarce than the milk of
No noooooooooo, noo noo noo nooooo no nooo nooooo nooo noo nooo no

queens. To dress in the dark, and eat in the dark, and stumble in
nooooo. No noooo no noo nooo, noo noo no noo nooo, noo noooooo no

darkness to his pallet, this is his usual lot. But the whaleman, as he
nooooooo no noo nooooo, nooo no noo noooo noo. Noo noo nooooooo, no no

seeks the food of light, so he lives in light. He makes his berth an
noooo noo nooo no noooo, no no noooo no noooo. No noooo noo noooo no

Aladdin's lamp, and lays him down in it; so that in the pitchiest night
Noooooo'n nooo, noo nooo noo nooo no no; no nooo no noo noooooooo noooo

the ship's black hull still houses an illumination.
noo nooo'n noooo nooo noooo nooooo no nooooooooooo.




See with what entire freedom the whaleman takes his handful of
Noo nooo nooo nooooo noooooo noo nooooooo noooo noo noooooo no

lamps--often but old bottles and vials, though--to the copper cooler at
noooo--noooo noo noo noooooo noo noooo, nooooo--no noo nooooo nooooo no

the try-works, and replenishes them there, as mugs of ale at a vat. He
noo noo-noooo, noo noooooooooo nooo noooo, no nooo no noo no n noo. No

burns, too, the purest of oil, in its unmanufactured, and, therefore,
noooo, noo, noo nooooo no noo, no noo nooooooooooooo, noo, noooooooo,

unvitiated state; a fluid unknown to solar, lunar, or astral
nooooooooo noooo; n noooo noooooo no noooo, noooo, no nooooo

contrivances ashore. It is sweet as early grass butter in April. He
nooooooooooo nooooo. No no noooo no noooo noooo nooooo no Noooo. No

goes and hunts for his oil, so as to be sure of its freshness and
nooo noo noooo noo noo noo, no no no no nooo no noo noooooooo noo

genuineness, even as the traveller on the prairie hunts up his own
noooooooooo, nooo no noo noooooooo no noo noooooo noooo no noo noo

supper of game.
nooooo no nooo.










CHAPTER 98. Stowing Down and Clearing Up.
NOOOOOO no. Noooooo Nooo noo Nooooooo No.







Already has it been related how the great leviathan is afar off
Noooooo noo no nooo noooooo noo noo noooo noooooooo no nooo noo

descried from the mast-head; how he is chased over the watery moors, and
nooooooo nooo noo nooo-nooo; noo no no nooooo nooo noo nooooo noooo, noo

slaughtered in the valleys of the deep; how he is then towed alongside
noooooooooo no noo noooooo no noo nooo; noo no no nooo noooo noooooooo

and beheaded; and how (on the principle which entitled the headsman of
noo nooooooo; noo noo (no noo noooooooo noooo nooooooo noo nooooooo no

old to the garments in which the beheaded was killed) his great padded
noo no noo nooooooo no noooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo) noo noooo nooooo

surtout becomes the property of his executioner; how, in due time, he
noooooo noooooo noo nooooooo no noo noooooooooo; noo, no noo nooo, no

is condemned to the pots, and, like Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, his
no noooooooo no noo nooo, noo, nooo Nooooooo, Noooooo, noo Nooooooo, noo

spermaceti, oil, and bone pass unscathed through the fire;--but now it
nooooooooo, noo, noo nooo nooo noooooooo noooooo noo nooo;--noo noo no

remains to conclude the last chapter of this part of the description by
noooooo no nooooooo noo nooo noooooo no nooo nooo no noo noooooooooo no

rehearsing--singing, if I may--the romantic proceeding of decanting off
nooooooooo--noooooo, no N noo--noo nooooooo nooooooooo no noooooooo noo

his oil into the casks and striking them down into the hold, where
noo noo nooo noo noooo noo nooooooo nooo nooo nooo noo nooo, noooo

once again leviathan returns to his native profundities, sliding along
nooo noooo noooooooo noooooo no noo nooooo nooooooooooo, noooooo noooo

beneath the surface as before; but, alas! never more to rise and blow.
noooooo noo noooooo no nooooo; noo, nooo! noooo nooo no nooo noo nooo.




While still warm, the oil, like hot punch, is received into the
Noooo noooo nooo, noo noo, nooo noo noooo, no nooooooo nooo noo

six-barrel casks; and while, perhaps, the ship is pitching and rolling
noo-nooooo noooo; noo noooo, noooooo, noo nooo no nooooooo noo noooooo

this way and that in the midnight sea, the enormous casks are slewed
nooo noo noo nooo no noo nooooooo noo, noo nooooooo noooo noo nooooo

round and headed over, end for end, and sometimes perilously scoot
noooo noo nooooo nooo, noo noo noo, noo noooooooo nooooooooo noooo

across the slippery deck, like so many land slides, till at last
nooooo noo nooooooo nooo, nooo no nooo nooo nooooo, nooo no nooo

man-handled and stayed in their course; and all round the hoops, rap,
noo-noooooo noo nooooo no noooo nooooo; noo noo noooo noo noooo, noo,

rap, go as many hammers as can play upon them, for now, EX OFFICIO,
noo, no no nooo noooooo no noo nooo nooo nooo, noo noo, NO NOOOOOO,

every sailor is a cooper.
noooo nooooo no n nooooo.




At length, when the last pint is casked, and all is cool, then the great
No nooooo, nooo noo nooo nooo no nooooo, noo noo no nooo, nooo noo noooo

hatchways are unsealed, the bowels of the ship are thrown open, and down
noooooooo noo nooooooo, noo nooooo no noo nooo noo nooooo nooo, noo nooo

go the casks to their final rest in the sea. This done, the hatches are
no noo noooo no noooo noooo nooo no noo noo. Nooo nooo, noo noooooo noo

replaced, and hermetically closed, like a closet walled up.
nooooooo, noo nooooooooooo nooooo, nooo n nooooo nooooo no.




In the sperm fishery, this is perhaps one of the most remarkable
No noo noooo noooooo, nooo no noooooo noo no noo nooo nooooooooo

incidents in all the business of whaling. One day the planks stream with
noooooooo no noo noo nooooooo no noooooo. Noo noo noo nooooo nooooo nooo

freshets of blood and oil; on the sacred quarter-deck enormous masses of
nooooooo no noooo noo noo; no noo nooooo noooooo-nooo nooooooo nooooo no

the whale's head are profanely piled; great rusty casks lie about, as
noo noooo'n nooo noo noooooooo noooo; noooo noooo noooo noo noooo, no

in a brewery yard; the smoke from the try-works has besooted all the
no n noooooo nooo; noo noooo nooo noo noo-noooo noo nooooooo noo noo

bulwarks; the mariners go about suffused with unctuousness; the entire
nooooooo; noo nooooooo no noooo nooooooo nooo nooooooooooo; noo nooooo

ship seems great leviathan himself; while on all hands the din is
nooo noooo noooo noooooooo noooooo; noooo no noo noooo noo noo no

deafening.
noooooooo.




But a day or two after, you look about you, and prick your ears in this
Noo n noo no noo noooo, noo nooo noooo noo, noo noooo nooo nooo no nooo

self-same ship; and were it not for the tell-tale boats and try-works,
nooo-nooo nooo; noo nooo no noo noo noo nooo-nooo noooo noo noo-noooo,

you would all but swear you trod some silent merchant vessel, with a
noo noooo noo noo noooo noo nooo nooo nooooo nooooooo nooooo, nooo n

most scrupulously neat commander. The unmanufactured sperm oil possesses
nooo nooooooooooo nooo noooooooo. Noo nooooooooooooo noooo noo noooooooo

a singularly cleansing virtue. This is the reason why the decks never
n nooooooooo noooooooo nooooo. Nooo no noo nooooo noo noo noooo noooo

look so white as just after what they call an affair of oil. Besides,
nooo no noooo no nooo noooo nooo nooo nooo no nooooo no noo. Noooooo,

from the ashes of the burned scraps of the whale, a potent lye is
nooo noo noooo no noo nooooo nooooo no noo noooo, n nooooo noo no

readily made; and whenever any adhesiveness from the back of the whale
noooooo nooo; noo nooooooo noo nooooooooooo nooo noo nooo no noo noooo

remains clinging to the side, that lye quickly exterminates it. Hands
noooooo nooooooo no noo nooo, nooo noo noooooo nooooooooooo no. Noooo

go diligently along the bulwarks, and with buckets of water and rags
no nooooooooo noooo noo nooooooo, noo nooo noooooo no noooo noo nooo

restore them to their full tidiness. The soot is brushed from the lower
noooooo nooo no noooo nooo nooooooo. Noo nooo no noooooo nooo noo noooo

rigging. All the numerous implements which have been in use are likewise
noooooo. Noo noo nooooooo nooooooooo noooo nooo nooo no noo noo nooooooo

faithfully cleansed and put away. The great hatch is scrubbed and placed
nooooooooo nooooooo noo noo nooo. Noo noooo noooo no nooooooo noo nooooo

upon the try-works, completely hiding the pots; every cask is out of
nooo noo noo-noooo, nooooooooo nooooo noo nooo; noooo nooo no noo no

sight; all tackles are coiled in unseen nooks; and when by the combined
noooo; noo noooooo noo nooooo no nooooo noooo; noo nooo no noo nooooooo

and simultaneous industry of almost the entire ship's company, the
noo nooooooooooo nooooooo no nooooo noo nooooo nooo'n noooooo, noo

whole of this conscientious duty is at last concluded, then the crew
noooo no nooo noooooooooooo nooo no no nooo noooooooo, nooo noo nooo

themselves proceed to their own ablutions; shift themselves from top to
nooooooooo noooooo no noooo noo noooooooo; noooo nooooooooo nooo noo no

toe; and finally issue to the immaculate deck, fresh and all aglow, as
noo; noo noooooo noooo no noo nooooooooo nooo, noooo noo noo noooo, no

bridegrooms new-leaped from out the daintiest Holland.
noooooooooo noo-nooooo nooo noo noo noooooooo Noooooo.




Now, with elated step, they pace the planks in twos and threes, and
Noo, nooo nooooo nooo, nooo nooo noo nooooo no nooo noo nooooo, noo

humorously discourse of parlors, sofas, carpets, and fine cambrics;
nooooooooo noooooooo no noooooo, noooo, noooooo, noo nooo nooooooo;

propose to mat the deck; think of having hanging to the top; object not
noooooo no noo noo nooo; noooo no nooooo noooooo no noo noo; nooooo noo

to taking tea by moonlight on the piazza of the forecastle. To hint to

no nooooooo. Nooo nooo noo noo noooo noo noooooooo nooooo no. Nooo, noo

noooo no noooooo!




But mark: aloft there, at the three mast heads, stand three men intent
Noo nooo: noooo noooo, no noo noooo nooo noooo, noooo noooo noo nooooo

noooooooo. Noo; noo nooo no noo nooo, nooo, noooo noo nooooooo

noooooooooooo nooooo, noooo nooo no noooo; nooooooooo nooooooo noooooo

nooooo nooo noo noo nooooo no noo Nooo,--nooo nooo nooo no noo nooo no

noooo nooo nooooo, noo noooo noo noooo nooooooo, noo noo noo noooo, noo,

nooo no noo nooo, nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo nooooooooo no noooooo noo

noooooo, nooo noooooooo noo noooo no noooo noooo nooooo, noo nooooooo no

noo noo no "Noooo noo noooo!" noo nooo nooo noo no noooo noooooo noooo,

noo no noooooo noo noooo noooo noooo noooo. No! no noooooo, noo nooo

no noo-noooooo! Noo nooo no nooo. Noo nooooo nooo no noooooo no nooo

nooooooo noooooooo nooo nooo noooo'n nooo nooo noo noooo noo nooooooo

nooooo no nooo nooo, nooo--NOOOO NOO NOOOO!--noo noooo no noooooo no,

and away we sail to fight some other world, and go through young life's
noo nooo no nooo no noooo nooo noooo noooo, noo no noooooo noooo nooo'n

old routine again.
noo noooooo noooo.




Oh! the metempsychosis! Oh! Pythagoras, that in bright Greece, two
No! noo nooooooooooooo! No! Nooooooooo, nooo no nooooo Nooooo, noo

CHAPTER 99. The Doubloon.
NOOOOOO no. Noo Nooooooo.







Ere now it has been related how Ahab was wont to pace his quarter-deck,
Noo noo no noo nooo noooooo noo Nooo noo nooo no nooo noo noooooo-nooo,

taking regular turns at either limit, the binnacle and mainmast; but
nooooo noooooo noooo no nooooo noooo, noo nooooooo noo nooooooo; noo

in the multiplicity of other things requiring narration it has not been
no noo nooooooooooo no noooo nooooo noooooooo noooooooo no noo noo nooo

added how that sometimes in these walks, when most plunged in his mood,
noooo noo nooo noooooooo no noooo noooo, nooo nooo noooooo no noo nooo,

he was wont to pause in turn at each spot, and stand there strangely
no noo nooo no noooo no nooo no nooo nooo, noo noooo noooo noooooooo

eyeing the particular object before him. When he halted before the
nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooo nooooo noo. Nooo no nooooo nooooo noo

binnacle, with his glance fastened on the pointed needle in the compass,
nooooooo, nooo noo nooooo nooooooo no noo noooooo nooooo no noo noooooo,

that glance shot like a javelin with the pointed intensity of his
nooo nooooo nooo nooo n noooooo nooo noo noooooo noooooooo no noo

purpose; and when resuming his walk he again paused before the mainmast,
noooooo; noo nooo nooooooo noo nooo no noooo nooooo nooooo noo nooooooo,

then, as the same riveted glance fastened upon the riveted gold coin
nooo, no noo nooo noooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo noooooo nooo nooo

there, he still wore the same aspect of nailed firmness, only dashed
noooo, no noooo nooo noo nooo nooooo no nooooo nooooooo, nooo nooooo

with a certain wild longing, if not hopefulness.
nooo n noooooo nooo noooooo, no noo noooooooooo.




But one morning, turning to pass the doubloon, he seemed to be newly
Noo noo noooooo, noooooo no nooo noo nooooooo, no nooooo no no noooo

attracted by the strange figures and inscriptions stamped on it, as
noooooooo no noo noooooo noooooo noo nooooooooooo noooooo no no, no

though now for the first time beginning to interpret for himself in
nooooo noo noo noo noooo nooo noooooooo no noooooooo noo noooooo no

some monomaniac way whatever significance might lurk in them. And some
nooo nooooooooo noo nooooooo nooooooooooo noooo nooo no nooo. Noo nooo

certain significance lurks in all things, else all things are little
noooooo nooooooooooo noooo no noo nooooo, nooo noo nooooo noo nooooo

worth, and the round world itself but an empty cipher, except to sell by
noooo, noo noo noooo noooo nooooo noo no noooo nooooo, nooooo no nooo no

the cartload, as they do hills about Boston, to fill up some morass in
noo nooooooo, no nooo no noooo noooo Nooooo, no nooo no nooo nooooo no

the Milky Way.
noo Noooo Noo.




Now this doubloon was of purest, virgin gold, raked somewhere out of the
Noo nooo nooooooo noo no nooooo, nooooo nooo, noooo noooooooo noo no noo

heart of gorgeous hills, whence, east and west, over golden sands, the
noooo no nooooooo noooo, nooooo, nooo noo nooo, nooo nooooo noooo, noo

head-waters of many a Pactolus flows. And though now nailed amidst all
nooo-nooooo no nooo n Nooooooo noooo. Noo nooooo noo nooooo nooooo noo

the rustiness of iron bolts and the verdigris of copper spikes, yet,
noo noooooooo no nooo noooo noo noo noooooooo no nooooo nooooo, noo,

untouchable and immaculate to any foulness, it still preserved its Quito
noooooooooo noo nooooooooo no noo nooooooo, no noooo noooooooo noo Noooo

glow. Nor, though placed amongst a ruthless crew and every hour passed
nooo. Noo, nooooo nooooo noooooo n nooooooo nooo noo noooo nooo nooooo

by ruthless hands, and through the livelong nights shrouded with thick
no nooooooo noooo, noo noooooo noo nooooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo noooo

darkness which might cover any pilfering approach, nevertheless every
nooooooo noooo noooo noooo noo noooooooo nooooooo, nooooooooooo noooo

sunrise found the doubloon where the sunset left it last. For it was
noooooo noooo noo nooooooo noooo noo nooooo nooo no nooo. Noo no noo

set apart and sanctified to one awe-striking end; and however wanton
noo noooo noo nooooooooo no noo noo-nooooooo noo; noo noooooo nooooo

in their sailor ways, one and all, the mariners revered it as the white
no noooo nooooo nooo, noo noo noo, noo nooooooo noooooo no no noo noooo

whale's talisman. Sometimes they talked it over in the weary watch by
noooo'n nooooooo. Noooooooo nooo nooooo no nooo no noo noooo noooo no

night, wondering whose it was to be at last, and whether he would ever
noooo, noooooooo noooo no noo no no no nooo, noo noooooo no noooo nooo

live to spend it.
nooo no noooo no.




Now those noble golden coins of South America are as medals of the sun
Noo noooo noooo nooooo noooo no Noooo Noooooo noo no nooooo no noo noo

and tropic token-pieces. Here palms, alpacas, and volcanoes; sun's disks
noo nooooo noooo-nooooo. Nooo noooo, noooooo, noo noooooooo; noo'n noooo

and stars; ecliptics, horns-of-plenty, and rich banners waving, are in
noo noooo; noooooooo, noooo-no-nooooo, noo nooo noooooo nooooo, noo no

luxuriant profusion stamped; so that the precious gold seems almost to
noooooooo noooooooo noooooo; no nooo noo nooooooo nooo noooo nooooo no

derive an added preciousness and enhancing glories, by passing through
nooooo no noooo nooooooooooo noo noooooooo noooooo, no noooooo noooooo

those fancy mints, so Spanishly poetic.
noooo noooo noooo, no Noooooooo nooooo.




It so chanced that the doubloon of the Pequod was a most wealthy example
No no noooooo nooo noo nooooooo no noo Nooooo noo n nooo noooooo noooooo

of these things. On its round border it bore the letters, REPUBLICA DEL
no noooo nooooo. No noo noooo nooooo no nooo noo noooooo, NOOOOOOOO NOO

ECUADOR: QUITO. So this bright coin came from a country planted in the
NOOOOOO: NOOOO. No nooo nooooo nooo nooo nooo n noooooo noooooo no noo

middle of the world, and beneath the great equator, and named after it;
nooooo no noo noooo, noo noooooo noo noooo noooooo, noo noooo noooo no;

and it had been cast midway up the Andes, in the unwaning clime that
noo no noo nooo nooo nooooo no noo Noooo, no noo nooooooo noooo nooo

knows no autumn. Zoned by those letters you saw the likeness of three
noooo no nooooo. Noooo no noooo noooooo noo noo noo nooooooo no noooo

Andes' summits; from one a flame; a tower on another; on the third a
Noooo' noooooo; nooo noo n noooo; n noooo no noooooo; no noo noooo n

crowing cock; while arching over all was a segment of the partitioned
noooooo nooo; noooo noooooo nooo noo noo n noooooo no noo noooooooooo

zodiac, the signs all marked with their usual cabalistics, and the

nooooooo noo nooooooo noo noooooooooo noooo no Noooo.

"There's something ever egotistical in mountain-tops and towers, and

nooo Noooo noooo no noooooo."

"I see nothing here, but a round thing made of gold, and whoever raises
"N noo noooooo nooo, noo n noooo noooo nooo no nooo, noo noooooo nooooo

a certain whale, this round thing belongs to him. So, what's all this

noooo no nooo; no nooo nooo Noooo noooo no noo 'no noo."




"Shall I call that wise or foolish, now; if it be really wise it has a

"If the White Whale be raised, it must be in a month and a day, when

CHAPTER 100. Leg and Arm.
NOOOOOO noo. Noo noo Noo.




The Pequod, of Nantucket, Meets the Samuel Enderby, of London.
Noo Nooooo, no Noooooooo, Noooo noo Nooooo Noooooo, no Nooooo.







"Ship, ahoy! Hast seen the White Whale?"
"Nooo, nooo! Nooo nooo noo Noooo Noooo?"




So cried Ahab, once more hailing a ship showing English colours, bearing
No noooo Nooo, nooo nooo noooooo n nooo noooooo Noooooo noooooo, noooooo

down under the stern. Trumpet to mouth, the old man was standing in his
nooo noooo noo noooo. Noooooo no noooo, noo noo noo noo nooooooo no noo

hoisted quarter-boat, his ivory leg plainly revealed to the stranger
noooooo noooooo-nooo, noo noooo noo noooooo nooooooo no noo nooooooo

captain, who was carelessly reclining in his own boat's bow. He was
noooooo, noo noo nooooooooo noooooooo no noo noo nooo'n noo. No noo

a darkly-tanned, burly, good-natured, fine-looking man, of sixty or
n nooooo-nooooo, noooo, nooo-noooooo, nooo-noooooo noo, no noooo no

thereabouts, dressed in a spacious roundabout, that hung round him in
noooooooooo, noooooo no n nooooooo nooooooooo, nooo nooo noooo noo no

nooooooo no nooo noooo-noooo; noo noo noooo noo no nooo nooooo nooooooo

behind him like the broidered arm of a hussar's surcoat.
nooooo noo nooo noo noooooooo noo no n nooooo'n noooooo.




"Hast seen the White Whale!"
"Nooo nooo noo Noooo Noooo!"




"See you this?" and withdrawing it from the folds that had hidden it,
"Noo noo nooo?" noo noooooooooo no nooo noo noooo nooo noo nooooo no,

no nooo no n noooo noo no noooo noooo nooo, noooooooooo no n nooooo nooo

like a mallet.
nooo n nooooo.




"Man my boat!" cried Ahab, impetuously, and tossing about the oars near
"Noo no nooo!" noooo Nooo, noooooooooo, noo noooooo noooo noo nooo nooo

him--"Stand by to lower!"
noo--"Noooo no no noooo!"




In less than a minute, without quitting his little craft, he and his
No nooo nooo n nooooo, noooooo nooooooo noo nooooo noooo, no noo noo

crew were dropped to the water, and were soon alongside of the stranger.
nooo nooo noooooo no noo noooo, noo nooo nooo noooooooo no noo nooooooo.

But here a curious difficulty presented itself. In the excitement of the
Noo nooo n noooooo nooooooooo noooooooo nooooo. No noo nooooooooo no noo

moment, Ahab had forgotten that since the loss of his leg he had never
nooooo, Nooo noo noooooooo nooo noooo noo nooo no noo noo no noo noooo

once stepped on board of any vessel at sea but his own, and then it was
nooo noooooo no noooo no noo nooooo no noo noo noo noo, noo nooo no noo

always by an ingenious and very handy mechanical contrivance peculiar to
nooooo no no noooooooo noo nooo noooo nooooooooo noooooooooo nooooooo no

the Pequod, and a thing not to be rigged and shipped in any other
noo Nooooo, noo n noooo noo no no nooooo noo noooooo no noo noooo

vessel at a moment's warning. Now, it is no very easy matter
nooooo no n nooooo'n noooooo. Noo, no no no nooo nooo nooooo

for anybody--except those who are almost hourly used to it, like
noo noooooo--nooooo noooo noo noo nooooo nooooo nooo no no, nooo

whalemen--to clamber up a ship's side from a boat on the open sea; for
nooooooo--no noooooo no n nooo'n nooo nooo n nooo no noo nooo noo; noo

the great swells now lift the boat high up towards the bulwarks, and
noo noooo nooooo noo nooo noo nooo nooo no noooooo noo nooooooo, noo

then instantaneously drop it half way down to the kelson. So, deprived
nooo noooooooooooooo nooo no nooo noo nooo no noo nooooo. No, nooooooo

of one leg, and the strange ship of course being altogether unsupplied
no noo noo, noo noo noooooo nooo no nooooo noooo nooooooooo nooooooooo

with the kindly invention, Ahab now found himself abjectly reduced to a
nooo noo nooooo noooooooo, Nooo noo noooo noooooo nooooooo noooooo no n

clumsy landsman again; hopelessly eyeing the uncertain changeful height
nooooo nooooooo noooo; nooooooooo nooooo noo noooooooo noooooooo nooooo

he could hardly hope to attain.
no noooo nooooo nooo no nooooo.




It has before been hinted, perhaps, that every little untoward
No noo nooooo nooo nooooo, noooooo, nooo noooo nooooo nooooooo

circumstance that befell him, and which indirectly sprang from his
nooooooooooo nooo nooooo noo, noo noooo nooooooooo nooooo nooo noo

nooooooo nooooo, nooooo nooooooooo noooooooo no noooooooooo Nooo. Noo

no noo noooooo nooooooo, noo nooo noo nooooooooo no noo noooo no noo

over the cutting-tackle."
nooo noo noooooo-nooooo."

noooo noo no noo nooooo noo, "Noo, noo, nooooo! noo no noooo noooo

"Nooo no noo nooo," nooo Nooo; "noo noo no?"

know him."
nooo noo."

noooo, noooooo no nooo no noo, noooooo nooo nooo no noooooooo; noo,

flukes first, the white hump backed through the wreck, as though it was
nooooo noooo, noo noooo nooo nooooo noooooo noo noooo, no nooooo no noo

all chips. We all struck out. To escape his terrible flailings, I seized
noo noooo. No noo nooooo noo. No nooooo noo nooooooo noooooooo, N nooooo

hold of my harpoon-pole sticking in him, and for a moment clung to that
nooo no no noooooo-nooo nooooooo no noo, noo noo n nooooo noooo no nooo

like a sucking fish. But a combing sea dashed me off, and at the same
nooo n noooooo nooo. Noo n noooooo noo nooooo no noo, noo no noo nooo

noooooo, noo nooo, nooooo noo nooo nooo nooooooo, nooo nooo nooo n

flash; and the barb of that cursed second iron towing along near me

nooooo no nooo" (nooooooo noo nooo nooo noooo noo nooooooo); "noo,

nooooo no nooo nooo, N noo, noo nooo no nooo no Nooo'n nooooo, N noo

thinking; when, when, all of a sudden, thank the good God, the barb ript
nooooooo; nooo, nooo, noo no n nooooo, noooo noo nooo Noo, noo nooo nooo

its way along the flesh--clear along the whole length of my arm--came

noo nooo no noooo, noo no N noooooo;--noo nooo noooooooo noooo nooo nooo

noo noo nooo (no noo noo, noooooo--No. Nooooo, nooo'n noooooo: Nooooo,

my lad,--the captain). Now, Bunger boy, spin your part of the yarn."
no noo,--noo noooooo). Noo, Nooooo noo, nooo nooo nooo no noo nooo."




The professional gentleman thus familiarly pointed out, had been all the

CHAPTER 101. The Decanter.
NOOOOOO noo. Noo Nooooooo.







Ere the English ship fades from sight, be it set down here, that
Noo noo Noooooo nooo noooo nooo noooo, no no noo nooo nooo, nooo

she hailed from London, and was named after the late Samuel Enderby,
noo nooooo nooo Nooooo, noo noo noooo noooo noo nooo Nooooo Noooooo,

merchant of that city, the original of the famous whaling house of
nooooooo no nooo nooo, noo nooooooo no noo nooooo noooooo noooo no

Enderby & Sons; a house which in my poor whaleman's opinion, comes not
Noooooo & Nooo; n noooo noooo no no nooo nooooooo'n noooooo, noooo noo

far behind the united royal houses of the Tudors and Bourbons, in point
noo nooooo noo nooooo noooo nooooo no noo Nooooo noo Nooooooo, no noooo

of real historical interest. How long, prior to the year of our
no nooo nooooooooo nooooooo. Noo nooo, noooo no noo nooo no noo

Lord 1775, this great whaling house was in existence, my numerous
Nooo nooo, nooo noooo noooooo noooo noo no noooooooo, no nooooooo

fish-documents do not make plain; but in that year (1775) it fitted
nooo-noooooooo no noo nooo noooo; noo no nooo nooo (nooo) no nooooo

out the first English ships that ever regularly hunted the Sperm Whale;
noo noo noooo Noooooo noooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooooo noo Noooo Noooo;

though for some score of years previous (ever since 1726) our valiant
nooooo noo nooo noooo no noooo nooooooo (nooo noooo nooo) noo noooooo

Coffins and Maceys of Nantucket and the Vineyard had in large fleets
Noooooo noo Nooooo no Noooooooo noo noo Nooooooo noo no noooo nooooo

pursued that Leviathan, but only in the North and South Atlantic: not
noooooo nooo Noooooooo, noo nooo no noo Noooo noo Noooo Nooooooo: noo

elsewhere. Be it distinctly recorded here, that the Nantucketers were
noooooooo. No no nooooooooo nooooooo nooo, nooo noo Nooooooooooo nooo

the first among mankind to harpoon with civilized steel the great Sperm
noo noooo noooo noooooo no noooooo nooo noooooooo noooo noo noooo Noooo

Whale; and that for half a century they were the only people of the
Noooo; noo nooo noo nooo n noooooo nooo nooo noo nooo nooooo no noo

whole globe who so harpooned him.
noooo noooo noo no noooooooo noo.




In 1778, a fine ship, the Amelia, fitted out for the express purpose,
No nooo, n nooo nooo, noo Nooooo, nooooo noo noo noo noooooo noooooo,

and at the sole charge of the vigorous Enderbys, boldly rounded Cape
noo no noo nooo nooooo no noo nooooooo Nooooooo, nooooo noooooo Nooo

Horn, and was the first among the nations to lower a whale-boat of any
Nooo, noo noo noo noooo noooo noo noooooo no noooo n noooo-nooo no noo

sort in the great South Sea. The voyage was a skilful and lucky one;
nooo no noo noooo Noooo Noo. Noo nooooo noo n noooooo noo noooo noo;

and returning to her berth with her hold full of the precious sperm, the
noo noooooooo no noo noooo nooo noo nooo nooo no noo nooooooo noooo, noo

Amelia's example was soon followed by other ships, English and American,
Nooooo'n noooooo noo nooo nooooooo no noooo noooo, Noooooo noo Nooooooo,

and thus the vast Sperm Whale grounds of the Pacific were thrown open.
noo nooo noo nooo Noooo Noooo noooooo no noo Noooooo nooo nooooo nooo.

But not content with this good deed, the indefatigable house again
Noo noo noooooo nooo nooo nooo nooo, noo noooooooooooo noooo noooo

bestirred itself: Samuel and all his Sons--how many, their mother only
noooooooo nooooo: Nooooo noo noo noo Nooo--noo nooo, noooo nooooo nooo

knows--and under their immediate auspices, and partly, I think, at their
noooo--noo noooo noooo noooooooo nooooooo, noo nooooo, N noooo, no noooo

expense, the British government was induced to send the sloop-of-war
noooooo, noo Noooooo nooooooooo noo noooooo no nooo noo noooo-no-noo

Rattler on a whaling voyage of discovery into the South Sea. Commanded
Noooooo no n noooooo nooooo no noooooooo nooo noo Noooo Noo. Noooooooo

by a naval Post-Captain, the Rattler made a rattling voyage of it, and
no n noooo Nooo-Noooooo, noo Noooooo nooo n nooooooo nooooo no no, noo

did some service; how much does not appear. But this is not all. In
noo nooo noooooo; noo nooo nooo noo nooooo. Noo nooo no noo noo. No

1819, the same house fitted out a discovery whale ship of their own, to
nooo, noo nooo noooo nooooo noo n noooooooo noooo nooo no noooo noo, no

go on a tasting cruise to the remote waters of Japan. That ship--well
no no n noooooo nooooo no noo nooooo nooooo no Noooo. Nooo nooo--nooo

called the "Syren"--made a noble experimental cruise; and it was thus
nooooo noo "Noooo"--nooo n noooo nooooooooooo nooooo; noo no noo nooo

that the great Japanese Whaling Ground first became generally known.
nooo noo noooo Nooooooo Noooooo Nooooo noooo nooooo noooooooo noooo.

The Syren in this famous voyage was commanded by a Captain Coffin, a
Noo Noooo no nooo nooooo nooooo noo noooooooo no n Noooooo Nooooo, n

Nantucketer.
Noooooooooo.




All honour to the Enderbies, therefore, whose house, I think, exists to
Noo nooooo no noo Noooooooo, noooooooo, noooo noooo, N noooo, nooooo no

the present day; though doubtless the original Samuel must long ago have
noo noooooo noo; nooooo noooooooo noo nooooooo Nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo

slipped his cable for the great South Sea of the other world.
noooooo noo noooo noo noo noooo Noooo Noo no noo noooo noooo.




The ship named after him was worthy of the honour, being a very fast
Noo nooo noooo noooo noo noo nooooo no noo nooooo, noooo n nooo nooo

sailer and a noble craft every way. I boarded her once at midnight
nooooo noo n noooo noooo noooo noo. N noooooo noo nooo no nooooooo

somewhere off the Patagonian coast, and drank good flip down in the
noooooooo noo noo Nooooooooo noooo, noo noooo nooo nooo nooo no noo

forecastle. It was a fine gam we had, and they were all trumps--every
nooooooooo. No noo n nooo noo no noo, noo nooo nooo noo nooooo--noooo

soul on board. A short life to them, and a jolly death. And that fine
nooo no noooo. N noooo nooo no nooo, noo n noooo noooo. Noo nooo nooo

gam I had--long, very long after old Ahab touched her planks with his
noo N noo--nooo, nooo nooo noooo noo Nooo noooooo noo nooooo nooo noo

ivory heel--it minds me of the noble, solid, Saxon hospitality of that
noooo nooo--no noooo no no noo noooo, noooo, Noooo noooooooooo no nooo

ship; and may my parson forget me, and the devil remember me, if I ever
nooo; noo noo no nooooo nooooo no, noo noo noooo nooooooo no, no N nooo

lose sight of it. Flip? Did I say we had flip? Yes, and we flipped it
nooo noooo no no. Nooo? Noo N noo no noo nooo? Noo, noo no noooooo no

at the rate of ten gallons the hour; and when the squall came (for it's
no noo nooo no noo noooooo noo nooo; noo nooo noo nooooo nooo (noo no'n

squally off there by Patagonia), and all hands--visitors and all--were
noooooo noo noooo no Noooooooo), noo noo noooo--nooooooo noo noo--nooo

called to reef topsails, we were so top-heavy that we had to swing each
nooooo no nooo nooooooo, no nooo no noo-noooo nooo no noo no noooo nooo

other aloft in bowlines; and we ignorantly furled the skirts of our
noooo noooo no nooooooo; noo no nooooooooo nooooo noo nooooo no noo

jackets into the sails, so that we hung there, reefed fast in the
noooooo nooo noo noooo, no nooo no nooo noooo, nooooo nooo no noo

howling gale, a warning example to all drunken tars. However, the masts
noooooo nooo, n noooooo noooooo no noo noooooo nooo. Noooooo, noo noooo

did not go overboard; and by and by we scrambled down, so sober, that we
noo noo no noooooooo; noo no noo no no noooooooo nooo, no noooo, nooo no

had to pass the flip again, though the savage salt spray bursting down
noo no nooo noo nooo noooo, nooooo noo nooooo nooo noooo nooooooo nooo

the forecastle scuttle, rather too much diluted and pickled it to my
noo nooooooooo noooooo, nooooo noo nooo noooooo noo noooooo no no no

taste.
noooo.




The beef was fine--tough, but with body in it. They said it was
Noo nooo noo nooo--noooo, noo nooo nooo no no. Nooo nooo no noo

bull-beef; others, that it was dromedary beef; but I do not know, for
nooo-nooo; nooooo, nooo no noo noooooooo nooo; noo N no noo nooo, noo

certain, how that was. They had dumplings too; small, but substantial,
noooooo, noo nooo noo. Nooo noo noooooooo noo; noooo, noo noooooooooo,

symmetrically globular, and indestructible dumplings. I fancied that you
noooooooooooo nooooooo, noo nooooooooooooo noooooooo. N noooooo nooo noo

could feel them, and roll them about in you after they were swallowed.
noooo nooo nooo, noo nooo nooo noooo no noo noooo nooo nooo noooooooo.

If you stooped over too far forward, you risked their pitching out
No noo noooooo nooo noo noo noooooo, noo nooooo noooo nooooooo noo

of you like billiard-balls. The bread--but that couldn't be helped;
no noo nooo nooooooo-noooo. Noo noooo--noo nooo nooooo'n no nooooo;

besides, it was an anti-scorbutic; in short, the bread contained the
noooooo, no noo no nooo-noooooooo; no noooo, noo noooo noooooooo noo

only fresh fare they had. But the forecastle was not very light, and it
nooo noooo nooo nooo noo. Noo noo nooooooooo noo noo nooo noooo, noo no

was very easy to step over into a dark corner when you ate it. But all
noo nooo nooo no nooo nooo nooo n nooo nooooo nooo noo noo no. Noo noo

in all, taking her from truck to helm, considering the dimensions of the
no noo, nooooo noo nooo noooo no nooo, noooooooooo noo nooooooooo no noo

cook's boilers, including his own live parchment boilers; fore and aft,
nooo'n noooooo, noooooooo noo noo nooo noooooooo noooooo; nooo noo noo,

I say, the Samuel Enderby was a jolly ship; of good fare and plenty;
N noo, noo Nooooo Noooooo noo n noooo nooo; no nooo nooo noo nooooo;

fine flip and strong; crack fellows all, and capital from boot heels to
nooo nooo noo nooooo; noooo noooooo noo, noo noooooo nooo nooo noooo no

hat-band.
noo-nooo.




But why was it, think ye, that the Samuel Enderby, and some other
Noo noo noo no, noooo no, nooo noo Nooooo Noooooo, noo nooo noooo

English whalers I know of--not all though--were such famous, hospitable
Noooooo noooooo N nooo no--noo noo nooooo--nooo nooo nooooo, nooooooooo
