noooo; nooo nooooo noooo noo nooo, noo noo noooo, noo noo noo, noo noo

joke; and were not soon weary of eating, and drinking, and laughing?
nooo; noo nooo noo nooo noooo no nooooo, noo nooooooo, noo nooooooo?

I will tell you. The abounding good cheer of these English whalers
N nooo nooo noo. Noo noooooooo nooo noooo no noooo Noooooo noooooo

is matter for historical research. Nor have I been at all sparing of
no nooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo. Noo nooo N nooo no noo noooooo no

historical whale research, when it has seemed needed.
nooooooooo noooo nooooooo, nooo no noo nooooo nooooo.




The English were preceded in the whale fishery by the Hollanders,
Noo Noooooo nooo nooooooo no noo noooo noooooo no noo Nooooooooo,

Zealanders, and Danes; from whom they derived many terms still extant
Nooooooooo, noo Noooo; nooo nooo nooo noooooo nooo noooo noooo nooooo

in the fishery; and what is yet more, their fat old fashions,
no noo noooooo; noo nooo no noo nooo, noooo noo noo nooooooo,

touching plenty to eat and drink. For, as a general thing, the English
nooooooo nooooo no noo noo noooo. Noo, no n noooooo noooo, noo Noooooo

merchant-ship scrimps her crew; but not so the English whaler. Hence, in
nooooooo-nooo noooooo noo nooo; noo noo no noo Noooooo nooooo. Noooo, no

the English, this thing of whaling good cheer is not normal and natural,
noo Noooooo, nooo noooo no noooooo nooo noooo no noo nooooo noo noooooo,

but incidental and particular; and, therefore, must have some special
noo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo; noo, noooooooo, nooo nooo nooo noooooo

origin, which is here pointed out, and will be still further elucidated.
nooooo, noooo no nooo noooooo noo, noo nooo no noooo noooooo nooooooooo.




During my researches in the Leviathanic histories, I stumbled upon an
Nooooo no nooooooooo no noo Noooooooooo noooooooo, N nooooooo nooo no

ancient Dutch volume, which, by the musty whaling smell of it, I
noooooo Noooo nooooo, noooo, no noo noooo noooooo noooo no no, N

knew must be about whalers. The title was, "Dan Coopman," wherefore I
nooo nooo no noooo noooooo. Noo noooo noo, "Noo Noooooo," noooooooo N

concluded that this must be the invaluable memoirs of some Amsterdam
noooooooo nooo nooo nooo no noo nooooooooo noooooo no nooo Noooooooo

cooper in the fishery, as every whale ship must carry its cooper. I was
nooooo no noo noooooo, no noooo noooo nooo nooo noooo noo nooooo. N noo

reinforced in this opinion by seeing that it was the production of one
nooooooooo no nooo noooooo no nooooo nooo no noo noo nooooooooo no noo

"Fitz Swackhammer." But my friend Dr. Snodhead, a very learned man,
"Nooo Noooooooooo." Noo no nooooo No. Nooooooo, n nooo noooooo noo,

professor of Low Dutch and High German in the college of Santa Claus and
noooooooo no Noo Noooo noo Nooo Nooooo no noo noooooo no Noooo Noooo noo

St. Pott's, to whom I handed the work for translation, giving him a box
No. Nooo'n, no nooo N nooooo noo nooo noo noooooooooo, nooooo noo n noo

of sperm candles for his trouble--this same Dr. Snodhead, so soon as he
no noooo noooooo noo noo noooooo--nooo nooo No. Nooooooo, no nooo no no

spied the book, assured me that "Dan Coopman" did not mean "The Cooper,"
noooo noo nooo, noooooo no nooo "Noo Noooooo" noo noo nooo "Noo Nooooo,"

but "The Merchant." In short, this ancient and learned Low Dutch book
noo "Noo Nooooooo." No noooo, nooo noooooo noo noooooo Noo Noooo nooo

treated of the commerce of Holland; and, among other subjects, contained
noooooo no noo nooooooo no Noooooo; noo, noooo noooo nooooooo, noooooooo

a very interesting account of its whale fishery. And in this chapter it
n nooo noooooooooo noooooo no noo noooo noooooo. Noo no nooo noooooo no

was, headed, "Smeer," or "Fat," that I found a long detailed list of the
noo, nooooo, "Noooo," no "Noo," nooo N noooo n nooo nooooooo nooo no noo

outfits for the larders and cellars of 180 sail of Dutch whalemen; from
noooooo noo noo noooooo noo noooooo no noo nooo no Noooo nooooooo; nooo

which list, as translated by Dr. Snodhead, I transcribe the following:
noooo nooo, no nooooooooo no No. Nooooooo, N nooooooooo noo noooooooo:




400,000 lbs. of beef. 60,000 lbs. Friesland pork. 150,000 lbs. of stock
noo,noo noo. no nooo. no,noo noo. Noooooooo nooo. noo,noo noo. no noooo

fish. 550,000 lbs. of biscuit. 72,000 lbs. of soft bread. 2,800 firkins
nooo. noo,noo noo. no noooooo. no,noo noo. no nooo noooo. n,noo noooooo

of butter. 20,000 lbs. Texel & Leyden cheese. 144,000 lbs. cheese
no nooooo. no,noo noo. Noooo & Nooooo nooooo. noo,noo noo. nooooo

(probably an inferior article). 550 ankers of Geneva. 10,800 barrels of
(nooooooo no nooooooo noooooo). noo nooooo no Nooooo. no,noo noooooo no

beer.
nooo.




Most statistical tables are parchingly dry in the reading; not so in
Nooo noooooooooo nooooo noo nooooooooo noo no noo noooooo; noo no no

the present case, however, where the reader is flooded with whole pipes,
noo noooooo nooo, noooooo, noooo noo nooooo no noooooo nooo noooo noooo,

barrels, quarts, and gills of good gin and good cheer.
noooooo, nooooo, noo noooo no nooo noo noo nooo noooo.




At the time, I devoted three days to the studious digesting of all
No noo nooo, N noooooo noooo nooo no noo nooooooo noooooooo no noo

this beer, beef, and bread, during which many profound thoughts were
nooo nooo, nooo, noo noooo, nooooo noooo nooo nooooooo nooooooo nooo

incidentally suggested to me, capable of a transcendental and Platonic
nooooooooooo noooooooo no no, noooooo no n nooooooooooooo noo Nooooooo

application; and, furthermore, I compiled supplementary tables of my
noooooooooo; noo, noooooooooo, N nooooooo noooooooooooo nooooo no no

own, touching the probable quantity of stock-fish, etc., consumed by
noo, nooooooo noo nooooooo nooooooo no noooo-nooo, noo., nooooooo no

every Low Dutch harpooneer in that ancient Greenland and Spitzbergen
noooo Noo Noooo nooooooooo no nooo noooooo Noooooooo noo Noooooooooo

whale fishery. In the first place, the amount of butter, and Texel and
noooo noooooo. No noo noooo noooo, noo nooooo no nooooo, noo Noooo noo

Leyden cheese consumed, seems amazing. I impute it, though, to their
Nooooo nooooo nooooooo, noooo noooooo. N nooooo no, nooooo, no noooo

naturally unctuous natures, being rendered still more unctuous by the
noooooooo nooooooo noooooo, noooo nooooooo noooo nooo nooooooo no noo

nature of their vocation, and especially by their pursuing their game
nooooo no noooo nooooooo, noo nooooooooo no noooo nooooooo noooo nooo

in those frigid Polar Seas, on the very coasts of that Esquimaux country
no noooo nooooo Noooo Nooo, no noo nooo nooooo no nooo Noooooooo noooooo

where the convivial natives pledge each other in bumpers of train oil.
noooo noo noooooooo noooooo nooooo nooo noooo no noooooo no noooo noo.




The quantity of beer, too, is very large, 10,800 barrels. Now, as those
Noo nooooooo no nooo, noo, no nooo noooo, no,noo noooooo. Noo, no noooo

polar fisheries could only be prosecuted in the short summer of that
noooo noooooooo noooo nooo no nooooooooo no noo noooo nooooo no nooo

climate, so that the whole cruise of one of these Dutch whalemen,
noooooo, no nooo noo noooo nooooo no noo no noooo Noooo nooooooo,

including the short voyage to and from the Spitzbergen sea, did not much
noooooooo noo noooo nooooo no noo nooo noo Noooooooooo noo, noo noo nooo

exceed three months, say, and reckoning 30 men to each of their fleet
nooooo noooo nooooo, noo, noo noooooooo no noo no nooo no noooo noooo

of 180 sail, we have 5,400 Low Dutch seamen in all; therefore, I say,
no noo nooo, no nooo n,noo Noo Noooo nooooo no noo; noooooooo, N noo,

we have precisely two barrels of beer per man, for a twelve weeks'
no nooo noooooooo noo noooooo no nooo noo noo, noo n nooooo noooo'

allowance, exclusive of his fair proportion of that 550 ankers of gin.
noooooooo, noooooooo no noo nooo nooooooooo no nooo noo nooooo no noo.

Now, whether these gin and beer harpooneers, so fuddled as one might
Noo, noooooo noooo noo noo nooo noooooooooo, no noooooo no noo noooo

fancy them to have been, were the right sort of men to stand up in
noooo nooo no nooo nooo, nooo noo noooo nooo no noo no noooo no no

a boat's head, and take good aim at flying whales; this would seem
n nooo'n nooo, noo nooo nooo noo no nooooo nooooo; nooo noooo nooo

somewhat improbable. Yet they did aim at them, and hit them too. But
nooooooo nooooooooo. Noo nooo noo noo no nooo, noo noo nooo noo. Noo

this was very far North, be it remembered, where beer agrees well with
nooo noo nooo noo Noooo, no no nooooooooo, noooo nooo nooooo nooo nooo

the constitution; upon the Equator, in our southern fishery, beer would
noo nooooooooooo; nooo noo Noooooo, no noo nooooooo noooooo, nooo noooo

be apt to make the harpooneer sleepy at the mast-head and boozy in his
no noo no nooo noo nooooooooo nooooo no noo nooo-nooo noo noooo no noo

boat; and grievous loss might ensue to Nantucket and New Bedford.
nooo; noo nooooooo nooo noooo noooo no Noooooooo noo Noo Noooooo.




But no more; enough has been said to show that the old Dutch whalers
Noo no nooo; nooooo noo nooo nooo no nooo nooo noo noo Noooo noooooo

of two or three centuries ago were high livers; and that the English
no noo no noooo noooooooo noo nooo nooo nooooo; noo nooo noo Noooooo

whalers have not neglected so excellent an example. For, say they, when
noooooo nooo noo noooooooo no noooooooo no noooooo. Noo, noo nooo, nooo

cruising in an empty ship, if you can get nothing better out of the
nooooooo no no noooo nooo, no noo noo noo noooooo nooooo noo no noo

world, get a good dinner out of it, at least. And this empties the
noooo, noo n nooo nooooo noo no no, no noooo. Noo nooo noooooo noo

decanter.
nooooooo.










CHAPTER 102. A Bower in the Arsacides.
NOOOOOO noo. N Noooo no noo Noooooooo.







Hitherto, in descriptively treating of the Sperm Whale, I have chiefly
Nooooooo, no noooooooooooo nooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo, N nooo noooooo

dwelt upon the marvels of his outer aspect; or separately and in detail
noooo nooo noo noooooo no noo noooo nooooo; no nooooooooo noo no nooooo

upon some few interior structural features. But to a large and thorough
nooo nooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo nooooooo. Noo no n noooo noo nooooooo

sweeping comprehension of him, it behooves me now to unbutton him still
nooooooo noooooooooooo no noo, no nooooooo no noo no nooooooo noo noooo

further, and untagging the points of his hose, unbuckling his garters,
noooooo, noo noooooooo noo nooooo no noo nooo, nooooooooo noo noooooo,

and casting loose the hooks and the eyes of the joints of his innermost
noo noooooo noooo noo noooo noo noo nooo no noo nooooo no noo noooooooo

bones, set him before you in his ultimatum; that is to say, in his
noooo, noo noo nooooo noo no noo noooooooo; nooo no no noo, no noo

unconditional skeleton.
noooooooooooo nooooooo.




But how now, Ishmael? How is it, that you, a mere oarsman in the
Noo noo noo, Noooooo? Noo no no, nooo noo, n nooo noooooo no noo

fishery, pretend to know aught about the subterranean parts of the
noooooo, noooooo no nooo noooo noooo noo nooooooooooo noooo no noo

whale? Did erudite Stubb, mounted upon your capstan, deliver lectures
noooo? Noo noooooo Noooo, noooooo nooo nooo noooooo, noooooo nooooooo

on the anatomy of the Cetacea; and by help of the windlass, hold up a
no noo noooooo no noo Noooooo; noo no nooo no noo nooooooo, nooo no n

specimen rib for exhibition? Explain thyself, Ishmael. Can you land
nooooooo noo noo nooooooooo? Noooooo noooooo, Noooooo. Noo noo nooo

a full-grown whale on your deck for examination, as a cook dishes a
n nooo-noooo noooo no nooo nooo noo noooooooooo, no n nooo nooooo n

roast-pig? Surely not. A veritable witness have you hitherto been,
noooo-noo? Nooooo noo. N noooooooo noooooo nooo noo nooooooo nooo,

Ishmael; but have a care how you seize the privilege of Jonah alone;
Noooooo; noo nooo n nooo noo noo noooo noo noooooooo no Noooo noooo;

the privilege of discoursing upon the joists and beams; the rafters,
noo noooooooo no noooooooooo nooo noo nooooo noo noooo; noo noooooo,

ridge-pole, sleepers, and under-pinnings, making up the frame-work of
noooo-nooo, nooooooo, noo noooo-nooooooo, nooooo no noo noooo-nooo no

leviathan; and belike of the tallow-vats, dairy-rooms, butteries, and
noooooooo; noo nooooo no noo nooooo-nooo, noooo-noooo, noooooooo, noo

cheeseries in his bowels.
nooooooooo no noo nooooo.




I confess, that since Jonah, few whalemen have penetrated very far
N noooooo, nooo noooo Noooo, noo nooooooo nooo nooooooooo nooo noo

beneath the skin of the adult whale; nevertheless, I have been blessed
noooooo noo nooo no noo noooo noooo; nooooooooooo, N nooo nooo noooooo

with an opportunity to dissect him in miniature. In a ship I belonged
nooo no noooooooooo no noooooo noo no noooooooo. No n nooo N nooooooo

to, a small cub Sperm Whale was once bodily hoisted to the deck for his
no, n noooo noo Noooo Noooo noo nooo nooooo noooooo no noo nooo noo noo

poke or bag, to make sheaths for the barbs of the harpoons, and for the
nooo no noo, no nooo noooooo noo noo noooo no noo nooooooo, noo noo noo

heads of the lances. Think you I let that chance go, without using my
noooo no noo nooooo. Noooo noo N noo nooo nooooo no, noooooo noooo no

boat-hatchet and jack-knife, and breaking the seal and reading all the
nooo-noooooo noo nooo-noooo, noo nooooooo noo nooo noo noooooo noo noo

contents of that young cub?
nooooooo no nooo noooo noo?




And as for my exact knowledge of the bones of the leviathan in their
Noo no noo no noooo noooooooo no noo noooo no noo noooooooo no noooo

gigantic, full grown development, for that rare knowledge I am indebted
nooooooo, nooo noooo noooooooooo, noo nooo nooo noooooooo N no nooooooo

to my late royal friend Tranquo, king of Tranque, one of the Arsacides.
no no nooo noooo nooooo Noooooo, nooo no Noooooo, noo no noo Noooooooo.

For being at Tranque, years ago, when attached to the trading-ship Dey
Noo noooo no Noooooo, noooo noo, nooo nooooooo no noo noooooo-nooo Noo

of Algiers, I was invited to spend part of the Arsacidean holidays with
no Noooooo, N noo noooooo no noooo nooo no noo Nooooooooo nooooooo nooo

the lord of Tranque, at his retired palm villa at Pupella; a sea-side
noo nooo no Noooooo, no noo noooooo nooo noooo no Noooooo; n noo-nooo

glen not very far distant from what our sailors called Bamboo-Town, his
nooo noo nooo noo noooooo nooo nooo noo noooooo nooooo Nooooo-Nooo, noo

capital.
noooooo.




Among many other fine qualities, my royal friend Tranquo, being gifted
Noooo nooo noooo nooo noooooooo, no noooo nooooo Noooooo, noooo nooooo

with a devout love for all matters of barbaric vertu, had brought
nooo n nooooo nooo noo noo noooooo no nooooooo noooo, noo noooooo

together in Pupella whatever rare things the more ingenious of his
nooooooo no Noooooo nooooooo nooo nooooo noo nooo noooooooo no noo

people could invent; chiefly carved woods of wonderful devices,
nooooo noooo nooooo; noooooo nooooo noooo no noooooooo noooooo,

chiselled shells, inlaid spears, costly paddles, aromatic canoes;
noooooooo nooooo, nooooo nooooo, nooooo noooooo, nooooooo nooooo;

and all these distributed among whatever natural wonders, the
noo noo noooo noooooooooo noooo nooooooo noooooo noooooo, noo

wonder-freighted, tribute-rendering waves had cast upon his shores.
nooooo-noooooooo, noooooo-noooooooo noooo noo nooo nooo noo nooooo.




Chief among these latter was a great Sperm Whale, which, after an
Noooo noooo noooo nooooo noo n noooo Noooo Noooo, noooo, noooo no

unusually long raging gale, had been found dead and stranded, with his
noooooooo nooo nooooo nooo, noo nooo noooo nooo noo nooooooo, nooo noo

head against a cocoa-nut tree, whose plumage-like, tufted droopings
nooo noooooo n noooo-noo nooo, noooo noooooo-nooo, nooooo noooooooo

seemed his verdant jet. When the vast body had at last been stripped of
nooooo noo noooooo noo. Nooo noo nooo nooo noo no nooo nooo nooooooo no

its fathom-deep enfoldings, and the bones become dust dry in the sun,
noo nooooo-nooo nooooooooo, noo noo noooo nooooo nooo noo no noo noo,

then the skeleton was carefully transported up the Pupella glen, where a
nooo noo nooooooo noo noooooooo noooooooooo no noo Noooooo nooo, noooo n

grand temple of lordly palms now sheltered it.
noooo nooooo no nooooo noooo noo noooooooo no.




The ribs were hung with trophies; the vertebrae were carved with
Noo nooo nooo nooo nooo nooooooo; noo noooooooo nooo nooooo nooo

Arsacidean annals, in strange hieroglyphics; in the skull, the priests
Nooooooooo nooooo, no noooooo noooooooooooo; no noo noooo, noo noooooo

kept up an unextinguished aromatic flame, so that the mystic head
nooo no no nooooooooooooo nooooooo noooo, no nooo noo nooooo nooo

again sent forth its vapoury spout; while, suspended from a bough, the
noooo nooo noooo noo noooooo noooo; noooo, noooooooo nooo n noooo, noo

terrific lower jaw vibrated over all the devotees, like the hair-hung
nooooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo noo noo nooooooo, nooo noo nooo-nooo

sword that so affrighted Damocles.
noooo nooo no nooooooooo Nooooooo.




It was a wondrous sight. The wood was green as mosses of the Icy
No noo n nooooooo noooo. Noo nooo noo noooo no nooooo no noo Noo

Glen; the trees stood high and haughty, feeling their living sap; the
Nooo; noo noooo noooo nooo noo noooooo, noooooo noooo nooooo noo; noo

industrious earth beneath was as a weaver's loom, with a gorgeous carpet
noooooooooo noooo noooooo noo no n nooooo'n nooo, nooo n nooooooo nooooo

on it, whereof the ground-vine tendrils formed the warp and woof, and
no no, noooooo noo nooooo-nooo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo noo nooo, noo

the living flowers the figures. All the trees, with all their laden
noo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo. Noo noo noooo, nooo noo noooo noooo

branches; all the shrubs, and ferns, and grasses; the message-carrying
nooooooo; noo noo nooooo, noo noooo, noo noooooo; noo noooooo-nooooooo

air; all these unceasingly were active. Through the lacings of the
noo; noo noooo noooooooooo nooo nooooo. Noooooo noo noooooo no noo

leaves, the great sun seemed a flying shuttle weaving the unwearied
nooooo, noo noooo noo nooooo n nooooo noooooo noooooo noo noooooooo

verdure. Oh, busy weaver! unseen weaver!--pause!--one word!--whither
noooooo. No, nooo nooooo! nooooo nooooo!--noooo!--noo nooo!--noooooo

flows the fabric? what palace may it deck? wherefore all these ceaseless
noooo noo nooooo? nooo nooooo noo no nooo? noooooooo noo noooo noooooooo

toilings? Speak, weaver!--stay thy hand!--but one single word with
nooooooo? Noooo, nooooo!--nooo noo nooo!--noo noo nooooo nooo nooo

thee! Nay--the shuttle flies--the figures float from forth the loom; the
nooo! Noo--noo noooooo noooo--noo noooooo noooo nooo noooo noo nooo; noo

freshet-rushing carpet for ever slides away. The weaver-god, he weaves;
noooooo-noooooo nooooo noo nooo nooooo nooo. Noo nooooo-noo, no nooooo;

and by that weaving is he deafened, that he hears no mortal voice; and
noo no nooo noooooo no no nooooooo, nooo no noooo no nooooo noooo; noo

by that humming, we, too, who look on the loom are deafened; and only
no nooo noooooo, no, noo, noo nooo no noo nooo noo nooooooo; noo nooo

when we escape it shall we hear the thousand voices that speak through
nooo no nooooo no noooo no nooo noo nooooooo nooooo nooo noooo noooooo

it. For even so it is in all material factories. The spoken words that
no. Noo nooo no no no no noo nooooooo noooooooo. Noo nooooo noooo nooo

are inaudible among the flying spindles; those same words are plainly
noo noooooooo noooo noo nooooo nooooooo; noooo nooo noooo noo noooooo

heard without the walls, bursting from the opened casements. Thereby
noooo noooooo noo noooo, nooooooo nooo noo nooooo noooooooo. Noooooo

have villainies been detected. Ah, mortal! then, be heedful; for so, in
nooo nooooooooo nooo nooooooo. No, nooooo! nooo, no noooooo; noo no, no

all this din of the great world's loom, thy subtlest thinkings may be
noo nooo noo no noo noooo noooo'n nooo, noo nooooooo noooooooo noo no

overheard afar.
noooooooo nooo.




Now, amid the green, life-restless loom of that Arsacidean wood, the
Noo, nooo noo noooo, nooo-nooooooo nooo no nooo Nooooooooo nooo, noo

great, white, worshipped skeleton lay lounging--a gigantic idler! Yet,
noooo, noooo, nooooooooo nooooooo noo nooooooo--n nooooooo noooo! Noo,

as the ever-woven verdant warp and woof intermixed and hummed around
no noo nooo-noooo noooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo noo nooooo nooooo

him, the mighty idler seemed the cunning weaver; himself all woven
noo, noo nooooo noooo nooooo noo noooooo nooooo; noooooo noo noooo

over with the vines; every month assuming greener, fresher verdure; but
nooo nooo noo noooo; noooo noooo nooooooo noooooo, noooooo noooooo; noo

himself a skeleton. Life folded Death; Death trellised Life; the grim
noooooo n nooooooo. Nooo nooooo Noooo; Noooo noooooooo Nooo; noo nooo

god wived with youthful Life, and begat him curly-headed glories.
noo noooo nooo nooooooo Nooo, noo noooo noo noooo-nooooo noooooo.




Now, when with royal Tranquo I visited this wondrous whale, and saw the
Noo, nooo nooo noooo Noooooo N noooooo nooo nooooooo noooo, noo noo noo

skull an altar, and the artificial smoke ascending from where the real
noooo no noooo, noo noo nooooooooo noooo noooooooo nooo noooo noo nooo

jet had issued, I marvelled that the king should regard a chapel as
noo noo nooooo, N noooooooo nooo noo nooo nooooo nooooo n nooooo no

an object of vertu. He laughed. But more I marvelled that the priests
no nooooo no noooo. No noooooo. Noo nooo N noooooooo nooo noo noooooo

should swear that smoky jet of his was genuine. To and fro I paced
nooooo noooo nooo noooo noo no noo noo noooooo. No noo noo N noooo

before this skeleton--brushed the vines aside--broke through the
nooooo nooo nooooooo--noooooo noo noooo noooo--noooo noooooo noo

ribs--and with a ball of Arsacidean twine, wandered, eddied long amid
nooo--noo nooo n nooo no Nooooooooo noooo, nooooooo, nooooo nooo nooo

its many winding, shaded colonnades and arbours. But soon my line was
noo nooo noooooo, nooooo nooooooooo noo noooooo. Noo nooo no nooo noo

out; and following it back, I emerged from the opening where I entered.
noo; noo noooooooo no nooo, N noooooo nooo noo noooooo noooo N noooooo.

I saw no living thing within; naught was there but bones.
N noo no nooooo noooo nooooo; nooooo noo noooo noo noooo.




Cutting me a green measuring-rod, I once more dived within the skeleton.
Noooooo no n noooo noooooooo-noo, N nooo nooo noooo nooooo noo nooooooo.

From their arrow-slit in the skull, the priests perceived me taking the
Nooo noooo noooo-nooo no noo noooo, noo noooooo noooooooo no nooooo noo

altitude of the final rib, "How now!" they shouted; "Dar'st thou measure
nooooooo no noo noooo noo, "Noo noo!" nooo noooooo; "Noo'no nooo noooooo

this our god! That's for us." "Aye, priests--well, how long do ye make
nooo noo noo! Nooo'n noo no." "Noo, noooooo--nooo, noo nooo no no nooo

him, then?" But hereupon a fierce contest rose among them, concerning
noo, nooo?" Noo nooooooo n nooooo noooooo nooo noooo nooo, nooooooooo

feet and inches; they cracked each other's sconces with their
nooo noo nooooo; nooo noooooo nooo noooo'n noooooo nooo noooo

yard-sticks--the great skull echoed--and seizing that lucky chance, I
nooo-nooooo--noo noooo noooo nooooo--noo noooooo nooo noooo nooooo, N

quickly concluded my own admeasurements.
noooooo noooooooo no noo nooooooooooooo.




These admeasurements I now propose to set before you. But first, be
Noooo nooooooooooooo N noo noooooo no noo nooooo noo. Noo noooo, no

it recorded, that, in this matter, I am not free to utter any fancied
no nooooooo, nooo, no nooo nooooo, N no noo nooo no noooo noo noooooo

measurement I please. Because there are skeleton authorities you can
noooooooooo N nooooo. Noooooo noooo noo nooooooo noooooooooo noo noo

refer to, to test my accuracy. There is a Leviathanic Museum, they tell
noooo no, no nooo no nooooooo. Noooo no n Noooooooooo Nooooo, nooo nooo

me, in Hull, England, one of the whaling ports of that country, where
no, no Nooo, Noooooo, noo no noo noooooo noooo no nooo noooooo, noooo

they have some fine specimens of fin-backs and other whales. Likewise, I
nooo nooo nooo nooo noooooooo no noo-noooo noo noooo nooooo. Nooooooo, N

nooo noooo nooo no noo nooooo no Nooooooooo, no Noo Noooooooo, nooo nooo

what the proprietors call "the only perfect specimen of a Greenland or
nooo noo noooooooooo nooo "noo nooo noooooo nooooooo no n Noooooooo no

River Whale in the United States." Moreover, at a place in Yorkshire,
Noooo Noooo no noo Nooooo Nooooo." Nooooooo, no n noooo no Noooooooo,

England, Burton Constable by name, a certain Sir Clifford Constable has
Noooooo, Nooooo Noooooooo no nooo, n noooooo Noo Nooooooo Noooooooo noo

in his possession the skeleton of a Sperm Whale, but of moderate size,
no noo nooooooooo noo nooooooo no n Noooo Noooo, noo no nooooooo nooo,

by no means of the full-grown magnitude of my friend King Tranquo's.
no no noooo no noo nooo-noooo noooooooo no no nooooo Nooo Noooooo'n.




In both cases, the stranded whales to which these two skeletons
No nooo noooo, noo nooooooo nooooo no noooo noooo noo noooooooo

belonged, were originally claimed by their proprietors upon similar
nooooooo, nooo nooooooooo noooooo no noooo noooooooooo nooo noooooo

grounds. King Tranquo seizing his because he wanted it; and Sir
noooooo. Nooo Noooooo noooooo noo noooooo no nooooo no; noo Noo

Clifford, because he was lord of the seignories of those parts. Sir
Nooooooo, noooooo no noo nooo no noo nooooooooo no noooo noooo. Noo

Clifford's whale has been articulated throughout; so that, like a
Nooooooo'n noooo noo nooo noooooooooo nooooooooo; no nooo, nooo n

great chest of drawers, you can open and shut him, in all his bony
noooo noooo no noooooo, noo noo nooo noo nooo noo, no noo noo nooo

cavities--spread out his ribs like a gigantic fan--and swing all day
nooooooo--nooooo noo noo nooo nooo n nooooooo noo--noo noooo noo noo

upon his lower jaw. Locks are to be put upon some of his trap-doors and
nooo noo noooo noo. Noooo noo no no noo nooo nooo no noo nooo-noooo noo

nooooooo; noo n noooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooo nooooooo nooo n noooo no

keys at his side. Sir Clifford thinks of charging twopence for a peep at
nooo no noo nooo. Noo Nooooooo nooooo no nooooooo nooooooo noo n nooo no

the whispering gallery in the spinal column; threepence to hear the echo
noo nooooooooo noooooo no noo nooooo nooooo; nooooooooo no nooo noo nooo

in the hollow of his cerebellum; and sixpence for the unrivalled view
no noo nooooo no noo nooooooooo; noo nooooooo noo noo nooooooooo nooo

from his forehead.
nooo noo nooooooo.




The skeleton dimensions I shall now proceed to set down are copied
Noo nooooooo nooooooooo N noooo noo noooooo no noo nooo noo nooooo

nooooooo nooo no noooo noo, noooo N noo nooo nooooooo; no no no nooo

wanderings at that period, there was no other secure way of preserving

nooo nooooooo nooooooooo. Noo no N noo noooooo noo noooo, noo nooooo

noo noooo noooo no no nooo no nooooo n noooo nooo noo n nooo N noo
