noooooo nooooo nooo noo noo nooooo; noo, nooooo, nooooo nooooo no noo

enter into a congenial admeasurement of the whale.
noooo nooo n noooooooo noooooooooooo no noo noooo.










CHAPTER 103. Measurement of The Whale's Skeleton.
NOOOOOO noo. Noooooooooo no Noo Noooo'n Nooooooo.







In the first place, I wish to lay before you a particular, plain
No noo noooo noooo, N nooo no noo nooooo noo n nooooooooo, noooo

statement, touching the living bulk of this leviathan, whose skeleton we
noooooooo, nooooooo noo nooooo nooo no nooo noooooooo, noooo nooooooo no

are briefly to exhibit. Such a statement may prove useful here.
noo noooooo no noooooo. Nooo n noooooooo noo noooo nooooo nooo.




According to a careful calculation I have made, and which I partly base
Noooooooo no n noooooo noooooooooo N nooo nooo, noo noooo N nooooo nooo

upon Captain Scoresby's estimate, of seventy tons for the largest
nooo Noooooo Nooooooo'n nooooooo, no noooooo nooo noo noo noooooo

sized Greenland whale of sixty feet in length; according to my careful
noooo Noooooooo noooo no noooo nooo no nooooo; noooooooo no no noooooo

calculation, I say, a Sperm Whale of the largest magnitude, between
noooooooooo, N noo, n Noooo Noooo no noo noooooo noooooooo, noooooo

eighty-five and ninety feet in length, and something less than forty
nooooo-nooo noo nooooo nooo no nooooo, noo noooooooo nooo nooo noooo

feet in its fullest circumference, such a whale will weigh at least
nooo no noo noooooo noooooooooooo, nooo n noooo nooo noooo no noooo

ninety tons; so that, reckoning thirteen men to a ton, he would
nooooo nooo; no nooo, noooooooo nooooooo noo no n noo, no noooo

considerably outweigh the combined population of a whole village of one
nooooooooooo nooooooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo no n noooo noooooo no noo

thousand one hundred inhabitants.
nooooooo noo noooooo noooooooooo.




Think you not then that brains, like yoked cattle, should be put to this
Noooo noo noo nooo nooo nooooo, nooo noooo nooooo, nooooo no noo no nooo

leviathan, to make him at all budge to any landsman's imagination?
noooooooo, no nooo noo no noo noooo no noo nooooooo'n noooooooooo?




Having already in various ways put before you his skull, spout-hole,
Nooooo noooooo no noooooo nooo noo nooooo noo noo noooo, noooo-nooo,

jaw, teeth, tail, forehead, fins, and divers other parts, I shall now
noo, noooo, nooo, nooooooo, nooo, noo nooooo noooo noooo, N noooo noo

simply point out what is most interesting in the general bulk of his
nooooo noooo noo nooo no nooo noooooooooo no noo noooooo nooo no noo

unobstructed bones. But as the colossal skull embraces so very large
nooooooooooo noooo. Noo no noo nooooooo noooo nooooooo no nooo noooo

a proportion of the entire extent of the skeleton; as it is by far the
n nooooooooo no noo nooooo nooooo no noo nooooooo; no no no no noo noo

most complicated part; and as nothing is to be repeated concerning it in
nooo noooooooooo nooo; noo no noooooo no no no nooooooo nooooooooo no no

this chapter, you must not fail to carry it in your mind, or under your
nooo noooooo, noo nooo noo nooo no noooo no no nooo nooo, no noooo nooo

arm, as we proceed, otherwise you will not gain a complete notion of the
noo, no no noooooo, noooooooo noo nooo noo nooo n nooooooo nooooo no noo

general structure we are about to view.
noooooo noooooooo no noo noooo no nooo.




In length, the Sperm Whale's skeleton at Tranque measured seventy-two
No nooooo, noo Noooo Noooo'n nooooooo no Noooooo nooooooo noooooo-noo

Feet; so that when fully invested and extended in life, he must have
Nooo; no nooo nooo noooo nooooooo noo nooooooo no nooo, no nooo nooo

been ninety feet long; for in the whale, the skeleton loses about one
nooo nooooo nooo nooo; noo no noo noooo, noo nooooooo noooo noooo noo

fifth in length compared with the living body. Of this seventy-two feet,
noooo no nooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo nooo. No nooo noooooo-noo nooo,

his skull and jaw comprised some twenty feet, leaving some fifty feet of
noo noooo noo noo noooooooo nooo nooooo nooo, noooooo nooo noooo nooo no

plain back-bone. Attached to this back-bone, for something less than a
noooo nooo-nooo. Nooooooo no nooo nooo-nooo, noo noooooooo nooo nooo n

third of its length, was the mighty circular basket of ribs which once
noooo no noo nooooo, noo noo nooooo nooooooo nooooo no nooo noooo nooo

enclosed his vitals.
nooooooo noo nooooo.




To me this vast ivory-ribbed chest, with the long, unrelieved spine,
No no nooo nooo noooo-nooooo noooo, nooo noo nooo, nooooooooo noooo,

extending far away from it in a straight line, not a little resembled
noooooooo noo nooo nooo no no n nooooooo nooo, noo n nooooo noooooooo

the hull of a great ship new-laid upon the stocks, when only some twenty
noo nooo no n noooo nooo noo-nooo nooo noo nooooo, nooo nooo nooo nooooo

of her naked bow-ribs are inserted, and the keel is otherwise, for the
no noo noooo noo-nooo noo nooooooo, noo noo nooo no noooooooo, noo noo

time, but a long, disconnected timber.
nooo, noo n nooo, nooooooooooo nooooo.




The ribs were ten on a side. The first, to begin from the neck,
Noo nooo nooo noo no n nooo. Noo noooo, no noooo nooo noo nooo,

was nearly six feet long; the second, third, and fourth were each
noo nooooo noo nooo nooo; noo nooooo, noooo, noo nooooo nooo nooo

successively longer, till you came to the climax of the fifth, or one
nooooooooooo nooooo, nooo noo nooo no noo nooooo no noo noooo, no noo

of the middle ribs, which measured eight feet and some inches. From
no noo nooooo nooo, noooo nooooooo noooo nooo noo nooo nooooo. Nooo

that part, the remaining ribs diminished, till the tenth and last only
nooo nooo, noo noooooooo nooo nooooooooo, nooo noo noooo noo nooo nooo

spanned five feet and some inches. In general thickness, they all bore
noooooo nooo nooo noo nooo nooooo. No noooooo noooooooo, nooo noo nooo

a seemly correspondence to their length. The middle ribs were the most
n nooooo nooooooooooooo no noooo nooooo. Noo nooooo nooo nooo noo nooo

arched. In some of the Arsacides they are used for beams whereon to lay
nooooo. No nooo no noo Noooooooo nooo noo nooo noo noooo noooooo no noo

footpath bridges over small streams.
nooooooo noooooo nooo noooo noooooo.




In considering these ribs, I could not but be struck anew with the
No noooooooooo noooo nooo, N noooo noo noo no nooooo nooo nooo noo

circumstance, so variously repeated in this book, that the skeleton of
nooooooooooo, no noooooooo nooooooo no nooo nooo, nooo noo nooooooo no

the whale is by no means the mould of his invested form. The largest of
noo noooo no no no noooo noo noooo no noo nooooooo nooo. Noo noooooo no

the Tranque ribs, one of the middle ones, occupied that part of the fish
noo Noooooo nooo, noo no noo nooooo nooo, nooooooo nooo nooo no noo nooo

which, in life, is greatest in depth. Now, the greatest depth of the
noooo, no nooo, no nooooooo no noooo. Noo, noo nooooooo noooo no noo

invested body of this particular whale must have been at least sixteen
nooooooo nooo no nooo nooooooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo no noooo noooooo

feet; whereas, the corresponding rib measured but little more than eight
nooo; noooooo, noo noooooooooooo noo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo nooo noooo

feet. So that this rib only conveyed half of the true notion of the
nooo. No nooo nooo noo nooo nooooooo nooo no noo nooo nooooo no noo

living magnitude of that part. Besides, for some way, where I now saw
nooooo noooooooo no nooo nooo. Noooooo, noo nooo noo, noooo N noo noo

but a naked spine, all that had been once wrapped round with tons of
noo n noooo noooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooo noooooo noooo nooo nooo no

added bulk in flesh, muscle, blood, and bowels. Still more, for the
noooo nooo no noooo, nooooo, noooo, noo nooooo. Noooo nooo, noo noo

ample fins, I here saw but a few disordered joints; and in place of the
noooo nooo, N nooo noo noo n noo nooooooooo nooooo; noo no noooo no noo

weighty and majestic, but boneless flukes, an utter blank!
noooooo noo nooooooo, noo nooooooo nooooo, no noooo noooo!




How vain and foolish, then, thought I, for timid untravelled man to try
Noo nooo noo noooooo, nooo, noooooo N, noo noooo noooooooooo noo no noo

to comprehend aright this wondrous whale, by merely poring over his dead
no nooooooooo nooooo nooo nooooooo noooo, no nooooo nooooo nooo noo nooo

attenuated skeleton, stretched in this peaceful wood. No. Only in the
nooooooooo nooooooo, noooooooo no nooo nooooooo nooo. No. Nooo no noo

heart of quickest perils; only when within the eddyings of his angry
noooo no nooooooo nooooo; nooo nooo nooooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo

flukes; only on the profound unbounded sea, can the fully invested whale
nooooo; nooo no noo nooooooo noooooooo noo, noo noo noooo nooooooo noooo

be truly and livingly found out.
no noooo noo nooooooo noooo noo.




But the spine. For that, the best way we can consider it is, with a
Noo noo noooo. Noo nooo, noo nooo noo no noo nooooooo no no, nooo n

crane, to pile its bones high up on end. No speedy enterprise. But now
noooo, no nooo noo noooo nooo no no noo. No nooooo nooooooooo. Noo noo

it's done, it looks much like Pompey's Pillar.
no'n nooo, no noooo nooo nooo Nooooo'n Nooooo.




There are forty and odd vertebrae in all, which in the skeleton are
Noooo noo noooo noo noo noooooooo no noo, noooo no noo nooooooo noo

not locked together. They mostly lie like the great knobbed blocks on
noo nooooo nooooooo. Nooo nooooo noo nooo noo noooo noooooo nooooo no

a Gothic spire, forming solid courses of heavy masonry. The largest,
n Nooooo noooo, noooooo noooo noooooo no noooo noooooo. Noo noooooo,

a middle one, is in width something less than three feet, and in depth
n nooooo noo, no no noooo noooooooo nooo nooo noooo nooo, noo no noooo

more than four. The smallest, where the spine tapers away into the
nooo nooo nooo. Noo nooooooo, noooo noo noooo nooooo nooo nooo noo

tail, is only two inches in width, and looks something like a white
nooo, no nooo noo nooooo no noooo, noo noooo noooooooo nooo n noooo

billiard-ball. I was told that there were still smaller ones, but they
nooooooo-nooo. N noo nooo nooo noooo nooo noooo noooooo nooo, noo nooo

had been lost by some little cannibal urchins, the priest's children,
noo nooo nooo no nooo nooooo nooooooo noooooo, noo nooooo'n nooooooo,

who had stolen them to play marbles with. Thus we see how that the
noo noo nooooo nooo no nooo noooooo nooo. Nooo no noo noo nooo noo

spine of even the hugest of living things tapers off at last into simple
noooo no nooo noo nooooo no nooooo nooooo nooooo noo no nooo nooo nooooo

child's play.
noooo'n nooo.










CHAPTER 104. The Fossil Whale.
NOOOOOO noo. Noo Nooooo Noooo.







From his mighty bulk the whale affords a most congenial theme whereon
Nooo noo nooooo nooo noo noooo noooooo n nooo noooooooo noooo noooooo

to enlarge, amplify, and generally expatiate. Would you, you could not
no noooooo, noooooo, noo noooooooo noooooooo. Noooo noo, noo noooo noo

compress him. By good rights he should only be treated of in imperial
nooooooo noo. No nooo nooooo no nooooo nooo no noooooo no no nooooooo

folio. Not to tell over again his furlongs from spiracle to tail,
noooo. Noo no nooo nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooo nooooooo no nooo,

and the yards he measures about the waist; only think of the gigantic
noo noo noooo no nooooooo noooo noo noooo; nooo noooo no noo nooooooo

involutions of his intestines, where they lie in him like great
noooooooooo no noo nooooooooo, noooo nooo noo no noo nooo noooo

cables and hawsers coiled away in the subterranean orlop-deck of a
nooooo noo noooooo nooooo nooo no noo nooooooooooo noooo-nooo no n

line-of-battle-ship.
nooo-no-nooooo-nooo.




Since I have undertaken to manhandle this Leviathan, it behooves me
Noooo N nooo nooooooooo no noooooooo nooo Noooooooo, no nooooooo no

to approve myself omnisciently exhaustive in the enterprise; not
no noooooo nooooo nooooooooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooooooo; noo

overlooking the minutest seminal germs of his blood, and spinning him
noooooooooo noo nooooooo noooooo noooo no noo noooo, noo nooooooo noo

out to the uttermost coil of his bowels. Having already described him
noo no noo noooooooo nooo no noo nooooo. Nooooo noooooo noooooooo noo

in most of his present habitatory and anatomical peculiarities, it
no nooo no noo noooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooooooooo, no

now remains to magnify him in an archaeological, fossiliferous, and
noo noooooo no noooooo noo no no nooooooooooooo, noooooooooooo, noo

antediluvian point of view. Applied to any other creature than the
nooooooooooo noooo no nooo. Noooooo no noo noooo nooooooo nooo noo

Leviathan--to an ant or a flea--such portly terms might justly be deemed
Noooooooo--no no noo no n nooo--nooo nooooo noooo noooo nooooo no nooooo

unwarrantably grandiloquent. But when Leviathan is the text, the case is
noooooooooooo noooooooooooo. Noo nooo Noooooooo no noo nooo, noo nooo no

altered. Fain am I to stagger to this emprise under the weightiest
noooooo. Nooo no N no noooooo no nooo noooooo noooo noo nooooooooo

words of the dictionary. And here be it said, that whenever it has been
noooo no noo nooooooooo. Noo nooo no no nooo, nooo nooooooo no noo nooo

convenient to consult one in the course of these dissertations, I have
nooooooooo no noooooo noo no noo nooooo no noooo noooooooooooo, N nooo

invariably used a huge quarto edition of Johnson, expressly purchased
nooooooooo nooo n nooo nooooo noooooo no Noooooo, noooooooo noooooooo

for that purpose; because that famous lexicographer's uncommon personal
noo nooo noooooo; noooooo nooo nooooo noooooooooooo'n nooooooo nooooooo

bulk more fitted him to compile a lexicon to be used by a whale author
nooo nooo nooooo noo no noooooo n noooooo no no nooo no n noooo nooooo

like me.
nooo no.




One often hears of writers that rise and swell with their subject,
Noo noooo noooo no noooooo nooo nooo noo noooo nooo noooo noooooo,

though it may seem but an ordinary one. How, then, with me, writing
nooooo no noo nooo noo no nooooooo noo. Noo, nooo, nooo no, noooooo

of this Leviathan? Unconsciously my chirography expands into placard
no nooo Noooooooo? Noooooooooooo no noooooooooo noooooo nooo noooooo

capitals. Give me a condor's quill! Give me Vesuvius' crater for an
nooooooo. Nooo no n nooooo'n noooo! Nooo no Nooooooo' nooooo noo no

inkstand! Friends, hold my arms! For in the mere act of penning my
nooooooo! Noooooo, nooo no nooo! Noo no noo nooo noo no noooooo no

thoughts of this Leviathan, they weary me, and make me faint with their
nooooooo no nooo Noooooooo, nooo noooo no, noo nooo no noooo nooo noooo

outreaching comprehensiveness of sweep, as if to include the whole
noooooooooo noooooooooooooooo no noooo, no no no noooooo noo noooo

circle of the sciences, and all the generations of whales, and men, and
nooooo no noo nooooooo, noo noo noo noooooooooo no nooooo, noo noo, noo

mastodons, past, present, and to come, with all the revolving panoramas
noooooooo, nooo, noooooo, noo no nooo, nooo noo noo noooooooo noooooooo

of empire on earth, and throughout the whole universe, not excluding its
no nooooo no noooo, noo nooooooooo noo noooo nooooooo, noo noooooooo noo

suburbs. Such, and so magnifying, is the virtue of a large and liberal
noooooo. Nooo, noo no nooooooooo, no noo nooooo no n noooo noo noooooo

theme! We expand to its bulk. To produce a mighty book, you must choose
noooo! No nooooo no noo nooo. No noooooo n nooooo nooo, noo nooo nooooo

a mighty theme. No great and enduring volume can ever be written on the
n nooooo noooo. No noooo noo nooooooo nooooo noo nooo no noooooo no noo

flea, though many there be who have tried it.
nooo, nooooo nooo noooo no noo nooo noooo no.




Ere entering upon the subject of Fossil Whales, I present my credentials
Noo nooooooo nooo noo noooooo no Nooooo Nooooo, N noooooo no noooooooooo

as a geologist, by stating that in my miscellaneous time I have been
no n noooooooo, no noooooo nooo no no noooooooooooo nooo N nooo nooo

a stone-mason, and also a great digger of ditches, canals and wells,
n noooo-noooo, noo nooo n noooo nooooo no noooooo, nooooo noo noooo,

wine-vaults, cellars, and cisterns of all sorts. Likewise, by way of
nooo-nooooo, noooooo, noo nooooooo no noo noooo. Nooooooo, no noo no

preliminary, I desire to remind the reader, that while in the earlier
noooooooooo, N nooooo no nooooo noo nooooo, nooo noooo no noo noooooo

geological strata there are found the fossils of monsters now almost
nooooooooo nooooo noooo noo noooo noo noooooo no nooooooo noo nooooo

completely extinct; the subsequent relics discovered in what are called
nooooooooo noooooo; noo nooooooooo nooooo nooooooooo no nooo noo nooooo

the Tertiary formations seem the connecting, or at any rate intercepted
noo Nooooooo nooooooooo nooo noo nooooooooo, no no noo nooo noooooooooo

links, between the antichronical creatures, and those whose remote
noooo, noooooo noo noooooooooooo noooooooo, noo noooo noooo nooooo

posterity are said to have entered the Ark; all the Fossil Whales
noooooooo noo nooo no nooo noooooo noo Noo; noo noo Nooooo Nooooo

hitherto discovered belong to the Tertiary period, which is the last
nooooooo nooooooooo nooooo no noo Nooooooo nooooo, noooo no noo nooo

preceding the superficial formations. And though none of them
noooooooo noo noooooooooo nooooooooo. Noo nooooo nooo no nooo

precisely answer to any known species of the present time, they are yet
noooooooo nooooo no noo noooo noooooo no noo noooooo nooo, nooo noo noo

sufficiently akin to them in general respects, to justify their taking
nooooooooooo nooo no nooo no noooooo nooooooo, no noooooo noooo nooooo

rank as Cetacean fossils.
nooo no Nooooooo noooooo.




Detached broken fossils of pre-adamite whales, fragments of their bones
Nooooooo nooooo noooooo no noo-noooooo nooooo, noooooooo no noooo noooo

and skeletons, have within thirty years past, at various intervals, been
noo noooooooo, nooo nooooo nooooo noooo nooo, no noooooo noooooooo, nooo

found at the base of the Alps, in Lombardy, in France, in England, in
noooo no noo nooo no noo Nooo, no Nooooooo, no Nooooo, no Noooooo, no

Scotland, and in the States of Louisiana, Mississippi, and Alabama.
Nooooooo, noo no noo Nooooo no Noooooooo, Noooooooooo, noo Noooooo.

Among the more curious of such remains is part of a skull, which in the
Noooo noo nooo noooooo no nooo noooooo no nooo no n noooo, noooo no noo

year 1779 was disinterred in the Rue Dauphine in Paris, a short street
nooo nooo noo noooooooooo no noo Noo Nooooooo no Noooo, n noooo nooooo

opening almost directly upon the palace of the Tuileries; and bones
noooooo nooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooooo no noo Noooooooo; noo noooo

disinterred in excavating the great docks of Antwerp, in Napoleon's
noooooooooo no nooooooooo noo noooo noooo no Noooooo, no Nooooooo'n

time. Cuvier pronounced these fragments to have belonged to some utterly
nooo. Nooooo nooooooooo noooo noooooooo no nooo nooooooo no nooo noooooo

unknown Leviathanic species.
noooooo Noooooooooo noooooo.




But by far the most wonderful of all Cetacean relics was the almost
Noo no noo noo nooo noooooooo no noo Nooooooo nooooo noo noo nooooo

complete vast skeleton of an extinct monster, found in the year 1842, on
nooooooo nooo nooooooo no no noooooo noooooo, noooo no noo nooo nooo, no

the plantation of Judge Creagh, in Alabama. The awe-stricken credulous
noo nooooooooo no Noooo Nooooo, no Noooooo. Noo noo-nooooooo noooooooo

slaves in the vicinity took it for the bones of one of the fallen
nooooo no noo nooooooo nooo no noo noo noooo no noo no noo nooooo

angels. The Alabama doctors declared it a huge reptile, and bestowed
nooooo. Noo Noooooo noooooo nooooooo no n nooo noooooo, noo nooooooo

upon it the name of Basilosaurus. But some specimen bones of it being
nooo no noo nooo no Nooooooooooo. Noo nooo nooooooo noooo no no noooo

taken across the sea to Owen, the English Anatomist, it turned out
noooo nooooo noo noo no Nooo, noo Noooooo Noooooooo, no nooooo noo

that this alleged reptile was a whale, though of a departed species. A
nooo nooo noooooo noooooo noo n noooo, nooooo no n nooooooo noooooo. N

significant illustration of the fact, again and again repeated in this
noooooooooo nooooooooooo no noo nooo, noooo noo noooo nooooooo no nooo

book, that the skeleton of the whale furnishes but little clue to the
nooo, nooo noo nooooooo no noo noooo noooooooo noo nooooo nooo no noo

shape of his fully invested body. So Owen rechristened the monster
noooo no noo noooo nooooooo nooo. No Nooo nooooooooooo noo noooooo

Zeuglodon; and in his paper read before the London Geological Society,
Noooooooo; noo no noo noooo nooo nooooo noo Nooooo Nooooooooo Noooooo,

pronounced it, in substance, one of the most extraordinary creatures
nooooooooo no, no noooooooo, noo no noo nooo noooooooooooo noooooooo

which the mutations of the globe have blotted out of existence.
noooo noo noooooooo no noo noooo nooo noooooo noo no noooooooo.




When I stand among these mighty Leviathan skeletons, skulls, tusks,
Nooo N noooo noooo noooo nooooo Noooooooo noooooooo, nooooo, noooo,

jaws, ribs, and vertebrae, all characterized by partial resemblances to
nooo, nooo, noo noooooooo, noo noooooooooooo no noooooo nooooooooooo no

the existing breeds of sea-monsters; but at the same time bearing on
noo nooooooo nooooo no noo-nooooooo; noo no noo nooo nooo noooooo no

the other hand similar affinities to the annihilated antichronical
noo noooo nooo noooooo nooooooooo no noo noooooooooo noooooooooooo

Leviathans, their incalculable seniors; I am, by a flood, borne back
Nooooooooo, noooo nooooooooooo noooooo; N no, no n noooo, noooo nooo

to that wondrous period, ere time itself can be said to have begun;
no nooo nooooooo nooooo, noo nooo nooooo noo no nooo no nooo noooo;

for time began with man. Here Saturn's grey chaos rolls over me, and I
noo nooo noooo nooo noo. Nooo Nooooo'n nooo noooo noooo nooo no, noo N

obtain dim, shuddering glimpses into those Polar eternities; when wedged
nooooo noo, nooooooooo nooooooo nooo noooo Noooo nooooooooo; nooo nooooo

bastions of ice pressed hard upon what are now the Tropics; and in
nooooooo no noo noooooo nooo nooo nooo noo noo noo Noooooo; noo no

all the 25,000 miles of this world's circumference, not an inhabitable
noo noo no,noo noooo no nooo noooo'n noooooooooooo, noo no noooooooooo

hand's breadth of land was visible. Then the whole world was the
nooo'n noooooo no nooo noo noooooo. Nooo noo noooo noooo noo noo

whale's; and, king of creation, he left his wake along the present lines
noooo'n; noo, nooo no nooooooo, no nooo noo nooo noooo noo noooooo noooo

of the Andes and the Himmalehs. Who can show a pedigree like Leviathan?
no noo Noooo noo noo Noooooooo. Noo noo nooo n nooooooo nooo Noooooooo?

Ahab's harpoon had shed older blood than the Pharaoh's. Methuselah seems
Nooo'n noooooo noo nooo noooo noooo nooo noo Noooooo'n. Nooooooooo noooo

a school-boy. I look round to shake hands with Shem. I am horror-struck
n nooooo-noo. N nooo noooo no noooo noooo nooo Nooo. N no nooooo-nooooo

at this antemosaic, unsourced existence of the unspeakable terrors of
no nooo nooooooooo, noooooooo noooooooo no noo noooooooooo noooooo no

the whale, which, having been before all time, must needs exist after
noo noooo, noooo, nooooo nooo nooooo noo nooo, nooo noooo noooo noooo

all humane ages are over.
noo nooooo nooo noo nooo.




But not alone has this Leviathan left his pre-adamite traces in the
Noo noo noooo noo nooo Noooooooo nooo noo noo-noooooo nooooo no noo

stereotype plates of nature, and in limestone and marl bequeathed his
nooooooooo nooooo no nooooo, noo no noooooooo noo nooo nooooooooo noo

ancient bust; but upon Egyptian tablets, whose antiquity seems to claim
noooooo nooo; noo nooo Nooooooo noooooo, noooo noooooooo noooo no noooo

for them an almost fossiliferous character, we find the unmistakable
noo nooo no nooooo noooooooooooo noooooooo, no nooo noo nooooooooooo

print of his fin. In an apartment of the great temple of Denderah,
noooo no noo noo. No no noooooooo no noo noooo nooooo no Nooooooo,

some fifty years ago, there was discovered upon the granite ceiling a
nooo noooo noooo noo, noooo noo nooooooooo nooo noo noooooo noooooo n

sculptured and painted planisphere, abounding in centaurs, griffins, and
nooooooooo noo noooooo noooooooooo, noooooooo no nooooooo, nooooooo, noo

dolphins, similar to the grotesque figures on the celestial globe of the
nooooooo, noooooo no noo noooooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo noooo no noo

moderns. Gliding among them, old Leviathan swam as of yore; was there
noooooo. Noooooo noooo nooo, noo Noooooooo nooo no no nooo; noo noooo

swimming in that planisphere, centuries before Solomon was cradled.
nooooooo no nooo noooooooooo, noooooooo nooooo Noooooo noo noooooo.




Nor must there be omitted another strange attestation of the antiquity
Noo nooo noooo no noooooo noooooo noooooo noooooooooo no noo noooooooo

of the whale, in his own osseous post-diluvian reality, as set down by
no noo noooo, no noo noo noooooo nooo-nooooooo noooooo, no noo nooo no

the venerable John Leo, the old Barbary traveller.
noo noooooooo Nooo Noo, noo noo Noooooo noooooooo.




"Not far from the Sea-side, they have a Temple, the Rafters and Beams
"Noo noo nooo noo Noo-nooo, nooo nooo n Nooooo, noo Noooooo noo Noooo

of which are made of Whale-Bones; for Whales of a monstrous size are
no noooo noo nooo no Noooo-Noooo; noo Nooooo no n noooooooo nooo noo

oftentimes cast up dead upon that shore. The Common People imagine, that
nooooooooo nooo no nooo nooo nooo noooo. Noo Nooooo Nooooo noooooo, nooo

by a secret Power bestowed by God upon the temple, no Whale can pass it
no n nooooo Noooo nooooooo no Noo nooo noo nooooo, no Noooo noo nooo no

without immediate death. But the truth of the Matter is, that on either
noooooo noooooooo noooo. Noo noo noooo no noo Nooooo no, nooo no nooooo

side of the Temple, there are Rocks that shoot two Miles into the Sea,
nooo no noo Nooooo, noooo noo Noooo nooo noooo noo Noooo nooo noo Noo,

and wound the Whales when they light upon 'em. They keep a Whale's Rib
noo noooo noo Nooooo nooo nooo noooo nooo 'no. Nooo nooo n Noooo'n Noo

of an incredible length for a Miracle, which lying upon the Ground with
no no nooooooooo nooooo noo n Noooooo, noooo noooo nooo noo Nooooo nooo

its convex part uppermost, makes an Arch, the Head of which cannot be
noo nooooo nooo noooooooo, noooo no Nooo, noo Nooo no noooo nooooo no

reached by a Man upon a Camel's Back. This Rib (says John Leo) is said
noooooo no n Noo nooo n Noooo'n Nooo. Nooo Noo (nooo Nooo Noo) no nooo

to have layn there a hundred Years before I saw it. Their Historians
no nooo nooo noooo n noooooo Noooo nooooo N noo no. Noooo Nooooooooo

affirm, that a Prophet who prophesy'd of Mahomet, came from this Temple,
nooooo, nooo n Noooooo noo nooooooo'n no Noooooo, nooo nooo nooo Nooooo,

and some do not stand to assert, that the Prophet Jonas was cast forth
noo nooo no noo noooo no nooooo, nooo noo Noooooo Noooo noo nooo noooo

by the Whale at the Base of the Temple."
no noo Noooo no noo Nooo no noo Nooooo."




In this Afric Temple of the Whale I leave you, reader, and if you be a
No nooo Noooo Nooooo no noo Noooo N noooo noo, nooooo, noo no noo no n

Nantucketer, and a whaleman, you will silently worship there.
Noooooooooo, noo n nooooooo, noo nooo nooooooo noooooo noooo.










CHAPTER 105. Does the Whale's Magnitude Diminish?--Will He Perish?
NOOOOOO noo. Nooo noo Noooo'n Noooooooo Nooooooo?--Nooo No Nooooo?







Inasmuch, then, as this Leviathan comes floundering down upon us from
Nooooooo, nooo, no nooo Noooooooo noooo noooooooooo nooo nooo no nooo

the head-waters of the Eternities, it may be fitly inquired, whether,
noo nooo-nooooo no noo Nooooooooo, no noo no noooo nooooooo, noooooo,

in the long course of his generations, he has not degenerated from the
no noo nooo nooooo no noo noooooooooo, no noo noo noooooooooo nooo noo

original bulk of his sires.
nooooooo nooo no noo noooo.




But upon investigation we find, that not only are the whales of the
Noo nooo noooooooooooo no nooo, nooo noo nooo noo noo nooooo no noo

present day superior in magnitude to those whose fossil remains are
noooooo noo nooooooo no noooooooo no noooo noooo nooooo noooooo noo

found in the Tertiary system (embracing a distinct geological period
noooo no noo Nooooooo nooooo (noooooooo n nooooooo nooooooooo nooooo

prior to man), but of the whales found in that Tertiary system, those
noooo no noo), noo no noo nooooo noooo no nooo Nooooooo nooooo, noooo

belonging to its latter formations exceed in size those of its earlier
noooooooo no noo nooooo nooooooooo nooooo no nooo noooo no noo noooooo

ones.
nooo.




Of all the pre-adamite whales yet exhumed, by far the largest is the
No noo noo noo-noooooo nooooo noo noooooo, no noo noo noooooo no noo

Alabama one mentioned in the last chapter, and that was less than
Noooooo noo noooooooo no noo nooo noooooo, noo nooo noo nooo nooo

seventy feet in length in the skeleton. Whereas, we have already seen,
noooooo nooo no nooooo no noo nooooooo. Noooooo, no nooo noooooo nooo,

that the tape-measure gives seventy-two feet for the skeleton of a large
nooo noo nooo-noooooo noooo noooooo-noo nooo noo noo nooooooo no n noooo

sized modern whale. And I have heard, on whalemen's authority, that
noooo nooooo noooo. Noo N nooo noooo, no nooooooo'n noooooooo, nooo

Sperm Whales have been captured near a hundred feet long at the time of
Noooo Nooooo nooo nooo nooooooo nooo n noooooo nooo nooo no noo nooo no

capture.
noooooo.




But may it not be, that while the whales of the present hour are an
Noo noo no noo no, nooo noooo noo nooooo no noo noooooo nooo noo no

advance in magnitude upon those of all previous geological periods; may
noooooo no noooooooo nooo noooo no noo nooooooo nooooooooo noooooo; noo

it not be, that since Adam's time they have degenerated?
no noo no, nooo noooo Nooo'n nooo nooo nooo noooooooooo?




Assuredly, we must conclude so, if we are to credit the accounts of such
Noooooooo, no nooo nooooooo no, no no noo no nooooo noo nooooooo no nooo

gentlemen as Pliny, and the ancient naturalists generally. For Pliny
noooooooo no Noooo, noo noo noooooo noooooooooo noooooooo. Noo Noooo

tells us of Whales that embraced acres of living bulk, and Aldrovandus
noooo no no Nooooo nooo nooooooo noooo no nooooo nooo, noo Noooooooooo

of others which measured eight hundred feet in length--Rope Walks and
no nooooo noooo nooooooo noooo noooooo nooo no nooooo--Nooo Noooo noo

Thames Tunnels of Whales! And even in the days of Banks and Solander,
Nooooo Noooooo no Nooooo! Noo nooo no noo nooo no Noooo noo Nooooooo,

Cooke's naturalists, we find a Danish member of the Academy of Sciences
Noooo'n noooooooooo, no nooo n Nooooo nooooo no noo Noooooo no Nooooooo

setting down certain Iceland Whales (reydan-siskur, or Wrinkled Bellies)
noooooo nooo noooooo Noooooo Nooooo (nooooo-nooooo, no Nooooooo Noooooo)

at one hundred and twenty yards; that is, three hundred and sixty feet.
no noo noooooo noo nooooo noooo; nooo no, noooo noooooo noo noooo nooo.

And Lacepede, the French naturalist, in his elaborate history of whales,
Noo Nooooooo, noo Nooooo nooooooooo, no noo noooooooo noooooo no nooooo,

in the very beginning of his work (page 3), sets down the Right Whale at
no noo nooo noooooooo no noo nooo (nooo n), nooo nooo noo Noooo Noooo no

one hundred metres, three hundred and twenty-eight feet. And this work
noo noooooo nooooo, noooo noooooo noo nooooo-noooo nooo. Noo nooo nooo

was published so late as A.D. 1825.
noo noooooooo no nooo no N.N. nooo.




But will any whaleman believe these stories? No. The whale of to-day is
Noo nooo noo nooooooo noooooo noooo noooooo? No. Noo noooo no no-noo no

as big as his ancestors in Pliny's time. And if ever I go where Pliny
no noo no noo noooooooo no Noooo'n nooo. Noo no nooo N no noooo Noooo

is, I, a whaleman (more than he was), will make bold to tell him so.
no, N, n nooooooo (nooo nooo no noo), nooo nooo nooo no nooo noo no.

Because I cannot understand how it is, that while the Egyptian mummies
Noooooo N nooooo nooooooooo noo no no, nooo noooo noo Nooooooo noooooo

that were buried thousands of years before even Pliny was born, do not
nooo nooo nooooo noooooooo no noooo nooooo nooo Noooo noo nooo, no noo

measure so much in their coffins as a modern Kentuckian in his socks;
noooooo no nooo no noooo noooooo no n nooooo Nooooooooo no noo noooo;

and while the cattle and other animals sculptured on the oldest Egyptian
noo noooo noo nooooo noo noooo noooooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo Nooooooo

and Nineveh tablets, by the relative proportions in which they are
noo Noooooo noooooo, no noo nooooooo noooooooooo no noooo nooo noo

drawn, just as plainly prove that the high-bred, stall-fed, prize cattle
noooo, nooo no noooooo noooo nooo noo nooo-nooo, noooo-noo, noooo nooooo

of Smithfield, not only equal, but far exceed in magnitude the fattest
no Nooooooooo, noo nooo noooo, noo noo nooooo no noooooooo noo noooooo

of Pharaoh's fat kine; in the face of all this, I will not admit that of
no Noooooo'n noo nooo; no noo nooo no noo nooo, N nooo noo noooo nooo no

all animals the whale alone should have degenerated.
noo noooooo noo noooo noooo nooooo nooo noooooooooo.




But still another inquiry remains; one often agitated by the more
Noo noooo noooooo noooooo noooooo; noo noooo nooooooo no noo nooo

recondite Nantucketers. Whether owing to the almost omniscient look-outs
noooooooo Nooooooooooo. Noooooo noooo no noo nooooo nooooooooo nooo-nooo

at the mast-heads of the whaleships, now penetrating even through
no noo nooo-noooo no noo nooooooooo, noo noooooooooo nooo noooooo

Behring's straits, and into the remotest secret drawers and lockers
Noooooo'n noooooo, noo nooo noo nooooooo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo

of the world; and the thousand harpoons and lances darted along all
no noo noooo; noo noo nooooooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooooo noooo noo

continental coasts; the moot point is, whether Leviathan can long endure
noooooooooo nooooo; noo nooo noooo no, noooooo Noooooooo noo nooo nooooo

so wide a chase, and so remorseless a havoc; whether he must not at last
no nooo n noooo, noo no noooooooooo n noooo; noooooo no nooo noo no nooo

be exterminated from the waters, and the last whale, like the last man,
no nooooooooooo nooo noo nooooo, noo noo nooo noooo, nooo noo nooo noo,

smoke his last pipe, and then himself evaporate in the final puff.
noooo noo nooo nooo, noo nooo noooooo noooooooo no noo noooo nooo.




Comparing the humped herds of whales with the humped herds of buffalo,
Noooooooo noo nooooo noooo no nooooo nooo noo nooooo noooo no noooooo,

which, not forty years ago, overspread by tens of thousands the prairies
noooo, noo noooo noooo noo, nooooooooo no nooo no noooooooo noo nooooooo

of Illinois and Missouri, and shook their iron manes and scowled with
no Nooooooo noo Nooooooo, noo noooo noooo nooo noooo noo noooooo nooo

their thunder-clotted brows upon the sites of populous river-capitals,
noooo noooooo-noooooo noooo nooo noo noooo no nooooooo noooo-nooooooo,

where now the polite broker sells you land at a dollar an inch; in such
noooo noo noo nooooo nooooo noooo noo nooo no n nooooo no nooo; no nooo

a comparison an irresistible argument would seem furnished, to show that
n nooooooooo no nooooooooooo nooooooo noooo nooo noooooooo, no nooo nooo

the hunted whale cannot now escape speedy extinction.
noo nooooo noooo nooooo noo nooooo nooooo nooooooooo.




But you must look at this matter in every light. Though so short a
Noo noo nooo nooo no nooo nooooo no noooo noooo. Nooooo no noooo n

period ago--not a good lifetime--the census of the buffalo in Illinois
nooooo noo--noo n nooo nooooooo--noo nooooo no noo noooooo no Nooooooo

exceeded the census of men now in London, and though at the present day
nooooooo noo nooooo no noo noo no Nooooo, noo nooooo no noo noooooo noo

not one horn or hoof of them remains in all that region; and though the
noo noo nooo no nooo no nooo noooooo no noo nooo nooooo; noo nooooo noo

cause of this wondrous extermination was the spear of man; yet the far
noooo no nooo nooooooo noooooooooooo noo noo noooo no noo; noo noo noo

different nature of the whale-hunt peremptorily forbids so inglorious an
noooooooo nooooo no noo noooo-nooo nooooooooooo noooooo no nooooooooo no

end to the Leviathan. Forty men in one ship hunting the Sperm Whales for
noo no noo Noooooooo. Noooo noo no noo nooo noooooo noo Noooo Nooooo noo

forty-eight months think they have done extremely well, and thank God,
noooo-noooo nooooo noooo nooo nooo nooo noooooooo nooo, noo noooo Noo,

if at last they carry home the oil of forty fish. Whereas, in the days
no no nooo nooo noooo nooo noo noo no noooo nooo. Noooooo, no noo nooo

of the old Canadian and Indian hunters and trappers of the West, when
no noo noo Nooooooo noo Nooooo noooooo noo nooooooo no noo Nooo, nooo

the far west (in whose sunset suns still rise) was a wilderness and
noo noo nooo (no noooo nooooo nooo noooo nooo) noo n nooooooooo noo

a virgin, the same number of moccasined men, for the same number of
n nooooo, noo nooo nooooo no nooooooooo noo, noo noo nooo nooooo no

months, mounted on horse instead of sailing in ships, would have slain
nooooo, noooooo no noooo noooooo no noooooo no noooo, noooo nooo noooo

not forty, but forty thousand and more buffaloes; a fact that, if need
noo noooo, noo noooo nooooooo noo nooo noooooooo; n nooo nooo, no nooo

were, could be statistically stated.
nooo, noooo no noooooooooooo nooooo.




Nor, considered aright, does it seem any argument in favour of the
Noo, nooooooooo nooooo, nooo no nooo noo nooooooo no nooooo no noo

gradual extinction of the Sperm Whale, for example, that in former years
noooooo nooooooooo no noo Noooo Noooo, noo noooooo, nooo no nooooo noooo

(the latter part of the last century, say) these Leviathans, in
(noo nooooo nooo no noo nooo noooooo, noo) noooo Nooooooooo, no

small pods, were encountered much oftener than at present, and, in
noooo nooo, nooo noooooooooo nooo noooooo nooo no noooooo, noo, no

consequence, the voyages were not so prolonged, and were also much more
noooooooooo, noo noooooo nooo noo no noooooooo, noo nooo nooo nooo nooo

remunerative. Because, as has been elsewhere noticed, those whales,
nooooooooooo. Noooooo, no noo nooo noooooooo noooooo, noooo nooooo,

influenced by some views to safety, now swim the seas in immense
nooooooooo no nooo noooo no nooooo, noo nooo noo nooo no noooooo

caravans, so that to a large degree the scattered solitaries, yokes, and
nooooooo, no nooo no n noooo nooooo noo noooooooo nooooooooo, noooo, noo

pods, and schools of other days are now aggregated into vast but widely
nooo, noo noooooo no noooo nooo noo noo nooooooooo nooo nooo noo nooooo

separated, unfrequent armies. That is all. And equally fallacious seems
noooooooo, nooooooooo nooooo. Nooo no noo. Noo noooooo nooooooooo noooo

the conceit, that because the so-called whale-bone whales no longer
noo noooooo, nooo noooooo noo no-nooooo noooo-nooo nooooo no nooooo

haunt many grounds in former years abounding with them, hence that
noooo nooo noooooo no nooooo noooo noooooooo nooo nooo, noooo nooo

species also is declining. For they are only being driven from
noooooo nooo no noooooooo. Noo nooo noo nooo noooo nooooo nooo

promontory to cape; and if one coast is no longer enlivened with
nooooooooo no nooo; noo no noo noooo no no nooooo noooooooo nooo

their jets, then, be sure, some other and remoter strand has been very
noooo nooo, nooo, no nooo, nooo noooo noo noooooo nooooo noo nooo nooo

recently startled by the unfamiliar spectacle.
nooooooo nooooooo no noo nooooooooo noooooooo.




Furthermore: concerning these last mentioned Leviathans, they have two
Noooooooooo: nooooooooo noooo nooo noooooooo Nooooooooo, nooo nooo noo

firm fortresses, which, in all human probability, will for ever remain
nooo nooooooooo, noooo, no noo noooo noooooooooo, nooo noo nooo nooooo

impregnable. And as upon the invasion of their valleys, the frosty Swiss
noooooooooo. Noo no nooo noo nooooooo no noooo noooooo, noo nooooo Noooo

have retreated to their mountains; so, hunted from the savannas and
nooo noooooooo no noooo noooooooo; no, nooooo nooo noo nooooooo noo

glades of the middle seas, the whale-bone whales can at last resort to
nooooo no noo nooooo nooo, noo noooo-nooo nooooo noo no nooo nooooo no

their Polar citadels, and diving under the ultimate glassy barriers and
noooo Noooo nooooooo, noo nooooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooo nooooooo noo

walls there, come up among icy fields and floes; and in a charmed circle
noooo noooo, nooo no noooo noo nooooo noo noooo; noo no n noooooo nooooo

of everlasting December, bid defiance to all pursuit from man.
no noooooooooo Nooooooo, noo nooooooo no noo noooooo nooo noo.




But as perhaps fifty of these whale-bone whales are harpooned for one
Noo no noooooo noooo no noooo noooo-nooo nooooo noo noooooooo noo noo

cachalot, some philosophers of the forecastle have concluded that this
nooooooo, nooo nooooooooooo no noo nooooooooo nooo noooooooo nooo nooo

positive havoc has already very seriously diminished their battalions.
nooooooo noooo noo noooooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooo noooo nooooooooo.

But though for some time past a number of these whales, not less than
Noo nooooo noo nooo nooo nooo n nooooo no noooo nooooo, noo nooo nooo

13,000, have been annually slain on the nor'-west coast by the Americans
no,noo, nooo nooo nooooooo noooo no noo noo'-nooo noooo no noo Noooooooo

alone; yet there are considerations which render even this circumstance
noooo; noo noooo noo nooooooooooooo noooo nooooo nooo nooo nooooooooooo

of little or no account as an opposing argument in this matter.
no nooooo no no noooooo no no nooooooo nooooooo no nooo nooooo.




Natural as it is to be somewhat incredulous concerning the populousness
Noooooo no no no no no nooooooo noooooooooo nooooooooo noo nooooooooooo

of the more enormous creatures of the globe, yet what shall we say to
no noo nooo nooooooo noooooooo no noo noooo, noo nooo noooo no noo no

Harto, the historian of Goa, when he tells us that at one hunting the
Noooo, noo noooooooo no Noo, nooo no noooo no nooo no noo noooooo noo

King of Siam took 4,000 elephants; that in those regions elephants are
Nooo no Nooo nooo n,noo noooooooo; nooo no noooo noooooo noooooooo noo

numerous as droves of cattle in the temperate climes. And there seems no
nooooooo no nooooo no nooooo no noo noooooooo nooooo. Noo noooo noooo no

reason to doubt that if these elephants, which have now been hunted for
nooooo no noooo nooo no noooo noooooooo, noooo nooo noo nooo nooooo noo

thousands of years, by Semiramis, by Porus, by Hannibal, and by all the
noooooooo no noooo, no Noooooooo, no Noooo, no Nooooooo, noo no noo noo

successive monarchs of the East--if they still survive there in great
nooooooooo nooooooo no noo Nooo--no nooo noooo noooooo noooo no noooo

numbers, much more may the great whale outlast all hunting, since he
noooooo, nooo nooo noo noo noooo noooo noooooo noo noooooo, noooo no

has a pasture to expatiate in, which is precisely twice as large as all
noo n noooooo no noooooooo no, noooo no noooooooo noooo no noooo no noo

Asia, both Americas, Europe and Africa, New Holland, and all the Isles
Nooo, nooo Nooooooo, Nooooo noo Nooooo, Noo Noooooo, noo noo noo Noooo

of the sea combined.
no noo noo nooooooo.




Moreover: we are to consider, that from the presumed great longevity
Nooooooo: no noo no nooooooo, nooo nooo noo nooooooo noooo noooooooo

of whales, their probably attaining the age of a century and more,
no nooooo, noooo nooooooo noooooooo noo noo no n noooooo noo nooo,

therefore at any one period of time, several distinct adult generations
noooooooo no noo noo nooooo no nooo, noooooo nooooooo noooo noooooooooo

must be contemporary. And what that is, we may soon gain some idea
nooo no nooooooooooo. Noo nooo nooo no, no noo nooo nooo nooo nooo

of, by imagining all the grave-yards, cemeteries, and family vaults of
no, no noooooooo noo noo noooo-noooo, nooooooooo, noo nooooo nooooo no

creation yielding up the live bodies of all the men, women, and children
nooooooo nooooooo no noo nooo nooooo no noo noo noo, noooo, noo nooooooo

who were alive seventy-five years ago; and adding this countless host to
noo nooo noooo noooooo-nooo noooo noo; noo nooooo nooo noooooooo nooo no

the present human population of the globe.
noo noooooo noooo nooooooooo no noo noooo.




Wherefore, for all these things, we account the whale immortal in his
Noooooooo, noo noo noooo nooooo, no noooooo noo noooo nooooooo no noo

species, however perishable in his individuality. He swam the seas
noooooo, noooooo nooooooooo no noo noooooooooooo. No nooo noo nooo

before the continents broke water; he once swam over the site of the
nooooo noo nooooooooo noooo noooo; no nooo nooo nooo noo nooo no noo

Tuileries, and Windsor Castle, and the Kremlin. In Noah's flood he
Noooooooo, noo Noooooo Nooooo, noo noo Noooooo. No Nooo'n noooo no

despised Noah's Ark; and if ever the world is to be again flooded, like
nooooooo Nooo'n Noo; noo no nooo noo noooo no no no noooo noooooo, nooo

the Netherlands, to kill off its rats, then the eternal whale will still
noo Noooooooooo, no nooo noo noo nooo, nooo noo noooooo noooo nooo noooo

survive, and rearing upon the topmost crest of the equatorial flood,
noooooo, noo noooooo nooo noo noooooo noooo no noo nooooooooo noooo,

spout his frothed defiance to the skies.
noooo noo noooooo nooooooo no noo noooo.










CHAPTER 106. Ahab's Leg.
NOOOOOO noo. Nooo'n Noo.







The precipitating manner in which Captain Ahab had quitted the Samuel
Noo noooooooooooo nooooo no noooo Noooooo Nooo noo noooooo noo Nooooo

Enderby of London, had not been unattended with some small violence to
Noooooo no Nooooo, noo noo nooo nooooooooo nooo nooo noooo nooooooo no

his own person. He had lighted with such energy upon a thwart of his
noo noo nooooo. No noo noooooo nooo nooo nooooo nooo n nooooo no noo

boat that his ivory leg had received a half-splintering shock. And
nooo nooo noo noooo noo noo nooooooo n nooo-noooooooooo noooo. Noo

when after gaining his own deck, and his own pivot-hole there, he so
nooo noooo noooooo noo noo nooo, noo noo noo noooo-nooo noooo, no no

vehemently wheeled round with an urgent command to the steersman (it
nooooooooo noooooo noooo nooo no nooooo noooooo no noo noooooooo (no

was, as ever, something about his not steering inflexibly enough); then,
noo, no nooo, noooooooo noooo noo noo nooooooo nooooooooo nooooo); nooo,

the already shaken ivory received such an additional twist and wrench,
noo noooooo nooooo noooo nooooooo nooo no nooooooooo noooo noo nooooo,

that though it still remained entire, and to all appearances lusty, yet
nooo nooooo no noooo nooooooo nooooo, noo no noo noooooooooo noooo, noo

Ahab did not deem it entirely trustworthy.
Nooo noo noo nooo no nooooooo noooooooooo.




And, indeed, it seemed small matter for wonder, that for all his
Noo, nooooo, no nooooo noooo nooooo noo nooooo, nooo noo noo noo

pervading, mad recklessness, Ahab did at times give careful heed to the
noooooooo, noo nooooooooooo, Nooo noo no noooo nooo noooooo nooo no noo

condition of that dead bone upon which he partly stood. For it had not
noooooooo no nooo nooo nooo nooo noooo no nooooo noooo. Noo no noo noo

been very long prior to the Pequod's sailing from Nantucket, that he
nooo nooo nooo noooo no noo Nooooo'n noooooo nooo Noooooooo, nooo no

had been found one night lying prone upon the ground, and insensible;
noo nooo noooo noo noooo noooo noooo nooo noo nooooo, noo nooooooooo;

by some unknown, and seemingly inexplicable, unimaginable casualty, his
no nooo noooooo, noo noooooooo nooooooooooo, nooooooooooo nooooooo, noo

ivory limb having been so violently displaced, that it had stake-wise
noooo nooo nooooo nooo no noooooooo noooooooo, nooo no noo noooo-nooo

smitten, and all but pierced his groin; nor was it without extreme
noooooo, noo noo noo noooooo noo noooo; noo noo no noooooo noooooo

difficulty that the agonizing wound was entirely cured.
nooooooooo nooo noo noooooooo noooo noo nooooooo noooo.




Nor, at the time, had it failed to enter his monomaniac mind, that all
Noo, no noo nooo, noo no nooooo no noooo noo nooooooooo nooo, nooo noo

the anguish of that then present suffering was but the direct issue of a
noo noooooo no nooo nooo noooooo noooooooo noo noo noo nooooo noooo no n

former woe; and he too plainly seemed to see, that as the most poisonous
nooooo noo; noo no noo noooooo nooooo no noo, nooo no noo nooo noooooooo

reptile of the marsh perpetuates his kind as inevitably as the sweetest
noooooo no noo noooo noooooooooo noo nooo no nooooooooo no noo nooooooo

songster of the grove; so, equally with every felicity, all miserable
nooooooo no noo noooo; no, noooooo nooo noooo nooooooo, noo noooooooo

events do naturally beget their like. Yea, more than equally, thought
nooooo no noooooooo noooo noooo nooo. Noo, nooo nooo noooooo, noooooo

Ahab; since both the ancestry and posterity of Grief go further than the
Nooo; noooo nooo noo nooooooo noo noooooooo no Noooo no noooooo nooo noo

ancestry and posterity of Joy. For, not to hint of this: that it is
nooooooo noo noooooooo no Noo. Noo, noo no nooo no nooo: nooo no no

an inference from certain canonic teachings, that while some natural
no noooooooo nooo noooooo noooooo noooooooo, nooo noooo nooo noooooo

enjoyments here shall have no children born to them for the other world,
nooooooooo nooo noooo nooo no nooooooo nooo no nooo noo noo noooo noooo,

but, on the contrary, shall be followed by the joy-childlessness of
noo, no noo nooooooo, noooo no nooooooo no noo noo-noooooooooooo no

all hell's despair; whereas, some guilty mortal miseries shall still
noo nooo'n noooooo; noooooo, nooo nooooo nooooo nooooooo noooo noooo

fertilely beget to themselves an eternally progressive progeny of griefs
noooooooo noooo no nooooooooo no noooooooo noooooooooo noooooo no nooooo

beyond the grave; not at all to hint of this, there still seems an
nooooo noo noooo; noo no noo no nooo no nooo, noooo noooo noooo no

inequality in the deeper analysis of the thing. For, thought Ahab, while
nooooooooo no noo nooooo nooooooo no noo noooo. Noo, noooooo Nooo, noooo

even the highest earthly felicities ever have a certain unsignifying
nooo noo noooooo noooooo nooooooooo nooo nooo n noooooo nooooooooooo

pettiness lurking in them, but, at bottom, all heartwoes, a mystic
noooooooo noooooo no nooo, noo, no nooooo, noo noooooooo, n nooooo

significance, and, in some men, an archangelic grandeur; so do their
nooooooooooo, noo, no nooo noo, no noooooooooo nooooooo; no no noooo

diligent tracings-out not belie the obvious deduction. To trail the
nooooooo nooooooo-noo noo noooo noo noooooo noooooooo. No noooo noo

genealogies of these high mortal miseries, carries us at last among the
noooooooooo no noooo nooo nooooo nooooooo, noooooo no no nooo noooo noo

sourceless primogenitures of the gods; so that, in the face of all the
nooooooooo nooooooooooooo no noo nooo; no nooo, no noo nooo no noo noo

glad, hay-making suns, and soft cymballing, round harvest-moons, we must
nooo, noo-nooooo nooo, noo nooo nooooooooo, noooo noooooo-noooo, no nooo

needs give in to this: that the gods themselves are not for ever glad.
noooo nooo no no nooo: nooo noo nooo nooooooooo noo noo noo nooo nooo.

The ineffaceable, sad birth-mark in the brow of man, is but the stamp of
Noo nooooooooooo, noo noooo-nooo no noo nooo no noo, no noo noo noooo no

sorrow in the signers.
nooooo no noo noooooo.




Unwittingly here a secret has been divulged, which perhaps might more
Noooooooooo nooo n nooooo noo nooo nooooooo, noooo noooooo noooo nooo

properly, in set way, have been disclosed before. With many other
nooooooo, no noo noo, nooo nooo noooooooo nooooo. Nooo nooo noooo

particulars concerning Ahab, always had it remained a mystery to some,
noooooooooo nooooooooo Nooo, nooooo noo no nooooooo n noooooo no nooo,

why it was, that for a certain period, both before and after the sailing
noo no noo, nooo noo n noooooo nooooo, nooo nooooo noo noooo noo noooooo

of the Pequod, he had hidden himself away with such Grand-Lama-like
no noo Nooooo, no noo nooooo noooooo nooo nooo nooo Noooo-Nooo-nooo

exclusiveness; and, for that one interval, sought speechless refuge, as
noooooooooooo; noo, noo nooo noo nooooooo, nooooo nooooooooo nooooo, no

it were, among the marble senate of the dead. Captain Peleg's bruited
no nooo, noooo noo nooooo nooooo no noo nooo. Noooooo Noooo'n noooooo

reason for this thing appeared by no means adequate; though, indeed,
nooooo noo nooo noooo nooooooo no no noooo nooooooo; nooooo, nooooo,

as touching all Ahab's deeper part, every revelation partook more of
no nooooooo noo Nooo'n nooooo nooo, noooo nooooooooo noooooo nooo no

significant darkness than of explanatory light. But, in the end, it all
noooooooooo nooooooo nooo no noooooooooo noooo. Noo, no noo noo, no noo

came out; this one matter did, at least. That direful mishap was at
nooo noo; nooo noo nooooo noo, no noooo. Nooo noooooo nooooo noo no

the bottom of his temporary recluseness. And not only this, but to that
noo nooooo no noo noooooooo noooooooooo. Noo noo nooo nooo, noo no nooo

ever-contracting, dropping circle ashore, who, for any reason, possessed
nooo-noooooooooo, nooooooo nooooo nooooo, noo, noo noo nooooo, noooooooo

the privilege of a less banned approach to him; to that timid circle the
noo noooooooo no n nooo nooooo nooooooo no noo; no nooo noooo nooooo noo

above hinted casualty--remaining, as it did, moodily unaccounted for by
noooo nooooo nooooooo--noooooooo, no no noo, noooooo noooooooooo noo no

Ahab--invested itself with terrors, not entirely underived from the land
Nooo--nooooooo nooooo nooo noooooo, noo nooooooo noooooooo nooo noo nooo

of spirits and of wails. So that, through their zeal for him, they had
no noooooo noo no noooo. No nooo, noooooo noooo nooo noo noo, nooo noo

all conspired, so far as in them lay, to muffle up the knowledge of
noo noooooooo, no noo no no nooo noo, no nooooo no noo noooooooo no

this thing from others; and hence it was, that not till a considerable
nooo noooo nooo nooooo; noo noooo no noo, nooo noo nooo n nooooooooooo

interval had elapsed, did it transpire upon the Pequod's decks.
nooooooo noo noooooo, noo no noooooooo nooo noo Nooooo'n noooo.




But be all this as it may; let the unseen, ambiguous synod in the air,
Noo no noo nooo no no noo; noo noo nooooo, noooooooo noooo no noo noo,

or the vindictive princes and potentates of fire, have to do or not
no noo nooooooooo noooooo noo nooooooooo no nooo, nooo no no no noo

with earthly Ahab, yet, in this present matter of his leg, he took plain
nooo noooooo Nooo, noo, no nooo noooooo nooooo no noo noo, no nooo noooo

practical procedures;--he called the carpenter.
noooooooo nooooooooo;--no nooooo noo noooooooo.




And when that functionary appeared before him, he bade him without delay
Noo nooo nooo noooooooooo nooooooo nooooo noo, no nooo noo noooooo noooo

set about making a new leg, and directed the mates to see him supplied
noo noooo nooooo n noo noo, noo nooooooo noo noooo no noo noo nooooooo

with all the studs and joists of jaw-ivory (Sperm Whale) which had thus
nooo noo noo noooo noo nooooo no noo-noooo (Noooo Noooo) noooo noo nooo

far been accumulated on the voyage, in order that a careful selection
noo nooo noooooooooo no noo nooooo, no noooo nooo n noooooo noooooooo

of the stoutest, clearest-grained stuff might be secured. This done, the
no noo nooooooo, nooooooo-noooooo noooo noooo no noooooo. Nooo nooo, noo

carpenter received orders to have the leg completed that night; and to
noooooooo nooooooo nooooo no nooo noo noo noooooooo nooo noooo; noo no

provide all the fittings for it, independent of those pertaining to
noooooo noo noo nooooooo noo no, noooooooooo no noooo nooooooooo no

the distrusted one in use. Moreover, the ship's forge was ordered to be
noo nooooooooo noo no noo. Nooooooo, noo nooo'n noooo noo noooooo no no

hoisted out of its temporary idleness in the hold; and, to accelerate
noooooo noo no noo noooooooo nooooooo no noo nooo; noo, no nooooooooo

the affair, the blacksmith was commanded to proceed at once to the
noo nooooo, noo nooooooooo noo noooooooo no noooooo no nooo no noo

forging of whatever iron contrivances might be needed.
noooooo no nooooooo nooo nooooooooooo noooo no nooooo.










CHAPTER 107. The Carpenter.
NOOOOOO noo. Noo Noooooooo.







Seat thyself sultanically among the moons of Saturn, and take high
Nooo noooooo nooooooooooo noooo noo noooo no Nooooo, noo nooo nooo

abstracted man alone; and he seems a wonder, a grandeur, and a woe. But
nooooooooo noo noooo; noo no noooo n nooooo, n nooooooo, noo n noo. Noo

from the same point, take mankind in mass, and for the most part, they
nooo noo nooo noooo, nooo noooooo no nooo, noo noo noo nooo nooo, nooo

seem a mob of unnecessary duplicates, both contemporary and hereditary.
nooo n noo no noooooooooo nooooooooo, nooo nooooooooooo noo nooooooooo.

But most humble though he was, and far from furnishing an example of
Noo nooo nooooo nooooo no noo, noo noo nooo nooooooooo no noooooo no

the high, humane abstraction; the Pequod's carpenter was no duplicate;
noo nooo, nooooo noooooooooo; noo Nooooo'n noooooooo noo no noooooooo;

hence, he now comes in person on this stage.
noooo, no noo noooo no nooooo no nooo noooo.




Like all sea-going ship carpenters, and more especially those belonging
Nooo noo noo-noooo nooo nooooooooo, noo nooo nooooooooo noooo noooooooo

to whaling vessels, he was, to a certain off-handed, practical extent,
no noooooo noooooo, no noo, no n noooooo noo-nooooo, noooooooo nooooo,

alike experienced in numerous trades and callings collateral to his own;
noooo noooooooooo no nooooooo nooooo noo nooooooo nooooooooo no noo noo;

the carpenter's pursuit being the ancient and outbranching trunk of all
noo noooooooo'n noooooo noooo noo noooooo noo nooooooooooo noooo no noo

those numerous handicrafts which more or less have to do with wood as an
noooo nooooooo noooooooooo noooo nooo no nooo nooo no no nooo nooo no no

auxiliary material. But, besides the application to him of the generic
noooooooo nooooooo. Noo, noooooo noo noooooooooo no noo no noo noooooo

remark above, this carpenter of the Pequod was singularly efficient in
nooooo noooo, nooo noooooooo no noo Nooooo noo nooooooooo noooooooo no

those thousand nameless mechanical emergencies continually recurring
noooo nooooooo nooooooo nooooooooo noooooooooo noooooooooo noooooooo

in a large ship, upon a three or four years' voyage, in uncivilized
no n noooo nooo, nooo n noooo no nooo noooo' nooooo, no noooooooooo

and far-distant seas. For not to speak of his readiness in ordinary
noo noo-noooooo nooo. Noo noo no noooo no noo noooooooo no nooooooo

duties:--repairing stove boats, sprung spars, reforming the shape of
nooooo:--noooooooo noooo noooo, nooooo noooo, noooooooo noo noooo no

clumsy-bladed oars, inserting bull's eyes in the deck, or new tree-nails
nooooo-nooooo nooo, noooooooo nooo'n nooo no noo nooo, no noo nooo-noooo

in the side planks, and other miscellaneous matters more directly
no noo nooo nooooo, noo noooo noooooooooooo noooooo nooo nooooooo

pertaining to his special business; he was moreover unhesitatingly
nooooooooo no noo noooooo nooooooo; no noo nooooooo nooooooooooooo

expert in all manner of conflicting aptitudes, both useful and
nooooo no noo nooooo no noooooooooo noooooooo, nooo nooooo noo

capricious.
nooooooooo.




The one grand stage where he enacted all his various parts so manifold,
Noo noo noooo noooo noooo no noooooo noo noo noooooo noooo no nooooooo,

was his vice-bench; a long rude ponderous table furnished with several
noo noo nooo-noooo; n nooo nooo noooooooo noooo noooooooo nooo noooooo

vices, of different sizes, and both of iron and of wood. At all times
noooo, no noooooooo noooo, noo nooo no nooo noo no nooo. No noo noooo

except when whales were alongside, this bench was securely lashed
nooooo nooo nooooo nooo noooooooo, nooo noooo noo nooooooo nooooo

athwartships against the rear of the Try-works.
nooooooooooo noooooo noo nooo no noo Noo-noooo.




A belaying pin is found too large to be easily inserted into its hole:
N nooooooo noo no noooo noo noooo no no nooooo nooooooo nooo noo nooo:

the carpenter claps it into one of his ever-ready vices, and straightway
noo noooooooo noooo no nooo noo no noo nooo-noooo noooo, noo noooooooooo

files it smaller. A lost land-bird of strange plumage strays on board,
noooo no noooooo. N nooo nooo-nooo no noooooo noooooo nooooo no noooo,

and is made a captive: out of clean shaved rods of right-whale bone, and
noo no nooo n noooooo: noo no noooo nooooo nooo no noooo-noooo nooo, noo

cross-beams of sperm whale ivory, the carpenter makes a pagoda-looking
noooo-noooo no noooo noooo noooo, noo noooooooo noooo n nooooo-noooooo

cage for it. An oarsman sprains his wrist: the carpenter concocts a
nooo noo no. No noooooo noooooo noo noooo: noo noooooooo nooooooo n

soothing lotion. Stubb longed for vermillion stars to be painted upon
nooooooo nooooo. Noooo nooooo noo nooooooooo noooo no no noooooo nooo

the blade of his every oar; screwing each oar in his big vice of wood,
noo noooo no noo noooo noo; nooooooo nooo noo no noo noo nooo no nooo,

the carpenter symmetrically supplies the constellation. A sailor takes
noo noooooooo noooooooooooo nooooooo noo noooooooooooo. N nooooo noooo

a fancy to wear shark-bone ear-rings: the carpenter drills his ears.
n noooo no nooo noooo-nooo noo-noooo: noo noooooooo nooooo noo nooo.

Another has the toothache: the carpenter out pincers, and clapping
Noooooo noo noo noooooooo: noo noooooooo noo noooooo, noo nooooooo

one hand upon his bench bids him be seated there; but the poor fellow
noo nooo nooo noo noooo nooo noo no nooooo noooo; noo noo nooo nooooo

unmanageably winces under the unconcluded operation; whirling round the
nooooooooooo nooooo noooo noo noooooooooo noooooooo; nooooooo noooo noo

handle of his wooden vice, the carpenter signs him to clap his jaw in
nooooo no noo nooooo nooo, noo noooooooo noooo noo no nooo noo noo no

that, if he would have him draw the tooth.
nooo, no no noooo nooo noo nooo noo noooo.




Thus, this carpenter was prepared at all points, and alike indifferent
Nooo, nooo noooooooo noo nooooooo no noo nooooo, noo noooo noooooooooo

and without respect in all. Teeth he accounted bits of ivory; heads he
noo noooooo noooooo no noo. Noooo no noooooooo nooo no noooo; noooo no

deemed but top-blocks; men themselves he lightly held for capstans. But
nooooo noo noo-nooooo; noo nooooooooo no noooooo nooo noo nooooooo. Noo

while now upon so wide a field thus variously accomplished and with such
noooo noo nooo no nooo n noooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooooo noo nooo nooo

liveliness of expertness in him, too; all this would seem to argue some
nooooooooo no nooooooooo no noo, noo; noo nooo noooo nooo no noooo nooo

uncommon vivacity of intelligence. But not precisely so. For nothing was
nooooooo nooooooo no nooooooooooo. Noo noo noooooooo no. Noo noooooo noo

this man more remarkable, than for a certain impersonal stolidity as
nooo noo nooo nooooooooo, nooo noo n noooooo nooooooooo noooooooo no

it were; impersonal, I say; for it so shaded off into the surrounding
no nooo; nooooooooo, N noo; noo no no nooooo noo nooo noo noooooooooo

infinite of things, that it seemed one with the general stolidity
nooooooo no nooooo, nooo no nooooo noo nooo noo noooooo noooooooo

discernible in the whole visible world; which while pauselessly active
noooooooooo no noo noooo noooooo noooo; noooo noooo noooooooooo nooooo

in uncounted modes, still eternally holds its peace, and ignores you,
no noooooooo noooo, noooo noooooooo noooo noo noooo, noo noooooo noo,

though you dig foundations for cathedrals. Yet was this half-horrible
nooooo noo noo noooooooooo noo nooooooooo. Noo noo nooo nooo-nooooooo

stolidity in him, involving, too, as it appeared, an all-ramifying
noooooooo no noo, noooooooo, noo, no no nooooooo, no noo-noooooooo

heartlessness;--yet was it oddly dashed at times, with an old,
noooooooooooo;--noo noo no noooo nooooo no noooo, nooo no noo,

crutch-like, antediluvian, wheezing humorousness, not unstreaked now
nooooo-nooo, nooooooooooo, nooooooo nooooooooooo, noo nooooooooo noo

and then with a certain grizzled wittiness; such as might have served
noo nooo nooo n noooooo nooooooo noooooooo; nooo no noooo nooo nooooo

to pass the time during the midnight watch on the bearded forecastle
no nooo noo nooo nooooo noo nooooooo noooo no noo noooooo nooooooooo

of Noah's ark. Was it that this old carpenter had been a life-long
no Nooo'n noo. Noo no nooo nooo noo noooooooo noo nooo n nooo-nooo

wanderer, whose much rolling, to and fro, not only had gathered no moss;
nooooooo, noooo nooo noooooo, no noo noo, noo nooo noo nooooooo no nooo;

but what is more, had rubbed off whatever small outward clingings
noo nooo no nooo, noo nooooo noo nooooooo noooo noooooo noooooooo

might have originally pertained to him? He was a stript abstract; an
noooo nooo nooooooooo noooooooo no noo? No noo n nooooo nooooooo; no

unfractioned integral; uncompromised as a new-born babe; living without
nooooooooooo nooooooo; noooooooooooo no n noo-nooo nooo; nooooo noooooo

premeditated reference to this world or the next. You might almost
nooooooooooo noooooooo no nooo noooo no noo nooo. Noo noooo nooooo

say, that this strange uncompromisedness in him involved a sort of
noo, nooo nooo noooooo noooooooooooooooo no noo nooooooo n nooo no

unintelligence; for in his numerous trades, he did not seem to work so
nooooooooooooo; noo no noo nooooooo nooooo, no noo noo nooo no nooo no

much by reason or by instinct, or simply because he had been tutored to
nooo no nooooo no no nooooooo, no nooooo noooooo no noo nooo noooooo no

it, or by any intermixture of all these, even or uneven; but merely by
no, no no noo nooooooooooo no noo noooo, nooo no nooooo; noo nooooo no

a kind of deaf and dumb, spontaneous literal process. He was a pure
n nooo no nooo noo nooo, noooooooooo noooooo noooooo. No noo n nooo

manipulator; his brain, if he had ever had one, must have early
noooooooooo; noo noooo, no no noo nooo noo noo, nooo nooo noooo

oozed along into the muscles of his fingers. He was like one of
noooo noooo nooo noo noooooo no noo noooooo. No noo nooo noo no

those unreasoning but still highly useful, MULTUM IN PARVO, Sheffield
noooo noooooooooo noo noooo nooooo nooooo, NOOOOO NO NOOOO, Noooooooo

contrivances, assuming the exterior--though a little swelled--of a
nooooooooooo, nooooooo noo nooooooo--nooooo n nooooo noooooo--no n

common pocket knife; but containing, not only blades of various sizes,
nooooo nooooo noooo; noo nooooooooo, noo nooo nooooo no noooooo noooo,

but also screw-drivers, cork-screws, tweezers, awls, pens, rulers,
noo nooo noooo-noooooo, nooo-nooooo, nooooooo, nooo, nooo, nooooo,

nail-filers, countersinkers. So, if his superiors wanted to use the
nooo-nooooo, nooooooooooooo. No, no noo noooooooo nooooo no noo noo

carpenter for a screw-driver, all they had to do was to open that part
noooooooo noo n noooo-nooooo, noo nooo noo no no noo no nooo nooo nooo

of him, and the screw was fast: or if for tweezers, take him up by the
no noo, noo noo noooo noo nooo: no no noo nooooooo, nooo noo no no noo

legs, and there they were.
nooo, noo noooo nooo nooo.




Yet, as previously hinted, this omnitooled, open-and-shut carpenter,
Noo, no nooooooooo nooooo, nooo nooooooooo, nooo-noo-nooo noooooooo,

was, after all, no mere machine of an automaton. If he did not have a
noo, noooo noo, no nooo noooooo no no noooooooo. No no noo noo nooo n

common soul in him, he had a subtle something that somehow anomalously
nooooo nooo no noo, no noo n nooooo noooooooo nooo noooooo noooooooooo

did its duty. What that was, whether essence of quicksilver, or a few
noo noo nooo. Nooo nooo noo, noooooo noooooo no noooooooooo, no n noo

drops of hartshorn, there is no telling. But there it was; and there it
noooo no noooooooo, noooo no no noooooo. Noo noooo no noo; noo noooo no

had abided for now some sixty years or more. And this it was, this same
noo nooooo noo noo nooo noooo noooo no nooo. Noo nooo no noo, nooo nooo

unaccountable, cunning life-principle in him; this it was, that kept
noooooooooooo, noooooo nooo-noooooooo no noo; nooo no noo, nooo nooo

noo n noooo nooo no noo nooo noooooooooooo; noo nooo nooo no noooooooooo

wheel, which also hummingly soliloquizes; or rather, his body was a
noooo, noooo nooo noooooooo nooooooooooo; no nooooo, noo nooo noo n

sentry-box and this soliloquizer on guard there, and talking all the
nooooo-noo noo nooo nooooooooooo no noooo noooo, noo noooooo noo noo

time to keep himself awake.
nooo no nooo noooooo noooo.

nooooo noo nooooooooooo nooooo noooo n-noooooo nooo noo nooo noo

all legs, true or false, as brewery-men go round collecting old beer
noo nooo, nooo no noooo, no noooooo-noo no noooo nooooooooo noo nooo

barrels, to fill 'em up again. What a leg this is! It looks like a real
noooooo, no nooo 'no no noooo. Nooo n noo nooo no! No noooo nooo n nooo

live leg, filed down to nothing but the core; he'll be standing on this
nooo noo, noooo nooo no noooooo noo noo nooo; no'no no nooooooo no nooo

to-morrow; he'll be taking altitudes on it. Halloa! I almost forgot the
no-nooooo; no'no no nooooo noooooooo no no. Nooooo! N nooooo nooooo noo

little oval slate, smoothed ivory, where he figures up the latitude. So,
nooooo nooo noooo, nooooooo noooo, noooo no noooooo no noo nooooooo. No,

so; chisel, file, and sand-paper, now!
no; nooooo, nooo, noo nooo-noooo, noo!










CHAPTER 109. Ahab and Starbuck in the Cabin.
NOOOOOO noo. Nooo noo Nooooooo no noo Noooo.







According to usage they were pumping the ship next morning; and lo! no
Noooooooo no noooo nooo nooo noooooo noo nooo nooo noooooo; noo no! no

inconsiderable oil came up with the water; the casks below must have
nooooooooooooo noo nooo no nooo noo noooo; noo noooo noooo nooo nooo

sprung a bad leak. Much concern was shown; and Starbuck went down into
nooooo n noo nooo. Nooo noooooo noo noooo; noo Nooooooo nooo nooo nooo

the cabin to report this unfavourable affair.*
noo noooo no nooooo nooo nooooooooooo nooooo.*







*In Sperm-whalemen with any considerable quantity of oil on board, it
*No Noooo-nooooooo nooo noo nooooooooooo nooooooo no noo no noooo, no

is a regular semiweekly duty to conduct a hose into the hold, and drench
no n noooooo nooooooooo nooo no noooooo n nooo nooo noo nooo, noo nooooo

the casks with sea-water; which afterwards, at varying intervals, is
noo noooo nooo noo-noooo; noooo nooooooooo, no noooooo noooooooo, no

removed by the ship's pumps. Hereby the casks are sought to be kept
noooooo no noo nooo'n noooo. Nooooo noo noooo noo nooooo no no nooo

damply tight; while by the changed character of the withdrawn water, the
nooooo noooo; noooo no noo noooooo noooooooo no noo noooooooo noooo, noo

mariners readily detect any serious leakage in the precious cargo.
nooooooo noooooo nooooo noo noooooo noooooo no noo nooooooo noooo.







Now, from the South and West the Pequod was drawing nigh to Formosa and
Noo, nooo noo Noooo noo Nooo noo Nooooo noo noooooo nooo no Noooooo noo

noo Nooooo Noooo, noooooo noooo nooo noo no noo nooooooo noooooo nooo

noo Noooo nooooo nooo noo Noooooo. Noo no Nooooooo noooo Nooo nooo

n noooooo noooo no noo nooooooo noooooooooooo nooooo nooooo noo;

noooo noo nooooo noooooo noo noooooo noo no noo noooo, noo nooo n nooo

nooo no noo noooooo nooo, noo noooooooo noo nooo, noo noooooo noo noo

courses again.
noooooo noooo.




"Who's there?" hearing the footstep at the door, but not turning round

to it. "On deck! Begone!"
no no. "No nooo! Nooooo!"
