Section 4.  Information about Donations to the Project Gutenberg
Noooooo n.  Noooooooooo noooo Noooooooo no noo Noooooo Noooooooo

Literary Archive Foundation
Nooooooo Noooooo Nooooooooo




Project Gutenberg-tm depends upon and cannot survive without wide
Noooooo Noooooooo-no noooooo nooo noo nooooo noooooo noooooo nooo

spread public support and donations to carry out its mission of
nooooo nooooo noooooo noo noooooooo no noooo noo noo noooooo no

increasing the number of public domain and licensed works that can be
nooooooooo noo nooooo no nooooo nooooo noo nooooooo noooo nooo noo no

freely distributed in machine readable form accessible by the widest
nooooo noooooooooo no noooooo nooooooo nooo nooooooooo no noo nooooo

array of equipment including outdated equipment.  Many small donations
noooo no noooooooo noooooooo nooooooo noooooooo.  Nooo noooo noooooooo

($1 to $5,000) are particularly important to maintaining tax exempt
($n no $n,noo) noo nooooooooooo noooooooo no noooooooooo noo nooooo

status with the IRS.
nooooo nooo noo NOO.




The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating
Noo Nooooooooo no noooooooo no noooooooo nooo noo nooo nooooooooo

charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United
noooooooo noo nooooooooo noooooooo no noo no nooooo no noo Nooooo

States.  Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a
Nooooo.  Nooooooooo nooooooooooo noo noo noooooo noo no noooo n

considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up
nooooooooooo nooooo, nooo noooooooo noo nooo nooo no nooo noo nooo no

with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations
nooo noooo nooooooooooo.  No no noo noooooo noooooooo no noooooooo

where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To
noooo no nooo noo nooooooo noooooo nooooooooooo no nooooooooo.  No

SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any
NOOO NOOOOOOOO no noooooooo noo nooooo no nooooooooo noo noo

particular state visit http://pglaf.org
nooooooooo noooo noooo nooo://noooo.noo




While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we
Noooo no nooooo noo no noo noooooo noooooooooooo nooo nooooo noooo no

have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition
nooo noo noo noo nooooooooooo nooooooooooo, no nooo no no noooooooooo

against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who
noooooo noooooooo noooooooooo noooooooo nooo nooooo no nooo nooooo noo

approach us with offers to donate.
nooooooo no nooo nooooo no nooooo.




International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make
Noooooooooooo noooooooo noo nooooooooo nooooooo, noo no nooooo nooo

any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from
noo nooooooooo nooooooooo noo noooooooo no noooooooo nooooooo nooo

outside the United States.  U.S. laws alone swamp our small staff.
noooooo noo Nooooo Nooooo.  N.N. nooo noooo noooo noo noooo noooo.




Please check the Project Gutenberg Web pages for current donation
Nooooo noooo noo Noooooo Noooooooo Noo noooo noo noooooo nooooooo

methods and addresses.  Donations are accepted in a number of other
noooooo noo noooooooo.  Noooooooo noo nooooooo no n nooooo no noooo

ways including checks, online payments and credit card donations.
nooo noooooooo nooooo, nooooo nooooooo noo nooooo nooo noooooooo.

To donate, please visit: http://pglaf.org/donate
No nooooo, nooooo noooo: nooo://noooo.noo/nooooo







Section 5.  General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic
Noooooo n.  Noooooo Noooooooooo Noooo Noooooo Noooooooo-no nooooooooo

works.
noooo.




Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm
Noooooooo Noooooo N. Nooo no noo nooooooooo no noo Noooooo Noooooooo-no

concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared
noooooo no n noooooo no nooooooooo noooo nooo noooo no nooooo nooooo

with anyone.  For thirty years, he produced and distributed Project
nooo nooooo.  Noo nooooo noooo, no nooooooo noo noooooooooo Noooooo

Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.
Noooooooo-no nOoooo nooo nooo n noooo noooooo no noooooooo noooooo.







Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed
Noooooo Noooooooo-no nOoooo noo noooo noooooo nooo noooooo noooooo

editions, all of which are confirmed as Public Domain in the U.S.
nooooooo, noo no noooo noo noooooooo no Nooooo Nooooo no noo N.N.

unless a copyright notice is included.  Thus, we do not necessarily
nooooo n noooooooo nooooo no nooooooo.  Nooo, no no noo noooooooooo

keep eBooks in compliance with any particular paper edition.
nooo nOoooo no nooooooooo nooo noo nooooooooo noooo noooooo.







Most people start at our Web site which has the main PG search facility:
Nooo nooooo noooo no noo Noo nooo noooo noo noo nooo NO nooooo nooooooo:




     http://www.gutenberg.org
     nooo://noo.noooooooo.noo




This Web site includes information about Project Gutenberg-tm,
Nooo Noo nooo nooooooo noooooooooo noooo Noooooo Noooooooo-no,

including how to make donations to the Project Gutenberg Literary
noooooooo noo no nooo noooooooo no noo Noooooo Noooooooo Nooooooo

Archive Foundation, how to help produce our new eBooks, and how to
Noooooo Nooooooooo, noo no nooo noooooo noo noo nOoooo, noo noo no

subscribe to our email newsletter to hear about new eBooks.
noooooooo no noo noooo nooooooooo no nooo noooo noo nOoooo.
